content: Nongstoiñ, 10 Naitung:U Mawnongrim jong ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division ba la ioh ban plie paidbah da u Myntri Rangbah ka sorkar Jylla u Mukul M Sangma ha ryngkat u HDR Lyngdoh Myntri kam pohiing, u la kylla dur, namar ba la shna noh tang dep, tang namar ban ioh pynrung ia ka kyrteng jong u MLA ka thain u bah H. Witting Mawsor, namar ba ha u Mawnongrim ba la pynkhreh bha ka kyrteng jong u MLA ka thain kam shym la don bad paw satia bad kumta tad haduh ban da pynbeit da kawei pat ka por kam shah shuh namar ba ka la dei noh ka sngi ban plie paidbah hynrei wat la u Mawnongrim u la kylla dur ha ka sngi plie la sngewthuh pat ba yn sa pynbha bad shna bha kham hadien.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta u Rupang u la ioh ban iakren bad u bah H. Witting Mawsor halor katei ka bynta bad na ka liang jong u bah Mawsor u la ong ba katei kaei kaei baroh khoit kadei namar ka jingleh stad jong u DC; namar ba naduh ba u Mukul u la phun sha u tei u MLA ka Mawshynrut ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpyntip ban plie noh ia ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division, na ka liang jong u bah Mawsor wut wut u la phun ia u DC ka West Khasi Hills District, u Arun Kumar Kembhavi IAS bad u la ia kynduh ruh markhmat ia u DC ha Madan Christ King ha ka sngi Tohdieng jong ka taiew ba la lah ha kapor ba ki dang leit ban jurip ia kaba jaka ban pynlong ia ka jingialang plie ia u maw nongrim.“Nga la pynkynmaw ia u DC ba ka kyrteng jong nga kum u local MLA kadei ban don ha u Maw nongrim hynrei u DC u la jubab ia nga da kaba u la ong ba “Protocol Doesn’t Allowed” bad hadien katei nga la buh  jingkylli ia u ba ka protocol aiu kata u kren bad nangno u la ioh hukum? bad na ka liang jong u DC u la jubab ba la hukum da ka Political Department ba um dei ban thoh ia ka kyrteng jongno jongno ruh, hynrei lait tang ka kyrteng jong u Myntri Rangbah bad jong u Myntri kam pohiing bad haba nga kylli ba mano bala hukum ia u bad u DC u la ong ba dei u MS Rao Principal Secreatary Home & Police Department” ong u bah Mawsor.Shuh shuh hadien katei na ka liang jong u bah Mawsor u la ong ba u la pyrshang ban telephun ia u MS Rao, la katto katne sien hynrei um ioh bad hadien pat u la ong biang ia u DC ba ha baroh ki jingplie ia ka Civil Sub Division lane ia ki Block ka kyrteng jong u local MLA jong ka thain ka dei beit ban don namar khamtam ba ka Civil Sub Division Mawshynrut kadei hapoh Iing jong u bad dei ma u ban pdiang kum ka jingiadonlang (In Presence) bad ia ka burom dei ban ioh lut sha ka sorkar bad kumjuh u kongsan bad u symbud kongsan ki dei na ka sorkar,  hynrei kum ka dak jong ka jingiadon lang ka kyrteng jong u local MLA kadei ban don.“Hynrei kaba sngew lyngngoh ka long ba u DC u la iai ong beit ba um lah ban leh ei ei lada um ioh ia ka hukum bad hadien ba nga la sngew dom nga la phun noh ia u Myntri Rangbah bad kumjuh ia u HDR Lyngdoh ban pyntip ia katei ka jingjia bad na ka liang jong ki ruh ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew lyngngoh halor katei ka jingbymthoh lang ia ka kyrteng jong u MLA ha u Mawnongrim bad hadien katei na ka liang jong u Myntri Rangbah bad u myntri ka kam pohiing ki la hukum ba dei ban kynthup lang ia ka kyrteng jong u local MLA ha u Mawnongrim bad kumta na ka liang jong u DC shimiet shimiet ki hap ban leh ia ka ban pynrung ia ka kyrteng ka jong nga ha u Mawnongrim” ong biang u bah Mawsor.U bah Mawsor hadien bala wai ka jingialang plie ia u Mawnongrim mynta ka sngi u la leit iakynduh markhmat bad u MS Rao ban kylli ba ka dei shisha ne em ba dei ma u u ba la hukum ia u DC ban nyn thoh ia ka kyrteng jong u local MLA bad na ka liang jong u MS Rao u la jubab da kaba u ong Em bad u la ong ruh ba kam don kaba kum kata ka hukum bad u bah Mawsor u la ia kynduh ruh ia u DC bad u la ong ba “Phi la thok ia nga bad nga la sngewthuh ruh ba katei ka dei ka jingleh stad jong u DC ka Nongstoin bad nga la ong ruh ia u DC ba lada u kwah ban iatreilang nangne sha khmat um dei ban leh stad palat”.Ha kaba iadei pat bad ka jingpynkhreh ia ka jingialang plie ia u mawnongrim jong ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division kaba long tang lai sngi na ka liang jong u bah Mawsor u la ai khublei kyrpang ia baroh ki ophisar sorkar bad kumjuh ia kito kiba la iadon bynta baroh namar ba kila trei shitom haduh katta katta ban pynlong ia ka sngi kaba mynta ban iphuh iphieng bad ym i kop ruh ba ka jingpynkhreh ka long tang lai sngi, hynrei la I kumba la pynkhreh lypa da ki taiew.
title: Leh stad U DC, ba jah kyrteng U MLA  Mawshynrut, ong U bah Witting

content: Shillong, 03 Naitung:U MLA ka Nongthymmai u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la sam borti ADB (Asian Development Bank) na ka bynta ban theh niut ha ka shnong Lapalang ha kane ka sngi. Ha ka thain Nongthymmai ki don 11 tylli ki shnong kiba la iasoi bad ka tnad pynroi sor ka sorkar ban pyntreikam ia kane ka projek pynkhuid shabar ka jaka ka Municipal.Ha kane ka sngi, la don lang u Rangbah Shnong, u secretary, Rangbah dong bad kiwei ha kaba da ki spah tylli ki longiing ki la wan ban shimti ia u borti.Ka shnong Lapalang ka dei kawei napdeng ki 11 tylli ki shnong kiba hap shabar ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) kiba la mynjur ban wan kit niut da ka kali Municipal.Kine ki shnong ki la iasoi ia ka jingiateh bad ka sorkar ba kan pyntreikam ia ka skhim pynkhuid ia ka sor kaba la bei pisa da ka Asian Development Bank (ADB).Ki shnong kiba la iasoi ia ka Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) ki long ka Mawlai Mawiong, Lapalang, Lawjynriew, Lumsohphoh, Nongmensong, RR Colony, Rynjah, Umpling bad na ka thain Nongthymmai.Katkum ka jingong ka sorkar ka jingpdiang ban wan kit niut ki kali Municipal, kam mut ba kan tuklar ban pynrung ia ki ha ka jaka ka Municipal hynrei kin neh haka jingpeit ka district council ha ka Scheduled Area.la ong ba kane ka skhim pynkhuid ia ka sor ka long ban pyniakhlad ia ki jaboh ba pyut bad ki bym pyut ha kaba ka ADB ka la bei pisa na ka bynta kane.
title: Ioh borti thieh niut ka Lapalang, kaba shabar ka Municipal

content: Shillong, 03 Naitung:Ka jingiakhih sangeh trei kaba la iaid sha ka shi taiew jong ki nongtrei ka Meghalaya Transport Corporation Workers’ Union (MTCWU) ka la ktah ia ka leit ka wan jong ki bos MTC kiba iaid shabar jylla bad hapoh ka jylla.Bun bah ki nongwan jngohkai sha kane ka jylla, ki la sah ei bad kim ioh ban leit ban wan da ka bos MTC kynthup kito kiba thmu ban thied tiket namar ba ka khang lut hadien ba ka sorkar kam shym la jubab eiei haduh mynta ia ka jingdawa jongki, ban pynneh shwa ia ka Kong Adalyne Nikhli kum ka Managing Director.Hynrei ia ki skul bos la pynlait noh namar ba ka ktah jur ia ki khynnah skul.Ki nongtrei jong ka MTC ki la sangeh treikam naduh ka 27 tarik Jylliew da kaba dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynneh ia ka Kong Nikhla.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, u general secretary ka MTCWU, u Bah K. Rumnong u la ong ba ka jingsangeh triekam kan bteng beit namar ba kam don kano kano ka khubor na ka sorkar kaba la phah sha ki haduh kine ki sngi.“Baroh ki kam ki jam jong ka MTC la weng lut. Ka jingdawa jong ngi ka long ban pynsangeh noh ia ka jingweng ia ka Kong Nikhla na ka kam MD MTC,” u la ong.Ha kawei ka liang, u Chief Secretary, u Y. Tsering u la kyntait ban kren eiei halor kane, hynrei u shu ong ba ka sorkar ka don ki kyndon pyniaid ia ki nongtrei sorkar.“Ngi don la ki jong ki kyndon bad ki rule bad ngin peit namar ba ia baroh ki nongtrei sorkar la hap hapoh ka rule”, la ong u Chief secretary.
title: Bteng ka jingsangeh trei ki  nongtrei MTC la shi taiew

content: Jowai, 3 Naitung:Da ki spah ngut ki khynnah skul ka HK Singh Memorial Secondary School, Jowai ha ryngkat ka jingiatreilang ki pulit ka Jowai Traffic Branch ki la mih paidbah ban pynkhuid ia ka Iawmusiang ha ki bynta bapher bapher naduh na phyllaw skul shaduh thanad, Newhill, Wah-Nangbah Road bad Thomas Jones Road.Kane ka long shibynta ban wanrah ia ka jingkhuid ia ka nongbah Jowai bad ha kajuh ka por ban pynpaw sha ki paidbah ba donkam ban sumar khuid ia ki jaka paidbah lada ha ki surok ne ha ki ophis sorkar bad wat ha ki skul bad haiing lajong.
title: Mih ki khynnah skul bad ki pulit,  ban pynkhuid Iew Musiang

content: Shillong, 03 Naitung:Ka HSPDP Mawthadraishan Constituency Area Unit ka pynrem bad pyrshah jur ia ka jingleh lyndet bad jingshet shukor jong u Bah Blandingstar Warjri u MDC, ia ka seng, ia ki nongialam ba hakhlieh jong ka seng bad ia ki nongkyrshan ba lui lui kiba la trei shitom met bad mynsiem ban pynjop ia u.Ha ka kyrwoh ba la pyllait, la ong ba une u MDC u khlem kynjoh ktien wat tang shi kyntien ruh ia ki nongialam bad nongkyrshan jong ka seng, hynrei ula shu jah rngai kumto kumba shah rah ha u ksuid tynjang naduh ka miet 19tarik Jylliew 2017 bad dei tad haduh ka janmiet jong ka 22tarik Jylliew 2017 hadien ba la wai ka dorbar jong ka KHADC ba u sa wan mihpaw pyrthei ban kren ha ki lad pathai khubor bad ula pynbna artad ba shispah na ka shispah ula rai ban leit pyniasoh bad ai jingkyrshan ia ka PDF, kaba long pyrshah ia ka rai jong ka seng, kaba la dep weng noh ia ka jingkyrshan na katei ka kynhun.Ka seng bad ki paidbah nongkyrshan ki la jied ia u ban leit shong ha iing dorbar ban iasaid ia ki jingeh jong ka constituency, ka ri bad ka jaidbynriew bad la ong “Ngi khlem jied ia u ba un leit shong riehtngen ha ki pyntha phlang ba jyrngam jong ka jingdum”.Ka jingleh jong u Bah Blandingstar Warjri MDC, ka dei ka jingleh kaba la pynsah umdum ha kaba ka HSPDP Mawthadraishan ka pynrem jur namar tang hapoh ki 6 bnai ba u la jop, u la pynkhein ia la ka kular ba u la khlei ban ieng skhem halor ki nongrim jong ka seng kaba la pynjop ia u. Ka jingleh jong u ka dei ruh ka jingiuhroit bad ka jingthombor ia ka hok jong ki nongkyrshan ba lui lui jong ka party kiba la pynjop don burom ia u ha ka bye election MDC kaba dang shu dep shen ha u bnai December 2016.Ka HSPDP Mawthadraishan, ka dawa ia u Bah Blandingstar Warjri MDC ba u dei ban resain noh mardor na ka kam MDC ba u bat bad um don hok shuh ba un dang bteng ia katei ka kam namar dei ka HSPDP kaba la pynjop ia u; ym dei ba u la jop hi.Ha ka juh ka por ka HSPDP Mawthadraishan Constituency Area Unit ka kyrpad ia baroh ki nongialam jong ki Primary Unit bad baroh ki nongkyrshan jong ka seng kiba hap hapoh ka Mawthadraishan constituency ba kim dei shuh ban shah ialam bakla ha utei u MDC uba la shet shukor bad phet noh na ka party. Ka party ka long kaba la pynkhreh ban iakhun bad ban ioh ia ka jingjop ba don burom ha ka election MLA 2018 arshah ban ia kaba ngi la pynjop ia u Bah Blandingstar Warjri uba la phet noh na ka seng.
title: “Risain noh Bah Blanding” dawa  ka HSPDP Mawthadraishan

content: Jowai, 3 Naitung:Ka kynhun ki nongtuh ki la prong ia ka bank Nongkyndong lane ka Meghalaya Rural Bank, Rymbai Brank bad ki la ioh ban rong haduh 3 tylli ki kor Kompiwtor kiba pyndonkam hapoh katei ka Bank.Ka nongtrei jong katei ka bank ka la kyndit ban iohi ba ka jingkhang ba na shadien ka la plie bad ia u tala la dep ot haba wan trei mynta ka step sngi Nyngkong.Ka Bank ka la khang naduh ka sngi Saitjain bad ha ka sngi U Blei bad ym lah ban tip mynno ki nongtuh ki la rung shapoh katei ka bank la ha ka miet sngi Saitjain ne miet sngi U Blei.Ki Pulit ka East Jaintia Hills ki la iathuh ba kitei ki nongtuh kim shym la ktah ia kaei kaei laitnoh tang ia kitei ki lai tylli ki kor Compiwtor.“Kim shym la rung wat shapoh kamra u Manager bad khamtam sha kamra kyrpang (Strong Room)”, la ong ki pulit kiba tohkit ia kane ka jingjia.
title: Ot ki nongtuh ia ka tala, rung ha Bank ha Rymbai

content: Shillong, 3 Naitung:Hynnin ka sngi, ki pulit ki la ioh kem ia saw tylli ki trok kit dewiong. Ka kali kaba don ia u number AS-01HC-8648, ka dei kaba la niah da U Kalvinson (32), ka number HR-61C-2148, ba la niah da U Pranding Nongbri, ka number AS-01FC-5057, ba niah da U Tahir Ali bad ka No ML-04C-4168. Kitei ki kali, la ioh kem da ki pulit Ri Bhoi, katba ki dang iaid ha ka National Highway – 40. Ki pulit ki la kem ia ki nongniah bad ki nongbud jong kitei ki trok.
title: Kurup ki  pulit 4 ki trok dewiong

content: Shillong, 3 Naitung:Mynta ka janmiet, ki arngut ki hep rit kiba na Mawlai Nongpdeng, kawei kaba dang 11 snem bad kawei pat kaba dang 8 snem ka rta, ki la shah rahbor ha lai ngut ki briew sha Golflink bad ynda poi ha madan Golflink, ki la iehnoh ia ki hangtei khlem da leh sniew eiei satia.Ki lad khubor ki ia thuh ba kitei ki ar ngut ki khynnah kynthei, ki mih na iing bad ki rah ia ka bol ban ialehkai phutbol hajan iing, hynrei la wan poi kawei ka kali jyrngam, kaba don lai ngut ki briew (kaba kim tip bha ka dei ka kali aiu) bad ki la thep ia ki hapoh kali bad arngut na kitei ki nongrahbor, ki shong lang bad ki ha ka jaka shong kaba hadien, katba uwei pat u dei u nongniah kali bad kitei kiba shong hadien, ki set ia kitei ki hep rit na shyntur bad ki teh ruh da ki tyllai na kjat. Ha lynti sha Golflink, la iathuh ba uwei u la thmu ban bat bor ia kawei na kitei ki hep rit.Ynda poi ha Golflink, lehse, ka lah ban dei ba kam pat dum bha ka bneng, ki la pyllait noh ia kitei ki arngut ki hep rit bad kitei ki la iaid sakma ha surok bah bad haba la lap da ki briew kiba kham rangbah, ki la phah ba kin leit ia kynduh ia ki pulit kiba don ha PTS bad ba la shimti noh da ki pulit jong ka Pasteur ban wad ia ki jingshisha halor ka jingshah rahbor jong kitei ki arngut ki hep rit.Kitei ki hep rit, kim da ithuh dur khmat bha ia kitei ki nongrahbor, hynrei la iathuh ba uwei na kitei, u dei uba tap tuppia bad uba lyngkot ka rynieng jongu.U Bah KW Chyne Rangbah Shnong ka Mawlai Nongpdeng, haba iakren bad U Rupang, u iathuh ba kiba ha iing jong kitei ki khynnah kiba jah, ki khlem leit pyntip eiei satia halor katei ka jingjia sha u, kum u khlieh jong ka Shnong, hynrei ula pyntip lem toi ma u, hadien ba ula ioh jingtip na ki pulit, ba ki la lap ia kitei ki khynnah rit, kiba dei na katei ka Shnong bad kaba ula pyntip ia ki, ha ka por 7baje mynta janmiet, ha kaba ula bthah ruh ia ki, ba kin leit peit ia la ki jong ki khun sha Pasteur Beat House, namar ba ki don ha katei ka thanat jong ki pulit. Lait nangta U bah Chyne, u iathuh ba um tip eiei shuh ia kaei kaba la jia ia kitei arngut ki khynnah rit, wat la u iathuh ba u shu tip, ba ki dei kiba 8 bad 11 snem ka rta.
title: Shah rahbor 2 ki hep rit na  Mawlai Nongpdeng sha Golflink

content: Shillong, 4 Naitung:Ka seng ki samla pule na ri Lum Garo kaba la tip kum ka Achik Students’ Welfare Association (ASWA) ka la weng noh ia ki jingbyrngem ia khih jong ka namarba tang mar ia dawa ka sorkar ka la pynurlong noh khlem da pynslem shuh ia ka jingdawa jong ka. Katei ka seng ka la byrngem ia khih halor ka jingbym ioh jaka pule jong ki samla Garo kiba don kumba 700 ngut ha ka kolej sorkar kaba don ha Tura hynrei tang san sngi shuwa ban kut katei ka por ba ki la buh ka sorkar ka la pynurlong noh ia ka jingdawa jong ki.Ha ka kyrwoh khubor u General secretary katei ka seng u Harley Davidson N Sangma u la ong “Ka jingpynurlong u Dr.Mukul Sangma ia ka jingdawa jong ngi tang hapoh san sngi ba ngi dawa ka la pynum ia ka dohnud jong ngi, ngim donkam shuh ban ia khih namar katei ka mat” ong ka kyrwoh haba pyntip ba la pynrung lut baroh 700 ngut eiei ki samla pule ha ka kolej sorkar ha Tura.Ia kane u la ong ba la pyntip sha katei ka seng da u Principal ka Tura Govt College mynta hi ka sngi, “U la iathuh ba la hukum ba dei ban pynrung klas lut khlem pynslem” ong katei ka kyrwoh kaba la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban mang tyngka na bynta katei ka kolej ban pynbun ia ki nonghikai bad ki nongtrei bad kumjuh ban pynheh ia ka khnang ba katei ka jingeh kan ym mih manla u snem kumhba ju long baroh shi katta.
title: Mar ia dawa, mar ia long, kmen ki Garo

content: Shillong, 4 Naitung:Ka la don ka jingnang kiew ki kynthei kiba dih drok ha ka nongbah kiba hapdeng ka rta 15-16 snem, la ong ka nongkren ha ka jingiaid paidbah pyrshah drok ha ka nongbah mynta ka sngi ba pynlong da ka National Health Mission (NHM), Meghalaya and Red FM.“Ka jingdon ki kynthei kiba dih drok ka la nangkiew ha ka nongbah bad ia kane la pynshisha lyngba ka jingwan rejister ha centre ha Civil Hospital Shillong bad kine ki dei hapdeng ka rta 15-16 snem”, la ong ka kong Phida Dkhar ka nonghikai ia kiba kyrni dih drok.Ka la ong ba ka daw halor kane kaba pynngop ia ki thei samla ka dei namar ka jingiakynduh jingeh ha iing ha sem jongki bad ka jingshah pynshoi ha ki paralok.“Ka jingbym don ka jingiasyllok jong ki kmie ki kpa bad ban iashong kai bad la ki khun ban sneng ban kraw ka la long kawei ka daw kaba pynlong ia ki kynthei ban kylla dih drok namar ka jingshah ialam bakla”, la ong ka Kong Dkhar.Ka la ong ruh ba bunsien ki kmie ki kpa ha kane ka juk kim don por ban iashsongkai ban sneng ia la ki khun bad ki bun kam ban ia beh ia ki kam ki jam ne kiwei ki daw pat.Ka la iathuh ba kine ki Kynthei ki shah pynbor ha ki Kmie ki kpa ba kin leh bha khamtam ha ka jingpule bad kiwei ki kam wat hapdeng ka jingbym Mon jongki run bad Kane ka la ialam ia ki ban phai noh pynban sha ki kam bym man namar ka jingsuhsat ka jingim.Namar Kane ka jingbym iasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki Kmie bad kpa khamtam ka jingbym Don por ki Kmie ki kpa ban iasyllok ban iaphylliew jingmut bad ki khun ka la pynlong ia ki Khun ban shah ialam bakla.Kumba long mynta ki don kumba 2000 ngut kiba kyrni drok kiba rejister ha ka nongbah bad kine ki wan shah Sumar man u B’nai ha civil hospital.Ka Kong Dkhar kala kyntu ia ki kmie ki kpa ba kin sngewthuh ba kin ialam ia ki khun jongki lada kiba iakynduh ia kum kane ka jingeh sha ka jaka kaba la buh ha Civil Hospital, Shillong lane ha Ganesh Das hospital.Ka NHM hynne ka la pynlong ia ka jingpynshai ia ki jingsniew na u drok ha jaka ieng bos ha Mawlai, bad ka la don ruh ka jingkyntip ha kaba ki briew ki jubab bad kiba dei ka jubab ki ioh khusnam.
title: Na ka daw iing, poi kyrni dih  drok ki thei samla ha ka nongbah

content: Shillong, 4 Naitung:Ka jingphet ki MLA na kawei ka seng sha kawei pat kan jur bha ha ka elekshon MLA 2018, ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ki ban bun ka jingphet seng dei ki MLA na ka seng Congress bad kin don katto katne ngut ki ban phet na ki seng riewlum ruh. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba kiba bun ki MLA ki ban phet seng shuwa ka elekshon 2018 ki dei ki ban leit ia soh sha ka seng NPP kaba ialam mynta da u MP ka Tura Parliamentary konstitwensi u Conrad K Sangma.La iathuh ba ha ki katto katne tylli ki konstitwensi ka seng Congress ka la buh briew lypa watla ki la don ki MLA ba mynta jong ka ruh, kawei na ki konstitwensi ba katei ka seng ka la pynkhreh ban buh kandidet da uwei pat ha ka jaka u MLA ka dei ka Mawkyrwat konstitwensi ha kaba la ong ba don ki nongialam ka seng Congress kiba kwah ban ym ai tiket shuh sha u bah Rowell Lyngdoh, MLA ba mynta uba la shah pynhap na ka shuki symbud myntri rangbah. Haduh mynta la iathuh ba ka Congress ka thmu ban pyniakhun da u MDC ka Langrin u bah Manstudy Nongrem na Mawkyrwat konstitwensi, wat la kin don kiwei pat ki ban pan tiket ba kynthup ia u President barim ka KSU Delhi Unit u bah Kynpham Lyngdoh.Tang mar ia iohsngew ia katei ka khubor la ong ba ka seng NPP ka la sdang ban phaikhmat sha u bah Rowell Lyngdoh ban pyniakhun na katei ka seng ha u 2018 , ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ka jingiakren hapdeng kitei ki ar kynhun ka dang iaid haduh mynta. Ki nongialam ka NPP ki la kyntait ia katei ka jingiakren bad u bah Rowell hynrei ki lad khubor ba iajan bad katei ka seng ki la iathuh ba ka jingiakren ka dang iaid shakhmat.Kumba ka long mynta katei ka lad khubor ka la iathuh ba ka NPP ka la jan ioh ban tan lut ia ki kha heh jong ka seng Congress ban ia khun na katei ka Party ha u 2018, la iathuh ruh ba un don sa uwei pat u kha heh na ka seng UDP u ba nwan ban pyniasoh ha ka por kaba biang. Ki nongialam katei ka seng ki la kren sngewskhem ba ha u 2018 kin bat ia ka bor synshar ha kane ka jylla da kaba ia thaw sorkar lang bad kiwei pat ki seng lait noh ka Congress.Ha kawei pat ka lad khubor la iathuh ba ka jingiadei u bah Rowell Lyngdoh bad ki nongialam Congress ka la nang jngai nang jngai ha kine ki sngi bad la sngewthuh ba wat ma u ruh u sngew duh jingkyrmen bha ban ioh tiket ha u 2018. Ki nongkyrshan jong u bah Rowell ki la iathuh ba ha ka jingshisha u la don jingthmu ban shongthait noh mynta u 2018 hynrei ka jingshah pynhiar shuki na ka kyrdan symbud myntri rangbah ka la pynsat sia ia u bad dei kate ka daw kaba la pynlong ba un ia khun biang ha u 2018.
title: Na UDP yn don ban ia soh NPP, phai  sha U Bah Rowell na Mawkyrwat

content: Shillong, 4 Naitung:Ki nongialam jong ki lai tylli ki sengbha-lang, kiba kynthup ia U bah Wellbirth Rani, President FKJGP, U bah Bipul Thangkhiew President RBYF bad U bah GH Kharshanlor President HNYF, ki kren shai ba ka sorkar Jylla, ka dei ban pynsangeh ia ka jing pyntrei ia ka lynti rel ha Ri Khasi.Ka kyrwoh na kitei ki seng, ka ong shuh shuh ba ka jingleh mynthi jong ka sorkar, ka pynlong ba kitei ki lai seng, kin shong jingialang, ha ka 7tarik Naitung 2017 bad ba kin shim ia ki rai iakhih bad ba kin sa pynbna bad pynshai paidbah hadien jong katei ka jingialang, ong ka kyrwoh na ki lai tylli ki seng.
title: 7tarik, yn rai iakhih lai ki Sengbhalang

content: Shillong, 04 Naitung:Ka UDP kam pat iakren eiei ban kyrshan ia u kyrtong President ka NDA ne ka UPA. Ka NDA ka la sei da u Ram Nath Kovind katba ka UPA ka la pynieng da ka Meira Kumar hynrei kan leit ban sngap ia ka jingwan ialap elekshon ka kyrtong ka UPA ka Meira Kumar lashai ka sngi ha ka nongbah.U General secretary ka UDP u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la ong mynta ka sngi, ba ka UDP kam pat shym la iakren iano ban kyrshan ha kane ka elekshon President ka ri hynrei na bynta lashai, kaba la khot da ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee ia ka jingwan ka Meira Kumar, ka party kan leit ban sngap ia ka jingkren jongka. U la ong ruh ba ka party kan leit ruh ban sngap ia ka jingialap elekshon jong u kyrtong ka NDA u Ram Nath Kovind ynda u la wan sha kane ka nongbah.“Hadien ba ngi la ioh ban sngap ia ka jingialap jongki baroh ar ngut, ka party kan sa iakren iano ban kyrshan”, la ong u Dr Mawthoh.Wat la ka UDP ka don lang ha ka rynsan ka North East Democratic Alliance (NEDA) kaba ialam da ka BJP, hynrei ka la kren shai ba ka NEDA ka dei tang ka rynsan ban iakren ia ka kam pynroi kiba iadei bad kane ka dong mihngi hynrei kam dei ka rynsan politik.Na ka liang ka NPP ka la dep pynbna ba kan kyrshan beit ia u kyrtong ka NDA katba kiwei ki seng khamtam ki seng riewlum kum ka HSPDP, NCP kim pat pynpaw halor kane.Ka kyrtong ka UPA ka Meira Kumar kan wan lashai ha ka nongbah ba kan ialap elekshon na ki MLA ban kyrshan ia ka.Kumba ka paw, u kyrtong ka NDA u la don lypa ha ka lynti ban jop lada ym shet kylla ki MLA bad MPs kiba don lang ha ka NDA.Ka elekshon President ka ri kan long ha ka 17 tarik Naitung katba ka elekshon Vice President kan long ha ka 5 tarik Nailar.
title: Ym pat iakren ka UDP,  iano ban kyrshan President

content: Nongstoiñ, 05 Naitung:Ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong ka thain Kynroh kaba don ha West Khasi Hills District, bad ki shnong ba marjan kila iakynduh ia ka jingeh kaba khraw namar ka jingnang sniew jong ka surok Nongstoin-Kynroh bad na Jaidoh sha Nongkasen, katba nang mih ki sngi bad kipor kaba la pynsyllang shisha ia ki paidbah ha kiba bun ki liang khamtam kaba la pynthut ia ka iaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah.Hadien ka jingiai ud jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong katei ka thain halor ka jingsniew jong katei ka surok kaba la palat pud na ka liang jong ka seng Hynniew Trep Youth Council (HYC) Nongstoin Circle ha ka sngi balang jong ka taiew kala leit ban buh bad aiti ruh da ka jing thoh sha u Executive Engineer ka tnad PWD Nongstoin Division ba un shimkhai ban leh ei ei noh kham kloi ha kaba iadei bad katei ka surok.Na ka liang jong u samla Lumlang president ka HYC Nongstoin Circle u la ong ba ki katto katne ki mat ia kaba ka seng kala leit ban buh ia ka jingthoh halor ki tei ki surok ki kynthup ha kaba iadei bad ka surok Nongstoin haduh Kynroh, ha kaba katei ka surok ka jingthliew kala long shaba palat haduh ba ki kali kiba iaid ba ieng ki la shem jynjar haduh katta katta bad kaba ar pat ka long ha kaba iadei bad ka surok na Kynroh sha jaidoh ha kaba katei ka surok kiba bun ki jaka ym shym la pat siangrong bad katei ka pynlyngngoh haduh katta katta ia ka seng ha kaba ha kano ka rukom ka tnad PWD ka ailad ia ki kontraktor ban shu leh katba mon khlem da pyndep.Ym tang kata ka seng kala kren ruh ia ka surok na jaidoh sha Mynnimawbri, ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jing trei kala urlong kumba 3 Km, katta kumba la kular da u Chief Engineer bad halor kane ka surok ka seng ka kyntu ia ka ophis jong ka PWD ba kan shim khia ban peit bad pyntrei bha katkum bala mang bad ruh ia ka surok na Mynnimawbri sha Mawkaton ha kaba katei ka surok haduh mynta ym shym la pat siangrong satia watla ia katei ka surok la shna la kham slem bad kane ka la pynsoh sat khamtam eh ia ki nongrep.Kumta na ka liang jong ka seng ka dawa ba ka tnad PWD ka dei ban leh ei ei noh mardor bad ban shim ruh ia ka jingkit khlieh ban siangrong noh ia kane ka surok bad ka seng ka la kyntu ruh ia ka tnad ba nalor kitei ki surok bala pynpaw ka seng kala ibit ruh ba ka tnad PWD ka la dei ban maramot noh ia ka surok na Mawkaton sha Nongkasen.Na kaliang u samla Lumlang u la ong ruh ba ka seng ha katei kajingthoh kala pynpaw ruh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingjot jong ka surok na duh Jaidoh sha Nongkasen ka daw ka dei namar ba ki muster roll kim da wan trei tikna, kaba ar ka jing jot jong katei ka surok ka dei namar ym pat siangrong bad ym pat siang maw bad nalor katta sa kajing iaid jong ki trok kit shyiap, maw bad dieng haduh ba kala pynlong shisha kajing eh ia ka iaid ka ieng jong ki kali rit.
title: Sniew palat surok Nongstoin –  Kynroh, Jaidoh sha Nongkasen

content: Shillong, 05 Naitung:U Dr Donkupar Roy, President ka UDP, u la ong ba ka sorkar ka don ka lad ban wad na ka bynta ban pynbeit ia ka jingeh jong ka jingmih na ka jingiakhih ki sengbhalang halor ka lynti rel.“Ka donkam ia ka jingmir jingmut kaba bniah bha halor kane ka kam shwa ba ka sorkar kan shim ia ka rai ban iaid shakhmat”, la ong u Dr Donkupar haba twad jing-mut kaei ka jingsngew jongu ia ka jingpyrshah ki sengbhalang.U la ong ba ka sorkar ka don ka lad ban pynbeit bad ki kynhun ba pyrshah ia ka lynti rel, namar ba lada iapyni bor kan nym poi shaei shaei, hynrei kan wanrah pynban ia kaba kham sniew.“Ka sorkar ka don ka lad ban pynbeit ia ka jingeh”, la ong u President ka UDP bad bynrap, ba ka donkam ban iakren bha ia kane la ka long kaba myntoi ne em ia ki trai shnong lada wan ka lynti rel.U la kubur ba kum ka jylla ka donkam ia ki lad ki lynti ban tehlakam shwa ia ka jingwan ki briew nabar namar ba lada ka jingwan ka lynti rel ka long ka jingma ia ki trai shnong, kam long kaba bha.Ka jingiakhih ka KSU ban pyrshah ia ka lynti rel ka la jan poi sha ka shi bnai hynrei na ka liang ka sorkar kam shym la khot iakren satia ia ki watla bun ki kynhun kynthup ki seng sain pyrthei, ki sengbhalang ki la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba kan khot iakren ban iapynbeit noh ia ka jingeh.Kham mynshwa, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la pynneh da kaba ong ba ka sorkar kan nym khot iakren ia ka seng katba ka dang bteng ban leh ia ki kam bymman ban pynthut ia ka suk ka sain.
title: Ka sorkar ka don lad ban pynbeit  jingeh lynti rel, ong u Dr Don

content: Shillong, 05 Naitung:Ka Meira Kumar, ka kyrtong president ka ri ka UPA kaba don 17 tylli ki seng, ka la wan ha ka nongbah mynta ka sngi ha kaba ka la pynlong ia ka jingialap elekshon ha annexed hall ka iing dorbar ka jylla.Haba kren sha ki MLA ha kane ka jingialang, ka Meira ka la ong ba ka shim ia kane ka rai ban mih madan ban iakhun ia kane ka elekshon ka long namar ba ka kwah ban pynieng ia ka nongrim ne ka ideology pyrshah ia ka sorkar NDA kaba la pyrshang ban set kak ia ka sur jong ki paidbah ka ri.“Nga ieng ha ka nongrim ban iakhun ia kane elekshon bad nga kyrmen ba ka sur ba napoh ka jingiatiplem hapdeng ki MLA,MP kan treikam ban kyrshan ia nga”, la ong ka Meira.Ha kane ka jingialang, bun ki MLA ba kham paw ka Congress kiba jah kum U Bah Prestone Tynsong, Kong Roshan Warjri, Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh kim shym la wan poi, hynrei ki MLA na kiwei ki seng, kiba wan sngap ki long na ka UDP ba kynthup u President u Dr Donkupar Roy, u Dr Jemino Mawthoh bad u Bah TW Chyne.“Ha ka jingialang hapoh ka jingialam ka President ka AICC ka Sonia Gandhi ki 17 tylli ki seng sain pyrthei ki la rai lang ban pynieng ia nga ha ka nongrim ka idoloji. Ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong ba ka elekshon President ha ka ri la ialeh da ka nongrim ka idoloji”, ka la ong.Ka la ther ia ka sorkar NDA ba ialam da u Narendra Modi da kaba kynnoh ba ka jinglait luit jong ki niam, ka jinglait luit jong ka bam, ka la shah khang, ha kaba ka sorkar ka la hukum ia ki briew iano ban mane, iano ban bam.“Shano shano ba nga leit ka la don ka sur kaba sngew tynnad bad kane ka dei ka jingialap ba nyngkong jong nga ha kane ka dong mihngi”, ka la ong.Ia ka Meira la synrang lang u CP Joshi u genl secretary uba peit ia ka Meghalaya, u Pawan Bansal uba long myntri sorkar barim ka UPA, nalor u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma, u President ka MPCC u Bah DD Lapang bad kiwei ki MLA ka Congress.Katkum ka sur mynta u kyrtong ka NDA u Ram Nath Kovind, u la don ha ka thong ban rah suk ia ka jingjop lada kam don ka jingiashet kylla hapdeng ki MLA bad MP.
title: Ngan iakhun President da  ka ideology, ong ka Meira

content: Shillong, 5 Naitung:U National Joint Secretary ka BJP u B.L Santhosh u la ong ba ka BJP ka la ioh ban synshar ha ki saw tylli ki jylla ka thaiñ shatei Lam Mihngi kata ka Assam, ka Arunachal Pradesh, Manipur bad Nagaland bad mynta ki sngi ki por ki la hajan eh ba katei ka seng kan ioh synshar sa ha ka jylla Meghalaya. “Ia ka Assam, Arunachal Pradesh, Manipur bad Nagaland ngi la ioh, ka por ba ngin synshar ia ka Meghalaya ka la hajan eh” ong u B.L Santhosh haba kren ha ka jingialang jong ka BJP kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Mawlong, Shella konstitwensi.Utei u heh BJP u la ong ba kumba ka long mynta ka BJP ka don 13 ngut ki myntri rangbah ha ki 13 tylli ki jylla jong ka ri India bad lada kheiñlang bad kiwei pat ki jylla kiba la synshar da ka kynhun kaba ia tehlok bad ka BJP kata ka NDA ka jingdon ki myntri rangbah ka long haduh 17 ngut, “Ha u 2018 u myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya ruh un dei na ka seng BJP” ong utei u heh BJP uba la wan ban peit pyrman ia ka jinglong jingman katei ka seng ha Shella konstitwensi. U Santhosh u la ioh ban ia kren markhmat mynta ka sngi bad ki nongialam jong ki Unit bapher bapher jong ka BJP Shella Mandal kiba la poi kumha 250 ngut eiei ha katei ka jingialang kaba la long ha Mawlong.Ha katei ka jingialang la donlang u President rangbah ka BJP ha ka jylla Meghalaya u bah Shibun Lyngdoh, u Vice President bah David Kharsati, u President ka BJP East Khasi Hills District u bah Babul Suting, u bah Jropsing Nongkhlaw Chief Organiser ka Shella Mandal u ban long ruh u kyrtong na katei ka seng ha ka elekshon 2018 na Shella konstitwensi bad kiwei pat ki nongialam jong katei ka seng. U bah Shibun Lyngdoh haba kren ha katei ka jingialang u la ong ba ha ka seng BJP ki don 4 ngut ki General Secretary bad ka kamram jong kitei ki 4 ngut ka dei ban leit sha ki nongbah jong ki jylla bapher bapher ha ka ri India, hynrei nalor kitei u la ong ba ki don pat sa ki Joint Secretary bad ka kamram jong ki Joint Secretary ka long ban rung sha manla ki kyndong kynshrot jong ka jylla kumhba u B.L Santhosh u la wan sha Shella konstitwensi.Shuwa ka elekshon 2018 u bah Shibun u la ong ba kin don bun ki nongialam jong ka BJP na Delhi ban rung sha ki kyndong kynshrot jong ka jylla ban pynsngewthuh paidbah bad u la ong ruh ba ka kam ka BJP kia mynta hi ka dei ban pynsngewthuh paidbah ia ka jingkordor ka synshar paidbah bad ka vote ka wan pat hadien. Ha katei ka jingialang ki nongialam katei ka seng ki la pynsngew ia kiba bun ki mat halor ka jingiaid lynti jong ka sorkar NDA hapoh ka jingialam jong ka seng BJP kaba la 3 snem kynthih mynta bad ki la kdew ba ka ri ka la lait na ka bamsap hapoh ka jingialam jong ka BJP. U bah Jropsing Nongkhlaw haba kren ha katei ka jingialang u la ong ba ka dei tang ka jingialang jong ki nongialam Unit na ki Polling Booth bapher bapher bad kam dei kaba la khot paidbah satia. La pynlong ia katei ka jingialang ha Indoor Stadium, Mawlong.
title: “U myntri rangbah ha Meghalaya un dei na ka seng BJP”

content: Shillong, 05 Naitung:Katba ka kyrtong President ka UPA ka Meira Kumar ka la kam ba ka UDP ka la ai ka jingkyrshan ia ka, na ka bynta kane ka elekshon President ka ri, hynrei na ka liang u president ka UDP U Dr Donkupar Roy u la kyntait ia kane ka jingkam jongka.“Nga sngew kmen ba u nongialam ka liang-pyrshah u Dr Donkupar Roy u la ai jingkyrshan lang ia nga ha kane ka elekshon President”, la ong ka Meira haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi ha Shillong ha ka jingwan iuhkjat jongka ban ialap elekshon.Ha kane ka jingialang ialap elekshon jongka, na ka liang ka UDP ruh hapoh ka jingialam u Dr Donkupar Roy, ki la wan ban sngap ia ka jingkren jongka.“Ma ngi ki politishian ngim dei kiba lui lui. Ngi leit sha ka jingialang ban sngap ban ioh sngew ia kaei ka nongrim ba ka kren. Kam mut ba ngi leit sha ka jingialang ba ngi la kyrshan ia ka”, la ong u Dr Donkupar haba kren bad ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi.U Dr Donkupar u la ong ba ka UDP ka leit ban sngap ia ka nongrim jongka, hadien ba la ioh ia ka jingkhot na ka MPCC, hynrei ka seng kam pat iakren iano ban kyrshan.“Ka jingleit jong ngi ka long ban sngap bad shwa ka 17 tarik Naitung, ka seng kan shong jingialang iano ban kyrshan”, la ong u Dr Donkupar.Wat la um pat pynpaw iano ka seng, kan ai jingkyrshan ha kane ka elekshon President hynrei u la kren shai ba ka seng, kan kyrshan ia kyrtong u ban jop.“Ngin kyrshan ia u kyrtong u ban jop. Ka jingkam ka Meira ka dei kaba bakla ba ka UDP ka la kyrshan ia ka”, u la ong bad bynrap ba ka nongrim ba ka ong ban iakhun ia ka elekshon da ka nongrim ka jingiatiplem kaba napoh kam long kaba lah ban urlong namar ha ka elekshon bun ki MLA ki ngeit beit ha ka jingbthah ka seng bad tang khyndiat eh kiba ngeit ha ka nongrim ka jingiatip lem kaba napoh.Katkum ka jingong u Dr Donkupar ka nongrim (ideology) ban ialeh elekshon ha India kam pat poi sha kane ka bynta bad ka seng, kan leit ruh ban sngap ynda la wan sa u kyrtong ka NDA namar ba ka kwah ban tip ban sngewthuh ia ka nongrim ba ki pynpaw.U la ong ba ki MLA ki dei ki nongjied bad ka jingleit sha ka jingialang ka long kumba leit sngap ki paidbah haba ialap elekshon u kyrtong ha ka MLA elekshon, hynrei ka jingjied ka shong ha ki.U President ka UDP u la kyntait ba kan don kano kano ka jingsngew iapher bad ka HSPDP ka bym shym la wan sha ka jingkhot ka Congress ban sngap ia ka Meira. U la ong ba ka jingkhot jong ka MPCC ka long shimet shimet ym ia ka seng.
title: Kam ka Meira Kumar ba kyrshan ka  UDP, kyntait u Dr Donkupar

content: Amlarem, 5 Naitung:Hynnin ka miet kumba 9 baje eiei ka la jia phylla ia kawei ka Bolero Pick-up kaba don u No ML-04 B 0265 kaba niah da uwei u Greatful Rymbai, ka la shah kit ha ka Wah na ka daw jong ka jingjur jong u slap ha kato ka miet ha kaba katba ka da iaid lyngba ka Surok kaba dei artad kaba iaid lyngba kawei ka wah rit ha ka tei ka jaka.Ia kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha marjan shnong jong ka shnong Karkhana kaba dei kawei na ka shnong rit ka don ha khappud bad ka Bangladesh jong ka thain War Jaiñtia ha kaba une u Driver u Ma Greatful uba dang wan donkam marwei na kawei na ki shnong ba marjan nangta bad kawei kaba sngewkmen bad kat kane ka jia ba khlem don kano kano ka jia pyn mynsaw ne sngewsih ha kaba iadei bad une u Driver wat la u don tang marwei ha kane ka por.Haba kaba iadei bad katei ka jing jia na ka liang jong ki tei ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka thain ki la ong ba bun sien hi ki la sah kut ha katei ka jaka ha ka por ba jur u slap bad da ka burom ki la kyrpad ruh ia ka ha khmat ka Sorkar ba kan sngewbha ban pynshna noh da ka jingkieng ha kane ka Wah khnang nangne shakhmat ba kan ymdon kano kano ka jingjia ba sngew sih ia ki paid jong ka tei ka thain namar ba u surok hi u dei u bud lum jong ha kaba ia dei bad ka kam iap kam im jong ki kum ki nong shong shnong ki la ong.Donbok ba utei u nongniah jong katei ka kali, ula ioh ban mih noh shabar, kan da la sahkut ha katei ka Wah bad la iathuh ba um shym la mynsaw jur satia, wat la u shu mong malu mala ka met ka phad jongu.
title: Rong ka um ia ka Bolero  Pick-up, ha shnong Kharkhana

content: Shillong, 05 Naitung:U President ka BJP u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka BJP ka dang iakren mynta bad kiba bun ki MLA ban ai ka jingkyrshan ia u kyrtong President ka NDA u Ram Nath Kovind. Katkum ka jingtip, u Kovind un wan sha kane ka jylla ha ka 7 tarik ban ialap elekshon ia ki MLA.Haba iakren mynta ka sngi, u Bah Shibun u la ong ba kumba haduh mynta ki la don ki MLA kiba la kular ban ai jingkyrshan ia u kyrtong ka NDA bad kiba la sngew thikna ki la palat ia ka 12 ngut eiei haduh mynta.“Ka jingiakren ka dang iaid mynta bad ki MLA kynthup kiba don ha ka liang ka sorkar ruh ban ai ka jingkyrshan ia u kyrtong ka NDA”, la ong u Bah Shibun.U President ka BJP u la ong ruh ba kan don ka jingialang lashai bad ki MLA kiba la don ka jingsngew ban ai jingkyrshan ia u kyrtong ba pynieng ka NDA hynrei um pat kwah ban iathuh bniah halor kane.Mynta ka sngi ka kyrtong ka UPA ka Meira Kumar ka la dep ban kren ha ki MLA shi bynta na ka jingialap jongka ban pan jingyrshan na ka bynta kane ka elekshon President ban long ha ka 17 tarik. Hynrei ha kane ka sngi, kiwei ki party bun kim wan kum ka NCP, NPP, HSPDP lait noh tang ka UDP kaba leit ban sngap hynrei ka bym pat treh ban kyrshan ia ka.
title: Dang iakren ka BJP ia ki MLA  ban kyrshan ia U Kovind

content: Shillong 05 Naitung:“Ka jingpdiang ka UDP ia u Bah HS Shylla sha ka party shwa ka elekshon MDC shiteng samoi, ka dei namar ba ka Nongkrem UDP kaba ong ia ngi ba u Shylla ba mynta um dei shuh u Shylla ba mynshwa”, la ong u Dr Donkupar Roy haba kylli mynta ka sngi, ia kaei ka jingsngew jongu, ia ka jingshet biang u Bah Shylla ia ka UDP.U President ka UDP u la ong ka seng, ka ngeit ha ka jingong ka UDP Nongkrem circle bad ka pdiang ia u, hynrei kumba ka paw ka long ba u Bah Shylla u dang dei uba rim hi bad um pat dei u Shylla ba thymmai.“U la mih na ka party nga kmen”, la ong u Dr Donkupar Roy, uba la ju iakynduh teng bad u Bah Shylla hapoh iing dorbar ha u snem 1988 bad u la shah mait kyrteng ha u lamphang dorbar, u Bah PR Kyndiah tang na ka kot ba la ujor da u Bah Shylla ban pynkhyllem ia ka sorkar u BB Lyngdoh. Hynrei kham hadien ki MLA ba shah mait kyrteng, ki la iakhun ha Supreme Court bad ki la jop biang ia ka jinglong MLA.U Dr Donkupar u bym kwah ban kren bun halor u Bah Shylla, u la ong ruh ba namar ba u Bah Shylla u la kam ba um dei shuh u Shylla kum mynshwa, ka UDP ha ka elekshon MDC shiteng samoi ka la ai tiket ia u na Nongkrem lyngba ka jingpynskhem ka UDP Nongkrem circle hynrei phewse u la kylla biang.U Bah Shylla uba don na UDP u la mih noh na ka party hadien ba u la leit ban kyrshan mynta ia ka PDF ba ialam da u Bah PN Syiem kum u CEM ha KHADC . Ha ka jingshisha, u Bah Shylla u dei uba ther jur ia ka EC ba ialam jong u Bah Pynshngain shwa ba un leit kyrshan kylla ia ka.
title: “U Bah Shylla, u dang dei uba  rim, um pat dei uba thymmai”

content: Nongpoh, 06 Naitung:Kan long ka jingkmen kaba khraw ia ki samla pule ym tang ha ka thain Umsning, hynrei ha ka Distrik hi baroh kawei bad kane ka la wan hadien ba mynta ka sngi u MP ka Shillong Seat, u Ma Vincent H Pala, u la wan ban plie paidbah ia ka Ri Bhoi Synod College kaba don ha ka shnong Umsait-sning, Ri Bhoi District.Ha kaba plie paidbah ia katei ka College, nalor ka jingdon u Ma Vincent Pala kum u kongsan, la sakhi ruh da ka jingdon ryngkat u Bah Donkupar Sumer, MDC ka Umsning Constituency, ki Pastor Rangbah ka Ri Bhoi Synod, kiba kynthup ia u Rev. B R Pamshong, u Rev. L,S Nongphlang, u Rev P. Mawnai, u Rev F.W Shadap, u Rev K.E Rympeit, ki Tymmen Basan, ki Riew rangbah ka thain lem bad ki rangbah Balang jong ka Balang Presbyterian ka Ri Bhoi Synod.Khyndiat kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ia katei ka College kaba dei ruh ka College ba nyngkong jong ka Ri Bhoi Synod, la tei lyngba ka MP Skim jong u snem 2013-2014, ha ka jinglut kaba la kot sha ka T. 40 Lak tam tad haduh ban da lah syndon ban plie paidbah mynta ka sngi.U Ma Vincent Pala, haba kren kum u kongsan ha kane ka sngi, u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ba un ioh ban iadon bynta lang ha kane ka sngi kaba kyrpang tam jong ka Ri Bhoi Synod, hadien ba ki la ioh ban plie paidbah ia la ka jong ka College, kaba long ruh kum ka kawei na ki shlem ka ban ai jinghikai ia ki khun samla kiba kwah ban pyndep ia ki jingpule kiba kham halor.Ha kajuh ruh ka por, u la ai ruh ka jingïaroh kaba khraw ia ka Ri-Bhoi Presbyterian Synod, kiba la don ia kaba kum kane ka jingangnud na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka kam pule puthi ha kane ka juk iabeh jingstad kaba mynta.La pynkut bad pynphuh pynphieng ruh ha kane ka sngi da ka jingrwai kaba la iashimbynta ki samla pule jong kane ka College bad ki nongrwai jong ka Ri Bhoi Synod Standing Choir.May i know about your college library?
title: Plie  ia ka Ri Bhoi Synod  College ha Umsaitsning

content: Nongstoiñ, 10 Naitung:Kum ka dak ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur ia ka jingthmu jong u Mukul M Sangma ban wan rah surok rel sha ka RI Khasi bad ka jingthwet bad kem pathar ia ki dkhot jong ka seng, na ka liang jong ka seng Khasi Students Union West Khasi Hills District Unit hapoh ka jingialam jong u samla John Fisher Nongsiang kum u President, mynta ka sngi ki la pdiang sngewbha ia u Myntri Rangbah jong ka Jylla da ki lama iong ha ryngkat ki jingthoh pynrem ia ka jingleh jong u.Kitei ki dkhot jong ka seng KSU WKHDU, ha ryngkat ka KSU Mawshynrut Circle, ki la pynlong ia ka jingdeng lama iong ha Riangdo bad ki la ap khnang ruh ia u Myntri Rangbah u ba thmu ban wan plie ia u maw nongrim jong ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division ban pyni bad pynpaw ba ki pyrshah jur ia ka surok rel kaba la thmu ban wanrah sha ma Ri Khasi.Haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor na ka liang jong u samla John Fisher Nongsiang President ka KSU WKHDU, u la ong ba ka seng KSU ka sngewkmen ia ka jingplie paidbah noh ia ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub-Division, bad kam don kano kano ka jingpyrshah halor katei ka bynta hynrei kaei kaba ka seng ka wan ban deng lama iong ka long ban pyni sha u Myntri Rangbah ba ka seng ka pyrshah jur ia ka surok rel hapoh ka Ri Khasi.Shuh shuh u samla Nongsiang u la ong ruh ba lada ka sorkar jong u Mukul ka dang iai kuman halor ka surok rel bad lada kam pyllait noh ia ki dkhot jong ka seng kiba la shah kem na ka liang jong ka seng ka la kloi ban mih sha ka madan thma ha ki prokram jingiakhih kiba tyngeh ia kaba ka KSU Sengkmie kala pynkhreh bad kan sa pynbna noh shen.
title: Da ki lama iong, pdiang sngewbha  ka KSU ia U MR ha Riangdo

content: Shillong, 10 Naitung:Ia ka Mawlai Block yn plie noh ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai bad kan treikam shipor na ka iing dorbar ka Mawlai Mawtawar.Mynta ka sngi ka ophis jong u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills ka la bthah ia u Block Development Officer (BDO) ka Mylliem, u Bah PT Passah ban jurip ia ka jaka ba thmu ban buh ia ka ophis jong ka Mawlai Block.Ia u mawnongrim yn buh ha ka 18 tarik bad naduh katei ka sngi kan sa treikam noh shwa na iing dorbar haduh ban ioh ia ka iing ophis lajong. Ia ka ophis yn tei ha Lummawsing kaba ai sngewbha da ka Dorbar shnong Mawtawar kaba heh kumba 3 akar.Mynta ka sngi la pynlong ia ka jingjurip ba la don lang ki nongmihkhmat ka Mawlai, u Bah Embhahlang B Syiemliem (MLA), u Bah PT Sawkmie (MDC), ki dkhot ka Mawlai Town Dorbar, ka JAC jong ki ar tylli ki sengbhalang na Mawlai bad kiwei nalor u BDO.Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u BDO u la pynsngewthuh ruh ba ka jingwan jong ka block ha Mawlai kam mut ba baroh ki scheme ne ki kam pynroi yn leh da ka block bathymmai, hynrei ki don ki scheme kum ka jingtrei 100 sngi lyngba ka NREGS kin dang hap iaid beit na ka Mylliem block namar mynta ki ne ki scheme ki la iaid marshiteng na ka Mylliem C&RD block.Na ka liang u MLA, Bah Embhah u la pynsngewthuh ia ki paidbah da kaba ong ba wat la ka Mawlai ka la ioh ia ka block lajong hynrei bun ki kam yn dang hap ban leit sha ka Mylliem block, kum ki MLA scheme ba la dep ban sdang bad ka NREGS.Ha kaba iadei bad ka surok ban poi sha katei ka ophis na ka liang u MLA u la iathuh ba u la iakren bad u engineer ka PWD ban kyntu ia u ban maramot bad pynbha ia ki lynti shwa ban plie ia ka ophis jong ka block.U MLA u la kyntu ruh ia ka sorkar ban khmih bad ailad shwa ia ki samla ka thain ban ioh rung ha ki kam ba hap ha ka grade IV, kum ka dak ka jingburom ia ka jingai kylluid jong ka shnong ia ka jaka.
title: Na iing dorbar Mawtawar  yn treikam ka Mawlai Block

content: Shillong, 10 Naitung:Ka seng FKJGP Seng Kmie ka la pynlong ia ka CEC mynta ka sngi, ha ophis treikam ka seng, ha ka por 12baje nohphai sngi ha kaba baroh lang ki dkhot jong ka CEC ki lah poi ryntih lang, ha kaba la pyniaid ia ka jingialang da U President ka seng kmie, U bah Wellbirth Rani bad la wanrah ia ka mat iatai, ha kaba iadei bad ka lynti rel ha Ronghona Byrnihat, ba la pyntrei da ka NEFR bad ka Sorkar jylla bad da kawei ka sur na ka liang ka CEC ka lah shim shwa ia ka rai ba ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban pynsangeh shwa noh ia katei ka project tad ynda biang shwa ia ki jaka rung jaka mih bad ki khyrdop talasi mynder bad ar tylli ki ain ba la pynbna da ka sorkar, ka Residential safety and security act bad ka Benami transaction act ba ka dei ban pyntrei noh ia kitei ki ain.Ha kajuh ka por ka Seng ka lah pynbna bad bthah iaki district bad ki circle ki unit bapher bapher khamtam ia ka Ribhoi district ba kin dei ban long kiba lah khreh na ka bynta ki jingiakhih ia kane ka ishu rel, lada ka sorkar kan dang sngap mynthi halor ka jingdawa ka seng bad ki wei ki seng kum ka RBYF,HNYF kiba iadon bynta lang naduh ba sdang ban iakhih da ka jing ia shong kyrain ha Additional Secretariat, ha ka 21 tarik u jylliew bad mynta pat da ki jingialang paidbah, ha ka 13tarik Naitung ha nongpoh, Ri bhoi district ban pynbor ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pynsangeh shwa ia ka lynti rel. Ka Seng  ka la iathir ruh  ia ka mat jong ka socio economic movement ha kaba ka seng ka lah dep ban buh ia ki committee bapher bapher kum ka Agriculture Committee, Livestock Farming committee, Tourism committe bad ka Skill development Committee ban pynsted bad pyntyllun janai iakine ki committee khnang ba u paradoh parasnam un ioh ka jing myntoi. Ha kajuh ka por ka seng  ka kwah ban ong iaka sorkar kam dei ban don tang ka jingthmu tang ban tih Uranium  bad ka dei ban sngewthuh ba tang u phlang ban thung lah lah ban pynriewspah ia ka jylla bad ba dei ban lum jingtip bniah kum sha Rambrai,Wahkaji, Umdohlun bad sha Langpih khnang ba ki briew sha kine ki thain kin riewspah   bad biang ha ka ri jingri kum ka ri masi ri blang ri dohkha khnang ba u paidbah un ioh jingmyntoi bad ioh kam ioh jam na kane ka bynta.Ka seng ka lah ioh ban iakren bad buh jingdawa ruh hakhmat ka sorkar jylla ia ka  kad liengsuin,  kaba don ha Umroi ban pynbit pynbiang noh khnang ba u paidbah un lait ban leit shaduh  Assam, ha ka leit ka wan, ong ka kyrwoh U bah Marbud Dkhar, Chief Organiser jong katei ka Seng.
title: Khreh na bynta ki jingiakhih  ishu rel, ong ka FKJGP ia ki dkhot

content: Shillong, 10 Naitung:Hadien 3 bnai ba ka la neh ka synshar Administrator ha GHADC la iathuh ba u Lat ka jylla mynta ka sngi u la pynkut noh ia katei ka synshar Administrator. La ong ba la weng noh ia ka AR ( Administratine Rule) khnang ban ioh pynlong noh ia ka elekshon CEM. Lah ban kdew ba ia ka synshar Administrator ha GHADC la pynbna naduh ka 4 tarik u iaiong hadien ba la mih ka kynrum kynram politik ha katei ka District Council ha kaba u CEM u Denang T Sangma u la risaiñ noh na ka shuki CEM ha u lber mynta u snem shuwa ban wanrah ia ka mat ia kren byn shaniah shuh ia ka Executive Committee. Katei ka jingrisaiñ u CEM ka la pynlong ba ym lah shuh tang ban pass ia ka mang tyngka jong katei ka Council ruh. Ha ka 7 tarik mynta u bnai u Chairman ka GHADC u Boston Marak u la risaiñ noh na ka shuki jong u da ka jingthmu ban ia khun ia ka shuki CEM, katei ka jingrisaiñ jong u ka dei ruh hadien ba u Lat ka jylla u Banwarilal Purohit u la kyntait ia ka jingai jingmut ka sorkar ban weng noh ia ka synshar Administrator. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ia ka elekshon CEM lah ban pynlong ha ka 18 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: Weng synshar Administrator ha  GHADC, 18tarik lah ban jied CEM

content: Nongstoiñ, 10 Naitung:Da ki hajar ngut ki paid Khasi bad Garo jong ka thain Mawshynrut kynthup ruh ia ki khynnah skul mynta ka sngi, ki la ia tuid sha ka madan Christ King Banglapluh Riangdo West Khasi Hills District, na ka bynta ban sakhi ia ka jingplie paidbah noh u Myntri Rangbah duh jong ka sorkar Jylla u Dr. Mukul M Sangma ia u maw nongrim jong ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division.Ha katei ka jingialang plie paidbah ia u maw nongrim jong ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division, nalor u kongsan la iadon lang ruh u bah HDR Lyngdoh myntri ka tnad pohiing, u MS Rao Principal Secreatary Home & Police Department, u bah S. Kharlyngdoh Secretary jong ka kam pohing u ba dei ruh u DC barim jong ka West Khasi Hills, u Arun Kumar Kembhavi DC ba mynta jong ka West Khasi Hills, u MLA ka thain u bah H. Witting Mawsor, bah K.P. Pangniang MLA ka Rambrai, u bah K. Marbaniang MDC ka Rambrai u bah M. Mawsor MDC ka thain ki ophisar sorkar na ki tnad treikam bapher bapher jong ka District.U bah Gardinal Sohshang Secretary jong ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division Demand Committee (MCSDC) u la ioh ban pynsngew ia ka khana jong ka jingiaid lynti jong ka jingiakhun ban pynioh bad pynurlong ia katei ka Civil Sub Division kata da kaba dawa ban kyntiew noh ia ka Administrative Unit Sha ka Civil Sub Division kaba pura.Ka Demand Committee na ka por sha ka por ka la phah ia ka dorkhas sha ka sorkar lyngba ki khlieh nongialam jong ka Jylla ka jong ngi, ki Myntri Rangbah ba don burom kiba la leit naduh u SC Marak, JD Rymbai, Dr. DD Lapang, Dr. Donkupar Roy bad haduh u Dr. Mukul M Sangma u Myntri Rangbah u ba mynta u ba la pynhun ia ka jingangnud jong ki paidbah ka thain mynta la kumba 20 snem tam ha kaba u la pynbna bad kular ha ka 14 tarik u Lber jong u snem 2016 hapoh ka Dorbar Mangtyngka ba un ai noh ia ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division.Shuh shuh u bah Sohshang u la ai khublei kyrpang ruh ia baroh kiba la iadon kti ban iakhun ban pynioh ia katei ka Civil Sub Division hapoh Mawshynrut naduh u bah H.L Nongsiang MLA barim jong ka thain, u bah H. Witting Mawsor MLA ka thain, ki sengbhalang bapher bapher bad khamtam ka jingkhublei ba kyrpang ka leit ruh sha ia I kong (L) M. War kaba dei ka MLA bad myntri barim, kaba la bam kwai ha dwar u Blei I bala ai sngewbha ia ka khyndew kaba don hapoh Mawthengkut kumba 12 akar tam ei ei sha ka sorkar na ka bynta katei ka Civil Sub Division.“Kane ka sngi kaba mynta kadei ka sngi kaba kmen tam jong ki paidbah ka thain Mawshynrut bad ban ia phi ki paidbah u ba kham kmen tam ha kane ka sngi nga dei ma nga ha ryngkat ka kynhun sorkar namar ba ngi la lah ban shah shkor ia ka jingang nud ka jong phi kaba la slem bah na kata ka daw nga nud ban ong ba ngi long kiba kham kmen tam ban ia phi ki paidbah baroh” ong u Myntri Rangbah haba ai jingkren kum u kongsan ha katei ka jingialang plie paidbah ia u maw nongrim jong ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division.Shuh shuh u Myntri Rangbah u la kren ruh ia ka jingdonkam kiba bun ba ka Jylla kala dei ban don noh la ka jong katkum ka jingiaid jong kapor bad ban pynurlong ia kata ki nongialam ba ha khmat eh jong ka sorkar Jylla kila hap ban shim ia ka synjam kaba khia na ka bynta ban pyrkhat ia ka lawei jong ki khun ki kti bad khamtam ia ka pateng ka ban sa wan bad kala dei kapor ba ka sorkar Jylla kan shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh na ka bynta ban pyntikna ba ha ki snem ki ban nang wan ka Jylla ka jong ngi kala dei ban don lut ia ki jingdonkam baroh khnang ba ki khun ki kti jong ngi kim nym donkam shuh ban dang hap leit shabar jong ka Jylla na ka bynta ban leit wad jingnang jingstad  bad ia ki kam ki jam.U Mukul u la kdew ruh halor shibun ki kam pynroi kiba ka sorkar ka la leh ha kine ki snem ba ladep bad khamtam ha une u snem ba ka sorkar ka la thaw ia ki lad ki kabu ban plie ia ki Civil Sub Division, ki C&RD Block, Ki Police Station bad kiwei kiwei da ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha ka roi ka par khamtam ha ki jaka nongkyndong.U la ban jur ruh halor ka jingroi ki kam kaikhlaw ha ka jylla ha kine ki snem ba la dep kiba la leh ia ki kam pyntriem bad wanrah ia ka jingshong syier ha ka imlang sahlang. Haba pynrem ia kitei ki kam u Mukul u la ong ba kine ki dei tang ki buit treikam jong ki runar ki bym don shuh ka jingiatiplem bad ki bym don ruh ka jingiohi na ka bynta ka lawei jong ki khun ki ksiew jongki ba hato kaei kaba kin mad ha ka lawei jingim jongki lada ka ri bad ka jait bynriew ka jot noh.Shuh shuh u la ong ba shibun ki kam pynroi ba kynthup ia ki surok bad ki lynti ki synkieng la dep ban wanrah na ka bynta ban weng ia ki jingeh ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan bad ka kit ka bah hynrei kine ki jingtrei ki la sahkut noh namar ka jingpyrshah na ki katto katne ki kynhun samla kiba sheptieng ioh ba ka sorkar kmie kan wan leh katba mon ne wan khlong ia uta u mar Uranium uba don ha kane ka jylla jongngi.U la buh ka jingkylli ba hato haduh katne ngi long kiba tlot ban pyrkhat ba lada ka surok ba bha kan poi ha ka jaka jongngi, ka sorkar kmie ne ki briew ba nabar ki lah ban wan leh katba mon ia ka thain jongngi wat haba ngi pyrshah ruh? Kane ka dei ka sorkar synshar paidbah (democracy) bad ka Democracy ka dei ka sorkar jong u paidbah, da ki paidbah bad na ka bynta ki paidbah bad kam dei ka sorkar jong ka masi, da ka masi bad na ka bynta ka masi, kren danda u Myntri Rangbah.U Myntri rangbah u la pynpaw ruh halor ki agenda ba ka sorkar ka la buh hakhmat u paidbah ha ka por election bad ong ba ka sorkar jongu ka la pynurlong ia ki kular ba ka la kular ha ka por election bad ym kum kiwei kiba shu khlei ia ki kular khlem da leh eiei wat hadien ba kila jop.U la ban jur ruh halor ka lad iohkam iohjam na ka bynta ki samla pule ba kynthup ia ki kam sorkar bad kumjuh ki kam private, halor ki surok ki surok bapher bapher kiba yn pyntrei ha kane ka District bad ka jylla hi baroh kawei, bad khamtam halor ka jingshahkhang jong ka jylla ban tih bad shalan dewiong namar ka jingbymdon iala ka jong ka Policy ia kaba ki nongkhaii ki la kyntait ban thaw wat hadien ba ka sorkar ka la pruid dak ban thaw ia kane ka policy naduh u snem 2012 ter ter.U la wer ia ki paidbah ba kin ai ka jingiatreilang bad ka sorkar nangne shakhmat khnang ba ka sorkar ka nang lah ban ai shuh shuh ka jingshakri ba khambha na ka bynta jongki hadien habud.Kiwei kiwei ki nongkren ha katei ka sngi ki kynthup ia u bah HDR Lyngdoh myntri ka tnad pohiing, u bah H. Witting Mawsor MLA ka Mawshynrut Konstitwensi, u bah K.L. Nongbri u ba long kum u SDO u ba thymmai jong katei ka Civil Sub Division bad kiwei kiwei, nalor ki jingkren ha katei ka sngi la pyniphuh iphieng shuh shuh ia katei ka sngi da ka jingrwai jingshad bala iashim bynta da ki kynhun bad ki khynnah skul bapher bapher jong ka thain Mawshynrut.
title: Plie U MR ia ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division

content: Shillong, 06 Naitung:Ka KSU ka la pynkhreh da ka jingiakhih kaba jur lada ka sorkar kam pynpdam noh ia ka kompeni North East Frontier Railway ba kan shna ia ka lynti rel ha kane ka rilum Khasi kaba sdang na Ri-Bhoi.U president ka KSU u Bah Lambokstarwell Marngar haba iakren bad katto katne ki nongthoh mynta ka sngi, u la ong ba ka KSU kam pat kylla nongrim satia naduh u snem 1988, ban pyrshah ia ka jingshna ia ka lynti rel.Kane ka jingkren u president ka KSU ka long hadien ba 25 ngut ki dkhot ka seng kynthup na Ri-Bhoi bad Khasi hills ki la shah kem halor ka jingkynnoh donkti ha ki kam thang Kali bad kiwei ban pyrshah ia ka jingshna ia ka lynti rel.U Presiddent ka KSU ula buh jingkylli ia ka sorkar jylla kaba kam ba lada wan ka lynti rel kan wanrah ia ka roi ka par da kaba long, “ka lynti rel kan pynroi iano, kan pynpar par iano”.U Bah Marngar u la long ba ka KSU kam nym pdiang ia ka lynti rel hynrei ka sorkar ka dei ban pyntreikam shwa ki lad pyrkhing ia ka jingrung bad jingmih ki briew nabar bad sa iakren pat kata ka lynti rel.“Naduh u snem 2011 haduh mynta ka sorkar u Dr Mukul Sangma kam shym la pyntreikam ia kita ki lad pyrkhing ia ki briew ba wan rung bad mih sha kane ka jylla”,u la ong bad bynrap, ia ka ain shong wai iingruh ne ka Resident Safety Act ruh kam shym la pyntreikam satia.Katkum ka jingong u president ka KSU lada ka sorkar kam pynsangeh ia ka kompeni ban shna jubor ia ka lynti rel, ka seng ruh kan iaid la kajong ka lynti bad lada jia eiei ka sorkar ka dei ban kitkhlieh.Ula long ruh ba lada ka sorkar ka khot iakren ne kam knot ka Seng kan ieng beit ha ka nongrim ban pyrshah ia ka lynti rel haduh ban pyntreikam shwa ia ki lad pyrkhing ba tyngeh.Halor ka jingong u Dr Mukul ban phah tohkit halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka Seng ka don jingiadei bad ka HNLC, u Bah Marngar u la ong ba u Dr Mukul u dei ban pynshai paidbah namar kumba la pynpaw ha lad pathai khubor ka HNLC ka la thad ba u Dr Mukul u la pan jingkyrshan na ka, ban iarap ia ka elekshon.“Ka KSU kam donkam bomb IED. Ka pyndonkam tang da u khulom”, ula ong.U Presidentt ka KSU u la ther ruh ia u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri-Bhoi uba la tyrwa pulit pahara ia ki nongtrei ka kompeni shan lynti rel ka NFR da kaba ong, balei um phah pulit sha khappud ban Iada ia ki paidbah na ka jingshah pyndik ha ki lehnoh Karbi.U la pynem jur ruh ia ka jingleit khynra ki pulit ia ki dkhot ka seng da kumba dei ki lehnoh bad kane kan long pynban kumba tynruh dieng tyllaw ia ka ding bar hem. Katkum ka jingong u President ka KSU, dang shen ki pulit ka Ri-Bhoi ki la leit ban kyndang ia ka iing jong u dkhot ka seng ha Umling bad namar ba kim ioh bat ia u, ki la byrngem bad pyntieng ia kiba haiing ba kin kem ia ki. “Kane ka jingleh jong ki pulit kan aiding pynban ia ka mynsiem ki samla”, la ong u Bah Lambokstarwell haba pynrem jur ia kane ka jingleh jong ki pulit.
title: Da ka jingiakhih ba jur, pynkhreh ka KSU “Shah kem 25 ngut ki dkhot”

content: Nongpoh, 10 Naitung:Kumba ka paw hi ba ka daw kaba hakhmat eh kaba la pynlong ia ki kynhun sengbhalang ha ka jylla ba kin pyrshah ia ka jingwan ka Lynti Rel, ka dei namar ba ka sorkar kam pat pyntreikam ia kita ki kyndon ain ki ban teh pyrkhing ia ka jingrung kyrthep ki mynder ha ka jylla bad halor kane ka mat mynta pat sa ka jingpyrshah na ka Dorbar ki Rangbah Shnong Ri Bhoi District (DRSRBD), kiba la pynpaw ia kajuh ka sur ba kim lah ban pdiang ia ka Lynti Rel sha ka jylla, lymda ka sorkar kam pat mynjur bad pynlong ain noh ia ka Village Administration Billl (VAB) bad ia kiwei de ki kyndon ain ki ban teh pyrkhing ia ka jingrung laitlan jong ki mynder sha ka jylla.Ha kane ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Umsning Auditorium Hall, la wan ban iashimbynta da ki nongialam ba hakhmat ka DRSRBD kiba kynthup ia u Bah Rocky Kylla, Chairman ka DRSRBD, u Bah CB Syiem General Secretary, u Bah Eddie G. Kharbani lem bad kiwei kiwei ki rangbah shnong bad ka mat kaba ki la iakren ha kane ka jingialang ka long halor ka jingkuman da ka sorkar jylla kaba la ialam da u Dr. Mukul Sangma, ban pyntreikam noh ia Village Administration Bill (VAB), ka jingbym lait ang ki nongmihkhmat na Ri Bhoi ha Assembly, ka Lynti Rel lem bad kiwei kiwei ki jingeh kaba la iakynduh da ki paidbah ha ka Distrik.Ha ka jingiatai kaba jur halor ka VAB, kane ka synjuk ka la pynrem jur ia ka sorkar jylla halor ka jingpynslem ban pynlong ain noh ia ka VAB, ha kaba ka la mih ruh ka jingiatai ba lada pyntreikam ia ka VAB, ka long ruh kum kawei na ki lad ban tehlakam ia ka jingrung kyrthep jong ki mynder ha ka jylla.Hynrei haba la poi ha ka jingiakren halor ka Lynti Rel, kane ka synjuk ki rangbah shnong ka la pynpaw sha ka sorkar ba da lei lei kam lah ban pdiang, ha kaba ki la dawa kylla na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pyntreikam noh ia ki kyndon ain ki ban teh pyrkhing ia ki mynder bad ban pynurlong ia ka VAB kaba ki la dawa la katno katne snem.Ha kawei pat ka liang kane ka synjuk, ka la pynrem ruh halor ka khynra dkhot KSU da ki pulit ha Ri Bhoi, namar kane ka jingkhynra KSU da ki pulit ka la wanrah ruh ia ka jingtieng jingsyier jong ki khyllung khynnah bad halor kane ka synjuk hi ka dawa na ki Bor Distrik ba ki dei ban sangeh noh mardor ia kane ka kam khynra ia ki dkhot ka KSU.Haba iadei bad kane, ki nongialam DRSRBD lashai ka sngi kin sa leit ban iakynduh ia u DC ka Ri Bhoi bad ha kajuh ruh ka por ki la pynbna ruh ba ha ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai kin pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah jong ki rangbah shnong hapoh ka Distrik, na ka bynta ban iakren ia kiba bun tylli ki mat kiba kum ka synjuk ka la pynkhreh lypa.
title: 26 tarik, ka jingialang jong ki  Rangbah Shnong ha Ri Bhoi

content: Shillong,7 Naitung:Ka jingiakhih jong ki nong Mawlai halor ka C&RD Block ka la pynioh nong kha ma kha ia ka Mawpat ha kaba mynta ka sngi u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Mukul Sangma u la pynbna ba yn plie syndon ar tylli ki Block kata ka Mawlai C&RD Block kan hap beit tang ia ka Mawlai baroh kawei katba kawei pat ka dei kaba kynthup ia ki shnong kiba hap hapoh ka Pynthor -um khrah konstitwensi, Nongthymmai konstitwensi bad katto katne tylli ki shnong jong ka Mawryngkneng konstitwensi.Wat la u myntri rangbah um pat jer kyrteng ia katei kawei pat ka Block kaba yn plie thymmai hynrei la sngewthuh ba kan dei hapoh Mawpat naba ka Mawpat ka la dep pynbiang pynbit lypa ia ka jaka ruh naduh ka por ba ka mih ka jingiatan tyllai ia ka Mawlai C&RD Block.Mynta ka sngi u Mukul u la khot ia ka jingialang kaba la wan ban ia shim bynta da ki 4 ngut ki MLA kata u bah Embhah Syiemlieh , MLA ka UDP na Mawlai, u bah A.L Hek MLA ka Congress na Pynthor-umkhrah, u Dr.Jemino Mawthoh ka UDP na Nongthymmai bad u bah David Nongrum na Mawryngkneng, la don ruh u MDC ka Congress na Mawlai u bah P.T Sawkmie kumjuh ruh la donlang ki nongsynshar shnong na kitei ki saw tylli ki konstitwensi.La don ruh u myntri sorkar ba peit ia ka C&RD Block u ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh, myntri pynroi sor.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor hadien ba la wai katei ka jingialang u Mukul u la ong ba mynhynin ka miet u la shong jingialang kyrkieh bad ki katto katne ngut ki ophisar bad la shim ia ka rai ha katei ka jingiakynduh ban ai beit baroh ar tylli ki Block bad la pynshong nongrim ruh katkum ka jingbun briew ha kitei ki ar tylli ki jaka.U la ong ba ka Mawlai kan kynthup ia baroh ki shnong jong ka Mawlai konstitwensi bad ka jaka ban tei ia ka Block ka dei ha Mawtawar kumba ki la tyrwa bad shen u la ong ba un phah ban jurip ia ka jaka ban sdang noh ia ka kam.Katba kawei pat ka block kaba um pat jer kyrteng u la ong ba kan kynthup ia ka Nongthymmai, ka Pynthor-umkhrah bad katto katne tylli ki shnong ba hap ha Mawryngkneng konstitwensi kiba don ha ki thaiñ Mawdiangdiang.
title: Pynbna U Mukul  ban plie sa 2 tylli ki Block

content: Shillong, 06 Naitung:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar ka iakynduh jingeh bha ban pyntreikam ia ka ain shim khjna thymmai ka Goods and Service Tax (GST) namar ba bun ki briew kim pat pei phang bha shaphang jongka.Haba kren mynta ka sngi sha ki nongthoh khubor, u Mukul u la ong ba kaba donkam mynta ka long ban pynshai bha ia ki nongsiew khajna kum ki nongkhaii shaphang ka Goods and Service Tax (GST).Halor ka jingkylli la yn khang noh ne em ia ki khyrdop khrong khajna hadien ba la pyntreikam ia ka GST, u Mukul u la ong kano kano kaba teh da ka ain yn bud ia kata hynrei um khlem shai la ka GST ka la mana ne em ban khang noh ia ki kyrdop.U la ong ba ki tnad sorkar jylla bad sorkar pdeng ki la iatreilang halor kane ka kam ban pynthikna ba ka GST kan treikam bha khlem jingthut.“Hapdeng ka jingeh, ngin pyrshang ban pynthikna ba ka kam kan iaid beit”, u la ong u Myntri Rangbah.Katkum ka jingong u Mukul, ka sorkar pdeng kala rai ban nym pyntud shuh ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka GST bad kane ka daw ka la pynlong ia ka sorkar jylla ban hap ban trei palat ia ka por trei ruh ban pyndep ia ka kam hynrei ka dang sah khlem pat lah ban pyndep haduh mynta.U la ong ba katkum ka GST ka sorkar pdeng kan hap ban buria ia ki jylla lada kim lah ban kot ka jingpynmih khajna kumba la buh thong da ka GST Council.“Ia ki jingduna ne jingduh ki jylla yn sa rai da ka GST Council,” u la ong.Ia ka GST la pyntreikam da u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi ha ka shiteng miet ka 1 tarik u Naitung, kaba dei ka jinglum khajna kaba thymmai ha ka ri hadien 70 snem ka jingioh jinglait luid.
title: Ki khyrdop khrong pisa ruh yn bud  katkum ka ain GST, ong u Mukul

content: Jowai, 6 Naitung:Ki pulit ka East Jaintia Hills, mynta ka sngi ki la ioh ban kurup haduh 3 trok u dewiong uba la thmu ban shallan be-ain pyrshah ia ka hukum jong ka NGT.Ki pulit ka EJH ki la bun kam ban peitngor halor ka jingshalan tuh bad sei tuh ia u dewiong ha ki jaka par dewiong bapher bapher bad mynta ka sngi ki la ioh kem ia kitei ki 3 tylli ki trok na lai jaka. Kawei ka trok kadei ka trok saw taiar (ML11-1901) kaba la niah da u Lodistar Hinge, katba ar ki trok 10 shaka kidei kynthup ia ka NLo1Q-8554 kaba la niah da u Firstmoon Kharbamthiah bad ka trok AS01C-0062 kaba la niah da u Md. Yakub Ali.Ia katei ki trok la kem na Sutnga, Umkyrpong bad Moopala bad ki pulit ki la kurup ia kitei ki trok bad kumjuh ia u dewiong bad la register mukotduma ia ki trai bad kumjuh ia kitei ki draiber.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, ki pulit ka WJH katba ki dang iaid pahara hynnin ka meit ha ka por 10 shiteng eiei, ki la ioh kem ia kawei ka trok kit dewiong kaba pynkhein ia ka hukum jong ka NGT. Ia katei ka trok kaba don ia u No. AS01HC-0750 la kem na Lad-Pasyih kaba la niah da u Ferdinand Rymbai na Moodymmai bad u nongbud jong u, u Nehlang Challam na Ummulong. Ki pulit ki la ithuh ruh ia u trai kali uba kyrteng u Nasim Arzoo uba na Kamrup Assam.Katba u trai dewiong pat la tip kum Deimi Lyngdoh na Thadmuthlong B bad u Baitki Suiam na Wapungshnong.
title: 3 trok, kurup dewiong  ki pulit EJH, 1 ha WJH

content: Shillong,7 Naitung:Ka HSPDP mynta ka sngi ka la rai ban nym ia jied President. Haba kren bad ki lad pathai khubor u Bah Ardent Basaiawmoit, President rangbah katei ka seng, u la ong ba ka daw ba ka HSPDP kam treh ban ia shim bynta ha katei ka elekshon President jong ka Ri ka dei namar ba kam mon ia u kyrtong ka NDA u Ram Nath Kovind naba u dei u briew uba la pynmih ia ki kyntien kiba u kren beiñ ia ki rit paid Muslim ha ka ri India da kaba ong ba ki Muslim ki dei ki ba shu wan hap wan ur ha kane ka Ri.U bah Ardent u la ong ba ka HSPDP ka kyntait ruh ban kyrshan ia ka kyrtong jong ka seng Congress ka Meira Kumar ha kaba u la ong ba ka jingkyntait ia ka, ka dei namar ba lah da ki phew snem ka Congress ka la synshar hynrei ka la pheil ha ka jingsynshar jong ka. “U Kovind dei uba kren beiñ ia ki rit paid Muslim ha India, ka Congress pat ka la synshar da ki phew snem hynrei ka la pheil” ong u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor.Lah ban kdew ba ka paralok 2018 jong ka HSPDP kata ka UDP mynhynin ka sngi ka la wan ban sngap ia ka jingialap elekshon jong ka kyrtong ka seng Congress ka Meira Kumar ha nongbah Shillong bad lashai ka sngi ruh ka UDP kan leit ban sngap sa ia u kyrtong ka NDA u Ram Nath Kovind ha Umiam. Ka UDP haduh mynta kam pat ai rai iano ban kyrshan hynrei la sngewthuh pat ba kan ia shim bynta ha katei ka elekshon President.Wat la u hehduh jong ka seng NCP u Sharad Pawar u dei uwei na kiba la leit ban synran lang ia ka Meira Kumar ka Congress ha ka por ba ka leit thep kyrteng kum ka kyrtong President hynrei u President jong ka NCP ha Meghalaya u bah Sanbor Shullai u la ong ba haduh mynta um pat ioh jingtip satia na Delhi iano ban kyrshan ha kane ka elekshon President ka ban long ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai.U bah Sanbor u la pynthikna ba lashai ka sngi un leit ban sngap ia ka jingkren u kyrtong ka NDA u Ram Nath Kovind ha ka jingialang ka ban long ha Orchid Resort, Umiam Lake . U bah Sanbor u la ong ba ka jingleit jong u lashai ka sngi ka dei beit namar ka jingiaieit bad u Himanta Biswa myntri sorkar ka jylla Assam namarba u dei u paralok ba iajan tam bad uba ia ieit eh bad u, “U Himanta u la phone ia nga ba ngan wan kum u paralok, ngan leit sha katei ka jingialang, iano ban kyrshan ngam pat lah ban ong” ong u bah Sanbor haba kren bad ki nongthohkhubor.
title: “U Kovind u kren beiñ Muslim” kyntait jied President ka HSPDP

content: Shillong, 6 Naitung:Ka Seng Samla Shnong Umkiang, ka hap siew bai nong da ki hajar tyngka na ka bynta ban pynkhuid line (electricity) ha ki thain Umkiang, man la ka por na ka daw ka jingmutlop bad ka jing-bym leh ei ei ka MeECL ban pynkhuid lain, namar ki sainar electric la pyniaid napoh khlaw pohbtab ha shi lynter lynti naduh Lumshnong haduh Malidor. “Ha ka jingshi-sha ngi ioh light tang da ki kynta ha ka shitaiew ha ka por badon sngi, hynrei ha ka por slap ka mut ngin nym lah tang ban phohsniew ruh ia ka light. Katba ka jingsiew ne ka jingpynshna bill light ka Company ka biang thik thik” ong ka kyrwoh.Na ka liang jong ka Dorbar Shnong Umkiang kaba la long ha ka 29tarik Jylliew 2017, ka sngewbynniaw haduh katta katta kat haduh ba ki rangbah, ki tymmen ki san bad ki samla bad kynthei bad shynrang kim lah shah shuh ia kane ka jingduh ding khah ne ka jingleh jong ka Company MeECL. Kane ka ktah haduh katta katta ia ka thain Umkiang khamtam namar ka jingshit kyrang jong ka sngi, ne ki jingdon kam bapher bapher khamtam ia ki khynnah skul kiba dang don ha ki jingpule kot.Kumta ka Seng kam lah ban shu sngap jar ia ka jingud jingnam jong ki paitbah, la hap ban pynkhuid da lade bad bad ai bainong ruh kumjuh na ka bynta ban pynkhuid line, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Nicholas Lyngdoh General Secretary SSSU cum Asst. Secretary Dorbar Shnong Umkiang.
title: Bei pisa ka shnong Umkiang  ban pynkhuid lain ilektrik

content: Shillong, 26 Naitung:Ka Khasi Students’ Union North Khasi Hills District ka pynrem ia ka jingleh runar bad leh riew khlaw ki pulit ka Ribhoi kat haduh ban da pynthut ia ka suk ka saiñ bad buh ia u paidbah ha ka shongsyier rit mynsiem, na ka daw ka jing thwet bad khynra dkhot KSU ki bor Pulit Ribhoi.Na ka liang ka seng ka pynpaw ka jing pynrem jur halor ka jingthombor ki pulit ha shnong Umbir, da kaba pynpait pynpra ia ka jingkhang Ïing u Bah Roland Mawthoh bad ka Kong Veronica Nongbsap, ha ka por ba ki pulit ki dang pynlong ka jingthwet bad khynra dkhot KSU ha shnong Umbir.Katei ka jingleh ki Pulit, ka la pynpaw shai kdar ba ka dei ka kam pynhiar kput ia ki dkhot ka seng bad samla Khasi bad ia ka Jaidbynriew hi baroh kawei bad ka pawshai ruh ba ka rukom treikam ki pulit, ki tbit tang ha ka por ba don jing iakhih (protest) ka KSU bad kiwei ki sengbhalang, hynrei haba don ka jingshah thombor ki para doh para snam basah ha thaiñ khappud ha ki pulit Assam bad ki lehnoh Karbi (KPLT) ki pulit Jylla kim lah ban leh eiei.Kumban shu pynkynmaw ba ha ka 21tarik Jymmang 2015, ka KSU bad ki Rangbah shnong ka Raid Nongtung ha ryngkat ki paid nongshong shnong shnong Umsur, Rymphum, Thangru bad Tyrshing bad ki wei ki shnong marjan kiba hap hapoh ka Raid Nongtung (block2), ki la ujor da ka Ejahar ha Mawlasnai Police Outpost bad ha U Superintendent of Police Ribhoi district, pyrshah ia ka kynhun lehnoh Karbi People Liberation Tiger, halor ka jing byrngem byrsit bad dawa pisa jubor ha ka dor 2000 tyngka naman ki longiing jong kitei ki shnong.Hynrei kaba lyngngoh ba haduh mynta ki pulit jylla ka Ribhoi kimnud ban leh eiei ia ka KPLT bad kim nud hi ruh ban ang tang shi kyntien ruh haduh mynta , hynrei ki trei shitom bad duhthiah duhdem ban thwet ia ki dkhot ka seng la kum ba thwet riew kieng atiar, ong ka kyrwoh na U Vincent Makri, Vice President, KSU North Khasi Hills District.
title: Ba thwet KSU, pynpait  iing ki pulit ha Umbir

content: Shillong, 10 Naitung:Ka State Commission for Women ka la khot hajir, ha ka 14 tarik mynta u bnai ia u Secretary ka Delhi Golf Club ban wan jubab ha ophis jongka ha Shillong halor ka jingshah beh ka Kong Tailin Lyngdoh na ka jaka bam ba ka shah khot tang namar ba ka riam Khasi da ka jainsem.“Ngi la khot hajir ia u secretary ka Club ban wan jubab ha ka 14 tarik”, la ong ka chairperson ka Commission ka Kong Theilin Phanbuh hynne ka sngi.Ka Kong Phanbuh ka la ong ba na ka liang ka Commission kan phah da ka jingthoh ba ka National Scheduled Caste and Scheduled Tribe Commission ba kan pynshitom kaba tyngeh ia ki bor pyniaid ka Delhi Club.Ka Kong Tailin Lyngdoh ka la shah beh na jaka bam ja ha ki nongtrei ka Delhi Golf Club ha ka 25 tarik Jylliew ha Delhi.Kat kum ka jingong ka Kong Phanbuh, ki bun ki khep ba ki briew na kane ka Dong Mihngi ki ju iakynduh ia ka jingshah ibein bad niew bein haba ki don shabar nabar Dong Mihngi.“Ngin iakhun ban pynthikna ba kiba donkti kin ioh ia ka jingpynsaja kaba tyngeh khnang ba ka jingisih jaitbynriew kan nym jia shuh ia ki Briew na dong mihngi”, ong ka Chairperson.Ha kawei ka liang ka Kong Tailin Lyngdoh ka la iathuh ba ka jingjia kaba la pynlong ia ka ban shah beh na katei jaka ka long kaba sngewsih kthang ha ka jingim jongka, ka bym jia mynno mynno ruh.“Nga kwah ba dei ban pynshitom pynsaja kaba jur ia kito ki briew”, la ong ka Kong Tailin kaba don lang ha ka ophis ka Commission.Ka la ong ba kumba 10-15 minit ba la don hangne ha katei ka jaka bam, la wan ar ngut ki briew kiba wan ban beh ia ka na jaka ba ki iashong namar ki la ai daw ba ka dei kum ka shakri bad kum ka Nepali. Ha ka jingshisha, la iakren ba ka dei kaba la shah khot, hynrei kim sngap satia.Ha kawei ka liang, ka Nivedita Barthakur kaba dei ka trai ba sah ka Kong Tailin, ka la ong ba ka Delhi Golf Club kam pat shym la panmap, halor ka jingjia bad ka jingpanmap ka long tang kaba shu pynmih khubor. Ka la kyntait ruh ban pdiang ia ka jingtohkit kaba la thung da ka Club namar ba kam don jingmut ban thung tohkit da ka club kaba shah kynnoh ban leh ia ka kam.“Kumno yn thung jingtohkit da ka club kaba donkti ha kane ka kam. Ym lah ban pdiang”, la long ka Barthakur.
title: Ka jingjia ba sngewsih kthang,  bym ju jia mynno mynno ruh:Tailin

content: Nongpoh, 23 Jylliew:Ki runar kiba ym lah satia ban ithuh dur khmat, mynta ka step ki la thmu ban wiang ding ia kawei ka IB jong ka tnat PWD kaba don ha Umsiang khappud bad ka Assam, hynrei hadien ba u Chowkidar u la lap ha ka por kaba biang ban pynlip noh ia katei ka ding.Ka tyllong khubor ia kaba la ioh ban lum jingtip na ki ophisar ka tnat PWD ha Ri Bhoi, la ong ba kane ka jingjia ka la jia mynta ka step ha ka por 4.30 baje ei ei mynstep bad ha katei ka jingthmu thang dusmon da ki runar ka la wanrah ia ka jingjulor ia ki ar tylli ki jingthiah kiba don ha katei ka IB ka PWD.Ki ophisar ka PWD na Mawhati Sub Division, tang mar ia ioh jingtip halor katei ka jingjia, ki la hiar mardor sha katei ka IB kaba don ha Umsiang ban jurip halor katei ka jingshah wiang ding, ha kaba ki la lap ba ka don ka jingjulor ia ia ar tylli ki jingthiah.Haba iadei bad katei ka jingthmu thang dusmon da ki runar ia katei ka IB, na ka liang ki Ophisar ka PWD, ki la dep ban pyntip sha ki bor Pulit ha Umsiang Police Outpost halor kane ka jingjia bad la dep ruh ban ujor da ka Ejehar sha ki Pulit ba kin pynlong ia ka jingtohkit na ka bynta ban ioh kem ia kito ki runar kiba la donkti ha katei ka kam.Halor kane ka jingjia, na ka liang ki pulit ka Ri Bhoi ki dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit bad ban thwet jur ia ki runar kiba la donkti ban wiang ding ia katei ka IB PWD ha Umsiang.
title: Ba shah wiang ding ka IB,  julor ar ki jingthiah ha Umsiang

content: Shillong, 23 Jylliew:Ka HSPDP kan leit ban ia kynduh markhmat ia u bah Blanding Warjri MDC ka Mawthadraishan ban tip shano u jah ha kine ki sngi naduh ba sdang ka dorbar bad ba u wan mih pyrthei pat hadien ba la wai ka dorbar mang tyngka. “Nga shu ia kynduh bad u mynne tangba dei ha ka jaka bun briew, ngam ioh ia kren bha ngin sa leit ia kynduh bad u” ong u General Secretary ka HSPDP u bah Witting Mawsor. U bah Witting u la ong ba ka jingiakren kaba tang tuk tak ha jaka bun briew kam pat shym la pynhun, wat la u ba Bland u la jubab malu mala hynrei dang hap pat ban ia kren markhmat bad u.U bah K.P Pangniang President ka HSPDP West Khasi hills u la ong ba haduh mynta u dang shu ioh jingtip ba u bah Blanding u la wan mih pat hynrei haduh mynta um pat ioh ia kren bad u, “Ngi hap ban ia kren bad u ban tip ia ka daw, “Ngi hap ban tip shuwa ia ka daw balei” ong u bah Pangniang.“Ngam sngew eiei, ka dei ka jingbakla”“Nga shu ithuh khmat, uto na Kynshi, ngi na Nongstoin” ong U bah HR Thabah, haba kynthoh halor ka jingshah kynnoh jongu, ba u pynrieh ia U Bah Blanding Warjri, MDC jong ka Mawthadraishan. “Ngam sngew eiei, ka dei ka jingbakla” ong biang U bah Thabah bad ula ong shuh “Ngam dei u riew sain pyrthei, nga dei u nongtrei kam lajong”.U Bah Thabah, ula ong shuh shuh, ba ha ka miet jong ka 20tarik mynta u bnai ruh, ki pulit kim shym la leit rung satia ha ka ophis jongu ha Mawlai Nongkwar, hynrei ki shu iaid ha surok bad ka jingrah ia arngut ki nongtrei jongu ruh, ka long ha ka por ba ki iaid ha surok bah bad kam dei satia na ka ophis jongu, ula pynshai shuh shuh.“Ngam sngew ei ei, ka dei ka jing bakla, ngam dei te u politician, shu ia ithuh khmat, utyo na Kynshi ngi na Nongstoin” shu iohi kotkhubor. Ngam sngew ei ei ba dei ka jing bakla, ki pulit ki khlem rung sha ophis.
title: “Shano u jah rngai” yn iakren  markhmat ka HSPDP ia u bah Blan

content: Shillong, 23 Jylliew:Haduh mynta ym pat lah ban sngewthuh la ki 3 ngut ki MDC ki bym shym la wan dorbar ki don sha kano ka liang-sha ka PDF ne sha ki seng riewlum. Kitei ki 3 ngut ki MDC ki bym poi sha ing dorbar ki dei na ki seng riewlum bad kitei ki long u bah Blanding Warjri MDC ka Mawthadraishan na ka HSPDP, u bah Equator Nongrang MDC ka Mairang na ka seng UDP bad u bah Adelbert Nongrum MDC ka KHNAM na Jaiaw.U bah Blanding Warjri um shym la wan dorbar naduh ka sngi sdang dorbar kata naduh ka 20 tarik u jylliew haduh mynta ka sngi kaba la pynkut noh ia ka dorbar. U bah Adelbert Nongrum u la wan dorbar tang ha ka sngi sdang kata ha ka 20 tarik u jylliew bad haduh ba kut um poi shuh, u bah Equator ruh kumjuh u la poi tang ha ka sngi sdang.Kitei ki 3 ngut ki MDC ki dei kiba don ryngkat bad ka seng riewlum ha ka por ba ki dang saindur kumno ban pynkhyllem ia ka Executive Committee ba ialam da u bah Pynshngaiñ bad shisngi shuwa ka dorbar ki la weng noh ialade na ka PDF. Ha ka sngi sdang dorbar u bah Adelbert Nongrum u la kylla noh na ka liang pyrshah sha ka jingbym don liang tang mar ia rah Resolution u CEM ia ka Rules 128 watla ha kajuh ka miet pat ka KHNAM ka la shim rai ban neh ha ka liang pyrshah.Kumba ka long mynta ka KHADC ka UDP ka don 4 ngut ki MDC kiba don ha ka liang pyrshah ( lait noh u bah H.S Shylla bad bah Arbinus Lyngdoh), ka HSPDP ka don 3 ngut, ka KHNAM ka don uwei ( lait noh u bah James Ban Basaiawmoit), ka Congress ka don 6 ngut ki MDC, u don sa u wei u MDC shimet na Sohryngkham konstitwensi u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem. Haba khein ia ka jingdon briew ka liang pyrshah mynta ka poi sha ka 15 ngut. Katba ka PDF pat ka don 2 ngut ki UDP, wei na ka KHNAM, wei u ba shah sospon ha ka seng Congress, wei BJP, wei NCP bad 8 ngut ki MDC shimet kaba mut ba ka don 14 ngut ha ka liang synshar.Hynrei ka jingbym lah pynkhyllem EC ka la pynlyngngoh bad ka la pynmih ki dak jingkylli hato kitei ki 3 ngut kiba don ha ka liang pyrshah bad kiba jah na ing dorbar mynta ki don ha kano ka liang ha ka PDF ne bad ki seng riewlum bad lada kitei ki 3 ngut ki la poi sha ka PDF ka pyni ba ka jingbun briew ka PDF mynta ka la poi sha ka 17 ngut.
title: 3 ngut ki MDC bym wan dorbar,  sha ka PDF ne sha ki seng riewlum?
