content: Shillong, 23 Jylliew:Ka drama politik ka na Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka la poi shaduh ka tyndong shkor u Lat jylla syndon mynta ka sngi.Ka liangpyrshah ha KHADC kaba kynthup ia ka HSPDP, UDP, Congress bad Independent ha kane ka sngi Thohdieng, ki la aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u Lat ka jylla u Banwarilal Purohit halor ka jinglong jingman ka sain pyrthei ha Council, khamtam ka jingpyniaid u chairman ia ka dorbar mang tyngka kaba la pynkut hynnin ka sngi, wat la ka dei ban kut mynta ka sngi.Ha ka jingshisha, ki dkhot ka liang pyrshah ki la mut ban iakynduh ia u Lat ka jylla hynrei namar ba um don ha kane ka sngi, ki la shu aiti noh ha u principal secretary jong u Lat.U nongialam ka liangpyrshah u Bah Mansturdy Nongrem haba kren sha ki nongthoh u la iathuh ba ki la dep aiti ia ka dorkhas ha u Lat ka jylla tangba um don la aiti noh ha u Principal Secretary. U Bah Nongrem u la ong ba la iakynduh ruh ia u myntri ka District Council Affairs (DCA) u Bah Prestone Tyngsong bad la aiti lang ia ka jingthoh.Hynnin ka sngi, mar ia wai ka dorbar na Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC), ki MDC ka liangpyrshah ki la mareh bran bran ban leit iathuh sha u myntri ka tnad District Council Affairs u Bah Prestone Tynsong ba u chairman ka dorbar KHADC u la shu shah shiliang ia ka liangsynshar.Ki dkhot ka liangpyrshah na KHADC kynthup na ka HSPDP, UDP, Congress bad Independent ki la iathuh ha u Bah Prestone ba u chairman Bah LG Nongsiej u la leh shiliang ha ka jingpyniaid dorbar da kaba shah ia ka Executive Committee ba ialam da u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem ha ka jingshong dorbar kaba long mynta ka sngi.Katkum ka jingiakren bad u myntri ka DCA u Bah Prestone, u la iathuh ba ki MDC ki la iathuh ba u Chairman u shah shiliang ia ka liang synshar bad ki la kynnoh ruh ba u pynwai noh ia ka dorbar mynta ka sngi, kaba dei ban wai lashai ka sngi.
title: Leit ujor ki liang pyrshah ka  KHADC, sa ha u Lat ka jylla

content: Shillong, 23 Jylliew:“Nga kyrshan PDF, ban ia trei lang bad ka Congress ngam treh” ong U bah Equator Nongrang, MDC jong ka Mairang, haba iakren bad U Rupang mynta ka janmiet. U Bah Nongrang, u ong shuh shuh ba ka rai jong ka seng UDP ruh, ka dei halor katei ka nongrim, ban pyn khyllem ia U bah PN Syiem bad ban thaw da kawei pat ka kynhun synrop jong ki seng trai ri, tangba ym dei ban ia treilang bad ka Congress lane ka BJP.Halor ka jingpep dorbar jongu, hynnin ka sngi, U bah Nongrang, ula ong shuh, ba kam dei ba u pep khnang, hynrei ba u leit ban rah ia ki kot dawai jong ka kurim jongu sha Guwahati, ka bym don ia ka met kaba koit ba khiah ha kine ki sngi. Ha kajuh ka por, U Bah Nongrang, u kren shai “Nga dei U MDC UDP bad nga trei shitom, na bynta ka UDP, naduh dang khynnah nga dei uba ieng halor ka nongrim jong ki seng trai bad nga dei u UDP paka”.Haba la kylli, la ki la don ne em, ki nongialam UDP, kiba la wad ia u, hadien ba u pep dorbar, hynnin ka sngi, U bah Nongrang, ula ong “Em”.Kiwei pat ki lad khubor, ki iathuh ba ka jing ia treilang jong ki seng trai ri bad ka Congress, hynnin ka sngi ha iing dorbar, ka dei ka rai hi jong ki katto katne ngut ki MDC bad kam dei satia ka rai jong ka seng hi baroh kawei, lane kaba U President jong ka seng UDP, u mynjur.Ka dei, nga kyrshan pdf, ban form bad ka congress ngam treh. Lada lah ban phom, lah kren shai ha u bah pynshngain. Pep hynnin, ba shitom menkmie ba leit rah report sha guwahati. Nga dei mdc udp, trei shitom na bynta udp. Ym pat don ba wad, naduh khynnah original minded, pat kyrshan nga dei udp paka. Ban pynhap pn thawalliane non congress, non bjp. Ka rai ka parti ka long kumta.
title: Nga kyrshan PDF, ban ia treilang  bad ka Congress ngam treh:Equator

content: Shillong, 23 Jylliew:Ka Drama ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka dang iai bteng bad ki la mih bun ki jingkylla ha ka samoi treikam jong ki MDC kaba dang iaid mynta dang 3 snem shiteng. Naduh ba ka People’s Democratic Forum (PDF) hapoh ka jingialam u bah Pynshngaiñ N syiem ( CEM) ka la wan ha ka bor synshar ki jingkylla kiba bun ki la mih ha KHADC kiba la pynduh nong ia ki seng saiñ pyrthei kiba khlaiñ ha kane ka jylla.Mar sien khyllem ka ARPA ka seng saiñpyrthei kaba duh nong eh ka dei ka HSPDP na ka jingphet seng ka kong Grace Mary Kharpuri -MDC ka Nongshken konstitwensi. Hadien ba ka PDF ka la wan ka HSPDP ka la duh nong biang na ka jingshah beh seng jong 2 ngut ki MDC u bah L.G Nongsiej bad u bah Morningstar Mawsor. Hadien katei ka mih ka jingsospon ka seng Congress ia u bah Pynshngaiñ bad hangtei sa ka seng Congress kaba la pra phum haduh ba 5 ngut ki MDC ki la risaiñ na katei ka seng bad kitei ki kynthup ia u bah Victor Rani MDC ka Jirang, u bah Arbinus Lyngdoh, MDC ka Umroi, bah Banteidor Lyngdoh MDC ka Mawkynrew, bah Antonio War MDC ka Laitumkhrah bad u bah Hadrian Lyngdoh MDC ka Mawkyrwat.Ha shuwa ba njia katei ka la don ka jingduh nong jong ki seng riewlum kata ka KHNAM kaba la duh noh ia u bah Process T Sawkmie MDC ka Mawlai uba la leit ban ia soh Congress, kham hadien ka la duh biang sa ia u bah Latiplang Kharkongor uba la phet seng noh, ka UDP pat ha katei ka por ka la duh ia u bah Hadrian Lyngdoh uba la leit ban ia soh Congress. Hadien ka don biang ka jingpra ha ka seng HSPDP hadien ka elekshon shiteng samoi ha kaba katei ka seng ka la beh seng ia u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem MDC ka Sohryngkham konstitwensi.Hadien ka elekshon shiteng samoi ka la mih biang ka dak jingduh nong ia ka seng HSPDP bad katei ka dei na ka jingjah rngai u MDC ka Mawthadraishan ha ka sngi long dorbar ka KHADC ha ka por ba ki seng riewlum ki don jingthmu ban pynkhyllem noh ia ka EC jong u bah Pynshngaiñ. Ha kane ka dorbar la iohi ba ka UDP ka la duh nong na ka jingduh nong jong ka ia 2 ngut ki MDC kata u bah H.S Shylla MDC ka Nongkrem bad u bah Arbinus Lyngdoh MDC ka Umroi bad ka don ruh ka dak jingduh nong biang ia katei ka seng namar ka jinghah dorbar sa u MDC ka Mairang u bah Equator Nongrang ha ka por ba ki seng riewlum ki donkam palat ia ka jingdon ryngkat jong u.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba hadien ka elekshon MDC 2014 ka seng Congress ka la jop haduh 10 ngut ki MDC, kham hadien khyndiat por ka la kham bun bad ka poi sha ka 12 ngut hadien ka jingwan ia soh u bah Hadrian Lyngdoh bad u bah Process T Sawkmie, katei ka seng ka duna biang namar ka jingrisaiñ noh u bah HDR Lyngdoh bad ka la poi sha ka 11 ngut. Kumba ka long mynta katei ka seng ka sah sa tang 6 ngut (5 ngut phet seng, wei shah sospon, la jop bujli noh u bah Kimfa Marbaniang na Rambrai konstitwensi -u bah HDR um lah ban khyllie na Sohiong).Lah ruh ban pynkynmaw ba HSPDP ka la jop haduh 7 ngut ki MDC kaba bun tam napdeng ki seng riewlum hynrei katei ka seng ka sah sa tang 3 ngut ki MDC kata ruh kynthup ia u MDC ba jah rngai ha kine ki sngi u bah Blanding Warjri na Mawthadraishan. Ka UDP kaba la jop 6 ngut ki MDC mynta ka don sa tang 4 ngut ki MDC kynthup uwei u bym shym la poi dorbar (Equator) uba ym pat lah ban tip la un dang don bad katei ka seng ne un mih noh. Ka KHNAM kaba la jop 4 ngut ki MDC mynta ka don sa tang 2 ngut ki MDC kynthup ia u bah James Ban Basaiawmoit uba katei ka seng ka artatien bha mynta ba un dang don hapoh ka Party.
title: Ha KHADC: Kad ka PDF ia ka  Congress, UDP, HSPDP, KHNAM

content: Nongstoiñ, 26 Jylliew: Ka jingkieng iaid kjat kaba la shna naduh ka por long MLA  u Maieid Hoping Stone Lyngdoh (Baw kwai ha duwar u Blei) kaba don ha ka shong Kyrshai kaba pyn iasoh ia ka Meghalaya bad Assam ka la sdang ban jot bad synjor noh, namar ym don shuh ba sumar ne maramot ia katei ka jingkieng kaba la wanrah ruh ia ka jingsyier ia ki paidbah kiba iaid ba ieng lyngba katei ka jingkieng.Katkum ka jinglap jong u nongthoh khubor katei ka jingkieng haduh mynta la shu syrdep da ki siej bad ka long kaba mynsaw haduh katta katta, namar mynta ka la ring sdot bad ki jingker jingda ruh kam don shuh ha kaba ki la don ruh ki khep ha kaba ki briew kiba iaid lyngba katei ka jingkieng kila kum hap shapoh kaba la wanrah ruh ia ka jingjia ba sngewsih kaba la shim ruh ia ka jingim jong ki ar tylli ki mynsiem.Haba sakhi ia kitei ki jingjia ba sngewsih, ki paidbah katei ka thain ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew diaw namar katei ka jingkieng ka dei kawei napdeng ki ar tylli ki jingkieng kiba pyniasoh ia ki shnong ha ka thain Kyrshai bad ka long kaba donkam bha ia ki paidbah ka thain hynrei ka jinglong synjor jong ka, kala pynsngew syier ia ki paidbah ba iaid ba ieng.Halor katei ka bynta, ka FKJGP Kyrshai Unit ryngkat ka jingiasynran ka FKJGP West Khasi Hills, ki la leit ban jurip ia katei ka jingkieng bad kila lap da la ki jong ki khmat ia ka jinglong synjor katei ka jingkieng, kumta ka seng ka la dawa mardor ia ki bor ba halor jong ka District kumjuh ia ki nongmih khmat ba kin tuklar mardor da kaba shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban pynbha ne maramot noh ia katei ka jingkieng khnang ba ki paidbah katei ka thain kin lait na kum kitei ki jingma kaba ki la iakynduh bad ban kham pynsuk ruh ia ka leit ka wan jongki.
title: Buh jingma, ka jingkieng  iaid kjat ka thain Kyrshai

content: Shillong, 26 Jylliew:Ka Seng Samla Shnong Mairangbah kan pynkup burom ia ka aktres Sylvania L Mawlong kaba la jop ia ka khusnam best femal actress na ka Prag Cine kaba long ha Guwahati, Assam dang shen. Ia kane ka khusnam la sam da u aktor ka Bollywood u Jackie Shroff. Kane ka khynnah samla ka ioh khusnam na ka phim Khasi,ka Dak Bangla.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, u President ka Seng Samla Mairangbah,  u Bah Macdonald Nongrang u la ong ba ka jingioh rah jongka, ia ka nam ka long ka burom ia ka shnong bad ka jaitbynriew.U la ong ba kane ka khynnah ba dang 15 snem ka dei kaba donsap bha namar ba ka ju shim bynta ha ka jingpynlong ia ka jingiakop shad ha ka shnong ruh ka tbit bha.Namar kane, ka Seng Samla kan pynlong ia ka jingpynkup burom ha ka 15 tarik Naitung ban wan ha Mairang.U Bah Nongrang u la ong ba ka long kaba sngewsih ba ka sorkar kam pat ithuh ia ki samla ba wanrah nam bad kam pat ju ai jingiarap ia ki phlim Khasi kaba dei kawei ka lad ban ai kam ia ki samla hynrei ka kloi ban iarap ia ki phlim ba nabar.  ”Lada ka ai T. 2 klur ia ka phlim  Rock on2,  ka don jingeh aiu ban iarap ia ki phlim Khasi”,u la ong bad bynrap ba ka phlim Rock on 2 ka dei kaba shu wan tang shi sngi ar sngi. Katba ka samla Sylvania ka la ong ba kaba pynlong ia ka ban poi sha ka thong ka dei ka jingai mynsiem na I pa jongka khamtam ban ak phlim.  Kane ka aktres Khasi ka dang  pule ha Dongkor RC UP skul, Mairang.
title: Yn pynkup ka Seng Samla Mairangbah ia ka aktres Sylvania

content: Shillong, 26 Jylliew:Ki pulit ka nongbah Shillong ki la shim da ka sien jam kaba khampher ha kane ka kynti ban ialeh pyrshah ia ka jingkynrei u drok ha kane ka nongbah bad kata ka long da kaba pyndonkam da ki kali ar shaka ne motor bike ban beh ia u drok bad shi bynta ban pynshai paidbah ia une u iakjakor ba pynjot ia ka imlang sahlang.Mynta ka sngi u Superintendent of Police u Davis R Marak u la kaweh lama na Sardar Polce Station ha kaba ki bike kila iaid sawdong ka sor Shillong ban pynbna paidbah ia ka jingiakhun pyrshah ia ka jingkynrei u drok.  Ka jingiaid bike da ki kynhun, ka la pynkyndit ia ki briew haduh ba bun ki bym tip ki sah lyngngoh.Ia ka kynhun ki nongniah bike la ialam da ka RERAM (Royal Enfield Riders’ Association of Meghalaya) lem bad ka jingiatreilang bad ka tnad pulit Sadar Police station.Nalor u SP la don lang ruh ki heh sorkar, bad ki dkhot ka Rotary Club. Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, u SP pyniaid kali,u Dr. Sacheng R. Marak, u la iaroh ia ka jingiasnohkti lang ka RERAM (Royal Enfield Riders’ Assocation of Meghalaya) da kaba ong ba ha kine ki ri, ki nongniah bike kum ka Hells Angels, Vagos ki ju iadonkti bad ki runar hynrei ha kane ka jylla ka RERAM ka la iasnohkti ban wanrah ia ka jingsuk.Katba u SP u Davis N.R Marak,  u la ong ba ki drok ki dei kum ka nem sniew jong ka imlang sahlang bad ka donkam ia ka jingiatreilang baroh ban ialeh pyrshah ia u.Kumjuh u Bah Gulrez Sohliya u secretary ka Royal Enfield Riders ‘Association (RERAM) haba kren ha kane ka jingialang u la ong ba ka RERAM  ka la ju don bynta ha ki kam imlang sahlang khamtam haba ki pulit ka Meghalaya ki ju donkam ia ka jingiatreilang jongki bad kumjuh ki bor synshar district.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Sohliya, u drok um ju kynrei ha kane ka jylla hynrei ha kine ki sngi ka la jubor bha bad wat ki kynthei ki shah rahbor na kane ka jylla sha kiwei ki jaka.Ka jingiaid bike mynta ka long na Sadar Police station sha Police Bazar sha Jail road sha Golf Links bad ka la don ruh ka jingsam kot lyngkdop pyrshah ia u drok, kaba ong, “Ong Em ia u Drok” kaba dei ka thong ba kongsan jong ka Positive Addiction Campaign.La pyniaid ruh ia ki bike na Golf Links  sha Don Bosco Square bad la wan pynkut biang ha Sadar Police Station.
title: Beh drok ki pulit da ki kali  ar shaka ha ka nongbah

content: Shillong, 26 Jylliew:Ka sain pyrthei ha Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ka dang khih phaloh bha mynta namar ba u CEM u Bah Pyn shngain N Syiem u dang pyrshang ban pynskhem ia ka EC jongu da kaba ai shuki ia kiba kyrshan dohiap ia u ha kane ka jingpyrshang pynkhyllem ha ka dorbar ba dang shen.Kat kum ka jingtip, u Bah HS Shylla uba dei u radbah ban pynlait im ia ka EC jong u Bah PN Syiem ula kyntait ia ka jingtyrwa ia ka shuki Deputy CEM namar ba u kwah ba ka EC ka PDF kan skhem. La iathuh ba u Bah Shylla u la sngew hun tang ba la neh ka shuki jong u Bah PN Syiem namar ba um sngew wit shuh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingwanrah ia ka MDC skhim kumba long myn shwa ha ka por ba u dang don ha ka liangpyrshah ha kaba u la shah pyndik ha ka EC jong u Bah PN Syiem.Ka tyllong khubor ba iohlum, la iathuh ba namar kane ka jingbym treh jong u Bah Shylla ia kane ka shuki, la ioh jingtip ba u Bah PN Syiem u la lah ban tyrwa noh ia ka shuki Dy CEM ha u MDC ka KHNAM u Bah Adelbert Nongrum uba dei uwei uba kyrshan ia ka EC khamtam ka jingpep jongu ha ka sngi iatynjuh bor, kaba la iarap ia ka PDF ban lait im da ka said na ka jingkhyllem. Ha ka jingiatynjuh bor dang shen ha iing dorbar, ka EC la PDF ba ialam da u Bah PN Syiem ka la lait salit na ka jingkhyllem  hadien ba u MDC ka KHNAM u Bah Adelbert Nongrum u la pep dorbar, u MDC ka UDP na Mairang u Bah Equator L Nongrang bad u MDC ka HSPDP na Mawthadraishan u Bah Blandingstar Warjri uba wan mih kynsan hadien ba la kut dorbar hadien ba u la pep dorbar baroh shi taiew.
title: Kyntait U Bah Shylla ka shuki Deputy  CEM, lah ban poi sha U Bah Adelbert

content: Shillong, 26 Jylliew:Haba ia kren bad katto katne ngut ki nong thohkhubor ki nongkyr shan ba kham hakhmat jong u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, MLA ka Congress na Umroi konstitwensi ki la iathuh ba ha kine ki khyndiat sngi u Ma Ngaitlang u la pynbna ha ki ba ha u 2018 un ia khun na ka seng NPP bad ki la ong ba u la kren ha ki ba ha u 2018 un wan phai biang sha Umroi ym shuh kum u MLA ka Congress hynrei kum ka MLA ka NPP. Kitei ki nongkyrshan u Ma Ngaitlang ki la iathuh ba ki ruh mynta ki la pynkhreh ban rung ialade hapoh ka seng NPP hynrei ki ap sa tang ka por ba u MLA jong ki un risaiñ noh na ka seng Congress. Katkum ka jing kren jong ki-ki la ong ba ym dei tang u ma Ngait lang ban leit NPP hynrei kin dang don shuh sa kiwei pat ki MLA Congress.Shuh shuh ki la ong ba ka jingpynkhreh u ma Ngaitlang ban ia khun na ka seng NPP na Umroi kam dei tang kaba u shu kren sop sop ha ki nongialam ba hakhmat hynrei ka dei kaba la dep ban rung thliew ing briew ban leit pynsngew sha ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong u. Ban pynthikna shuh shuh ia katei ka khubor ki la iathuh ba ki don ruh ki nongialam sengbhalang kiba kyrshan ia u ma Ngaitlang kum na ka seng RBYF ki ban pyniasoh noh shen ialade sha ka NPP bad uwei na ki, u dei u General Secretary katei ka seng u bah Augus Sten na ka thaiñ Umroi. Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ha u bnai ba la dep u ma Ngaitlang u la leit ban ialap paidbah sha Jirang konstitwensi na ka bynta u nongialam barim ka RBYF u bah Sosthenus Sohtun bad ban pynbna ruh ia u kum u kyrtong jong ka seng NPP na katei ka konstitwensi ha u 2018.
title: “Ha u 2018 ngan wan phai kum u MLA ka NPP”

content: Nongstoiñ, 26 Jylliew: Ka shnong Kyr shai ka dei ka shnong kaba dang hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka West Khasi Hills District, bad kadei ruh ka shnong kaba don ha khappud bad ka Jylla Assam, hynrei haba phai sha ki paidbah nong shong shnong jong katei ka thain ki dang long kiba sah dien haduh katta katta bad ka daw hi ka long namar ka jingshah iehnoh khunswet jong katei ka thain ha ka sorkar Jylla ha baroh ki liang.Kaba la pynsyllang ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong katei ka thain bad ia ki shnong ba marjan kadei ruh namar ka jingbym biang tikna jong ka bording ilektrik ha kaba katei ka thain ka hap ban mad ia ka jingshong dum haduh 4 snem kynthih, kaba la wanrah jingeh shibun ia ki paidbah khamtam ia ki khynnah skul.Haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor, na ka liang jong u bah Rapstar Marngar u ba dei u Rangbah Shnong Kyrshai u la ong ba haduh 6 tylli ki shnong ha katei ka thain ki la hap ban mad ia ka jingshong dum namar ka jingbym treikam shuh jong ki kor ilektrik (Machine) bad u la ong ruh naduh ba wanbuh nyngkong ia kitei ki kor jong ka bording ilektrik ki la treikam tang 1 bnai, hynrei hadien ka 1 bnai ki tiar kila julor noh khlem kano kano ka jingmaramot haduh ba ki paidbah katei ka thain ki la hap ban shong dum haduh 4 snem kynthih.Ym tang kata na ka liang jong Rapstar Marngar u la ong ruh ba kitei ki 6 tylli ki shnong ki kynthup ia ka shnong Mawpun, Pathar Phlang, Mawdiangkper, Mawdumdum, Nongspung bad Kyrshai, bad u la ong ruh ba ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta na ka liang jong ka shnong kala pyrshang ban pyntip sha ki bor ba dei peit, hynrei namar ka jingbymbiang jong ka surok, u la ong ba ka shem jingeh ia ki ban wan shaduh Nongstoin namar ban wan shaduh Nongstoin hap ban lut da ki phew phew hajar namar tang na Kyrshai ban wan sha Nongstoin ki hap ruh ban iaid lyngba ka Jylla Assam.Kumta ha kaba iadei bad katei ka jingeh jong ki paidbah katei ka thain na ka liang ka seng FKJGP West Khasi Hills District, hapoh ka jingialam jong u Palwanbor Syiem, President FKJGP WKHD, myn ha ka sngi saitjain jong ka taiew ba la lah ka la leit ban hiar jurip ia ka shnong Kyrshai bad ha katei ka jingleit hiar jurip na ka liang ka seng ka la lap ia ki jingeh jong ki paidbah katei ka thain ha kaba ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la shu ieh noh bein la bun bun snem.Na ka liang ka seng FKJGP ha katei ka jingleit jurip kala pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia halor katei  ka jingleh bein ka sorkar Meghalaya ia ki thain khappud bad na ka liang jong u Palwanbor Syiem haba ia kren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ong ba ki paidbah ka thain Kyrshai bad kiwei ki thain khappud ki ieid haduh katta ia ka Meghalaya ha kaba ki la pynneh ia u pud u sam bad u la ong ba ka sorkar kadei ban ai buskit ia ki nongshnong shnong Kyrshai namar ka jingieid jong ki ia ka Meghalaya wat hapdeng ka jingiehnoh bein ka sorkar Meghalaya kim shym la leit ban pyniasoh bad ka sorkar Assam ha kaba bun ki jingiarap ki ioh na ka.Ka seng ha kajuh kapor ka dawa ruh ia ka tnad MeCEL ba ka dei ban wan maramot noh ia ki machine light baroh kiba la sniew bad ban pynpoi bording noh sha kitei ki shnong bad lada ka tnad kam shym leh eiei na ka liang ka seng kan sa shim da kiwei ki lad halor katei ka bynta.
title: 4 snem shong dum ka Kyrshai  ba sniew ka mashin bor ding

content: Shillong, 26 Jylliew: Kawei ka long kmie Khasi kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka kong Tailin Lyngdoh ka la shah beh na jaka ba pynlong ia ka jaka bam ha Delhi Golf Club hynnin ka sngi halor ka jingkynnoh ba ka phong jainsem kaba I kum ka shakri ing.Katkum ka khubor ba la pynmih ha ka TNT, la ong ba ioh na ka Nivedita Barthakur, kaba dei na ka dong mihngi, bad ka Advisor ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar Assam, ha kaba ka kong Lyngdoh ka trei kum ka nonghikai ia u khun jongka, ki la khot ban ia bam sngi ha Delhi Golf Club ha ka 25 tarik Jylliew. Bun bah kiba shah khot naduh ki heh ki hain, ki doktor, ki ophisar la khot lang nalor ka Kong Tailin Lyngdoh, ka longkmie Khasi na Meghalaya kaba ju leit jingleit da ka phong Khasi na London sha UAE.Khadsan minit shwa ban bam ja, u Manager uba kyrteng u Ajit Pal bad kawei ka kynthei kaba kyrteng ka Sumita Thakur, ka la leit sha ka Kong Tailin bad ka la ong ia ka ban mih noh na mieh jaka bam namar ba ka I kum ka shakri iing. Haba ka Nivedita Barthakur ka la buh jingkylli ia ki, ki la ong ba ka I kumba ka dei ka shakri iing, ka Nepali bad ka riam jongka, ka iapher.“Nga la ong ba ka dei kaba la shah khot sngewbha, ka dei ka longkmie Khasi bad ka riam da ka riam lajong ka Jainsem. Nga la ong ba nga dei na Assam bad ka dei ka kur jong nga bad kam shym la rah ia u badge ba ka dei ka nongtrei iing”, la ong ka Nivedita katkum ka khubor TNT.Hynrei kitei ki briew kim shym la pyndem bad ki la pyneh. “Ngi la phet noh na ka club da kaba sngew ba la shah ktah ia ka burom, sngew ba ki briew na ka thain Dong Mihngi ki shah peit niew bein”, la ong ka Nivedita.
title: Shah beh ka longkmie Khasi na jaka bam ha Delhi ba phong jainsem

content: Shillong, 26 Jylliew:Ka kynhun ki nongshad  hapoh ka lama ka All Meghalaya Dancers Association (AMDA) ki la byrthen ba lad u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma um khot iakren bad ki shwa ka elekshon, kim banse ban leit shah thngan noh ha surok.Kine ki nongshad hapoh ka jingialam u President ka AMDA u Bah Kitbok Thabah u la ong ba ki la dep phah jingthoh la lai sien sha u Dr Mukul ban khot iakren halor ki mat jingdawa jongki, hynrei haduh mynta kim shym la ioh khubor eiei.U Bah Thabah u la ong ba ki mat jingdawa jongki, ka long ban seng noh ia ka skul hikai shad lada ym lah ha baroh ki district ruh, dei ban buh ha Shillong, nangta ban iarap ia ka jinglut jingsep jongki haba ki leit iashim bynta shabar ha ki jingiakop shad namar ba ka jinglut ka jubor bha ia ki.“Ngin sa pynlong ia ka jingshah thngan ha kano kano ka por shwa ka elekshon lada u Myntri Rangbah um khot iakren”, la ong u Bah Thabah haba kren hynne sha ki nongthoh khubor.Ha kawei ka liang, ka AMDA ka la kyrpad ruh ia ka sorkar ba kan iarap lem na ka bynta ki nongshad kiba la leit iakhun sha Mumbai kiba la poi sha ka kyrdan ba kham shakhmat.Mynta ka sngi, u Bah Thabah u la ong ba ki don saw ngut ki kynhun ba la poi sha ka kyrdan ba shakhmat kiba donkam jingiarap kynthup u  Bah Kitwanlang Khyllait uba la rung ha ka Bharat ki Khoj,  u Vishal Paul ha ka Dance Plus,  ka Dafisha Kharbani kaba dang ap result na jingiakop, ka kynhun Dawanshai Fusion kaba na Ri-Bhoi.Haba kren ha kane ka sngi, ka Dafisha kala ong ba kawei ka jingeh jongki ka dei haba ki leit shabar ki donkam shibun ka jinglut bad kawei pat ka jingdonkam ban don ki nonghikai. Ia kane ka jingeh la pynsngew ruh u Bah Kitwanlang.
title: Byrthen shah thngan ki nongshad,  lada ym khot iakren u Dr Mukul

content: Shillong, 4 Jylliew:“Nga sngew sam-mut, halor ka jingong jong U Mukul Sangma, ba ka UDP, ka don ka jingiadei kaba na kyrpong iing bad ka BJP” ong U Donkupar Roy President ka UDP, ha ka jingpynmih khubor mynta ka sngi.“Ngi ngeit ba ka jing ia trei synrop, ha shwa lane hadien ka elekshon, kam ju don kata kaba ki ong ka kyrpong lane ka jingkhang bah” ong U Dr Donkupar Roy.U Mukul Sangma, u don ka jingkulmar khlieh, hadien ka jingiatreilang jong ka UDP bad ka HSPDP. Baroh ki iatip, ba kam don satia ka jingiateh paralok shwa ka elekshon bad ka BJP, ong shuh u nongialam ka seng UDP.U Dr Don,u kylli shuh, ba balei ba ka Congress, kan kynnoh ia ki seng trai ri, halor ka jingkiew jong ka BJP bad ka dei ka jingbym larkam ka seng Congress, ba ka kiew stet ka BJP ha ka Ri bad ha ki Jylla bad la ai nuksa ia ka Assam, ha kaba ki don bun ki nongialam Congress, kiba la kynriah sha ka BJP. Ha Meghalaya, ki don bun ki Congress, ki ban leit iasoh sha ka seng BJP, ha kaba ha Shella, ki don ki nongialam Congress, kiba leit BJP bad ha Sohra ruh, la pyni ba u nongialam ka Congress, U Dr PW Khongjee, u leit iasoh BJP bad kumta kam dei satia ka UDP, kaba ai bor ia ka BJP, hynrei ka dei ka jingbym larkam jong u myntri rangbah , kaba pynlong ia ki dkhot jong katei ka seng, ba kin iasoh sha ka BJP. “Lada ka BJP, ka kiew ha Meghalaya, ka dei namar ka jing bym larkam jong u myntri rangbah bad ka seng jongu” bad U Dr Donkupar, u ong shuh “Ha Meghalaya, ngi thikna ba ki seng trai ri, kin thaw sorkar ha ka elekshon 2018”.
title: Kulmar khlieh U Mukul, ba ia treilang ki seng trai Ri:Dr Don

content: Shillong, 4 Jylliew:Ban buddien halor ka jingslem ban pyllait ia ka tulop bad arrear jong 12481 ngut ki nonghikai Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA) kiba hikai ha ki kyrdan Lower Primary bad Upper Primary hapoh ka jylla, ka synjuk ki nonghikai SSA ka Meghalaya SSA Schools Association (MSSASA) Sengkmie ha ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai ka la leit ban iakynduh ia u Ambrose Ch. Marak State Project Director (SPD) ka Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan State Education Mission Authority Meghalaya (SSA-SEMAM) ha ophis treikam jong u. Ka tulop kaba shu sahkut la 3 bnai kynthih kaba ki nonghikai SSA ki dei ban ioh dei jong u bnai Lber, Iaiong bad Jymmang jong mynta u snem bad ka arrear jong ka tulop ba tymmai jong u snem mang tyngka 2016-17 kaba la shu sah teng mynta la shisnem khlem lah ban pyllait kata naduh ka 1 tarik u Iaiong 2016 haduh 31 tarik u Lber jong mynta u snem.U bah H.M.Marbaniang General Secretary ka Meghalaya SSA Schools Association (MSSASA) Sengkmie haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor hadien ka jingiakynduh bad u SPD u iathuh, ba u SPD u la pyntip ba ia ka arrear jong ka tulop thymmai jong u snem mang tyngka 2016-17 kaba dei katkum ka jingmynjur jong ka Project Approval Board (PAB) 2016 ka MHRD ka Sorkar Pdeng bad ruh katkum ka hukum ba la pynmih da u State Mission Director (SMD) ka SEMAM kaba dei ka Society kaba pyniaid bad peit ia ka scheme SSA hapoh Meghalaya ha ka 31 tarik u Risaw,2016 kaba tang 3 bnai kata naduh 1 tarik Iaiong haduh 30 tarik Jylliew jong u snem 2016 ryngkat bad ka tulop thymmai jong u bnai Lber bad Iaiong mynta u snem la dep ban pyllait bad phah na ka ophis jong u ha ka 1 tarik u Jylliew sha ka ophis jong baroh 11 tylli ki District Mission Coordinator (DMC) ha ka jylla bad la bthah ruh ia ki ban pyllait mar mar khlem da pynslem shuh sha ki nonghikai SSA.U State Project Director (SPD) u iathuh ruh ba ka daw ba ka ophis jong u ka hap ban pyllait shwa tang 3 bnai ia ka arrear jong ka tulop thymmai jong u snem mang tyngka 2016-17, ka dei namar ba ka tnat MHRD ka Sorkar Pdeng kam pat phah lut ia ka fund na ka bhah jong ka kaba dei ban ioh da ka Sorkar Jylla bad la khih lynti ban ioh ia ka fund ba dang sah mynta u bnai. Bad ia ka arrear kaba dang sah jong u snem mang tyngka 2016-17 kata naduh 1 tarik Naitung 2016 haduh 28 tarik Rymphang 2017 yn sa pyllait noh mar ia ioh ia ka pisa na ka tnat MHRD, bynrap shuh shuh u bah H.M.Marbaniang.U bah Aristotle C. Rymbai President ka MSSASA Sengkmie haba kren bad ki nongthoh khubor u ong ba u State Project Director (SPD) u iathuh ba na ka bynta u bnai Lber mynta u snem la pyllait ia ka tulop thymmai katkum ka PAB 2016-17 bad ka hukum bala pynmih da u State Mission Director (SMD) ha ka 31 tarik Risaw, 2016 kaba la phiah kyrdan ia ki nonghikai SSA ha ki ar kyrdan trained bad untrained ha kaba kiba la pyndep ia ka traning katkum ki kyndon ka National Council of Teacher Education (NCTE) bad RTE Act kin ioh 19044/- bad ki bym pat pyndep ia ka training kin ioh 13335/- ha ka Lower Primary bad ha ka Upper Primary 20493/- ki trained bad 14392/- ki untrained. Kumjuh na ka bynta u snem mang tyngka 2017-18 hadien ba ka Project Approval Board (PAB) ka MHRD ka Sorkar Pdeng ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha ka 2 tarik u Lber mynta u snem ha New Delhi ka la mynjur ia ka jingtyrwa jong ka Executive Committee ka SEMAM ban pynjynsur ia ka jingsiew ia ki nonghikai SSA ki bym pat lah ban pyndep ia ka training katkum ki kyndon ka NCTE na ka bynta u snem mang tyngka 2017-18, kaba la wan hadien ka jingai jingmut jong ka Meghalaya SSA Schools Association (MSSASA) mynshem snem ban pyrkhat biang bad ban pynjynsur ia ka jingsiew ia u nonghikai SSA untrained bad ruh ban ailad ia ki ban pyndep ia ka professional training (D.El.Ed), la pynlait ia ka tulop thymmai jong u bnai Iaiong mynta u snem kaba dei mar katjuh ia kiba dep ia ka training (trained) bad ki bym pat pyndep (untrained) kata ha ka jingsiew kaba 19044/- ia ki nonghikai Lower Primary bad 20493/- ia ki nonghikai Upper Primary.
title: Pyllait ka sorkar ia ka tulop  ba 3 bnai ki nonghikai

content: Nongpoh, 01 Jylliew:Ki riew runar ki bym shem la lah ban ithuh, mynta ka sngi, ha ka por 2 baje ei ei dangstep phyrngab, ki la leit ban thang dusmon ia ka ophis jong ka Youth Congress kaba don ha shnong Pahamsohthri, Ri Bhoi District.Katkum ka jingtip ka tyllong khubor, la ong ba donbok ha katei ka jingshah thang katei ka ophis jong ka Youth Congress kam shem la julor bun, hynrei ka la shu julor malu mala, namar ha katei ka por ba katei ka ophis ka la shah thang ka la don ka jinghap slap.Kumta haba iadei kane ka jingjia, na ka liang ki bor pulit ka Ri Bhoi, ki dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba jur ban lapdien ia ki briew kiba donkti ha ka ban thang dusmon ia katei ka ophis jong ka Youth Congress Nongpoh.Ha ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 9 baje mynmiet ki runar ki la kawang petrol bomb hakhmat kawei ka dukan kaba don ha Lower Jail Road, Shillong.Ha kawei pat ka jingjia ha katei ka 31 tarik hi ki runar ki la kawang petrol bomb ia ka jing jong ka Smt.Minoli Borman kaba don ha Lumshyiap, Nongmynsong, ym shym la don jingjulor eiei ha katei ka jingjia. Ha ka por 11:30 pat mynmiet kawei ka Fortuner kaba don ia u nombar MH-14Y-9717 kaba dei jong u Ashish Gundal ka la kem ding hajan ka jaka ieng kali ha jong ka Orchird Resort, Umiam , katei ka kali ka la julor malu mala.
title: Shah thang ka ophis Youth Congress ha  Nongpoh, kem ding ka kali ha Umiam

content: Nongstoiñ, 04 Jylliew:Halor ka jingshah dawa kaba T.1klur jong ka kong F Marngar, ha U MLA Nongstoin, kumta ki nongkyrshan jong U MLA, ki la pynsngew ba kan bha ba ka kong Marngar, kan leit pan map noh na U MLA, ba kan lait na katei ka jingsiew bai mynraiñ khmat ia u MLA kaba long 1 klur tyngka.Ka kyrwoh ba la phah da u bah Barly Nongum K. Dkhar lem bad kiwei kiba dei ki nongkyrshan ba radbah jong u tei u MLA, u la ong ba kan bha shibun ia ka kong F. Marngar ba kan shu leit pan map noh ia u MLA namar ba ym don shuh da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti namar ba katkum ka section 499 bad 500 ter ter haduh 502 jong ka Indian Penal Code, la khang pyrshah iano iano ruh ban kren ia ki kyntien kiba ktah ia ka longbriew man briew bad kiba shah ujor hapoh kitei ki kyndon ain kin hap ban siew katno katno ruh katkum ka jingbatai ha kitei ki kyndon ym ba u nongshah kren un dawa hynrei ka aiñ ka dawa. Shuh shuh katkum ka kyrwoh la ong ruh ba nalor kata kitei ki kyndon aiñ ki kdew shai ruh ba yn pynshitom bad set byndi ar snem khlem jamin lem bad ka jingshah daiñ kuna katba shah ka kam, hynrei u MLA u khlem kwah satia ban iaid lyngba ka ejahar sha ki bor ka aiñ, hynrei u la pynjynsur tang lyngba ka jingphah pan map bad ai legal notis, hynrei katei ka longkmie kum ka riew kynthei, kam shym sngap satia bad pyneh pynban. “Ha kaba iadei bat katei ka legal notis hap ban bud beit ïa ki kyndon aiñ khamtam kiba iadei bad ka longbriew man briew namar na ha ka ri synshar paidbah ym dei ban kren kynthoh palat iano iano kampher lada dei u nongtrei sorkar, u draibar, u daju lane uno uno ruh” ong ka kyrwoh na ki nongkyrshan u MLA ka Nongstoiñ.
title: Bha ba pan map, ban lait ka T.1klur,  nongkyrshan U MLA Nongstoin

content: Nongpoh, 04 Jylliew:U Chief Judicial Magistrate ka District Session Court, Nongpoh, mynta ka sngi u la phah biang sa 14 sngi ha ka Judicial Custody lane ba kin shong ha phatok, ia ki arngut ki nongialam ka KSU, hadien ba ki la shah kem na ka jingjia shah hiarthma ka jaka ban shna ia ka Steshon Rel ha shnong Ronghona, Ri Bhoi District.Kum ban shu pyn-kynmaw hangne, ki arngut ki nongialam ka KSU ba kynthup ia u samla Ferdynand Kharkamni President ka KSU North Khasi Hills District bad u Sonstar Nongkhlaw, Assistant General Secretary ka KSU, Sengkmie ki la shah kem noh ha ki Pulit hadien katei ka jingjia ha Ronghona kaba la jia ha ka 27 tarik u u bnai ba la dep. Katba ki lai ngut ki nongialam ka KSU, ba kynthup ia u Jayand Sylliang, Paplu Lyngdoh bad Johny Nongrum, ia kaba ki la shah kynnoh ba ki la donkti ha katei ka jingjia, yn tian bishar lashai ka sngi ha ka Court u Chief Cudicial Magistrate ha Nongpoh.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi District, u la pynbna ba ia ka kyndon ain 144 CrPC, kaba dei ruh ka ain kaba khang pyrshah ban lum briew palat ia ka 5 ngut yn weng noh shipor, kane ka la wan ruh hadien ba ka Ri Bhoi District ia mynta ka dang don hapdeng ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ban rakhe ia ka jingdap ba 25 snem.Kumta haba iadei bad kane, wat la ki la weng ia katei ka kyndon, hynrei la khang pyrshah pat ia ki briew ba kin rah ia kino kino ki tiar pynmynsaw bad kiba ktah ia ka shongsuk shongsain jong ki paidbah.
title: 14 sngi ha phatok ia ki heh KSU,  weng 144 CrPC ha Ri Bhoi

content: Shillong, 04 Jylliew:Ka jingiateh paralok ki ar tylli ki seng riewlum ka jylla kynthup ka United Democratic Party (UDP) bad ka Hills State People Democratic Party (HSPDP) shwa kane ka elekshon ban wan, ka la buh ka jingartatien ia ka Congress ba ka lah ban dei tang ka jingplie lad ia ka BJP ban ioh bsuh khlieh na kyrpong iing.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma, u la ong ba ka jingiatreilang ki seng riewlum kam dei shuh kaba rim namar ba ka ju don teng ruh kum kane ha ki snem ba la dep hynrei mynta ka daw ka jingiatreilang jongki ka dei tang namar ba kim lah ban pyni beit ia ka jingiatreilang bad ka BJP ha ka elekshon.“Hato ka jingiateh paralok ka UDP-HSPDP kan long kum ka jingplie lad ia ka BJP ban bsuh khlieh na kyrpong iing ha kane ka jylla”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ka jingiateh kine ki seng riewlum ka long kumba ai lad ia ka BJP ban wan bsuh khlieh ha ki jylla ka Dong Mihngi namar ba baroh kine ki seng riewlum ki don ha ka shatri ka North East Democratic Alliance (NEDA) kaba ialam da ka BJP.
title: Ka BJP na kyrpong, ba iatreilang ka UDP-HSPDP: Mukul

content: Shillong, 04 Jylliew:U heh ka AICC ba peit ia ka Meghalaya u CP Joshi u la ong ba ia ka jingbishar jong ka party ia ka jingshah ujor u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar uba dei u myntri sorkar bad MLA ka party, ka shong ha u president ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC). Ha ka jingjubab halor ka jingkylli halor kane mynta ka sngi, u Joshi u la sait met ban kren eiei halor kane hynrei u la niat sha ka MPCC.“Ia kane ka kam jong u Bah Sniawbhalang, la tip bha u President ka MPCC ban jubab”, la ong u Joshi.U Bah Sniawbhalang u la shah ujor ha ka Jowai Congress Committee kaba kynnoh ba u la thmu ban pyniakhun da u Bah Wailad Shylla uba dei u kynum jongu pyrshah ia u MLA ba mynta ka Congress u Dr Roytre Christopher Laloo. Ha kajuh ka por, u la kynthah ia ka BJP ba ka la pyrshang ban bsuh khlieh ha kane ka dong mihngi na ka bynta ki jingthmu buit poh jongka.U Joshi u la wan iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka Congress ha kane ka jylla ha kaba u la pynlong ia ka jingiakren iathir halor ka jinglong jingman ka party.“U la ong ba ka jingialang ka long ban iakren ia ka jinglong jingman ka party bad nga la ioh ia ka jingsngew na u Myntri Rangbah, na ki nongkitkam ka party”, la ong u Joshi.
title: “Ka kam u Bah Sniawbhalang, tip bha u heh ka MPCC”

content: Halor ka jingshah lute ka Petrol Pump ha West Jaintia Hills, ha ka 10tarik Rymphang 2017, ha ka surok ban leit sha Shangpung, ki pulit ki la kem ia ki arngut ki runar na Cochin, ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep, ha kaba ki la wan ialam ia kitei ki runar sha Jowai.Ha katei ka jingjia, ki don 3ngut ki runar, kiba shong ha ka thuk tuk, kiba la leit lute T.2.5 lak, da kaba pynap suloi ha katei ka Petrol Pump bad ki la kurup ruh ia lai tylli ki mobile na katei ka Petrol Pump.Ki pulit ka West Jaintia, ha ka jingialam jong U Bah Ploster Syiem, Deputy Superintendent of Police, ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit bad ki la ioh ban wad bniah sha Assam bad sha Kerala ruh bad ha katei ka jingtohkit, ki la ioh ban kem ia kitei ki arngut ki runar.Kitei kiba la shah kem, ki long U Bipul Daimary (23) uba na Hastinapur jong ka Tamulpur Sub Division, ka Assam bad U Roghu Ramchiary, na Goybari jong ka Assam hi.
title: Shah kem 2 ki snar lute, namar  ka T.2.5lak na Petrol Pump

content: Shillong, 04 Jylliew:Ka jingiakawang ktieh da ka jingiakop iatyrko hapdeng u nongialam ka BJP u Nalin S Kohli bad ki nongialam ka Congress ka la nang khluit mynta. Haba jubab halor ka jingkop iatainia u Kohli, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ther kylla ia u Kohli da kaba ong ba u la shu kren khlem da tip satia ia kaba sdang kaba kut.U Mukul Sangma, u la buh jingkylli kylla ia u Nalin Kohli, naduh mynno u la long nongshong ka Meghalaya ba un wan batai stad ia ki kam jong ka jylla. “Hato u Nalin Kohli u long nongshong shnong ka Meghalaya?”, la buh jingkylli u Dr Mukul.Ka jingkawang ktieh hapdeng ka BJP bad ka Congress ka la nang khluit hadien ba u MP ka Congress na Assam u Gourav Gogoi u la tyrwa ialade ban iatyrko bad u Nalin Kohli ia ki kam ka BJP bad ka Congress ha kane ka dong mihngi. Hynrei u Nalin S Kohli u la pynphai nia kylla ia u Gourav da kaba ong ba ka long kaba sngew thamalu, ba u Dr Mukul u la shim wai ia u briew na Assam, u bym dei satia na ka jylla Meghalaya.Na ka liang u Dr Mukul, u la buh jingkylli ia u Kohli ba hato u Nalin u la ju wan jngoh teng ia ka Meghalaya ha kine ki san snem ba la dep, hato u la ju leit jngoh sha ki jaka nongkyndong. Kane ka jingkren jongu ka dei tang ka jingthmu ban leh kam khaii ban pynpaw paidbah.U Dr Mukul Sangma u la pynsyriem ia u Nalin S Kohli tang kum u nongpeitkai, ym u nongialehkai da kaba ong, u Nalin u dei tang u nongpeitkai uba shu pyrta haba u peit ia kiba ialeh. “U Nalin Kohli u long tang kum u nongpeitkai haba ialeh ki nongialehkai ha madan. U dei u nongpeitkai uba shu peit haba nga ialehkai”, la ong u Dr Mukul.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingiakhih lynti rel ka KSU, u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la ong ba ka jingiakhih jong ka KSU ban shim da ki lynti ban pynthut ia ka suk ka sain na ka jingshna ka lynti rel, khnang ban pynsngew sha ka skhor ka sorkar ka long kaba bakla.U Dr Mukul u la ong ba kane ka jingeh ka dei jong kawei ka seng (KSU) hynrei ka dei ban sngewthuh ba ka sorkar jylla ka la trei shitom ban phikir ia ka jingwan rung ki briew nabar ha kaba ka la pdiang ia ka Resident and Safety Act bad ka la pynkhreh shaid shaid ban pynshna ia ka Jaka rung bad jaka mih (entry and exit point). “Ym ju don ki sorkar ha ki snem ba la dep kiba nud ban leh kum kane ka sorkar jong nga khamtam ia kum kane ka mat kaba iatyngkhuh bun ki jingeh”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ka jingkham slem ban pyntreikam ia ka jaka rung bad jaka mih ka long namar ba ka sorkar ka hap ban iaid katkum ki kyndon ban iaid.Halor ka jingkylli la ka sorkar kan khot iakren ne em ia ka KSU, u la ong ba ka seng KSU kaba leh ia ki kam beain ban sngap ka sorkar ka dei ban weng noh ia kane ka jingleh namar ba kane kam dei ka lynti kaba dei bad ka sorkar ka la ju iakren bad ka KSU lem bad kiwei ki sengbhalang.U la kam ruh ba kiwei ki sorkar ha ki snem ba la dep kim ju nud ban leh ia ki kam ba kane ka sorkar ka leh na ka bynta ka jingbit jingbiang jong u paidbah bad ka jylla. U la ai jingmut ia ki bor ba dei peit ban iakren bad ka KSU namar ba kane kam dei ka lynti kaba nyngkong ha ka jylla hynrei ka la don ha Garo Hills.Ha kajuh ka por, u la kam ba ka jinglong jingman ka long jai jai bha ha ka jylla bad kam don satia kano ka jingthut ha ka shongsuk shongsain.
title: U Nalin Kohli u nongpeitkai, nga  dei u nongialehkai, ong U Mukul

content: Shillong, 4 Jylliew:Hynnin ka sngi, la ioh kem biang sa ia U Bah Shainborlang Syiemiong, uba na Jakrem, uba dei uwei uba leit iakob ban ia mareh kam pulit bad ka daw, ka long namar ba ula phah mareh lem na ka bynta jongu ha U Bah Rolin Wahlang, uba dei uwei na ki para marjan jongu, na katei hi ka Shnong.Da ka jingshah kem jong U Bah Shainborlang, kumta kiba shah kem mynta, ki la poi baroh sha ka 4ngut, na ka jingleh thok, ha ka jing ia mareh kam pulit.Ha ka taiew ba ladep, lai ngut ki samla ki la shah kem, kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Estanrilin Sohphoh, u Tynshainlin Wanniang bad u Marvelous Kharjahrin kiba dei na thaiñ Mawkyrwat.Kine kiba shah kem ki dei kiba ialeh ia ka eksamin kam Follower kaba lait kumba 2 hajar tylli ha kane ka tnad. U Bah Lakador ba kine ki samla kiba shah kem ki dang don ha ka jingtohkit ba kham bniah jong ki pulit bad ka Board ka la khang lad ruh ia ki ba kim lah shuh ban aplai kam ha ka tnad pulit nangne shakhmat.
title: Shah kem sa uwei, ba pyn mareh  thok da uwei ha ka ialeh pulit

content: Nongstoiñ, 26 Jymmang:Ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division Demand Committee, (MCSDDC) da kawei ka sur ka la shim ia ka rai ban dawa na ka sorkar Jylla ba ka dei ban pynkloi noh ia ka jingplie ia ka Civil Sub Division jong ka Mawshynrut bad katei ka Committee ka la ai por ruh ia ka sorkar Jylla haduh ka15 tarik u bnai Jylliew ban pyndep ia katei ka bynta.Katei ka rai kala mih ruh mynta ka sngi ha ka jingialang bala pynlong da ka Mawshynrut Civil-Sub Division Demand Committee (MCSDDC) hapoh ka iing Dorbar Shnong Riangdo, na ka bynta ban ia pyrkhat bad ban iatai sani bha halor ka jingpynslem jong ka sorkar Jylla ban plie ia ka Civil Sub – Division ha katei ka thain.Haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor hadien ba la wai katei ka jingialang na ka liang jong u samla Arkhelos Diengngan u ba dei ruh u Chairman jong katei ka Committee u la ong ba ka jingthmu jong ka Demand Committee ban pynlong ia katei ka jingialang ka long hadien ka jingpynslem jong ka sorkar Jylla ban plie ia ka Mawshynrut Civil -Sub Division, katba ia ki lai tylli kiwei pat ki Civil -Sub Division bala pynbna da ka sorkar la dep ban plie lut bad mynta kaba sah ka dei sa tang ka Mawshynrut.Shuh shuh u bah Diengngan u la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong ka Demand Committee da kawei ka sur ka la shim ia ka rai ban ai por ia ka sorkar Jylla haduh ka 15 tarik Jylliew, ba kadei ban pyndep noh ia ka jingplie ia ka Mawshynrut Civil -Sub Division bad lada ka sorkar jylla hapoh ka jingialam jong u Dr. Mukul Sangma kum u Myntri rangbah kam lah ban pyndep ia ban plie ha katei kapor bala buh na ka liang jong ka Committee kan shim da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti ban pynbor ia ka sorkar.Katba na ka liang jong u bah G. Sohshang Secretary katei ka Committee u la ong ba ha kaba iadei bad ka jingpynslem jong ka sorkar Jylla ban plie noh ia katei ka Civil Sub Division, na ka liang jong ka Committee ka la dep ruh ban leit ia kynduh ia u bah S. Kharlyngdoh DC barim bad kumjuh ruh ia u Arun Kumar Kembhavi DC thymmai jong ka West Khasi Hills District, ban pan jingtip halor ka jingplie ia katei ka Civil Sub – Division, hynrei kitei ki khlieh jong ka District kila ong ba kim shym pat la ioh kano kano ka jingtip na ka sorkar halor katei ka bynta.
title: Hapoh 3 taiew, plie ia ka Civil Sub  Divn ha Mawshynrut ne yn rai iakhih

content: Shillong, 26 Jymmang:Ka jingialang ka HSPDP Maw-kynrew circle ka la pynskhem ia ka kyrteng u Bah Martle N Mukhim ban long u kyrtong ka Party ha kane ka elekshon MLA 2018. Ia ka kyrteng u Bah Martle la mynjur da jingialang General council kaba la wan iashim bynta na ki tnad bapher bapher ka party ha Mawusam, Thangsning mynta ka sngi.U MLA barim ka Dienglieng u la long ba ki Nongmihkhmat paidbah kum ki MLA, MDC mynta ha jaka ban plie lad ia ki samla, ki paidbah ban trei ban ktah ia ki kam ki dup, ki kylla long pynban ki diengpynkiang kiba teh mraw pynban.Haba kren ha ka jingialang pynskhem kyrtong ia u hynne ka sngi ha Mawusam, Thangsning, u Bah Martle u la ong, “Mynta ki nongmihkhmat haba ki ai skhim ki kylli shwa, uto uba kyrshan ne em ia nga”,.“Ka jingbishna jingpihuin ka la kiew mynta haduh khlieh jong ki briew naduh ki Nongsynshar”, u la bynrap.“Ka bamsap ha kane ka jylla kaba la shyrkhei haduh katta katta, ka la pynjot pynpra ia ka ing ka sem, ka imlang sahlang”, la ong u myntri barim ka sorkar.U la ther ruh ia ka sorkar da kaba ong ba mynta, ba ki myntri sorkar ki sngap haba iohi ba u myntri rangbah u bamsap namar ba ialade ruh ki la ioh lang.pynpaw ia ka jingsahdien ka thaiñ ha kine ki snem, u Bah Martle u la ong ba ha kine ki 10 snem naduh ba um long nongmihkhmat shuh, lada kren tang ka surok, la isangsot bha. “Ka surok mynta ha thaiñ Jatah, ka mih skhim tang ban shu theh khyndew pum pum namar ki ong bym don skhim. Hynrei nga tip ka skhim ka don tangba haba kim nang, ki pynjah lut”, u la ong.“Ki paidbah baroh ki kylli kaei ka nongrim jong u Bah Mukhim, ngan iathuh iaphi, ka nongrim jong u Bah Mukhim, ka long ban iada ia ka khyndew ka shyiap, ka riti dustur, ktien ka thylliej, kiba dei ki nongrim jong ka jaitbynriew”, la ong u Bah Martle.U Bah Martle uwei na ki nongialam seng riewlum ula jop kum u MLA la 20 snem na kane ka thain shwa ba un shah rem noh ha u 2008.Bun ki riew rangbah kiba la kren ha kane ka jingialang ki la pynpaw ia ka jingbynnud ia ka jingshah rem noh u Bah Martle hadien ba ki la mad 10 snem da u MLA thymmai u Bah Remington Pyngrope ha kaba ki kam pynroi sha ka than Kim ju iohi satia hynrei la jubor sa tang ka leh shiliang.Ka jingialang kaba la rai ban pynjop biang ia u Bah Martle ha kane ka kynti da kaba trei borbah met bad mynsiem bad la ia ieng lut baroh kiba don ha ka jingialang ban pynskhem ia kane ka rai.Ha kane ka sngi, la jied ruh ia ki nongkitkam jong ka party ha kaba la bynshet ia kam president ha u Bah Martle N Mukhim katba ia ka kam general secretary la jied ia u Bah Blustar Mukhim. La pdiang ruh ia ka jingthaw ia kaYouth Wing bad ka Women Wing.U Bah Martle u la ong ba kum u nongmihkhmat ba la 20 snem, um ju don kano kano ka jingbishni ne pyrshah iano iano hynrei tang kawei kaba u pyrshah jur ka dei ia ka jingbiej ka jingsahdien.U la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew jur halor ka jinghiran ba ki paidbah ka thaiñ ki la iakynduh hapoh kine ki khyndait snem namar ba ki paidbah ki la shah ialam bakla ban kheiñ dewthala ia kam ban jied ia u nongmihkhmat.Ka jingkheiñ dewthlana ia ka kam bah kam san ban jied nongmihkhmat ka la wanrah ka jinghiran ia ki paidbah ka thaiñ bad u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ban nym kheiñ ba ka kam nongmihkhmat ka dei tang jong ki riew madan ki nongshong surok.U la ong ba dei ban kynmaw ba haba sniew ka saiñ pyrthei, ka pur lang ka jingsniew sha ka iing ka sem, ka trei ka ktah bad ka imlang sahlang.U la ong ba don ki briew ha ka por thep vote ruh kim treh ban thep haduh ba kin sa ioh pisa shwa bad kane ka kylla kam kai noh na ka kam ba kyntang.U la ong ba ha ki snem mynshuwa khamtam ha u snem 1988 ki paidbah ki jied laitluid ia ki nongmihkhmat hynrei ha kane ka juk, ki la shah teh mraw pynban ha ki MLA ki MDC.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Martle, ka Congress ka dei kaba hikai ban leh shiliang ban iaid lait ia ki nongialam shnong haba wan kano kano ka skhim ha ki shnong ki thaw.
title: Pynskhem ka HSPDP ia u Bah  Martle kum u kyrtong MLA 2018

content: Jowai, 26 Jymmang:Ka dong Chilliang Raij mynta ka sngi ka la leit buh ia ka jingujor sha u Deputy Commissioner ka West Jaintia Hills halor ka jingjyllei palat ki ksew shang makia hapoh ka dong bad kumjuh ha ka nongbah Jowai hi baroh kawei.U Secretary ka dong Chilliang Raij, u la ong ba ka jingbun kine ki ksew shang makia ka la buh jingma ia ki paidbah naduh ki khynnah skul bad ki rangbah.Kitei ki ksew shang makia ym tang ba ki la buh ia ki paidbah ha ka jingma hynrei ki la wan rah ruh ia ki jakhlia bapher bapher sha phyllaw iing ba shong briew.Ki kmie ki kpa ruh ki don ha ka jingsyier ban phah skul ia ki khun jong ki ba tieng ioh shah dait ha kitei ki ksew bym don trai. Na ka liang ka dorbar shnong lyngba u ma A. Lanong uba dei u Secretary ka Chilliang Raij u la kyntu ia u DC ban shim khia halor kane ka jingeh jong ki paidbah.
title: Ujor ka Chiliang Raij ba  jyllei ki ksew shang makia

content: Jowai, 26 Jymmang:Ki paidbah khamtam ki nongpang bad ruh ki nongtrei bad ki doctor jong ka PHC kaba don ha Pdeinshakap, ki la ia kynduh jingeh ban ai ka jingshakri kaba biang ia ki paidbah ka thain.Ka Pdeinshakap PHC ka don haduh 38 tylli ki shnong bad ka jingbun briew kaba la palat pud. Ki nongpang kiba wan ban thiah pang kim ioh jaka thiah bad ki hap ban thiah ha madan tang ban ioh ka jingsumar.Katei ka jaka ai jingsumar kaba rit, ha ka jingshisha kadei ban don tang san jingthiah, hynrei na ka bynta ban iarap ia ki nongpang, ki Doctor bad ki Nurse ki la hap hi ban pynbiang sa san tylli, katta katei ka PHC ka don 10 jingthiah. Hynrei na kitei ki 10 jingthiah, ki don tang phra tylli ki jingthiah kiba dang lah ban pyndonkam.Nalor katta, ka jingdon ki nongtrei jong ka PHC naduh ki Doctor bad ki Nurse kam iahap shuh ba ka jingbun ki nongpang. Ym duna ia ka 120 ngut ki nongpang kiba wan shim dawai man ka sngi na ki 38 shnong katba ki Doctor ki don tang ar ngut kiba kynthup ia uwei u Doctor MBBS bad uwei u Doctor Ayush. Ki don tang 4 ngut ki staff Nurse – ar ngut na ki kidei kiba la thung tang kum ki contract.Uwei u Pharmacist uba don tang mynsngi bad uwei u Lap Technician. Tang kawei ka LDA, ym don UDA. Katei ka LDA ka hap ban peit lut ia ki kam ophis bad ka jingkhia kam kaba palat khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ki Birth Certificate.Ka PHC ka don saw ngut ki nongtrei grade IV.Na ka liang u Rangbah Shnong ka Pdeinshakap, u ma Forward Shylla u la ong ba kane ka PHC ka la ai ka jingshakri kaba bha tam ia ki paidbah ka thain bad baroh kiba trei ha katei ka jaka kidei kiba trei shitom hynrei ngi kum ka shnong bad kum ki paidbah ha kane ka thain ngi iohi ba ka jingkhia ka kam jong ki ka la long shaba palat.Ki kamra thiah pang ruh ki long kiba jaw um. Tang shu slap baroh ki kamra ki la dap um lut namar ka jingjaw um, la iathuh kawei ka longkmie kaba ap nongpang.Na ka liang ki Doctor bad ki Nurse ki la pynpaw ba katei ka PHC ka la donkam ia ka iing dewbilat kaba thymmai namar katei ka iing tin ka la jot bad rim palat.Na ka liang u Rangbah shnong u la ong ba ka bor shnong ka la dep thoh sha ka tnad naduh u snem 2015 hynrei ka tnad kam pathiaw satia ia ka jingud jong ki.
title: Kynduh jingeh ki paidbah bad  ki Doctor ha Pdeinshakap PHC

content: Nongstoiñ, 28 Jymmang:Ka party HSPDP kadei ka seng kaba la rim bha, ka ban sa kynjoh 50 snem ha u snem 2018, bad katba ka seng, ka dang pynkhreh ban rakhe ia ka jingdap 50 snem, kynsan ka seng, ka la sdang ban kiew sted bha ha kaba kiba bun ki la sdang ban phai khmat sha ka seng, ym tang hapoh West Khasi Hills hynrei ka HSPDP kala sdang bah suhthied bha ruh hapoh ki bynta jong ka East Khasi Hills, ka la sdang ruh ban khlie lung khie im sha ki thain Ribhoi bad sha ki thain Jowai.Ha kaba iadei pat bad ka jingong ba ka seng HSPDP, ka la beh noh ia u MDC ka thain u bah Morning Mawsor bad ia u MDC ka Nongstoin u bah L.G. Nongsiej, na ka liang jong u bah Ardent Miller Basaiawmoit haba kren ha ka jingialang bah ha Mawthengkut u la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ka seng HSPDP ka khlem beh ia u bah Morning Mawsor na ka seng, hynrei ka kwah ban pyniaid beit iaid ryntih ia ka seng, ha ka rukom kaba itynnad, namar ka jingleit ban pyniasoh jong ki ar ngut ki MDC sha ka PDF khlem ka jingtip jong ka seng, ka long kum ka jingialeh pyrshah bad na ka liang jong ka seng, ka la pynsngewthuh ia ki, hynrei kim shym sngap bad ki la ong ba ki la jied hi noh ban mih na ka seng.U bah Ardent u la kren ruh shaphang ka Langpih bad u la ong ba mano bala pynkhih bad pynklumar jingmut ia ka thain Langpih mynta naduh ba la pynmih bad pynkhie im biang ia ka Hima Nongmynsaw kaba la leit noh naduh ki spah tylli ki snem, naduh ba la iap katei ka Hima Nongmynsaw hadien ba ym don nongpeit nongkhmih shuh u (L) Maieid Hoping Stone Lyngdoh u la bthah ia u Syiem jong ka HimaRambrai ban peit ia katei ka thain bad ha ka snem 1984 u Syiem ka Hima Rambrai u la ithuh ban pyniasoh ia ka Raidmynsaw kaba la tip ruh kum ka Hima Raidmynsaw Rambrai Syiemship, ha kaba ula ong ba ka dei ka kynhun PDF, kaba ialam ha District Council, kaba pynim iaka Hima Nongmynsaw.Hynrei ha u snem 1985 la die noh ia katei ka Hima Raidmynsaw sha u briew shimet, hynrei da ka jingiakhun bad ia said jong ki paidbah ym shymla lah bad haduh ka jingpeit jingkhmih jong ka Hima Rambrai katei ka Raidmynsaw ka la ioh haduh lai ngut ki myntri bad u ba khatduh haduh mynta u dei u bah Hindro Samakha u ba long u Sirdar bala ithuh da ka District Concil ha u snem 2000 bad ha ka snem 2009 la thung ia u kum u sirdar bad kumjuh ha u 2015 da ka jingjied biang jong ki paidbah ka thain, bad dei u bah Hindro samakha bad ki paidbah ka thain kiba la iada ia ka Langpih ban dang neh ha ka Jylla Meghalaya haduh mynta.
title: Ka HSPDP kam beh ia u bah Morning & bah LG Nongsiej

content: Shillong, 28 Jymmang:“Shisien ba la mih madan, ka dei beit ka phainal bad kam lah ban ialehkai khlem don ba thep kol” ong U MLA jong ka seng UDP, haba iakren bad U Rupang mynta ka janmiet.Haba iakren halor ka jing iatreilang jong ka seng HSPDP bad ka UDP, ha ka elekshon 2018, utei u rangbah, ula ong “Dei ban burom ha ki jaka ba don ki MLA. Lada ym burom, kan myntoi aiu” ong shuh shuh utei U MLA, u bym kwah ban pynpaw kyrteng.Ka jingiatan tyllai, ka jur bha ha kine ki sngi, ha ki katto katne ki Constituency ba kitei ki seng trai ri, ki khlain baroh arliang, namar ba ki kandidet jongki, ki kwah ban iakhun beit ha kane ka elekshon 2018 bad kitei ki kynthup ia ka Mylliem, ha kaba ka don ka MDC na ka seng HSPDP bad nangta sa u kandidet jong ka UDP, uba ju ia khun beit ha kine ki sien ba ladep bad nangta ka Mawkynrew, ha kaba U bah Martle Mukhim MLA barim, ula pynbna, ba un iakhun beit na ka seng HSPDP, kaba dei ruh ka Constituency jong U MLA ka seng UDP bad nangta sa ka Mairang, kaba ju dei ka ktem jong ka HSPDP bad nangta ka UDP pat ka don ia U MLA jongka na katei ka Constituency, nangta ka Mawthadraishan ha kaba ka HSPDP, ka don ia U MDC, uba dang shu jop shen, katba ka UDP, ka don ia U MLA na katei ka Constituency bad kumjuh ka Sohiong ruh kaba don ia U MDC na seng HSPDP, katba kaba ju dei ka ktem jong ka UDP.
title: “Shisien ba la mih madan,  ka dei beit ka phainal”

content: Nongstoiñ, 28 Jymmang:Ki hajar ngut ki nongkyrshan bad nongkit kam jong ka HSPDP Mawshynrut Area Unit, ha ka sngi saitjain, ki la shim ia ka rai ban phah biang ia u bah Witting Mawsor, MLA ka thain ba un long kum u kyrtong jong ka seng, ban iakhun na katei ka Konstitwensi ha ka elekshon sha ka iing Dorbar thaw ain jong ka Jylla ka ban sa long ha u 2018.Ha ka jingialang, kaba la long ha Mawthengkut, la iadon lang ruh u President ba rangbah duh jong ka party u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit, u bah Witting Mawsor u ba long ruh u MLA ka thain bad ha kajuh kapor kum u Secretary ka HSPDP, u bah D. Jyndiang MLA ka Nongstoiñ, Pastor K.Langrin Secretary ka HSPDP Mawshynrut, u bah M. Unyiap u bala pyniaid ia katei ka jingialang.Haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang u bah Witting Mawsor u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew lyngngoh kaba khraw ban iohi ia ki hajar ngut ki paidbah kiba la wan ban ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ia u bad khamtam ia ka seng hi baroh kawei, namar ba um shym la khmih lynti ba un iohi ia ki hajar ngut ki paidbah namar ba u la ju ioh sngew ia kiba bun ki sur kiba ong “U Bah Witting Mawsor um don shuh wat tang u wei ruh u nongkyrshan”.Shuh shuh u bah Mawsor u la panmap na ki paidbah nongkyrshan bad khamtam na ka Mawshynrut Konstitwensi hi baroh kawei ba um shymla lah ban iadon ryngkat lang bad ki ha kine ki khyndiat bnai kiba la leit namar ka jingshitom kaba la ban ha ka met jong u, bad u la ong ruh ba wat la um shym la lah ban iadon ryngkat lang hynrei ia kaei kaba dei jong u paidbah u la pyndep ia ka kamram ban ai sha ki.Ym tang kata u bah Witting u la ong ruh ba na kapor sha kapor u ju ieng hapoh jong ka Iing Dobar thaw ain ka Jylla ha kapor ba don ka dorbar ban kren halor kiba bun ki jingdonkam hapoh ka Konstitwensi ka jong u, u la kren ruh ha kaba iadei ban pynioh Civil Sub Division ia ka Mawshynrut bad kumjuh ia ka Police Station, ka surok Maweit bad kiwei kiwei kiba la sdang ruh ban urlong mynta bad kitei kiei kiei kin nym shu wan hi hapoh ka thain lymda don ka jingiaksaid hapoh ka Iing dorbar.Ha kaba iadei pat bad ka jingphet seng bad mih noh u bah Morning Mawsor na ka party HSPDP, u bah Witting u la ong ba um kwah ban kren ne ong ei ei ha kaba iadei bad katei ka phang namar ba ka seng, kam shymla beh hynrei u la mih hi da ka mon sngewbha lade, namar kata u bah Witting u la ong ba um kwah ban kren ei ei halor katei ka mat namar ba ban ia ki paidbah u dang kham sngewsih shibun shah ma u.“Hoid kala don shisha kata ka jingpyrshang ban pynphriang ia ka khubor ban ong ba ka HSPDP hapoh Mawshynrut ka la troin mynta, bad kala don ruh ka jingkynnoh bad kynthoh ia u bah Witting MLA ba un nym jop shuh ha ka election ka ban sa wan, hynrei haba nga iohi ba katne ngut ki paidbah kila wan ban ai ka jingkyrshan ha kane ka jingialang kala weng noh ia kita ki ei ei baroh bad khamtam ia ka jingartatien bad ngi lah ban ong ba ka HSPDP na Mawshynrut kan dang ioh biang ia ka seat lane ka jingjop ha kane ka election kaba ban sa long shen” ong u President ba rangbah duh jong ka party u bah Ardent haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang.Ha katei ka jingialang ka party HSPDP ka la ioh ruh ban pynithuh bad pdiang sngewbha ia kiba dang wan rung thymmai sha katei ka seng, kiba kynthup ruh ia ki katto katne ngut ki nongialam sengbhalang na ki seng bapher bapher kiba la paw hapoh ka Jylla kiba don ha katei ka thain.
title: Rai ki hajar ngut ban iakhun biang  U bah Witting Mawsor ha ka 2018

content: Shillong, 26 Jymmang:Tang mar ia sdang ka jingiateh lok hapdeng ka HSPDP bad ka UDP ban ia treilang ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 ha ka jylla, ka la sdang ruh ka jingpait jingpra bad ka jingduh nong ba nyngkong eh ka dei ka UDP ha kaba mynta ka sngi la pynduh pyndam syndon ia katei ka seng ha Nongkrem Konstitwensi. U General Secretary ka UDP Npngkrem u bah Teiskhem Kharmuti u la iathuh ba mynta ka sngi ka la don ka jingialang jong ka seng UDP Nongkrem bad ha katei ka jingialang kaba la donlang u MDC bah H.S Shylla la pynwai noh ia katei ka seng bad la pynduh pyndam noh shisyndon.U bah Teiskhem u la ong ba ia katei ka rai la shim hadien ba ka Party ka la iatai sani bha bad ka la lap ba u President Rangbah ka UDP u Dr.Donkupar Roy um shym la kynjoh ktien tang shi kyntien ruh ia ka Circle, hynrei u la shim beit beit ia ka rai ban ia treilang bad ka HSPDP tang lyngba ka jingiakynduh sop sop tang 2 ngut hi bad u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit President ka HSPDP. U bah Teiskhem u la ong ba la pynkhlain ia ka UDP ha Nongkrem ha u 2016 da ka jingthmu ban pynrem ia u bah Ardent MLA ka Nongkrem bad dei halor katei ka nongrim ba ka HSPDP ka la shah rem kput ha ka elekshon MDC shiteng samoi. “U Dr.Don um shym la khein snep ia ki 6097 vote ka Nongkrem hynrei u kheiñ kordor ia ka 4122 vote ka UDP, ngi nangkhmih lynti ba un pan jingmut na ka Circle hynrei u leh donbor pynban” ong u bah Teiskhem.U bah Teiskhem u la ong biang , “Ngi la isih palat ia u MLA jong ngi u bah Ardent, ngi la trei shitom ban pynjop ia u bah Shylla ban pynrem ia u ha ka elekshon MDC shiteng samoi bad ngi la ioh jingjop, ngi da thrang eh ban pynrem biang ia u bah Ardent ha u 2018 bad ngi don ka thong ban pynrem beit hynrei u President ka UDP u nguid noh ia la ka prie tang na ka daw ba u tieng ioh u bah Teinwell u ia leh pyrshah ia u , u tieng ia ka PDF” ong u bah Teiskhem. Lah ban kdew ba ka UDP ha Nongkrem ka la kam ba ka jingjop ha ka MDC elekshon ka dei tang ka Yellow Card hynrei ha u 2018 kan ai Red Card ia u bah Ardent, haba ia kren halor katei ka bynta u bah Teiskhem u la ong ba kiei kiei kin sa nang paw nangne shakhmat. Lah ruh ban kdew ba u bah Shylla ka UDP u la ong ba ka HSPDP kam shym la poi shuh sha ka phainal naba kam wan tang ha ka kyrdan ba-ar ruh hynrei ka la hiar sha ka kyrdan ba-lai ha ka MDC elekshon, halor katei ka bynta ruh u bah Teiskhem u la ong ba yn ia sa ia kren hadien.Kham hadien u bah Teiskhem u la ong ba bun kiba la phet seng na ka UDP hynrei don tang katto katne ngut kiba dang neh bad ka UDP.
title: Byrngem ai red card ia ka HSPDP, ai  Red Card “ialade” ka UDP Nongkrem

content: Shillong, 26 Jymmang:Ka la mih pyrthei, ka shithi, kaba iadei halor ka bor jong ka Khasi District Council bad katei ka paw pyrthei, halor ka jingdawa jong ka Council ban mynjur ia ka Village Adminstration Bill lane ka VAB, 2014.U Ajay Kanoujia, Director NE II, ula phah shithi sha U MS Rao, Principal Secretery sha U Lat ka Jylla, Meghalaya, ha U Kyllalyngkot 2016, kaba long la 6bnai tam mynshwa, ha kaba u jubab ia ka shithi, kaba la phah da U Rao, ha 10tarik Nohprah 2015.Ki mat kiba la pan jingshai na ka tnat kam poh iing jong ka sorkar India, ki long ba kat kum ka paragraph 3(e) jong ka Sixth Schedule, ia ka jingjied ia ki dkhot sha ka District Council, ka dei ban iaid da ka jing ia thep vote jong ki paidbah bad la ong ruh ba ki Village Council lane ki dorbar shnong bad ki Town Committee ruh kumjuh, ki dei ban jied da ka jing ia thep vote paidbah, hynrei ha Meghalaya, ym pat shym la jied satia da u paidbah, ia ki dorbar shnong lane ki Village Council.La pyni shuh shuh ba ha ka jing ia soi soskular hapdeng ka ANVC bad ka sorkar India ryngkat bad ka sorkar Meghalaya, la kren shai ba ka donkam ban don ki dorbar shnong, kiba da jied da u paidbah bad kumta, ka dei ban iaid ha kajuh ka rukom ha Khasi bad ha Jaintia Hills District Council; hynrei la ong ba ha ka mat jong ka VAB, katei kam shym la kynthup satia.Katei ka shithi, ka kdew ia ka Paragraph 3(g) jong ka Sixth Schedule, ka ai bor ia ki District Council, ba kin thung ia ki Syiem lane ki Rangbah Shnong, ha kito ki jaka ba don ki trai shnong bad la bthah, ba ym dei namarkata ban pyn ia khleh lang hapdeng ka paragraph 3(e) bad ka paragraph 3(g) bad la bthah ba ym bit ban pyn iakhleh ia kane ka kam, halor ka phang jong ka riti dustur bad ka rukom jied nong mihkhmat jong kane ka juk, namar ba kan ialam bakla ia ka jingmut jong ka riti synshar Ri.Ha ka mat jong ka VAB, la ong shuh shuh ba tang ki Khasi, kin lah ban don bynta ha ka Dorbar Shnong bad ba kin jied ia ki dkhot jong ka Dorbar bad la kylli namarkata ia ka bhah jong kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew bad ki kynthei ruh kumjuh bad la ong ba ka jingjied ka dei ban long ia baroh bad ym dei ban pynduh ia ka bhah jong ka synshar paidbah ia kiwei ruh ki jaitbynriew.U Ajay Kanoujia, u ong shuh shuh ba ka don ka mukotduma ha Meghalaya High Court, kaba ong ba haba ka Meghalaya, ka la ioh ia la ka jong ka Jylla, kumta la dei ban pynduh noh ia ki District Council, namar ba ka Jylla Meghalaya, ka dei kaba la synshar hi da ki trai jylla suda bad ba ka Sixth Schedule, ka don bynta, tang mynshwa ha ka por ba ka Meghalaya, ka dang don hapoh ka Jylla Assam.Katei ka jingpan jingpynshai ka ong shuh shuh ba ka rukom trei kam jong ki Dorbar Shnong, ha kaba pyniaid ia ki skhim bapher jong ka sorkar, dei ban da peit bha bad katei ka dei kaba la leh ha kiwei pat ki bynta bapher jong ka Jylla.U Bah John F Kharshiing, haba iakren bad U Rupang, u iathuh shuh shuh, ba lada ka poi sha ka kutlad, ba ka sorkar India, kam ithuh ia ka jingiasoi jong ki khlieh nongsynshar bad ka sorkar India, kumta ki Dorbar Hima Khasi, kin hap ban leit tied jingkhang sha ka United Nations lane sha ka kashari jong ka pyrthei.
title: Byrngem ki khlieh nongsynshar  ban ujor sha United Nations

content: Shillong, 26 Jymmang:Ka jingiatan tyllai hapdeng ka Mawpat bad Mawlai ia ka C&RD Block Mawlai ka nangjur bha mynta. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ka sorkar ka la shem jingeh ban shim ia ka rai ba khadduh shano ban ai bad ka dawbah ka dei ba ka la don ka jingkyntur na baroh ar ngut ki nongmihkhmat jong ka seng Congress kata u bah A.L Hek MLA u kwah ban rah sha Mawpat katba u bah P.T Sawkmie MDC pat u pynbor ban rah sha Mawlai.Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba u bah Hek u la byrngem ba lada rah sha Mawlai bad pynduh ia ka Mawpat un mih noh na ka seng Congress katba u bah Sawkmie ruh u la byrngem ba lada rah sha Mawpat un mih noh na ka seng Congress. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh shuh shuh ba ki nong Mawlai ki la byrngem ba lada jia ba u bah Sawkmie uba don hapoh ka seng Congress um lah ban wanrah ia ka Block sha Mawlai kin ym ailad ia ka seng Congress tang ban ialap elekshon ruh bad dei na katei ka daw ba la ong ba u lah ban mih noh na ka seng Congress lada ka sorkar kam ai sha Mawlai.Lah ban kdew ba baroh ar tylli kitei ki shnong ki la dep tyrwa ha la ki jong ki jong ki jaka sha ka sorkar ban tei ia ka Block Mawlai hynrei la ong ba ka sorkar ka don ha ka jingeh mynta bad kam lah ban shim ia ka rai ha kaba la iathuh ruh ba katei ka kam ka lah ban sahteng shuwa bad yn ym lah ban shim rai shuwa ka elekshon.
title: Jur ka jingiatan tyllai ia ka Block  Mawlai, sha Mawlai ne Mawpat

content: Shillong, 26 Jymmang:Ki pulit ka Meghalaya ki dang sah ha ka umdum halor ka jingjah jong ka samla Lammidaki Rymbai 24 snem kaba shnong Iaiong, Jaintia Hills ha Guwhati watla, ka kam ka la iaid la saw bnai eiei mynta. Haduh mynta,katkum ka jingiathuh jong u Bah Syiem, ki pulit ki la ioh ban kem ia uwei u briew (khar Assam) uba dei na Kamrup, uba dei u samla barim katei ka samla hynrei u la iakhlad noh bad ka.“Ngi la buddien ia u bad la lap na Kamrup, ka Kamrup district hynrei ha ka jingtohkit um don bynta eiei bad ka hynrei mynta ngi dang tohkit shuh halor kane ka kam ban lap ia ki runar”, la ong u Bah Syiem. Ha ka jingiakren bad u Superintendent of Police (Crimes) ka East Khasi Hills mynta ka sngi, u Bah Vivek Syiem u la ong ba ki pulit ka Meghalaya ki dang sah umdum namar ba kane ka kam, ka hap ha ka kti jong ki pulit ka Assam hynrei watla katta ruh ki la pyrshang ban iatreilang bad ki pulit Assam ban thwet ia kiba donkti halor kane ka kam.U Bah Syiem, u la ong ba ki pulit ka Dispur, Assam kim shym la shim khia bha ia kane ka kam bad dei halor kane ba ka kmie jong katei ka khynnah ka Kong Jemina Rymbai ka la leit ban pan jingiarap na ki pulit ka jylla halor kane ka kam.Kane ka jingwan jong kiba haiing jong katei ka samla ba la shah rahbor, ka long hadien shi bnai ba ki la dep ban ujor ejahar ha Dispur Police station hynrei kim shym la leh eiei ban tohkit. Ka samla Lamidaki Rymmai kaba trei pyntbit (internship) ha ka GNRC Hospital, Guwahati, ka la jah naduh ka 2 tarik Rymphang 2017.Katkum ka jingiathuh I kmie jong kane ka samla, I Kong Jemina Rymbai, ka khun jongi, ka dei kaba pule nurse ha International Hospital Guwahati bad ka leit pyntbit ne intership ha katei ka hospital.I kmie jong kane ka samla, I la iathuh ba ka khun jongi, ka la shah rahbor ha ki runar bym lah ban tip haduh kine sngi watla ki pulit ka Assam lyngba ka jingshim khia jong ki pulit ka Meghalaya, ki la ioh kem uwei u briew uba don ka mobile jongi.Hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba haduh mynta kam shym la iaid shaphrang kane ka kam namar ba ki pulit ka Assam kim shym la shim khia satia.
title: Kem ia u samla barim, ha suin ki pulit  halor ka jingjah ka nos na Ialong

content: Nongpoh, 26 Jymmang:Uwei u khynnah skul jong ka St. Paul Higher Secondary School, Nongpoh, uba la tip kyrteng kum u Pius Sharma (13) bad uba dang pule klas V1 u la mynsaw jur hadien ba ka kynroh kaba dang shu shna thymmai jong katei hi ka skul ka la khyllem kynsan ha kawei ka dukan kaba don hajan jong katei ka skul bad ha ha katei ka jingjia ka la bhan ruh ia utei u khynnah uba dang don ha katei ka dukan.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia mynta ka janmiet ha ka por 4 baje 20 minit, namar ha katei ka por ka don ruh ka jinghap slap kaba jur bha ha Nongpoh bad ka daw kaba la pynlong ia utei u khynnah ba un shah bhan ha katei ka kynroh, ka dei ruh hadien ba u leit ban rieh slap ha katei ka dukan.Ia u ne u khynnah skul u ba la mynsaw jur na ki bynta jong ka khlieh bad ka kjat la ioh ban sei noh, namar ka jingkloi iarap da ki briew kiba don hajan jong kane ka dukan bad ruh ban rah mar mar sha Bethany Hospital, Nongpoh ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba kyrkieh.Haba ia kren bad I Sr. Jemma J. Dkhar, Headmistress jong ka St. Paul Higher Secondary School, I la iathuh ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por ba u dang hap slap jur bha ha Nongpoh, bad ka dei ruh ha ka por ba dang shu wai skul, ha kaba u tei u khynnah skul u la mih na ingskul bad leit ban rieh slap ha katei ka dukan kaba don hamar pyrshah jong kane ka skul.Ka Sr. Dkhar ka la ong ruh, ba tang mar ia ioh jingtip halor kane ka jingjia na ka liang ki nonghikai ha ryngkat bad ka ki la leit mareh mar mar sha katei ka dukan bad ruh ban iarap sei ia u tei u khynnah u ba la sahkut hapoh ki maw bad ka khyndew, bad mar mar ia ioh sei ia u la rah noh sha Hospital ha Bethany ban ai ia ka jingsumar bad ruh ban leh ia ka X-Ray.
title: Mynsaw u khynnah skul, ba  twa ka kynroh ha Nongpoh

content: Jowai, 28 Jymmang:Ka long ka jingjia kaba ktah ia ka jingsngew briew ha kaba u kpa u la phasi ia la I khun ba dang 2 bnai hashwa ban phasi ia lade.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha Tuber-Kmai Shnong ha ka miet sngi Saitjain. U Riang Lyngdoh u la phasi ia la I khun iba kyrteng ka Aim Phawa bad hadien pat u la phasi sa ia lade ha ka juh ka jaka ha kamra iing jong ki.Ha katei ka por, ka kmie jong itei I khyllung, I kong Rilang Phawa I dang saitjain hajan iing hi.Ha kaba nyngkong u Rangbah Shnong katei ka shnong, u Graham Lyngdoh u la pyrshang ban buhrieh ia katei ka jingjia da kaba khang ia ki ba haiing ban pyntip pulit. Namar ka jingioh jingtip kloi ki pulit, ki pulit hapoh ka jingialam u OC ka Khliehriat ki la hiar sha katei ka shnong bad la kit ia baroh ar ki metiap sha Khliehriat ban pyndep ia ka Post mortem.Hadien ba ki pulit ki la leh ia kaba donkam katkum ka ain, utei u rangbah shnong u la hap ban ujor ejahar sha ki pulit. Mynta ka sngi la pyndep ia ka post mortem bad la aiti ia ki met sha kiba haiing.
title: Phasi u kpa ia I khun ba  2 bnai bad phasi ia lade

content: Shillong, 28 Jymmang:“Ngin ujor da ka dorkhas sha ka Megha-laya High Court, ia ka jingskud jaka ka MUDA ha kane ka taiew ban wan”, ka dei ka kyntien ba la ong da u Executive Member ba peitia ka pla tyngka ka KHADC u Bah Niel Antonio War.Ha ka jingiakren sha ki nongthoh khubor, u Bah Antonio u la ong biang, “Ngi la iakynduh ia ki nongsaid ain bad la iakren bun bnai bad ngin ujor da ka dorkhas halor kane”.Ka sorkar jylla ka la pynsangeh ban pyntreikam ia ki ain shna iing shabar ka Municipal hadien ba la mih ka jingpyrshah jur na ki paidbah na kylleng ki jaka ba hap ha khapsor, hynrei ka High Court ka la pyniap biang ia ka rai pynsangeh ka sorkar ia ka jingpyntreikam ia ka ain shna iing, hadien ba la ujor da u Bah Tirot Sing.Ha ka jaka ban leit iasaid biang halor kane, ka sorkar kam shym la leh bad ka la sngap beit ia ka rai ka High Court, kaba mut ba ka ain shna ing ka MUDA ka treikam.Halor kane ka nongrim, ka KHADC ka la rai ban leit ujor pyrshah halor kane ban pynthikna ba ha ki jaka ba hap ha ka jingpeit ka KHADC kim dei ban shah tuklar ha ka sorkar jylla.Ha kawei ka liang, u Bah Antonio u la kynnoh ba ka sorkar pdeng ka la pynduna haduh 1 klur ba la mang sha ki KHADC tang namar ba slem ka sorkar jylla ban pynlait ia ka pisa ba la mang sha ka Council.U la ong ba ka shim por shi snem kynthih ia ka sorkar jylla ba kan pynlait ia ka pisa jong ka T. 133 klur kaba la pynlait mynshem ha u Rymphang ka sorkar pdeng ka dang pynlait shen.U la ong ba ka jingleh pynsuki khnang ka sorkar ka long ban khang lad ia ka pisa ba la ai ka sorkar pdeng ia ka KHADC, namar ba haba slem ka jingpynlait ia ka pisa, ka jingaiti ia ki Utilisation certificate ruh ka slem lypa.“Mynta la shah khate haduh san spah klur namar ka jingslem ka jingpynlait pisa ka sorkar jylla”, u la ong.“Ha ka 2015-16 ngi ioh 1000 klur, ngi la shah pynhiar jong u 2017-18 haduh 500 klur bad mynta ngi la duh 15 spah klur, kane ka dei ka jingleh ka sorkar jylla, nga kynnoh beit ia ka sorkar jylla, hato kam dei ba leh ma ka”, u la ong.
title: Mynta ka taiew yn kiew kashari, ka KHADC na ka MUDA

content: Shillong, 28 Jymmang:KA State Co-ordination Committee of Coal Owners, Miners & Dealers Forum (SCCCOMDF) lyngba ki stad ain jong ka Seng, ka la dep buh ia ka dorkhas ha ka 25tarik mynta u bnai, ha Supreme Court, na ka bynta ban kyrpad pynjlan por shuh sa kumba 6 bnai ban ioh kit bad leit die ia U dewiong bala dep sei. Ka iing bishar badonburom jong ka Supreme Court ha ka 21tarik mynta u bnai, ka la dep ai por ban shah kit ia U mar dewiong bala dep sei haduh ka 31tarik Jymmang 2017. Na ki tyllong khubor jong ki bor Sorkar la iathuh kumba ka long mynta dang don sa kumba 7/8 lak ton eiei u dewiong uba dang sah ban pynkit. Ka jingbym lah jong ki nongkhaii dewiong ban pyndep kumba la bthah ka long na kiba bun ki daw ki bym lah kiar, kumta ka Forum kam banse ban thaw lad leit kyrpad biang ia ka iing bishar ka Supreme Court ban ai lad biang sa kumba 6 bnai eiei.Hadien bala dep pdiang ia ka dorkhas jong ka Forum da ka iing bishar Supreme Court ha ka 25tarik mynta u bnai, la khmih lynti ba yn sa shong bishar ha U bnai Naitung (July) 2017.
title: 7lak ton u dewiong, uba dang  sah, pan por ban kit sa 6bnai

content: Shillong, 28 Jymmang:U MDC ka BJP u Bah Niel Antonio War, u la ong ba u la long uba la pynkhreh ban iakhun ia ka elekshon MLA pyrshah ia ka myntri sorkar ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh na East Shillong.Haba kylli hato ka jingmih ka khubor hamsaia ba ka Kong Ampareen kan iasoh bad ka BJP, u Bah Antonio u la ong, “Ym dei tang ka Kong Ampareen hynrei wat u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma ruh la don ka hamsaia ba un iasoh BJP”.U la bteng biang da kaba ong, “Hato ngi kwah ban wan ka jingkylla da kijuh ki briew na ka Congress. Ki paidbah ki kwah ban don ka jingkylla ym da kine kijuh ki briew. Nga la pynkhreh bad ai ba ka party kan rai”.U la ong ba ma u, kum u nongialam ka party na East Shillong u la pynkhreh ia ka elekshon 2018 namar ba ka dei na ka jingkwah u paidbah ban don ka jingkylla.“Ngi la iohi kin bun ki nongialam na ka seng Congress kin mih noh namar ba ka jingangnud ki paidbah ka dei ban don ka jingkylla”, u la ong.Halor ka jingkylli hato kan don ne em ka jingktah na ka jingrung sha ka BJP, u Bah Antonio u la ong, “Ngi wan na ka konstitwensi kaba khampher kaba iakhlehlang lang bun ki jaitbynriew. Ha kato ka por ba mih na ka Congress, ngam sngew nang ban leit shano shano, ngam iahap bad ha ka jingrai rangbah jong nga, la iohi ba ka jingleh jong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi khamtam ba ka sorkar pdeng ka thmu na ka bynta kane ka thain shatei lammihngi”.U la ong ba naduh mynshwa u dei ba la im la heh ha ka sain pyrthei ha ka seng Congress, hynrei ka daw kaba pynlong ia u ban mih noh ka dei namar ba kane ka sorkar jylla ba ialam u Dr Mukul Sangma kam kwah ban peit ia ka mat kiba ktah ia ka jaitbynriew hynrei ka thombor pynban kumba la jia ia ka KHADC.“Nga don ha ka Congress hynrei haba iakren ia ki mat jong ka jaitbynriew, ka sorkar jylla ka la pyrshang ban tyllep ia ki haba ngi don ha ka PDF jong u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem, ki khein ia ngi kum ki niut. Ki san ngut ma nga, Bah Banteidor Lyngdoh, Albinus Lyngdoh, Bah Hadrian Lyngdoh bad Victor Rani ngi la mih noh namar ba ka party ka kwah ban shu pynkbum ia ka mat party khlem sngap ia ka mat jong ka jaitbynriew”, u la ong.“Ka party kam lah ban sngap ia ngi, ka thombor pynban ia ngi”, u la ong.
title: Ym tang ka Kong Ampareen, sawa  ia U Mukul ruh ban iasoh BJP:Antonio

content: Shillong, 17 Jymmang:Ka eriong kaba jur bha (cyclone) ka la pyndkut bad pynjot noh ia u tnum mobile ha Maweit, ha ka miet jong ka 15tarik Jymmang 2017. Ka jingdkut bad ka jingjot noh une u tnum mobile, ha kaba la pyndait lang bad ka airtel network ha u juh une u tnum, ka la pynsah ha ka jinglyngngoh bad ka jingjynjar ia ka thain hi baroh kawei, ong ka ka kyrwoh sngewdiaw na u General Secretary ka HYC Maweit circle u samla Jeremiia Dkhar.
title: Khyrwait ka eriong ia  u tnum mobile ha Maweit

content: Shillong, 17 Jymmang:U MDC ka UDP na Umsning Constitwency, u Bah Donkupar Sumer u la lah ban iakhun elekshon MLA na ka party thymmai ka People Democratic Front (PDF).U Bah Donkupar u dei u EM ka Khasi Hills Autonamoust District Council (KHADC) hapoh ka jinglong CEM u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem bad u dei uwei na ki MDC ka UDP u bym weng na ka jingkyrshan ia ka PDF watla ka party ka la rai ban weng noh.U Bah Donkupar u dei u MDC ba nyngkong eh jong ka Umsning Constitwency bad ula jop ha ka elekhon MDC 2013 na ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP) kumta lada u Donkupar un mih noh na ka UDP bad iakhun na ka PDF kan long ka jingtynjuh ba kham eh namar ka UDP ka la don lypa ki briew katba ka PDF ka dei ka seng sain pynthei ba thymmai bad kan kham shitom ha ki jingiakhun.Ka PDF kaba long ka liang synshar ha KHADC hapoh ka jingialam jong u Bah Pynshangain N Syiem (MLA/MDC Mawsynram) kum u Chief Executive Member la dep ban pynbna ha ki bnai ba la dep kum ka seng sain pyrthei ba thymmai ha ka jylla bad ka la lah ban pynkhih win ia baroh ki MDC jong ka KHADC ban aireng pyrshah ia ki MLA ha ka elehshon 2018, watla ki don ki MLA kiba pynjop ia ki ha ka elekshon MDC ruh hynrei kim salia bad ka daw tynrai jong katei ka dei na ka skim special Central Assistant na ka sorkar kmie haba uwei u MDC un ioh kumba T.3 klur .Kawei pat ka tyllong khubor ba la ioh lum ka iathuh u Bah PN Syiem MLA/MDC jong ka Mawsynram constitwency shen um shimti kum u President ka PDF ban ialam ia ka kynhun hadien ynda u la iehnoh ia ka kam MLA.
title: Lah ban iakhun MLA u  Bah Don Sumer na ka PDF

content: Shillong, 17 Jymmang:Ka jingshong bishar ka KHADC halor ki jingujor pyrshah ia u Syiem Sohra u Pa’iem Freeman Sing Syiem ka dei ban long lashai ka sngi ka 18 tarik u jymmang, hynrei na ka daw ka jingpan por jong u Syiem Sohra ka la pulom noh. U EM ka tnad Elaka u bah Latiplang Khar-kongor u la ong ba u Syiem Sohra u la pan por bad la ai por ia u shi taiew kaba mut hapoh ka 25 tarik mynta u bnai.Lah ban pynkyn-maw ba ki jingujor pyrshah ia u Syiem Sohra ki la wan na kiba bun ki liang -na ki nongsynshar shnong ha kaba la kynnoh ba u Syiem u la pynkhein ia ka riti dustur bad la ujor ruh da ka KSU South Khasi Hills halor ki jingjia kiba la jia ha Majai kaba la kynnoh ba u Syiem u la ai pata khyndew haduh kumba 450 tylli eiei sha ki bar jylla bad la kynnoh ba ia ujuh u briew u la ai pata haduh kumba 10 tylli eiei bad kiwei pat ki jingujor.Lah ban pynkynmaw ba kham mynshuwa haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor u EM ka Elaka uba dang shu shimti shen ia katei ka tnad u bah Latiplang Kharkongor u la ong ba un bishar bniah bin pa bin ia baroh ki jingujor bad lada jia ba lap ba ka don ka jingleh thur mur jong u Syiem ka KHADC kan leh ia kaba donkam kaba lah ruh ban poi sha u pud ba yn sospon noh shuwa ia u.
title: Pan por u Syiem Sohra na ka KHADC

content: Shillong, 17 Jymmang:Ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) jong ka Federation of Khasi Jaintia and Garo People (FKJGP) kaba long mynta ka sngi ka la shim ia ka rai ban pyntyllun shakhmat ia ka thong sha ka ioh ka kot bad ka imlang sahlang (Socio-Economic Movement). Ka FKJGP ka la pynrem ruh ia ka sorkar namar ka jingbym lerkam ha ki kam pynroi ha baroh ki liang khamtam ha ka Aquaculture Mission, Horticulture Mission, Livestock Mission bad kiwei kiwei.Kate ka seng ka la ong ba ka sorkar ka la pynsyrwa kai ia ka pisa u paidbah bad mynta ba la jan ka elekshon ka la sdang ban bret kulmar ia ki skhim kiba long kumba rep kba ha ri shyiap. Ka kyrwoh khubor ka la ong ba kan peitngor bha ha baroh ki kam pynroi ha ka jylla khnang ban lah ban pyntyllun ia katei ka thong jong ka. Ha ka 25 tarik katei ka seng ka la ong ba kan hiar sha Phlangdilon ban ia kynduh ia ki nongrep. Ka la pynrem jur namar ka jingbym lah ka sorkar ban teh lakam ia ka jingkhaii masi tuh sha Bangladesh.
