Kawei pat ka mat ba kate ka seng ka la rai ka long ba baroh ki Unit, ki Circle ki District ki dei ban peitngor bha halor ka jing pynrung kyrteng ka sorkar ia ki bar jylla ha electoral roll khnang ba u bar jylla u bym dei hok yn ym dei ban rung kyrteng da lei lei ruh ha electoral roll jong ka jylla tang na ka bynta ka jingioh jingmyntoi jong katto katne ngut ki politishian.Katei ka seng ka la thung ia u bah Elton Cliff Warjri kum u Assistant General Secretary, ka la thaw saw tylli ki Sector – ka Agriculture Sector – ba ialam da u bah Kynsai War bad lai ngut ki dkhot, Tuesday Lytep, Bishar Dhar bad Ferdinal Iawphniaw. Ka Skill Development Sector ba ialam da u Kitboklang Nongphlang, ki dkhot, Elton Cliff Warjri, Kmenlang Tariang bad James Kharbani, ka Livestock Sector, ba ialam da u bah Marbud Dkhar, ki dkhot Constantine P Mawlong, Edar, Bep bad Lui Lyngdoh bad ka Tourism Sector – ba ialam da u Eldie Newron Lyngdoh ki dkhot Reginal Thabah, Energy S Cajee bad Ksanbor Kharshiing. Kane ka long katkum ka kyrwoh na u bah Eldie Newton Lyngdoh, Information Secretary.
title: Ki Skhim ka sorkar kumba  rep kba ha ri shyiap:FKJGP

content: Nongstoiñ, 17 Jymmang:Ka kong F. Marngar kaba dei ka Secretary jong ka seng kynthei HSPDP, kaba la shah sospon ruh na ka jinglong dkhot ka jong ka hapoh jong ka party HSPDP, kala kyntait mardor ia ka jingdawa jong u MLA ka Nongstoin u bah D. Jyndiang ba ka dei ban pan map na u tei u MLA hapoh 48 kynta, halor ka jingpynmih khubor kaba la long pyrshah bad ktah mationg ia u MLA shimet kumba la pynpaw da ka EC HSPDP Nongstoiñ Area Unit kaba la shong kyrkieh ha ka janmiet jong ka sngi ba ar jong ka taiew.“Ngam shym la kren pyrshah ei ei ia ka party HSPDP, bad ngan nym pan map hi ruh na u MLA kumba u la dawa namar ngam shym lap bad iohi ia ki daw kiba biang ba ngan leit ban pan map na u tei u MLA, bad ngan ap ruh ia katei ka 48 kynta bad ia ka jingthmu jong u tei u MLA” ong ka kong F. Marngar ha ka jingiakynduh lang bad ki lad pathai khubor jong ka District mynta ka janmiet ha Nongstoiñ.Shuh shuh ka kong F. Marngar, ka la iathuh ruh ba ka la kren shisha ia kiei kiei kumba kala paw bad mih ha kawei na ki kot khubor Khasi ha ka sngi nyngkong jong ka taiew (Ym ha u Rupang) bad ka kong F. Marngar ka la ong ruh ba kitei ki jingkren ki jong ki long shisha kumta namar ba u tei u MLA um pat kot bor haba tang ia ka jingialang jong ki longkmie (Women’s wing) kaba dang shu dep shen, u la klumar khlieh haduh katne.“Ha ka jingshisha u MLA lada u sngew ba nga la bakla ban kren ha ka jingialang jong ka Women’s Wing kaba dang shu dep shen u la dei ban ong bad pyni ia nga hynrei u tei u MLA um shymla leh ia kata bad u la kynnoh pynbna ia nga ba nga la shu kam ba nga dei ka Secretary jong ka Women’s wing” ong biang ka kong Marngar.Haba pyrshang pat ban kylli ba ka sngew kumno halor ka jingong jong u MLA bala katei ka kong ka kyntait ban pan map hapoh 48 kynta un ai syndon ia ka da ka notis ki riewsaid ain bad ban rah ruh shaduh ka Privilege Committee jong ka Assembly, na ka liang jong ka kong Marngar kala jubab da kaba ka ong ba “Lada u sngewbit ban ialeh bad pyni da ka bor bad ka longkmie u mat leh”.Ha kaba iadei pat bad ka jingshah pynwai noh shipor jong ka Women’s Wing bad Youth Wing, na ka liang jong kitei ki nongialam ka Women’s wing ki la ong ba ha ka jingshisha katkum ki matti treikam jong ka party HSPDP naduh kipor kiba mynshwa yn nym lah ban shim ia kano kano ka rai tang da ka EC hynrei hap ban lum bad pynlong da ka jingialang paidbah (General Meeting).Katba na ka liang jong u bah Marcus Marwein, u ba la shah sospon na ka jinglong dkhot jong u hapoh jong ka Party da katei ka EC kaba la dep shong kyrkieh haba iakren bad ki lad pathai khubor u la ong ba ka thong ka jong ki ban sospon noh ia u bad ia I kong F. Marngar haduh 3 snem kynthih bad kumjuh ruh ban pynwai noh ia ka Women’s bad Youth wing ka long ba kila khein lypa ban kin nym shah pynwit shuh ha kaba iadei bad ki tiket na ka bynta ki ar tylli ki Election kata ka MLA bad MDC.Haba pyrshang ban kylli pat na kitei kiba la shah sospon hato kin dang don ne em hapoh jong ka Party bad haba jubab ia katei ka jingkylli u bah Marcus Marwein, u la ong ba kam don jingmut shuh mynta ban dang iakren party bad u la ong ruh ba halor ka jingshah sospon ka jong u haduh mynta um shym pat la ioh kano kano ka kynja shithi shah suspon bad katei ka jingsospon ruh ka long ka bym don nongrim.“Lada ka party HSPDP hapoh Nongstoiñ Konstitwensi kan iai long ha kane ka dur kam I don ruh ia ka jingkyrmen ha kane ka election MLA ka ban sa long shen” pynkut u bah Marwein.
title: “Lada U MLA, u kwah ia pyni  bor bad ka longkmie u mat leh”

content: Shillong, 17 Jymmang:Ka don ka ktien, kaba ong “Long mraw ha Ri lajong” hynrei ha kane ka jingjia, kaba mynta, ka wan da kumwei pat bad kata ka long “Ym don iing sah ha Ri lajong” bad katei ka dei ia ki 3ngut ki rangbah, kiba na Khliehriat, kiba wan Shillong, hynnin ka sngi, kiba hap thiah ha surok bad ka daw, ka long namar ba ki hotel, kim ai jaka sah satia ia ki.U Ma Starling Rupsi (Dkhar), ha ka jingiakren da ka mobile bad U Rupang, u iathuh ba ki ia don 3ngut para shynrang bad ki la ia wad jaka sah, naduh 9baje haduh 12baje mynmiet, hynrei kim shym ioh satia, ha ki bynta jong ka Khyndailad.La iathuh da U Bah Starling, ba ki leit shwa ha Ashutosh Inn bad ki la pyn ithuh ialade, ba ki dei na Khliehriat, Jaintia Hills bad mar kumta, ki la pan ia ki kot jingmynjur na ki pulit; hynrei namar ba kim don ia ki kot na ki pulit, ki la shah kyntait ban sah ha katei ka Hotel. La iathuh da U Ma Starling, ba ki la iaid bad leit wad sha 8,9 tylli ki hotel, sawdong jong ka Khyndailad, ba kynthup ia ka Greenland, ka hotel ha MTC bad kumta ter ter, hynrei kitei lei kim kwah shuh tang ban iakren ruh bad ki ai daw, ba ki kamra jongki, ki la dap lut smam.U Ma Starling, u kren diaw mynsiem, da kaba ong, ba ki briew kiba nabar, ki ioh sahmiet sadhai ha ki jaka sah ha Shillong bad u ong “Mangi pat ki trai shnong, ngim ioh” bad u iathuh ba ki Hotel ki pyrkhing bha ban ai sah ia ki trai shnong, khlem da ioh jingmynjur na ki pulit.Ha ka kutlad, U Ma Starling, uba dei na ka seng IBSWO, lem bad ki arngut ki paralok U Ma Andrew Nicos Suchiang bad U Ma Shabida Mynthlu, ki la leit kiew noh sha Laitkor bad thiah ha Petrol Pump hapoh ka kali jongki.
title: Thiah surok 3ngut ki rangbah,  bym ioh hotel ha 9lad

content: Shillong,17 Jymmang:Ha ka 16 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 6:30 baje janmiet 2 ngut ki briew kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Specialborn Nonglait bad u Ricky John Nonglait ki la shoh ia u Jeffry Dohling ha Mawkisyiem, Sohra, u la mynsaw jur bad la pynkit ia u sha Civil Hospital, Shillong.
title: Poi Civil ba shah shoh ha Sohra

content: Shillong, 17 Jymmang:Ka nongialam ka BJP Mahila Mandal ka Dya Rathore ka la kyntait ia ka jingkynnoh ba ka sorkar BJP kan khang ia ka jingbam bam doh masi bad ka jingthombor ia ki kynhun rit paid.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, ka Rathore ka la ong ba, “Ka BJP ka kwah ban iada ia ki rit paid bad kumjuh kan nym kwah ban tuklar ia ka mon laitluid jong ki briew ban bam doh”. Hajuh ka por, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew khia halor ka jingjur ki kam thombor ia ki kynthei khynnah ha kane ka jylla.Ka la ong ba ka President ka BJP Mahila Mandal ka ri ka Vijaya Rahatkar lem bad ka secretary ka Pooja Kapil Misra kin wan jngoh ia ka sor Shillong ha aka 22 tarik mynta u bnai Jymmang ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon ha kane ka jylla nalor kiwei ki mat ban iakren kiba iadei bad ka jingeh jong ki kynthei.Ka la ong ba ha kane ka jingwan jongki,kin iakynduh ia ki nongialam ka BJP Mahila ha kane ka jylla bad kin iapylliew jingmut ha kiba bun ki mat.Ha kawei ka liang, ka President ka BJP Mahila Meghalaya Mandal, ka Kong Pelcy Snaitang ka la iathuh ba haduh mynta ki la don haduh 20 hajar ngut ki longkmie ba la rung dkhot bad ka BJP ha kane ka jylla, wat la kam pat lah ban thaw lut ia ka mandal ha baroh ki konstitwensi. “Ngi la don kumba 20 hajar ngut ki dkhot longkmie ha ki 30 tylli ki mandal ha ka jylla bad ka dang sah sa 30 tylli ki mandal ban thaw ha ka jyllla baroh kawei”, la ong ka Kong Snaitang.Ia kine ki mandal ba dang sah yn sa pyndep ban thaw hapoh kine ki lai bnai ban wan shwa khnang ban pynkhlain shwa ban wan ka elekshon, ka la bynrap.
title: Ka BJP kan iada ia ki rit paid,  kam khang doh masi: Rathore

content: Shillong, 17 Jymmang:Ka elekshon 2018 kan dei ka elekshon kaba kin mih bun ngut ki kyrtong na Sohra konstitwensi, iathuh ki lad khubor. Haduh mynta la ong ba ki la don haduh 6 ngut ki kyrtong kiba la iaid shakhmat bad kitei ki long u MLA ba mynta u bah Titos W Chyne na ka UDP, u bah Donevan Kharwanlang MDC ba mynta ka Congress (uba la ap ban ia khun na ka Congress lada ioh tiket), u MLA barim ka Sohra u Dr.P.W Khongjee, u bah Gavin Mylliemngap, u bah Droi Khongsti uba lah ban ia khun na ka seng HSPDP bad u bah Bantei Rumnong u President ka Seng Khasi uba lah ban ia khun na ka seng BJP. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba nalor kitei ki 6 ngut kin dang don shuh shuh kiwei pat ki kyrtong shimet ki ban ia khun ha u 2018 hynrei kitei kim pat mih pyrthei mynta bad don napdeng jong ki kiba la ia khun teng ha ki elekshon ba la dep.Haba twad jingmut na ki pyrman saiñpyrthei ha Sohra ia ka Politik kumba ka long mynta la sngewthuh ba ka jingiakhun ha u 2018 kan long kaba jwat bha ia u MLA ba mynta ka Sohra. La iathuh ba kawei na ki ktem kaba utei u MLA mynta u khlain bha ka dei na Laitlyngkot hynrei nangtei la mih haduh 2 ngut ki kyrtong u bah Gavin bad u bah Droi. Shuh shuh la ong ba kawei pat ka ktem jong u MLA ba mynta u bah Titos ka dei na Khlieh Shnong , Sohra hynrei nangtei ruh la iathuh ba ka jingmih u bah Bantei Rumnong kan ktah bha ia u MLA katei ka konstitwensi.Na Shella konstitwensi pat haduh mynta ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ki dang don dang 4 ngut ki kyrtong bad kitei ki kynthup ia u Dr.Donkupar Roy u MLA ba mynta na ka UDP, u bah Leston Wanswett, u bah Jropsing Nongkhlaw bad u bah Wellborn Bynnud. Hynrei la ong ba nalor kitei ruh kin dang don shuh sa kiwei de ki kyrtong ki ban mih bad la ong ba lada jia ba u bah Leston um treh ia khun na ka seng Congress -katei ka seng ruh kan sei kyrtong bad ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba u bah Pyndap Saibon ka KHNAM ruh u dang peit ia ka politik ha Shella bad lada jia ba mih ki jingkylla la iathuh ba u lah ban hiar biang.
title: Yn kham bun ki kyrtong 2018 na  Sohra, 6 ngut kiba la paw kyrteng

content: Shillong, 17 Jymmang:U President ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee (MPCC), u Bah DD Lapang u la kubur ba ka party ka la ioh pdiang ia ka jingujor ka Jowai Block Congress pyrshah ia u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar halor ka jingkynnoh ba u la thmu ban pynieng kyrtong ha ka jaka jong u MLA ba mynta na Jowai, u Dr. Roytre Christopher Laloo.U Bah Lapang u la ong ia kane hadien ba la wai ka jingialang ha ophis ka party mynta ka sngi. “Nga la ioh pdiang ia ka jingujor halor kane, hynrei ngam pat ioh peit ia ka”, la ong u Bah Lapang. U la ong ba ka party kam pat shong ban pyrkhat la ka long kaba shisha ne em. Katkum ka jingong u Bah Lapang, ka party kan iaid katkum ki kyndon treikam haba ka shim ia kano kano ka rai. “Ngim pat iakren iapyrkhat ia ka jingdawa ban pynhiar shuki ia u Bah Sniawbhalang”, la bynrap shuh u Bah Lapang.Halor ka jingkylli kaei ka jingsngew jongu ia ka jingkren duh mynsiem ki paidbah ia ka Congress ha kane ka jylla, u Bah Lapang u la ong ba ka Congress ka long kum u dieng ba jrong tam bad dei na kata ka daw, ba ki briew baroh ki kwah ban kawang ia ka. “Ka Congress ka dei ka party kaba long kum u dieng ba jrong tam bad dei na kata ka daw, ba ki ia kawang ia ka hynrei kaba kut yn sa iohi ia ka dur ba shisha”, u la ong.U la iathuh ba ha ka jingialang mynta ka sngi, ka long ban pan kaiphod na ki district bapher bapher ia ka jingiaid ki kam ki jam. Haduh mynta, u la iathuh, la ioh jingkhein ba baroh kiba rung dkhot ha ka party ha ka jylla ka la poi sha ka 2 lak ngut tam kynthup kiba rim bad kiba thymmai bad ka jingpynrung dkhot kan dang iaid shaid shaid.U la ong ba ka party ka la rai ban kham pynkloi ban pynlait ia ki kyrtong ha kane ka elekshon da kaba bthah ia baroh ki district ki unit ban pyndep ia kane ka kam khnang ban lah ban trei kham bha ia ka elekshon.
title: Ngam pat ioh peit ia ka shithi  ujor ia U Ma Sniaw:DD Lapang

content: Shillong, 18 Jymmang:U MLA ka Umsning u Dr Celestine Lyngdoh um pat kubur ba ka Ri-Bhoi ka donkam ban phiah ne thaw sa kawei ka district ia mynta.Haba jubab halor ka jingkylli halor kane mynta ka sngi, u Dr Celestine u la ong, “Ngam pat sngew ba ka Ri-Bhoi ka donkam ban phiah ne thaw district shuh ia mynta hynrei ngi donkam ban pynkiew kyrdan ia ki administrative unit kum ka Patharkhmah sha ka Civil Sub-Division”.U la iathuh ba na ka liang jongu bad ki briew ka thain, ki la pynsngew ia ka jingdonkam ban pynkiew kyrdan noh ia ka Patharkhmah sha ka Civil SUb-Division hynrei u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba yn sa leh ha ka por ban wan.“Ha ka jingshisha, ngi la dep pynsngew ia kane sha ka sorkar hynrei na ka liang u myntri rangbah u la ong ba un sa peit ha ka por ban wan”, la ong u Dr Celestine.Ha kawei ka liang, u MLA ka Umsning u la ong ba ka ri-Bhoi mynta ka la kiew sted bha naduh ba la ioh ia ka district ha kaba hapoh kine ki kyndiat snem, kam ju don shuh ka jingiap pang khieshohrih, ka jingpang at ryngdang ha Ri-Bhoi.“Wat ha ka liang ka pule puthi ruh ka la kiew sted bha ha kaba ka dei kawei na ki district ba kham shakhmat ban ia kiwei ha kine ki snem”, u la ong.Haba pynpaw ia ka jingsngew sarong ia ka Ri-Bhoi, u Dr Cesletine u la ong ba ka Ri-Bhoi ka la pynmih ruh ia u Myntri Rangbah u Bah DD Lapang, ki ophisar, ki doktor bad bun kiwei pat. “Ka ktien Bhoi biej, mynta ka la jah namar ba ngi la stad la kiew bha”, la ong u Dr Celestine.Ia ka Ri-Bhoi district la plie ha ka 4 tarik Jylliew 1992 na ka Nongpoh Civil Sub-Division da kaba pyniakhlad noh na ka East Khasi Hills District. Ka don san tylli ki MLA konstitwensi kynthup ka Umroi, Umsning, Nongpoh, Mawhati bad Jirang.Kumba 30-40 lak yn pynlut ha jingrakhe 25 snem ka Ri-Bhoi districtKa Organising Committee ka Ri-Bhoi District Silver Jubilee Celebration kan rakhe ia ka jingdap 25 snem ka jingioh ia ka district ha u bnai Jylliew ban wan.Ia ka Ri-Bhoi district la plie ha ka 4 tarik Jylliew 1992 na ka Nongpoh Civil Sub-Division da kaba pyniakhlad noh na ka East Khasi Hills District.Ban rakhe ia ka jubili rupa, ka Organising Committee kan pynlong ia ka jingrakhe san sngi naduh ka 5 haduh 9 tarik Jylliew ha madan NSCA Stadium, Pahamsyiem Nongpoh.Katkum ka jingong u Dr Celestine Lyngdoh, ka jinglut na ka bynta kane ka jingrakhe kan ym duna ia ka 30-40 lak tyngka. “Ngi la antad ba ka jinglut kan ym duna ia ka 30-40 lak ha kane ka jingrakhe bad ngin pyrshang ban pynmih pisa na ki nongnoh synniang sngewbha bad na kiwei ki lad”, la ong u Dr Celestine.U chairman ka Organising Committee u Dr Celestine Lyngdoh uba dei u MLA ka Umsning u la ong ba ha kine ki sngi, yn sa pyni ia ki jinglong kyrpang jong ka riti dustur jong ka ri Bhoi naduh ka shad ka kmen, ka rwai ka siaw, ka bam ka dih, ka rukom bat khyndew jong ki Bhoi. Kin don ruh ki jingialehkai, ki jingiakop ha ka put ka tem, ha kaba ia ki nongjop yn ai khusnam pisa.Ha ka sngi plie kata ha ka 5 tarik yn plie da u Bah DD Lapang uba dei u MLA ka thain katba ha ka sngi kut, yn pynwai da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma.
title: Ia mynta, ka Ri-Bhoi kam pat donkam  ban phiah district:Dr Celestine

content: Shillong, 17 Jymmang:U Myntri sorkar jylla uba dei ruh u nongialam ka Congress, u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar mynta ka sngi u la kyntait ba u la don bynta ban pynieng kyrtong na Jowai pyrshah ia u MLA ba mynta u Dr Roytre Christopher Laloo.Ha ka jingiakren bad ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi ha Shillong, u bah Sniawbhalang u la ong ba kumno ka Block Congress Jowai, kan shu kynnoh ia u, haba tang ia u kandidet jong ka party ruh ym pat pynbna.“Ia u (Bah Wailad Shylla), uba dei u kynum jong nga, la jied da ka shnong Mukhla, ngam dei uba phah ban iakhun elekshon”, la ong u Bah Sniawbhalang bad bynrap, “ka dei ka hok jong uno uno u briew ban pan tiket hynrei kan shong ha ka party ban rai”.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Sniawbhalang, lada u pynieng kandidet hadien ba ka party ka la pynbna ia u kyrtong, lah ban ong ba u la ialeh pyrshah ia ka party. Mynta mano mano ki lah ban pan tiket na ka party bad ka shong ha ka party ba kan rai iano ban ai tiket.“Peit kum ha Umroi konstitwensi ha ka elekshon MLA ba la dep, ia u MLA u Bah Stanlywis Rymbai ruh ka party ka la pynduh tiket namar ba ka kwah ia u briew ban jop beit ha ka elekshon”, la bynrap u Bah Sniawbhalang.Kane ka jingpynshai u Bah Sniawbahlang ka long hadien ba ka Jowai Block Congress Committee ka la kynnoh ba u la pyrshang ban ialap ha ki paidbah ban ai tiket noh ha u Bah Wailad Shylla uba dei u kynum jong u, bad ban pynduh tiket noh ia u Dr RC Laloo.Ka Jowai Block Congress ka la ujor sha ka MPCC pyrshah ia u Bah Sniawbhalang, da kaba dawa ruh na ka Meghalaya Pradesh Congress Committee ba kan pynshitom ia u bad ban pynhap shuki noh kum u Myntri.U Bah Sniawbhalang u la ong ba u Bah Wailad Shylla u dei u nongtrei party la 8-9 snem uba shitrhem bha bad un sa pan tiket na ka party ha kane ka kynti ban iakhun na Jowai tangba ia kane, yn shong ha ka rai jong ka party. U Bah Sniawbhalang u la shah kynnoh ha ka Jowai Congress ba u la leit ban ialap elekshon sha kylleng ki jaka ban kyrshan ia u Bah Wailad da kaba pyrshah ia u Dr RC Laloo.Ha kawei ka liang u Bah Sniawbhalang u la kyntait ia ka jingmih khubor ba un mih noh na ka seng Congress ban leit sha kiwei pat ki party kum ka NPP. U la pynthikna da kaba ong, “Ha kane ka elekshon ban wan, un iakhun beit na ka party Congress bad ka jingkynnoh ba un mih noh ka dei tang ka khubor lamler”.Hynrei ha kajuh ka por, u la ong ba, u burom ia baroh ki party, hynrei ban leit pyniasoh sha kawei ka pat ka party kam jingmut namar ba u la rai ban iakhun beit na ka Congress.
title: Kyntait ba pynieng kyrtong  pyrshah ia u Dr RC Laloo

content: Shillong, 18 Jymmang:Ka National Green Tribunal (NGT), Kolkata, ka la shim bishar mynta ka sngi, ha kaba dei bad ka jingai jingiada bad pynkhuid ia ka wah Myntdu bad ka sorkar Jylla, ka pynpoi ia ki kot ki sla jongka, tang kumba shiphew minit ha shwa ba kan sdang ka jingbishar bad u nongiasaid na ka liang jong U Ma Sajay Laloo, U Amit Kumar, ula kynnoh ba ka sorkar Jylla, kam shym leh eiei bad kam shym burom ruh ia ka rai jong ka NGT, ha kaba ula ong ba haduh mynta kam shym don satia kano kano ka jing pynkhuid ia ki bynta ba don sawdong jong ka Wah Myntdu bad katei ka kynthup ia ka jingtei iing sem, ka jingkurup jaka, ka jingtih shyiap, ka jingsait jain bad kiwei kiba iaid beain ha katei ka WahNa ka liang U Todi, Advocate General ka Meghalaya, ula pyni ia ki jingpynkhreh jong ka sorkar Jylla, hynrei, la ong da U bah Laloo, ba kam don satia ka jingshisha, kaba pyni ha madan.Ka jingshong bishar kan long biang ha ka 26tarik Naitung 2017 bad ka NGT, ka la bthah ia ka sorkar Jylla, ba kan pyni da ki jingshisha kiba shai bha, halor ki kam ki duk jongka.
title: Ym shym pat pynkhuid ka  sorkar ia ka Wah Myntdu

content: Shillong,14 Jymmang:Kumba ju long manla u snem ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew ka Lait Shuthim ka la pynlong ia ka Shad Suk Mynsiem, ha katei ka shad ki la don bun ngut ki nongshad naduh ki khynnah haduh rangbah kynthei bad shynrang kiba la wan ban ia shim bynta na ki shnong bapher bapher najan bad najngai. Katei ka Shad ka la iaid beit iaid ryntih khlem don kano kano ka jingpynthud na ki bor mariang, wat la la iohi ba ka don ka jinghap ha kylleng ki jaka.
title: Shad suk mynsiem ka Shuthim

content: Shillong, 14 Jymmang:U myntri ka sorkar jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba haba ka kynhun tem na Pynter (Pynursla) ka la leit sha Delhi ban tem sur tynrai ha kawei na ki jingialang, uwei na ki myntri sorkar pdeng uba donlang ha katei ka jingialang u la sngewbang palat ia katei ka sur tem tynrai jong ki bad u la ong ba dei ban hikai lem ia ki briew jong ka nongbah Delhi ruh ba kin tem kumtei. U bah Prestone u la kren kum u kongsan ha ka Convocation kaba 7 jong ka Assembly Board of Music Institute kaba la long ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew ha Dinam Hall, Shillong.Ha katei ka jingialang la sam ia ki syrnod sha ki 241 ngut ki samla kiba la pyndep ia ka jingshah hikai ha ka rukom tem tynrai na ka Assembly Music Institute jong ka jingïaseng Samla ka KJP Assembly kaba don ha Mission Compound, Shillong.Kitei ki samla ki dei kiba la shah hikai ban tem duitara, tem ksing, piano, guitar bad tonic solfa. Shuh shuh haba kren kum u kongsan u bah Prestone u la kyntu ia ka Asembly ba kan thaw ki lad ki lynti ban plie lad ïa kiwei de ki jaidbynriew ban wan shah hikai ha kane ka jaka hikai khnang ba ka jingrwai bad tem sur tynrai u Khasi kan nang saphriang bad nangiar ha kylleng ki jaka jong ka pyrthei.Ha katei ka jingialang ba la pyniaid da u Chairman ka Assembly Board of Music Institute u Bah MAH Syih la donlang u T.Bn EW Kharsohnoh, Director ka Institute, u Rev SR Dkhar, Chairman ka Jingiaseng samla KJPA, u Rev. SS Majaw, Moderator ka KJPA bad kiwei.
title: “Ba bang sur ki nong Pynter,  kwah shah hikai ki nong Delhi”

content: Shillong, 14 Jymmang:Ka jingjia ia pyniap ba sngew shyrkhei ka la jia mynta ka sngi ha ka shnong Okkapara Songgitcham kaba don ha South West Garo Hills District, ka shnong kaba hap hapoh Garobadha Police Outpost. Ha katei ka jingjia la ong ba ki don ar ngut shi ba ha ing kiba la ia shun thlong mluh thlong sying kata hapdeng u Kilman Ch Marak bad u Ranjan M Marak.Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ka la don ka jingiania hapdeng kitei ki 2 ngut bad tang kumba shiphang ar phang u Kilman u la wanrah da ka suloi shiktang (SBBL) bad u la siat ia u Ranjan hynrei u kuli um shym la dei ia u Ranjan bad tang mar kumta hi sa u Ranjan u la sei da ka wait tyngkrong u la tur sha u Kilman bad u la mait na ryndang bad na met jong u. U Kilman u la iap hashen. Ki pulit ka Garobadha tang mar ia tip ia katei ka jingjia ki la leit sha katei ka shnong, ki la kem ia u Ranjan bad ki la kurup ia ka wait kaba u pyndonkam,katba ia ka metiap u la pynkit sha Civil Hospital, Tura ban leh ia ka post mortem. ( SP News).
title: Mait uba shah siat,  ia u nongsiat suloi

content: Nongstoiñ, 14 Jymmang:Ki pulit ka Nong-stoiñ, ha ka sngi Saitjain, ki la kem noh ia u wei u briew u bala don kti ban leh kynshlein bad jrong kti ia ki saw ngut ki khynnah kynthei kiba dang hapoh 13 snem, da kaba u la shim kabu tang namar ba u sah marjan bad kitei ki khynnah.Katkum ka khubor na u Superintendent of Police ka West Khasi Hills u bah G.D Khar-wanlang la ong ba ia utei u briew la tip kyrteng kum u Albin Nongrum 45 snem, uba shong ba shah hapoh ka dong Spengthawlangmlah kaba hap hapoh ka shnong New Nongstoin West Khasi Hills.Shuh shuh u bah Kharwanlang u la iathuh ruh ba u tei u briew u dei ruh u Nonghikai jong ka skul Rympei Bashai kaba dei kawei na ki skul jong ki briew kiba don ha ki jingduna ha ki dkhot met kaba don ha kawei na ki jaka ha ka shnong Mawiong Pyndengrei West Khasi Hills District, bad katei ka jingjia kala jia ha u bmai ba la lah ha katei ka jaka sah ka jong u hi.Hadien ba ki ba haiing ki la ioh ia ka jingtip halor katei ka jingshah leh kynshlein bad shah jrong kti jong kitei kitei ki heprit ha u tei u briew, na ka liang jong kiba ha iing ha sem ha ka sngi saitjain jong ka taiew ba la lah ki la leit ban ujor sha ki pulit ka Nongstoin ha kaba ki pulit ruh ha ka jan miet jong katei ka sngi ki la kem noh ia u tei u briew.Halor katei ka jingjia na ka liang jong ki pulit ka Nongstoiñ ki la dep ruh ban register ia ka case pyrshah ia u bad na ka liang ki pulit ki la buh ruh lai sngi ha ka jingtohkit kaba bniah jong ki pulit.
title: Kem ki pulit Nongstoiñ, ba jrong  kti ia 4 ngut ki hep 13 snem

content: Shillong, 14 Jymmang:U President ka party BJP u Amit Shah un sa wan sha ka jylla Megghalaya ha u Nailar ban wan ban pynkhreh na ka bynta ka elekshon MLA ha kane ka jylla kaba bun paid da ki Khristan, katba u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi un sa wan ha u Naiwieng ban wan.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum, la iathuh ba ka jingwan jong u Amit Shah ka long kumno ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon ha kane ka jylla bad kawei pat ban pynthikna ba ka sorkar ha u 2018 kan nym dei shuh ka Congress ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya.La iathuh ba ka BJP na New Delhi ka la thaw lad kumno ban khwai ia ki nongmihkhmat na kiwei ki party ban iakhun na ka BJP, bad ka thong ka long beit uno uno uba don ka jingkyrmen ban rah ia ka jingjop, ka BJP kan sa pyndonkam beit ha ka elekshon tang na ka bynta ban pynjah kyrteng noh ia ka Congress.Ym tang katta ka jingwan u Amit Shah ka long ruh ban iakren bad ki seng sain pyrthei kiba don ha ka North East Democratic Alliance (NEDA) ban don ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut bad ki, lada ym dei shwa ka elekshon ruh hynrei hadien ka elekshon ban ia thaw sorkar.Hynrei ka khubor kaba lah ban pynkyndit ha kane ka jingwan jong u Amit Shah ka long ba kiba bun ki MLA na kiwei ki party ki lah ban pynbna syndon ban rung sha ka BJP.Ha kawei ka liang, la iathuh ba u Modi un wan ban kren ia ki kam pynroi ka sorkar NDA bad khamtam na ka bynta ka elekshon MLA ban wan ha ka jylla.Katkum ka jingtip, ka BJP na kane ka jylla ka la don ka jingiakren bad ki katto katne ngut ki MLA na kiwei ki party kiba kwah ban rung ban iakhun noh na kane ka seng hynrei kim pat kwah ban pynpaw pyrthei bad kin sa ap sa tang kumba katto katne bnai.
title: Elekshon 2018: U Amit ha u Nailar,  U Modi ha U Naiwieng ha Shillong

content: Shillong, 14 Jymmang:Ki paidbah jong ka thain Nongjri kila pynpaw ia ka jingsngewbitar ia ka jingleh jong ka BSNL ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingshna ia u tnum Mobile hapoh katei ka shnong namar ba kam shym la lah ban pyndep mynta la lai snem lynter.U Bah Nasar Marwein, u wei na ki rangbah shnong katei ka thain, u la ong ba ka long kaei kaei kaba sngewsih ban iohi ba ka BSNL ka la leit ban shna ia u tnum mobile ha kane ka shnong lai snem mynshuwa hynrei haduh mynta kam pat lah ban pyndep ia une u tnum.Ka thain Nongjri baroh kawei ka don kam ia u tnum mobile namar kumba ka long mynta ka net work mobile ha kane ka jaka ka wan na kiwei ki bynta kum ka thain Maweit bad ki thain Mawkyrwat bad ka net work kam biang ki don tang ki jaka jaka ba lah ban ioh net work.U Bah Marwein u la ong ba ka thain Nongjri, ka la don kam kyrkieh ban don ia u tnum mobile khang ba kan ioh bha ka net work, la ong ba bun sien ha ba don kano kano ka jingjia ban pyntip sha ki bor jong ka ain ruh ka shitom bha hap ban leit ia thuh sha Nonghyllam, hynrei lada ka biang ka net work ka long ba lah ban pyntip wa tang da ka phone.La ong ba na ka liang jong ki paidbah ki kwah ba ka BSNL ka dei ban pyndep noh ia u tower ba la sah teng mynta la lai snem la da ka BSNL kam lah ban pyndep kloi na ka liang ki paidbah ka tei ka thain ki hap ban ujor sha ki bor ba halor.
title: Bitar ka thain Nongjri, bym  trei dep ia u tnum BSNL

content: Shillong, 14 Jymmang:Ha ka sngi thohdieng jong ka taiew ka KSU ka la pynlong ia ka jingialang ha Nongjri (thaiñ Borsora) ban pyrshah halor ka jingshah rahbor jong u samla na ka shnong Bynther-Mairang u Dajied Kynsai Syiemlieh. Ha katei ka sngi baroh ki dukan kiba don ha katei ka thain ki la khang lut ban ia mih ryntih sha katei ka jingialang pynrem ia ki kam leh donbor ia ki Khasi kiba shong basah ha khappud.Haba kren ha katei ka jingialang u President jong ka KSU South West Khasi Hills u Forwardman Nongrem u la ther tyngeh ia ka sorkar namar ka jingbym lah ban pynbiang ia ki bor pahara ha katei ka thaiñ da kaba kynnoh ba dei namar ka jingbym lah iada ka sorkar ba sa mih ki riew shim kabu ban thombor ia ki Khasi kiba sah ha katei ka thaiñ kaba la ju bteng na kawei ka por sha kawei pat. Utei u samla u la ong ba lada jia ba ka sorkar ka sngewthuh ba kam lah ka la dei ban ai noh da ka laisen AK-47 ia ki samla ba kin iada ia ka thaiñ.“Ka sorkar kam lah satia ban ai ka jingiada, ai noh da ka laisen AK-47 ia ki samla ka thaiñ ba kin iada ialade bad ia ki paidbah” ong u samla Forward haba kren ha katei ka jingialang. “Ka jaitbynriew jong ngi kam dei kaba leit mushlia ia kiwei hynrei lada jia ba ka jingshah thombor kan dang bteng ngim banse ban thom ia ka sang” u la ong. Utei u nongialam ka KSU u la dawa na ki seng lehnoh ba ki dei ban pyllait noh shisyndon ia u samla Dajied khlem da pynmynsaw ne buh kyndon hynrei lada kim sngap u la ong ba ka KSU kan hap ban pyrkhat thymmai da kawei pat ka rukom ban iada ia ki para doh para snam lajong.U la ong ba katei ka jingiaiaid paidbah kan dei ka jingkyrsiew thiah ia ka jaitbynriew ban ia ieng tylli kawei bad u la ong ba lada jia ba ka jingiasngewpher jaitbynriew kan mih ha katei ka thaiñ ka sorkar ka dei ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh. Kiba bun ki nongkren ha katei ka jingialang ba kynthup ia u President ka Langkynma Circle u samla Ioanis Hashah, u samla Truely Lyngdoh General Secretary KSU SWKH, u Marconi Thongni Finance Secretary KSU SWKH ki la ban ha kajuh ka sur ba katei ka jingshah rahbor, shah thombor ki Khasi ha katei ka thaiñ kam dei ka jingjia kaba nyngkong hynrei ka la sdang naduh ki snem 1998 bad dang iai bteng haduh mynta, kitei ki nongkren ki la dawa ba ki runar ki dei ban pyllait noh ia u samla Dajied bad ki la byrngem ruh ba lada jia eiei ka sorkar ka dei ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh lada mih kiei kiei hadien habud.“Lada ka jaitbynriew ka donkam ban wanrah ia ka jingsngewpher jaitbynriew ngi kloi ban wanrah lada kum kine ki kam thombor ia ki paradoh para snam ki jong ngi ki dang iai bteng” ong u samla Thongni. Shuh shuh ki nongialam ka KSU ki la thalaiñ ruh ia ki pulit da kaba ong ba ki pulit kiba don ha Mawkyrwat ki lapmiet tang ka talasi kali katba ha ka thaiñ Nongjri -Borsora pat ym don pulit. Ha katei ka sngi ki nongkren ki kynthup ruh ia u bah C Nongbri, u bah A Wanniang , u bah JJ Hashah Rangbah Shnong Nonghlam u bah N Marwein u rangbah shnong ka shnong Umsur bad kumjuh ruh u bah A M Diengngan.
title: “Ai laisen AK-47 ia ki samla”;  byrngem pyni bor ka KSU

content: Nongstoiñ, 14 Jymmang:Ki seng kynthei jong ka HSPDP, ki la khie bitar jur ia U Bah Diostarness Jyndiang MLA jong ka Nongstoin, ba um shym la lum la lang ia ki, na ka bynta ban iakren ia ka tiket jong ka elekshon MLA 2018, hynrei, u la shu leit sop sop pat ialade ban thep kyrteng biang kum u kandidet jong ka Nongstoin, na bynta ka elekshon, ka ban sa wan.Katei ka shnat jong ki kynthei, hapoh ka jingialam jong ka kong S. Thongni President bad kong P.F. Marngar Secreatary, ki la ther tyngeh ia u bah Diostarness Jyndiang, MLA jong ka Nongstoiñ Konstitwensi, ba um shym la lum ia ka jingialang paidbah kaba kynthup lang ïa ki rangbah bad longkmie ia kaba u la dep ban kular naduh ka 28 tarik u Rymphang 2017.Ha ka jingialang paidbah (General Meeting), ba la pynlong da ka HSPDP Women’s Wing Nongstoiñ Area Unit, hynnin ka sngi kiba bun ki nongkren haba ai jingkren ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingbynñiaw ïa u President jong ka Nongstoiñ Area Unit, namar ka jingbym lah ka jong u ban lum ia ka jingialang paidbah na ka bynta ban khot application ia ki Kandidet kiba kwah ban iakhun ia ka Election ha u 2018.Katba katei ka jingialang ka la iaid la mar shiteng bad shwa ban poi noh artad sha kaba kut U MLA ka Nongstoiñ u ba dei ruh u President ka HSPDP Nongstoiñ Area Unit, u la wan poi ha katei ka jingialang bad na ka liang jong ki nongialam jong ka Women’s Wing ki la iohlad ruh ban ther markhmat ia u tei u MLA bad pan ruh ia ka jingpynshai halor ka jingbym lah jong u ban lum ia ka jingialang paidbah bad kumjuh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingleit aplai tiket sop sop ialade.Haba pynshai ia kitei ki jingkylli u bah Diostar Jyndiang u la ong ba naduh ka 28 tarik u bnai Rymphang hadien ba la don ki briew kiba la sdang ban pynthut ïa ka jingïalang jong ki dkhot jong ka party, te na ka liang jong ka seng, ka la ïa shong ban ïa pyrkhat bha bin pa bin ïa ka jinglong jingman ban lap ruh ïa ki briew kiba la pyrshang ban ïalam bakla bad ban pynthohbria ruh ïa ka seng baroh kawei, kaba la pynlong ruh ban pynsahteng ia ka jingthmu ban lum ia ka jingialang paidbah kumba ki kwah.Haba ïadei bad ka kam election u bah Jyndiang u la ong “Ka kam Election kadei ka kam jong ka Central body ha kaba ngi la don ia ka State Election Committee bad yn da ki la bthah ïa ngi ba ngin leh ïa kaba donkam hangta ngin sa leh ïa ki jingdonkam bad halor kane ka kam ka shong ruh ha ka bor jong ka jingpyniaid jong katei ka committee na ka liang ka jong nga kum u President ngam lah ban ai shibun ka pynshai”.Hadien katei ka jingialang u nongthoh khubor u la iohlad ruh ban iakren bad ka kong P.F. Marngar Secretary HSPDP Women’s Wing Nongstoiñ Area Unit, ha kaba ka la ong ruh ba ka la ioh jingtip ba u MLA u ba dei ruh u President jong ka Nongstoiñ Area Unit, u la dep ban phah applikeshon sha ka central boby na ka bynta ban pan tiket ia lade ban iakhun ia ka Election 2018.Bad ka la ong ruh ba katei ka jingleh jong u MLA khlem ka jingpyntip sha ki paidbah ka long kaba bakla shibun namar ha ka jingshisha lada u kwah ban ïakhun ia ka Election ruh u lah dei ban wan shwa ban pyntip ïa ngi ki paitbah bad ki paitbah kin sa ai ia ka rai la ki la ibit ne em ïa u ba un dang ïakhun biang, ym ba un shu leh sop sop.“Lada bakla ka jingai ïa ka tiket ha Nongstoiñ ngin khylliap lama noh ïa ka HSPDP ha Nongstoiñ hi baroh kawei bad lada ka HSPDP kan duhjait na Nongstoiñ ngam tharai ba kiwei pat kiba na kiwei ki Konstitwensi ba kin dang im biang namar ka Nongstoiñ ka dei u budlum jong ka HSPDP”, ong ka kong P.F. Marngar.Kaba ka la bynrap shuh shuh ba ka jingialang, ka la rai ba kan thoh noh ïa ka shithi sha u President ka Nongstoiñ Area Unit ba un lum noh mardor ïa ka jingïalang paitbah bad lada um leh ei ei kumta kin phah ruh ïa ka shithi sha u President ba Rangbah duh jong ka Party, bad lada u President rangbah u don ïa ka mynsiem ka jingpyrkhat na ka bynta u paitbah u dei ban phah ïa u President ka Nongstoiñ area Unit, ba un lum noh mardor ïa ka jingialang khnang ba kin ïoh ruh ban tip ba ïano yn ai ïa ka tiket.
title: Na ka tiket MLA Nongstoin, byrngem  khylliap lama ki kynthei HSPDP

content: Shillong,14 Jymmang:Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew, ka tnad kaba peit ia ka bit ka biang ka bam ka dih ha ka jylla ka Food Safety ka la leit khynra ia ka dukan die marbam jong uwei u Marwari kaba don ha Keating Road. Katei ka jingleit khynra ka dei hadien ba katei ka tnad ka la ioh jingujor na u Rangbah Dong ka Bomfyle Road u bah Keith Kharshiing. Katei ka dukan ka dei kaba la tip kum ka Patanjali kaba dei trai da u S.S Agarwal. La ialam ia ka kynhun leit khynra da ka kong BDS Mukhim Assistant Commissioner Food Safety bad u bah Nathaniel Lyngwi u Food Safety Officer ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki pulit ka Sadar PS.Ka jingleit khynra ka dei namarba ka la don ka jingujor ba ka don ka jingdie be-aiñ ia ka um bam ha katei ka dukan.Ha ka jingleit khynra katei ka tnad ka la lap ba 3 tylli ki klong um kiba 20 litar kiba la die ha ka dor kaba tad tang T.100 tyngka bad kitei ki klong ki don ia ki kyrteng jong ki kompeni Prime, Camper bad Savor, hynrei u Agarwal um shym don kano kano ka jingiateh bad kine ki kompeni bad la suba ba ia ka um ruh u shu phylliew na la ing kaba don ha Bomfyle Road ka ing kaba dei trai da ka u wanrah na ka ing ba u shong u sah ha Bomfyle Road ia kaba la dei trai da ka Assam Pradeshik Marwari Sammelan Shiksha Kosh Trust jong ka Marwari Committee na Guahati.La leit ban khynra ruh ha katei ka jaka sah jong u bad la lap bun tylli ki klong thylli, ki jingdih umsoh Cocacola, Pepsi kiba la kut tarik bad la lap ruh ba u die ha dukan ia ki jingbam kiba la shah dait khnai.Ka tnad ba peit ia ka bam ka dih ka la ong ba u SS Agarwal um don ia ka Food License kaba pyni ba u la pynkhein ia ka ain 31(1) jong ka Food Safety Act bad kaba mana ia uno uno u nongdie jingdie ban buh ia ki marbam.“Ngi lap ba u SS Agarwal u la pynkhein ia ka Section 31 (1) jong ka Food Safety Act kaba uno uno u nongdie jingdie um lah ban buh mar bam khlem ka Food License “, la ong ka kong DBS Mukhim ka bym shym la ihun ia ka rukom die marbam utei u Marwari. La kurup ia baroh ki klong um kiba la ioh na ingsah jong u.
title: Khynra  ia ka dukan Marwari  “lap ia ki jingbam ba la dait khnai”

content: Shillong, 10 Jymmang:Ka KSU ka la buh jingkylli hato u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri-Bhoi District u GP Gotmare u dei u DC ban peit ia ka jingeh ki paidbah ne u dei u Ejen ( Agent) lynti rel?. Katei ka dei ka jingkylli ka KSU halor ka jingkynthoh jong u DC ka Ri-Bhoi da kaba ong ba lada ka kompeni kaba shna lynti rel ka donkam jingiada ka bor District ka kloi ban ai ki lad jingiada ia ki. “Lada u DC ka Ri Bhoi u ong ba ka kompani kaba shna lynti rel ha Ri Bhoi ka dongkam ia ki jingiada, ki bor district ki long kiba kloi ban ai jingiada ia ki, hynrei ka jingkylli kaba mih ka long balei u DC um ai jingiada iaki paidbah kiba sah ha khappud bad ka Assam kiba mad iaka jingshah pyndik bad jingshah thombor” ong u Lambokstarwell Marngar President ka KSU Central Body da kaba bynrap ba haduh mynta ka KSU kam pat ia kynduh ia u DC ka Ri-Bhoi kumba u la kam.Ula ong ba halor ka jingkam u DC ba ka kam ban shna iaka lynti rel kan sa sdang biang, na ka liang ka KSU kan iengskhem ha ka nongrim ban pyrshah beit bad kan nym ailad ban shna iaka lynti rel katba ka sorkar jylla kam pat lah ban shna ia ki ain ki ban iada iaka jaitbynriew na ka jingwan rung kyrthep ki mynder ri bad ki bar jylla.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingujor ejahar ka NFR ia ka KHADC bad KSU kiba la leit pynsangeh iaka kam shna lynti rel, U Lambokstarwell Marngar ula ong, “Ha ka jingshisha dei ma ngi ki ban ujor ejahar kylla ia ka NFR namar ka la shu leh donbor ban shna iaka lynti rel khlem da ioh jingbit shwa naka KHADC namar ki jaka ban shna iaka lynti rel ki hap hapoh ka Scheduled Area, hynrei ka tnad rel ka la shu thom da ka bor ban shna ia ka lynti rel”.
title: “U DC Ri-Bhoi u Ejen ban  shna lynti rel” kylli ka KSU

content: Shillong,10 Jymmang:Mynta ka sngi ka jaka hikai niah kali ba la pyniaid da u Wanpyn-hunlang Nongrum bad u Evalarisha Shabong na Jaiaw Mawbynna ka la noh synniang 500 tylli ki jingsp khmut sha ki pulit pyniaid kali. Ia kitei la aiti sha u N.K Syiem SP Traffic ha kamra treikam jong u.Ha ka jingiakren bad kitei utei u heh pulit pyniaid kali u la ai jingkhein ruh ia ka jingioh daiñ kuna ki pulit na ka jingpathar ka rukom niah kali ha nongbah Shillong. Katkum katei ka jingkhein ka long ba ha u kyllalyngkot, 2017 ki la don 1830 tylli ki kes bad ka kuna ka long T.6, 04,300 tyngka ha u rymphang, 2017 ki la don 1976 tylli ki kes bad ka kuna ka long T.6,63,250 tyngka , ha u lber ki don 1564 tylli ki kes ka kuna ka long T.5,95,200 tyngka bad ha u iaiong 2017 ki don 1578 tylli ki kes bad ka kuna ka long T.6, 25, 580 tyngka bad baroh ka long T.24,88,330 tyngka. Kitei ki kes ba la ioh bat ki long ka jingrung sha ki jaka bym shah iaid kali, ka jingkit palat pud, ka jingjia aksiden, ka jingniha kali bu-aid, ka jingjiah kali khlem laisen, ka jingiah thuk thuk khlem helmet bad kiwei pat.
title: 500 tylli ki jingsop khmut sha ki pulit

content: Shillong, 10 Jymmang:Ka General meeting jong ka Meghalaya Upper Primary School Teachers Association(MUPSTA) West Khasi Hills District kan long ha ka 13 tarik u Jymmang 2017 ha Ri Khasi Free U.P School New Nongstoin ha ka por 11 AM. Ha kane ka Meeting,yn pynthymmai noh ia ki nongkit kam jong ka MUPSTA West Khas Hills District. Ha ka kane ka meeting, ki nongialam na ka Central Body kin ai ruh ka jingpynshai halor ka 100% Enhancement ia ka tulop ki nonghikai Adhoc School kumba la pdiang da ka Cabinet meeting dang shen nalor ki kam (Issue) ba dang sahteng ban pyntreikam da ka sorkar. La kyrpad ia baroh ki nonghikai Adhoc jong ki Upper Primary school kiba don kylleng ka West Khasi Hills District ba kin sngewbha ba kin ia poi khnang sha katei ka jngialang ba donkam, la ong ka kyrwoh na u Bah Keneth, Shadap u President MUPSTA .
title: Ka jingialang MUPSTA West Khasi Hills

content: Shillong, 10 Jymmang:Ka Shillong Municipality Board (SMB) ka la pynkhreh mynta ban pynbiang ia ki jaka na ka bynta ban pynshong ia ki nongdie madan ha ki katto kattne ki jaka ba la ibiang ban lait na ka jingshong pathar ha ki surok, ki lynti syngkieng.U Myntri ka tnad pynroi sor u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka Municipal ka la ioh pdiang haduh kumba 500 ngut ki nongdie madan ba la aplai ban ioh shong die madan na ki jaka ba hap hapoh u pud u sam ka sor.Ka jingthmu ka sorkar ban kynriah ia ki nongdie madan ha lynti ka thain Motphran, Khyndai Lad, ka la iakynduh jingeh hadien ba ki nongdie kim shym la kohnguh ia ka hukum ka sorkar.Hynrei na ka liang u Bah Ronnie u la ong ba ki nongdie madan ki dei ban sngewthuh ba kim dei ban shu shim kabu ba tang namar ba ki duk, kin shu shong ban die jingdie katba mon, hynrei ki dei ban burom ia ka jingpyrshang ka sorkar ban pynbeit ia ka jingeh namar ka pynwit ia ka iaid ka ieng ki paidbah bad ka wanrah ruh ia ka jingjaboh.“Ngi la pyrshang ban pynbeit ia kane ka kam hynrei la mih pynban ka kynhun kaba pyrshah. Ha ka jingshisha, kum ki nongshong shnong kiba don ka jingkitkhlieh ki dei ban kohnguh ia ka jingbthah ka sorkar namar ba ym lah ban shu ialeh kulmar”, la ong u Bah Ronnie.Kine kiba la aplai ban shong die madan ki dei ki longiing kiba duk bad ki kynthei kiba hap ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban pyndap ia ki jingdonkam ka iing ka sem.Kham mynshwa, u bah Ronnie u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la pynbeit ban buh ia ki nongdie madan ha ki katto katne ki jaka kiba dei jong ka sorkar ha kylleng kane ka sor. Kine ki jaka ki kynthup ia ka iew Malki, ka Laitumkhrah, ka thain Polo bad kiwei de.
title: Dang pynkhreh ka Municipal ban ai  jaka ia 500 ngut ki nongdie madan

content: Jowai, 10 Jymmang:U ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, uba dei u myntri sorkar ba dei peit ia ka tnad sam bording bad kiwei kiwei, u la plie paidbah ia ka jaka ai jingsumar kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka ‘Rasongsli Nursing Home”, kaba don ha Amshipai, Amlarem, West Jaintia Hills District mynhynnin ka sngi ba-ar.Ha kane ka sngi la donlang u Local MLA ka thain, u ma Stephanson Mukhim, u MLA ka Umroi, u ma Ngaitlang Dhar, u Local MDC, ma Hollando Lamin, kiwei pat ki MDC kynthup ia u ma Shemhok Garod bad ma Phillip Tangliang, ka SDO, kong I Laloo bad u SDPO bad OC ka AMlarem PS nalor kiwei kiwei ki kynrem ki lyndang.Katei ka Hospital ka dei kaba la seng da u riew shimet, u ma Rom Dhar uba dei ruh u Kabiraj lane u nongai dawai kynbat ba pawnam ka thain.Ha katei ka jaka ai jingsumar ka don ia ki Doctor kiba tbit kiba kynthup ia u Dr. Dameshwa Paslein kum u Resident Medical Officer (RMO), ka Dr. Da-e-wan Najiar bad ka Dr. B. Saimon kaba dei ka super specialist na ka bynta ka khlieh (neurologist) bad 4 ngut ki staff nurse nalor u Pharmacist, u Lab-technician bad kiwei kiwei ki nongtrei.Katei ka jaka ai jingsumar ka don haduh 26 jingthiah kiba kynthup ia ki jingthiah shynrang, kynthei, khyllung bad kito kiba kha khyllung.Kiba la ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi ki la ai ka jingiaroh ia u ma Rom Dhar bad ka iing ka sem jong u, namar kane ka jingthmu ba bha jong u ban shakri ia ki para mynsiem khamtam ia ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka thain.Ka SDO Civil Sub-Division, ka kong Laloo ka la ong ba ka dei ka jingshisha ba dang donkam ban don shibun ki jaka ai jingsumar kiba biang ha ka jylla bad ka long kaei kaei kaba dei ban iaroh ba u ma Rom Dhar u la wan shakhmat ban pyni ia kane ka nuksa ban ai ka jingshakri ia ki para briew ha ka liang ka koit ka khiah.U ma Lahkmen Rymbui, MLA barim ka thain, u la ong ba ha ka por jong u ruh u la pyrshang ban pynioh ia ka Hospital Sorkar ha ka thain ban shakri ia ki paidbah hynrei ka sorkar kam shym lah pynurlong ia kane wat lada ia ka jaka la ai sngewbha da ki riew paidbah. U la ai ka jingiaroh ha ryngkat ka jingkyrkhu kyrdoh ia kane ka Nursing Home. “Nga khmih lynti ba kane ka jaka ai jingsumar kan ai ka jingkyrkhu ia ki paidbah”, u la ongNa ka liang u ma Hollando Lamin u la kyntu ia ki Doctor ban ai ka jingshakri kaba bha tam ia ki paidbah.Na ka liang u Local MLA u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewnguh ia u ma Rom halor kane ka jinglah jong u ban tei ia kane ka Hospital bad u la kyntu ruh ia ki paidbah ban ai ka jingiatreilang khnang ba kane ka Hospital kan lah ban shakri khambha ia ki paidbah ka thain.“U la ong kum ki nongmih khmat ngi la ia kren bad ka sorkar ban pynioh ia ki jaka ai jingsumar kiba biang hynrei namar ba don bun ki daw, ka sorkar kam lah bad ka jingtei ia kane ka jaka ai jingsumar da u riew shimet kan long ka jingkyrkhu ymtang ia ki nongpang hynrei wat ia ki samla ka thain kiba la pyndep ia ki jingpule jong ki ha liang ba ai jingkoit jingkhiah ia ki paidbah”, la ong u ma Stephan.U ma Ngaitlang Dhar, u la kyntu ia ki Doctor ban long kiba don ka Akor ka burom, ban jem ka ktien ka thylliej bad ban long kiba trei shitom bad ruh kiba duriap ha ka kam khang ba kane ka jaka ai jingsumar kan kiew na kawei ka sngi sha kawei pat.“Bun sien ki Doctor ki dom riang, ki kren tohmet ia ki nongpang bad lada ki Doctor lane ki Nurse ki nang ban kren ia ki nongpang, ka jingpang ka la jem lypa ha shwa ban dih dawai”, la ong u MLA ka Umroi.U kongsan, u ma Sniawbha ha ba kren u la ong, u ma Rom Dhar um da dei uba la nang la stad hynrei u dei u briew uba iohi jngai bad u la ieng rangbah ban tei ia kane ka jaka ai jingsumar kaban ai jingmyntoi shi katdei eh ia ki paidbah ka thain bad ia kiba na jan bad na jngai.“Ngi ki nongmihkhmat ngi duh thiah ban pyrkhat ia ki jingeh jong ki paidbah khamtam ha ka liang ka koit ka khiah. Ka koit ka khiah ka long kaba donkam. Lada phi don ka iing dulan paki, ka surok kaba bha, ka kam ka jam kaba biang, hynrei lada phi duh ia ka jingkoit jingkhiah, kine baroh kin long leh nohei”, la ong u Ma Sniawbha.Na ka bynta ban pynurlong ia ka jingtei ia katei ka jaka ai jingsumar kaba jop, na ka liang u ma Sniawbhalang bad u ma Ngaitlang ki la ai ruh ka jingiarap nadong hadong ia u ma Rom Dhar.
title: Plie u ma Sniawbha ia ka  Hospital u Kabiraj ha Amlarem

content: Shillong, 10 Jymmang:Ka Synod ka la pynbna ha ki jingiaseng jong kiba bun ki balang ba ki paid riewngeit jong ka balang Presbyterian kim dei ban sheptieng ia u Aadhaar nombar bad ha katei ka jingpynbna la ong ba kam lei lei bad kam don jingiadei eiei bad uta u mrad khlaw kumba kiba bun ki riew ngeit khamtam ha nongkyndong ki sheptieng lut ban leh Aadhaar.U Pastor PBM Basaiawmoit u dei uwei na ki nongialam jong ka kynhun kaba pyrshah ia u Aadhaar ban pyntreikam jubor ha kane ka ri India khamtam ha ka jylla Meghalaya. La kylli na u Pastor Basaiawmoit aiu u sngew halor katei ka jingpynbna ka Synod ha ki iing mane ba u Aadhaar um lei lei, “Ho, oid nga tip ba ki ong ym lei lei, nga te ngam ong ym lei lei , ngam pyrshah ia ka jingong jong ki ym lei lei hynrei ka eh bha ban ong ym lei lei, da lei lei pat yn ong kumno” ong u Pastor PBM haba ia kren bad u Rupang.Utei u pastor uba dang wad bniah mynta shaphang u Aadhaar nombar u la ong ba lada shim katkum ka Science bad Philosophy kaba ma u, u la dep pule kam don ka jingong ba u Aadhaar um lei lei, “Ia mynta ka jingwad bniah jong nga kam pat poi sha kaba kut” ong u Pastor uba bteng biang da kaba ong “U Aadhaar um dei ban proof ia ka Identity hynrei u dei ia ka Security, ka Jenesis jong u Aadhaar ka dei naduh u 1999 ha ka por ka thma Kargil kaba u Atal Bihari Vajpayee u long myntri rangbah duh” bynrap biang u pastor.Shuh shuh u pastor u la ong ba katkum ka hukum jong ka Supreme Court u Aadhaar um dei ban long salonsar ia baroh hynrei tang ia kito ki don ka mon lajong hynrei u la ong ba ka jingleh pat mynta ka la wan ha ka dur ka jingpynbor naba wat ia ki khynnah skul ruh la pynbor ban leh Aadhaar nombar, “Ia ki khynnah kiba dang rit ka rta kum ki khynnah skul ym lah ban ong ba ki don ka mon lajong kitei kim pat lah ban jied ia ka mon lajong hynrei katei ka dei ka jingpynbor” ong biang u Pastor da kaba ong ba ka jingleh ka sorkar ka dei ka jingleh pyrshah ia ka huku ka kashari. U la ong biang ba ha kane ka jylla ki dang don dang 9% kiba don Aadhaar katba ka jylla Assam pat ka dei kaba rit duh ha India kaba don tang 7% ki nongshong shnong jong ka kiba don Aadhaar.
title: U Aadhar um lei lei, ong ka  Synod sha kylleng ki Balang

content: Jowai, 11 Jymmang:U MLA ka Jowai, uba dei ruh u Symbud Myntri Rangbah ka jylla, u Professor RC Laloo, u la plie paidbah ia ka Science Stream lane ka tnad pule Science ha North Liberty Higher Secondary School, Jowai.Ka North Liberty Higher Secondary School Jowai kaba don ha Moo-kyrdup, Ladthadlaboh Jowai ka la plie ia katei ka tnad pule ha ka iing u Dr. RC Laloo, Dy.CM ka jylla kaba la tei bun mala ha Mission Compound Jowai.Ha kane ka sngi la donlang ka kong M Pde bad u SP ka WJH kum ki nongshah khot sngewbha ba kyrpang bad u DC kum u Symbud Kongsan.Haba kren ha ka jingialang, ki nongkren naduh u SP, R Muthu, DSEO kong Pde bad u DC ka WJH, u bah R Rapthap kumjuh u kongsan Dr. Laloo ki la iaroh ia u Principal katei ka Skul, u ma Richard Uriah uba dei u Engineer bad u trai jong ka North Liberty Hr. Sc School.U maPrincipal katei ka Skul u la iathuh ba ka jingseng skul kadei ka jingphoh sniew jong u bad la ialam lynti ia u da U Blei. Ka jingthmu ban don ka Science Stream ha nongbah Jowai ka dei ka angnud ka sniew jong nga da ka jingkyrshan imei bad I pa jong nga bad kane ka jingthmu jong nga ka la urlong shisha.U la ong ba kane ka Science Stream kan ai ka jingshakri ia ki samla pule kaba biang nadong hadong. Ha kane ka Skul yndon ka Resource Centre bad kumjuh ka Coaching Centre ban pyntip ia ki samla pule ban jop ha ki jingiakhun jong ki ha ki Entrance Examination bapher bapher.Ka por sdang skul kan long naduh 9:00 am baje haduh 2:30 pm. Naduh 2:30 pm haduh 4:00 pm kan don ka por ialehkai Tenis, Carom Board, ka por ia kren ia khana shi paralok bad ka por ban peit TV bad Phlim katba naduh ka por 4 baje haduh 7 baje por miet kan don ka jingai jinghikai da ki nonghikai batbit kiban wan na ki Skul bad College bapher bapher ka nongbah Jowai.“Kan don ruh ka online Coaching course nalor ka Coaching da ki Resources Persons bat bit bad ia ka Online Course ngi kum ka skul ngi la dep ban iateh soskular bad ka Company By Ju’s India”, la ong u ma Richard UriahNa ka liang u SP u la ong ba ba ka Subject Science kadei kaba bun ki khien kaba eh bha hynrei ka Scince kadei pat ka ngim lah ban iaid lait ha ka jingim.”Haba ngi kylli jingkylli shaphang ka jinglong jingman ki kynja baim, ki kynja bym don jingim bad wat ia ka haw haw, kata kadei ka science kaba ngi donkam ban wad ia ka jubab”, la ong u SP.Ka kong Pde kum ka DSEO ka la ai ka jingiaroh ia ka North Liberty kaba la iaid shakhmat ban seng ia kane ka tnad pule ka ban iarap ia ki samla pule ha ka District. Na ka liang u DC u bah Rapthap u la ong ba ka jingseng ia kane ka tnad pule kan iarap ia ki samla pule bad ia ki kmie ki kpa kiba ju don hapdeng ka jingkulmar jingmut man la u snem na ka bynta ban ioh pynrung skul ia la ki khun jong kiKatba u kongsan, u ma RC Laloo u la ong ba la tei ia kane ka iing (Iing Bun Mala) kum ka dak ban kynmaw ia ki kmie ki kpa bad imei ieid paieid jong u kiba bun na ki ki dei ki nonghikai.“Nga la iaroh ia u Principal ka Skul North Liberty uba don ka jingthmu ban kyntiew ia ka pule ka dangle ha kane ka sor baieid jong nga”, u la ong.U la kyntu ia u Principal ban kyntiew ia kane ka tnad pule jong ka skul. “Nga shaniah tylli haphi bad ngin peit hapoh ar snem, kaei ka result jong kane ka skul”, u la ong.
title: Plie u Dy CM ia ka Science Stream ka North Liberty Hr. School

content: Shillong, 11 Jymmang:Ka GVK EMRI, ka la pynshai halor ka jingkylla jong ka kali kit nongpang 108, kaba kylla hynnin ka sngi bad kaba la pyniap ia arngut ki briew, mynhynnin ka sngi, ha kaba kiba khlad, ki kynthup ia U bah Teiborlang Lyngdoh, uba la don la 9snem ka rta bad ka 108 bad nangta sa U Bah Pyrshangbor Marwein, uba dei u nongniah jong katei ka kali, ha kaba la kam, ba u dei uwei na ki nongniah uba tbit tam ia kitei ki kali 108 bad ula don mynta la hynniew bnai bad u dei uba trei ha Mairang.Halor ka jingkylla jong katei ka kali, la iathuh ba ki buh da ki GPS, kiba ai jingtip sha katei ka ophis, lada jia ba ki kali ki iaid palat ia ka 50 kilometre ha ka shi kynta, hynrei la iathuh ba halor katei ka jingjia, kim shym la ioh jingtip eiei satia bad la iathuh ruh ba baroh ki nongniah jong ki 108, ki lah ban niah tang haduh 70 Kilometre ha ka shi kynta bad ka kali, ka la khang hi, ba kin iaid palat ia katei ka jingsted ba la buh.Na ka liang katei ka kompeni, ka kam ba ka jingiap jong kitei ki arngut, ki long ba ki mynsaw na ka khlieh bad na ka shadem bad ka jingdih buaid, ka long kaba kim pat lah ban pynthikna satia, namar ba ka jingtohkit, ka dang iaid shakhmat ban lap ia ki jingshisha, ong ka kyrwoh jong ka GVK EMRI.Katei ka kali jong ka 108, hynnin ka sngi, ka la kylla ha ka riat, kaba don harum Lad Mawreng, ong ka khubor.
title: Ym pat pdiang ka 108, ba  dih buaid kiba iap kylla kali

content: Shillong, 23 Iaiong:U Mukul Sangma myntri rangbah ka Meghalaya, ula ujor sha ki pulit mynta ka sngi, halor ka jingmih ka twitter account ha ka kyrteng jongu.Ka jing ujor jong U Sangma, ka dei ha Sardar Police Station mynta ka sngi bad ha ka jingthoh, kaba la thoh ha ka kyrteng jongu, la ong “Lada nga jop elekshon, ngan pynlong ain ia ka jingrep bhang ha Shillong”.“Ngi la thoh sha ka twitter, ba ka ai jingtip, ia u briew, uba pyndonkam ia katei ka account” ong U Davies Marak, Superintendent of Police, East Khasi Hills.
title: Thaw thok ia ka kyrteng U MR ha Twitter

content: Shillong, 23 Iaiong:Ka United Democratic Party (UDP) ka la kyrmen ba ka elekshon 2018 kan wan jia biang kumba long ha u snem 1997 ha Jaintia Hills, ha kaba ka party kan jop lut baroh 7 tylli ki konstitwensi bad ban long ka party kaba bun paid tam ha ka iing dorbar.Ha ka jingiakren bad u General Secretary ka UDP u Dr Jemino Mawthoh, u la ong ba ka UDP ka la kyrmen skhem ba ka elekshon MLA 2018 kan long kumba jia ha u snem 1997 ha kaba ka long ka party kaba bun paid tam ki MLA ha ka iing dorbar thawain kaba don 60 ngut ki MLA.“Ka UDP ka khlain bha ha Jaintia Hills ha kane ka kynti, bad ngi kyrmen ba ka elekshon 2018 kan wan jia biang kumba long ha u snem 1997 ha kaba ngin ioh baroh ki jain spong”, la ong u Dr Mawthoh.U la ong ba lyer ka elekshon na ka sur jong ki paidbah ka jyla, ka la beh bha ha kine ki sngi sha ka party riewlum ha kaba ka UDP kan long ka party kan jop bun bha bad ban bat ruh ia u shabuk ka jingsynshar. “Ngi la kyrmen ba ngin jop ym duna ia ka 20 ngut ki MLA ha kane ka elekshon ban wan ha baroh kawei ka jylla”, la ong u Dr Mawthoh, uba long ruh u MLA na ka Nongthymmai.Kumba ka long mynta, ka UDP ka don tang phra ngut ki MLA ha kaba ka la shong baroh san snem ha ka liangsynshar khlem iasoh satia bad ka Congress kaba synshar ha kane ka jylla.Katkum ka jingong u nongialam ka UDP, ka party kan ialam ia ka sorkar ha kane ka kynti ban wan namar ba ki paidbah ki la ngiah bad sngewthuh ia ka jingsynshar ka Congress kaba wanrah ia ka jinghiar ha ka ioh ka kot khamtam ha ka rukom pyniaid pisa kaba long lymmuh bha, kaba buh jingeh ia ka jylla bad ia ki paidbah.
title: Kyrmen ka UDP ban jia biang  kum ha u snem 1997 na Jaintia

content: Jowai, 23 Iaiong:U Myntri ka tnad C&RD, u ma Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u ma Justine Dkhar, MLA ka thain kum u symbud kongsan ki la wan buh ia u Maw Nongrum na ka bynta ka C&RD Block Wapung ha Wapungskur ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ha ka jingialang kaba shongkun wat lada pynthut ka mariang.Ha kane ka sngi, ki heh District naduh u DC, ki ADC bad u BDO nalor ka Director jong katei ka tnad, ka I Sangma ruh ka la iadonlang nalor ki rangbah shnong bad ki paidbah ka thain.U Rangbah Shnong ka Wapungskur, u ma Satly Ryngkhlem u la ong ba ka jingwanrah ia ka Khliehriat C&RD Block na Khliehriat sha Wapungskur ka long ka jingkyrkhu ia ki paibah na kiba bun ki shnong ka thain namar kane ka long kan pyniajan ia ka ia jingiadei hapdeng ka tnad sorkar bad ki paidbah nongkyndong ka thain.U la iathuh ba ka dorbar shnong Wapungskur bad ka Dorbar Shnong Wapungshnong ki la ai sngewbha haduh 5 acre ka jaka na ka bynta katei ka Ophis jong u BDO ha katei ka jaka kaba thymmai.U Rangbah Shnong ka Wapungshnong, u ma Gliter Rymbai u la ai ka jingkhublei ia u MLA, ki MDC bad ia ki DC bad baroh ki sahep sorkar kiba la trei shitom ban kynriah iaka Development Block na Khliehriat sha Wapung.U DC ka West Jaintia Hills u la kyntu ia ki paidbah ban ai ka jingiatreilang ba ki nongtrei jong katei ka ophis khnang ba kan lah ban ai ka jingshakri kaba bha tam ia u paidbah ka thain.U Ma Justine Dkhar u la ong ba ka East Jaintia Hills ka dang donkam sa kwei ka Block ha ka thain Border jong ka ri Bangladesh bad ia ka District Civil Hospital. U la pan ka jingkyrshan na ki paidbah ba un ioh ban pynurlong ia katei ka jingthmu jong u na ka bynta ban myntoi ki paidbah.U Kongsan hashwa ban plie pyrda ia u Maw-Nongrim u la ong ba ka jingtrei shitom u MLA jong ka thain ka la wanrah ia kane ka Block ha kane ka shnong bad u la ai ka jingiaroh ia ki paidbah bad ruh ia ki sahep jong ka tnad C&RD Block kiba la ai ia ka jingiatreilang bad u MLA ka thain.U la ong ba ka Shnong Wapungskur kadei ka jaka kaba biang eh ban don kane ka tnad treikam jong ka sorkar namar ka dei ka shnong kaba long pdeng ia kiba bun tylli ki shnong ha ka thain. U la ong ba ka jingwan buh maw nongrim mynta ka sngi kan nym kut satia hynrei ka dei ka jingsdang jong ka jingmyntoi jong u paidbah ka thain.“Ngam kwah ban shu wan buh maw nongrim, hynrei ka jing-angnud jong nga ka long ban iohi ia ka jingtreikam kane ka ophis ha ka rukom kaba bit ba biang ban myntoi u Paidbah. Kum u Myntri ka tnad, ngan pyrshang katba lah ban pyndep ia ka jingtei ia ki ophis treikam jong kane ka ophis hapoh 5 lane 6 bnai”, la ong u ma Sniawbha.
title: Buh Mawnongrim u ma Sniawbhalang  ia ka C&RD Block ha Wapungskur

content: Nongstoiñ, 24 Iaiong:Katba ka election sha ka Iing Dorbar thaw ain jong ka Jylla ka la nang jan ki seng sain pyrthei bapher bapher hapoh ka thain West Khasi Hills District, ki la sdang ban ia khoh reh na ka bynta ban nang pynkhlain shuh shuh ia la ki jong ki jong ki seng hapoh ka thain. Shuh shuh nalor ki seng sain pyrthei kiba la paw, ki paidbah ka thain ki la ia sdang ban shong shit bha sa ia kawei pat ka seng sain pyrthei kaba dang shu mih thymmai ha ka Jylla kaba la tip ruh kum ka People’s Democratic Front (PDF).Hadien ba la pynbna paidbah ia ka PDF kum ka seng sain pyrthei kaba thymmai hapoh jong ka Jylla katei ka seng, ka la ialeh ban bsuh khlieh shwa sha ka thain West Khasi Hills District, ha kaba kala ioh ruh ban pyniar ia ki tnad treikam ki jong ka ha ki ar tylli ki Konstitwensi kiba don hapoh ka thain West Khasi Hills.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba dang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la dep katei ka seng, ka la dep ban wan thaw ia ka PDF ha Nongstoin ha kaba ka la jied ruh ia ki nongkitkam ba shipor jong na katei ka Konstitwensi bad hadien katei, na ka liang jong ki nongkitkam jong ka PDF sengkmie, ki la hiar sa sha ka thain Mawshynrut ban thaw sa ia ka tnad treikam ka jong ka ha katei ka Konstitwensi.Katei ka paw shai ruh ha ka General Meeting kaba la long mynta ka sngi hapoh Iing Dorbar Shnong Riangdo, ha kaba ki nongialam ka PDF sengkmie ki wan ban sain dur bad ban seng ia ka party PDF hapoh Mawshynrut Konstitwensi ha kaba kitei ki nongialamki la pynshai ia ka nongrim bad ka jingthmu jong ka sen.Haba pynshai paidbah ia katei ka seng, kitei ki nongialam ki la ong ba ka tynrai jong ka seng, ka dei kaba la seng da u paidbah na ka bynta u paidbah bad jong u paidbah, shuh shuh kila kren ruh shaphang ka roi ka par bad kumjuh ia ka jingiaid lynti jong ka seng PDF sha ka Election Commission jong ka Ri haduh mynta.Hadien ba ki la iatai sani bha halor katei ka jingialang da kawei ka jingmut ki la shim ia ka rai ban jied ia ki nongkitkam ba shipor napoh ka Mawshynrut Konstitwens namar ba ka seng, mynta ka dang don ha pdeng kiba bun ki kam ban pynbit pynbiang sha ka Election Commission jong ka ri bad hadien ba ki paidbah ki la ia mynjur ia katei ka rai la pynlong sa ia ka jingiajied ia ki nongkitkam ba shipor.Ia ka kam President la jied ia u bah Valentine Pangniang, u bah Tobias Iawren kum u Vice President, u bah Aibor L Nonglait kum u general secretary, lai ngut ki joint Secretary ba kynthup ia u Anthony Marbaniang, Gregory Syiem bad u bah Johnpaul Iawphniaw, katba ia ka kam Finance Secretary la jied ia u bah Donbok Dkhar bad la jied ruh ia bah Peter Thyrniang bad u bah Thomas Jones Kharbani kum ki Convener ka Youth Wing katba I Kong Lusibia Thyrniang bad Elinda Thyrniang kum ki Convener ka Women’s Wing.Ha katei ka jingialang ban thaw bad jied ia ki nongkitkam ka Mawshynrut la iadon ryngkat lang u bah Ivanlumlang Marbaniang President ka PDF sengkmie, u bah Emlang Lytan Working President ka PDF seng kmie, u bah Auspicious L Mawphlang Secretary ka PDF sengkmie, u bah Aibor L Nonglait Organising Secretary PDF West Khasi Hills u bala pyniaid ruh ia ka jingialang bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Sdang shongshit ka PDF hapoh  ka thain West Khasi Hills District

content: Shillong, 23 Iaiong:“Ka long kaba sngewsih ba I Bah Titos Chyne MLA Sohra ila ialam bakla ha ki kotkhubor, ba hana ka jingialang CEC UDP ha ka 17tarik Iaiong 2017 ka kad arliang halor ka rai ba ki MDC UDP ki dei ban weng noh ia ka jingkyrshan ia ka PDF i Bah PN Syiem ha KHADC” ong ka kyrwoh na U bah BM Lanong Senior Working President ka seng UDP.“Ka dei ka bynta jong nga ruh ban pynshai paidbah ba ia katei ka jingialang kaba la wan na baroh ki District UDP Khasi bad Jaintia Hills, la pyniaid da u President hi, u Dr Donkupar Roy, uba hadien ki jingiakren sani u la buh ia ka jingtyrwa hakhmat ka dorbar bad la pdiang hun da kawei ka sur, lait tang u MDC Umsning u Bah D.Sumer, uba la ieng ban pynpaw ia la ka jingsngew jong u” ong shuh ka kyrwoh.U bah Bindo, u ong shuh shuh “Ban ong ba ka jingialang ka kad arliang, i Bah Titos i dei ban pynshai ia kane hakhmat ka party, namar baroh ki la iohi bad sakhi ba i shu pynksan bymhok ia ki MDC kwah shuki bad dei na kum kine ki jingkren ba ki 4 ngut ki MDC ki nang ioh mynsiem”.U Senior Working President, u ong ba U Bah Titos, u la sei ruh ia kawei ka nia bym shisha ba ka la don teng ha ki snem 2009-10 ba ka seng ka la rai ba ki MLA UDP kin weng noh na ka jingiatreilang bad ka Congress, hynrei ki MLA kim shym kohnguh. Kane ruh ka bym shisha, namar wat la ki la don ki jingiakren, hynrei kam shym don kum katei ka rai.Halor ka jingkyrshan ka UDP ia U Bah HS Shylla ha District Council haba U Bah Shylla u dang long CEM bad ba U Bah HL Massar u ieng la ka jong marwei, kam shym don kum katei ka jingjia ba U Bah Massar u la don marwei, ong shuh U Bah Bindo.U bah Bindo, u ong shuh shuh ba ki la don ki jingjia ba ka Congress ka la kad arliang ha kitei ki por ha KHADC, ha kaba kawei ka kynhun Congress ka la wanrah ia ka jingtyrwa bym shaniah shuh, ia U Bah Shylla, ha ka por ba U dang long CEM jong ka seng Congress hi. “Ka jingkyrshan ia i Bah Shylla tang ha katei ka por, ka dei halor ka political strategy (ka buit sain pyrthei), namar ka jingpra ka kynhun Congress bad ia kane, kam shym don kano-kano ka jingtuklar na ka seng kumba la ialam bakla da ki nongkwah shuki” ong utei u rangbah.“I Bah Titos ila kdew ruh ba ka la don ka jingialang sop-sop ha ka 21 tarik April ha ing jong nga. Ia kum kine ki kam sop-sop dei tang kito kiba ju mlien ialade ki tip bha. Ka jingiakynduh ha ka 21 tarik April, la khot kyrkieh tang napdeng ki katto-katne ngut kiba kyrshan ia ka rai CEC 17 tarik, ia kaba ym don jingmut ban khot ia ki nong pyrshah. Kam dei ruh ka jingialang sop-sop, namar la ia kynduh ban pyrkhat ia kaei kaba dei ban leh bad la ia beit ban leit ia kynduh ia u President bad la ia pynbeit bad u President hi ban ia kynduh ia u ha ka sngi Nyngkong 24 tarik April, khnang ban ia pyrkhat lang bad u, kumno yn ialeh nangne shakhmat ia kitei ki MDC 4 ngut bad lada donkam wat ia ki nongsuh buit ruh, katkum ki lynti ba ka Constitution ka seng ki kdew” ong shuh U bah Lanong.U Bah Bindo, u ong ruh ba tang ban kham skuin ki paidbah balei kane ka kam ka poi haduh katne, ka dei namar ka KHADC ka lah ioh kumba 123 klur tyngka na ka 133 klur ei-ei na ka Central Government, haduh ba ym tang ki MDC hynrei kiwei ruh kiba don la ki jingkhein ki ia-skuin lang.“Kitei ki MDC ki pynksan ruh hana ba ka District Council ka dei ka autonomous body (kaba don hok synshar), kumta ki ain teh, kum ka 10th Schedule kam trei kam ia ki. Ka pynpaw ba kitei ki MDC bad ki nongaibuit jong ki kim bna ei-ei shaphang ka jingmut jong ka ‘autonomous body’ ne ka 10th Schedule jong ka Constitution ka ri India, wat la kane ka ain kam pat don ha ki Distirct Council” ong U Senior Working President bad u kren pynkut da kaba ong ba ka jingshisha ka long ba ki MDC ki don la ki jong ki seng ha District Council kumba long ha Parliament bad ki State Assembly bad ka party system na kaba ki jop, la ithuh da ka ain. “Kumno ia ki nongphet seng yn pynksan kum ki nongieit ri”? pynkut ka kyrwoh.
title: “Ba kad arliang ka CEC UDP”  kynthah sa U bah Bindo ia U bah Titos

content: Nongpoh, 24 Iaiong:Da ki spah ngut ki longkmie na ki thain bapher bapher jong ka Nongpoh Constituency, ki la wan ban iashim bynta ha ka General Council jong ka UDP Nongpoh Circle Womens Wings, ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynha ka sngi Saitjain ha Community Hall Sajer, Nongpoh, kaba long ruh kum shibynta ban ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ia ka Kong Rona Khymdeit ka ban sa aireng ha ka Ilekshon 2018.Ha katei ka jingialang kaba la wan ban iashim bynta da ki heh nongialam ka UDP na Ri Bhoi, ba kynthup ia u Bah Donbok Khymdeit, President ka UDP ha Ri Bhoi, u Bah Rayonald Kharkamni General Secretary, ka Kong Preti Kharpyngrope, President State Women Wing, Kong Rona Khymdeit, MDC Nongpoh Constituency lem bad kiwei de ki nongialam bad nongkyrshan ba radbah ka UDP.Ha katei ka jingialangbah ka UDP Women Wings ka Nongpoh Circle, la jied Adviser ia ka Kong Rona Khymdeit, Kong Krolity Marwein kum ka President, Vice President ka Kong Queen Mary Rymbai, ka Kong Hamon Pyngrope kum ka General Secretary, ka Kong K. Makhroh, Joint Secretary, la jied ruh kawei ka Dkhot na baroh ki 11 tylli ki Sub Circle jong ka Women Wings, kiba don hapoh ka Konstitwensi lem bad kiwei kiwei ki nongkitkam.Ha katei ka sngi la jied ruh ia ki nongkitkam bathymmai ka Adhoc Body ka Women Wings ka UDP ha Ri Bhoi District, ha kaba la jied ia ka Kong Rona Khymdeit kum ka President, ka Kong Bitalin Marbaniang kum ka General Secretary lem bad kiwei kiwei ki nongkitkam, kiba la mihkhmat na 5 tylli ki Konstitwensi kiba don hapoh ka dong Ri Bhoi.
title: Da ki spah ngut wan ki longkmie ha ka ialang UDP Nongpoh

content: Shillong, 24 ïaiong:Ka KSU Jaiaw Circle mynta ka sngi ka la leit ban pyndam ia ki jingthoh kiba la wah ha ki sign board jong ka State Bank of India kaba don ha Iewduh bad ka ICICI Bank kaba don ha Garikhana. Ka KSU ka la leit ban pyndam da ki rong lieh ia ka jingthoh Bara Bazar bad la buh tang ia ki jingthoh kiba thoh ‘Iewduh’.
title: Pyndam ka KSU ia ka Bara Bazar ki Bank ha Iewduh

content: Shillong, 24 ïaiong:Katba ki sngi ki nangjan sha ka elekshon 2018, ka politik ka la nang khluit nangkhluit ha kane ka jylla bad mynta ka kynti ka elekshon ka dei ruh kaba kham pher naba kiba mih shakhmat ban aireng mynta ki kham bun hi ki samla. Mynta ka sngi sa uwei pat u samla u la pynbna ialade ba un ia khun ha ka elekshon 2018 na Shillong North konstitwensi. Utei u samla u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Tony Marbaniang uba shong basah ha Police Reserve , namar ba u kpa jong u u trei pulit.U bahTony Marbaniang u dei u khun jong ka kong Judygrace Marbaniang bad u bah Lashwa Khongsni. Utei u samla u dang don 25 snem karta bad u dang shu pyndep ia ka Graduate. Ha ka jingiakren bad ki nongthohkhubor la wan ban synran ia u da ki phew ngut ki longkmie , ki samla na ka thaiñ Reserve , na Jail Road, Keating Road, Punjabi Line. Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u bah Tony Marbaniang u la ong ba mynta u don ha ka seng BJP bad u dei u dkhot jong ka seng BJP bad u pynpaw ruh ba u kwah ia khun na ka seng BJP hynrei haduh mynta um pat pan tiket hynrei u la ong ba ka jingiakhuh ka la thikna ba un ia khun beit lada ioh ne duh tiket ruh.U la ong ba ka daw kaba u la mih shakhmat ban ia khun ha ka elekshon ka dei namarba u kwah ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha ka konstitwensi kaba bun ki jingduna khamtam eh ia kaba dei bad ka jingeh ba ki samla pule ki ia kynduh. Kiba bun na ki paidbah kiba la wan synran ia utei u samla la ithuh ba ki dei ki nongbud jong ka MLA ba mynta ka Shillong North ka kong Roshan Warjri, la kylli na ki katto katne ngut ki longkmie balei ki la phet noh na ka kong Roshan -ki la jubab ba ka daw hi ka dei namar ka jingiakynduh kam shimet jong ki bad don ruh kiba la ong ba u dei u samla na ka jaka bad ka dong ba ki sah ki mih ban kyrshan ia u.
title: Mih u samla na kut pulit ban  aireng 2018, na North Shillong

content: Shillong, 24iaiong:Ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai u Babu Kitbor W. Nongrum, u Nongthoh Kot ba pawkhmat jong bun tylli ki Kot Khasi, mynta u la pynmih biang sa kine ki kot harum:Ki nongthoh kot khasi – v (Ka Jingim & Jingtrei u Oscar M. Wahlang & u Victor G. Bareh; jingieit bajanai (novel) – Ka khana na ka 1st Khasi Feature Film on Video, 1985;jingieit bajanai ia phi – 1987 (Novel – New Edition, 2017). Ia kitei ki Kot la pyllait paidbah ha Seminar jong ka Khasi Authors’ Society, ha ka 22 tarik.
title: Ki kot thymmai u babu Nongrum

content: Amlarem, 24 Iaiong :Ka BJP Youth Wings Amlarem Mandal ha ka jingialam jong u President ka Party u Samla Everest Langstang bad u Secretary u Samla Hamsalet Lamin ki la leit ai ia ka jingpyntip sha ka Office u CEO jong ka MeECL ha Jowai ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingduh Transformer ka Shnong Amlarem Amlatdoh mynta la 8 bnai tam.Ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jing leit ai jingpyntip jong ka BJYM ki la buh ka jing kyrpad na ka bynta ba kin sngewbha ban shim khia khnang na ka bynta ban pyn ioh ia u Transformer jong ka Shnong Amlarem Amlatdoh namar ba ha kine ki bnai ba la dep ka jingduh jong u Transformer mynta ka la long 8 bnai tam eiei bad ha kine ki khyndiat bnai ba la dep ki la juh buh teng ia are tylli ki Transformer bad ki ne ruh ki la duh biang bad kane ka long ka ba la Ktah shibun ia ka Shnong Amlarem Amlatdoh khamtam ia ki Samla pule , ki dukan ki Kharkhana, ki Clinic Doctor bad kiwei kiwei ki office Sorkar kiba don ha Amlarem.Bad ha kane ka jingkyrpad jong ki la ban shuh shuh ia u Chief Engineer na ka bynta ba un shim khia khnang ia kane ia kane ka jing tyrwa jong ki na ka bynta ban pyn ioh kloi ia u Transformer jong kane ka Shnong khnang ba kane kan pynsuk ia baroh ki jing donkam jong ki paid jong ka tei ka Thain.
title: Sngewkhia ka BJYM, ba duh  ding ka Amlarem Amlatdoh

content: Jowai, 18 Iaiong:Ka Bor Shnong Nongbareh Rim jong ka thain Amlarem Sub-Division ka la kyntait war ia ka jingkynnoh ka kynhun hapoh ka jingialam u ma Starlight Talang kaba la mih ruh ha ki katto katne ki lad pathai khubor ba ka don ka jingshah beh bad tait shnong bad ka jingpynduh ruh ia ka hok jong ki 66 tylli ki longing kiba ialeh pyrshah ia ka bor shnong.“La pharep ia ngi, da katei ka kynhun ba ngi la rai ban pynduh khaw rashon, lum jingtep, lum thangbriew bad kumjuh ruh ban trei bylla 100 sngi tang namar ba ki katto katne ki nongialam katei ka kynhun u ma Talang ka kwah ban kamai spah na ka kam sam Rashon bad kane ka kynrum kynram ka la jia la shisnem mynta” ong ka khubor.Ka la sdang hadien ba ka la don ka jingbym ioh sam khaw rashon da kawei ka longing kaba kwah ia katei ka kam treimon sngewbha. Hadien ba katei ka longing kam shym la ioh ia katei ka kam sam reshon ka la mih ka kynrum kynram haduh ba kane ka kynrum kynram ka la poi sha ophis jongka Amlarem Sub-Disvision.Na ka liang ka tnad Supply jong ka Amlarem Sub-Division ka la shim ruh ia ka rai ba baroh 120 iing ki nongioh bynta khaw rashon ki dei ban wan shim beit na ka RM Mukhim, kaba dei ka nongdie lang ha Amlarem.Kane ka la iaid shisnem bad ki don ruh ki longing ki bym lah ban wan shim hi,hynrei ki la jied ia la u briew jong ki ban leit shim bad ban sam pat ia ki ha shnong.Halor kane ka kynrum kynram na ka liang ka dorbar Shnong ka la trei shitom ban pynbeit na ka por sha ka por, la ong u Secretary Shnong haba pynshai sha ka kynhun tohkit kiba la hiar mynta ka sngi sha katei ka shnong.Katei ka kynhun tohkit ka kynthup ia ka Magistor, kong A Kharpuri, u bah Mairom, SDPO, Amlarem bad u BDO ka Amlarem u ma B Sungoh.Na ka liang kitei ki nongtohkit kin sa phah ia ka kaiphod sha ka SDO, SP bad DC ka West Jaintia Hill.“Ngi la shimkhia bha ia kane ka jingkynnoh bad ngi la maham ruh ia ka bor shnong lada ka don kum katei ka jingthmu ban tait shnong ia ki nongsong shnong bad lada katei ka jingkynnoh ka long kaba shisha ngin kem ia ki hapoh ki kyndon ain khnang ba kin ioh ia ka jingpynsaja katkum ki kam ba ki leh”, la ong u SDPO ka Amlarem Sub-Division.
title: “Ngim shym tait shnong ne  pynduh ia ka hok jong ki”

content: Nongpoh, 18 Iaiong:Hadien ka jingjurip kaba la long mynta ka sngi bad lap ruh ba ka VNR Infrastructure Ltd, ka la shu pyntrei khlem da ioh jingbit na ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ban pyntrei ia ka Steshon Rel kaba don ha shnong Ronghona; na ka liang ka Khasi Student Union, ka la rai ban buh beit ia ka jingpyrshah ba halor kane ka jingpyntrei ia ka lynti Rel ha Ri Bhoi.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor, na ka liang u samla Ferdynald Kharkamni, President ka KSU, North Khasi Hills District, u la ong ba ka KSU hi kan iai buh beit ia ka jingpyrshah halor ka lynti rel sha Ri Bhoi, katba ka sorkar kam pat pyntreikam ia ki kyndon ain kiban the pyrkhing halor ka rung ka mih ki mynder.“Kumba ngi lap ha kane ka jingjurip, la shem ka sorkar kam pyntreikam satia ia kata ka Interstate Migration Workmen Act, namar kaei kaba ngi lap ka long ba ki briew nabar ki ioh ban wanrung laitluid ban wantrei sha kane ka jylla wat haba kim don ia ki kot ki sla, katba ka sorkar kam pyntreikam ia ki ain ba ka la dep shna ban teh pyrkhing ia ki bar jylla” la bynrap u samla F. Kharkamni.Ka seng ka dap ruh da ka jinglyngoh kaba khraw ban tip ba ka sorkar jylla, kam shem la suidniew ia ka District Council, namar ia kane la sakhi ruh hadien ba la pyntrei ia kane ka Steshon Rel, khlem da kynjoh ktien wat ia ka District Council kaba dei ruh kaba peit halor ki kam khyndew kam shyiap, u la bynrap.
title: Pynrem ka KSU ba lyndet ia ka KHADC

content: Shillong, 18 ïaiong:Ha ka 15 tarik u jylliew mynta u snem yn sdang rakhe ia ka jingdap 150 snem ka jaka pyntbit ia ki nonghikai kaba don ha Nongsawlia ka Cherra Teacher’s Training Centre-Sohra bad ia katei ka jingrakhe yn pynkut ha ka 17 tarik u risaw mynta u snem.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor mynta ka sngi ka Principal jong katei ka jaka ai jinghikai ka kong M.B Khongwir, ka la pynsngew ia ka jingsdang ban seng ia katei ka jaka pyntbit da ki mishoneri na ri Sepngi bad kumno ka la iaid lynti haduh ba ka long kumba ka long mynta ha ka jingshakri jong ka kaba 150 snem.Ka kong Khongwir ka la iathuh ba ka CTTC ka dei ka shlem jong ka KJP Assembly kaba la sdang da ki Mishoneri jong ka Welsh Mission ha u snem 1842 lyngba ka jingmait phang bad ka jingprat lynti jong u Thomas Jones -I uba la wan iuhkjat ha Sohra ha ka 22 tarik u jylliew, 1841. Ka la iathuh ba ka jingsdang ban seng ia katei ka jaka hikai ka dei hadien ba la nangroi ki skul bad nangbun ki khynnah skul ha kane ka ri Lum Khasi -Jaintia hadien ka jingsdang ki sahep ban seng ia lai tylli ki skul kata ha Mawsmai,Mawmluh bad ha Nongsawlia, kumta ka la ong ba ki sahep ki la i donkam ban thaw noh sa ia ka jaka pyntbit ia ki nonghikai ba kin ai ka jinghikai kaba paka ia ki khynnah skul. Kumta ka la ong ba la plie noh ia ka Normal Training School ia ki nonghikai bad ha kaba sdang ki la don katto katne ngut ki nonghikai kiba shah hikai bad kitei ki pyntbit ialade ha katei ka jaka bad la ju phah ruh ba kin leit ai jinghikai ha kajuh ka por ryngkat bad ka shah pyntbit artad hangtei. Ha u snem 1864 ka la ong ba ka sorkar Assam ha katei ka por ka la sngew donkam ban phah pyntbit ia ki nonghikai skul sorkar bad ka la pan jaka ban bsuh lang ia ki nonghikai sorkar ruh hangtei bad la ai jaka da ka KJP.U Principal ba nyngkong eh jong katei ka jaka hikai u dei u Rev.E.W Thomas ( shuwa jong u ki dei ki Superintendent). Hadien jong u la wan ban shimti ia ka kam Principal da u Tbn. W.Knight Sohlang uba dei ruh uba nyngkong eh na ki trai ri ban long kum u Principal ha katei ka jaka pule-u la shimti ha u snem 1953 bad hadien jong u la wan sa ka kong Almora Lyngdoh ha u snem 1999 bad ha u snem 2012 ka la shimti noh sa ka kong M.B Khongwir kaba dang bteng ia katei ka kam haduh mynta ruh. Ka kong Khongwir ka la iathuh ba kumba ka long mynta katei ka jaka hikai ka don 6 ngut ki nonghikai, 6 ngut ki nongtrei ( bym dei nonghikai) bad ma ka-ka Principal bad ki don 100 ngut ki nonghikai ba dang sha pyntbit mynta. Ka la iathuh ruh ba ka iatei ka jingthmu ban rakhe la lah ban leh ryngkat ka jingiasnohkti lang ki nonghikai kiba la dep shah pyntbit ha katei ka jaka.Ha katei ka jingiakren bad ki nongthohkhubor la donlang u Rev.R Bareh u dkhot ka Managing Committee, u Pa’iem Kynsai .N Syiem u nonghikai ba la dep shah pyntbit ha katei ka jaka (uba dei ruh mynta u Syiem ka Hima Bhowal) bad u bah S.Khongsngi. U Pa’iem Kynsai u la ong ba la pyrshang ban lum ban lang ia baroh ki nonghikai ba la dep shah pyntbit ha CTTC ban pyrkhat kumno ban ia snohkti lang ban pyntyllun ia ki kam kiba ia dei bad ka rakhe 150 snem bad kumno ba nwad lad ban ioh jingiarap pisa. U la iathuh ba la don ka jingialang kaba ki la lah ban jied ia ki nongkitkam jong katei ka kynhun ne ki Alumni bad ha ka 22 tarik ïaiong kan don ka jingialang jong ki ha Dinam Hall ha ka por 11 baje mynstep bad la kyrpad ia baroh ki nonghikai ba la lait na CTTC ban ia poi lang ban pyrkhat ia katei ka kam naba ka jinglut ka long kaba la heh kaba la antad ba kan poi kumba T.20 lak eiei.
title: Yn rakhe 150 snem, ka jaka  pyntbit nonghikai ha Nongsawlia

Kharkamni.Ka seng ka dap ruh da ka jinglyngoh kaba khraw ban tip ba ka sorkar jylla, kam shem la suidniew ia ka District Council, namar ia kane la sakhi ruh hadien ba la pyntrei ia kane ka Steshon Rel, khlem da kynjoh ktien wat ia ka District Council kaba dei ruh kaba peit halor ki kam khyndew kam shyiap, u la bynrap.
title: Pynrem ka KSU ba lyndet ia ka KHADC

content: Shillong, 18 ïaiong:Ha ka 15 tarik u jylliew mynta u snem yn sdang rakhe ia ka jingdap 150 snem ka jaka pyntbit ia ki nonghikai kaba don ha Nongsawlia ka Cherra Teacher’s Training Centre-Sohra bad ia katei ka jingrakhe yn pynkut ha ka 17 tarik u risaw mynta u snem.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor mynta ka sngi ka Principal jong katei ka jaka ai jinghikai ka kong M.B Khongwir, ka la pynsngew ia ka jingsdang ban seng ia katei ka jaka pyntbit da ki mishoneri na ri Sepngi bad kumno ka la iaid lynti haduh ba ka long kumba ka long mynta ha ka jingshakri jong ka kaba 150 snem.Ka kong Khongwir ka la iathuh ba ka CTTC ka dei ka shlem jong ka KJP Assembly kaba la sdang da ki Mishoneri jong ka Welsh Mission ha u snem 1842 lyngba ka jingmait phang bad ka jingprat lynti jong u Thomas Jones -I uba la wan iuhkjat ha Sohra ha ka 22 tarik u jylliew, 1841. Ka la iathuh ba ka jingsdang ban seng ia katei ka jaka hikai ka dei hadien ba la nangroi ki skul bad nangbun ki khynnah skul ha kane ka ri Lum Khasi -Jaintia hadien ka jingsdang ki sahep ban seng ia lai tylli ki skul kata ha Mawsmai,Mawmluh bad ha Nongsawlia, kumta ka la ong ba ki sahep ki la i donkam ban thaw noh sa ia ka jaka pyntbit ia ki nonghikai ba kin ai ka jinghikai kaba paka ia ki khynnah skul. Kumta ka la ong ba la plie noh ia ka Normal Training School ia ki nonghikai bad ha kaba sdang ki la don katto katne ngut ki nonghikai kiba shah hikai bad kitei ki pyntbit ialade ha katei ka jaka bad la ju phah ruh ba kin leit ai jinghikai ha kajuh ka por ryngkat bad ka shah pyntbit artad hangtei.
