Ha u snem 1864 ka la ong ba ka sorkar Assam ha katei ka por ka la sngew donkam ban phah pyntbit ia ki nonghikai skul sorkar bad ka la pan jaka ban bsuh lang ia ki nonghikai sorkar ruh hangtei bad la ai jaka da ka KJP.U Principal ba nyngkong eh jong katei ka jaka hikai u dei u Rev.E.W Thomas ( shuwa jong u ki dei ki Superintendent). Hadien jong u la wan ban shimti ia ka kam Principal da u Tbn. W.Knight Sohlang uba dei ruh uba nyngkong eh na ki trai ri ban long kum u Principal ha katei ka jaka pule-u la shimti ha u snem 1953 bad hadien jong u la wan sa ka kong Almora Lyngdoh ha u snem 1999 bad ha u snem 2012 ka la shimti noh sa ka kong M.B Khongwir kaba dang bteng ia katei ka kam haduh mynta ruh. Ka kong Khongwir ka la iathuh ba kumba ka long mynta katei ka jaka hikai ka don 6 ngut ki nonghikai, 6 ngut ki nongtrei ( bym dei nonghikai) bad ma ka-ka Principal bad ki don 100 ngut ki nonghikai ba dang sha pyntbit mynta. Ka la iathuh ruh ba ka iatei ka jingthmu ban rakhe la lah ban leh ryngkat ka jingiasnohkti lang ki nonghikai kiba la dep shah pyntbit ha katei ka jaka.Ha katei ka jingiakren bad ki nongthohkhubor la donlang u Rev.R Bareh u dkhot ka Managing Committee, u Pa’iem Kynsai .N Syiem u nonghikai ba la dep shah pyntbit ha katei ka jaka (uba dei ruh mynta u Syiem ka Hima Bhowal) bad u bah S.Khongsngi. U Pa’iem Kynsai u la ong ba la pyrshang ban lum ban lang ia baroh ki nonghikai ba la dep shah pyntbit ha CTTC ban pyrkhat kumno ban ia snohkti lang ban pyntyllun ia ki kam kiba ia dei bad ka rakhe 150 snem bad kumno ba nwad lad ban ioh jingiarap pisa. U la iathuh ba la don ka jingialang kaba ki la lah ban jied ia ki nongkitkam jong katei ka kynhun ne ki Alumni bad ha ka 22 tarik ïaiong kan don ka jingialang jong ki ha Dinam Hall ha ka por 11 baje mynstep bad la kyrpad ia baroh ki nonghikai ba la lait na CTTC ban ia poi lang ban pyrkhat ia katei ka kam naba ka jinglut ka long kaba la heh kaba la antad ba kan poi kumba T.20 lak eiei.
title: Yn rakhe 150 snem, ka jaka  pyntbit nonghikai ha Nongsawlia

content: Shillong, 18 Ïaïong:Wat lada ka dang don ka jingartatien ha kiba bun ha kaba ïadei bad ka jingsumar jong ka H. Gordon Roberts Hospital, Jaïaw, hynrei ha ka jingwad bniah ki katto katne ki nongthoh khubor, la shem ba da ka jingwan ïatrei bad ïarap lang ki Doktor (Visiting Doctors) ba la kham tbit, kane ka Hospital ka la sdang ban wan biang sha ka jingsumar kumba long ha ki snem baladep.Katto katne ki Doktor kiba la don mynta ki kynthup ïa u Dr. R. Nongrum, uba bat kum u Medical Superintendent, uba long u Surgeon ne u Doktor puid briew ba tbit naduh ba u dang trei ha Civil Hospital Shillong. Ryngkat une u Doktor u don ruh kiwei pat ki Doktor bat bit ha ka Surgery kum u Dr. K. Khyllep, Dr. P. Lamare, u Dr. I. Nongbri, Dr. I. Syiemlieh, Dr. Lurstep Wanshnong bad kiwei kiwei.Ha ka liang ka General Medicine u don u Dr. DS Sethi, uba tbit ruh ha ka liang ki jingpang shadem (Cardiologist).Ki longkmie kiba kwah ban leit kha khunlung ruh kim dei ban don ka jingsheptieng, namar ki don ki Doktor kiba tbit ha kam kha khunlung (Obstetric) kum u Dr. W. Wankhar, Dr. R. Sunn, Dr. K. Ropmay, Dr E. Blah bad kiwei kiwei.Ha ka liang ka Orthopedic ne ka jingpang kaba ïadei bad ki shyieng, don u Dr. D. Phanbuh, Dr. H. Rapsang bad kiwwei kiwei de ki Doktor.Ha ka Radiology Department u don u Dr. B.K. Sonowal nangta u don ruh u Neurologist ne u Doktor ba peit ïa ka jingpang ba ktah ïa ka khlieh, uba ju wan ïarap u Dr. AJ Sarmah. Ha ka Pathology bad Microbiology u don u Dr. Nirmal Tudu bad Dr. Raphael Lyngdoh. Ha ka tnad ba peit ïa ka jingsumar ia ki khunlung (Pediatric) I don u Dr. Ibakordorshisha Sun bad lai ngut kiwei pat ki Doktor ba ïarap ïa i. Katba ha ka department jong ka psychiatrist bad counseling u don u Dr. Eddie Mukhim.Kane ka jingwad jingtip ki nongthoh khubor ka lap ruh ba ka Blood Bank ka treikam bha, ka Dialysis Unit, ka ICU ruh kumjuh. Ka Emegency, ka OT Department ki treikam baroh 24 kynta. Ki kor ki bor kiba treikam ki long ka X-Ray, ka CT Scan.Wat lada ka Hospital ka don hapdeng ka jingduna pisa, hynrei ki dawai dashin kiba ki paidbah ki kham donkam ki don ka Pharmacy jong ka Hospital, lait noh ki dawai kiba ki briew kim ju kham wad ne ki dawai kiba ki briew kiba ym ju kham ïoh ïa ki jingpang.La lap ruh ba rukom sumar ka la ïaid bha, ha kaba ki Nurse bad kiwei kiwei de ki nongtrei jong ka Hospital ki ïatreilang bad ki bor pynïaid ka Hospital, wat lada mynta ki dang don hapdeng ka jingeh ïa ka tulop jong ki. La ïohi ruh ba ki paidbah ki la sdang ban wan shah sumar biang ha kane ka Hospital kaba la shakri mynta la kumba 95 snem ha kane ka jylla.Balei Kim buh doctor lajong katka multispeciality
title: Wan ïarap ki Doktor ba  tbit, ha Robert Hospital

content: Shillong, 05 Iaiong:Ka BJYM Megha-laya ka la dawa na u Chief Secretary ka jylla u KS Kropha ba ka sorkar ka dei ban thaw ia ka kynhun jurip eriong na ka bynta ban pynthikna ba ki briew kiba iakynduh ia kane ka jingeh kin ioh ia ka jingiarap khlem shah ieh ha ka sorkar.Ha ka jingthoh ba la phah sha u Kropha mynta ka sngi, u President ka BJYM u Bah Egenstar Kurkalang u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban thaw ia ka kynhun, khnang ban pynsted ia ka jingshim jingdiah ia ka jingjulor jong ki mar rep, ki iing ki sem jong ki briew. Ym katta, ka sorkar ka dei ban pynsted ruh ia ka jingai jingiarap katkum ka jinglut jingsep jongki, ym ban shu ai baishun.“Na ka bynta ban pynsted ia ka kam, ka sorkar ka dei ban thaw da ka kynhun jurip halor ka jingjia eriong ha ka jylla ha kine ki sngi”, la ong u Bah Kuralang.
title: Dawa jurip eriong ka BJYM na u CS

content: Shillong, 05 Iaiong:Ka jingialang jong ka North Eastern Council (NEC) ha Secretariat, Shillong ka la iakren ia ka plan jong ki kam pynroi ha ka dong mihngi ka Draft Regional Plan ryngkat ba ki heh jong ki tnad sorkar pdeng bapher bapher kiba don ha kane ka dong mihngi.Ki tnad sorkar pdeng kum ka ICAR, Health, Airport Authority of India, NESAC, UGC, Power, MSME, Sports Authority of India bad kiwei ki iashim bynta ha kane ka jingialang na ka bynta ka roi ka par jong ka thain.U C.K. Das u dkhot ka NEC uba pyniaid ia ka jingialang u la ban jur na ka bynta ban pynlong ia ka thain kaba roi lyngba ka jingiashim bynta bad pyntreikam ia ki skhim bapher bapher ka sorkar India.U la ban jur ia ka jingiakren kaban long khah khah bad ban iakynduh ban bishar bad peit ia ka jingiaid jong ki kam.U Ram Muivah u Secretary ka NEC u la pdiang sngewbha ia baroh kiba wan iashim bynta ha kane ka jingialang.
title: Iatai ka NEC ia ka plan  ka thain

content: Shillong, 5 ïaïong:Ka ophis jong ka Shillong Contonment Board mynta ka sngi ka la kyndang naphang ïa ki ïing kiba la shna be-aiñ, ha ki jaka ba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka, kitei ki ïing ba la shna be-aiñ ki dei kiba don ha jan ka Anjalee cinema hall bad kiba dang hap hapoh ka South Shillong constituency.Ka jingpynpra ia kitei ki ïing kala sdang naduh ka por 8 baje mynstep bad da ki spah tylli ki ïing kiba don ha katei ka jaka ki la shah pynpra, na ka liang ki briew kiba sah be-aiñ ha katei ka jaka ki la kynnoh ba ka SCB ka la shu leh donbor bad pynpra ia kitei ki ïing khlem ka jingpyntip shwa ne ai por ban mih, hynrei kat kum ka jingioh jingtip la ong ba na ka liang ka SCB ka lah dep ban ai por ia ki ban mih noh na katei ka jaka mynta la palat 2 bnai hynrei kim shym la kohnguh satia bad la ïoh jingtip ruh ba dang hynnin ka sngi ka kynhun jong ki briew ba sah ha katei ka jaka ki la leit ban mudui sha ka Iingkashari, hynrei na ka liang ka Ingbishar kala kyntait ban ai ia ka stay order ne ban phah pynsangeh ia katei ka rai jong ka SCB.Kine ki briew kiba kam ba ki dei kiba la shong la sah da ki 50 haduh 60 snem ha katei ka jaka ki la kynnoh ba ka jingpynpra jong kaContonment ïa ki ïing kiba don ha katei ka jaka ka long ka ba la shu leh shiliang namar ki kynnoh ba ïa ki ïing bad ki kudam jong ki mahajon kim shym la ktah satia, hynrei ha ba ïakren bad ki bor jong ka SCB ki la ïathuh ba ki ïing ki bym shym la pynpra kidei kiba la siew ïa ka bai wai ryngkat ka jingïasoi soskular bad ka SCB.Haba pyrshang ban ïakren bad u Chief Executive Officer ka SCB ki nong thoh khubor kim shym la ïoh lad satia namar ba u CEO um don ha ka ophis treikam jong u.
title: Shah pynpra spah tylli ki ïing,  ba shna ha jaka Cantonment

content: Shillong, 5 Iaiong:Ki pulit ki la ioh jingujor na ka kong Hidis Dkhar , 45 snem karta ba ha ka miet 4 tarik mynta u bnai ki runar ki la pyniap ia u lok jong ka uba la tip kyrteng kum u Dabiang Suchiang, 50 snem karta ha ka jaka ba la tip kum ka Umkunok kaba don ha ka shnong Barato.
title: Shah pyniap u rangbah ha Barato

content: Nongpoh, 05 Iaiong:Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawtnum kaba don ha Ri Bhoi, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia bad pynrem jur halor ka jingdon jong ki katto katne ngut ki riew khwan myntoi shimet kiba dei na ka shnong Mawtnum hi bad kiba la nud ban leit thok ia ki briew da kaba kam ialade kum ki Rangbah Shnong bad Secretary Shnong.Katkum ka kyrwoh ia kaba la phah da u Bah N.L Maring bad u Bah L.P Makri, kiba long kum ki Rangbah shnong bad Secretary shnong, la ong ba kitei ki briew kiba mlien ban leh ia katei ka kam thok kam shukor, ki kynthup ia arngut ki rangbah ia kaba la tip kyrteng kum u Bah Robinson Makri bad u Bah Donkupar Ranee, katba kawei ka longkmie la tip kum ka Kong Phlestimai Syiem.Shuh shuh, ka kyrwoh ka la ong ruh, ba kitei ki 3 ngut ki ju mlien ban leit shim pisa ram bad buh bynda da ki dulir ne pata ba shu shna thok bad haba iadei bad kane ka kam thok jong ki, da ki phew ngut ki briew kila ngat ha kane ka apot bad shah thok ha kitei ki 3 ngut.Ym tang katta, hynrei kitei ki 3 ngut kila shna ruh ia ka seal jong u Rangbah Shnong bad Secretary Shnong bad ki da pyndonkam ruh ia ka muhor ka Dorbar Shnong bad ki non judicial stamp ban thoh ia ki kot ki sla naka bynta ban kamai spah jubor, ha kaba kane ka la paw pyrthei ka dei ruh hadien ka jingwanmih da kito kiba ai pisa ram sha ka shnong ban dawa katkum ka soskular buh bynda, namar ba kitei ki 3 ngut kim leit mih shuh ban leit siew iaka pisa.Kumta haba iadei bad katei ka kam lehthok leh shukor da kitei ki 3 ngut, kum ka Dorbar Shnong ka kyndit bad dap da ka jingsngewlyngngoh, ban tip ia katei ka kam beain ia kaba la leh da kitei ki 3 ngut.Haba mih kiba kum kine ki jingjia, ka Dorbar Shnong hi ka pynrem jur ia kitei ki riew thok, namar tang namar ka jingshimkabu da ki 3 ngut, ka la ktah pat ia ka burom ka ijot jong ka shnong ka thaw hi baroh kawei.Ka Dorbar Shnong Mawtnum, ka pynpaw ruh ia ka jing sngewlyngngoh ba kumno kito kiba ai pisa ram, ki shu ai beit ia ka pisa khlem da wan mih bad pynshisha da ka Dorbar Shnong, namar kum ka shnong ruh ka shem jingeh ban pynbeit, namar khlem ka jingtip naduh ba sdang bad ka jingbym don ki sakhi satar.Namarkata, ka Dorbar Shnong Mawtnum ka buh ka jingkyrpad ia kiwei pat ba kin long kiba husiar ban ai pisa kulmar ia kano kano ka jingbuh bynda ne shim ram khlem da wan mih bad pynshisha da ka Dorbar Shnong, khnang ba kin lait na ka apot shah thok bad ha kajuh ka por ka Dorbar Shnong ka maham ruh ia kitei ki 3 ngut, ba kim dei shuh ban dang mlien ia kitei ki kam thok kam shukor bad lada ka Shnong ka dang lap kan sa leh da kaba tyngeh bad aiti sha ki bor jong ka ain ban leh ia kaba donkam, pynkut ka kyrwoh na ka Dorbar Shnong Mawtnum.
title: Pynrem ka Mawtnum ia kiba kam nongialam shnong

content: Nongstoiñ, 5 Iaiong:Hadien bala ioh ia ka jingtip kaba thikna halor ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba ju ai jingiarap ia ka kynhun kieng atiar na ri lum Garo kaba la tip kum ka Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA), ki pulit ka Shallang kila pynlong ia ka jingwad bniah ban lap ksai ia kitei ki briew kiba don kti ban ai jingiarap ia katei ka kynhun kieng atiar ha kiba bun ki liang.Shuh shuh katkum ka tyllong khubor na ki heh pulit ka West Khasi Hills la ong ba ki pulit jong ka Shallang hadien ba kila suba jur ia u wei u briew u bala tip kyrteng kum u Daniel M Sangma 32 snem ka arta na ka shnong Rongkhugre kaba hap hapoh ka Shallang Police Station, mynta ka sngi ki la leit ruh ban pynlong ia ka jingkhynra ia ka iing sah jong utei u briew.Ha katei ka jingleit khynra ki pulit ka Shallang na ka iing sah jong u tei u briew ki la ioh ruh ban kurup ia shibun ki tiar siat ba kynthup ia kawei ka pistol 7.65 mm ar tylli ki kuli AK 47 ki bym Pat bthei, 5 tylli ki shithi dawa Pisa ha ka kyrteng jong ka GNLA, kawei ka 7.65 mm pistol magazine, kawei bad kawei ka Panasonic smart phone.Ki pulit ka Shallang kila kem noh ia u tei u briew halor ka jingdonkti ka jong u ban ai jingiarap ia katei ka seng kiengbatiar bad ruh halor ka jingiarap ban pynbuh rieh ia kitei ki tiar siat bala ioh kurup da ki pulit ha ryngkat ka jingsakhi lang ruh da ki Independent witnesses.
title: Talasi ki pulit Shallang ia  ka iing u nong iarap ka GNLA

content: Shillong, 05 Iaiong:Ki kontraktor ba trei ia ki kam ha ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher ki sngew syllang bha ha ka rukom pynlait bill ka sorkar kum ka PWD bad kiwei ki tnad, namar ba ka jinglut bad ka jingioh bill kam iahap shuh.U nongthoh u la ioh ban iakren bad ki katto katne ki kontraktor, kiba la pynpaw ba bunsien ka jingtrei jongki, lada kan long T. 5 lak, ynda la ioh pisa ka long tang T. 50 hajar eiei.Ha une u snem mynta, kim pat sngew thikna ruh ia ka rukom pynlait pisa ia kaba rim, namar ba don kiba pynlait bad kiba bun kim ioh bill.Hynrei kawei kaba sngew ngiah ia ki kontraktor ka long namar ba ha kine ki sngi, la kynnoh, ba bun ki kontraktor kiba donkti wat ki ophisar sorkar, da kaba rejister ia kiba haiing hasem kum ki kontraktor bad ki briew jong ki politishian kiba ioh bill thik thik katba ia kiwei ki bym don jingiadei, ka bill ka eh ban lait.Katkum ka jingtip, la kynnoh ba ki kontraktor kiba la trei ia ka kam kontraktor bun phew snem, ki la shah kyntait watla ki dei hok bad ki lah ban trei ia kam hynrei kito kiba dang shu wan mih tang namar ba dei ki briew jong ki politishian bad kiba don jingiadei bad ki ophisar, ki ioh kam watla kim don ka jingtbit ban shna ne leh ia ka kam.“Don ki ophisar, enjiniar kiba trei ia kam kontrak da kaba rejister ia ka kyrteng jong kiba haiing hasem”, la ong ki kontraktor.La kynnoh ba kane ka jingleh politik bad ka jingshim kabu, la kynnoh, ba ka dei kawei ka daw, kaba la pynlong ia ki jingtrei ban torti namar ba bun kim tieng lada shah ujor ruh namar ba ki la don ki boss ban iada ia ki.
title: Ka pisa kaba T.5lak, siew ka  PWD T.50hajar ia ki kontraktor

content: Shillong, 5 Iaiong:Namar ka jingpynkhreh u MDC ka Mawshynrut u bah Morningstar Mawsor ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 pyrshah ia la u hynmen ar kmie u bah Witting Mawsor uba de u MLA ba mynta ka HSPDP na Mawshynrut, ki bahaing hasem jong kitei ki ar ngut ki la kren pynsngewthuh ia u bah Morning ba um pat dei ban kyrkieh, hynrei u dei ban shong shuwa namar ba kam long kaba itynnad ban ia khun pyrshah shi para bad shiing shisem hynrei u bah Mornng Mawsor um treh ban kynran dien bad u la iaid shakhmat ban ia khun beit ha u 2018.“La bunsien la pynlong ia ka jingiakren sngewthuh hynrei um sngap, u la rai beit ban iaid shakhmat, ka kur ruh ka la kren ba ym dei ban ia leh pyrshah shi ing shisem hynrei um sngap, ki kur baroh kim suk ia katei ka rai jong u” ong u bah Witting Mawsor haba ia kren bad u Rupang.U bah Witting u la ong biang “Nga la iarap ban pynjop ia u, nga don ka jingshaniah kum u hynmen -para lajong ba ngin ia treilang hynrei ngan ong kumno shuh ka dei ka jingsngewthuh shimet jong u hi”. U la bteng biang da kaba ong “Baroh ki iohi bad ki tip ia kata ba dei ma nga uba leit shaw ia u na ïng ban pynieng ha ka MDC elekshon hynrei ia ka mon laitluid pat jong u briew ym lah ban bat”.Haba la kylli hato ka jingmih jong u bah Morning kan ktah ne-em ia ki vote jong u bad ki vote jong ka HSPDP, “Ki don tang wei- ar ngut kiba bud ia u hynrei kiba bun ki don sha nga, kam da don than eh ka jingktah ia nga” u la jubab.Ka Mawshynrut konstitwensi ka dei ka konstitwensi kaba ju mih bun bha ki kyrtong ha ki elekshon, la kylli na u bah Witting katno ngut eiei ki kyrtong ki ban mih ha u 2018. U la iathuh ba kumba long mynta kiba la iaid shakhmat dei ka seng Congress, ka UDP, ka NPP ka HSPDP ( ma -u) bad u bah Morning Mawsor.
title: Ka kur ruh kam suk ban iakhun  shi para, ong u bah Witting

content: Shillong, 5 Iaiong:Kham mynshuwa ka sorkar ka la pynbna ba kan plie noh ia Mawshynrut Civil Sub-Division bad ka Mawlai C&RD Block ha u iaiong mynta u snem, u MLA ka HSPDP na Mawshynrut konstitwensi u bah Witting Mawsor u la ong ba u la ia kren bad ka sorkar hynrei ka la ong ba kam pat buh tarik “Nga dang shu phone ia u Dr.Mukul u ong ba um pat buh tarik” ong u bah Witting.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ki paidbah katei ka thaiñ ki la angnud ban plie noh ia ka Civil Sub-Division, hynrei ka jingpynslem ka sorkar ka la pynartatien pynban ia u. U la ong ba kiwei pat ki jaka ki bym don kyrteng ha ka jingkren mang tyngka jong u myntri rangbah kum ka Ranikor Administrative Unit, ka Sohiong C&RD Block, ka Chokpot la plie la ka plie kumto katba ka Mawshynrut bad ka Mawlai pat kaba la don hapoh ka thup kyrteng ym pat shym la pyndep haduh mynta ruh kaba la dap shisnem.“Nga i artatien pynban ba ka Ranikor, ka Chokpot , ka Sohiong ka bym don kyrteng ha ka jingkren mang tyngka (Budget Speech) hynrei la leh la ka leh, hynrei ma ngi pat ki ba la don kyrteng ym pat shym la leh haduh mynta ruh. Baroh la pyndep lut sa tang ka jong nga bad ka jong u bah Embhah” ong u bah Witting uba la kdew ba ha konstitwensi jong u ki don ar tylli ki ba ka sorkar ka la pynbna ban plie kata ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub-Division bad ka Riangdo Police Station hynrei kawei ruh ym pat pyndep satia.Ha kawei pat ka khubor u la iathuh ba mynta u don hapoh konstitwensi ban leit sha ki shnong bapher bapher ban ai jingiarap da ki tin soping namar ka jingshah pynjulor kiba bun tylli ki ing ha ka jinghap phria ha kine ki ar sngi. U la iathuh ba ki don da ki spah tylli ki ing ha ki shnong bapher bapher hapoh Mawshynrut konstitwensi, “Ka jinghap phria kaba jur bha, ka jingrben u phria ha madan ka long haduh shi pruh, ngam pat ioh jingtip ban don kano kano ka jingmynsaw hynrei ka rep ka riang ka la julor bha -bun ki riew hadem kiwei pat ki jingthung ki dang shu thylleng ban mih soh hynrei ki la julor lut, ngim pat ioh ban shim jingkhein lut katno ka jingjulor” u la ong.
title: “Ka Sohiong, Chokpot, Ranikor  kam don ha ka mang tyngka”

content: Shillong, 06 Iaiong:Ki lawadong ki law kyntang, ki law shnong, law raid, law syiem, ki dei ki jingstad jong u Khasi hyndai ban pynneh pynsah ban iada ia ka mariang kaba ka pyrthei mynta ka la kyndit bad sdang ban ialeh ban pynneh bad iada ia ki khlaw.U Prof BK Tiwari u la ong baroh ki kynbat dawai la ioh na ka khlaw na btap bad khlem ki khlaw ki btap, yn nym ioh kynbat dawai. U la ong ba ha ri Khasi, ym dei tang ka Law Kyntang Mawphlang hynrei da ki spah tylli ki law kyntang ki don ha kylleng ka ri Khasi kiba la pynneh pynsah da ki longshwa manshwa.U Prof Tiwari u la kren ha ka jingiakynduh lang ki nongsumar Khasi ba la khot da ka Synjuk Ki Hima Arliang Wah Umiam Mawphlang Welfare Society, Mawphlang lyngba ka Tambourine Trust bad da ka jingiatreilang bad ka Rilum Foundation, Smit hynne ka sngi ha NEHU Guest House, Shillong.Kumba 50 ngut ki nongsumar kynbat na ki thaiñ Sohra, Mawphlang, Lyniong bad na kiwei ki jaka ki la wan ban iashim bynta ha kane ka jingialang ban iakren kumno ban pynkham janai ia ka rukom sumar Khasi.Katkum ka jingong u Prof Tiwari, Lada jah ki law adong, law kyntang, law raid, law shnong, law syiem, yn nym ioh kynbat dawai shuh bad hangta kan long ka jingeh ia ki nongsain dawai kynbat bad khamtam ia u bynriew.Ki law adong, ki law kyntang ki long kum ki ing jong ki kynbat dawai, ki dieng ki siej, ki syntiew ki skud ban pynneh pynsah ia ka mariang.Ban nym jah noh ka sap sumar paka jong ki Khasi, u Prof Tiwari, u la kyntu ia ki nongsumar Khasi ba kin sngewbha ban nym buhrieh ia ka sap hynrei ki dei ban iasam pateng ha kiwei khnang ba ynda la ki la leit na kane ka pyrthei kiwei kin lah ban pyndonkam.Bun na ki rukom sumar Khasi, la shu batai da ka ktien bad lada ym iasam ha kiwei ki pateng, kan jah noh kata ka rukom sumar shisien ba ka la khlad noh u ne ka nongsumar.U la ong ba ha ka jingshisha, wat ka rukom pyndonkam ia ki kynbat dawai ruh kan jah noh lada ki briew kim tip ia ka jingdonkam ne ban pyndonkam ia uta u kynbat tang namar ba kim ioh ia ka jingtip.Ka por kam dei shuh ban leh maphot ia ka mariang ne ki kynbat dawai hynrei ban nang ban pyndonkam ia ki khnang ba kin nym duh jait na kane ka sla khyndew namar ba ki la don ki kynbat dawai kiba la eh ban shem wat ha kane ka ri Khasi namar ka jingleh maphot palat ki briew khlem tyngkai ia ka lawei.Katba u Prof. Don Syiem u la pynshai kham bha halor ka jingdonkam ban da buh jingthoh ban shondur ruh ia ki jait kynbat kiba ki pyndonkam.Na ka liang jongka NEHU ka kwah bad ka kloi ban iarap ban pynithuh ia ki kyrteng jong ki Kynbat, bad ban pynioh ia ka jinglong trai jong ngi halor kito ki jait kynbat bad jingkhleh ba ngi pyndonkam. Ym tang katta, ki kloi ruh iarap ban pynphriang ia kane ka kam kum ka Health Tourism.Katba u Bah Tambor Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingthmu ka jingiakynduh lang ki nongsumar Khasi ka dei namar ban pynlong ia ki nongsumar ban pyntbit ban iamir jingmut shuh shuh kumno ban pynbha ia ka rukom sumar Khasi. U la ong ba ka donkam ban don ka jingiatreilang hapdeng jong ki nongsumar Khasi khnang ba ka jingpang kaba kiwei kim lah, ki lah ban phah sha kiwei pat da kaba iatreilang.Na ka liang jong ki nongsumar Khasi ki iathuh ba da ka jingjulor bad ka jingnang syllen jong ki khlaw ka la wanrah ia ka jingduh jait bad jah noh ki kynbat dawai kiba lah shisha ban pynloit ia ki ba donkam. Lada lah jah ka khlaw kine ruh ki jah noh. La dei ka por ban pynsngew sha ki bor Shnong, haduh ka Sorkar ba ka por ka la kyrkieh eh ban iatreilang ban pynneh pynsah ia ka mariang.
title: “Ym tang ka Law kyntang Mawphlang,  da ki spah ki law kyntang ha ri Khasi”

content: Nongstoiñ, 6 Iaiong:Ka seng Khasi Student Union Mawshynrut Circle, hapoh ka jingialam jong u samla Armstrong Sohshang ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la lah kala leit ban ia kynduh ia u Deputy Commissioner ka West Khasi Hills District u Arun Kumar Kembhavi, ha ryngkat ka jingthoh ban dawa pyndam noh ia ka kyntien Sonapahar kaba la ju pyndonkam ban thoh ha ki ophis sorkar bapher bapher kiba don hapoh Mawshynrut Block.Haba iakren bad u nongthoh khubor ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta na ka liang jong u samla Armstrong Sohshang u la ong ba ka jingpyrshah jong ka seng ia katei ka kyntien ‘ Sonapahar’ ka long namar ba katei ka kyntien kam dei ka kyntien Khasi ha kaba kiba bun ki nong shong shnong jong ka thain kim sngewtynnad ban jer ne khot da katei ka kyrteng iaka ka thain, bad haka jaka jong katei ka kyntien dei ban pyndonkam bad thoh noh da ka kyntien Mawshynrut ha man la ki ophis sorkar kaba dei ka kyntien ka ba iahap bad kit jingmut ia ka thain hi baroh kawei.Halor ka jingioh jong ka Mawshynrut ia katei ka kyntien Sonapahar na ka liang jong u bah Sohshang u la ong ba kadaw ka long namar ba kham mynshwa ha katei ka thain la don kawei ka kompani kaba la wan ban surbe ia ki jaka puta, namar ba katei ka thain kala paw nam bha ha ka jingdon ia ki marpoh khyndew barem dor bad namar ba ki nong trei katei ka kompani kim dei ki Jaitbynriew Khasi kumta kila jer bad pynmih ruh ia katei ka kyntein Sonapahar ha ka jaka jong ka Mawshynrut, ha kaba jan baroh ki ophisar sorkar haduh mynta ki dang iai pyndonkam ia katei ka kyntien nongwei.Shuh shuh u bah Sohshang u la ong ruh ba ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta na ka liang jong u DC u la kular ba un sa shimkhia bad ban pyndep ia katei ka kam hapoh 6 bnai, hynrei na ka liang jong ka seng kala ai jingmut bad kyrpad ia u DC ba un kham pynkloi ia katei ka kam la kumno kumno ban pyndep noh hapoh shi bnai namar ba ioh lehse ka sorkar kan plie noh ia ka Civil Sub Division.“Ha shwa ba ka sorkar kan sa plie noh ia ka Mawshynrut Civil Sub Division, baroh ki ophis sorkar kiba don ha ka thain kidei ban thoh noh ia ki address jong ki bad ia ki signboard da ka kyntien Mawshynrut bad nangne shakhmat lada ka seng ka dang iohi biang da ka kyntien ‘Sonapahar’ ha ki signboard jong ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher ka seng kan sa leh iaka ba donkam” pynkut u bah Sohshang.
title: Da ka Mawshynrut, ym ka  Sonapahar, ong ka KSU ha U DC

content: Shillong,6 Iaiong:Ki pulit ki la ioh ia ka jingujor na u HC P Rynjah lyngba u IC Ummulong Beat House ba ha ka 29 tarik u lber ha ka por 7 baje mynmiet kawei ka trok kaba don ia u nombar AS-11-AC-0409 kaba la ñiah da u Sunamuddin Khan na Nutan Chandrapur ba katba u dang iaid lyntina Khanduli ban leit sha Shillong bad haba la poi ha Mawpun ,Wahiajer katei ka trok ka la sniew bad katba u dang shna ia katei ka trok kynsan kynsan la mih 4 ngut ki runar ki bym lah ban tip kiba la rah da ka waitbad ki la lute T.60 hajar tyngka na katei ka trok.
title: Shah lute  ka trok T.60 hajar

content: Shillong, 30 Lber:Ka jingbuh sngi ban iakren pynbeit pud hapdeng u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam bad ka Meghalaya kam dei namar ba ki kwah hi hynrei, katkum ka khubor, ka dei namar ba ka ophis jong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri, (Prime Minister Office) jong u Narendra Modi, ka la bthah ia ki ban iashong ban iapynbeit ia ka jingiakajia pud. Katkum ba paw, ka jingtreikam ka ophis jong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri, ka dei kaba sted bha ban tuklar haba ioh pdiang kano kano ka jingthoh na ki paidbah ne ki riew shimet.U Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u Sarbanda Sonowal bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u Dr Mukul Sangma kin iakynduh ha ka 3 tarik Iaiong ha Guwahati ban iakren ia ka jingiakajia pud.Ym pat lah ban tip ha kano ka dur ne ka mat ba kin iakren hynrei kum ioh jingtip, ka ophis u PMO kala bthah ia kine ki ar tylli ki jylla ban iapynbeit da ka lynti kaba sngew tynnad baroh ar liang.Kumba ka paw naduh mynshwa, ka jingiakren pynbeit pud hapdeng kine ki ar tylli ki jylla, kam ju poi shaei shaei ruh wat ha ka jingshisha, baroh kine ki jylla la synshar kajuh ka party Congress.Hynrei ha kane ka kynti, ka jingsynshar ka iapher ha kaba ha Assam, la synshar da ka BJP katba ha Meghalaya dang synshar ka Congress.
title: Buh sngi ia kren kam pud ka Assam,  Meghalaya ba tuklar ka PMO

content: Jowai, 31 Lber:Uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum Balajied Nongrum u la ujor sha ki pulit ha Nartiang ba u la shah tuh ki tiar kali ba buh ha trep ha iing sah jong u kaba don ha shnong Mynsngat ha kane ka 27 tarik.Haba tohkit hi da lade utei u bah Nongrum u la lap ba ia kitei ki tiar kali jong u la lap na kawei ka jaka pyllang tiar jot kaba don ha katei ka juh ka shnong bad haba tohkit la lap ba uwei u briew uba kyrteng u Plas Lipon u la wan die ia kitei ki tiar.Na ka liang ki pulit ki la tohkit ia kane bad ki dang thwet ia utei u ba donkti ban ioh kem ia u.
title: Shah tuh haduh 1 lakh 50 hajar ki tiar

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:Ka tnad District Council Affairs jong ka sorkar jylla mynta ka sngi ka la hukum ia u Chairman ka Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) ba un peit ma u kum u CEM ba shipor ka District Council kat bym pat lah ban pynlong ia ka elekshon CEM. Haba ia kren bad ki lad khubor u Boston Marak Chairman ka GHADC u la ong ba u la ioh hukum na ka sorkar ban peit shipor ia ka GHADC tad haduh ban da lap ban pynlong elekshon CEM bad utei un shimti ia katei ka kam naduh ka lah sngi u blei.U Marak u la ia kynduh ia u myntri ka tnad DCA u bah Prestone Tynsong ban batai ia ka jinglong jingman ha GHADC hynrei u khlem ioh pat ban ia kynduh ia u Lat ka jylla naba u don ha ka jylla Assam. La iathuh ba kumba ju long ha District Council lada mih kano kano ka jingkhyllem EC u Lat u ju pynbna ia uwei napdeng ki MDC kum u nongpeit ba shipor.
title: U Chairman kum u CEM  ba shipor ka GHADC

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:Uwei u rangbah ba la 42 snem karta uba la tip kyrteng kum u Lopina Kharsyntiew na Patarim, Block-II, Mawlai, Shillong u la jah rngai na la ong ryngkat ka trok kaba u niah kaba don ia u nombar ML-05J-5058, u la jah naduh ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai.
title: Jah u Rangbah bad ka trok

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:Ka Meghalaya Minerals Exporter’s Chamber of Commerce (MMECC) ka pynpaw ia ka jing-sngewnguh ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma, u ba la bat ia la ka jong ka kular kaba u la kren hapoh ka iing dorbar thawain jong ka jylla, ha ka dorbar mang tyngka kaba dang shu dep, ha kaba ula khlei ba ka sorkar kan ialeh katba lah ban iarap ia ki briew kiba trei ha kane ka kam mawshun.Ka MMECC, ka shim ba dei da ka jingshim khia jong u myntri rangbah ka jylla ba ka tnad khlaw, ka la sdang ban jurip biang ia ka jingdon u mawshun ba dang sah ha ki par jong ki briew khnang ban ai jingbit biang ban shallan ia u, ha kaba la leh lyngba u Forest Officer (DFO) Territorial Shillong bad la dep ban bthah ia kiba trei mawshun ba kin buh ia ki aplikeshon jong ki ban dup lah ban leh ia kaba don kam.Kane ka lynti kaba ka sorkar ka la leh, lyngba jong ka tnad khlaw, na ka liang jong MMECC, ka long kaba u myntri rangbah ka jylla u la shim ia ka lynti kaba dei ban pynlait ia ki briew kiba im kane ka kam mawshun ba kin ioh ban trei ban ktah bad ha ka juh ka por ban dang ioh ban pynkhreh ia ka plan kaba biang ban tih mawshun bad ban ioh ia ki kot ki sla na ka sorkar.Ka MMECC ka kyntu ia u DFO, territorial East Khasi Hills District ban pynkloi ia kane ka kam ban pyndep kloi ia ka jingjurip khnang ba kito kiba dang don ia u mawshun ba la dep tih, yn ioh ban shallan noh ha dien ba ka ophis ka la ai ia ka Challan.Katei ka seng, ka pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewnguh ia u nongialam ka liang pyrshah hapoh ka iing dorbar thawain ka jylla u Dr Donkupar Roy, u ba la shim khia ban kren ia kane ka jingeh jong ki paidbah hapoh ka iing dorbar thawain ha kane ka dorbar mang tyngka kaba dang shu kut shen, ha kaba u myntri rangbah ka jylla ruh u la sngap bad shah skhor bad leh ia kaei kaba u la klur hapoh ka iing dorbar.
title: Sdang jurip biang ia ka jingdon  u Mawshun ba dang sah

content: Shillong, 30 Lber:Ka Executive Committee ka GHADC kaba ialam da ka seng NPP ka la khyllem noh mynta ka sngi. Katei ka jingkhyllem ka EC ka dei hadien ka jingrisaiñ jong u Chief Executive Member u Denang T Sangma. U Dy.CEM ka KHADC u Augustine Marak haba ia kren bad u Rupang u la iathuh ba tang mar ia sdang ka dorbar mang tyngka, ha ka sngi kaba ar, u Chairman u la pynbna ba u Denang u la risaiñ noh na ki daw shimet jong u bad da katei ka jingrisain u CEM ka EC ruh ka la khyllem noh.Mynhynnin ka sngi ka Liang pyrshah kaba ialam da ka Congress ka la wanrah da ka jing bym shaniah shuh ia ka EC jong ka NPP bad u Chairman u Boston Marak u la pdiang ban ia kren ia katei ka NC mynta ka sngi, hynrei tang mar ia sdang dorbar mynta ka step u Chairman u la pynbna ba u ioh pdiang ia ka shithi risaiñ na u CEM bad kumta hi ka EC ka la khyllem hi noh. Lah ban kdew ba ka EC jong ka Garo Hills Progressive Alliances (GHPA) kaba ialam da ka seng NPP ka don 19 ngut ki MDC na ka 29 ngut bad kitei ki kynthup ia 10 ngut ki MDC ka NPP, 3 ngut ka GNC, 1 BJP , 1 NCP bad 7 ngut ki Independent.Ryngkat bad u CEM ki don 6 ngut ki MDC kiba la mih noh na ka GHPA bad kitei ki kynthup ia u Chairman u Boston Marak ryngkat ki 4 ngut kiwei pat ba kynthup ia u Wenison Marak ka Garo National Council, u Dhormonath Sangma uba phet na ka Congress ban ia soh NPP mynta u la leit phai biang sha ka Congress, u Ismail Marak ka BJP uba phet na ka Congress bad u Righteous Marak u MDC ka NCP uba phet na ka Congress.U Boston Marak u la kam ba ka liang pyrshah ka don mynta 16 ngut ki MDC bad ka la biang ba kin kam ia ka bor synshar. U la kynnoh ba katei ka jingjot jingpra ka dei namarba ka jingdkoh jong ka rukom treikam ka EC ba ialam ka NPP.La iathuh ba ka jingiadie ia thied kulai ka dang iaid haduh mynta ruh. U Dy.CEM u Augustine Marak u la iathuh ba haduh mynta um pat lah ban ong eiei namarba ka jingiakren bad ki nongialam ka NPP ka dang iaid ban ia khun ban wan biang ha ka bor.“Katno ngut ki MDC ngi don mynta, ngim pat lah ban ong, ngan sa ai jingtip ia phi” ong u Augustine haba ia kren bad u Rupang.Hynrei kiwei pat ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba mynta ki nongialam ka NPP ba kynthup ia u Conrad bad u nongialam ka BJP u bah Shibun Lyngdoh ki dang don hapdeng ka jingiakren kumno ban thawlad ban wan biang ha ka bor.
title: Shuwa ban sdang dorbar “risaiñ” u  CEM; khyllem ka EC ka NPP ha GHADC

content: Shillong, 30 Lber:Ka jingialang jong ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) ka United Democratic Party (UDP) kan long ha ka 10 tarik Iaiong ban wan, ban iakren bad ban shim ia ka rai, la yn dang kyrshan ne em ia ka Executive Committee ka People Democratic Forum (PDF) ba ialam da Bah Pynshngain N Syiem ha KHADC.Ka jingialang ha katei ka sngi kan iakren ruh na ka bynta ban pynkhreh ia ka elekshon MLA kaban long lashem snem ha ka jylla.U General Secretary ka UDP u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la ong ba ka jingialang ka sub-committee hynnin ka la phah ia ka jingsngew jongka, sha ka CEC ba kan shim ia ka rai kaba sngew biang halor ka jyrsieh ka KHADC.“Ia ka jinglap ka House Committee ka KHADC ia ki kam jyrsieh ka EC ba ialam da u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem,yn iakren bad yn shim ia ka rai kaba kut ha ka 10 tarik Iaiong”, la ong u Dr Mawthoh.Ka UDP ka la thaw ia ka Sub Committee on KHADC Affairs ban peit bniah bad bishar ia ka kaiphod jong ka House Committee kaba tohkit halor ki kam bamsap ha KHADC na ka pisa kaba la iohlum na ka Professional Tax na nongpoh bad Nongstoin khamtam ka jingpaw ka kyrteng u CEM ban Pynshngaiñ N Syiem bad u bah Antonio War EM pla tyngka ha katei ka kaiphod.U Bah BM Lanong hynnin ka sngi u la ong ba ka Sub Committee kan phah ia ka rai sha ka Party ban weng noh ne em na ka PDF kaba ialam da u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem hadien ba peit bniah ia ka kaiphod ka House Committee.Ha katei ka kaiphod jong ka HC, la iasoi da u nongialam ka Liang pyrshah uba dei u Chairman u bah Manstudy Nongrem, ka nongialam jong ki MDC ka HSPDP ka kong Teilinia Thangkhiew, nongialam ki MDC ka KHNAM bah Adelbert Nongrum bad nongialam ki MDC ka UDP u bah Teinwell Dkhar kiba dei ki dkhot ha ka kynuhn synrop ka PDF.
title: 10 tarik yn iathir ka CEC ka  UDP ban neh ne weng na PDF

content: Shillong, 30 Lber:4 ngut ki nongtrei jong ka tnad khlaw ka KHADC ki la shah sospon na ka kam jong ki namar ka pisa kaba T.34,30,000 tyngka. Katei ka jingshah sospon ka la sdang nyngkong da ka jingsospon ia u Forest Chowkidar Cum Peon u Franklin Khymdeit ha ka 2 tarik u naiwieng, 2016 bad hadien pat sa 3 ngut ki ophisar kata u bah T.Saiborne-Chief Forest Officer, bah M Lyngdoh Deputy Chief Forest Officer bad bah Baniwell Lyngdoh Under Secretary sha ka Executive.Kham ha shuwa ia kane, ka EM ba peit ia ka tnad khlaw ka KHADC ka kong Gracemary Kharpuri haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ha ka dorbar mang tyngka ka KHADC ka la kubur ba ka la don ka jingpyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa ba ka KHADC ka ioh bhah 50% na ka tnad khlaw bad ia kane ka la ong ba utei u Chowkidar ( Franklin Khymdeit) u la kubur ba u la pyndonkam bakla ia katei ka pisa bad ka la ong ruh ha katei ka por ba ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid bad ka la jan dep artad bad kan sa aiti sha ka Executive Committee.Kham hadien la mih sa ka jingshah sospon ki 3 ngut ki ophisar kiba peit ia katei ka tnad, haba ia kren bad ka kong Grace ka la ong ba ka jingtohkit kaba nyngkong la dep ban aiti sha ka EC hynrei ka dang don sa kawei pat ka jingtohkit kaba dang iaid mynta bad khnang ba ka jingtohkit kan long kaba khuid la sospon noh ia ki 3 ngut ki ophisar.Ia ka jingtohkit ba nyngkong la khlieh da u Joi9nt Secretary ka KHADC u bah D.G Syiemiong bad kaba-ar pat la khlieh da u bah E.L Myrten Additional Judge bad la ai por 3 bnai ban pyndep ia ka jingtohkit.
title: Saw ngut shah sospon ki nongtrei  khlaw KHADC na ka T.34 lak

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:T.6.30 klur tyngka ka sorkar ka la ioh lum na ki kali bad ki thuk thuk kiba pynkheiñ Aiñ bad katei ka kuna ka dei kaba la lum san snem mynta kata naduh u 2012-2013 haduh u 2016-2017. Katei ka kuna ka dei kaba la lum na ki briew kiba niah kali bad ka bu-aid kyiad, kiba kren phone por dang ñiah kali, ki bym deng snieh, ki thuk thuk ba niah khlem jingsop khlieh, kiba pynher sted bad kiwei pat kiba pynkhein ia ki kyndon aiñ.Ka kuna kaba heh heh kaba la iohlum ka dei ka East Khasi Hills kaba haduh T.3.76 klur tyngka , nangta bud sa ka Ri-Bhoi T.92.7 lak tyngka, ka West Jaintia T.49.9 lak tyngka. West Garo Hills T.34.8 lak tyngka, East Jaintia Hills T.30.9 lak tyngka, North Garo Hills T.3.7 lak tyngka, South West Khasi Hills T.1.9 lak tyngka, East Garo Hills T.1.2 lak tyngka. Ym shym la don ba shah dain kuna ha South West Garo Hills, Ampati.
title: T.6.30 klur, ka kuna na ki  kali pynkheiñ Aiñ ha ka Jylla

content: Shillong, 30 Lber:Ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ki dei ki kynta kiba jur slap tam ha ka nongbah Shillong, na ka bynta jong u snem 2017. Ka jinghap slap, ka la poi sha ka 18.9milimetre, katba kum ka jingai jingkhein ka Meteorological Department jong ka Sorkar India, kaba don ha Upper Shillong. Katei ka tnat, ka buh jingmaham, ba kan don biang ka jinghap slap, kaba jur ha ki katto katne ki bynta jong ka Jylla, ha ka 3tarik Iaiong 2017.
title: U slap ba jur tam jong u 2017

content: Shillong, 30 Lber:Ka Khasi Students’ Union (KSU) Bangalore Unit lyngba kane ka kyrwoh ka pynpaw, ba hadien ka jingpeit pyrman jong ka seng mynta la bun snem ka shem, ba ki bun bha ki jaka ai jinghikai kiba na Karnataka bad Meghalaya ki ju phah ia ki samla pule na Meghalaya sha Karnataka, khamtam ha ka nongbah Bangalore. Hynrei ka seng ka sngewsih pat ban iohi ba ki bun bha kum kine ki jaka ai jinghikai, ki mih tang ban kjit pisa na ki ba bun ki khynnah kiba luilui da ka ba ki pynbiej bad phon ia ki ha kiba bun rukom. Ka seng ka la lap ba kiba bun ki jaka hikai, ki pynbiej da kita ki jing ai ram ia ki samla ban pule na Meghalaya tang ban ioh kjit pisa na ki.Kiba bun bha ki samla pule na Meghalaya ki la shah thok shah phon ha kum kine ki kynhun, kiba kular ia ki ban pynbiang ia ki ha ki jaka pule kiba pawnam bad ba tbit hynrei mar syn poi sha Bangalore kine ki samla pule ki ngat pynban ha ki jaka pule kiba wat ka sorkar ruh kam pat ithuh ia ki.Kumta ka seng ka maham tyngeh ia kine ki jaid kynhun, ba lada ki dang iai bteng ia kum kine ki kam thok kam shukor ka seng kam banse ban shim noh da ki lad ki lynti kiba tyngeh khnang ban tehlakam ia ka jingshah thok ki samla pule ba luilui na jylla Meghalaya, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Rymphang Nongsiej, President, KSU Bangalore Unit.
title: “Pynbiej ki kompeni ia ki samla Khasi”

content: Jowai, 30 Lber:Uwei u bar jylla uba trei ha kawei ka petrol pump kaba don ha East Jaintia Hills u la jah rngai na jingtrei naduh ka 27 tarik une u bnai ha ryngkat ka pisa kaba 4 lakh 16 hajar tyngka.U Manager ka NES Sutnga Petrol Pump, u Mukesh Jain u la ujor sha ki pulit ka Khliehriat ba u Rakesh Sharma (25) u la jah rngai ha ryngkat katei ka pisa.
title: Jah u nongtrei petrol pump bad 4.16 lakh

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:Ka jingiakren pyn-beit pud hapdeng u Myntri Rangbah ka Assam u Sarbananda Sonowal bad u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya u Dr Mukul Sangma kan long lashai ka sngi ha Guwahati por 11 baje mynstep ha Administrative Staff College ha Khanapara, Guwahati.Kane ka jingiakren pynbeit pud ka dei ka sien kaba 20 ha ka kyrdan Myntri rangbah jong kine ki ar tylli ki jylla naduh ba la kha ia ka Meghalaya.Ka jingiakren ban pynbeit iakajia pud bad ka Assam ka la iaid naduh u snem 1971 haduh mynta bad naduh u snem 1971, la don 19 sien ba ki Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam ki iakynduh haduh 2012, bad 12 sien ki Chief Secretary.Ki don 12 tylli ki jaka ba iakajia pud hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam kynthup ka Blocks I bad II, Upper Tarabari, Gizang Reserve Forest, Hahim, Langpih, Borduar, Boklapara, Nongwah-Matamur, Khanapara-Pillangkata, Deshdemoreah, Khanduli-Psiar ba Ratacherra. Kine ki jaka ki dei kiba hap ha West Khasi Hills, Jaintia Hills bad ha Ri Bhoi district ka Meghalaya.Na bynta u Dr Mukul, yn synrang lang ki myntri jongu kynthup Deputy Chief Minister u Dr R.C Laloo, u nongaibuit ka sorkar, Bah D.D Lapang, myntri kam pohiing Bah HDR Lyngdoh, Kong Roshan Warjri bad u Chief Secretary u K.S Kropha bad kiwei.
title: Mynta yn iakren pud U Sonowal  bad U Mukul ha Guwahati

content: Jowai, 30 Lber:Ki Shipai BSF, Jowai Sector ki la pynlong ia ka program ban ai jinghikai ia ki khynnah skul shaphang ka kam ki shipai BSF bad ruh ki la pynlong ruh ia ka jingpyni rong ia ki tiar ba ki BSF ki pyndonkam kynthup ia ki suloi ba bunjait.Ha ka sngi ba-ar, ki shipai BSF ki la pynlong ia ka program ha Don Bosco Khliehriat bad ha Sacred Heart Secondary School, Byndihati ha kaba ki khynnah skul na ki skul bapher bapher kynthup ia ki samla pule ka St. Anthony’s (extension) kaba don ha Byndihati.Hynnin ka sngi pat la pynlong ia kum kane ka juh ka program ha Marian Hill Secondary School, Jowai bad ha Nongtalang College, Amlarem Sub-Division.Ha Jowai, ki khynnah skul na Marian Hill, St. Mary Mazzarello bad na North Liberty Higher Secondary School ki la wan ia shim bynta ha katei ka program.Na ka liang u Deputy Commandant ki BSF, u ME Zingkhai u la ong ba kane kadei ka jingthmu ban wanrah ia ka jingiasngewjan hapdeng ki riew paidbah khamtam ki khynnah skul bad ki shipai BSF.“Bun ki tieng ia ngi ki BSF namar ba ngi phong uniform, hynrei ngi ruh ngi dei ki briew hi kum maphi bad phim dei ban tieng ia ngi”, ong utei u heh ki BSFUtei u heh ka BSF u la batai shaphang kumno la seng ia ka kynhun shipai BSF da ka sorkar India bad kumno ki la iada ia u pud u sam ka ri ban khanglad ia ka jingwan rung tuh ki nongshun.Ha kine ki Program, nalor ka jingpynirong ia ki tiar ialeh bad kiwei kiwei ki jait tiar ba pyndonkam da ki shipai BSF, la pyni ruh ia ka film lyngkot shaphang ki BSF.Kane ka long ruh shi bynta ban pynshlur ia kito ki khynnah skul bad samla pule ban kin don ka mynsiem ban rung sha ka kam shipai ynda ki la dep ia ki jingpule na ka bynta ban shakri bad ban iada ia ka ri.
title: Pyniajan ki BSF bad ki  paidbah, khynnah skul

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:Hadien ka jinghap slap, kaba 18.9 milimetre, ha ki 48 kynta ba ladep, hynrei, ka jinghap slap, ha ka nongbah Shillong, ka la nang jur shuh shuh, ha ki 24 kynta ba ladep, ha kaba ka jinghap slap, ka la poi sha ka 34.6 milimetre.Ka ka jingai jing khein ka Meteorological Department jong ka Sorkar India, kaba don ha Upper Shillong, ka ai jingmaham ruh, ba kan dang bteng ka jinghap slap, kaba jur lem bad ka eriong, ha ki bynta jong ka Jylla, ha ka 1tarik, 2tarik bad 3tarik Iaiong 2017.
title: Nang jur slap  shuh ha Shillong

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:Ka sorkar jylla ka la pynmih ia ka jingpynbna ba baroh ki dukan kyiad kiba hapoh ka 500 meter ka jingjngai na ki surok bah, ki dei ban khang kdam noh naduh lashai ka sngi ka 1 tarik Iaiong.Kane ka jingpynmih hukum ka sorkar ka long hadien ba ka Supreme Court ka ri ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ba baroh ki dukan kyaid ha ka ri kiba don hapoh ka jingjngai kaba 500 meter ki dei ban khang kdam bad lada don kiba leh pyrshah yn pynshitom da ka ain.Ka rai jong ka Supreme Court ka long hadien ba katkum ka jingshyrkhei ka jingiap bad ka jingmynsaw ha ki jingjia aksiden kali ha ki surok ha ka ri namar ka jingbuaid.Katkum ka jingkhein ka sorkar, kumba 5 lak ki jingjia aksiden ha ka ri ha ka shi snem bad kumba 1 lak ngut tam ki briew ki duh na ka jingjia aksiden kali ha ka ri India.Ka jingshah khang ki dukan kyiad ha ka jylla kan ktah jur ruh ia ka khajna ka sorkar jylla kaba kamai na kine ki dukan kyiad kiba ieng lain ha man ki surok bah ha ka jylla.Katkum ka jingiathuh u myntri ka tnad Excise, u Zenith Sangma, ka sorkar jylla ka duh khajna kumba san spah klur na ka jingkhang ia ka kyiad .U Zenith u la ong ba kumba T. 500 klur la duh khajna na ka jingkhang noh kumba 265 tylli ki dukan kyiad da ka hukum ka Supreme Court ha kane ka jylla.Ia kane la iathuh da u Myntri ka khajna ka jylla u Zenith M Sangma hynne ka sngi ha ing dorbar halor ka jingkylli jong u bah Dr Jemino Mawthoh.Hadien ba hukum ka Supreme Court la khang 265 tylli na ka 561 tylli ki dukan kyiad ha baroh ka jylla.Katkum ka jingong u Myntri ia ka jingdon ki dukan kyaid ka long ha East Khasi 61 tylli, West Khasi 10, South West Khasi 13, Ri Bhoi 31, East Jaintia Hills 35, West Jaintia Hills 26, East Garo Hills 07, West Garo Hills 53, South Garo Hills 13, North Garo Hills 18, South West Garo Hills 21 bad Sohra sub division 08 tylli.Ha u 2013-14 ka sorkar ka ioh khajna T.1626620757, ha 2014-15 ka ioh khajna T. 1511353697 bad ha u snem 2015-16 ka ioh lum khajna T.1700549408.Kiwei pat ki lad khubor, ki iathuh ba ka Supreme Court, ka la kham pynjynsur ia ka hukum jongka, ha kaba ka la buh kyndon ba yn khang tang ia kito ki dukan kyiad, kiba don ha ka jingjngai kaba 220 metre na surok bah, ong ka khubor ba dang shu ioh lum bad katei ka dei ka hukum, kaba la pynmih mynhynnin ka sngi, ha kaba la bthah, ba katei kan trei kam, ha kito ki nongbah, kiba don tang kumba 20hajar ngut antad eiei.
title: 500 meter na surok bah,  khang lut ki dukan kyiad

content: Mawkyrwat, 26 Lber:Mynhynnin ka sngi u Myntri ba dei khmih ia ka tnad PWD Roads u Martin M. Dango u la plie ia u mawnongrim jong ka jingkieng Maheskola- Darengiri Roads ryngkat ka jingsynran lang u Zenith M. Sangma Myntri ka tnad Sports & Youth Affairs lem bad ki nongialam jong ka Ranikor Block Congress Committee (RBCC) u bah Jerman Nonsiang ia kaba la pynlong ha ka shnong Chimasora South West Khasi Hills.Na ka liang u kongsan u Martin M. Dango, haba ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi u la ong ba ia kane ka jingkieng Maheskola – Darengiri Roads kaba dei ka RCC Bridge kaba wan lyngba ka skhim RIDF- XX11 la mang haduh T. 3 klur 8 lak tyngka na ka bynta ban shna iaka bad ka jingjrong jong kane ka jingkieng ka long kumba 24.7 meter eiei.U la ong ruh ba kane ka jingkieng ka long kaba la rim bha bad ka dei ka jingkieng kaba naduh ka por Sorkar Assam bad kaba la neh kumba palat sanphew snem mynta bad ka jingioh ban maramot bad shna thymmai ia kane ka jingkieng ka long kum ka jingkyrkhu ia ki paidbah kane ka thaiñ ha kaba ki la lah ban leit na kawei ka jaka sha kawei pat ban ia Khaii ia pateng.Shuh shuh na ka liang jong u, u buh ruh ia ka jingkyntu ia ki paidbah ba ki dei ban don ka jingsngew longtrai ia kane ka jingkieng bad ba ki dei ruh ban iada bad lehkhuid ia kane ka jingkieng kaba ka sorkar ka la shna na ka bynta ka jingdonkam jongki, u la ong ruh ba katba lah yn pyndep kloi ia ka jingshna ia kane ka jingkieng.Ha kane ka sngi plie ia u mawnongrim la pyniaid ia ka jingialang da u bah F. Sohlang E.E PWD Roads Ranikor ryngkat ka jingiadonlang u Zenith. M. Sangma Myntri ka tnad Sports & Youth Affairs, bah Manstudy Nongrem MDC Langrin Constituency, bah D. Kyndiah Assistant Executive Engnineer Nonghyllam, bah H. S. Diengdoh ADC South West Khasi Hiils, Jerman Nongsiang President Ranikor Block Conggress Committee bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Plie U Dango ia u mawnongrim ka jingkieng ha Maheskola

content: Nongstoiñ, 24 Lber:Ka jingbymlah jong ki kyrtong ka seng Congress ban ioh ia ka jingjop ha ki election na Nong-stoin, ka dei na ka daw jong ka jingiaknieh tiket bad ka jingiai pynkylla ia ki kyrtong da ka MPCC, hadien ba ki dkhot bad nongkitkam jong ka seng ki la dep ban ia jied bad katei ka jingkylla khlieh khlieh tdong tdong ia ki kyrtong ka long ruh kawei na ki daw bah ban mih ka jingiapait ia pra hapoh jong ka seng.Kumta ban tehsong biang ia ka seng congress hapoh Nongstoin, ka NBCC da kawei ka jingmut ki la iashim ia rai ban phah ia ka kyrteng jong u bah Gabriel Wahlang kum u kyrtong ban iakhun ia ka election MLA ha u 2018 bad ia u bah N. Nongdkhar kum u kyrtong MDC ha u 2019, sha ka MPCC da ka jingiamynjur lang da baroh ki President Delegate, Youth Congress, Mahila ki nongkitkam jong ki Primary Unit bad Sub Unit bapher.Katei ka paw shai ruh ha ka General Meeting jong ka Nongstoin Block Congress Committee, kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Congress Bhavan Nongstoin bad ha katei ka jingialang hadien bala pynpaw ia kitei ki ar ngut ki kyrteng ban long kum ki kyrtong, ki la pan ruh ia ka jingmynjur na baroh ki paidbah nongkitkam jong ka seng Congress ha kaba baroh ki la iamon bad ia mynjur ia kitei baroh ar ngut ba kin long kum ki kyrtong jong ka seng, na ka bynta ka election MLA bad MDC da kaba ki la ia pyni ruh ia ka dak jong ka jingiamynjur da kaba iarah kti.Ia katei ka jingialang la pyniaid da u bah Simpleman Marwein Vice President jong ka NBCC ha ryngkat ka jingiadonlang u bah B.K. Bani Adviser ka NBCC, u bah F. Lyngkhoi Chief Adviser District Youth Congress, kitei ki ar ngut kiba la shah jied kum ki kyrtong kata u bah Gabriel Wahlang bad bah N. Nongdkhar, bad la wan ruh ban iashim bynta da President Delegate, Youth Congress, Mahila ki nongkitkam jong ki Primary Unit bad Sub Unit bapher.
title: Rai ka NBCC: U bah Gabriel  u kyrtong MLA & N. Nongdkhar MDC

content: Shillong, 26 Lber:Ha ka 24 tarik mynta u bnai ka la don ka jingialang hapdeng ki pulit bad ki trai Hotel jong ka nongbah Shillong ban ia kren halor ka jingkiew ka kam khaii met bad ki kam ia shonglok be-aiñ. Ha katei ka jingialang la ia kren ba donkam ban pyndait ia ki CCTV Camera kiba khlaiñ, ban pynbiang ia ki rikod jong ki briew kiba sah ha ka hotel bad ban pan ia ka identity card jong ki, ban pyni man ka sngi sha ki pulit ia ka rikod ba ki briew ki wan sah, ban pynbiang ia ki jingtip shaphang ki nongtrei Hotel sha ki pulit, ki trai Hotel ki dei ban pynthikna ba kan ym don ka kam khaii met hapoh Hotel jong ki.U Inspector M.N Khan Officer In-charge, Laitumkhrah P.S u la pynsngew sha ki trai Hotel ia ki kyndon pyniaid jong ki , u Shri K. Prasad, MPS. Dy. Superintendent of Police (Hqr), East Khasi Hills, Shillong ruh u la batai ia ki kumno ban pyniaid khnang ba kan long kaba shngaiñ bad ka ban lait na ki kam awria.Na ka liang ki trai Hotel la kren da u Shri Paramvir Singh uba kular ban ia treilang bad ki pulit kumba la batai. Ki la don haduh 112 ngut ki trai kiba la wan na ki 112 tylli ki Hotel kiba ia shim bynta ha katei ka jingialang kaba la donlang ruh u Superintendent of Police, East Khasi Hills, Shillong u Shri Davis N R. Marak, IPS.
title: Man ka sngi ki Hotel ki dei ban  pyni ia ka jingwan sah briew: Pulit

content: Shillong, 26 Lber:Lashai ka sngi ka 27 tarik u lber kan don ka dorbar kyrpang ka KHADC ban ia kren halor ka ripod tohkit jong ka House Committee kaba la pyndep ia ka jingtohkit jong ka halor ka jingpynrung ia ka pisa ba la lum na ka Professional Tax na Nongpoh bad Nongstoin sha ka account ki riew shimet.
title: Mynta ka dorbar kyrpang KHADC

content: Shillong, 26 Lber:Ki don baroh 267 ngut ki khunswet ha baroh ka jylla kiba ioh jingiarap na ka skhim ka sorkar jylla.Katkum ka jing-khein ba la ai da ka sorkar, la pyni ba kine ki khunswet kiba ioh jingiarap ki dei jong u snem 2016.Ha East Khasi Hills ki khunswet kiba ioh jingiarap ki long 13 ngut, West Khasi Hills 50 ngut, Ri-Bhoi 3 ngut, West Jaintia Hills 10 ngut, East Jaintia Hills iwei, South West Khasi 11 ngut, South Garo Hills 40, South West Garo Hills 47 ngut, North Garo Hills 27 ngut, East Garo Hills 15 ngut bad ha West Garo Hills ki don 50 ngut kiba ioh jingiarap na ka sorkar.
title: 267 ngut ki khunswet ba ioh jingiarap

content: Nongpoh, 26 Lber:Hadien ka jingujor na ki nongrep ha ka thain Umlaper, kiba la iakynduh jingeh halor jingshah pynjulor ia ki jaka rep jaka riang ka jongki, tang namar ka jinglehtorti da u Kontraktor ba pyntrei ia ka surok PMGSY, kata na Umlaper sha Lymphuid, ki nongialam ka KSU, ia kaba la ialam da u Samla Lamkyrdan Sungoh, Organizing Secretary ka KSU, NKHD lem bad ki dkhot na ka Nongpoh Circle, ha ka sngi Thohdieng, ki pynlong ia ka jingleit ban jurip bad pynrem jur halor ka jinglehtorti da u Kontraktor ba shna ia katei ka surok.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ia katei ka surok PMGSY kaba 16.125 km, kaba pyniasoh na Umlaper sha Lymphuid, la pyntrei da u Bah Khlurstep Pakma bad na ka bynta katei ka surok ka sorkar ka la mang haduh T. 144.03 lak.Hadien kane ka jingjurip, u samla L. Sungoh, u la ong ba ka seng ka la lap ba ki don haduh 30 ngut ki nongrep kiba la shah ktah, ha ka jingshna ia kane ka surok PMGSY, ha kaba naduh ki lyngkha kba bad kiwei de ki jaka rep ki la shah ktah.“Ha ka jingshisha ngi kmen bad ngim don jingpyrshah ei ei haba wan kino kino ki kam pynroi na ka ki paidbah, hynrei kaei pat kaba pynlong iangi ban gin hap ban pyrshah kadei namar ka jinglehtorti da u Kontraktor uba la pynshna ia kane ka surok, namar kaei kaba ngi la sakhi ba ka la don ka jingjulor ha ki jaka rep, katba na ka liang u Kontraktor pat u khlem seiw ei ei sha kito kiba la shah ktah” ong u samla L. Sungoh.Wat na ka liang jong kitei nongrep kiba la shah ktah, ki la leit ban iakynduh ia utei u Kontraktor ban iakren halor ka jingshah pynjulor ia ki jaka rep ki jongki, hynrei na ka liang utei u Kontraktor um shem la pynsngap ia katei ka jingud da kitei ki nongrep, bynrap u samla L. Sungoh.Kumta, haba iadei bad katei na ka liang ka seng kan nym shong kli kti, hynrei kan dawa na ka sorkar na ka bynta ka hok jong kitei ki nongrep kiba la shah pynjulor ia ki lyngkha ki jongki bad ha kajuh ruh ka por ka seng kan sa leit ruh ban kynduh ia u DC ka Ri Bhoi, u la bynrap.
title: Torti u Kontraktor ia ka surok  Umlaper-Lymphuid, julor ka rep

content: Shillong, 24 Lber:Ka Myntri tnad pule puthi ka jylla ka Deborah Marak ka la ai jingmut ia u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem, ba un iakynduh bad u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma ban iakren ia ka jingpynrung ia ka skul Rangblang bad ka Divine Mercy Secondary Skul Umdang ha South West Khasi ha ka NCLPR.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Mawsynram Bah Pynshngain mynta ka sngi ha iing dorbar, ka Deborah ka la ong, “Ka jingpdiang ban pynrung ia ka skhim la jied ka tnad Planning ba la peit da u Myntri Rangbah, nga ai jingmut ia u Bah Pynshngain ban leit iakynduh markhmat bad u Myntri Rangbah, balei katei ka skul kam shym la shah jied ban ioh skhim”.Kane ka jingkren ka myntri ka la pynmih sur ha iing dorbar, namar ka jingsamrkhie ki dkhot ka iing namar ba u Bah Pyn-shngain bad u Dr Mukul ki dei kiba iakawang ktieh bha.Halor kane u Bah Pynshngain u la jubab da kaba ong, “Hadien ba la kut ka dorbar mang tyngka, ngan leit iakynduh ia u Myntri Rangbah”.Ha kane ka por, u myntri rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ieng bad u la jubab, “Ka jingai jingmut jong ka myntri kaba dei bha bad kumjuh ka jubab na u Bah Pynshngain ruh kaba biang bha”.U Myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka sorkar ka don ka pisa ym tang na ka NCLPR, hynrei wat na ka skhim ka sorkar jylla ruh ban ai sha ki skul ban shna ia ki iing bad kiwei ki jingdonkam. Ki don ki skhim ruh ba ka sorkar ka la pan pisa na ka NEC, la ong u Myntri Rangbah.Hadien kane u Bah Pynshngain u la ieng biang bad jubab ia ka jingkren u Myntri Rangbah da kaba ong “Nga kyrmen ba u Myntri Rangbah un leh ynda nga rung ha kamra jong u”.
title: Kwah ka Deborah ban ia kynduh  U Bah Pynshngain bad U Mukul

content: Shillong, 24 Lber:Tang ar sngi hadien ba u la shah ujor, mynta u bah Paul Lyngdoh MLA ka UDP na 18 Shillong West konstitwensi u la ujor kylla ia ki briew kiba ujor pyrshah ia u, ha kaba ia katei ka jing ujor, u la ai sha u Chief Secretary ka jylla uba dei ruh u Chief Vigilance Commissioner bad ha katei ka jingujor pyrshah ia u, ula ong ba ka dei tang ban pynthoh-bria ia u bad u la kyntu ba dei ban pynshitom ia ki briew kiba u la niew kyrteng ha ka jing ujor. Ha ka 22 tarik mynta u bnai u ba Michael Pakyntein u la ujor pyrshah ia u bah Paul da kaba kynnoh ba u la pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa paidbah kaba kot haduh T.55.80 lak tyngka. U bah Paul Lyngdoh haba kyntait ia kiba bun ki jingkynnoh pyrshah ia u halor katei ka pisa u la ong ba ka dei tang ka jingleh politik ban pynsniew dur ia u. Lah ban kdew ba u bah Michael Pakyntein bad ka kynhun jong u ki dei ki nongkyrshan radbah jong u bah Paul Lyngdoh ha ka elekshon kaba la dep.Ha ka jing ujor sha u CS, u bah Paul Lyngdoh u la kdew ruh ba ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingthied tiar thied tar ha konstitwensi jong u dei kaba leh da ka Implementation Committee kaba la thaw katkum ki jingbthah ka Shillong Municipal Board bad baroh ki kot ki sla ba donkam la phah sha ka SMB kaba la mynjur bad pyllait ia ka pisa sha ka komiti. U la ong ruh ba ia kitei ki tiar ba la thied la dep ban sam sha ki paidbah nongshong shnong bad ki dorbar shnong jong ka konstitwensi, ki seng bad kiwei bad ia ka Utilization Certificate ruh la dep ban phah sha ka SMB ryngkat ki dur ki dar ba la sam paidbah.U bah Paul u la kynthah kylla ia u bah Michael Pakynteiñ da kaba ong ba u dei u briew uba la don dak sniew bad uba la lait phatok hadien ka jingshah kem jong u ha ka 31 tarik u naitung, 2014 ha Laitumkhrah PS bad u la ong ruh ba un dang hap ban leit mih sha ing bishar ka District and Session Court Judge ha ka 3 tarik u iaiong, 2017. Shuh shuh ha katei ka jing ujor, u la ong ba ha u naitung 2014 u Pakyntein ryngkat bad 2 ngut kiwei pat kiba dei ki nongtrei jong ka seng HNLC ki la shah kem namar ka jingthmu jong ki ban rahbor ia u khun jong uwei u nongkhaii.U la kynthah ruh ia kiwei pat ki paralok jong u Michael Pakyntein kata u Rishan Nongsiej, Damonlong Pakyntein bad Bernhard Kharmih kiba dei ki nongshong shnong jong ka Lower Mawprem bad u la kynnoh ba kitei ki nongkyrshan barim jong u mynta ki la kylla long ki sohpyut bad hadien ba la lap lut ia ki kam jaboh jong ki u la ong ba kim don lynti shuh da kumwei pat lait noh sa tang ban mih hi na ka kynhun jong u bad ban mih pyrthei pat da kumwei da ki jingkynnoh bym dei ban tap eit miaw ia ki kam jaboh jong ki, ong u bah Paul.Shuh shuh u la ong ba uwei na ki nongujor u bah Damonlang Pakyntein u la pynkular khlieh ia ka dorbar shnong ha kaba ka la hap ban lum jingialang kyrkieh namar ka jingsei ia ka pisa kaba T.6 lak tyngka da u na ka SMB ban pyniaid ia kawei ka kam hynrei ka bym shym la leh eiei bad hadien ka SMB ka la bthah ia ka dorbar shnong ban pynphai biang noh ia katei ka pisa. U la ong ba ha katei ka por um kwah shuh ban dang pynjan ialade bad kitei ki briew “Nga shu kiar noh ialade, ngam kwah ban dang pynjan bad ki hynrei nga shu ap beit ba kin mih noh dalade hi na ka kynhun jong nga ban iasoh bad kiwei pat ki kynhun” u la ong. Halor ki jingkynnoh ba la soi tuh ia ki cash memo kiba la kyntait da ki trai dukan u bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba lada dei ba soi tuh ki trai dukan ki la dei ban ujor ejahar “Ka lah ruh ban dei ba ki trai dukan ki thok ban lait na ki khajna” u la ong.
title: Ujor kylla u bah Paul ; kynnoh  ba dei ka jingleh Politik

content: Nongstoiñ, 26 Lber:Mynta ka nohsngi jong ka sngi u Blei ha kapor kumba 1:40 PM ei ei ki pulit ka Nongstoin, ki la leit ban tam noh ia kawei ka metiap ka bym shymla ithuh shuh namar ba kala sdang ban pyut bad ia katei ka met iap la ioh ban tam na ka wah Umpniang kaba don kham harum ia ka Madan Nongpathar kaba hap hapoh ka shnong Pyndengrei West Khasi Hills District.Ia katei ka jingjia la lap da ki katto katne ngut ki briew ki ba dang iaid lynti na katei ka jaka bad kiba dang thmu ruh ban leit Saitjain ha katei ka wah. Ki pulit mar ia ioh jingtip halor katei ka jingjia ki la leit mar mar sha katei ka jaka ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit kaba bniah.Katkum ka khubor na ki pulit la ong ruh ba katei ka metiap ka la shah tep ha u shyiap jong katei ka wah bad wat la katei ka metiap ka la pyut noh mar shiteng, hynrei katkum ka jingpeit ia katei ka metiap la ithuh ba ka dei jong ka kynthei kaba la antad ruh ha ki 15 haduh 18 snem eiei.Shuh shuh ki pulit kila suba jur ba katei ka met iap kadei kaba la shah pyniap dusmon ha ki briew ki bym shym la pat la lah satia ban tip bad hadien ba ki la dep ban pyniap ki la leit ban tep hapoh jong u shyiap u ba don harud jong ka tei ka wah.Ym tang kata ki pulit ki iathuh ruh ba wat la ia katei ka met iap ym shym la pat tip ia ka kyrteng lane ka jaka sah, hynrei na katei ka met iap la lap ruh ia u wei u jingdeng kti u bala don ha katei ka metiap ha ryngkat ka jingthoh ba la thoh Nisha BN.Na ka liang jong ki pulit hadien ba ki la dep ban leh ia kaba donkam kila pynkit noh ia katei sha Civil Hospital Nongstoin ban pyndep ia ka post mortem bad na ka liang jong ki pulit ki ladep ruh ban register ia ka case bad jingthohkit bad budien halor katei kajing jia kan dang iaid sha khmat.
title: Tam ia ka met pyut kynthei,  na ka Wah Umpniang Pyndengrei

content: Shillong, 26 Lber:Ka JACATAM ka la rai ban ap haduh ka 11 tarik Iaiong 2017 ia ka jingkular jong u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma ban pynkiew tulop 100 percent ia baroh ki nonghikai skul adhoc ha ka jylla kumba u la kular ha ka iing dorbar dang shen.Ka jingialang jong ka JACATAM kaba long ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ka la shim ia kane ka rai hadien ba la iapyrkhat sani bha.“Ka JACATAM ha ka jingialang kaba long ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ka la rai ban ap ia ka khubor na ka sorkar haduh ka 11 tarik Iaiong ia ka jingpynbna jong u Myntri Rangbah ban pynkiew tulop 100 percent ia ki nonghikai skul adhoc da kaba shim naduh ka 1 tarik Nailur 2016”, la ong u Publicity Secretary u Babu Kular Khongjirem.U la ong ba lada ka sorkar kam phah khubor eiei halor kane, ka JACATAM kan pynlong ia ka jingiakhih naduh ka 12 tarik Iaiong da kaba shah thngan.“Lada ka sorkar (Cabinet) kam pdiang ia kane shwa ka 11 tarik Iaiong, ngin pynlong ia ka jingiakhih da kaba shah thngan naduh ka 12 tarik Iaiong ha Shillong”, la ong u nongkitkam ka JACATAM.
title: Ap ka JACATAM haduh 11 tarik

content: Shillong, 26 Lber:Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew ka la don ka jingialang bah jong ka seng UDP Ranikor Circle ne ka General Council bad da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah ki la poi sha katei ka jingialang kaba la long ha ka shnong Nongnah. La pyniaid ia katei ka jingialang da u President jong katei ka seng na Ranikor Circle u bah P.K Raswai MLA/MDC barim. La don ruh u bah Allan F Dkhar na ka Central Body uba wan peit pyrman ia ka jingialang bah jong katei ka Circle.Ha katei ka jingialang la pynskhem ia ki nongkitkam thymmai jong ka UDP Ranikor Circle na bynta ka samoi treikam naduh u snem 2017 haduh 2019 da u bah Allan Vice President UDP Central Body. La pdiang sngewbha ruh ia kiwei pat ki nongialam kiba wan na kiwei pat ki party ban ia soh sha ka seng UDP ba kynthup ia u Pastor R.R Marak uba dei u nongialam jong ka seng Congress bad u nongkyrshan radbah jong u MLA ba mynta u M.M Dango, u Marak u dei na ki thaiñ khappud na Rajapara, u bah D.Lyngkhoi na Wahkaji u nongkyrshan radbah jong u Dango u la wan ia soh sha ka UDP, nangta la pdiang sngewbha ruh ia u bah P.Snaitang Secretary ka BJP Ranikor Mandal uba la wan pyniasoh sha ka UDP.Haba kren pdiang sngewbha ia baroh sha katei ka jingialang u Secretary ka UDP Youth Wing Ranikor Circle u bah Bahun S Basan u la kynthah ia ki kam jong u MLA ba mynta ka Ranikor ha kaba u la ong ba utei u MLA u juwan mih tang shisnem shuwa ka elekshon sha konstitwensi bad u la ong ba shisnem shuwa ka elekshon ka la don ka jingiaid Census da ki briew jong u MLA ban wan shim kyrteng na manla ki thliew ing bad ki pan ruh ia ka Xerox EPIC.U la kynnoh ruh ba don kiqwei pat ki briew kiba la wan sha katei ka thain da kaba thmu ban pynlong mar khaii ia ki paidbah ban shu thied beit da ka pisa, “Don u rangbah na Pynursla uba mut ban pynlong mar khaii ia ki paidbah” ong u bah Bahun khlem da jer kyrteng mano hynrei la sngewthuh pat hadien ba ia kren bad u bah Donkupar Massar MLA barim ka Nongshken u la iaid bha mynta sha Ranikor konstitwensi ban ia khuh elekshon.La pule ia ka ripod jong ka UDP Ranikor Circle da u General Secretary jong ka u bah G.G Bung Snaitang bad ha katei ka ripod u la kdew bun ki kam kiba ka UDP ka la leh hapoh Ranikor konstitwensi khamtam ha ka por long nongmihkhmat u bah P.K Raswai. U la pynkynmaw ruh ba ka UDP ka la shah rem ha u 2013 ha u Martin M Dango tang da 455 vote bad u la ong ba ka jingshah rem ka dei na ka daw ka jingiapait bad ka jingbun palat ki kandidet khamtam na ka daw ba ka Party ka khot aplikeshon ia ka tiket hynrei mynta u la ong ba ka la pyniaid da kawei pat ka rukom kata ban shu jied hi beit ia u briew ba ka party ka ibit khlem da khot aplikeshon shuh namarba ha ka elekshon ba la dep u la ong ba kiba duh tiket ki thep pynban sha la ka jong ka kol. U la batai ia ka jingiaid lynti jong katei ka seng bin pa bin ban shim dano ban pyniakhun ha u 2018 bad shuwa ban pynbna ia ka kyrteng u la ong la peit na baroh ki liang ba u kyrtong katei ka seng u dei ban long uba baroh ki paidbah ki lah ban pdiang.Ha katei ka jingialang da kawei ka sur ka UDP Ranikor ka la rai bad pynbna ba ka la jied ia u bah Pius Marwein kum u kyrtong bad kaba sah mynta ka dei sa tang ban ioh jingmynjur na ka Central Body bad la pynbna ba ym shym la phah ia ka kyrteng jongno jongno ruh sha ka Central Body hynrei tang utei u samla marwei.U bah Pius Marwein u dei u samla uba dang 32 snem karta bad uba dang mih thymmai ha ka saiñpyrthei, u dei u khunswet uba hap ban peit hi ia ka ing ka sem jong u hadien ka jingkhlad noh u kpa jong u-u dei u briew uba dang samla ( bym pat shongkurim).Ki paidbah ki la risa shaid ha katei ka jingialang tang mar ia pynbna ia ka kyrteng u bah Pius bad bun ki nongkren ki la pynpaw ba u de u samla uba shisur shi dur bad uba sngewrit.Uwei na ki rangbah uba la kren ha katei ka jingialang u la ong “Ngi la phah da u khun swet uba baroh ki ibeiñ hynre idei hangne ba ngin sa iohi ba u David u pynkyllon ia u Goliath” u la ong.U bah Pius haba kren ha katei ka sngi u la ong ba u don ka jingangnud ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha Ranikor kaba ym don jingkylla eiei wat la ka la ioh da ujuh u MLA la 20 snem mynta.U la kren diaw ia ki lynti ki syngkien ka rep ka riang bad kiwei pat ki mat ha kaba u la ong ba lada un ioh ia ka jingjop un aiti lut ka jingshakri na ka bynta u paidbah.U ba Allan haba kren ha katei ka jingialang, u la ong ba ki paidbah kim dei ban shim ia ka elekshon kum ka tamasa, hynrei ki dei ban kynmaw ba ka dei kaba kam kaba kyrpang bha kumno ban saindur ia ka lawei bad ki pateng ban wan bad ki dei ban pynshong nongrim bha shuwa ba kin nion ia u budam ban vote iano iano.U R.R Marak uwei na ki nongialam Congress u la ong ba baroh shi katta u la kyrshan radbah ia u Dango, hynrei u la ong ba u Dango um shym la don jingmut eiei ruh ban pynroi ia ka imlang sahlang hynrei tang ia ki riew shimet beit.U la ong ba u la pyrkhat ban leit ia soh noh bad ki party riewlum hynrei haba pyrkhat bha u la ong ba dei tang kawei ka Party riewlum kaba lah ban ia khun pyrshah ia ka Congress bad kata ka dei ka UDP bad dei halor katei ka bynta ba u la leit ia soh noh bad ka UDP, “Baroh ki paidbah kiba don bad nga kiba ju ia vote ia u Dango mynta baroh ki la lynniar bad ki la pynpaw ba ki la ngiah” ong u Marak.Ka Ranikor konstitwensi ka don 27,819 ngut ki nongthep vote haduh mynta, ka don 62 tylli ki Polling Station bad ki don ruh bun jait ki jaitbynriew kiba don vote ha katei ka konstitwensi ba kynthup ia ki Khasi, Garo, Hajong, Bengali, Mendai, Nepali, Urang bad kiwei pat.Haba ia kren bad une u nongthohkhubor, hadien ba la wai ka jingialang u bah P.K Raswai MLA/MDC barim uba la shah rem ha u 2013 ha u M.M Dango u la ong ba ka jingbym ia khun jong u kam dei ba u la shongthait na ka elekshon ne ka Politik hynrei ka dei ka jingailad jong u ia u samla ban pynliem ia u MLA ka Ranikor uba dei na ka seng Congress, “Kam mut ba nga shongthait na ka elekshon ne politik, hynrei nga kwah ban ailad ia u samla, ngi la ia kren ruh naduh u 2013 ba lada rem ngan ailad noh ha kiwei pat ban pyrshang” ong u bah P.K Raswai.Ha ka jingiakren u bah Raswai u la ai ksai ba ka eh bha ia u ban jop elekshon na Ranikor bad la sngewthuh ba u don jingmut ban pyrshang na kiwei pat ki konstitwensi.
title: Pynbna ka UDP Ranikor ban pynieng  da u Pius Marwein  ha u 2018

content: Shillong, 26 Lber:Ka NPP ka seng sainpyrthei ba la seng da u Purno A Sangma (bam kwai ha dwar u blei) ka lah ban khur bun ngut ki MLA na ri lum Khasi Jaintia ha ka elekshon MLA 2018. Ki lad khubor ba iajan bad katei ka seng, ki la iathuh ba ka jingpynkhreh ia ka 2018 bad ka jingwad ia ki kyrtong kiba khlain ka la iaid shaid shaid. La sngewthuh ba ki kyrtong kiba katei ka seng ka ia kren mynta ki dei ki riew rim kiba ih ha ka politik bad don ruh katto katne ngut kiba dei mynta ki MLA jong ka seng Congress.La iathuh ba U Ma Sniawbhalang Dhar, Ngaitlang Dhar bad na ka ing jong ki, ki lah ban ia khun ha u 2018 la ong ba ki lah ban ia khun na ka seng NPP bad ka jingiakren hapdeng ka NPP bad kitei ka dang iaid mynta.Nangta la iathuh ba don ruh ki MLA barim kiba la shah rem ha u 2013 kiba la pynkhreh ban ia khun na katei ka seng.La ioh jingtip ba u bah Donkupar Massar MLA barim ka Nongshken u lah ban ia khun na katei ka seng na Ranikor konstitwensi bad ki don ruh kiwei pat ki Constituency ha West Khasi Hills, kiba ka NPP, ka dang peit khmat bha ha kine ki sngi bad kitei ki kynthup ia ka Mawshynrut bad ka Rambrai Jyrngam Constituency.
title: Lah ban khur ka NPP, bun ngut  ki MLA na Khasi -Jaiñtia ha u 2018

content: Shillong, 26 Lber:Kumba 47-51 percent ki longkmie ar met ha kane ka jylla ki kha khun ha la iing bad kim treh ban leit sha hospital, la ong ka kaiphod jong ka Controller and Auditor General (CAG) jong u snemn 2016.Kane ka dei namar ba ki rukom ai jingsumar jong ka sorkar kim long kiba biang khamtam ha ki jaka nongkyndong lait noh kiba don sha sor ki jaka sumar kiba khama biang.“47-51 percent ki longkmie ar met ba la rejister kim treh ban leit kha ha hospital bad ki kham lah ban kha ha la iing”, la ong ka kaiphod u CAG.Kane ka pyni ia ka jingduna ka jingai injek bad ka jingbatai ba thikna na ki briew ka koit ka khiah. “Ka la don ruh ka jingduna ha ka jingsiew ia ki longkmie ba kha khun na ka skhim Janani Suraksha Yojana, ha kaba ki longkmie kim tip bha ia kane namar ba kam don ka jingpynshai paidbah”,la ong ka CAG.Nalor kiba bun ki jingduna, ka State Health Mission ba khlieh da u Myntri Rangbah ka long tang ka kyrteng khlem don eiei katba ka State Health Society ba khlieh da u Chief Secretary ka shu long thohmut thohmat. Namar kane, kam don ka jingtrei ban jop ia ka thong ba la buh da ka sorkar pdeng, la ong ka kaiphod u CAG.
title: 51% ki nong kyndong ki kha khun ha iing

content: Shillong, 26 Lber:U bah G.G Bung Snaitang u General Secretary ka UDP Ranikor Circle haba kren ha ka jingialang pynbna kyrtong ka UDP Ranikor kaba la long ha ka shnong Nongnah u la ther tyngeh ia ka seng Congress kaba la mihkhmat ia ka Ranikor la 20 snem mynta. U la ong ba la 20 snem ym shym la iohi kam eiei bad dei tang ha ka por ba u P.K Raswai, u long nongmihkhmat ba shibun ki kam pynroi ki la wan poi sha katei ka thaiñ.Haba kynthah ia u MLA jong ka Ranikor u M.M Dango u la ong ba ki paidbah ki la ngiah shoiñ bad ki la kwah eh ban wanrah jingkylla ha ka thaiñ, “U Dango mynta ka kynti um dei shuh ban Dang-Go hynrei u Should Go” ong u bah G.G Bung Snaitang General Secretary ka UDP Ranikor Circle.U la kynthah ruh ia u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem CEM KHADC ha kaba u la ong ba u bah Pynshngaiñ um don daw eiei bad ka seng Congress hynrei u don daw beit para marwei bad u Dr.Mukul Sangma.“Nga kwah ban ong ruh ba lehse ioh kata ka PDF ka seng thymmai kan poi shane ba ka PDF ka dei ka ‘Pynshngaiñ Democratic Front’. U bah Bung u la pynsngew sha ki paidbah da kaba ong ba dei ki MLA ka UDP kiba wanrah ia kiba bun ki mat ia kren na bynta u paidbah ha ing dorbar thaw-aiñ bad ha KHADC u la ong ba dei u MDC jong ka UDP na Umsning u bah Donkupar Sumer uba lap ia ka jyrsieh bamsap kaba shyrkhei bha na ka Professional Tax.U la ther tyngeh ia ka seng Congress ha kaba u la ong ba ha ka jylla Uttar Pradesh ka dei ka jylla ba la kha la pun ia ka seng Congress bad ka la heh la san bha hynrei mynta ki paidbah ki la kyntait lut ia katei ka seng.“Ka UP kaba dei ka ktem bah jong ka seng Congress bad la kha ruh ia katei ka seng ha katei ka jylla hynrei ha ka elekshon ba la dep ka la khyllem, hangne ha Meghalaya lei dei tang i skum sim” u la ong.U la ong ba ha u 1998 ka UDP ka la ialam ia ka sorkar ha ka jylla badkumjuh ruh katto katne por ha u snem 2008, “U Dak 8 dei u dak jong ka UDP-ha u 2018 ruh ngin thaw ia ka sorkar” u la ong da kaba bynrap ba ha Ranikor ka jingpynkylla nongmihkhmat ka dei ha u dak 8.
title: U Dango ym dei shuh ban Dang-Go,  hynrei u Should Go, ong u bah Bung

content: Jowai, 27 Lber:U Bishop ka Jylla Niam Jowai (Jowai Diocese) ha ka jingpyllait khubor hynnin ka sngi, ha Jalaphet, East Jaintia Hills District, u la ong ki Sister kiba pyniaid ia ka Nazareth Hospital, Shillong kin wan ban plie ia ka Nazareth Hospital Unit, ha Lad Pasyih-Phramer ha kane ka 31 tarik mynta u bnai.La ong ruh ha shwa ban plie ha ka por 9.30 mynstep yn don ka jingialang kaba lyngkot bad ka jingkren kyrkhu kyrdoh ia ki doktor bad naduh ka por 10 baje ki Doktor kin sdang ka jingpeit ia ki Nongpang bad ai dawai.Ha kane ka 31 tarik yn wan da ki Surgery Doktor bad ki Medicine Doktor bad ha ka 4.4.2017 (Tuesday) ki Gynnae Doktor bad Pediatric Doktor.Kane ka jingwan ki Doktor Nazareth ha Phramer, kum ka jingsdang kin wan arsien shitaiew man la ka sngi Thohdieng (Friday) bad sngi sngi ba-ar (Tuesday) jong ka taiew pynthikna shuh shuh ka Dr. Sister Noreen, Nazareth Hospital Shillong.Ha ka 31 tarik Lber 2017, un wan U Dr. Rangat (Consultant Surgery) Nazareth Hospital bad ka Team jong u. Kino kino ki Nongpang kiba kwah ban phah peit ha kine ki Doktor jong ka Nazareth Hospital, ki lah ban wan phah peit ialade ha kine ki Doktor ha man la ka sngi Thohdieng bad sngi Ba-ar jong ka taiew, kyntu u Bishop Victor Lyngdoh ka Jylla niam Jowai.
title: 31 tarik yn plie ia ka Nazareth Hospital Unit ha Phramer

content: Nongstoiñ, 26 Lber:Ha ka sngi Saitjain jong ka taiew bala lah u wei u rangbah, u ba na ka shnong Riangmaw West Khasi Hills District, u la leit ban ujor da ka ehajar ha thanad Nongstoin pyrshah ia kiba don kti ban sei tuh ia ka Challan dewiong jong u tei u rangbah.Katkum ka ehajar bala wan ban ujor da u tei u rangbah la ong ba u la lap ia katei ka jingjia ha ka14 tarik mynta u bnai katba u dang thmu ban leit sei ia ki Challan ki jong u na ka ophis DMR kaba don ha Nongstoin, hynrei Mar ia poi ha katei ka ophis u la lap ba ia ki Challan ki jong u la dep ban wan sei tuh noh da kiwei ki briew ki bym shymla lah satia ban tip.Hadien katei na ka liang jong u tei u rangbah u la ai da ka jingthoh sha u ophisar ka tnad DMR halor katei ka jingjia bad na ka liang jong ka tnad DMR kala pyntip sha u tei u rangbah ba ia ki challan MTC Book NO. 2236 SL NO. 22350, 223598 bad MEPRF Book NO. 22350 SL NO. 223598 kiba don ha ka kyrteng jong u tei u rangbah la wan ban sei noh da kiwei Pat ki briew ki bym shymla lah satia ban tip bad ithuh.Shuh shuh la ong ruh ba ki nongsei tuh ia ki Challan jong u tei u rang ah kila pyndonkam ruh ia ka specimen signature ha ka kyrteng jong u tei u rangbah bad ia ka dur thep vote (EPIC) kaba la dep phah attested ha u DC jong ka East Garo Hills District.Na ka liang jong u Officer Incharge ka Nongstoin Police Station u la ong ba ha kaba iadei bad katei ka jingjia na ka liang jong ki pulit kila dep ban register case bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid sha khmat.
title: Da ka ehajar ujor u rangbah ba  shah sei tuh, ki Challan dewiong

content: Shillong, 24 Lber:Ha ka sngi palei jong ka taiew u MDC ka Mawkynrew konstitwensi u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh uba la ju tip kum u bah Paidang u la sam paidbah ia ka skhim kaba T.3 klur tyngka kaba la ioh lyngba ka Special Assistant na ka sorkar pdeng. La sam ia katei ka skhim ha ka jingialang paidbah kaba la long ha phyllaw ing skul jong ka Church of God ha Thangsning. Katei ka skhim kaba la sam ka kynthup ia ki jingtrei bapher bapher naduh ka lynti iaidkjat, pynbha ia ki Community Hall, ki kynroh, ki nala um, ki madan ialehkai, surok Shnong, ki skul jong ki shnong bapher bapher ba hap hapoh Mawkynrew konstitwensi. La sam ia ki work order da u bah Pai ryngkat bad ka kurim jong u ka kong Amanda Pakynteiñ.Ha kane ka sngi, u Bah Paidang ula buh ka jingtyrwa hakhmat u paidbah na ka bynta ka elekshon MLA-2018 bad ula pan ïa ka jingkyrshan na u paidbah ryngkat jingkular da kaba ong “Lada nga shah jied kum u MLA ha u 2018, ngan nym aireng shuh ïa ka elekshon MDC-2019 namar nga sngewthuh ba ngan nym lah ban shakri ar kynrad”. Kiwei pat kiba la ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup ïa u Bah Kolin Rongtong Sordar rim ka Nongjrong, u Bah Tyngkai S Mynsong Sordar Raid Rngi, Bah Andra Rynjah Sordar Laitkyrhong, Bah Traibor Nongkhlaw Sordar Thangsning, Bah Cresent Lyngdoh President ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Mawkynrew Constituency, Bah Seibor Warbah, Secretary Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Mawkynrew Constituency, Bah Daniel Suting ba na Jatah Lakadong bad kiwei kiwei. Ia ka jingialang ha katei ka sngi la pyniaid da u Bah D.L.Nongspung.
title: T.3 klur sam skhim ka  lok U MDC Mawkynrew

content: Jowai, 24 Lber:Ka JHADC mynta ka sngi ka la mynjur ia ka Mang Tyngka kaba 140.19 klur bad kane ka mang tyngka ka duna haduh 1.52 klur na ka jing-mang ban ioh lum.Ka JHADC lyngba kane ka mang tyngka ka la mang ban lum haduh 139.19 klur katba la mang ban pyllut pat haduh 140.72 klur. Ha shwa ban mynjur ia katei ka mang tyngka, ka la don ka jingiatai da ki member jong ka JHADC ha kaba u ma Marki Mulieh u la ong ba ka jingthaw thymmai ia ka kam bapher bapher hapoh ka Council kan ktah iaka iarong pisa jong ka. U la ong ruh ba ka jingthung ia ka Casual Driver bad ia ki Casual Peon bad Personal Peon ruh ka ktah ia ka pla pisa jong ka District Council.Ka JHADC ka la mang ban thung haduh 39 tylli ki kam ba lait hapoh ka Council na ka bynta ban pynkhlain shuh shuh ia ka rukom treikam jong ka.Hadien ka jingiatai, ha ka dorbar kaba la shong ha ka nohphai sngi, ka iing dorbar ka JHADC ka la rai ban mynjur iaka kumba ka long ha kaba u Chairman ka JHADC u la pynbna ruh hapoh ka iing ba ia katei ka mang Tyngka kaba dei na ka bynta u snem 2017-18 la mynjur bad pdiang ia ka dang ka iing dorbar.Ha ka kylla step jong ka dorbar Mang Tyngka, la iatai ruh halor ka Bill kaba la wanrah da u CEM hynnin ka sngi Palei hapoh ka iing Dorbar. Katei ka Bill kaba la tip kum ka The Jaintia Hills Autonomous District (Administration of Justice) Bill, 2017.Kane ka Bill ka long na ka bynta ban pynkhlain ia ka rukom trei kam ki Court District Council naduh ka Subordinate District Council Court, District Council Court bad Additional District Council Court bad kumjuh ruh ia ki Village Court lyngba ki kyndon bapher bapher.U ma Marki Mulieh u ba dei u MDC ba marwei ka liang pyrshah u la wanrah ia ka mat iatai, hynrei la kyntait ia ka da u lamphang dorbar, na ka daw ba kam long satia kaba shai bad kumjuh ruh u la wanrah ia ka Amendment halor katei ka Bill, hynrei hadien pat u la hap ban weng noh na ka daw ba baroh kiwei pat ki dkhot ka iing dorbar ki mynjur ia ka kumba ka long.
title: Mynjur ka JHADC ia ka mang tyngka kaba 140.72  Klur

content: Shilllong, 24 Lber:Ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi ka la pass ia ka ain da kaba pynkiew ia ka baibam tymmen jong ki MLA sha ka T. 30 hajar. Ia kane ka ain Legislative Assembly of Meghalaya (members Pension (amendment) Bill 2017. Ia kane ka Bill la wanrah da u MM Danggo u myntri ka tnad parliamentary affairs.Da ka jingpas ia kane ka ain, ki MLA kiba la shongthait kin ioh baibam tymmen T. 30 hajar shi bnai. Da kane ka jingwanrah ia kane ka jingpynkylla ia ka baibam tymmen jong ki MLA la pynkiew na ka T.17,000/- sha ka T.30,000/-, ia ka Medical Allowances kaba T.3000/- mynta la pynkiew sha ka T.5000/- bad kane kan treikam naduh ka 1 tarik u bnai Kyllalyngot 2017.Ha kajuh ka por, ka iing dorbar ka la pdiang ruh ban pynkiew tulop jong ki MLA lyngba ka jingpdiang ia ka Meghalaya Legislators Salaries and Allowances (Amendment) Bill, 2017, ia kaba la pdiang da ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi.
