Kane ka Amendment bill, ka long ban kyntiew ia ka tulop bad kiwei kiwei de ki jingsiew, ia ki minister, speaker, Parliamentary secretary, nongialam ka liang pyrshah bad ia ki dkhot jong ka iing dorbar thawain ka jylla.Katkum kane ka Amendment Bill kaba la wanrah mynta ka sngi hapoh ka iing dorbar ka tulop jong u Speaker, la pynkiew na ka T.63,600/- sha ka T.1,08,000/-, ia u Deputy Speaker la pynkiew na ka T.62,750/- la pynkiew sha ka T.1,06,000/-.Na ka bynta jong u myntri rangbah, la pynkiew na ka T.64,000/- sha ka T.1,09,000/- Ia ki myntri la pynkiew na ka T.63,600/- sha ka T.1,07,500/-, ki myntri khynnah, la pynkiew na ka T.63,200/- sha ka T.1,07,000/-, bad na ka T.62,750/- la pynkiew sha ka T.1,06,000/- bad ia ki parliamentary Secretary pat la pynkiew na ka T.62,750/- la pynkiew sha ka T.1,06,000/-.Katba na ka bynta jong ki MLA, ia ka tulop jong ki la pynkiew na ka T.34,000/- sha ka T.60,000/- ia kiwei ki jingsiew sha ki MLA, kaba ki ioh T.5000/- la pynkiew sha ka T.15,000/- na ka bynta ka bai phone bad kiwei kiwei ki jingdon kam la buh T.11,000/-, Ka jingsiew kaba T.3000/- tyngka la pynkiew sha ka T.10,000/-, ka jingsiew kaba T.7000/- la pynkiew sha ka T.14,000/- ia ka jingsiew kaba T.6000/- la pynkiew sha ka T.12,000/- haba khien lang baroh ka jingsiew ia u MLA ha ka shibnai kala kiew sha ka T.1,21,000/- tyngka.Na ka bynta jong nongialam ka liang pyrshah hapoh ka iing dorbar ka jingsiew la pynkiew na ka T.63,250/- sha ka T.1,07,000/-.Kiwei ki Bill ba la pass da ka iing dorbar ki long ka Meghalaya Community and Public Services Social Audit Bill 2017, ka ban ailad ia ki paidbah ban leh audit ia ki kam ba la shna da ka sorkar ha man ki jaka ha ka jylla kaba iasyriem bad ka Social audit jong ka skhim shipah sngi na ka MGNREGS.Ka iing dorbar ka la pdiang ruh ia ka jingpynkylla ia ka Compulsory Registration of Marriage Act (amendment) Bill 2017 katkum ka jingdawa jong ki Balang bapher bapher.
title: Mynjur ka iing dorbar ban pynkiew  tulop ia ki MLA bad ki MLA rim

content: Jowai, 24 Lber:Ka Sumer Patorship kaba don hapoh ka Raliang Elaka kaba dei ruh tang ma ka, ka Patorship kaba la ithuh da ka JHADC naduh u snem 1968, mynta ka sngi ka iing Dorbar ka la rai ban mynjur ia ka Resolution ba wanrah da u CEM ka JHADC u ma Thombor Shiwat na ka bynta ban ai Elaka noh ia ka.Ia katei ka Elaka ba thymmai la tip ia ka kum ka Sumer Elaka kaba don palat 10 hajar ki nongshong shnong bad kaba kynthup ia ki 17 tylli ki shnong.Ki shnong kiba hap hapoh katei ka Elaka Thymmai ki kynthup ia ka shnong Pala kum ka head-quarter, ka Kseh, Umkyrpong, Mooriap, Lakasein, Samasi, Mynthlu, Krem Myrsiang, Kyrluh, Jalapher Bri-Sumer, Mulait Bri-Sumer, Mookhain, Mynthning, Shyrwang, Larket, Khahnar bad ka Mooknor.U ma Thombor Shiwat, haba kren hapoh ka iing Dorbar u la pynpaw ba riew rangbah na ka thain Sumer ki la dawa la slem bha ban ioh noh ia la ka Elaka bad hadien ba ka EC ka la bishar bniah bad ka la shem ba ki paidbah katei ka thain ki ia kynduh jingeh shibun ban wan shaduh sha Raliang na ka bynta ban pyndep ia ki kam ki jam jong ki ha kaba iadei bad ka Ophis u Dolloi.U ma Bison Iano, MDC ka Raliang ruh u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen halor ka jingrai ban pynkha ia ka Sumer Elaka. Utei u MDC u la iathuh ba ia kane ka kam la leh ruh da ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut ki bor Elaka jong ka Raliang bad ki Rangbah jong ka Sumer Patorship (Sumer Elaka mynta).Na ka liang u ma Richard Singh Lyngdoh ruh u la ai ka jingiaroh ia ka EC kaba la wanrah ia katei ka mat iakren bad u la kyntu ia ka EC ban pynbiang sa ia u pud u sam ba janai jong katei ka Elaka khnang ban lait na kano kano ka jingiapher jingmut hapdeng ki nongshong shnong kiba na ki elaka ba marjan.
title: Ioh elaka ka Sumer Patorship

content: Nongpoh, 27 Lber:Da ki hajar ngut ki paid nongshong shnong na ki shnong bapher bapher kiba don ha ki thain Mawhati, Ri Bhoi District, mynta ka sngi ki la tuid sha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Madan Umsohlait, ban ai ka jingkyrshan ia u Bah Roswell Shadap, uwei na ki kyrtong uba don ia ka jingthmu ban iakhun ha ka Elekshon 2018 na ka party National People Party (NPP) na Mawhati Constituency.Ha kane ka jingialang paidbah, kaba la sakhi ruh da ka jingdonlang da ki heh nongialam ka NPP, ba kynthup ia u Bet Sangma, General Secretary ka State NPP, u Bah J.S Kurbah, President ka NPP East Khasi Hills District bad kaei kaba kham pynkmen eh ia ki heh nongialam ka NPP, ka dei nalor ka jingdon jong ki paidbah, hynrei la pynshngain ruh da ka jingiashim bynta lang da ki phew ngut ki Rangbah Shnong jong ki shnong kiba don ha katei ka thain.U Bah Roswell Shadap, haba kren ha kane ka sngi, nyngkong eh um lah khlem da pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ban iohi ba ki paidbah ki kloi ban ai ka jingkyrshan kaba radbah ia u ban long kum u kyrtong na ka party NPP ha ka Elekshon 2018 bad u la phla ruh da kaba ong, ka nongrim hi kaba la pynlong ia u ba un mih madan ka dei ruh hadien ba u la ioh ban iakynduh bad iakren bad ki rangbah shnong kiba don ha ka Mawhati Constituency.“Nga sngewkhia ban iohi ia ka jingshah banbein jong ki nongrep ha ka sorkar, namar kumba ka long mynta ha ka Mawhati Constituency hi haduh 90 persen ki dang dei hi ki nongrep bad ha kajuh ruh ka por ka dang dei hi ka thain kaba dang sahdien ha kiba bun ki liang, kumta lada ym don lei sa ki nongmihkhmat ki ban peit ia kane ka jingeh jong ki paidbah, ka la nang pynshem jingeh shuh shuh ia ki paidbah ha ka thain hi baroh kawei” ong u Bah Roswell Shadap.Namarkata, lada ka Party NPP kan ai ia ka Ticket bad lada ngan jop na kane ka Constituency, nga kular haphi ki paidbah ba nga kloi wat ban long kum u nongbahkhlieh (Grantor), namar ka kamram jong ki nongmihkhmat ka long ban peit ia ka roi ka par na ka bynta jong ki paidbah nongshong shnong, u la bynrap.Ha kane ka sngi la ioh ruh ia ka jingkren da u Bet Sangma, ha kaba u la pynshai paidbah halor ka nongrim ba ka NPP ka ieng bad u la ong ruh ba ka party NPP ia kaba la seng da u (L) P.A Sangma ha u snem 2013, hynrei kumba ka long mynta ka la suhthied wat sha kiwei ki jylla jong ka Ri. Shuh shuh, u la ong ruh kumba ki paidbah ka Mawhati Constituency, ki kwah ban ai ia ka Ticket sha u Bah Roswell Shadap, hynrei u la pynshai ba ia kaba mynta hi ym pat lah ban rai, tangba kaei kaba la sakhi halor kane ka jingbun jong ki paidbah kiba la wan ha kane ka sngi, kum ki nongialam ka Party ngin sa leit ban iathuh sha kiba kham halor jong ka Party, khnang ba kin ioh ban shim ia ka rai.Namarkata, kaba ka Party hi ka kwah ban ai ia ka Ticket sha u briew uba ki paidbah ki shanniah, khnang ba yn lah ban wanrah ia ka jingjop bad kumba ka NPP ka don ia ka jingangnud ban ioh ia ka bor synshah hadien ka Ilekshon 2018, u la bynrap.
title: Poi palat hajar ki paidbah ha ka jingialang NPP ha Umsohlait

content: Shillong, 24 Lber:Ka HSPDP Mawkyr-wat area ka kwah ban pynshai paidbah ba ka khubor kaba la mih ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la dep kaba ong “U Bah E.K. Raswai u kyrtong ka HSPDP na Mawkyrwat ha u 2018” ka long kaba bakla bad ka bym don jingshisha eiei.Haba pynshai halor kane u Bah Nolip Lyngdoh u President ka HSPDP Mawkyrwat area, ka seng u la ong ba ka kwah ban pynshai ba ka party kam pat rai eiei halor iano ban ai ia ka tiket ban ialeh na Mawkyrwat namar ia kane ka kam dang hap ban iakren ha ka komiti kaba dei bad kane ka bynta kaba dei ka Central Election Committee ka party.“Ngi kwah ban pynshai ruh ba don ar ngut ki riew rangbah kiba la pan tiket na ka party na ka bynta ka election 2018; kita ki long Bah Enbin K. Raswai bad Bah Renikton L. Tongkhar”,la ong ka HSPDP.Halor kane ka kam ka seng HSPDP Mawkyrwat Area ka dang hap ban ap ia ka rai jong ka Central Election Committee ha shwa ba kan pynbna paidbah ia u kyrtong jong ka, la ong u Bah Nolip Lyngdoh.
title: Ym pat rai kyrtong na Mawkyrwat: HSPDP

content: Shillong, 27 Lber:Ka kong Roshan Warjri, myntri ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar Jylla, ka la ia kynduh ia u myntri ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar India, U JP Nadda, mynta ka sngi ha ka ophis treikam jongu ha New Delhi, ha kaba ka la pynpaw ia ka jingdonkam kyrkieh ba ka sorkar India, kan mynjur noh ia ka Megha Health Insurance Scheme (MHIS). U myntri ka koit ka khiah, ka sorkar India, u la kular ha ka kong Warjri, ba un peit kham kloi noh ia katei ka wah. Ka myntri ka pynpaw ruh ia ka jingdonkam ban don ka Amrit Pharmacy ha Shillong Civil Hospital, Shillong bad ban buh noh ia ka jaka sumar, ia kiba mynsaw jur ha Civil Hospital, Shillong bad ha Tura Hospital ruh kumjuh.
title: Ba sahkut ka MHIS, hiar  Delhi ka myntri Jylla

content: Shillong, 24 Lber:Mynta ka nohphai sngi kawei ka Petrol Pump kaba don ha Nongrim Hills kaba don mar syndah bad ka Rynjah ka la pluh. Katei ka jingjia la ong ba ka jia ha ka por 4 baje eiei nohphai sngi. La iathuh ba ka jingsdang kem ding jong katei ka Petrol Pump ka dei na kawei ka trok kit umphniang kaba ieng ha katei ka jaka.Haba ia kren bad u SP City u bah Vivek Syiem u la ong ba katei ka Petrol Pump ka dei kaba long trai da u bah Plostarland Lyngdoh na ka shnong Nongshiliang. Ha katei ka jingjia u la ong ba kam shym la don kano kano ka jingjulor kaba heh lait noh tang ka kali kit umphniang kaba ieng hangtei bad ki kor theh umphniang.Haduh mynta ki pulit kim pat lah ban ai jingkheiñ ia ki jingjulor ha katei ka jingjia bad ki dang tohkit ban lap ia ka daw bad la iathuh ba tang mar ia kem ding katei ka Petrol Pump kaba don ha ka jaka sah briew, ki paidbah ki la mih na la ki ing ki sem bad ki la lynñiar bad phet shane shatai.Namar katei ka jingjia la iohi ba da ki phew tylli ki kali pynlip ding na ki dong bapher bapher ka nongbah Shillong ki la her sha katei ka jaka ban leit tem ia ka ding kaba klang. La iohi ruh ba namar katei ka jingjia ka la don ka jingdheng kali kaba jur bha mynta ka janmiet ha kylleng ka nongbah Shillong.
title: Pluh ka Petrol Pump ha Nongrim  Hills; tasam ka dheng kali

content: Shillong,24 Lber:Ka Shnong Phodeit-sim kaba don ha ki thain Phodkroh Ranikor kam shym la ioh bording naduh ba la thaw shnong kata naduh u snem 1996 haduh kine ki sngi ruh, ka dorbar shnong ka la dawa na ki bor ka MeECL ba ka dei ban wanrah bording noh ha katei ka shnong da kaba ki la leit ban aida ka jingthoh. U bah Sporlin u rangbah na katei ka shnong u la ong ba ki bor shnong ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia u MLA jong ki u Martin M Dango halor katei ka kam, hynrei ki shu kut tang ha ki jingkular. U la iathuh ba katei ka shnong kaba don 30 ing bad 135 ngut ki nongshong shnong ka ia kynduh jingeh namar ka jingbym don bording bad ki khun ki kti jong ki ki hap khreh kot da kaba thang sharak ha ka por miet.U Samla Marconi Thongni, President ka Ranikor Circle u la bynrap ba kane ka shnong ka dei kaba la rung ruh ha ka Khanasamari jong u snem 2000-2001 bad 2010-2012 jong ka Sorkar. “Ngi sngew lyngngoh haduh katta katta watla kane ka shnong ka dei kaba la rung ha ka Khanasamari pynban na ka liang u Director ka tnat Distribution jong ka MeECL u la ong ba kane ka shnong kam pat rung ha ka skhim DDUG,” ong u Samla Marconi. U iathuh ruh ba u Director ka tnat Distribution ka MeECL u la kular sha ki nongialam ka Phodeitsim bad KSU ban pynioh bording ia kane ka shnong da kaba pynrung ha ka Phase-II jong ka skhim DDUG. U la iathuh ruh ba kane ka shnong ka dei ruh ka bym pat don surok rong bad ki paidbah ki dang hap pyndonkam da ka lynti khlaw.
title: Naduh 1996 ym don ding ha Phodeitsim

content: Shillong, 24 Lber:Ka shnong Lait-mawlong-Wahpein kaba don ha konstitwensi Sohra ka la ioh ia ka jingithuh kum ka Open Defecation Free (ODF) ne ka shnong kaba la don lut ki painkhana ha man ki thliew iing. Ia kane ka jingpynbna la plie paidbah da u MLA ka thain u Bah TW Chyne ha ka jingialang kaba long hynne ka sngi ha katei ka shnong ba la don lang ka BDO ka Khatar shnong-Laitkroh Kong E Warjri bad ki riew rangbah katei ka shnong. Ha kane ka sngi, u MLA u la pynpaw ia ka jingkmen ba ka shnong kaba la lah ban pyntreikam ia kane ka jingthmu ban pynneh ia ka jingkhuid bad u la kyntu ia ki paidbah nongshnong ba kin bat bha ia ka jingkhuid ha ka shnong bad ki sawdong sawkun.
title: Ka Laitmawlong- Wahpein kaba khuid

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:U MLA ka Mawsyn-ram u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem u la byrngem ban leit kiew sha iing kashari lada ka sorkar jylla ka dang iai leh meinah ban nym pynlait thikna ia ka bhah pisa kaba dei jong ka district council.Haba wanrah ia ka jingkylli hynne ka sngi hapoh ka iing dorbar, u Bah Pynshngain u la ong, “Lada ka sorkar kam pynlait pura ia ka bhah pisa jong ka district council, ngin hap ban leit tied jingkhang sha ka Kashari”.U la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban sngewthuh ba ia ka bhah ka district council ka dei kaba la pynkhamti da ka riti synshar ka ri India bad ka dei ka kamram ka sorkar banpyndep hok ia ka kamram.U Bah Pynshngain u la kynnoh ba u Myntri ka district council affairs u Bah Prestone Tynsong u khlem kreh kot bha shwa ban wanrah ia ka jubab hapoh ka iing dorbar bad u la ai jingkhein bakla.U la ong ba ha ka jiingshisha, ka sorkar ka dang dei ban pynlait ia ka bhah pisa basah sha ki district council ka long T.130 klur tam na ka jingioh lum khajna na u dewiong, mawshun.Halor kane, u myntri ka tnad district council affairs u Bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba haduh mynta ka pisa ba dang sah ba ka sorkar jylla kam pat pynlait sha ki district council ka T.57,00,34,755 klur kynthup ka KHADC, JHADC bad ka GHADC.Kane ka pisa kaba dei ban ioh da ki district council ka dei ka bhah na ka major mineral kaba mut na u dewiong, mawshun, la ong u Bah Tynsong.U Myntri ka tnad district council u la ong ba na ka bynta ki minor mineral ka sorkar ka la pynlait lut sha ki district council.Katkum ka jingong u myntri, ka pisa ba dei bhah ban ioh ka JHADC ka long T. 20,57,88,586 klur, ka KHADC ka long T.36,42,46,169 klur. Hynrei ia ka GHADC la dep pynlait lut kata T.64,97,185 klur.Halor ka jingbyrngem u Bah Pynshngain ban leit sha Kashari, u bah Tynsong u la ong ba lada u bah Pynshngain um hun, um lah ban khang ba un leit sha Kashari.U la kyntait ia ka jingong u Bah Pynshngain ba ka sorkar ka leh meinah ia ka district ha ka jylla. “Ka sorkar jylla kam ju leh meinah ia ki district council bad ka pynlait beit ia ka bhah katkum ba la pynkhamti ha ka riti synshar ka ri”, la ong u Bah Tynsong.
title: T. 57 klur tam sah ka bhah  ki District Council ha ka sorkar

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:Ka jingbuh ia ki ing Meghalaya house shabar jylla ka long ia ka leit ka wan jong ki heh sorkar kynthup ki Myntri, ki babu sorkar hynrei ia ki paidbah bad ki samla pule kan shong lada lait ki kamra, la ong u Myntri ka General Administration u bah HDR Lyngdoh ha ing dorbar.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli u MLA u John Leslee K Sangma, U bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ki don 147 ngut ki nongtrei ha Meghalaya house ha New Delhi, Kolkata, Mumbai, Vellore bad Guwahati katba ki nongaibam ki don 88 ngut.Nalor kine, la don 24 tylli ki Kali kynthup 13 ha New Delhi, 8 ha Kolkata bad mar kawei ha Guwahati, Mumbai, bad Vellore.Halor ka jingbym ioh jingbam tynrai na Meghalaya ha kine ki iing khamtam ki dohkha tyrkhong, u Myntri u la ong ba un peit ia kane ban pynthikna ba ki paidbah Meghalaya kin ioh bam Dohkha ha kitei ki ing.Shwa ia kane u MLA u Saleng K Sangma u la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban ai pyniaid canteen noh ha ki samla bym ioh kam ka jylla kiba la pyndep ia ka jinghikai ha ka hospitality bad ym dei ban ai ha ki briew nabar jylla.
title: Ki iing Meghalaya kim mang  kyrpang ia ki samla pule

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:U MLA ka Sohra u Bah TW Chyne mynta ka sngi hapoh ka ing dorbar u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew khia ia ka jingai wai ka sorkar ha ki riew shimet ban ap khyrdop ha Secretriat kaba dei ka jaka ka jabieng jong ka jylla.Haba wanrah ia kane ka mat ha ka ing dorbar u Bah Chyne u la ong, “Kumno ka sorkar ka lah ban shu ai wai kat ia ka kam pahara ban ap khyrdop ha Secretariat kaba dei ka kamram jong ki pulit”.U la ong ba kane ka jingleh ka sorkar ka long kaei kaei kaba lah ban ktah bad um sngew iahap ia kane ka jingleh ka sorkar.U MLA u la kren ruh ia ka jingbym don ki jaka ap ia ki heh ki hain haba ki leit donkam ha Secretariat khamtam ia ki MLA kiba thmu ban leit kynduh ia ki myntri sorkar ha kaba ki hap ban shu ap kum ki riew paidbah shabar.Ym tang kane, u MLA u la pynsngew ruh ba ka phyllaw ka Secretariat ka dei kum ka jaka set kali jot namar ba la khapngiah ki kali bad kane ka la wanrah ia ka jingbym itynnad bad ka jingjaboh bad pynsniew dur ia ka Secretariat.“Ka Painkhana ha Secretariat ruh kaba la rim bha kum ka juk barim bad ka donkam ban pynthymmai ia kane”,la ong u MLA ka Sohra.Haba jubab ia kane, ka myntri ka Deborah Marak ka la ong ba ka sorkar ka la ai wai ha ki riew shimet tang ban shu long nongplie hynrei ym ia ka kam pahara la leh da ki pulitKa la kubur ia ka jingong u MLA ba ka phyllaw ka Secretariat ka dei ka jaka set kali jot bad ka la kynnoh ba kane ka dei namar ba ka tnad pyniaid kali kam ju patiaw ban pynkhuid ia ki kali ba la rim watla ka la thoh bunsien ba kin leh ia kane ka kam.“Nga mynjur ba ka phylla ka Secretariat ka dei ka jaka set kali jot bad ka daw ka dei namar ba ka tnad pyniaid ka slem palat ban leh haba la dep ai jingthoh man ka por ba kan pynkhuid noh ia ki kali rim”,la ong ka myntri.Ka la kular ruh ba kan shimkhia lada don kamra ban buh kum ka MLA room khnang ba ki MLA kiba leit kynduh ia ki myntri sorkar ha Secretariat kin shong jahthait.Ka la kular ruh ban peit ia ka jinglong jingman ki painkhana ha Secretariat kumba lapynsngew da u MLA ka Sohra.
title: Ki nongap khyrdop ha  Secretariat, shu ai wai nabar

content: Shillong, 21 Lber:U MLA ka Rambrai-Jyrngam u bah KP Pangniang u la ong ba ki shnong ba don ha ki jaka ba iaknieh bad ka Assam ki la jah lut baroh ha ka map ba pynmih da ka Geological Survey of India(GSI) hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba ka sorkar jylla kam shym la shim khia eiei halor kane.Haba wanrah ia kane ka mat ha ing dorbar mynta ka sngi u bah Pangniang u la ong, “Kaei kaba la pynjah ia ki shnong ba iaknieh hapdeng ka Assam bad Meghalaya ha ka map, kam don jingsngew khia eiei ia kane ka sorkar”, la ong u bah Pangiang.U la ong ba kane ka map ka la ialam bakla ia u pud u sam ka Meghalaya bad ka paw ba ki 12 tylli ki jaka ba iaknieh kim don shuh sha Meghalaya.“Kane ka map ka la iaid iew bad saphriang kylleng ha ki skul, ki jaka”, la ong u bah Pangiang.Haba takrain ia ka sorkar kaba khlem shimkhia halor ban pynbeit ia u pud u sam, u bah Pangniang u la ong ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la iaid lynti 45 snem, hynrei kam pat don u pud u sam ba pura bad kane ka paw ba ka map jong u snem 1971 kam iahap shuh bad ka map 2009.U la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynmih jingpynbna ban weng noh ia kane ka map 2009.Haba jubab halor kane, u Symbud Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Roytre C Laloo u la ong ba ka Geology Survey of India (GSI) kam shym la pynmih kano kano ka map ha u snem 2009.U Dr Laloo u la ong ba ka map kaba la wanrah da u MLA ka Rambrai ka dei kaba leh da ka tnad Department of Science and Technology, ym kaba pynmih da ka GSI.U la ong ba ha kane ka map la thoh ba ia ki jaka ba don ha ka khappud bad ka Assam ym pat pynthikna. “Ka sorkar Meghalaya ka la phah jingthoh sha u Additional Director ka GSI halor kane hynrei ka jubab ka long ba ka GSI kam shym la pynmih map eiei ha u snem 2009”, la ong u Dr Laloo.U la ong ba ka sorkar Meghalaya kam pdiang ruh ia kane ka map namar ba baroh ki jaka ba iaknieh bad ka Assam ka kwah ba ki dei ban wan sha Meghalaya.“Ia ka jingpynmih ia kane ka map la leh khlem mynjur ne iasyllok bad ka sorkar Meghalaya. Ngi la ujor pyrshah ia kane”, la ong u Dr Laloo.U la ong ba ka jingiakren ban pgnbeit iakajia pud bad ka Assam ka la iaid naduh u snem 1971 haduh mynta. “Naduh u snem 1971 la don 19 sien ba ki Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam ki iakynduh haduh 2012, bad 12 sien ki Chief Secretary”, la ong u Dr Laloo.U la ong ba baroh ki jingialang pynbeit pud ki la poi sha ka 21 sien ha kine ki 44 snem hynrei khlem pat lah ban iapynbeit hynrei na ka liang ka sorkar kan iai buddien ban ioh biang ia ki jaka sha Meghalaya.
title: Jah lut ki jaka ka Meghalaya ha  map ka GSI, ong u MLA Rambrai

content: Jowai, 27 Lber:Mynta ka sngi kawei ka longkmie na ka shnong Barato, West Jaintia Hills ka la ujor sha ki pulit ba u khun jong ka uba kyrteng kum u Riwanshias Dhar u la shah shoh haduh ba u la mynsaw jur ha ki phra ngut ki briew kiba dei na ka juh ka shnong.Katei ka longkmie ka la kynnoh ba u khun jong ka u la shah shoh shah bom ha kitei ki phra ngut ki briew kiba don ia ki tiar pynmynsaw ba shyrkhei.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka 25 tarik ha ka por 10 baje mynmiet ha ka jaka kaba la tip kum ka Mynriang Thwai Shyrngan. Hynriew ngut na kitei kiba shah kynnoh kidei kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Por Talang, Promus Biam, Dahun Situng, Najir Mynso, Hamrit Timung bad u Binas Timung katba ar ngut kiwei pat ym shym la ithuh kyrteng.
title: Ujor ka kmie ba thmu pyniap ia u khun

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:Kum ka dak jong ka jingsngewlem halor ka jingshah shoh ki doktor, ha kiba ha iing jong ki nongpang ha Maharash-tra, ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep, ki doktor jong ka NEIGRIHMS mynta ka sngi, ha ka lama jong ka NEIGRIHMS Residents Doctors Association (NRDA), ki pynlong mynta ka sngi, kum ka sngi ba iong bad ba ki leit trei, da kaba deng da ki jain iong.“Ka dei kane ka lynti ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngewlem ia ki doktor, kiba la shah shoh ha kiba ha iing jong ki nongpang, khlem don daw eiei” ong U Dr Ete Tony, President jong ka NRDA. La iathuh ruh, ba ha ki ar taiew ba ladep, ki la don bun ki jingshah ktah kti jong ki doktor bad katei ka long, kaba ima shibun eh, ong shuh U Dr Tony. Ki doktor, ki trei haduh 100 kynta ha ka shi taiew bad kane ka jingleh tohmet ia ki, ka long kaba sngewsih jur shibun eh, ong U Dr Tony. Ki doktor ki pyrshah ruh ia ka rai jong ka Bombay High Court, ha kaba ka ia nujor ia ki doktor, ba ki dei ban long kum ki nongtrei karkhana bad katei ka dei ka rai, kaba ki sngew pyrshah jur.
title: Ka sngi “ba iong” ki doktor NEIGHRIMS

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:Ka House Committee ba la thaw da ka ïng dorbar ka KHADC ba la khlieh da u nongialam ka liang pyrshah u bah Manstudy Nongrem MDC ka Congress na Langrin ka la pyndep ia ka jingtohkit jong ka halor ki jingkynnoh bamsap kiba ha KHADC kaba la kot haduh T.1.52 klur tyngka ( Shi klur san phew ar lak tyngka) kaba dei ka pisa khajna jong ka Professional Tax kaba la lum na Nongpoh bad Nongstoiñ.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor mynta ka sngi u Chairman jong katei ka komiti u bah Manstudy, u la ong ba ka komiti ka la dep shong haduh san sien ban bishar bniah ia katei ka kam bad ia kiba dei ban khot hajir la khot hajir lut bad mynta ki la dep ban pynbit pynbiang ia ka ripod bad ia katei ka ripod yn phah noh sha ka ophis jong u Chairman jong ka KHADC u bah L.G Nongsiej ban leh ia kaba donkam.U bah Manstudy u la ong ba haduh mynta ym pat lah ban pyntip paidbah ia katei ka ripod naba ka dei kaba long trai da ka ing dorbar bad ia kaei kaba don hapoh katei ka ripod yn pyntip beit hapoh ing dorbar. Haba u bah Manstudy um shym treh ban iathuh ia kaei kaba ka komiti ka la lap, la kylli na u hato katkum ka jinglap jong ka komiti ka i donkam ne-em ba dei ban khot kyrkieh noh ia ka dorbar kyrpang, “Donkam ban khot kyrkieh noh ia ka dorbar kyrpang, ngin ai jingmut ia u chairman ba un khot noh” ong u bah Manstudy.Ki dkhot jong katei ka House Committee ki kynthup ia ka nongialam jong ki MDC ka HSPDP ka kong Teilinia Thangkhiew, nongialam ki MDC ka UDP u bah Teinwell Dkhar, nongialam ka KHNAM bah Adelbert Nongrum bad katei ka komiti ka la pynrung ruh ia u bah V.G Kynta u stad-aiñ kum u dkhot jong ka ban iarap tohkit ia katei ka kam.Lah ban kdew ba ka la don ka jingpynrung ia ka pisa jong ka Professional Tax jong ka KHADC ba la iohlum na Nongpoh bad Nongstoiñ Branch bad katei ka mat ka la khih win bha ha ing dorbar District Council ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba la leit, ka la don ruh ka kynhun tohkit ban tohkit ia katei ka kam hynrei ka ing dorbar kam hun ia ka ripod bad ka la thaw da ka kynhun tohkit jong ka ing dorbar.
title: Donkam dorbar kyrkieh halor  ka ripod bamsap ha KHADC

content: Nongstoiñ, 22 Lber:Wat la ka shnong Tangri ka long kawei na ki shnong kaba la paw bad bna nam bha ha ka thain West Khasi Hills, naduh ki por ba mynshwa, pynban ka dei ruh kawei na ki shnong kaba iai mad ia kiba bun ki jingeh bad ka long ruh ka shnong kaba dang sahdien bha ha ka roi ka par haduh kine ki sngi.Katkum ka jingwad jingtip jong u ne u nongthoh khubor u la lap ba katei ka shnong Tangri, ka la paw nam bha ha ka jingbun khli (khlieng) kaba la pynlong ruh ia u Kaitor ba paw nam bha jong ka West Khasi Hills u ba la bam kwai ha Dwar u Blei u (L) Skendrowell Syiemlieh ban thaw jingrwai halor ka jingbun khlieng katei ka shnong, bad ka kyrteng jong katei ka shnong ka la paw ruh ka jngrwai ‘Ah Moina’ ba la rwai da u tei u kaitor.Katei ka shnong Tangri ka jngai tang kumba 2 KM ei ei na ka shnong Shyrwang kaba don ha surok bah Nongstoin-Shillong shnong bad katei ka shnong ka dang hap hapoh ka Mawthadraishan Konstitwensi West Khasi Hills District bad ban poi sha katei ka shnong hap ban kam lyngba ka wah Kynshi bad kaba sngewsih ka long ba katei ka shnong haduh mynta mynne ka dang hap ban pyndonkam ia ka jingkieng sainar iaid kjat ban kam lyngba katei ka wah, namar ba haduh mynta mynne ym pat don satia ka jingkieng ba lah ban iaid kali.Kaba kham I sangsot shuh shuh ia kaba u ne u nongthoh u la lap ka long ba ki paidbah nongshong shnong katei ka shnong bad kiwei ki shnong ba marjan kiba hap ban kam lyngba katei ka wah ki hap ruh ban kit lang ia ki Mar ki Mata ki jong ki ha la ka met ban pynpoi shnong namar ba katei ka jingkieng ka dei tang ka jingkieng iaid kjat kaba kaweh ruh artad haba iaid bun briew kaba lah ban ap jingma ia ki paidbah nongleit nongwan kiba iaid lyngba katei ka jingkieng.U ne u Nongthoh khubor u la iohlad ruh ban iakren bad U Sordar ka shnong Tangri u bah Ban Warjri ban kylli ba ki leh kumno ban pynpoi ia ki Mar kiba khia, ki bymlah shuh ban kit da u briew sha shiliang ka wah Kynshi, bad na ka liang jong ki, ki la ong ba ha ka por tlang kim da khuslai than namar ba katei ka wah ka rit bad ki kali ki lah ban iaid lyngba katei ka wah hynrei kaba jynjar ka long ha ka por lyiur haba heh um ym don jaka iaid kali ban jam sha shiliang bad ki hap ban set noh ia ki kali hala shnong bad kumjuh ha ka shnong Shyrwang.Shuh shuh haba pyrshang ban kylli na u tei u sordar ka Tangri ba hato kum ki nongialam shnong ki la ju leit mih ne em sha ki bor ba halor ban iakren shaphang ka jingpynioh noh ia ka jingkieng iaid kali ban jam lyngba katei ka wah, bad na jong u tei u sordar u la ong ba na ka liang jong ki bor shnong kim shympat la leit mih ne iakren ei ei sha ki bor ba halor ha kaba iadei bad ka kingkieng iaid kali bad u la ong ruh ba kham mynshwa kala don ka jingthmu ban shna noh ia ka jingkieng ha katei ka wah lyngba ka PMGSY bad katei ruh ka la shu sahkut noh khlem poi shaei shaei.Kaba kham sngew kyndit ban ioh sngew ka long ba u MLA jong ka thain u dei u trai shnong na katei ka shnong Tangri, bad haba phai pat sha katei ka shnong jong u tei u MLA ki shnong ki thaw ki dang long kiba sahdien palat khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ki lynti ki syngkien bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Tang ka jingkieng kali ruh  kam don, ka shnong Ah!Moina

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:U MLA ka Maw-shynrut u Bah Witting Mawsor u la kyntait ia ka jingkam ka sorkar ba u la tyrwa die jaka sha ki shipai BSF ha Umjarain, Nongstoin kumba la kren da u myntri kam pohiing u Bah HDR Lyngdoh ha iing dorbar hynnin ka sngi.Haba pynshai halor kane ka jingkren jong u Bah HDR Lyngdoh, u Bah Witting u la ong, “Da ka mynsiem sngewkhia, nga kwah ban pynshai ia phi ki paidbah nongpule kot khubor, baroh ba ka jingmih khubor, ha ka kot khubor ka dei kaba lamler bad ka bym don nongrim haei haei”.U la bynrap, “Nga khlem leit ia kynduh ia u DC Nongstoin ryngkat bad kita ki 10 ngut ki trai khyndew mynno mynno ruh, kane ka long tang ka kam bishni shimet ia nga bad ka jingthmu ban pynjah burom ia nga da mano re mano, u myntri u la ioh jingtip bakla na u D.C .Nongstoin”.Hynnin ka sngi ha ka jubab jongu, u bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ki don 10 ngut ki trai khyndew kiba na ka Shnong Pyndengrei ryngkat u bah Witting Mawsor, MLA, Mawshynrut ki la leit ia kynduh ia u D.C Nongstoin ban tyrwa jaka ia ki BSF ban ktem ha Umjarain, Nongstoin. Ia kane ka jubab jong u Bah HDR Lyngdoh ka long hadien ba u MLA ka Nongstoin u bah D Jyndiang u la wanrah ia kane ka mat ha iing dorbar thawain.
title: Don kiba bishni ba kynnoh die jaka: Witting

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:Ka Seng Khasi Kmie, Mawkhar Shillong hynnin ka sngi ka 21 tarik u Lber 2017, ka la sei ïaka ksing ka dhah, ka tang-muri ka shaw shaw, ban sdang ban tem ïaki, kum ka dak ban ban pynkyn-maw ïala ki para kur ki para kha ban pynkhreh naka bynta ban ïashim bynta sha ka Shad Suk Mynsiem.Ïa kane ka jingtem ksing la pynlong ha phyllaw jong ka Ïing Sng ha Mawkhar, Shillong.Ha shwa ban tem ïaka ksing, la ioh shwa ïa ka jingkren na u General Secretary ka Seng Khasi u Rgh Arwan S. Tariang, uba la pdiang sngewbha ïa baroh ki para riew seng kiba la wan ban sakhi ïa kane ka sngi ba kynthup ïa President ka Seng Khasi u Rgh Bantei S. Rumnong, u Chairman bad Secretary ka Cultural Committee u Rgh P.D Nongrum bad u Rgh Rangpher Rynjah, President ka Seng Kynthei bad kiwei kiwei.Hadien kane la shimti pat da ka Komiti u Tymmen u San ka Seng Khasi Kmie, ha kaban leit sha ka nguh ka dew, ka dwai ka phirat bad ka shat ka kheiñ, ban ïa pan na U Blei Trai Kynrad U Nongbuh U Nongthaw, ba ka ha kine ki artaiew jong ka jingpynkhreh, ba ki kam ki jam kin ïaid beit kin ïaid ryhtih. Ïa ka nguh ka dem la pyndep da u Chairman ka Komiti u Tymmen u San, u Rgh Skor Jala ha kaba la don lang u Rgh Secretary ka komiti u Rgh Kworshon Marbaniang.Hadien ba la dep ka nguh ka dem ka khan ka shat, ba la sdang ban tem pat ïa ka ksing ka dhah bad put ïa ka tangmuri. Mynta ka kynti ïa ka Shad Suk Mynsiem yn pynlong ha ki lai sngi, kata ha ka 8, 9 bad ka 10 tarik u Ïaiong, 2017.Naka liang ka Cultural Committee ka pyntip ba naduh kane ka sngi, ha kine ki artaiew kiban wan, kan don ka jinghikai shad ïa ki khynnah barit haduh ki khun samla kynthei bad shynrang kaban sdang naduh ka por 5:30 janmiet ha iing seng ha Mawkhar.
title: Sdang ka ksing ka Shad Suk Mynsiem

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:U MLA ka Nongkrem u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit u la ong ba ki don haduh kumba 60 percent ki nongshong shnong ha ka Meghalaya ki bym don khyndew bad ia kane la lap katkum ka kaiphod ka Socio-Economic Census kaba la leh ha u snem 2011.Haba wanrah ia kane ka mat mynta ka sngi hapoh ka iing dorbar u Bah Ardent u la ong ba kane ka mat ka dei kaba khia bha ha kaba ka sorkar jylla kam dei ban thet kti hynrei dei ban shim khia ban thaw ki lad ki lynti ia kine ki paidbah ka jylla.U la ong ba ha kane ka jylla ka jaka ka don jong ki raid ki hima, jong ki shnon hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba kine ki jaka ba la kam da ki Syiem, ki Rangbah Shnong, ki myntri bad kiwei, ki long pynban tang kum ki nongkhnoit ia ki paidbah ha jaka ban sam jaka lem ia ki bym don jaka.“Ka por ka la dei ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynthikna ba ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban tuklar ia ka kam ym ban shu ai mon ha kine ki nongsynshar kiba khnoit ia ki paidbah da kaba die jaka, bad pyndonkam bakla ia ka spah mariang na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi jongki”, la ong u Bah Ardent. U Bah Ardent u la ong ba wat ki district council ruh ki la phiel ban tehlakam ia kine ki nongsynshar bad ka la dei ka por ia ka sorkar ba kan tuklar halor kane.Katba u MLA ka Nongthymmai u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la ong ba ka jingrem palat ka bai rejister ia ki jaka, ka la pyntieng ia ki paidbah ka jylla ban wan shakhmat ban rejister ia ki jaka jongki bad u la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pynduna ia ka bai siew khnang ban ailad ia ki paidbah ban wan shakmat.Kumjuh u MLA ka West Shillong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingleh sting ka sorkar ban leit rejister ia ki jaka sha thain khappud bad ka Assam ka la pynioh lad ia ka sorkar Assam ban shim kabu ban rejister ia ki jaka jong ki paidbah katei ka thaim.“Ka sorkar ka dei ban phah ia ki ophisar na DC ophis Nongpoh ban leit rejister ia ki jaka jong ki paidbah sha thain khappud khnang shi bynta ban pynkhlain ban kam ia ki jaka sha ka jylla Meghalaya kiba iaknieh bad ka Assam’, la ong u Bah Paul.U MLA ka Dadenggiri u James K Sangma pat u la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pyrkhing ban nym ai pathar ia ki jaka rep ban pynlong ki ktem karkhana namar ba shisien ba ka khyndew ka la lut, ym lah ban ioh biang.
title: 60 percent ki nongshong shnong ka jylla  kim don khyndew, ong u Bah Ardent

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:U bah Michael Pakynteiñ u nongshong shnong jong ka 18 Shillong West konsti-twensi u la ujor ejahar sha u Chief Secretary ka sorkar jylla u K.S Kropha pyrshah ia u MLA katei ka konstitwensi u bah Paul Lyngdoh ka UDP bad katkum katei ka jingujor u la kynnoh ba u bah Paul Lyngdoh u la pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa paidbah kaba haduh T.55,80,000 tyngka (San phew san lak phra phew hajar tyngka). Ha katei ka jingujor u bah Pakyntein u la ong ba katkum ka jubab RTI ba u la ioh na ka Shillong Municipal Board, ka jingkhein ba u bah Paul u la pyni ba u ai sha konstitwensi ka long ka bym dei bad ia kane u la ong ba la pynshisha ruh da ki trai dukan kiba la pyni ba la shim ia ki tiar na ki dukan jong ki. U la dawa ba u CS u dei ban tohkit ia katei ka jingjia bad ban ai ia ka bishar hok bad u la dawa ruh ba dei ban pynngat ia u ha ki kyndon kam sniew.Katkum katei ka RTI kaba u bah Pakyntein u la ioh na Shillong Municipal Board ka pyni ba u Chairman ka Implementation Committee u la thied khiew shet 100 tylli kiba 15 litar, 100 tylli kiba 25 litar bad 100 tylli kiba 20 litar kaba haduh T.17,10,000 tyngka (Khadhynniew lak shi phew hajar tyngka) bad hangtei la suh ia ka Cash Memo ba la thied na ka Meghalaya Metal House kaba don ha Iewduh kaba la thied ha ka 5 tarik u naitung, 2014. U bah Pakyntein u la wad jingtip na katei ka dukan, hynrei u trai jong ka Meghalaya Metal House u Sri Ashim Kumar Banik u la kyntait ba la thied tiar na dukan jong u bad u la jubab ba ka Cash Memo kam dei na dukan jong u bad kam shym la don ka jingsiew pisa kaba haduh kattei ha ka dukan jong u bad u la jubab ruh ba ka jingsoi bad ki dak ba thoh ha ka cash memo kim dei ba u thoh ma u ne ki nongtrei jong u, hynrei la shu soi tuh bad thaw tuh dano dano.Nangta la jubab biang ha ka RTI ba u chairman ka Implementation Committee u la thied 2000 tylli ki shuki plastic kiba don kti ( jingbat) bad 3000 tylli ki bym don jingbat bad katei baroh ka poi T.18,90,000 tyngka ( Khad phra lak khyndai phew hajar tyngka) bad hangtei la suh ia ka cash memo jong ka DR Enterprise kaba don ha Thana Road Shillong kaba la pyni ba la thied ia kitei ki tiar ha ka 1 tarik u naitung, 2014. Hynrei hangtei ruh u bah Pakyntein bad ka kynhun u la leit tohkit na katei ka dukan ha kaba u trai dukan u la phah da ka jingthoh sha ki ba ha katei ka sngi um shym la die shuki haduh 5000 tylli bad um shym la die ruh sha u Chairman ka Implementation Committee 18 West Shillong kumba la pyni ha ka cash memo. U la jubab sha katei ka kynhun ba la shu soi tuh bad pyndonkam bakla ia ka soi jong u.Ka RTI ka la pyni biang ba u chairman ka Implementation Committee jong ka 18 West Shillong konstitwensi u la thied 100 tylli ki Syntex kiba 1000 litar, 100 tylli kiba 500 litar, 100 tylli ki tyrpa heh bad 100 tylli ki tyrpa rit bad baroh ka pisa ba la thied ka long T.19,80,000 bad ia kitei ki tiar la pyni ba la thied na ka dukan Badgliram Radhakrishna kaba don ha Laitumkhrah ha ka 28 tarik u jylliew, 2014. U bah Pakyntein u la ong ba ki ioh ban ia kren da ka phone (kaba u don ki rikod) bad u trai dukan bad u la kyntait ba ia kitei ki tiar la thied na ka dukan jong u.Ha ka RTI u la bah Pakyntein u la ong ba la thied ia ki tiar bapher bapher bad la sam sha ki dorbar shnong, ki seng, ki jaka pule hapoh ka 18-West Shillong konstitwensi ba kynthup naduh ki komputorbad kiwei pat ki tiar bad baroh ka poi T.21,75,700 tyngka. Nangta la thied 100 tylli ki kor suh jain ha ka dor T.7,25,000 tyngka, la thied 1200 tylli ki shatri ha ka dor T.28,20,000 tyngka, la thied 2500 tylli ki shuki plastic ba don jingbat ha ka dor T.10,25,000 tyngka bad la thied 100 band ki tin soping ha ka dor T.5,80,000 tyngka. Ia baroh kitei ki tiar la suh cash Memo ba la thied na ka Syiem Enterprise kaba don ha Jaiaw Shyiap hynrei halor katei u bah Pakyntein u la ong ba ki la tohkit bad ki lap ba kam don kum kata ha Syiem Enterprise bad ka dei tang ka kyrteng snaiap.Ha katei ka RTI u bah Pakyntein u la ioh jubab biang ba la thied 3200 tylli ki kombor ha ka dor T.375 tyngka kawei bad baroh ka pisa ba la pynlut ban thied kombor ka poi T.12,00,000 tyngka bad ha ka cash memo la suh ba la thied na Ludhiana Blankets kaba don ha Guwahati bad la pyni ba la thied ha ka 26 tarik u rymphang, 2014. U bah Pakyntein u la ong ba haba pynshong nongrim ia kitei ki kombor ha ka dor iew hangne ha Shillong ka long tang T.150 tyngka kawei katba ha ka cash memo la pyni ba ka dei T.375 tyngka kawei.Baroh kitei ki skhim kiba la kdew haneng ki dei na ka SUPW naduh u snem 2009-10 haduh u 2015-16.
title: Shah ujor U bah Paul Lyngdoh,  kynnoh ba pyndonkam bakla T.55 lak

content: Shillong, 22 Lber:Ka Supreme Court of India, ha ka jingshong bishar jong U Chief Justice of India, ha ryngkat bad u Justice DY Chandrachud bad U Justice Sanjay Kishan Kaul, ka la weng noh ia ka hukum jong U Chief Justice barim jong ka Meghalaya High Court, kaba ula pynmih hukum, ba ka sorkar Meghalaya, ka dei ban phah pahara pulit ia u, ha ka Z Category, wat ynda haba ula shongthait na katei ka kam ruh.Katei ka jing ia said ka poi sha ka Supreme Court, hadien ba la mudui da U Bah Sajay Laloo ban ujor pyrshah halor katei ka rai, kaba la rai da ka Division Bench jong ka Meghalaya High Court, ha kaba la khlieh da U Umanath Singh, ha kaba ula hukum ia ka sorkar Jylla bad ka sorkar India ruh kumjuh, ba ki dei ban ai jingiada ia u bad kumjuh ia kiwei de ki nongbishar, da kaba kin ia syllok lem bad kitei ki nongbishar. Na ka jingwad jingtip jong ki tnat syntiat jong ka sorkar Meghalaya bad ka sorkar India ruh kumjuh, kim shym la lap satia, ba utei u nongbishar barim, u don jingma ia ka jingim jongu, wat la mynta, u ioh ia ka jing iada na uwei u pulit PSO, ha ka jaka sah jongu ha Noida. Dang shen ka Supreme Court, ka la kyntait ruh ia ka hukum jong ka Rajasthan High Court, kaba bthah ba ym ju dei ban talasi ia ki nongbishar, haba ki leit jingleit da ka liengsuin, ha ki kad liengsuin bapher jong ka Ri India.
title: Weng ka Supreme Court, ki  pulit pahara ia U Umanath Singh

content: Shillong, 21 Lber:Katba nangiaid ki por ki la nangmih bun ki samla donsap na kane ka jylla kiba la pyrshang ba pynpaw ia ka la sap ba ki don da kaba leit ban ia shim bynta ha ki rynsan kiba heh bad kiba paw jong ka ri India bad don ruh kiba la leit ban ia shim bynta ha ki rynsan jong ka pyrthei baroh kawei.Ka kong Bateithymmai Nongrum, 27 snem karta ka dei kawei na ki samla kaba la leit shaduh Mumbai ban ia khun ha ka rynsan pyni sap kaba la tip kum ka ‘Yes I Am Reality Show’ kaba yn pyni paidbah ha ka Zing Channel TV. Katei ka samla ka dei na ka shnong Umthied Bynther kaba don ha ki thaiñ Mairang -ka shnong jong u kaitor ba pawnam u bah Skendrowell Syiemlieh (Bam kwai ha dwar u blei). Ka dei ruh ka khunruit jong utei u nongrwai ba paw ka ri lum Khasi.Haba ia kren bad u Rupang katei ka samla ka la iathuh ba ka ju sngewtynnad ia ki kam rwai naduh ba ka dang don 4 snem karta bad ka la ong ba ha katei ka rta kam pat nang ban rwai hynrei ka sngewtynnad ban shu kynud kai ia ki jingrwai Hindi. Dei ha ka rta kaba la kham heh ba ka la sdang nyngkong ban rwai ia ki jingrwai niam bad ki sur tynrai, hynrei kham hadien ka la pynleit jingmut noh ban rwai ia ki jingrwai Hindi.Ka kong Bateithymmai ka dei ka khun jong i bah Tharsing Syiemlieh (para trai jong u bah Skendrowell Syiemlieh) bad ka kong Biroda Nongrum. Ka dei kaba nyngkong duh na ki kynthei napdeng ki 7 ngut shi para. Ha u rymphang mynta u snem ka la leit ban ia khun ia ka Audition jong ka Yes I Am bad ka la poi shaduh ka Mega Audition bad mynta ka dang ap ia ka resol ban poi sha ka rynsan iakhun jong ki riew donsap. Ka la iathuh ba katei ka rynsan ka ia syriem kum ka India Got Talent kaba ym tang ki nongrwai kiba ia shim bynta hynrei ki don bunbah ki riew donsap kiba wan ban pyni ia ka sap jong ki. Ka kong Batei ka la leit ban ia khun teng ruh ha ka Audition jong ka Saregamapa ha Kolkata hynrei ka la shah kyntait noh ha ka kylla kaba-ar ( 2nd Round).Haba la kylli ka jingrwai aiu ka la rwai ha ka por ba ka leit Audition sha Mumbai ka la ong ba ka rwai da ki jingrwai Remix bad ki jingrwai kiba dang shu mih thymmai ha kine ki khyndiat snem. Haba kylli pat shaphang ka jinglut jingsep ba ka leit sha Mumbai ka la ogn ba la pynlut pisa na ing na sem jong ka bad ym ioh jingiarap eiei.Shuwa ban ia kren bad une u nongthohkhubor ka kong Batei ka la kren sha ki nongthohkhubor ha Shillong Press Club ban pan ka jingkyrshan na ki paidbah ba kin vote ia ka ba kan ioh ban ia khun ha ka phainal bad ki paidbah ki lah ban vote ia ka lyngba ka facebook da kaba khniot ia u symbol Love ha ka page Yes I am Reality Show bad ka la rwa iruh shi lain ar lain ha katei ka jingiakren bad ki nongthohkhubor. Ka AMDA ka la kyrpad ia ki paidbah ba kin kyrshan ia ka kong Batei ba kan poi sha ka thong khnang ba kan wanrah ia ka nam ka burom ka jylla.
title: Sha ka rynsan pyni sap ha Mumbai,  ia khun ka khunruit u bah Sken

content: Amlarem, 23 Lber:Ka Nongtalang Amlariang bahap hapoh Amlarem Sub-Division Hadien 18snem eiei ka la pynlong biang mynta ka sngi ia ka Theatre (Dra-ma) ia kaba u longshuwa na kane Shnong u juh pynlong ia kane ka jait drama.Bad Ia kane ka Theatre la wan plie da u MLA jong kane ka Thain u Ma Stephenson Mukhim kum u kongsan ha kane ka sngi, u Ma Holando Lamin kum u synbud kongsan, ki nongkitkam jong kane ka Shnong bad ki paid bah ki ba la ia wan Ban ia sakhi lang .Ha ka jing kren jong u Ma Hat Pohchen uwei na ki riew Rangbah jong kane ka Shnong, u la ong ba ha ki por mynshwa ki briew na kane ka Shnong ki juh pynlong ia kane ka drama kaba kum shibynta ban pynbyrngia ia bad ban ym ialam ia u briew sha ki kam ba sniew kum ha ka dih ka bam ka ba pynbuaid, namar ba ia u briew u ba dih kin ym shah ia u ba un iashim bynta ha drama, namar ba ha shuwa ba kin pynlong ia kane ka drama kin hap ban pynlut ia por jong da ki taiew bad ki bnai bad u la ong shuh shuh ruh ba ki por ba u dang samla u dei uwei na ki actress ha kito ki por namar ba u shynrang ha ka Theatre u hap ban long kynthei bad ka kynthei pat kan hap long shynrang.Bad ha ka jing kren pat u kongsan ha kane ka sngi plie, u la ai ka jingiaroh nyngkong ia ki Rangbah na kane ka Shnong ia ka jing kylla thiah kylla dem jong ki na ka bynta ban pynim biang ia kaei kaba u longshuwa manshuwa u la leh kaba long kum shibynta na ka ban pynbyrngia bad ban ia iada ruh ia kiei kiei ki kam ba sniew kum ki riew Rangbah na kane ka Shnong ki la ia thuh bad u la ong ka jing pynlong ia kane ka Theatre kaba kum shi bynta ban iai pynsah ia ki khana jong ki long dien, na kawei ka por sha kawei pat bad u lah ong shuh shuh ruh ba na ka liang jong u kum u MLA un iai pynnoh ia ka kti ka mon ka kti ka diang na ka bynta ki jing bha ka Shnong ka thaw ha ka imlang ka sahlang kat ka lah kot ka bor na ka bynta jong ka jing bha jong u paid bah.Ki kyrteng jong ki ar tylli ki drama ha kane por kawei la ai kyrteng “Ti Pyrthai ah I Ryum be in kom to be sia ” ia kaba la shna da u CM Pohrmen bad kawei pat la Ai kyrteng “Deman Baklaye ” ia kaba la thaw da u L.Myrchiang.
title: Hadien 18snem, pynim biang  ka Nongtalang ia ka Theatre

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:Hadien ka jingmih khubor ba U General Secretary ka EJNC, u thmu ban rahbor ia uwei u bar jylla uba dei ruh u trai jong kawei ka hotel kaba don hapoh Lad-Rymbai, kuma na ka liang jong ka EJNC-Central Council,ryngkat ka jing synran lang jong ki nongialam jong ka HANM-EJH, HNYF-EJZ, HYC-WJC, WJNC ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia u trai hotel, ban lap ia ka jingshisha bad na ka liang jong utei u trai hotel ula iathuh ba ha ka miet jong ka 19tarik jong une bnai; ki la don arngut ki briew kiba rung hapoh ka hotel jong u da kaba thmu ban bamja, hynrei ha katei por ka la mih ka jing bym ia sngewthuh jingmut hapdeng jong u bad ki dkhot jong ka seng ha kaba na ka liang jong ki ki la shoh lah bom ia u bad ki la leit noh khlem da don kano kano ka jingthmu ban rahbor ia utei u trai hotel.Haba pyrshang pat ban wad ia ka jingshisha ia ka daw jong ka jing bym ia sngewthuh jing mut hapdeng jong kine ki ar liang, u samla S. Lyngdoh, G.S EJNC, ula iathuh ba dei ka jing bym nang jong une u bar jylla ban burom, ha ka kren ka khana kaba la pynlong ia ki ban jrong kti ia utei u bar jylla.Kaba pynlyngngoh ia ka seng ka long ba balei kita ki Nongialam Shnong jong ka Lad-Rymbai (datsympein) bad ka trai jaka ki pyndonkam ia kata ka ktien ‘Thmu ban Rahbor’ ha ka jing ujor jong ki, khlem da pyrkhat ba kane ka jingleh jong ki ka ktah iaka burom ijot jong ki khun samla ka District, namar ban pharep ka suk, hynrei ban pynshisha pat ka jynjar, kumta la kyntu ia ki nong ujor ba kin wad shwa ia ka jing shisha shwa ba kin iaid shakhmat.Ha kajuh ka por ruh ka EJNC-CC ka pyntip paitbah ba ka seng naduh ba pynmih ia kane ka khubor ka seng kam don jing iadei shuh bad u Philip J Bamon uba ju long u nong ai buit ka seng, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Bah Shanbok Syad, President EJNC-CC.
title: Kyntait u trai hotel Lad Rymbai

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:U syiem jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw u Pa’im Phrestar Syiemlieh jong ka hima Nongkhlaw u la phah ia u Deputy Syiem u bah KM Syiemlieh bad lai ngut ki myntri, u Bah B L Nongbri, Bah L Basaiawmoit bad bah BL Nongum ba kin leit ban jurip ia u pud u sam jong ka hima ha khappud bad ka jylla ha Assam, namar kala don ka jingwan tam pud jong ki briew katei ka jylla da kaba wan rep hapoh jong u pud u sam jong ka hima Nongkhlaw.Ha kane ka jingleit jong kine ki heh ka hima Nongkhlaw ha ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai, ki la lap ba kala don ka jingkyntur pud da ki briew jong ka jylla Assam, kiba dei na ka shnong Barigoan, kiba la wan ban dakhol ia ki jaka jong ka hima Nongkhlaw da kaba wan rep wan riang bad ki jaka kiba la shah dakhol ki hap ha u pud u sam jong ka jingpeit jong ka shnong Raja Khomai, Belahari, Raja Bala ki dei ki shnong jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw.Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang jong u Dy Syiem jong ka hima bad ki myntri ki khot hajir u Goanbura jong ka shong Barigoan ban tohkit na u halor kane ka jingwan tam pud da kaba wan rep. Na ka liang jong u tei u nongpyniaid shnong ka jylla Assam u la ong ba kum u Goanbura jong ka shnong um shym la ai jingbit iano iano ruh ba kine leh ia kane ka kam ban rep ban riang hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Hima Nongkhlaw, kiba leh ia kane ki la leh da la ka jong ka mon khlem jingtip jong u kum u nongpyniaid shnong.Na ka liang jong u Goanbura u la ong ha khmat jong u Dy Syiem bad ki myntri jong ka hima nongkhlaw ba nangne sha khmat un ong ia la ki paidbah nongshnong shnong ka Barigoan ba kimd ei ban ban kyntur pud, ha ka juh ka por kito ki briew kiba la wan rep hapoh u pud u sam jong ka hima Nongkhlaw kila pan map bad kila ai ka jingkular ba nang ne sha khmat kin nym wan kyntur jaka shuh ban rep ha u pud u sam jong ka hima Nongkhlaw.Khang ban nym sah shrah kine ki jaka, na ka liang jong u Syiem bad ki myntri ki la ai bor ia ki trai shnong kiba dei na Raja Khomai, Raja Bala, Belahari bad ka shnong Mawdem ba kin leit ban rep ban riang ha kitei ki jaka ha u pud u sam jong ka shong ka thaw ka jong ki khnang ba ki briew jong ka jylla Assam kin nym ioh lad ban wan skut jaka bad ban wan kam ei, namar lada shuieh shrah ki jaka jong ka hima kin sa shah klun ei ha ki briew na katei ka jylla kumba la jia ha kiwei kiwei ki bynta jong ka jylla Meghalaya.Ha katei ka jingleit na ka liang jong ki myntri ki la pom pynkhyllem noh ia ki dieng kiba la wan ban thung da ki briew na ka jylla Assam hapoh u pud u sam jong ka hima Nongkhlaw bad kane ka jingpom ia ki dieng ka long ban pyni sha ki briew kiba na ka jylla Assam kiba la sdang ban wan kyntur pud ba ka hima kan nym ai lad da lei lei ba kin wan tur hapoh u pud u sam jong ka hima la ong ruh ia ki briew na katei ka jylla Assam ba kim dei ban pynsier pynsmiej ia ki briew jong ka hima kiba shong ba sah ha katei ka thain.
title: Kyndang U Syiem khynnah bad ki myntri ka Hima Nongkhlaw

content: Jowai, 23 Lber:U Executive Member ka JHADC uba dei peit ia ka pla tyngka, u ma Joinriwel Pyrtuh mynta ka sngi ha ka sngi shong dorbar mang tyngka u la wan rah ia ka mang tyngka kaba la kot haduh 139 klur (139 klur 19 lakh 96 hajar 100 ) tyngka bad kane ka mang tyngka ka long kaba duna haduh 1 klur 52 lakh tyngka na ka jingmang ban iohlum da ka konsil na ka bynta u snem 2017-18 .Ka JHADC ka la mang ban iohlum haduh 140 klur 72 lakh tyngka lyngba ki jingpynmih bapher bapher kynthup ruh na ki jingiarap pisa na ka sorkar pdeng bad sorkar jylla, nalor ka bhah kaba ka la ju ioh na ka khajna mar poh khyndew. U ma Pyrtuh u la iathuh ba ka Council ka la mang ban ioh lum tang 12 klur 25 lakh na lade bad na ka khajna mar poh khyndew ka jingmang ban iohlum kan long haduh 84 klur nalor ka grant na ka sorkar jylla kaba 42,94 klur tyngka.“Ka District Council ka don hapdeng ka jingkyrduh pisa na ka daw ka jingkhang tih dewiong ha ka jylla bad ngi khmih lynti ba ka sorkar kan ia bit ia biang bad ka NGT khnang ban dup lah ban weng ia kane ka jingeh ka Council”, la ong u ma Pyrtuh haba kren halor ka mang tyngka kaba la wanrah hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi.U la iathuh ba ka JHADC ka la ioh pdiang Rs. 8.71 klur kum ka bhah na ka jinglum khajna jong ka sorkar jylla halor u Dewiong na kaba dei ban ioh kaba haduh Rs. 44.69 klur bad Rs. 20.69 klur na kiwei pat ki mar poh khyndew kiba dei ki minor mineral na kaba dei ban ioh haduh Rs. 21.89 klur ha kane ka snem ba ladep katta ha u snem 2015-16. Ha kaba iadei bad ka grant na ka sorkar jylla ka JHADC ka la ioh pdiang tang Rs. 1.8 klur kaba dei kaba la mang kyrpang na ka bynta ban shna ia ka Building jong ka District Council.Ha kaba iadei bad ka Special Assistance lane ka jingiarap pisa kyrpang na ka sorkar pdeng, u ma Pyrtuh u la iathuh ba ka JHADC ka la ioh pdiang ia ka 33 klur 57 lakh tyngka bad ia kane ka pisa la pynrung shadph ka Account jong ka District Council.“Ngi khmih lynti ba ia kane ka pisa yn pyntrei kam ia ka ha ki kam pynroi bapher bapher ha une u snem 2017-18”, la ong utei u EM ka JHADC
title: Wan rah ia ka mang tyngka ka JHADC

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:U bah Renikton Lyngdoh Tongkhar haduh mynta um pat sngew lah ngeit ia ka jingpynbna ha ki lad khubor ba ka HSPDP ka la rai ban ai tiket ha u bah Enbin Kharraswai na Mawkyr-wat konstistwensi. “Ka long kaba shisha ba hadien ba nga la ia soh HSPDP, nga dei uwei na kiba pan tiket na bynta ka 2018, ha ka 22 tarik u rymphang ruh ngi dang ia shong jingialang kam pat don eiei kaba kum kata ban shim rai ia ka tiket, hynrei nga kyndit ban iohi ha ki kotkhubor ba ka la don ka jingialang ha ka 18 tarik u lber kaba ngam ioh jingtip eiei bad hangtei ki la pynbna ia ka tiket” ong u bah Renik haba ia kren bad u Rupang lyngba ka phone.Haba pynpaw ka jingbym sngew shai bad ka jingbym sngew lah ngeit halor ka tiket kumba la pynbna ha ki kotkhubor da u Secretary ka HSPDP Mawkyrwat Area Unit u bah Deling Snaitang, u bah Renikton u la ong ba lada dei ba pynbna tiket ka Party ka la dei ban pynbna lang baroh ha kiwei ki konstitwensi ruh, “Nga tharai ba lada dei por pynbna tiket kin pynbna lang sha kiwei ki konstitwensi, sngew phylla balei tang ha Mawkyrwat” u la ong.La kylli hato lada u duh tiket un ia khun kum u kyrtong shimet ne un ia soh noh bad kiwei pat ki Party “Haduh mynta ngam pat kwah ban ong eiei, ha ka jingshisha ka don ka Election Committee kaba la pynkupbor da ka CEC jong ka Party ban pynbna ia ka tiket, hynrei haduh mynta nga iohi ba ki pynbna tang ki briew ba na Mawkyrwat, ngan hap ban ap ia ka rai khadduh jong ki bor bahalor jong ka Party, ngan sa kren pat hadien” u la ong da kaba bynrap ba ki don 2 ngut kiba pan tiket na ka HSPDP na Mawkyrwat konstitwensi kata ma u bad u bah Enbin bad ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha ka 22 tarik u rymphang u la ong ba ka jingiakren ka long kaba sngewtynnad bha namar la ia rai ba lada ioh tiket mano mano ruh yn kyrshan uwei ia uwei pat bad ba ki paid nongkyrshan jong katei ka seng ruh ki la hun beit lada ioh mano manor uh uwei napdeng jong ki. Lah ban kdew ba u bah Renikton u la ia khun nyngkong eh ia ka elekshon MLA ha u 2013 na ka Party NPP na Mawkyrwat konstitwensi bad ha katei ka elekshon u la shah rem noh ha u kyrtong ka Congress u bah Rowell Lyngdoh bad u la ioh 4459 vote.
title: Nga ap ia ka rai khadduh na ki bor ba halor ka Party: Renikton

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:Ka sorkar haduh mynta ka sngi kam pat shym la lah ban shim rai ia ka jingker sainar shiah ha khappud ka Bangladesh bad India naba ka CCIB ka dang iai ieng pyrshah ia ka jingkwah ka sorkar ban ker na ka jingjngai kaba 150 yard bad ka kwah ba ka sorkar ka dei ban ker beit naduh na Zero Point.Mynta ka sngi ka la don ka jingialang ha ophis u Deputy Commissioner East Khasi Hills ban ia kren halor katei ka bynta bad ha katei ka jingialang la don ki nongialam jong ka CCIB ba kynthup ia u bah Sukkynjai Myrchiang-Chairman, bah Kmen Myrchiang Secretary, bah Joe Marweiñ President barim ka FKJGP, Lambok Marngar President KSU lem bad kiwei pat ki nongialam jong katei ka kynhun, la don ruh u Sujir Naug na ka NBCC, la don na ka liang ki BSF, kong Lakiang ADC na ka liang ka sorkar bad la don ruh katto katne ngut ki trai jaka.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor hadien ba la wai katei ka jingialang u Secretary ka CCIB u bah Kmen Myrchiang, u la ong ba ym shym la lah ban shim rai naba ka CCIB ka dang ieng pyrshah beit haduh mynta ruh ban ker sainar shiah na ka jingjngai ba 150 yard bad ka kwah ba ka sorkar kan pynbeit shuwa ia u pud u sam uba biang bad ka dei ruh ban ker beit na Zero Point. U bah Kmen u la ong ba wat ka Zero Point kaba don mynta ruh kam pat dei satia ka jaka kaba dei hynrei kumba la long naduh mynshuwa u la ong ba ka don shaduh ka jaka ba kam trai ka Bangladesh. “Ka Bangladesh ka la dep ioh lypa ia ki jaka jong ngi, lada ailad lei sa ban ker ker sainar shiah na ka 150 yard sa katno hajar akar ka jaka India kan leit sha Bangladesh” u la ong. Utei nongialam ka CCIB u la ther tyngeh ia ki nongmihkhmat, MLA ki bym shym la ia kren eiei ia u pud u sam ka India bad Bangladesh kaba naduh Nongjri shaduh Jaliakhola.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la thmu ban leh da ka buit ia pynpait pynpra ba ka jingthmu jong ka kan urlong ha kaba ka la pyntip ia katei ka jingialang tang sha ki trai khyndew kiba ka la dep ia suh buit lypa bad kiba ka la lah ban pynkohnguh katba ia kiwei pat kiba bun kam shym la pyntip satia. U la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynlong da ka jingialang paidbah ban sngap ia ka sur u paidbah da kaba hiar shaduh ka jaka ba don ki paidbah ym ban khot ia ki ha Shillong. Kumba ka long mynta u bah Kmen u la iathuh ba katba nangmih ki sngi ka Bangladesh ka la nang iai kyntur pud da kaba rah ia ki pilar kham shaneng bad ka poi wat shaduh Dawki ruh katba ki shipai iada pud ki BSF pat ki shu long tang ki nongpeitkai.Shuwa ba ki nongialam ka CCIB kin mih na kamra jingialang la mih shuwa da ki phew ngut ki trai jaka bad haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor ki la ong ba ki hun ia ka rai jong ka sorkar ban ker na ka jingjngai kaba 150 yard bad kim don jingpyrshah eiei. Uwei na ki trai jaka uba la kren ha ka kyrteng jong ka kong Synjadmai Khongsdam u la ong ba ki don 12 ngut ki trai jaka na Nohwet bad kitei baroh 12 ngut ki la hun ia ka rai jong ka sorkar bad ki mih noh na ka jingialang naba ki sngew ba kam donkam shuh ia ki ban kren jrong. Halor katei ka jingkren ki nong Nohwet u bah Kmen u la ong ba ka jaka jong kitei ki briew kam shym la hap hapoh ka 150 yard bad ka don tang khyndiat shaneng kaba tang 11 mitar kaba ka sorkar kan siew bai lutksan sha ki katba kiba bun pat kin shu kylla duhei noh. U la kynnoh ba kitei ki briew kim shym la pyrkhat shuh ia kiwei pat ki trai jaka tang namar ba ki la sngewbiang ialade.
title: Ym lah shim rai ia ka jingker  sainar shiah, iai pyrshah ka CCIB

content: Nongstoiñ, 23 Lber:Ka Mawshynrut Block Congress Committee West Khasi Hills, ha ka General Meeting kaba la long ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai ka la iatai sani bha halor ki kam ki jam jong ka party bad khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka election 2018 bad ha katei ka jingialang da kawei ka jingmut, ki la ia rai ban phah ia ka kyrteng jong u Robert Edwington Dkhar kum u kyrtong ha katei ka election. Katei ka jingialang kala shim ruh ia ka rai ban phah tang u wei kandidet na ka party kata hadien ka jingpynpaw ia kiba nud ba ia ai reng bad ha katei ka jingialang baroh kila I bit bad iahun lang ia u bah Robert Edwington Dkhar u ba dei ruh artad u Vice President jong ka West Khasi Hills DCC ban long kum u kyrtong na katei ka party.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw ba ha ki por ba la dep ka ju don beit ka jingiaknieh ia ka tiket na ka party congress hynrei mynta ka kynti katei ka jingialang da kawei ka jingmut kala shim ia ka rai ban phah tang kawei ka kyrteng shi ki bor ba halor kata sha ka DCC bad MPCC bad lada yn dang mih kandidet biang nalor u tei u bala ia jied bad iahun lang ha katei ka jingialang ka party kan nym ai ia ka jingkyrshan.Na ka liang jong u President ka MBCC u bah Srally Rashir u la kyntu ia baroh ki nongtrei jong ka party ba kin ia tylli kawei bad ban nym don kano kano ka jingiasngewpher jingmut bad lada don ki jingbym shai ha kano kano ka bynta dei ban iakynduh ia ki heh jong ka party hapoh Konstitwensi.
title: Kandidet Congress Mawshynrut, ia U bah Robert Edwington Dkhar

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:U Myntri tnad sam ding ka jylla u bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la pyntip ha ka ing dorbar mynta ka sngi, ba ki don 524 tylli ki transformer kiba sniew tang ha u snem 2016-17 ha kylleng ki jaka ha jylla.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da ka MLA ka Dikkanchi Shira, u Ma Sniawbhalang u la ong ba ka jingsniew jong ki transformer ka dei na u slap, leilieh, ka jingthang ding palat, ka jingtuh ding ki briew.Halor ka jingkylli ka Dikkanchi la u Myntri u tip ne em ba ki don ki nongtrei ka MeECL kiba phah sei Pisa na ki nongkynsong ban siew ia ka bai shna ia ki transformer haba ki sniew, u Myntri u la kyntait ba ka sorkar kam don jingtip eiei halor kane.U la pyntip ruh ha u snem 2013-14 ki don 428 tylli ki transformer kiba sniew, 428 tylli ha u snem 2015-15 bad 492 ha u snem 2015-16. Na kine kiba sniew, tang 1706 kiba la shna pynbha haduh mynta bad ka jinglut ban shna pynbha ia kine ka long T. 307.63 lak bad T. 507.12 lak la thied thymmai ia ki transformer.U la ong ba ki don ki shnong kumba 250 tylli kiba khlem pat ioh ding, namar ka jingsniew ki transformer ha kaba ka tnad ka dang pyrshang ban shna pynbha ia ki. U Myntri u la kubur ba ki jaka shna ki duna, namar ki don tang lai tylli ha baroh kawei ka jylla kynthup kawei ha Sumer, Dakopgre bad ha Mendipathar. Katkum ka jingong u myntri, lada don ka jingsniew kaba kham jur la phah shna sha ki kompeni shabar.U la ong ba ka sorkar kan pyrshang ban buh shuh ia ki jaka shna ha man ki district ka jylla hynrei kan shong ha ka jingioh pisa ka sorkar. U la pyntip ba ki transformer kiba sniew naduh 2013-14 haduh 2017 ki long 162 tylli ha East Jaintia Hills, 140 ha West Jaintia Hills, East Khasi Hills 352, West Khasi Hills 142, RiBhoi 295, South West Khasi 106, South Garo 74, East Garo Hills 78, West Garo Hills 294, North Garo Hills 86 bad South West Garo Hills 130.
title: 524 tylli ki transformer kiba  sniew tang ha u snem 2016-17

content: Shilong, 17 Lber:Haba wanrah ia kane hapoh ka ing dorbar, u Dr Mawthoh u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynlait na ka jingpyn-shitom ia kito ki longing kiba duk, namar ba ka jingbakla kam dei na ki, hynrei dei ka MeECL kaba la khlem pynpoi bill da ki bnai bad ka jingwanrah bill jongka hadien saw ne san bnai ka pynlong ia ki ban shem jingeh ban siew shisien siew namar ba ka la kot da ki phew hajar.“Lada ka MeECL ka kloi wut wut ban ot ia ka ding, ban shain kuna namar ba ki briew kim lah ban siew ym namar ka jingbakla jong ki, ka la leh aiu pat ia ki kompeni kiba la ashram da ki klur tyngka”, la ong u Dr Mawthoh.U la ong ba katkum ka jingtip ba la ai u myntri ka tnad bording, ka sorkar ka sah ram haduh T. 90 klur ha ki kompeni bapher bapher ha ka jylla bad hato ka la ot ia ka ding ne ka la pynshitom.U Dr Mawthoh um pdiang ruh ia ka jingong jong u Myntri ba kam don satia ka jingkiew bill bai thang ding namar ba u la ioh shibun ki jingud ba la ioh na ki paidbah ba ki la ioh pdiang ia ka jinglymmuh ka bai tang ding ha kaba don kiba poo T. 4000 hynrei la thoh T. 4 lak bad don kiba poi T. 2 hajar la thoh T. 2 lak.Ban lait ia ka jingeh jong ki paidbah, u Dr Mawthoh u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban shna ia ka bai thang ding man u bnai khnang ban pynsuk ia ki nongsiew.Hynrei halor kane, u Myntri tnad bording u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la kubur ba ki don tang ha ki katto katne ki bynta ia kane ka jingbakla ha ka rukom khein bait hang ding bad ka daw ka dei namar ka jingsniew jong ki meter.“Ki don ki jaka ba ki mter ki la sniew bad kala pynlong ia ka bai thang ban kiew pathar bad ka MeECL ka la pyrshang ban pynbeit ia kane ha ki jaka ba ioh jingujor”, la ong u Bah Dhar. U la ong ba ka MeECL kan shim ia ki lad ki lynti ban pynshitom ia kito ki kompeni kiba khlem siew ia ka bai thang ding da ki klut katkum ki kyndon jong ka ain.
title: “Kiba duk da ki hajar la ot ding, ki kompeni da ki klur kam leh eiei”

content: Shillong, 17Lber:Haba shim bynta halor ka jingiakren, halor ka mang tyngka ha ing dorbar mynta ka sngi, U Dr Don u la ong, “Kane ka sorkar ki thaw ki mission bapher bapher bad lehse ka dei kaba bun tam ki mission. Ngi don ka mission football, organic mission, aqua mission, green energy mission, apiculture mission, water mission bad kiwei hynrei khlem ka jingmih ne jingmyntoi ia ki paidbah ka jylla”.Ka daw ka jingbym mih jingmyntoi ka dei namar bym don ki missionary bad la bun sa tang ki mission, la ong u Dr Don.“Wat ha ka konstitwensi jong nga ruh, ngam iohi ia ki missionary”, la ong u Dr Don bad u shim ba shawei ruh kam don jingpher.Ula ong ba ka bha ia ka sorkar ba kan pyntbit ia ki ophisar jong ki tnad ba kin long kum ki missionary khnang ba ka mission ka sorkar kan ai jingmyntoi shisha ia ki paidbah ka jylla. “Pyntrei ia ki ophisar, pyndonkam ia ki ban pynurlong ia ka mission na ka bynta u paidbah”la ong u Dr Don.U la ong ba ka jingai skhim ka sorkar ban shna pung dohkha, ban ri ngap, ban thung dieng agar, ban ri jingri kam don jingmut satia, namar ba ki briew ki shu kwah ban ioh skhim sorkar hynrei ki don tang katto katne kiba kut jingmut bha bad sa kawei ka long ba ka skhim ka sorkar ka long kaba rit bad kam don jingphoida eiei.“Ka jingai skhim ban shna pung dohkha kam dei ban long kaba rit, la kumno kumno kam dei ban duna ka jingheh kaba shi akar ka jaka bad ban jied ia ki briew kiba don jingthmu shisha khnang ba kan long ka jingmyntoi ia ki”,u la ong.U la ong ruh kaei ka jingmut ba ka sorkar ka ai skhim ngap ha kaba ka ai tang san tylli ki ksing ngap, kin leh aiu ki nongri ngap tang san tylli. “Haba ka sorkar ka kwah ban kyntiew ia ki, ka dei ban ai da ki san phew ne spah tylli khnang ba kin ioh kheit ia u soh, ym ban long tang thohmut thohmat”, la ong u Dr Don.
title: Kane ka sorkar ka bun tang ki mission khlem missionary: Dr Don

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:“Kane ka skhim shna pung dohkha ka sorkar ka pynkylla shrah ia ki pyntha kba ruh”, la ong u Bah Ardent bad bynrap, “Don ki nongrep tang ban ioh subsidi, na ka pynthor kba, ki la pynkylla pung dohkha bad na ka pung dohkha, sa kylla sha ka pung jakoid syndon”.U la ong ba ka daw ka jingkwah eh ki paidbah ban shim ia kane ka skhim pung dohkha ka dei namar ba ki kwah ban ioh ia ka subsidi ba la tyrwa ka sorkar hynrei kam dei ba ki kwah ban ri dohkha bad namarkata, kane ka skhim ha jaka ban pynbha ban kyntiew ia ka kam ka dih ha ka rep kba, ka la pynkylla pynban ia ki nongrep sha ka apot.“Kumno ka sorkar kan kam ba kan kynkiew ia ka rep ka riang khamtam ban pynioh ia ka bam ka dih kaba shngain nalade haba ka pynkylla pung dohkha pynban ia ki pynthor kba”, la ong u MLA ka Nongkrem.Halor ki jingkieng thew dewiong, u Bah Ardent u la ong ba ka jingkieng thew (weighbridge) ha Laimer, Ri-Bhoi ka dei kaba ailad ia ki katto katne ki trok ban iaid khlem thew eiei bad kane ka paw ba ka don eiei kiba donkti ha kane ka kam.“Ki don ki paralok jong nga, phim tieng ban kren ia kane hapoh iing dorbar bad nga tip ba don katto katne ki briew ki bym hun ia kane ka jingwanrah jong nga ia kane ka mat ha iing dorbar”, la ong u Bah Ardent.U la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban buh CCTV ha baroh ki jingkieng thew baroh khnang ban pynthikna ba kiba leh thok ki dei ban shah pynshitom. U la ong ba ka jingiaid lait ki trok khlem thew ym tang ba ka pynduh khajna ia ka sorkar hynrei ka long beain ruh.
title: Na ka pung dohkha sha ka pynthor kba sha ka pung jakoid, ong u Bah Ardent

content: Nongpoh, 19 Lber:Ia katei ka Iing Durbar (Community Hall) ia kaba la tei ha ka jinglut kaba la kot sha ka T. 20 Lak, la wan ban plie paidbah da u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, MLA ka Umroi Constituency kum u kongsan, ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang kiwei de ki riew rangbah ba kynthup ia u Bah Sosthenus Sohtun, Rangbah shnong ka Lum Nongthymmai, u Bah P. Syngkli, Lyngdoh ka Raid Nongkylla, u Vikram Singhania lem bad kiwei ki riew rangbah ha katei ka shnong.Haba kren kum u kongsan ha katei ka sngi, u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, um lah khlem da pynpaw ia ka jingiaroh kaba khraw la ka long ia ki nongialam shnong bad ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ruh kumjuh, namar ba ki la lah ban leh kat ia katei ka kam kaba khraw, khlem da don kino kino ki jingiarap pisa na ka sorkar bad ha kajuh ruh ka por ka long ruh kum kawei na ki nuksa kaba bha tam ba kiwei pat ki shnong ba kin bud. “Kane baroh kadei namar ba ka don ka jingiasngewthuh jingmut hapdeng ki nongialam shnong bad ki paidbah bad lada kam don ka jingiatylli ki nongialam bad ki shah ialam, ngam tharai ba ki lah ban leh kat ia kane ka kam kaba khraw” ong u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar. Namarkata, kum ka jingiasnohktilang bad ka Dorbar Shnong Lumnong-thymmai, ha katei ka sngi u Ma Ngaitlang Dhar, u la nohsynniang ruh da kaba aiti ia ka pisa kaba T. 50 Hajar, sha ki nongialam shnong ka Lumnongthymmai.
title: Khlem jingiarap sorkar, tei ka Lumnong-thymmai, ka Iing Durbar ba T.20 lak

content: Mawkyrwat, 19 Lber:Ha katei ka sngi la iadonlang ruh u Bah H.M Shangpliang,Secretary Health & Family Welfare Cum Mission NHM Meghalaya, ka Deputy Commissioner ka SWKH kong Ripnar Lyngdoh, ka DM&HO ka Mwkyrwat ka Dr. (MRS) M. Marbaniang bad kiwei kiwei.Haba ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi, na ka liang u bah Rowell Lyngdoh u la ong ba kane ka dei ka prokram ba nyngkong tam ha ka District naduh ba la ioh ia ka District ba pura bad ka jingthmu jong kane ka prokram ka long ban ai jingtip sha ki paidbah halor ka jingkongsan jong ka koit ka khiah. U la kyntu ruh ia ki paidbah ba kin shim ia ki lad ki kabu kiba ka sorkar ka la ai sha kin a ka bynta ban nang khang kyntiew ia ka koit ka khiah. U la ban jur ruh halor ka jingling ba kongsan jong ka jinglehkhuid da kaba kyntu ia iwei pa iwei ban pynlong ia ka shnong ka thaw kaba khuid ba suba. U la kyntu ruh ia ki samla ba kin kiar na kaba shongkha khynnah namar kane ka ktah ia ka koit ka khiah bad ka jinglong jingsan ha ka met. Namarkata u la kyntu ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka thaain Mawkyrwat ba kin ai ka jingiatreilang bad ka sorkar na ka bynta ban nang kyntiew ia ka District na kawei ka por sha kawei pat.Ha katei ka sngi la ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na u symbud kongsan bah H.M Shangpliang u ba la kyntu ia ki paidbah ban pyndonkam hok ia ki scheme bapher bapher ba ka sorkar ka la ai na ka bynta ka jingmyntoi u paidbah. Ia ka jingialang ha katei ka sngi la ioh ban pyniaid da I kong Ripnar Lyngdoh, DC ka SWKH ha ka jingiadonlang ruh ki khynnah skul, ki nongtrei sorkar bad ki paidbah kiba la wan sha sakhi ia katei ka prokram.
title: Plie u bah Rowell ia ka jaka sumar ei ha Mawkyrwat

content: Jowai, 19 Lber:
title: Kurup Kyiad na dukan ki shilok ha Jowai

content: Jowai, 19 Lber:“Ka KJP Synod Mihngi ka dap da ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingjyllei ka jingshah lehbein ki kynthei naduh ki kam batbor bad kam pyniap bad na ka liang ka KJP Synod ka la pynbeit ban duwai kyrpang halor kane”, la pynbna u Moderator ka KJPSM ha ka jingiaseng bah mynne ka por step ha shwa ban khot ia u Pastor Rangbah, u Rev. Dr. JF Jyrwa ban duwai kyrpang halor kane ka jingshah ban bein jong ki.Ka KJP Synod Mihngi mynta ka sngi ka la pynwai noh ia ka jingiaseng bah ba 15 jong ka kaba la long naduh 16 tarik une u bnai ha ka Balang Ummulong kaba hap ha Wahiajer-Moodymmai Presbytery.Ha kane ka jingiaseng bah, u Rev BB Lamin bad u Rev. Dr. JM Hynniewta ki la long ki nongsam ia ka khubor u Blei ha ka jingiaseng kaba 10:30 mynstep bad 1:30 nohphai sngi. Ha ka jingiaseng nohphai sngi, u Pastor Hynniewta u la pynshong nongrim ia ka jingkren jong u na ka Shithi ba-ar u Appostol Paul u Thimothy 3 ka lynnong dkhot 1 haduh 5 kaba ong, ‘hynrei to tip ia kane ba haki sngi kiba khadduh kin wan kipor bashisha. namar ki briew kinlong kiba ieit tang ia lade, kiba ieit sbai, kiba kren sarong, kiba leh khraw, kiba kren sinew, kibym kohnguh iala ki kmie ki kpa ki bym sngewnguh. Kibym khuid, kiba khlem ieit iala ka kynja, kiba khlem map, kiba krensiar, kibym suitñiew, kiba runar,kibym ieit iaka ba bha, ki nongdie lok, kiba hangamei,kiba leh meng kiba ieit iaka jingsngewbha khamtam ban ia kaba ki ieit ia U Blei’.U Pastor Hynniewta u la ong ba ka jingim Khristan ka long ka jingim kaba ngi hap ban iaksaid man ka sngi ban ioh ia ka dur jong u Blei ha ngi kumba u la thaw ia u briew ha ka dur jong u. U Pastor u la ong ba bunbah ki Khristan ki long riewblei tang ha kaba paw shabar katba harieh pat ki leh ia ka kam ba tngit kaba isih ha khmat U Blei. “Wat long ki khristan kiba arsap hynrei to long kiba riewblei naduh ka mynsiem khnang ba ka dur jong u Blei kan paw ha ngi”, la ong u Pastor.U Pastor Hynniewta u la buh jingkylli ia ki phew phew hajar ki paid riewngeit lada ki lap ia ki nongsharai balang lane ia ki dkhot Balang kiba beh jingiaseng man ka sngi U Blei bad kiba ai jingkynshew ruh kaba heh ha iing Mane bad lehse ngi tip pat ia ka jinglong ba tngit (Bamsap) jong u, kum ki nongsharai balang bad kum ki Khristan ngi dei ban iarap ia u ban un ioh ia ka jingim kaba riewblei ha ryngkat ka jingsngewthuh janai ia ka bor jong ka jingriewblei.U la ong ruh haba ngi pyndap ia kino kino ki Form bad haba kylli ia ngi ia ka Niam ngi thoh Khristan kam pher lada ngi don ha ka Balang Catholic, Presbyterian, Balang U Blei lane kino kino ki Balang Christan ba ki don. “Lada kum ki Khristan ngi long kiba riewblei bad ngi sngewthuh ia ka bor jong ka jingriewblei, khlem artatien baroh ki jingsniew ha kane ka pyrthei kin duh kin dam noh ha ka shi minit”, la ong u Pastor.Ha kane ka sngi, la pynsngewlung mynsiem shuh shuh ia ki paid riewngeit da ki jingrwai shem mynsiem na ki kynhun rwai choir bapher bapher naduh ka jingiaseng mynstep bad nohphai sngi.Ha ka jingiaseng por 10:30 mynstep la ioh ia ka jingrwai Choir na ka Balang Laban Presbyterian church, Umsyiem, Sutnga bad Balang Umlyngka katba ha ka nohphai sngi pat la ioh ia ka jingrwai na ka Balang Ummulong kum ka nongpdiang ia katei ka jingiaseng Synod bad na ka Balang Jowai, Laitumkhrah Presbyterian church na ka Standing Choir KJP Synod Mihngi.Ha kane ka jingiaseng Synod, la pynkyntang Pro Pastor ia ki 9 ngut ki dkhot na ka Balang bapher bapher kiba la pyndep ia ki jingpule jong ki bad ruh 6 ngut la pynkyntang Pastor ia ki Pro Pastor. Ia kitei ki 9 ngut yn sa pynkyntang ia ki kum ki Pastor ha ka jingiaseng kaban sa long la shym snem ha ka Balang Tynring, Laitumkhrah Presbytery.Ka jingiaseng Assembly kan long ha ka 6 haduh 9 tarik une u bnai ban wan ha Sohryngkham.
title: Sngewkhia ka KJP Synod Mihngi ba shah lehbein ki kynthei khynnah

content: Nongpoh, 08 Rymphang:Ka Hynniewtrep National Youth Front (HNYF) Northern Region, ka la pynrem jur ia ki riew shim kabu kiba la nud ban hiar thma ka Weighbridge jong ka sorkar kaba don ha 13Mer, Ri Bhoi District, da kaba kynnoh ruh ba ka daw kaba la pynlong ia katei ka jingjia, ka dei namar ka jingdonktilang da ki Dalal bad ki trai kali na Meghalaya bad Assam, kiba la ju mlien ban pyllait tuh ia ki trok kit dewiong palat pud na katei ka jingkieng thew kali.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, myn ha ka miet Sngi u Blei, katei ka jingkieng thew kali, ka la shah hiar thma ha ki briew ia kaba la suba ba ki dei na ka jylla Assam bad ha katei ka jingshah hiar thma ka la don ruh ka jingjulor kaba khraw ha katei ka jingkieng thew kali, ba kynthup naduh ki tiar ki tar bad kawei ka JCB ka la shah pynjulor lut.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor, u Bah Marcus Marten President ka HNYF, Northern Region, u la ong ba kum ka seng kam lah khlem da pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur ban iohi ia ka jingshlur jong ki riew shimkabu, kiba la nud ban hiar thma wat ia ka jaka jong ka sorkar.“Ka jingbym shimkhia da ka sorkar ban bat ia kito ki trok kiba la kit palat pud, kiba la pynkhein ia ki kyndon kiba ba la buh da ka NGT, ka dei kawei na ki dawbah kaba la pynlong ia katei ka jingshah hiar thma” ong u Bah Marcus Marten.Kumta haba iadei bad kane, ka HNYF, Northern Region, ka la kyntu ia ki bor Distrik ka Ri Bhoi ba kin bat lut ia baroh kito ki trok kiba la kit palat pud, khang ba kum kitei ki jingjia kiba pynsngewsih kin nym jia shuh nangne shakhmat, u la bynrap.
title: “Donkti ki Dalal na Meghalaya  bad Assam, ia ka jingjia ha 13 Mer”

content: Shillong, 08 Lber:U Myntri tnad sam ding ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh ban buh ia ki meter siew nokot, ha ki 74 tylli ki jaka ha ka jylla ha ka jinglut ka ban kot sha ka T. 32.73 lak.Ha ka jingjubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u nongialam liangpyrshah u Dr Donkupar Roy ha iing dorbar thawain mynta ka sngi, u Bah Sniawbhalang u la ong ia mynta ka sorkar ka dang buh tang ha ki san tylli ki jaka ia ki pre-paid meter namar ba ki dei kiba lutksan bha, wat la ki don shibun ki jingmyntoi.Katkum ka jingong u myntri, ki pre-paid meter ki kham lait na ka huri hura ha ka rukom khein bai thang ia ka ding, kim donkam ban buh security deposit bad kiwei ki jingmyntoi hynrei ka shem jingeh ia ka sorkar ba kan pyntreikam lut namar ba ka bun palat ka jinglut ban leh shisien leh baroh.
title: Ki meter siew nokot ha 74 jaka

content: Shillong, 08 Lber:U myntri ka tnad shna iing ka jylla u Zenith M Sangma mynta ka sngi u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la pynduh pyndam noh ia ka skhim sam tin sha ki briew ba duk naduh u snem bad ha jaka jongka, la pynmih da kawei ka skhim kaba la tip kum ka Chief Minister Housing Assistance Scheme kaba thmu ban ai skhim ban shna iing.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Mawshynrut u Bah Witting Mawsor hynne ka sngi ha iing dorbar, u Zenith u la ong ha kane ka Chief Minister Housing Assistance Scheme ki don ar bynta kawei na ka bynta ban shna iing ha ka jinglut kaba T. 3.10 lak ban ai sha ki briew ba kham duna ka jingkamai bad kawei pat ban pynbha ia ki iing.Hynrei u Myntri u la ong kane ka skhim ka dang don hapdeng ka jingpynkhreh ka sorkar bad kam pat shym la pyntreikam namar ba kam pat lah ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam.U la ong ba ka don ruh ka skhim ka sorkar pdeng kaba kyrteng ka Pradhan Mantri Awaas Yojana (PMAY) kaba thmu ban ai iing baduk sha ki nongshong shnong bad kane ka skhim ka la treikam mynta ha ka jylla.
title: La sangeh ka sam tin, ong u myntri

content: Shillong, 8 Lber:Ki shipai Border Security Force, kiba pahara ha Gujangpara, South West Garo Hills district, ki la lap ia ka krem, ha khappud bad ka Bangladesh jong ka Gujangpara.Ha ka jingiaid pahara bha, ki shipai BSF, ki la lap ia ka krem, kaba dang shu dep tih shen, hajan ka ka jingker sainar, ha kaba la ngeit ba la tih da ki nongkhaii masi tuh, namar ba katei ka dei ka jaka, kaba ka jur bha ka jingkhaii masi. Katei ka krem, ka dei kaba don ka jingheh kaba 3 phut la ar phut bad ka don ka jingjyliew kaba kumba 20 haduh 25 phut. Katei ka krem, ka dei ka bym tip dep tih satia, namar ba ka donkam ban tih sa 200 metre eiei, ban tih, na ka bynta ban pei lyngba sha ka bynta jong ka Bangladesh. Ki BSF, ki dang tih bniah ia ka jingmut jong katei ka krem, la ka dei, na ka bynta ka khaii masi ne ioh lehse, ka dei na bynta kiwei pat ki kam pyntriem.
title: Lap ki BSF ia ka krem thymmai,  ba 20 phut ha Gujangpara

content: Shillong, 08 Lber:Ka ophis jong u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri ka la pynnoh jingiarap mar T. 2 lak sha ki longiing jong kito ki briew ba la khlad noh ha ka jingjia aksiden ha Nongspung, ka West Khasi Hills bad mar T. 50 hajar sha kiba mynsaw.Ia kane la iathuh u myntri kam pohiing ka jylla u Bah HDR Lyngdoh haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Rambrai u Bah Phlastingwell Pangniang hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi.U Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la iahthuh ba na ka liang jong ka sorkar jylla pat kan ai jingiarap T. 50 hajar ia kiba iap bad T.10 hajar ia kiba mynsaw, kiba ngat ha katei ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha kane ka jingkylla kali.U myntri u la ong ba la pynngat ha ka ain ia u nongniah bad yn sa kem ynda u la mih na jaka sumar namar ba mynta u dang shah sumar ha Civil Hospital Shillong.
title: T. 2 lak ia kiba iap, T. 50 hajar ia  kiba mynsaw ai ka ophis u MRD

content: Mawtajuh, 8 Lber:Hadien 14 bnai ba kim shym la ioh khaw rashon mynta ka sngi ki nongshong shnong jong ka Nongbah Mawshuit ka shnong kaba don ha ka thaiñ Khad-ar Shnong ki la ioh ia utei u khaw hynrei kim pat shym la ioh lut baroh bad ki dang ioh tang 10 bnai katba ia ka saw bnai kaba sah u nongsam khaw rashon u bah Hem Khongrymmai u la kular ha ki ba un sa sam lut kham hadien.Ki la don haduh 12 ngut ki nongshong shnong ki bym shym la ioh khaw la 14 bnai na ka daw ba kim treh ban shim ia u khaw naba la die palat ban ia ka dor ba ka sorkar ka la buh kata T.3 tyngka , ki la iathuh ba u nongsam khaw u sam ha ka dor T.5 tyngka.Haba ia kren bad u nongthohkhubor ha jaka sam khaw rashon ha Mawtajuh, ki longkmie katei ka shnong ki la iathuh ba kim da sngew tohmet than ia ka jingdie ha ka dor T.5 tyngka hynrei kaba pynsngewsih jur ia ki ka dei namar ba ka don ka jingbym shai ha ka kam thung nongsan khaw (Dealer) ha katei ka Centre Nongbah Mawshuit bad ki la kynnoh ba ia u nongsam khaw la shu thung donbor tang da u Acting Sordar u bah Ngen Khongshei ryngkat ki katto katne ngut ki rangbah kiba u sngew iahap jingmut khlem da ailad ia u paidbah ban jied bad khlem da khot paidbah ha ka sngi jied nongsam khaw kumba ju leh ha ki por mynshuwa.Ki 11 ngut na ka shnong Nongbah Mawshuit kiba la ioh biang ia u khaw ki kynthup ia ka kong Florentina Khongjee, Jesynta Khongrymmai,Keroahunlang Khongsit, Kun Khongshei, Lub Khongjee, Riaiom Khongngain, Riakor Phanbuh,Shena Khongshei, Sngop Shabong,Taiar Kongshei bad Sngiat Khongshei bad iwei pat na ka shnong Dewiong i Lngui Ksing.Kitei ki la ioh biang ia u khaw rashon ba dei ka hok jong ki hadien ba ki la leit ujor sha ki bor ka Sohra Civil Sub Division kaba la thung ia ka jingtohkit bad la lap ba ka don ka jingbym biang bad kumta la ai hukum ia u nongsam khaw ba u dei ban pynbiang kumba ki dei ban ioh.Na katei ka 10 bnai ba ki la ioh mynta ka sngi ryngkat bad ka shini ia u bnai kyllalyngkot la khein dor T.9 tyngka shi kilo katba kiwei pat ki bnai ba sah la khein ha ka dor T.3 tyngka shi kilo.Lah ban kdew ba kham mynshuwa ha u lber, 2016 ka la don ka kynrum kynram ha katei ka Centre namar u khaw rashon bad ka kynhun ki ophisar na Sub-Division Sohra ki la hiar sha nongbah Mawshuit ban leit pynlong jingialang paidbah bad na katei ka jingialang la rai ban tohkit bha ia katei ka jingjia bad hadien ba la tohkit la hukum ba u
