nongsam u dei ban pynbiang ia u khaw, shini, sharak kumba ki paidbah ki dei ban ioh.Ka kong Riakor Phanbuh kawei na ki longkmie kaba don kyrteng ha ka ration card ka la ong ba nalor kitei ki kynrum kynram ba kitei ki 14 ngut kynthup u bah Lukas Khongjee bad Phoh Ksing kim shym la shim khaw la 14 bnai ka la don sa kawei pat ka jingjia kaba u nongsam khaw u leh thur mur bad katei ka dei ba don na ki paidbah kiba shim khaw dang ar ne lai sien katba ha ka Card jong ki pat la pyni ba ki la shim bun bnai.Ia katei ruh ka la iathuh ba la leit ujor sha ki bor ka CSD bad la hukum ba u nongsam un pynbiang lut ia kitei ki jingdkoh baroh bad u nongsam u la kular ba un leh kumta ha kine ki sngi ban wan.Haba kren sha u nongthohkhubor ki la pynpaw ba katei ka jingkular u nongsam khaw ka la long bunsien hynrei haduh mynta um pat paw bad ki la byrngem ba lada jia ba um leh kumba u la kular ha kane ka sien ba mynta kin leit ujor biang sha ki bor bahalor.Na ka jingiakren bad kitei ki paidbah la sngewthuh ba katei ka jingjia ka la mih namar ka jingbym hun ha ka rukom thung Acting Sordar ha kaba la mih ar kynhun hapoh shnong, kaba ki la iathuh ba katei ka kam ka la poi shaduh District Council ha kaba la don ki nongujor ba dei ban khot dorbar hynrei haduh mynta ruh ym pat shym la khot dorbar ban pynbeit ia ka kam nongsynshar lane ban jied ia u sordar ba pura.
title: 14 bnai ki la duh, 10 bnai shisien, ai  u nongsam khaw rashon sha ki paidbah

content: Shillong, 08 Lber:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la ioh jingmyntoi haduh T. 2.779 klur na ki kompeni na ka Corporate Social Responsbilities (CSR) ne ki kam ba ki leh na ka bynta ka bha ka miat jong ka imlang sahlang.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ha iing dorbar ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongthymmai U Dr Jemino Mawthoh mynta ka sngi u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba kane ka T.2.779 klur ka dei jong u snem 2015-16 kaba la ioh na ki 6 tylli ki kompeni kiba don ha kane ka jylla.Katkum ka jingong u Myntri Rangbah ki kam ba kine ki kompeni ki la leh na ka bynta ka imlang sahlang ka long kum ka jingthung dieng, ka jingshna lynti iaid, ka jingbuh ia ki jaka sumar ia ki paidbah bad bun kiwei pat.U la ong ba kane ka pisa ba ki la siew sha ka sorkar ka dei katkum ka kyndon 135 jong ka Companies Act 2013.U la ong ba wat la ka sorkar jylla kam pat pynkylla ia ka Industrial and Invesment Promotion Act 2012 hynrei kine ki kompeni ki la siew ia kane ka CSR lyngba ka jingshim khia ka sorkar ha kaba ma u, shimet kum u myntri rangbah u la khot ia ka jingialang jong ki heh ki kompeni bapher bapher kiba don ha kane ka jylla ba ki dei ban pynbiang ia ka CSR katkum ba la buh ka sorkar.
title: T.2.779 klur ioh khajna  ka sorkar na ka CSR ki kompeni

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:La ar sngi eiei mynta ki pulit ki la bat ia ki kali jyrngam bad ki la hukum ba kim dei shuh ban dang iai kamai bad ban rung ha nongbah Shillong. Don ki nongniah kali jyrngam kiba la pyntip sha une u nongthohkhubor ba ka jingbat kali ka la jur palat mynhynnin bad mynta ka sngi ha kaba ki pulit ki la bat ia ki kali, ki la dain kuna bad ki la beh noh ryngkat ka hukum ba kim dei shuh ban dang wan kiew sha nongbah Shillong.La ioh jingtip ba mynta ka janmiet ka la don ka jingialum kaba da ki spah ngut ki nongniah kali jyrngam ha Smit bad hangtei la iathuh ba ki la pynpaw ka jingbitar ia katei ka jingleh ki pulit. Kiba bun ki jingiatai ki la mih ha katei ka jingialang ha kaba ki la rai ba kin dang bteng beit ia ka jingkamai kumba ki ju leh bad ki la shim ba katei ka jingleh ki pulit ka dei ka jingleh shilliang khmat naba ia ki kali rong stem -iong ki shah ban kamai sha nongkyndong katba ia ki kali jyrngam kiba la tip kum ki kali nongkyndong pat ym shah ban kamai sor.Ki nongniah kali jyrngam ki la byrngem ruh ba lashai ka sngi kin leit ban kamai kumba ki ju leh bad lada jia ba ki pulit ki dang bat ki ruh kin pyni bor da kaba khang sbak ia ki kali rong iong rong stem ba kin kiew sha nongkyndong bad la ong ba ia katei kin sdang na jingkieng Umshyrpi ha kaba kin ym shah ia ki kali rong iong rong stem ban kiew palat ia ka jingkieng Umshyrpi kata sha ki thain Upper Shillong.Ki la iathuh ba ka Permit jong ki rong stem rong iong ka dei beit ha sor Shillong kaba ki ong ka Shillong Region katba ka permit jong ki rong jyrngam pat ka dei ha nongkyndong (Rural Areas) hynrei ym shym la kdew pat kiba kum kino ki jaka ba dei nongkyndong ba ki lah ban kamai.Ki la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngew eh ba lada ong ba kamai nongkyndong shaei kin bret ia ki paidbah kiba wan na nongkyndong ban leit sha sor.Lah ban kdew ba kane kam dei ka sien kaba nyngkong ba ka la mih katei ka jingjia shah bat jong ki Taxi Jyrngam hynrei ka dei kaba la jia teng ha kaba khrui ki nongniah Taxi Jyrngam ki la leit sha ophis jong u DTO ha ka 7 tarik u risaw, 2016 bad kumjuh ruh sha u SP Traffic ba nia kren ia katei ka kam.Lah ruh ban kdew ba ha katei ka por u DTO u la ong ba un sa kren ha ka jingialang jong ka Regional Transport Authority kaba u Deputy Commissioner East Khasi Hills u dei u Chairman hynrei haba kitei ki nongniah Taxi ki la leit kynduh ia u DTO ha kine ki shisngi ar sngi la iathuh ba ym pat shym la khot ia katei ka jingialang bad ki la ong ruh ba ki la ia kynduh ia u DC bad ha ka jingiakren ki la ong ba u la ong ia ki ba baroh ka shong ha ka jingpynbeit jong ki kata lada ki Taxi rong iong rong stem kim don jingwit kam don jingpher eiei.La ioh jingtip ba ka East Khasi Hills Local Taxi Welfare Association ka la pynpaw ba ka mdon jingwit eiei hynrei ka dang mih pat kane ka jingjia.Ki nongniah Taxi Jyrngam ki la pynpaw ruh ka jinglyngngoh ba ki Sumo stem kiba dei na kiwei pat ki District la shah ba kin kamai, ki kali Tourist kiba dei kylleng ki jylla la shah ban kamai ha ki District, hynrei ia ki Taxi jyrngam pat ym shah.
title: Byrngem ki jyrngam ban ym  shah leit nongkyndong ia ki stem

content: Shillong, 9 Lber:La 2 snem mynta ka shnong Nongbah-Mawshuit ka shnong kaba don ha ki thaiñ Khad-ar Shnong kam shym la ioh ban trei ia ka skhim 100 sngi ne ka MNREGA kata naduh u snem 2015-2016 bad u snem 2016-2017, ia kane la iathuh da ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka shnong haba ia kren bad u Rupang.Ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka shnong ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih namarba kim ioh ia katei ka skhim kaba ka sorkar pdeng ka la mang kyrpang ia ki paidbah nongkyndong. Ki longkmie bad ki samla jong katei ka shnong ki la ong ba katei ka jingbym ioh ia kate ka skhim ka la buh jingeh ia ki khamtam ha kum kane ka por ba kim don bylla don sngi. Ki la iathuh ba mynshuwa ha ka por ba ka jingpyntrei ia ka skhim ka dang iaid beit ki samla ne ki longkmie ki ioh jingmyntoi bha naba ha ka jaka ba kin shong sngi ki ioh ban leit bylla.U nongthohkhubor u la sakhi ba katei ka shnong ka dei kaba dang sahdien ha kiba bun ki liang bad kam pat don tang ka surok iaid kali haduh mynta ruh bad la sakhi ba kam pat don ruh ki lynti iaid kjat kiba biang, haba ia kren bad kitei ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki la pynpaw ka jingsngew diaw namarba katei ka jingsangeh ka kam 100 sngi ka la ktah ruh ia ka roi ka par hapoh shnong khamtam ki lynti iaid kjat kiba kiwei pat ki shnong ki ju ioh ia ki lynti ba biang lyngba katei ka skhim.Haba wad jingtip na kaei ka daw ba kim shym la ioh trei haduh 2 snem ia katei ka skhim, u Secretary ka Village Employment Committee (VEC) jong katei ka shnong u bah P. Khongjee u la ong ba la pynsangeh naduh ka por ba uwei u rangbah u la leit pyrta shnong ba yn sangeh noh ia katei ka skhim, “Naduh u bah Prik Ksing uba kam ialade kum u Rangbah Shnong u la pyrta shnong da kaba ong ba ka dei ka hukum u Acting Sordar, la sangeh noh” ong u bah Khongjee haba ia kren bad u nongthohkhubor.La iathuh ruh ba ki nongshong shnong ki la leit ud na ki bor ka Khar-ar Shnong-Laitkroh C&RD Block ban pyntrei noh ia ka kam 100 sngi bad la ong ba la kular ha ki ba shen yn sa sdang noh ia katei ka kam ha katei ka shnong. Na ka jingiakren la sngewthuh ba ka daw ba kongsan ba la mih katei ka kynrum kynram ka dei namar ba ka don ka jingbym hun ia ka rukom jied nongsynshar shnong.
title: 2 snem ym don ba pyntrei skhim  100 sngi ha Nongbah-Mawshuit

content: Jowai, 9 Lber:Ka KSU Jaintia Hills Dist Unit mynta ka sngi, ka la leit buh ia ka dorkhas ha u DC East Jaintia Hills ha ka jingiadei ban shna noh ia ka jaka talasi mynder ha Malidor bad ha kiwei de ki jaka ba la dep jurip, na ka bynta ban khanglad ia ka jingrung jingmih ki mynder sha kane ka bri u hynniew trep.Ka jingthmu ban shna ia kane ka khyrdop ka la sah teng haduh mynta kaba hap hapoh East Jaintia Hills District namar ka jingthmu ban buh ia ki jaka talasi mynder, la dep ban mynjur da ka sorkar Jylla naduh ki snem ba la dep, hynrei ha East Jaintia Hills ka kam ka dang sah teng sah ha duh mynta.Ka seng ka la bthah ruh ia ka District ba la dei ban thaw noh ia ka District Tast Force kumba la dep pyn kylla ha ka Meghalaya Act No.6 of 2016 clause 5 (1) of Meghalaya Residents Safety and security Act,2016 hapoh u ne u snem. Na ka liang jong DC ruh u la kular ban shim khia halor kine ki mat jingdawa, namar ba ki long ki jingdawa ba dei hok ban leh.
title: Khohreh jaka talasi  mynder ka KSU Jaiñtia

content: Shillong, 09 Lber:U MLA ka Maw-shynrut u Bah Witting Mawsor u la pynpaw ba ka jingiakhun jongu ban dawa ban ioh surok kaba bha kam shym la kut tang ha kaba leit kyrpad ha ka sorkar, u myntri ka PWD hynrei ula phai ruh sha u Blei da kaba duwai ba Un ktah ia ka sorkar bad u myntri PWD ba kin peit ia ka jingsniew ha West Khasi Hills.Haba wanrah mynta ka sngi ia ka rai halor ka jingsniew ki surok ha West Khasi Hills, u Bah Mawsor u la ong, “Nga la duwai shisha ia u BLei ba un ktah ia ka mynsiem u myntri ka PWD bad ia ka sorkar hynrei kane kam shym la urlong satia kampher lada kim sngap ruh u Blei un sa ktah ia ki”, la ong u Bah Mawsor.U la ong ba u la iai kren bad u la iai kynduh man ka por ia u myntri PWD bad ka sorkar ba kan phaikhmat lem ia ki surok ha West Khasi Hills hynrei khlem jingmih eiei haduh mynta.“Ka Surok Nongstoin sha Maweit ka dei kaba sniew tam ha ka pyrthei, wat u kulai ruh un kdiah kjat lada un iaid ha kane ka surok”, la ong u MLA ka Mawshynrut.U la ong ba kiwei ki ong ba ki don ka surok kaba bha tam ha ka pyrthei, don kiba ong ba ki shna ia ka surok kaba khring ia ki samla (romantic road) hynrei ka surok Maweit kaba la shna naduh ka por ka sorkar Assam, ka dei kaba sniew tam ha ka pyrthei.U la ong ba ka thain Maweit bad ka West Khasi Hills ka dei ka jaka kaba riew spah bha ha ka spah mariang namar ba ka don lut ki marpoh khyndew naduh u dewiong, u uranium, ki dieng ki syntiew bad bun kiwei hynrei haba phai sha ka surok ka long kaba sahdien tam napdeng baroh ki district.“Ki surok ha West Khasi Hills kiba bun ki dei tang ki surok khyndew suda”, la ong u Bah Witting bad bynrap ba namar ka jingsniew palat ka surok ka la pyntieng ia ki nongshangkai pyrthei ban leit iaid kai sha West Khasi Hills.Katba u MLA ka Rambrai-Jyrngam u Bah KP Pangiang haba shim bynta ha kane ka jingiatainia, u la ong ba naduh u snem 2013, ka sorkar u Dr Mukul Sangma ka la kular ban ai surok ban shna surok kaba bha ha baroh ki jaka ha ka jylla hynrei kaba sngewsih ka long ba haduh mynta kam urlong satia.“Naduh u snem 2013 haduh mynta, ka sorkar ka shna surok tang 119 km ha baroh kawei ka jylla bad lada khein uwei u MLA ne ka konstitwensi ka ioh surok tang mar 1.98 km”, la ong u Bah Pangiang.U la ong ba kaba sngewsih ka long ba ka tnad PWD ka la leh bein ia ka thain ha kaba ia ki surok ki bym pat dep ruh, la ai jingtip sha ka sorkar pdeng ba la dep nadong shadong.U MLA ka Rambrai-Jyrngam u la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba kan nym leh shiliang ia ka West Khasi Hills da kaba mang skhim kumjuh khamtam ia ka surok khnang ban wanrah ia ka roi ka par ha ka thain bad ka jylla.Katba kiwei kiba iashim bynta lang kynthup u MLA ka Mairang Bah Metbah Lyngdoh, u MLA ka Nongstoin Bah J Jyndiang, u Saleng A Sangma, u Nihim D Shira ki la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba kan bishar biang ia ka surom shna ia ka surok bah Shillong-Nongstoin-Tura namar ba ka don ki jaka ba la wanrah ia ka jingjia aksiden kali namar ba ka jingshna ka kompeni khamtam ha ki khongdong kumba la jia ha Nongspung ha kine ki sngi.Kiwei pat kiba shim bynta ha kane ka jingiatainia ki kynthup ia u nongialam liangpyrshah u Dr Donkupar Roy, u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit.
title: “Nga duwai ia u Blei ba un ktah ia ka mynsiem u myntri PWD”

content: Shillong, 9 Lber:Kat kum ba la ioh lum na ki briew jong ka Thain War Jaintia, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew-khia halor ka jingkhaii be ain jong ki katto katne ki briew na ka tei ka thain bad ka jingkhaii ka la long la jan man miet. Na ka liang ki paid jong katei ka thain ki lyngngoh ba ki bor pulit ne ki BSF ki ba kim shym la kem ia kine kiba khaii tuh (illegal trade) kiba iaid lyngba ka surok ba iaid lyngba ka shnong Satpator, Trangblang, Remshyiap shaduh Amsohrhong kaba long ka kad khaii beain ia ki masi la jan man ka miet. Ki la pynpaw shuh shuh ki don ka jing tieng ioh ba katei ka thain kan long ka kad khaii be ain sa kiwei kiwei ki mar khaii,kum ki Dawai Phensidyl, ki tiar siat, ki drugs,bad kiwei kiwei ki ban ktah wat ia ka imlang ka sahlang bad ka jingshong sngain ki shnong ki thaw namar kumba ki shait iohsngew ba bunsien haba don ki kad khaii tuh ka don ruh ka jingbym sngain jong ki kynthei khynnah kiba leit bri leit lyngkha.
title: Khaii masi tuh sha War Jaiñtia

content: Shillong, 9 Lber:Namar ka Jingia-seng Khasi Jaintia Presbyterian Synod Sepngi ka ban long ha Mawlai Umshing ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai, ki pulit ki la pynbeit ia ka lynti iaid ki kali bad ki jaka pynieng kali.Ki jaka pynieng kali rit kin long ha Madan Shnong Mawroh, Khlaw Syiem Lad Sanker Hospital, madan Polytechnic, surok na Umjarain sha Mawtawar, hapoh NEHU, na bynta kali heh ki bos ne ki trok ka jaka ieng kan long ha K.V School hapoh NEHU hajan Gate No.1.Na bynta ki kali ba iaid na baroh arliang ka surok NEHU Gate No.1 haduh Gate No.3 la pynbeit ba kiba wan na Umshing ban leit sha Mawtawar kin hap ban rung na Gate No.1 bad mih Gate No.3, kiba wan na Mawtawar ban leit sha Umshing kin rung tang na Gate No.3 bad mih na Gate No.1.Ki kali ba wan na Lad Umshing ym shah ban leit sha Umsohkhlur, ba wan na Lad Umshing ym shah ban leit sha Umshingiar.Ki kali ba la rung hapoh ki jaka jingiaseng yn ym shah mih shuh tad haduh ban da wai jingiaseng, la bthah ia baroh ki kali jingiaseng ban bud beit bud ryntih ia ki kyndon pynbeit kali, kane ka long katkum ka jingpyntip na u SP ka East Khasi Hills u bah M.Kharkrang.
title: Pynbeit kali Jingiaseng Synod

content: Shillong, 5 Lber:Ka HNLC, ka kren shai ba kan nym lah ban shu iapein kumto ia la ka jong ka nongrim ban shu wan pyndem kum ki seng Garo, tang na bynta ban ioh ia ka song tyngka, ong ka kyrwoh na U Sainkupar Nongtraw, Publicity Secretery jong katei ka Seng. Katei ka seng, ka ong shuh shuh ba la seng nongrim ia ka Seng ym dei halor ka pisa thungsner, hynrei halor ka nongrim ban pynioh biang ia ki hok ka jaidbynriew ba la shah knieh noh ha ka sorkar india bad ka kyrwoh, ka ong shuh shuh ba ka HNLC ka don laki jong ki tyllong,haduh mynta ka dang ioh ia ka jingkyrshan ba man la u snem ha ka liang ka pisa, ki tiarsiat na ki katto katne ki Ri bym shahliang India kynthup na ki seng bar ri kaba long bunshah ia kaei kaba u Mukul Sangma u tyrwa.“Ka long kaei kaei kaba isaitmet ba u Mukul u pyrshang ban nguid ia la ka jong ka prie,haba tang iaka song tyngka ba lah mang ka sorkar pdeng ia ka ANVC bad ANVC(B) ruh u dang pyndonkam bakla ban ai sha kito ki dkhot ba shu wan pyndem shimet,bad kine ki seng ki khlem pat ioh eiei ruh hadien bun snem kat haduh ba ka samoi treikam u CM ka lah jan kut noh” ong biang ka kyrwoh ba la phah da ka ktien Khasi.La ong biang da ka HNLC, ba ki Seng Garo ki pher ka nongrim haba ianujor bad kiwei pat ki seng ha ka thain shatei Mihngi, namar ba ki Naga lei ki lah dep ban pynbna ia ka ‘plebiscite’ 66 snem mynshuwa kata naduh u Snem 1951 ba ki kwah ban ieng kum kari balaitluid la ka jong kampher wat lada rit ne heh. Ka jingbym ailad ka Sorkar India ia kiwei ki ri ban don bynta lang ha kane ka jingiakren, ka pynlong ia ka NSCN(IM) ban sahkut tang haki jingiakren,dei ruh halor kata ka nongrim ba ka NSCN(K)ka randien noh na ka jingsangeh iasiat.La ong biang da katei ka seng, ba ka jingthmu ban shu pynkut daka bor iaka jingiakhih kino kino ki seng ne jaidbynriew khlem da wanrah iaka jingiateh baskhem ha ka dulir jingsuk(peace treaty)kan khamsniew arshah ban ia kaei kaba ju long, shim nuksa ia ka jingkynad ba khlem kut hapdeng ka North bad Ka South Korea,kane ka jia tang namar ba ka thma korea 1950-53 ka shu kut tang daka jingsangeh ban iakynad(armistice),ym dei lyngba ka jing ia sos iasuk.Ka kyrwoh na ka HNLC, ka ong shuh shuh ba ka Sorkar Congress lei la tikna ba kan nym don shuh iaka bor ha u snem 2018,ka lah duh ka jingshaniah na ki seng kiengatiar,ka lah duh lut ia ka jing shaniah u Paidbah “Khlem artatien ka BJP kan wan haka bor ha u Snem 2018 ha Meghalaya sa tang lada kane ka seng sain hima bakhlain ha india ka lah ban sangeh ia ka kam sain hima kaba wanrah ia ka jingsngewiapher (Communal politics)”.Ka long kaei kaei kaba sngew lyngngoh ba u Lat ka Jylla un kam ba ka Meghalaya ka lah roi la par bha lyngba kane ka Sorkar, ong ka kyrwoh bad ka ong shuh “ Hato une u Lat u don jingtip ba ia ka scheme lynti ban leit sha ka jaka rep soh U Mukul Sangma u pyntreikam tang namar ba ka don ka jingiathoh shongkurim ka khun jong u ha katei ka jaka”.
title: Ngim kwah song tyngka,  kum ki seng Garo: HNLC

content: Shillong, 5 Lber:Ha ka miet 3 tarik ki runar, kiba ym lah ban tip ki la leit ban pynpra dusmon ia ka ïng jong u bah Curtis Rani kaba don ha Mawkneng, Sohiong. Katei ka dei kaba dang shu shna thymmai bad la pyntwa ia ki kynroh kiba dang shu kynroh maw blok dang shen bad la bom ruh ia ka atoskhana ha ban da pra phom. Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u trai jong katei ka ing u bah Curtis Rani, u la ong ba tang mar ia jia kumta ha ka step kaba bud kata ha ka 4 tarik kaba dei ka sngi saitjaiñ ki khubor ki la saphriang sted lyngba ki Social Media bad dei ruh ha ka sngi saitjain ba u la ong ba u SP City u bah Vivek Syiem u la phone ia u bad ha kajuh katei hi ka sngi u la ong ba u la ujor pyrshah ia u Syiem ka Hima Nongspung u Pa’iem Petrick Syiemiong bad u Joint Secretary jong katei ka Hima ha Sohiong OP.U bah Rani u la ong ba ka daw ba u la ujor pyrshah ia kitei ki 2 ngut ki khlieh jong ka Hima Nongspung, ka dei namar ba shimiet shuwa ban jia katei ka jingjia kata ha ka 2 tarik u lber, ka la don ka jingshah byrngem ha kaba u Syiem u la phah da u Rangbah Shnong ka Mawkneng u bah Kelingstar Rani ba un leit pynsngew sha ka kmie jong u Curtis bad ban leit ong ‘Lah ka ïng ne ka RTI’. “Nga ngam don hynrei i mei i la iathuh ba u Rangbah Shnong u shu wan ong kumta bad u leit noh” ong u bah Curtis. “Ngam ju don daw badno badno hapoh shnong, hynrei ka dei beit tang bad u Syiem kumjuh bad ki katto katne ngut ki konktraktor bad ka daw ba ki buh shun ia nga ruh ka dei beit tang na ka daw ba nga wad RTI” u ong biang. Haba kylli katno ka jingjulor jong katei ka ïng kaba la shah pynpra, u la ong ba haduh mynta um pat lah ban antad katno “Hynrei kumba 300 tylli ki maw blok kiba la kynroh la pynpra phum, ka atoskhana ruh la pra phum” u la jubab.Katkum ka jingiathuh utei u rangbah uba la pyni ruh ia ki kot ki sla ha u Rupang, la iohi ba u la pan RTI nyngkong eh ha ka 6 tarik u nailar, 2015 bad u la pan jingtip na ka Hima Nongspung bad ki la don haduh 12 tylli ki jingtip kiba u pan bad kitei ki kynthup ia ka jingai wai ia ka khyrdop khrong khajna kaba don ha Mawjongka naduh u 2013-2015, ka jingpynlut bad ka jingmih jong ka Hima ha u sne m2014-2015 bad kiwei pat ki jingtip kiba ia dei bad ka synshar khadar. Ha ka jingpan RTI kaba –ar u la pan jingtip 16 tylli ki mat na ka Hima Nongspung, “Naduh 2015 haduh mynta ngam pat ioh jubab, katei ka kam ka la poi ruh ha u CIC” ong u bah Curtis uba ujor ruh sha u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills halor ka jingieng be-aiñ ka khyrdop khrong khajna ha Mawjongka khlem ka jingbit jong ka bor District.Katkum ka jingiathuh bad ka jingthoh ba utei u rangbah, u la pyni, ka pyni ba ki don ruh ki jingiakajia jaka kiba la poi sha KHADC bad ia katei ka kam ka District Council ka la khot hajir ia ki ar kynhun la laisien bad nalor nangtei ka la don sa kawei pat ka hajir kaba la buh ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai. Ha ka 1 tarik mynta u bnai u Syiem ka Hima Nongspung Pa’iem Petrick Syiemiong u la thoh da ka jingthoh sha u Sordar Wahlang 9 kyntoit bad u rangbah shnong Mawkneng da kaba hukum ba ki dei ban pynsangeh ia ka jingtrei ha Mawkneng lad surok Nongspung kaba don hajan ka dukan ka kong Trilian Warjri namar ba ka don jingiakajia bad ba ka Hima kam pat lah rai. “Ngim tip u Syiem u khang ia ka jingtrei aiu, ka rep, ka shna ing, ka 100 sngi, u shu ong beit ban sangeh noh bad u pan pata khyndew” ong utei u rangbah hadien ba la shah pynpra ka ing.
title: Pynpra ki runar ia ka ing ha Mawkneng;  mudui  ia u Syiem Nongspung

content: Jowai, 5 Lber:‘Kane ka por kaba ngi im kadei ka por kaba ngi bun kam eh, ngim don por shuh ban kynmaw ia U Blei bad ruh ban ia syllok bad U Blei’ la ong u Pastor FS Rymbai haba kren ha ka jingiaseng Samla KJP Synod Mihngi kaba 15 kaba la long mynta ka sngi ha Balang Presbyterian, Mihmyntdu.“Ko ki samla, ki longkmie longkpa, ngi donkam ban ia syllok bad U Blei khnang ba ynda ngi la mih shabar na la iing jong ngi, ngin ym shah jop satia ha ki jingsniew jong kane ka pyrthei”, la ong u Pastor.Da ki phew hajar ki riewngeit ka KJP Synod Mihngi na kylleng ki Balang ha rilum Khasi bad Jaintia kynthup ruh kiba na Assam, ki la wan tuid sha katei ka jingiaseng samla ka KJP Synod Mihngi kaba la sdang naduh ka 3 tarik bad kut noh mynta ka meit sngi U Blei.Nalor ki phew hajar, la wan sakhi ruh ia kane ka jingiaseng bah ki Samla KJP Synod Mihngi da ki nongmihkhmat kiba kynthup ia ar ngut ki MP, u ma Vincent H Pala bad u Conrad Sangma nalor u CEM ka JHADC u Ma Thombor Shiwatu MLA ka Sutnga, u ma Hopeful Bamon, u Dy. CEM ka JHADC u ma A Andrew Shullai, u ma Moonlight Pariat u pa Dolloi Jowai, u Puramon Kynjing.U Rev. FS Rymbai uba la sam ia ka khubor kaba u la pynshong nongrim na ka Kitab ki Nongbishar 16:28 u la ong, U Blei u kwah ban thaw thymmai ia ngi, u kwah ban pyllait ia ngi na ka jingshahteh mraw ka jong ngi ha ki jingsniew jong ka pyrthei.Katba ha ka jingiaseng nohphai sngi, u Rev. K Pariat u la sam ia ka khubor ba bha ia kaba u la pynshong nongri na ka Gospel u Ioanis 11:11.U Pastor Pariat u la ong ba don lai jait ki paralok. Uba shu khot paralok, uba paralok uba kham jan bad u paralok uba hajan eh. U paralok uba hajan eh udei uba kit ba bah lem ia ki jingeh jingshitom bad u ba kmen lang ruh ha kapor ba kmen.“U Jisu u dei u Blei, udei u paralok uba hajan eh uba kloi ban kit ia baroh ki jingkit bakhia ki jong ngi”, la ong u Pastor Pariat.La pynlung mynsiem ruh ia ki riewgngeit da ki jingrwai choir na ki jingiaseng samla bapher bapher. Ha ka jingiaseng 10:30am, ka kynhun nongrwai choir na ka jingiaseng samla Balang, Moobakhon, Shnongpdeng, Laitlyngkot bad ka Balang Rattacherra bad ha ka jingiaseng nohphai sngi pat la ioh ia ka jingrwai na ka jingiaseng Samla ka Balang Mowtyrshiah, Standing Choir jingiaseng Samla KJP Synod Mihngi na ki Delegates bad kumjuh na ka Balang Mihmyntdu.Ka jingiaseng samla KJP Synod Mihngi kaba khadhynriew kan long naduh ka 2 tarik haduh 4 tarik Lber 2018 haka balang Sutnga, East Jaintia Hills.
title: “Ngi la bunkam palat ngim don por  shuh ban ia syllok bad U Blei”

content: Shillong, 5 Lber:Namar ka jingkyntur pud ki shipai ha Law-sohtun ka MCIC 19th Shillong South konsti-twensi ka la ia kynduh ia u Rangbah Shnong bad ki Rangbah Dong ka Dorbar Shnong Lawsohtun bad ki la ia kren halor katei ka bynta kata ka jingker kynroh ki bor shipai ha jaka ka Lawsohtun, ha katei ka jingiakynduh u Rangbah Shnong u bah Mitchell Wankhar, ki rangbah dong bad ki dkhot ka Dorbar ki la shim ia ka rai ban ujor sha ka tnad iada ri ka sorkar pdeng ne ka Mnistry of Defence Authority bad kumjuh sha ka sorkar jylla halor katei ka jingkyntur pud ki shipai.Shuwa ia kane ka MCIC hapoh ka jingialam u bah Sanbor Shullai MLA ka la lum jingialang ha ka 4 tarik mynta u bnai ha Assam Club Laban kaba la pyniaid da u Joy Rynjah Secretary bad pdiang sngewbha da u B. Thangkhiew Rangbah Shnong- Dorbar Shnong, ha ryngkat ka jingiadonlang u bah Ricky Shullai- MDC ki ophisar pulit ka Crime branch /Traffic Branch/ MePDCL ryngkat bad ki Rangbah Shnong , Rangbah Dong, Seng Teilang ki Kynthei/, Seng Samla bad kiwei pat.Ha katei ka jingialang la ia kren halor ka jingshah thombor ki kynthei ki khynnah, ka jingbym biang ki rukom pyniaid kali, ka jingbym treikam ki bording ha surok bad kiwei bad ha katei ka jingialang ki ophisar ki tnad sorkar ki la kular ba hapoh shibnai kin pynbiang lut ia baroh ki jingdkoh treikam ha katei ka konstitwensi.Ha katei ka juh ka sngi ka la don ka jingialang ha RLSSCO Community Hall, Bishnupur Shillong, ha ka por 2 baje mynsngi bad la sam ia ki tiar Sports sha ki 100 tylli ki kynhun kynthup naduh ki skul, ki kolej, ki klob, ki seng samla bad kiwei pat ki kynhun na kate ka konstitwensi.
title: Sha ka tnad iada ri, yn ujor  ba tam pud ki shipai ha Lawsohtun

content: Shillong, 5 Lber:Ka jingwan ka jingiaseng Synod ha Mawlai ka la long ka jingkyrkhu ia ka shnong Mawlai Umshing naba katei ka shnong kaba dang duna bha ha kiba bun ki liang naduh ki surok, ki lynti iaid kjat, ki umbam umdih, bording bad kiwei hynrei mynta shi taiew shuwa ban sdang ka jingiaseng Synod katei ka shnong ka la ioh ia kiba bun ki kam pynroi. Ki paid nongshong shnong ka Umshing ki ju mad jingeh khamtam ha ka por lyiur naba ki hap ban iaid kjat lyngba ki lynti iaid kiba ktieh, hynrei mynta katei ka shnong ka la ioh lai tylli ki lynti iaid kjat bad ka surok kaba shi kilomitar eiei kaba la mang pisa T.3 klur tyngka. Ia katei ka kam la pyndep wut wut, namar ba ha ka sngi u blei kata ha ka 12 tarik kan don ka jingiaseng Synod ha Mawlai.Ha ka sngi saitjaiñ jong ka taiew u MLA ka Mawlai u bah Embhah Syiemlieh u la plie ia ka surok bad ki lynti iaid kjat. U MLA u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkmen namarba la lah ban pynurlong ia baroh ki kam pynroi kiba dei ban poi ha Umshing shuwa ka jingiaseng Synod. “Kine baroh ki wan urlong dei ka jingiatreilang na ka Dorbar Shnong, ka Balang Presbyterian bad nga u MLA, dei lyngba ka jingisynei u Blei baroh ki jingpynkhreh ia kane ka jingiaseng Synod ki la dep pura ha ka por kaba biang bad kynthup ruh ia ka jingbiang ia ka umbam umdih da ka tnat Water Resources kaba la pisa T.35 lak bad ka jingpynbiang ia ka bording elektrik da ka tnat Meghalaya Energy Corporation Limited (MeECL)” ong u bah Embhah Syiemlieh.U bah Embhah u la ong ba haduh mynta ka sorkar ka dang pyllait pisa dang T.1 klur tyngka bad ka dang sah sa T.2 klur tyngka hynrei u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen, namar ba ki konktraktor kiba trei ia ka kam ruh ki la shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban pyndep noh, wat la ka sorkar ka don hapdeng ka jingkyrduh pisa. Shuh utei u MLA ka Mawlai u la ong ba naduh u snem 2013 haduh 2018 ka pisa na ka MLA Scheme kaba T.7 klur tyngka un theh lut sha ki paidbah ka konstitwensi na bynta ki kam pynroi bapher bapher ha Mawlai bad sha ki longing kiba duk. “Ngam shym la riewspah na ka jinglong MLA bad ngam shym la tuh wat tang shi naia ruh na ka skhim MLA ne MDC, nga sngewhun ka mynsiem bad nga ioh thiah suk ha ka por mynmiet naba nga la pyndonkam hok ban sam lut ia ki skhim u paidbah” ong u bah Embhah.Lah ban kdew ba ha ka jingplie ia ka surok bad lynti iaid kjat la donlang u bah CS Khongsar, Rangbah Shnong ka Umshing, u Pa’iem Ricky Nelson Syiem, Acting Syiem ka Hima Mylliem, u Tbn Dr. BR Kharlukhi, u Bah V. Nongdhar, Secretary ka Dorbar Shnong Umshing, u Bah BR Kharmujai, Rangbah Shnong Mawlai Mawdatbaki, Dr. Marco Mitri, Rangbah Shnong Mawlai Kyndon Massar, Bah IR Kharshyndon Rangbah Shnong Mawlai Mawtawar, Bah Kynsai Lyngdoh, Vice President ka Mawlai Town Dorbar, ki Engineer ka tnat PWD bad PHE ryngkat ki trai jaka.
title: Ngam riewspah na ka jinglong MLA,  ngam tuh shi naia ruh: Embhah

content: Shillong, 05 Lber:Ka sorkar jylla ka la wanrah ia ka ain ai jingtip jong ki nongtrei sorkar ia ka jingkamai ne ka jingioh jongki shisien shi snem.Ia kane ka ain kaba la tip kum ka Meghalaya Public Servants (Furnishing of information and annual return of assets and liabilities and limits for Exemption of asset in Filing Returns) Rules 2016, la wanrah da u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma ha ka sngi shong dorbar mang tyngka ba nyngkong ha kane ka sngi Thohdieng. Ka sorkar ka thaw ia kane ka ain na ka bynta ba ki shakri sorkar ki dei ban ai jingtip sha ka sorkar ia ka jingioh kamai jongki ha ka shi snem, kynthup ka spah ka phew. Man u shakri sorkar u dei ban pynbna ia ka jingioh kamai jongu man ka 31 tarik Lber man u snem sha ka sorkar.
title: Hap iathuh ki nongtrei ia ka kamai

content: Shillong, 5 Lber:U Bah HS Shylla, MDC jong ka seng UDP, ula thoh hynnin ka sngi sha U Mukul Sangma, myntri rangbah ka Jylla, ha kaba ula kynnoh ba ka tnat pynroi sor, ka la pynkhein, da ka jubor justi ia ka ain ba mynshwa jong ka sorkar Jylla, kaba la tip ka Meghalaya Town and Country Planning Act, 1973, kaba dei ruh ka ain, kaba nyngkong, kaba la nang pynmih shuh shuh ia ka jing treikam jong ka MUDA.Ka Section 1 (2) jong ka Meghalaya Town and Country Planning Act, 1973, ka kren shai ba katei ka ain, ka treikam ha baroh ka Jylla, hynrei ka lait noh, tang ha ki jaka, kiba hap ha u pud u sam jong ki Autonomous Districts. Ka dei ruh, lyngba ka jingmynjur jong kano kano ka District Council, ba ka ain, ka lah ban treikam bad kata ka long, da kaba pynbna paidbah bad haduh mynta kam don ka jingpynbna jong ka Khasi District Council lane kano kano ka bor, kaba pyntreikam ia katei ka ain jong ka tnat pynroi sor sha ki jaka ba hap ha ki District Council.La ujor shuh shuh, da U MDC, ba ka MUDA, haduh mynta ka pynmih ia ki jingpynbna paidbah ia ki kyrwoh khubor jongka, ha kiba bun ki khep, khlem da don ka ain kaba shai, kaba pyni ia ki jingtrei kam jongka bad katei ka paw, lyngba ka jingbishar jong ka High Court, ha ka 16tarik Rymphang 2017, lyngba ka mukotduma kaba la mudui ha u snem 2015.La ong shuh da U MDC, ba ka sorkar, ka dei ban tuklar kyrkieh ia ka Meghalaya Urban Development Authority (MUDA) bad khanglad ia ki kam mushlia jongka bad kumjuh ruh ia ka MeECL, PHE, bad kiwei de ki tnat, ba kim dei ban shu kylla niang kohnguh ha ki ain jong ka MUDA, ha ki shnong kiba hap ha u pud trei kam ki District Council. “Ngam banse ban mih sha u paidbah, lada jia ba ka ophis jongphi kam leh kyrkieh noh ia kane ka mat” kren pynkut U bah HS Shylla MDC jong ka Nongkrem.
title: Ngan mih sha u paidbah, halor  ki kam thombor jong ka MUDA

content: Nongstoiñ, 5 Lber:Ka jingkylla kali Synod, ha Jaidohkroh Nongspung, ka la dep shi taiew thik mynta ka sngi bad ka jingiap jong ki mynsiem briew kiba shong ha katei ka trok ka la nang kiew shuh shuh sha ka 19 ngut.Katkum ka khubor ba la ioh lum da u nongthoh khubor la ioh jingtip ba ka jingnang kiew biang jong ka jingiap briew ha katei ka jingjia ka long hadien ka jingkhlad noh sa u wei pat u khynnah samla u ba la mynsaw jur ha katei ka jingjia aksiden kali, u ba la khlad noh mynta ka step ha ka por 10:40 ei ei hapoh ka Hospital NEIGRIMS ha Shillong.Shuh shuh la ioh jingtip ruh ba u tei u samla u ba la khlad noh mynta ka step ha katei ka Hospital, u dei u Donisstar Kharkrang 24 snem, na ka shnong Nginiong bad u tei u samla u ba la khlad u dei ruh u wei na ki 6 ngut kiba shitom jur bad kiba thiah hapoh CCU (Critical Care Unit) ha katei ka Hospital.Ha kaba iadei pat bad kiwei kiwei kiba mynsaw jur ha katei ka jingjia kiba thiah ha CCU ha katei ka Hospital haduh mynta ki don sa kumba 4 ngut, katba iwei pat ila ioh mih noh na katei ka CCU.Katba hapoh Civil Hospital Nongstoin, katkum ka jingleit wad jingtip u nongthoh khubor, la lap ba kiba bun hi kila ioh mih noh na katei ka Hospital, namar ki la sdang ban ioh bor bad kiba dang don pat ha ka jingshah sumar ha katei ka Hospital haduh mynta ki don satang 4 ngut kynthup ia u draibar ba niah ia ka trok.La iathuh ba U Donisstar, u dei uba shong ha jrong jong katei ka trok bad u la khlad noh, hadien ka jingmynsaw kaba jur na ki bynta jong ka khlieh. U Donisstar, u don khun iwei, iba dang saw bnai, I khun kynthei bad yn tep ia u, lashai ka sngi.
title: 19ngut kiew kiba iap, ba kylla  ka trok leit Synod Nonglang

content: Nongstoiñ, 6 Lber:Hadien ba ka seng Hynniewtrep Youths Coucil (HYC), Lai Lyngdoh Area Unit, ka la ioh jingtip halor ka jinglum synniang jong ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar shnong jong ka Lai Lyngdoh Area (SNSLLA), na ki paidbah jong ka thain na ka bynta ban pan jingkyrshan ia ka mukotduma , ba la phah da ka Joint action Committee (JAC), halor ka surok Nongstoin-Mawthabah-Ranikor; na ka liang jong ka seng ka la dawa na katei ka synjuk ha ryngkat ka jingthoh ba ka dei ban pynsangeh noh mardor ia katei ka jinglum synniang na ki paidbah jong ka thain.Na ka liang jong ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor ka jinglum synniang jong katei ka synjuk na ka bynta ka surok Nongstoin-Mawthabah-Ranikor, namar ba katei ka surok ka dei kaba la mang pisa, da ka Ministry of Road Transport and Highways lyngba ka Special Accelerated Road development Programme for North East (SARDP-NE), na ka bynta ban pynsuk ia ka jingtih ia u Uranium ha kylleng ka thain Mawthabah.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta na ka liang jong u samla Khrawbor Shangrit, General Secretary ka HYC Lai Lyngdoh, haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u la ong ba Ia katei ka rai ban lum ia u synniang la shim da ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong Lai Lyngdoh Area bad ki Trai Khyndew Nongstoin-Pombriew-Wahkaji-Ranikor-Nongkynjang bad Nonglwai ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha ka 20 tarik Rynphang bad ha katei ka jingialang katei ka synjuk ka la rai ruh ban pan jingkyrshan na ka bynta ka mukotduma, ba la lam khmat da ka JAC, na ka bynta ban ianoh synniang lem na ka bynta ka jinglut jingsep.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba kum ki nongsynshar shnong bad khamtam ki paidbah jong katei ka thain kim dei ba ai ia u synniang na ka bynta katei ka kam namar ba ia katei ka mukotduma, kaba ka JAC ka la ai, ki paidbah jong ka thain kim don jingtip ei ei bad ia katei ka kam la leh tang da ki katto katne ngut khamtam ki dkhot jong ka JAC.
title: Pyrshah ba lum pisa  mukotduma, surok Nongstoin-Wahkaji

content: Shillong, 6 Lber:Ka tnat rep jong ka sorkar India, ka ICAR na Umiam, ka la pynmih ia ki sniang, kiba ki la ai kyrteng ki sniang Lumsniang, ha kaba la pyni paidbah ia kitei ki sniang mynta ka sngi, ha ka jingdon ryngkat jong U Dr. H Rahman, Deputy Director General (Animal Science) ICAR, New Delhi; U Dr. R S Gandhi, Assistant Director General, ICAR, New Delhi, U Dr. S V Ngachan, Director jong ka Institute; U Dr. B C Deka, Director, ATARI, Zone III, ha ryngkat bad kiwei pat ki ki nongmihkhmat jong ka sorkar Meghalaya.Kitei ki dei ki sniang, kiba la pynkhleh lang hapdeng ki sniang shnong lane ba ki ai kyrteng Sniang Megha bad ki sniang Hampshire bad la pyniakhleh, da 25 percent ki sniang shnong bad 75 percent ki sniang Hampshire. La iathuh ba ka ICAR, ka la iaid ia katei ka jingthmu jongka, la 25snem kynthih bad ha katei ka jingiaid lynti ka ICAR, ka la lah ban pynmih ia kitei ki sniang, ha kaba ki la ai kyrteng ruh ia ki “Lumsniang”.Kitei ki sniang, ki dei kiba la pynmih, katba kum ka jinglong jong ki sniang kiba don sha kane ka thain, kiba kha ia ki khun sniang kiba kham heh bad kiba don ruh ia ka doh kaba kham bha bad kaba kham bang, ba ki briew jong kane ka thain, ki ia bang bha ban bam doh. Kitei ki sniang, ki lah ban khia hapdeng ka 90 haduh ka 100 kilo ha ka rta kaba khad ar bnai bad ka dor die jongki, ka poi sha ka T.11000 haduh T.13000 uwei u sniang, kaba la heh dor ar shah, na ka dor jong ki sniang Khasi, kaba long hapdeng ka T.6,000 lane T.7,000.
title: Pynmih ka ICAR ia ki Lumsniang,  ki sniang kiba bang doh

content: Shillong, 5 Lber:Ka jingkylla jong ka trok leit jingiaseng, ka la kylla la shitaiew kynthih mynta ka sngi bad ki ar tylli ki Balang, ha Mawbyrkhong bad kumjuh ha Nginiong, ki la pynlong ia ki jingiaseng duwai ba kyrpang, na ka bynta kiba khlad bad kiba iap ruh kumjuh ha la ki jong ki jong ki Balang mynta ka sngi.U bah Rostar Marbaniang, uba dei u rangbah jong ka Balang Nginiong, u iathuh ba ki la pynlong ia ka jingiaseng duwai, kaba kyrpang mynta ka sngi ha ka balang jongki bad kumjuh ruh ki la leit ban pynlong jingiaseng duwai sha ki iing jong kito ki saw ngut kiba iap na katei ka Shnong. Ha ka Balang Mawbyrkhong ruh, ki pynlong jingiaseng duwai mynta ka sngi, la iathuh da U Bah YK Lyngkhoi, Tymmen Basan jong ka Balang, haba iakren bad U Rupang, da ka mobile.U Bah Rostar Marbaniang, u iathuh ba na ka jingiakren bad kito kiba mynsaw arngut, kiba la wan phai sha shnong, ki iathuh ba katei ka trok, kaba ki shong, ka la dei ban kylla ha Mawlangkhar, ka jaka, kaba don kumba 17 kilometre na katei ka shnong Nginiong. “Ka rah ka taiar dien” ong utei u rangbah, haba iakren bad U Rupang bad ka daw, ka dei beit namar ba ka stet bha ka rukom niah ia katei ka kali. La iathuh shuh shuh, ba hadien jong katei ka jingsyier mynsiem ha Mawlangkhar, ka la don ka jingkynjah jar jar, ha katei ka prah jong katei ka trok, namar ba kiba bun ki la sheptieng eh, ia ka rukom niah kali thurmur. Hynrei, tang shi kilometer tam, ha ka jingnang iaid shuh shakhmat, ka la jia shisha katei ka jingkylla jong katei ka trok ha Nongspung, ong utei u rangbah. Kiba mynsaw, kiba dei na ka shnong Nginiong, ki dang don mynta sa 5ngut kiba don ha Hospital, la iathuh.Lah ban pynkynmaw, ba katei ka dei ka trok, kaba mih na ka shnong Mawbyrkhong kaba don ia u number ML 06 4474, ka la kit khapngiah briew ban leit jingiaseng Synod sha Nonglang, ha kaba la niah ia katei ka kali, da u Bah Aldening Syiem bad ba ula kam, ba ka jingkylla ka trok, ka dei namar ba ka khapngiah palat ka kali shakhmat bad kumta, ula bakla thep kiar, ha kaba ula ong ba u thep sha ka 3rd kiar, ka poi pynban sha ka neutral kiar.
title: Ka trok leit Synod, ka la dei  ban kylla ha Mawlangkhar

content: Shillong, 28 Rymphang:Ka sorkar kam pat pynthikna ba kan buh ne ai kyrteng da ka Mawlai Block ha Mawlai haduh mynta bad katkum ka jingkren jong u Mynri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma, ka sorkar kan sa rai shen.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, sha ki lad pathai khubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang ka kynhun myntri, u Dr Mukul u la ong ba ka sorkar kam pat rai satia ban ai kyrteng bad ban buh ia ka ophis ka Block kaba pyniakhlad na ka Mylliem Block.“Ngim pat rai la ban ai kyrteng thymmai ne em”, la ong u Dr Mukul haba kylli shaphang ka Mawlai Block.“Ngi don ki shnong kynthup ka Mawlai, Pynthorumkhrah bad ka Nongthymmai. Ka jingkylli ka long ban ioh ia ka jaka kaba biang tam kaba iahap bha ia ka jingsuk jong ki paidbah nongleit nongwan”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ym dei ban leh politik ia kane ka kam, hynrei dei ban iakren bad ban sngap ia ka jingkwah jong ki paidbah namar ba baroh ki paidbah jong ka Pynthorumkhrah, ka Nongthymmai bad ka Mawlai ki dei kumjuh ym don jingpyniapher.“Kam don kano kano ka jingpyniapher ia ki paidbah jong ka Mawlai, Nongthymmai ne ka Pynthorumkhrah konstitwensi”, la ong u Dr Mukul.Ka Mawlai Block ka dei kawei kaba iaknieh hapdeng u MLA ka Pynthorumkrah u Bah AL Hek u la dawa ba dei ban buh ha Mawpat katba u MLA ka Mawlai u Bah Embhahlang Syiemlieh bad u MDC Bah PT Sawkmie kiba dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban buh ha Mawlai.Ha kawei ka liang, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka jingthung ia ki nongtrei ha ki Block thymmai la rai ban leh shwa da ka kontrak haduh ban da pynmih da ka jingpynbna da kumwei pat.
title: Ym thikna ka Block Mawlai, yn buh  ha jaka ba biang ki paidbah:Mukul

content: Jowai, 28 Rymphang:Ia ka metiap jong ka samla kaba la lap na rud surok bah NH-44 ha Dkhiah East naduh ka 23 tarik une u bnai, la ithuh mynta ka sngi da kiba haiing hasem jong ka.Ka jingithuh ia katei ka samla da kiba haiing hasem jong ka, ka la long tang lyngba ka dur kaba la phah da ki pulit lyngba ka Whatsapp na East Jaintia Hills sha Ribhoi District.U SP ka East Jaintia Hills, u bah S Thamar, u la iathuh ba lashai ka sngi, ki ba haiing jong katei ka samla na Ribhoi District kin wan hi da lade ban pyntikna la katei ka samla kadei ka jong ki.Na ka liang u  SP ka Ribhoi, u bah GD Kharwanlang haba iakren na Nongpoh, u la iathuh ba u kpa jong katei ka samla uba la tip kyrteng kum u Emer Kharthangmaw, u la wan ban pyntikna ba ka dei ka khun jong u kaba kyrteng ka Binora Dohtdong kaba dei na ka shnong Lympyllun, Umsning.Ka tyllong khubor ruh ka la iathuh ba katei ka longing jong katei ka samla kaba la shah pyniap ka long kaba duk tasam bad ki la shym jynjar shi katdei ban kit ia ka metiap jong ka na Khliehriat sha Umsning na ka bynta ban pyndep ia ka niam ka rukom.Kumban shu pynkynmaw ba ki pulit ka Khliehriat lyngba ka jingpyntip ki riew paidbah na ka shnong Dkhiah East ki la lap ia katei ka metiap narud surok bah NH44 ha ka por 5 baje mynstep ha ka 23 tarik une u bnai.Ki pulit ki la suba ba ka lah ban shah bret nalor kali hadien ba la dep pyniap bad leh dusmon ia ka.
title: La ithuh kiba haiing ia ka met  ka samla ba bret ha Dkhiah East

content: Shillong, 28 Rymphang:U bah Bindo M Lanong Senior Working President jong ka seng UDP u la ong ba kane ka jylla ka dei ka jylla kaba rit, ka jaitbynriew ruh kaba rit hynrei ka seng UDP ka la shim ia ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka jingiatylli ym ban mih ka jingiapait ia pra bad ka pyrshang ruh ban wanrah jingiatylli hapdeng baroh ki seng riewlum khnang ban ioh bat noh ia ka bor synshar ha ka jylla. Hynrei u la ong ba tang shu mih ki jingiapher tang shu mih ki jingiashrut don ki briew kiba shim kabu ban thaw noh da ka seng saiñpyrthei thymmai.“Ngi iohi ba bun ki seng kiba shu mih kumto tang na ka jingiashrut badno badno hynrei kitei ki jah noh tang katto katne por, kam don jingmut ban thaw seng thymmai, ha District Council sdang ruh pat sdang ia kata ka Political Party lah mih kat kane ka jingbudnam, ki briew kiba budnam ki thaw ia ka Political Party, shano kan poi-ka long kumba shu pynkulmar kai ia ka jingmut u paidbah” ong u bah Bindo.“Hynrei nga shaniah ha u paidbah, u paidbah u sngewthuh ia ka bynta lajong kaei kaba dei ha kum kane ka por ba ngi pyrshang ban pyniatylli ban ioh ia ka bor synshar, don ki Party kiba ki paidbah ki la kyntait, katno tylli ki seng kiba la mih ki jah noh, lada u paidbah u sngewthuh kam myntoi ban thaw Political Party, nga kyndit ban iohsngew ba mih Political Party ha KHADC, ngi te ngim don bynta eiei” ong biang u bah Bindo haba kylli kumno ka UDP ka sngew halor ki jingsaphriang ki khubor ba ka People Democratic Forum kan kylla noh sha ka People Democratic Front.Katba u Dr.Jemino Mawthoh, General Secretary katei ka seng u la ong baroh shi katta ka UDP ka iohi ba ka dei ka Campaign for Change ban pynkylla ia ka jingmut ki paidbah lyngba ka jingleit ai jingshai kylleng kylleng ym ka kum ka seng sainpyrthei, “Lada ki don jingmut ban wanrah da kata ka seng sainpyrthei ia ka PDF ngin hap ban ia shong pyrkhat biang, ngi kwah ba ka kynhun kaba ngi donlang lada ka kwah ban thaw seng ruh hynrei ka dei ban leh haba shai ba ngin sngewthuh shai” u la ong.“Ka jingkren jong uwei u nongialam ka la biang”Shisngi ar sngi shuwa ba ka dorbar mang tyngka ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council kan sdang ka UDP ka la byrngem ba ki MDC jong ka kin ther tyngeh ha katei ka dorbar halor ki 9 tylli ki mat ba katei ka seng ka khlem ioh jubab na u Chief Executive Member ka KHADC u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem.U Chairman ka Sub Committee on District Council Affairs u bah Bindo M Lanong, u la ong ruh ha ka jingkren bad ki nongthohkhubor ha katei ka por ba ki MDC ka UDP kin tih naduh tyllong khnang ba kitei ki jingkynnoh halor ki 9 tylli ki mat kin shai.Hynrei haba la poi ha ing dorbar la iohi ba ki MDC ka UDP kim shym la kren eiei halor katei ka bynta lait noh tang u MDC katei ka seng na Nongkrem konstitwensi u bah H.S Shylla uba la wanrah da ka jing ia tynjuh bor, kaba la kyrshan da ki MDC ka Congress bad u MDC ka Sohryngkham u bah Pyniaid Sing Syiem.La kylli na u bah Bindo ha ka jingiakren bad ki nongthohkhubor hadien ba la wai ka jingialang jong katei ka komiti mynta ka miet ban tip, na kaei ka daw ba ki MDC ka UDP kim kren hynrei tang u bah Shylla marwei, u bah Bindo u la ong “Ka jingkren jong uwei ka la biang, yn ia kren bun lei haba la kren uwei, uwei na ki nongialam u la kren, shu buh kum ha ing haba la kren u kpa yn ia kren lei, u bah Shylla u la iohi u la lap ba don ki jingtip kiba ngim tip kiba la buhrieh bad la shu leh napoh napoh” ong u bah Bindo haba ia kren bad ki nongthohkhubor.U Secretary jong katei ka komiti u Dr.Jemino Mawthoh pat u la ong ba kam don kano kano ka jingiapait ia pra hapdeng ki MDC ka UDP kumba la kynnoh hynrei u la ong pat ba ka don ka jingiapher ha ka jingmut jong ki bad ia katei la dep ban iatai ha ka jingialang jong katei ka seng.Ha kaba ia dei bad ka NC ba la wanrah u bah Shylla u Dr.Jemino u la ong ba kam dei kaba bakla namarba ha dorbar la ther la thalain ia u bah Shylla ia ki kam shimet jong u, “U ruh u donkam ban ioh pynshai ban iada ialade” ong u Dr.Jemino.
title: “Ki briew kiba budnam ki thaw  Political Party, shano kan poi”

content: Nongstoiñ, 28 Rymphang:Ka jingialang jong ka seng HSPDP Nongstoin Area Unit, kaba la long mynta ka sngi hapoh Bishop Hall Nongstoin, na ka bynta ban ia jied bad pynskhem ia ki nongkit kam kiba thymmai jong u snem 2017-18, ka la long long kaba khluit bha ha kaba ki paidbah nong kyrshan jong ka seng, ki la ia hylla hapoh katei ka jingialang namar ka jingbymhun ka jong ki, haba u General secretary jong katei ka seng, u la pynbna ba ka Executive Committee jong ka seng, kaba la ia shong kyrkieh, ka la dep ban ia rai ban pynneh biang ia ki nongkit kam ki barim na ka bynta katei ka samoi trei kam.Shuh shuh ha katei ka por la don ruh ki katto katne ngut ki nongkit kam jong ka seng, kiba la ia hylla da kaba pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah kaba jur ia katei ka rai jong ka EC bad ki la ong ruh ba kim lah ban pdiang ia katei ka rai, namar ki ba bun ki dkhot ka EC kim shym la ioh ia ka jingtip ei ei ruh em halor katei ka jingialang bad ki la ong ruh ba dei ban jied thymmai beit ha katei ka Jingialang.Katba katei ka jingialang ka dang khluit bha bad ka dang don ruh ha pdeng ka jingiania hapdeng jong ki nongkyrshan jong ka seng, kiba la wan ha katei ka jingialang, na ka liang jong u President ba rangbah duh jong ka seng, u bah Ardent Basaiawmoit u la mih noh na katei ka jingialang khlem wanphai shuh bad ha katei ka por ki paibah nongkyrshan jong ka seng, ruh ki la iamih lang sha bar ha ryngkat ka jingbitar da kaba ki la pyndonkam ruh da ki ktien kiba lai phew jait ban kynnoh bad kynthoh ruh ia u President rangbah jong ka seng.Hadien katei ka jingiamih noh u bah Ardent na katei ka jingialang na ka liang jong u chairman katei ka jingialang u bah T. Lyngdoh u la pynwai noh shipor ia katei ka jingialang khnang ban tem shwa ia katei ka jingia hylla bad ha katei ka por ba ki paidbah ki la iamih shabar jong ka jaka pynlong jingialang ka la don ruh ka jingia nia hapdeng ki para nongkit kam jong ka seng, ha ryngkat ka jingia kdew kti.Na ka liang jong u MLA ka Rambrai u bah KP Pangniang u ba dei ruh u President jong ka party HSPDP ka West Khasi Hills, ha ryngkat u MLA ka Nongstoin u bah D. Jyndiang, ki la pyrshang ban tem noh ia katei ka jingia nia bad khot biang ia baroh ki paidbah shapoh ka jingialang na ka bynta ban ia kren da kaba jai jai bad ban ia pynshai ym ban shu ia hylla ne ia nia I wei ia iwei bad kumta na ka liang jong ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong katei ka seng, ki la ia rung biang ban sngap ia ka jingpynshai bad don ruh ki katto katne kiba la phet noh.Haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor hadien ba la wai katei ka jingialang na ka liang jong u chairman ba pyniaid ia katei ka jingialang u bah T. Lyngdoh u la ong ba ym dei ba la pynkut noh ia ka jingialang, hynrei la hap ban pynwai noh shwa shipor ia katei ka jingialang namar ka la sdang ban khluit bad u la ong ruh ba ka seng, kan sa shim biang ia ka rai bad hapoh jong u bnai Lber bad ha katei ka sngi yn khot lang ruh ia ki nongkitkam jong ki Primary unit bapher bapher ha ryngkat ka Executive committee jong kane ka area.Ha kaba iadei pat bad ka jingbitar bad kynthoh ki paidbah lai phew jait ia u bah Ardent nongialam ba rangbah jong ka party HSPDP, na ka liang jong u bah Pangniang haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u la ong ba ka jingmih jong ka jingiakhluit ka long ba namar ba katei ka jingialang ka dei jong ka general meeting, ha kaba ym dei tang ki dkhot bad nongkyrshan jong ka HSPDP kiba don, hynrei la don lang ruh da kiwei kiwei ki briew kiba na bar bad hadien ba la ia rung bad pynbeit biang katei ka jingialang ka la iaid beit bad kala long kaba jop.
title: Kulmar ka jingialang  HSPDP  ha Nongstoin, mih noh U Bah Ardent

content: Shillong, 28 Rymphang:Ka jing ia kynduh lang jong ki Pastor na ka Ri Bhoi Synod, ka KJP Synod Mihngi bad na ka KJP Synod Sepngi, kaba la long mynta ka sngi, ka la iakren halor ka ain shong kurim jong ka sorkar Jylla lane kaba la tip ka Meghalaya Compulsory Registration of Marriage Act 2012 bad ka ain kaba la pynkylla biang ha u snem 2015 bad ha katei ka jingialang, la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia bad ka jing bym sngew hun halor katei ka ain bad ka jingialang, ka shim ba naduh ba la pyntreikam ia ka Indian Christian Marriage Act 1872, ka balang ka dang bud ryntih beit ia katei ka ain khlem jingbakla ne jingduna eiei ruh em.Ka kyrwoh na U Rev JM Nongpluh, uba pyniaid ia katei ka jingialang, ka ong ba ia ki jingiathoh la ju ithuh da ki Pastor, kiba dei ki Marriage License Holder bad kam ju don kano kano ka jingiathoh hapdeng ka Balang, kaba shu iathoh khlem da ithuh ma ki.Ka kyrwoh ka ong shuh shuh “Kyndit kynsan, ka sorkar, ka la shim noh ia kane ka hok na ka Balang, kaba pyndonkam hok ia ka Indian Christian Marriage Act, 1872 bad kane ka long ka jing ban khia ia ki khun Kristan, khamtam kiba don ha ki kyndon kynshrot jong ka Jylla, kiba dei tang ki kum shiliang ki sem ki shiliang.Kane ka ain ka pynshong sting ruh ia ki jing pyniathoh ba la dep da ka Balang, ha kaba la hap ban pyn ithuh haduh ar sien ia kajuh ka jing iathoh” ong ka kyrwoh.Ka jingialang, da kawei ka jingmut, ka sngew dei ban kyrpad ia ka sorkar ba kan pynkylla noh ia kane ka ain, da kaba pyllait noh, ia kiba pyndonkam ia ka Indian Christian Marriage Act, kaba dei ka ain jong ka sorkar India.“Ki Pastor kiba la wan sha kane ka jingialang, ki la ia kut ban ai ia ka jingkyrshan ia ki lai ngut ki Pastor, kiba la leit sha ka iing Kashari jong ka Meghalaya pyrshah ia katei ka ain” pynkut ka kyrwoh na U Pastor Nongpluh.
title: Pyrshah ki Pastor Presbyterian,  ia ka ain shongkha ka sorkar Jylla

content: Jowai, 1 Lber:Ki bynta ka wah Umngot ha West Jaintia Hills, naduh ka Shnongpdeng, Dawki ki dei ki jaka jngohkai kiba la khring bha ia ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei na bar jylla bad kumjuh na bar ri bad mynta ka kynti pat ka Darang ruh ka la sdang ban paw pyrthei na ka bynta ban khring ia kane ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei.Ka shnong Darang kaba don marjan bad ka shnongpdeng ka don ka jaka kaba itynnad bad da ka jingshimkhia u DC barim, u Arun Kumar Kembhavi bad ruh da ka jingtrei shitom ki samla ka shnong lyngba ka jingaibor jong ka Dornar Shnong, la seng ia ka Darang Tourism Promotion and Development Society (DTPDS) na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka kam jngohkai pyrthei kaba dei ruh ka karkhana ban kyntiew ia ka ioh ka kot ki nongshong shnongKa Tamasa Tlang: Mynhynnin ka sngi ha katei ka shnong, la pynlong ia ka Tamasa Tlang ia kaba la tip ruh kum ka Winter Tourism Fest. Ia kane ka Tamasa la bei pisa da ka bor District haduh 1.90 lakh da ka jingiatreilang ka tnad shang pyrthei bad kumjuh ka bor Sub-Division Amlarem ha ryngkat ka DTPDS.“Ka jingthmu jong ngi ka long ban wanrah ia ka lad iohkam iohkam ia ki para shnong para thaw khamtam eh ia ki samla ba la nang la stad ba kin lah ieng ha la ki jong ki kjat”, la ong u Chairman ka Society, u bah Reachingson Kongwang.“Ka kam sorkar ka long kaba eh bha ban ioh ha kine ki sngi bad kum ki samla kiba don ka jingkitkhlieh ngi hap ban wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban ieng hala ki kjat lajong”, u la bynrap .Ha ka jingialang shwa ban sdang ka tamasa, u ADC, bah DM Wallang u la ong ba ka donkam ban don ka jingkit khlieh na ka bynta kane ka kam, ym tang ban pdiang bad ban pynbiang bam ia ki nongwan jngohkai, hynrei kaba kongsan eh ka long ban iada ia ki na kano kano ka jingjia kaba sngewsih.U Kongsan ha katei ka sngi, u long u Local MLA, u ma Stephanson Mukhim, U ma Stephanson Mukhim u la ai ka jingiarap pisa ia katei ka Society haduh kumba 3 lakh shiteng ban pyniaid beit shakhmat ia ka jingthmu ka society. Kane ka pisa ka long lynba ka skim SRWP.Na ka liang utei u nongmihkhmat ka thain u la iaroh ia ka Society bad ia ka borshnong kaba don ka jingiatylli ban kyntiew ia ka shnong ka thaw.U ma Mukhim u la plie pyrda ruh ia u maw ba la seng nongrim ia ka Darang Tourist Spot mynta ka sngi ha katei ka Shnong.Kiwei pat kiba la kren ki kynthup ia ka SDO, I Laloo, u SDPO, Jason Mairom, u Rangbah Shnong, u Chairman ka Society, U MDC ka thain, ma H. Pohthmi bad ka EAC, AMlarem ka kong Kharpuri nalor kiwei kiwei.Ha kane ka sngi la sakhi ruh ia ka jingiakop kinglieng, iakop jngi, iakop ngam um bad kiwei kiwei ki jingialehkai kiba la ia shim bynta da ki samla bad rangbah kynthei bad shynrang.Ia kane ka tamasa la sdang naduh ka 25 tarik bad kan kut ha ka 11 tarik u Lber ha ka shnong Borghat bad Kwator, East Jaintia Hills.
title: Ka wah Umngot, ka khring bha  ia ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei

content: Shillong 28 Rymphang:Ka sorkar ka la jer kyrteng thymmai ia Ganesh Das hospital sha ka Ganesh Das Govt Maternal Child and Health Hospital, Shillong, ia ka Rilbong Chowk la jer sha ka Capt Clifford Nongrum Square, ia ka surok KJP Synod Jowai sha ka Thomas Jones Road, bad ia ka Gurampani sha ka Saphai.Kawei pat ka mat ba ka sorkar ka la pdiang ka long ban pynkylla noh ia baroh ki Assam Scheduled Form sha ka Meghalaya Scheduled Form.
title: Kyrteng thymmai ia ka Ganesh Das

content: Shillong, 28 Rymphang:Ka KJP Synod Mihngi Vocational Training Centre, kan plie ia ka jaka hikai thain jain, ha ka 4tarik Lber 2017 ha Pongtung, ha kaba yn plie da U MLA jong ka thain, uba dei ruh u myntri ka tnat Border Area, U bah P Tynsong. Nalor ka KJP Synod Mihngi, ka tnat Border Area, ka tnat thain jain jong ka sorkar Jylla, ha ryngkat ka Social Economic Life Development Department jong ka KJP Synod Mihngi, ki iatreilang ha katei ka jingai jinghikai.
title: Hikai thain jain ha Pongtung

content: Shillong, 01 Lber:Ka Seng Khasi Kmie, hapoh ka jingïalam u Rgh Banteilang S. Rumnong bad u Rgh Arwan S. Tariang kum u President bad Secretary, ryngkat ka jingïa synran lang ka komiti u Tymmen U San ka Seng Khasi, ki la pynkhie im biang ia ka lehniam Mawkynthei ha ka shnong Umkaduh, ha thaiñ Marngar bad Mawsyntai, Ri-Bhoi District ha ka 26 tarik Rymphang ba la dep.U Rgh Romeo Mawrie ba dei u dkhot ka komiti u Tymmen u San, u la wad bniah ban lum khana na ki nongshnong shaphang ka nguh ka dem ha kane ka maw, kaba don harud jong ka lynti jong kane ka shnong, kaba don kham shaneng jong ka Pung Marngar.Na ka jingïakren bad ki riew rangbah ka shnong, la sngewthuh ba kane ka maw la juh niew ïaka kum ka kynja kmie rangbah, kaba long ka nong ri nong da nong ker, kaba kdup ba sumar ïala ki khun ki hajar ka raij, kiba lada ki don ha ka shem jynjar ka shem lanot, ki juh leit ha kaban nguh ban dem ha kane ka jaka.Ka nguh ka dem ka lehniam ka lehrukom ha kane ka jaka Mawkynthei ka la jah noh ïa kaba ym lah ban tip na ka daw aiu, hynrei kumba phah ka maïa ba na sha lyndet, ka Seng Khasi sa shisien ka la lap bad shem biang sa shisien ïa u Mawkynthei.Ia ka lehniam, la lam khmat da uwei na ki tymmnen ki san jong ka Raij Marngar, ïa kaba la synran lang da u Chairman ka Komti u Tymmen U San u Rgh Skor Jala, u Rgh Hambok Kharmawphlang, Rgh Donbokstar Kurkalang, Rgh Romeo, ha kaba la pynlong biang ïa ka lehniam ka leh rukom kum ka dak ba sa shisien ban pynkyntang biang ïa ka lehniam ha une u Mawkynthei.Hadien kane, u Lyngdoh ka Raij Marngar ha ka jingkren ka jong u, ai khublei ïa ka Seng Khasi Kmie kaba kloi ba kan shimti noh shi syndon Ia kane ka jaka, ha ka juh ka por ban ïarap naka bynta ban wan ban pynkyntang biang sa shisien ïa kane ka Mawkynthei don nam ha ka Raij, da kaba u la ong ba na ka liang ka jong u bad ki paidbah kin khreh ba kin pynkhie im biang ïa kane ka lehniam ka leh rukom kaba naduh kane ka sngi, man la u snem kan don ka lehniam bad ka nguh ka dem ha kane ka maw.
title: Da ka jingknia, pynkhie im biang  ia ka lehniam Mawkynthei

content: Nongstoiñ, 1 Lber:U CEM ka KHADC, u bah Pynshngain N Syiem ha ka sngi ba ar jong ka taiew, u la hiar sha Nongstoin ban leit jngoh bad noh synniang ruh ia ki lanot kiba shitom na ka jingjia ba kylla ka trok, kaba la jia ha ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai ha Jaidohkroh Nongspung.U CEM u la rung manla ki kamra hapoh jong ka Civil Hospital ha Nongstoin ban leit ai mynsiem ia baroh ki 16 ngut ki lanot kiba la ngat ha katei ka jingjia ba shyrkhei ia kaba haduh mynta ki dang don ha pdeng ka jingshah sumar ha katei ka Hospital.Shuh shuh ha shwa ba u CEM un poi ha sor Nongstoin na ka bynta ban leit jngoh ia ki lanot kiba dang don ha pdeng ka jingshah sumar ha katei ka Hospital, u la hap ruh ban iaid lyngba katei ka surok ha Jaidohkroh Nongspung kaba dei ka jaka bala jia katei ka jingkylla ka trok kaba i shyrkhei haduh ba ki 12 ngut ki mynsiem ba kordor ki la khlad noh ha shen.Mar iapoi ha katei ka jaka, ba la jia katei ka jingjia na ka liang jong u CEM u la pynsangeh ia ka kali ka jong u bad hiar ruh ha katei ka jaka na ka bynta ban buh syntiew kum ka dak ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngew lem na ka bynta ki mynsiem ba kordor kiba la khlad noh ha katei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih ha katei ka jaka.Haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor jong ka District hadien ba u la dep ban leit jngoh ia ki lanot kiba don ha pdeng ka jingshah sumar ha Civil Hospital Nongstoin.Na ka liang jong u CEM u la ong ba hadien katei ka jingjia kaba sngewsih u la sngew ba ka dei ka kamram ka jong u kum u CEM ban leit kynduh ia kitei ki lanot kiba don ha pdeng ka jingshitom bad ruh ban sngewlem na ka bynta ki mynsiem kiba la khlad noh.“Tang mar iapoi ha ka shnong Nongspung bad haba nga la iohi ia katei ka jaka ba la jia katei ka jingjia ba sngewsih nga ktah ka mynsiem bad nga la hap ruh ban hiar ban buh syntiew ha katei ka jaka kum ka dak ban kynmaw ieid bad burom ia kito ki mynsiem kiba la duh noh ha katei hi ka jaka” ong u CEM.Ha kaba iadei pat bad kiwei kiwei ki bymshymla don ha katei ka Hospital ha Nongstoin na ka liang jong u CEM u la ong ruh ba she un a pyrshang ban leit ia kynduh kyrpang ia baroh ki 3 shnong kiba la mad ia katei ka jingjia ba sngewsih.
title: Wan jngoh  U CEM KHADC  ia kilanot kylla trok ha Nongstoin

content: Shillong, 01 Lber:Ka Seng Khasi Ri-Bhoi Pyllun kan pynlong iaka Lympung kaba 4 ha shnong Khyndewso hajan Mawlasnai ha ka 5 tarik u Lber 17.Kumta ka seng ka khot kawer ia baroh ki kur ki kha kiba bat ia la ka Niam tynrai ban ia poi sha katei ka lympung ha Ri-Bhoi bad ban wanrah ruh iaka put ka tem bad ka shad tynrai naki tnad Seng Khasi , la ong ka kyrwoh na u Bah Lam Sungoh President bad Bah Ap Dohling Secretary.Ha kajuh ka por, ka Seng Khasi Nongmynsong ka pyntip ba kan pynlong ïa ka Shad Suk Mynsiem ba shi sien shi snem ka jong ka haka 18 bad ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai ha madan Urkaliar. Kumta ka Seng ka wer ïa ki nongshad kynthei bad shynrang ban ïashim bynta naka bynta ban pynphuh pynphieng ïa kane ka shad ka kmen kaba long ka dak ai nguh u khun bynriew ïala u Blei Trai Kynrad.Ha kawei ka liang, ka Seng Khasi Kmie ryngkat ka komiti u Tymmen u San, ki phah ïa ka kitbok kitrwiang sha baroh ki khun samla pule jong ka Seng Khasi bad Seiñ Raij, kiban khreh naka bynta ba kin ïakhun ïa ki eksamin bapher bapher ka jong ki. Ka kyrwoh na ki nongïalam ka seng ki ai mynsiem ïa ki khun samla kynthei bad shynrang ban dem minot ha ka jingpule, khang ban lah ha kaban ïa tbeh sha ka thong ban kiew shakhmat ha ka liang ka jingnang jingstad ha ka jingim.
title: Shad Seng Khasi Ri-Bhoi bad Nongmensong

content: Shillong, 01 Lber:Ka CSWO ka la pynpaw ia ka jinglyng-ngoh halor ka jingkam jong u heh ka AMD (Atomic Minerals Directorate) ba ka jingtih uranium kam ktah ia ki kynja baim, kumba la paw ha ki lad pathai khubor.Ha ka jingpynlait kyrwoh, ka President ka CSWO ka kong Agnes Kharshiing ka la ong ba kane ka jingkren ka long kaba lamler bad ka bym lah ban pdiang.“Kane ka dei ka jingkren riew khlaw da kaba pyrshang ban shu pynbiej ia ki paidbah jong kane ka jylla shaphang u uranium bad jingtih ia u uranium. Bun ki pyrkhat ba ki briew kane ka dong mihngi ki dei kiba dan biej bad lah ban shu pynbiej”, la ong ka CSWO.Ka jingtih uranium kan pynkylla shrah da ki hajar snem khamtam ia ki thliew ba la khlong, ka la ong.Ka CSWO ka la kam ba katkum ka kaiphod, ka jingpynmih u uranium ia ka bih ka long kaba jur bha. Ha ka 0.1% u uranium, kumba 99.9% na ki phngit kin sah. Nalor ki bynta jong u uranium ba la khlong, ka ktieh na jaka ba khlong ia u uranium kan kynthup ia baroh ki kynja phngit jong u ore bad kane kan long ka bih ia ki kynja ba im”, la ong ka CSWO.Ka CSWO ka la ong ba kan iai pyrshah beit ia ka jingthmu ban tih uranium ha ka jylla Meghalaya bad kyntu ia ka sorkar ban nym ap ia ka kompeni ba kan pyntroin ia ka mariang tang na ka bynta ban shna surol. Ka sorkar ka dei ban peit ia ka jingbit jingbiang jong ki briew bad ka roi ka par ha ka jylla khamtam ha ki jaka nongkyndong, ym ban shaniah ha ka jingpynksan bakla jong ki heh ka kompeni.Ki sorkar kiba kwah ban shu khlong jubor ia u uranium ki buhrieh ia ka jingshisha ba ka jingkam jong ki heh ka AMD ba u Ore u dei uba bha kam iahap satia na ka jinglap jong ka jingwad bniah na NEHU mynshwa ba u ore um dei uba bha ha kane ka Meghalaya bad u jur bha ka radiation.
title: Lamler u heh ka AMD bym ktah  u uranium ia ki kynja ba im: CSWO

content: Nongpoh, 01 Lber:Haba pynshai halor ka jingsospon da ka seng Congress, mynta ka sngi u Bah Minsing Makri, uwei na ki heh Nongialam ka seng Congress ha ka Nongpoh Block Congress Committee bad ha Ri Bhoi District, u la pynshai kylla da kaba ong ba kane ka jingshah sospon jongu na ka seng, ka dei tang ka jingleh marwei, da ki katto katne ngut ki nongialam ka Nongpoh Block Congress Committee ryngkat bad u Bah C.B Syiem kum u President.Haba ai jingpynshai sha ki nongthohkhubor, u Bah Minsing Makri, u la ong ba ka jingkynnoh ba u la pynkhlemrain ia u MLA badon burom jong ngi, u Dr. D.D Lapang, kam don nongrim bad ka jingshisha, namar ha ka jingshisha kum u Nongialam ka Congress u la iatreilang bad u Dr. D.D Lapang naduh u snem 1977, ha kaba tad haduh kane ka khyllipmat um pat la ialeh pyrshah ia ka party ne ia u Dr. D.D Lapang.Shuh shuh, u la ong ruh wat hapdeng kine ki kynrum ki kynram ba la mih hapoh ka party halor ka jingkynnoh ba u la pynkhein ia ki kyndon jong ka party, hynrei u Bah Min Makri, u la ong ba un iai trei shitrhem na bynta ka party bad ban wanrah nam jong badon burom ia u Dr. D.D Lapang ha ka election 2018.Kane ka jingshah sospon na ka seng, ka dei tang namar ba don ki katto katne ki Rangbah ka party kiba la sngewthuh bakla ia ka jingtreikam jongu, hynrei watla katta, kum u Rangbah un dang shimkhia ia ka kam bad kloi ruh ban pdiang ia ka rai jong ka Disciplinary Committee, u la bynrap.
title: Ther kylla u heh Congress,  halor ka jingshah sospon

content: Shillong, 28 Rymphang:Ka All Meghalaya Dancer’s Association, kawei na ka seng kaba nyngkong eh kaba ju ai jinghikai ia riew don sap naduh u snem 2000 haduh mynta ha kane ka kynti kan pynlong ia ka jingshong kyrain, ha jaka ieng kali ha Addl. Secretariat naduh ka por 12:00 mynsngi haduh 4:00 janmiet ban dawa bad pynpaw na ka sorkar halor ka jingeh jong ki samla donsap jong ka Jylla.Ka seng ka la dep phah ruh ia ka dorkhas, sha u myntri rangbah bad sha ki dkhot ka dorbar Jylla, ban thaw ia ka ain ban pynurlong noh ia ka jingthmu kaba la slem bah jong ki samla donsap.Kumta ka seng ka khot ka wer ia kito ki riew donsap shad bad rwai kynthup ki Association/club kumjuh ruh ia kito kiba ia khun ha ki jing iakob bapher bapher ban ia don ryngkat bad ai jingkyrshan ba pura lem ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingdawa jong ka seng, ong ka kyrwoh khubor ba la pyllait da U Bah Denny Rynjah, Organising Secretary.
title: Lashai, yn shong kyrain ka AMDA

content: Nongpoh, 28 Rymphang:Ki Nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Umran-Dairy, Ri-Bhoi District, kynthup ia ki Rangbah, ki Longkmie, ki Samla kumjuh ruh ki khynnah rit, ha ryngkat ka Seng PPM jong ka North Khasi Hill District bad RBPM Central Body, myn ha ka sngi-saitjain, ki la iaid paidbah na pdeng shnong sha ka jaka shna thymmai Petrol/Diesel Pump kaba thmu ban shna hajan wah Umran.Halor kane ka jingshna Petrol/Diesel Pump thymmai, ki kynhun jong ki Longkmie kynthup ki nongsaitjain nong ha wah Umran, ki la leit ban ia kren ia u trai kane ka Petrol/Diesel Pump, ha kaba iadei bad ka jaboh jabain ka ban mih na kane ka Petrol/Diesel Pump thymmai; hynrei kane ka jingiakren ka la pulom noh, namar ba wan mih bad kam trai pynban da u bah AL Hek, MLA ka Pynthorumkhrah.Ha ka jingiakren jong u, u la kam ba un leh da kata ka stad saian thymmai, ka ban set ia ka jaboh shirta, hynrei haba ki longkmie ki kylli bniah bha ia u, “Balei ba kata ka stad saian, ym pyrshang shwa ha Wah Umkhrah?”, u kren dom pynban u ong, “Lada lap ia ka jaboh na kane ka Petrol/Diesel Pump sa phah jingthoh sha NGT ne wat sha Supreme Court ruh, ngam tieng”Ka kynhun jong ki Rangbah, ki Longkmie, ki samla bad ki khynnah rit, kiba la mih paidbah myn ha ka sngi-saitjain bad rah la ki pla card, ban pyrshah ia kane ka jingshna Petrol/Diesel Pump thymmai harud wah Umran, ki la ia soi paidbah ia ka shithi pyrshah ban ai ha u Rangbah Shnong Umran-Dairy, ha kaba ki la ujor ba katei ka Petrol/Diesel Pump thymmai ka ba mut shna hajan wah Umran, kan nang pynjur shuh shuh ia ka jingjaboh jong ka Wah Umran, nalor ki ar tylli ki Petrol/Diesel Pump kiba la don lypa, namar ka jingbym lah ban teh lakam ia ka jaboh kaba mih na ki.La kylli shuh shuh ba kumno katei ka Petrol/Diesel Pump ka ioh jingmynjur, khlem ka jingtip ki nongshong shnong jong ka shnong Umran-Dairy.?Ka kyrwoh, ba la soi da ka Kong I Mawnai, ka ong shuh “Ka jingkren baheh u trai katei ka Petrol/Diesel Pump, U bah AL Hek, (MLA Pynthorumkhrah) ka la pynbitar ia shibun ki Longkmie bad halor kane ngi dawa ba u dei ban sangeh shisyndon ia katei ka jingshna ia katei Petrol/Diesel Pump ka jong u”.
title: “Lada lap ia ka jaboh na kane ka Pump,  sa thoh sha Supreme Court ruh ngam tieng”

content: Nongstoiñ, 28 Rymphang:Katba dang mih da ka jingiakmen ha ryngkat ki paralok ba iatreilang ban ia leit bam khana halor u lum Mawphanlur West Khasi Hills District, ka wan jia pynban, ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha kaba u wei u rangbah u ba la tip kyrteng kum u Kyntiewdor Wahlang 36 snem na ka shnong Mission Mairang, u la iap ngam jyllop noh ha ka pung halor u tei u lum Mawphanlur.Katkum ka tyllong khubor ba la ioh lum da u nongthoh khubor na u Station Ophisar ka Nongstoin Fire Service, la ong ba katei ka jingjia kala jia mynta ka sngi, ha ka por kumba 2:30 nohsngi ei ei, katba u tei u rangbah ha ryngkat ki paralok ki jong u kiba iatreilang ha ka ophis PWD Mairang Division, ki la ia wan shalor u tei u lum ban ia bam khana.Shuh shuh ka khubor na u tei u ophisar ka iathuh ruh ba katei ka jingjia ka la wan jia ruh hadien ba u tei u rangbah u la leit ban shong ia ki lieng kiba la shu buh ha katei ka pung da ki trai lieng khlem da ioh jingbit ban shong bad la ong ruh ba ha kitei ki lieng kiba don ha katei ka pung, kim shym la don wat tang ia ki boitha lane ki jaket ban iada na ka jingngam jyllop.U tei u rangbah u ba la iap ngam jyllop ha katei ka pung ha Mawphanlur la ioh jngtip ruh ba u dei u ba trei tang kum u FA Officiating ha katei ka ophis PWD ha Mairang bad ha ka por ba jia katei ka jingjia; na ka liang jong ki paralok jong u kim shym la lah ban ai ka jingiarap ha ka por kaba biang namar ba u la hap ha marpdeng jong katei ka pung.Hadien ba la ioh jingtip ia katei ka jingjia na ka liang jong ki pulit pynlip ding ka Nongstoin (Fire Service) ki la her bran bran shalor u tei u lum ban leit ai jingiarap, hynrei haba lapoi ha katei ka pung, u tei u rangbah u la dep iap bad ngam jyllop bad hadien ar kynta ba la ialeh, ki pulit pynlip ding ki sa lah ban ioh sei noh ia ka met jong u na katei ka pung.
title: Ngam jyllop u rangbah na  Mairang, ha pung Mawphanlur

content: Shillong, 1 Lber:Ka Synjuk Ki Nongsynshar Shnong Ka Bri U Hynniew Trep, ka kyrpad ia u myntri rangbah ka Jylla, ba un iarap lem ia kito ki shem lanot ha ka jingkylla kali, kiba dei na ki shnong Nginiong, ltongbudum bad Mawbyrkhong. Ka Synjuk, ka shim ba u myntri rangbah, un lah ban iarap lem ia kitei ki riew shem lanot na ka Chief Ministers Relieve Fund, sha kitei ki shem lanot, kiba ha iing ha sem jongki, kiba ia kynduh ia ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha ka Sngi U Blei ba ladep.
title: Pan iarap ia ki hap kali na U MR

content: Mawkyrwat , 1 Lber:Ki nongrep synsar jong ka shnong Nongnah, myn ha ka sngi saitjain jong ka taiew ba ladep, ki la ioh ban kem ia u wei u kharbangla u bym shym la tip kyrteng satia, katba u dang iaid kai ha u Lum Iawpaw, u ba don ha ka shnong Nongnah South West Khasi Hills.Katkum ka tyllong khubor la iathuh ba ia une u Kharbangla la iohi da ki nongrep kiba shait rep synsar ha u lum Iawpaw ba u pyrshang ban rung  ha kawei  na ki iing ba shait pyndonkam ki nongrep ban buh tiar bad rieh slap bad mar  syn iohi ia u ne u riew phylla, na ka liang jongki wut wut ki la pyrta briew bad da ka jing kloi ki para nongrep la ioh ban kem noh ia u tei u Kharbangla.Shuh shuh kitei ki nongrep ki la iathuh ruh ba haba pyrshang ban kylli ia u, u la iathuh ba u dei u Muslim bad u la don ruh kumba hynriew sngi hynriew miet eiei ha katei ka khlaw, bad na ka met jong u la ioh ban kurup ia kawei ka torch light bad ki battery kiba thoh da ka ktien Bangla, bad na ka liang jong ki, ki la aiti noh sha ka seng HYC Nongnah Area Unit.Naka liang ka seng haba pyrshang ban kylli kyrteng ba u dei u ei bad u wan leh aiu sha katei ka jaka, u tei u Kharbangla um shym la iathuh bad u kren kyllain pynban da kaba ong ba u kyrteng u ‘Salman Khan’ bad shiphang pat u kyrteng u ‘Anil Kapoor’ kumta na ka liang ka seng ka la aiti noh sha ki pulit jong ka Ranikor Police Station ban tohkit shuh ia u tei u Kharbangla.Na ka liang ka seng ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia ha kaba ia dei bad utei u Kharbangla uba la ioh ban iaid mon ha ki jaka lum khasi bad hajuh ka por kaba pynsngewtieng ioh u tei u Kharbangla u dei pynban u nongrah ktien ne u lehnoh ISIS uba pyrshang ban wan syntiat  ia kane ka jaka lum Khasi.
title: “Nga dei U Salman Khan” poi sah  6 miet u khar Bangla, ha Lum Iawpaw

content: Nongpoh, 01 Lber:Ka Ri Bhoi Presbyterian Synod, lyngba ka kyrwoh kaba la pynlait da U Rev. H.L Marsing, Senior Executive Secretary RBPS, ka la pynpaw ba kum ka Synod ka dap da ka jingsngewkhia mynsiem halor ka jingjia kaba sngewsih kaba la jia ha ka 26 tarik u Rymphang, 2017, ha ka jingleit sha ka jingïaseng Samla K.J.P Synod Sepngi, ha ka Balang Nonglang.Kum ka Synod ka pynpaw ruh ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba kyrpang ia ki briew na ka Shnong Nginiong, Mawbyrkong bad Nongbudam kiba la iakynduh ia katei ka jingjia kaba ym shym la poi pyrkhat.Kumta haba iadei bad katei ka jingjia ba sngewsih, na ka liang ka Synod ka buh ruh ia ka jingduwai kaba kyrpang kyrpang ba U Blei jong ka jingieit un ai ka jingpyntngen bad ka jingpynshait bor kaba kynja mynsiem ia kito baroh kiba la kynduh ia katei ka jingjia ba sngewsih kthang, la bynrap ka kyrwoh na I Rev. H.L Marsing.
title: Sngewlem ka Ri Bhoi Synod  halor ka jingaksiden Kali

content: Nongpoh, 01 Lber:Ki Pulit syntiat khlaw na ka tnad Wildlife jong ka Jirang Beat ba hap ha Nongpoh Wildlife Range, hynnin ka janmiet ha ka por 7. 30 baje janmiet, ki la ioh ban  kem haduh 7 ngut ki nongsiat mrad beain bad ki la ioh ruh ban kurup haduh 5 tylli ki suloi, na kawei ka jaka kaba la tip kum ka Sdat Umphuit (Umiewsier), kaba don ha ki thain Mawdem, Ri Bhoi District.Kitei ki 7 ngut kiba la shah kem, ki kynthup ia u Bah Ophrin Rynta-thiang, u Bah Phrangsngi Kurbah, u Bah Lidra Kurbah, u Bah Dilip Kumar Kharthangmaw, u Bah Lingstep War, u Bah Starbor Kurbah bad u Bah Khlur Kurbah, baroh ki dei na ka Shnong Jabar ba hap ha Sohiong Police Outspost, West Khasi Hills District, katba kitei ki suloi kiba la ioh ban kurup ki kynthup ia 2 tylli ki suloi SBBL, 2 tylli ki suloi DBML bad kawei ka suloi SBML.Ym tang katta, hynrei na kitei kiba la shah kem, la ioh ruh ban kurup haduh 2.30 KG ka Doh Skei ba la tyrkhong, saw tylli ki kjat skein, kawei ka Khlieh Skei, ka snieh Skei ba la pyniap da kitei ki nongsiat mrad beain. Kiwei pat ki tiar kiba la ioh ban kurup ki kynthup ia ki shira bakhor, ki sisa, ki tickly, ki wait bad tari, ki Torchlight, bad ki Kuli Suloi ba dang treikam.Haba kren sha ki Nongthoh khubor ha Nongpoh, u Bah Teibor Lyngdoh, Beat Officer ka Jirang Beat, u la ong ba ka jingioh ban kem ia kitei ki nongsiat mrad beain, ka dei hadien ka jingiai buddien kaba la kham slem, namar kitei ki briew ki dei ruh kiba ju mlien ban wan ban beh mrad ne siat mrad ne siat beain ia ki mrad kiba don ha ki khlaw jong katei ka thain.Shuh shuh, u la ong ruh hadien kane ka jingioh ban kem ia kitei ki nongsiat mrad beain, na ka liang ki bor ba dei peit kin sa pynlong ruh ia ka jingtohkit kaba jur bad khamtam eh halor ka jingpyniap ia katei ka Skei.Kumta, hadien ba la dep ban tohkit ia kitei ki nongsiat mrad beain, mynta ka sngi na ka liang ka tnad Nongpoh Wildlife Range ka la leit ban aiti noh sha ka Disrtict Court, khnang ba kin bishar bad ruh ban pynshitom katkum ki kyndon jong ka Wildlife Act, u la bynrap.
title: Kem ki pulit khlaw 7ngut, ki  nongsiat mrad na ki thain Mawdem

content: Nongstoiñ, 1 Lber:“Suk kita ki nongiap kiba iap ha u Trai” (Jing pynpaw 14:13) bad “Suk  kiba sngewsih naba yn pyntngen ia ki” (Mat 5:4), ong ka phang pdeng jong ka jingialang thang mombati kum ka dak ban pynpaw ia ka jingsngew lem na ka bynta ki mynsiem kiba la duh noh ha ka jingkylla ka trok ha Nongspung, bad ruh ia kiba dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ha ki Hospital bapher bapher bala pyniaid da ka seng Nongstoin Region Local Taxi Owners and Driver Association (NRLTODA).Ia katei ka jingthang mombati la sdang na Jaidohkroh Nongspung ka jaka bala jia katei ka jingjia ba sngewsih ha katei ka jingthang mombati bad la pynkut ia katei ka jingialang ha Nonbah Nongstoin, da kaba bteng biang ia ka jongiathang mombati sa ha katei ka jaka ha kaba la sakhi ruh da ki spah ngut ki paidbah kynthup ia ki khynnah ki Samla long kmie long kpa, ki sengbhalang bapher bapher jong ka thain Nongstoin kila wan ban iashim bynta ha katei ka jingthang mombati ha ryngkat ka mynsiem kaba sngewkhia.Ha katei ka janmiet ka la don ruh ka jingialang kaba lyngkot ha kitei ki ar tylli ki jaka ha kaba la pyniaid da u bah Alfred Marthong President jong ka NRLTODA bad ha katei ka jingialang ki la pynlong ruh ia ka jingia sngap jar kaba 2 minit bad ruh ka jingduwai na u Tymmen basan D.K Bani na ka balang Presbyterian Nongspung bad na u bah P. Syiem dkhot jong ka NRLTODA ban pynpaw ia ka jingkynmaw burom bad duwai ia baroh ki mynsiem kiba la duh noh na katei ka jingjia.Shuh shuh na ka liang jong ka seng NRLTODA ha katei ka sngi ka la buh ruh ia ka synduk na ka bynta ban ianoh synniang na ka bynta ki lanot kiba don ha pdeng ka jingshah sumar ha ki Hospital bapher bapher jong ka Jylla bad ia katei ka synduk ka seng kan sa leit ban aiti noh ia katei ka synduk ha u DC ka West Khasi Hills District ban pynpoi sha kiba ha iing jong ki lanot.
title: Shim bynta ki paidbah ka thain Nongstoin,  ha ka jingthang mombati hap kali

content: Shillong, 1 Lber:Ka HNLC, ka kynthah tyngeh ia ka sorkar Jylla, namar ba kam shym la pyntreikam satia ia ka soskular jing ia suk bad ka ANVC, da kaba kam shym la ai jingiarap satia ia ki dkhot jong ka seng ANVC (B) bad ka HNLC, ka kynnoh ba u myntri rangbah, u don ka jingiadei kaba jan bha bad ki dkhot jong ka seng ANVC bad ka dei halor katei ka jingshisha ruh, ba ka sa poi ka jing ia soi soskular iasuk hapdeng ka sorkar bad ka ANVC.U Ajaju A Marak, U Political Secretary jong ka ANVC(B), uba la shah siat iap, ula iathuh halor ka jingiadei jong ka ANVC bad u myntri rangbah, ha U Nohprah 2013 bad ki pulit, ki la pyniap noh ia u, ha ka 11tarik Kyllalyngkot 2014.Ka HNLC, ka kynnoh shuh shuh ba u myntri rangbah bad U Lat ka Jylla, ki la khot ia katei ka seng, ba kin mih noh na ka jinglong kaikhlaw, hynrei, katei ka dei tang ka kam thok suda bad katei ka seng.Ka ong ba kam shaniah satia, ia une u myntri rangbah, uba pyndonkam da ki kaikhlaw ban pynkhlain ialade ha ka kam sain pyrthei bad ka HNLC, ka ong ba ka la ngiah bad ijli ia ka sorkar Meghalaya, hynrei mynta, ka don ka jingkyrmen tang ia ka sorkar India.Ka HNLC, ka ong shuh shuh ba ki BSF, ki kam, ba ka HNLC, ka don bun ki ktem jongka, ban ia ka GNLA lane ka ULFA ha Bangladesh, hynrei katei ka seng, ka lyngngoh ba ki pulit pat, ki ju kam ba ka HNLC, kam don briew shuh sha Bangladesh.Ka HNLC, ka ong shuh shuh ba mynta U Champion. R. Sangma, ula lait jamin, na kiba bun ki jingkynnoh jong ki pulit, hynrei ka kyrwoh jong katei ka seng, ka ong ba ka don ka jing artatien kaba khraw, ba U Champion un lah ban shah thap pyniap ha ki pulit, kumba don ka jingthmu ban pyniap ia U Sohan.D.Shira. Ka HNLC, ka shim ba ka jingshah pyniap jong U Norok Momin, ka dei ka kam shu thok, hynrei, ka dei kaba la pyniap khnang da ki pulit bad ka HNLC, ka shim ba ka don hi kaba kum katei ka jingthmu, ban shim noh ia ka jingim jong U Bah Sainkupar Nongtraw bad U Bah Bobby Marwein ruh, ong ka kyrwoh ba la phah, da U bah Sainkupar Nongtraw, Publicity Secretary,HNLC.
title: U Norok, u dei uba la shu  pyniap khnang, ong ka HNLC

content: Shillong, 03 Lber:Ki nongïalam ka Seng Khasi Seiñ Raij, ha ka sngi ba-ar jong ka taïew, ki la pynsngew hakhmat u Lat jong ka jylla u Banwarilal Purohit haba ïadei bad ki hok kaba ki rit paid (minority) ba dei ban ioh kat kum ba la pynkhamti ha ka riti synshar jong ka ri.Ia kane ka jingleit ïakynduh la don lang u Rgh Bantei S. Rumnong bad Rgh Arwan.
