S Tariang kiba long President bad Secretary ka Seng Khasi Kmie, ryngkat u ma O.R Challam President ka Seiñ Jowai bad u Warai Kharbuki.Ha kane ka jing ïakynduh ïa u Lat, ki nongïalam ka Seng Khasi bad Seiñ Raij, ki la pynsngew ha u Lat ba lada ka sorkar jylla kam kloi ba kan ithuh ïa ki paidbah ba dang bat ba dang snoh ïa ka niam tynrai niam tre, kan sa poi ka por ba kan sa duh sa dam syndon ka jaidbynriew hi baroh kawei.Katkum ka riti synshar jong ka ri, ha ka artikle 29 (1) bad 29 (2), ka pynpaw ba lada don kano kano ka kynhun ki paid nongshnong shnong kiba im ba shong bad ba sah hapoh u pud u sam jong ka ri, kiba don ïala ka jong ka ktien ka thyllieh, ki khana niam bad ki la riti kiba janai, kum kane ka kynhun ki don ka hok ban ioh kyrpang ïa ka bhah ba pule ba la ithuh da ka sorkar, ne ban ioh ruh ïa ka mang tyngka kaba pura.Ka nongrim ba pynlong ïa ka Seng Khasi bad Seiñ Raij ban dawa ïa kane ka hok ban ithuh noh kum ki rit paid ha ka jylla ka long halor ka “T.M.A. Pai judgment, the Niam Khasi – Niam Tre fall squarely withinthe meaning of Article 29 (1), 29(2) and 30 (1)”, ïa kaba ka sorkar jylla tad haduh kine ki sngi kiba mynta kam shym la treh ba kan ithuh ne pdiang ïa ki paid riew ngeit jong kine ki ar tylli ki Seng Niam kumki rit paid.“Pynban ka sorkar ka jylla kam shym la sngap ïa kane ka jingdawa ka jong ngi ki seng niam , da kumta ngi na ka liang ka Seng Khasi bad Seiñ Raij ngi la ïaid noh shakhmat ban seng ïa ka synjuk kaba tip kum ka ‘Forum for Rights and Justice’ ha kaba ngi la ujor shi sydon da ka Public Interest Litigation (PIL), ha ka Meghalaya High Court” la ïathuh ki ïalam ïa u Lat.Ha kaba kut ki ïalam jong kine ki ar tylli ki seng niam ki kyntu ïa u Lat ba na ka liang ka jong u ban ïarap ba un shim khia lem ïa kane ka kam ba la sahkut sah hajuh, haka juh ka por ba un ïarap naka bynta ba un pynurlong noh shi syndon ïa kane ka kam, kaba long kat kum ka riti synshar jong ka ri.
title: Ha u Lat pynsngew ka Seng  Khasi ia ka hok ki rit paid

content: Nongpoh, 03 Rymphang:U District Magistrate, ka Ri Bhoi District, hynnin ka sngi u la pynbna paidbah ba la pynjari da ka kyndon ain 144 CrPC, kaba long ruh kum ka jingmana bad khang pyrshah ia baroh ki trok kit dewiong ne kit mar, ba kim ieng shuh ha ki Petrol Pump ne ban ieng palat ia ka ar tylli ha shilynter ka surok bah NH-6 ha Ri Bhoi District.Ka jingpynjari ia katei ka kyndon, ka long ruh hadien ba la lap ba bun na ki trok khamtam eh ia ki Trok kit dewiong, ki ju ieng ha ki Petrol Pump bad kumjuh ruh harud jong ka suroh, ha kaba kane ka lah ban wanrah ia ka jingthuh ha ka leit ka wan jong ki paidbah ha shilynter jong ka surok bah NH-6.Ha kajuh ruh ka por la pynjari ia katei ka juh ka kyndon, da kaba maham ia baroh ki briew kiba ju mlien ban leh ia ki kam beain, da kaba shna ia ki iing sher dara ha shilynter ka surok bah NH-6, ban pynlong kum ki jaka ban shim ia ki dewiong na ki trok kiba la kit palat pud bad pynlong ruh kum ki jaka stock dewiong, khang ban lait na ka Weighbridge kaba don ha 13Mile Tamulkuchi bad stock ia ki dewiong.Hadien ba la pynmih ia kane ka jingmaham, ba lada don kino kino kiba leh pyrshah kin shah pynshitom katkum ki kyndon ain.
title: Pynjari 144 CrPC ha  ka surok NH-6 ha Ri Bhoi

content: Shillong, 3 Lber:Ka JHADC kam don ia ka tnad kaba peit kyrpang ban pynneh ia ka riti dustur jaitbynriew kata ka Arts and Culture bad ka jingbym don katei ka tnad ka la pynlong ia ka seng Jaintia Students’ Union (JSU) ban dawa na u CEM ka JHADC ba u dei ban thaw noh kyrkieh noh ia katei ka tnad.La ialam ia katei ka kynhun ban ia kynduh ia u CEM da u President u Rikut N Parien bad u General secretary  u Emperor Bareh kaba la leit ban ia kynduh ia u ma Thombor Shiwat hapoh kamra treikam jong u bad la ai ruh da ka jingthoh halor ki lai tylli ki mat.Ka mat kaba nyngkong ka dei ban thaw ia ka tnad Arts and Culture, kaba ar ban thaw ia ki kyndon kiba khlain ban pynneh pynsah ia ki lum ki wah bad kaba lai ka dei ban pynbeit noh ia u pud u sam jong ki Elaka baroh kiba hap hapoh ka JHADC.Ha katei ka jingiakynduh u CEM u la kular ban leh ia kaba donkam.
title: Ym don tnad Arts and Culture ka JHADC, dawa ka JSU

content: Shillong, 3 Lber:U Jadav Payeng uwei na ki nongthung dieng u la khot ia ki khynnah ba kin shnohkti ha ka kam thungdieng thungsiej ban pynneh pynsah ia ka mariang. Utei u la sdang ia ka kam thungdieng ha ka por ba u dang don dang 14 snem karta bad ka daw kaba la pynlong ia u ban thung dieng ka dei hadien ba u u iohi ia ka jingiap da ki spah tylli ki bsein ha u snem 1979 ha ka por ba ja ka jingshlei um.U la thung kumba 10 hajar tylli ki tynrai dieng ha ki 40 snem ha ka jaka kaba heh 550 akar bad kaba dei ruh ka jaka kaba ki briew ki pyrkhat ba ka dei ka jwat bha ba ki dieng kin im hynrei mynta katei ka jaka ka la kylla jyrngam.Katei ka jingkhot jong u Payeng ka dei ha ka jingialang kyrpang halor katei ka phang ha IIM, Shillong, u dei u riewlum Mishing na ka district Jorhat jong ka jylla Assam. U la sdang ban thung dieng da 25 tylli ki siej bad katei ka jaka ka la kylla long kum ka ingsah jong ki khla, ki hati , ki rabit bad ki sier.“Dei ban ai manla u symbai dieng ia u khynnah ban thung ha ka por ba u sdang ban rung skul, ka dei ruh ka jingkitkhlieh jong u khynnah ban sumar ia ute iu dieng ba un heh un san” u la ong.U Payeng u la thung ruh ia uwei u dieng ban pynsah kynmaw ia u Dr.APJ Abdul Kalam uba kyllon ha katei ka jaka ha IIM shuwa ba un khlad noh.
title: Khot ia ki khynnah ban thung dieng

content: Shillong, 3 Lber:Ka jingialang ka kynhun myntri mynta ka sngi ka la pdiang ban ia ka amendment Bill, 2017 na ka bynta ban pynkiew ia ka jingmang pisa jong ka Meghalaya Contingency Fund na ka T. 200 klur sha ka T. 305 klur na ka bynta ban wanrah ha kane ka dorbar mang tyngka.“Ngi la tyrwa ban wanrah ia ka Bill kaba ngi la rai ban pynkiew ia ka jingmang pisa jong ka Contingency fund na ka T. 205klur sha ka T. 305 klur. Yn rah ia ka dorbar ban ioh ia ka jingpdiang’, la ong u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma.U la ong ba ka jingmang pisa na ka bynta mynshwa ka long T. 205 hynrei la pynkiew shi por sha ka T. 455 klur lyngba ka Ordinance kham mynshwa bad mynta ka donkam ia ka bill ban rah ha iing dorbar ban pynskhem ia ka.Ka jingpynkiew ia ka jingmang pisa ka long ban pynlah ia ka sorkar lyngba ka tnad Finance ban pynlait lypa ia ka pisa na ka Contingency Fund ia ki kam ba kham donkam kyrkieh katkum ka jingdawa jong ki tnad, ka bym shym la pynhap ha ka mang tyngka.
title: Pynkiew ka sorkar, ia ka contingency fund

content: Shillong, 03 Lber:Ka dorbar mang tyngka ka jylla ka la sdang mynta ka sngi bad ka dei ka sien ba nyngkong ha ka khana ka iing dorbar, ba uwei u MLA un don hapoh phatok katba ka dorbar ka dang iaid.Ka dorbar kaba don 60 ngut ki MLA ka duna uwei u dkhot, namar ba u MLA ka Mawhati u Bah Julius K Dorphang u dang don hapoh phatok halor ka jingshah tian bishar jongu na ka jingshah kynnoh leh beijot ia ka khynnah 14 snem.Ha ka jylla Meghalaya hadien 40 snem ba la ioh jylla, kan dei ka sien ba u MLA un ym lah ban wan sha ka dorbar hadien ba u la don ha phatok halor ki kam bymman jongu. U Bah Dorphang u dei u MLA shimet uba kyrshan ia ka sorkar MUA-II ba ialam da u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma.Ka dorbar thawain mynta ka sngi, ka sdang da ka jingkren maitphang u Lat ka jylla u Banwarilal Purohit, ia ki kam ba har rukom ba la leh da ka sorkar jylla bad kiban sa leh ruh kumjuh.Kane ka dei ka dorbar mang tyngka ba khadduh jong ka jylla jong kane ka samoi treikam ka san snem (2013-2018) shwa ba kan wan da kawei pat kaba thymmai lashem snem.Lah ban kdew ba u Bah Dorphang u MLA ka Mawhati u la shah pynngat ha ka kyndon ka POCSO bad u la dang don ha ka jingbishar ka iing kashari halor ka jingshah kynnoh jongu.Nalor u Bah Dorphang, ki don sa 17 ngut ki rangbah kiba la shah kem halor ka jingdonkti ia kajuh ka khynnah ban leh beijot kaba la jia ha ka hotel Marvelenn Inn kaba dei trai u khun jong u Myntri kam pohiing u Bah Horju Donkupar Roy Lyngdoh, u MLA na Sohiong bad ha kiwei ki hotel.
title: Ha ka sien nyngkong, jah U MLA  na dorbar, naba shong patok

content: Shillong, 3 Lber:U MDC ka Nong-thymmai konstitwensi u bah Latiplang Kharkongor u la pynpaw ka jingbym sngew ia hap jingmut ban buh ia ka ophis jong ka C&RD Block Mawlai shaduh sha Mawtawar. Utei u MDC u la ong ba u kwah ba ka Block ka dei ban don ha ka jaka ba long pdeng kata ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah ka Nong-thymmai, Pynthor bad ka Mawlai ruh kumjuh. U la ong ba ka Mawtawar ka la jngai palat. “Ngim pyrshah hynrei ngi kwah ba kan don beit hapdeng ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah ki lai konstitwensi” ong u bah Latiplang Kharkongor.U bah Latiplang u la ong ruh ba ha ka sngi ba-ar jong ka taiew un lum ia ka jingialang jong ka Synjuk Ki Nongsynshar Shnongf ka Nongthymmai Pyllun ha Dorbar Hall , Pohkseh ha ka por 7 baje janmiet ban ia kren sani bha halor katei ka kam. Lah ban kdew ba dang mynhynin ka sngi ka Mawlai Mawtawar ka la thoh sha ka tnad C&RD Block bad ka la aiti ia ka jaka kaba heh 3 akar ban tei ia ka C&RD Block Mawlai ha kaba ka Director C&RD ka I.R Sangma, Director ka tnat C&RD ryngkat ka jingiadonlang u Jt. Director, u Bah Embhahlang B. Syiemlieh, MLA ka Mawlai, u Bah IR Kharshyndon, Rangbah Shnong Mawtawar, Seng Samla Mawlai Pyllun, FKJGP bad HYC mynta ka sngi ki la leit jurip ia ka jaka kaba heh 3 akar ba la aiei da ka shnong Mawtawar ha Lummawsing ban tei ia ka ophis jong ka C&RD Block ha Mawlai. Ka Director kan sa phah ia ka kaiphod jingjurip ba mynta ka sngi sha ka Sorkar.
title: Ym kwah ka Nongthymmai  ban thaw Block sha Mawtawar

content: Nongpoh, 03 Rymphang:Ha kawei ka jingjia pluh iing kaba la jia mynta ka janmiet ha ka por 6 baje ha shnong Nongmawlong, ba hap hapoh ka Umsning C&RD Block, ha kaba kawei ka longiing kaba dei jong ka Kong Aitimon Nongrum bad u Bah Augustine Lyngdoh, ka la shah bamduh ha ka ding kaba shyrkhei haduh ban da ingkhong bad kylla dpei.Katkum ka jingtip ia kaba la ioh ban lum da ki nongthohkhubor, la ong ba katei ka longing ka don haduh 7 ki khun ba kynthup 3 ngut ki Kynthei bad 4 ngut ki shynrang, hynrei donbok ha katei ka por ba jia katei ka jingpluh ym shem la don briew ha iing.Shuh shuh, la ioh jingtip ruh ba ka daw hi kaba la pynlong ia katei ka iing ba kan pluh, ka dei namar ka jingdon jong ki runar kiba thang khlaw na shawei ka jaka, hynrei kawei ka ding suki suki ka la pur hajan jong katei ka iing, tad haduh ba kan da bam duh syndon ia baroh ki jingdon jingem ha katei ka iing bad haba khein kyllum ka la kot sha ka T. 2 Lak tam.La ithuh ruh ba na ka liang ki paidbah nongshong shnong, ki la pyrshang ban ai jingiarap ban pynlip ia ka ding, hynrei namar ba ka ding ka la ioh lad ban pur ha sawdong jong ka iing, kane ka jingpyrshang jong ki paidbah ban iarap ka la shu pulom noh ha kaba naduh ka iing bad baroh ki jingdon jingem ki la kylla dpei na ka jingbamduh jong ka ding kaba shyrkhei.
title: Na ka jingthang khlaw ki runar,  kylla dpei ka longiing ha Nongmawlong

content: Shillong, 3 Lber:Mynta ka sngi ha ka por 9 baje mynstep kawei ka Bos NEHu kaba don ia u nombar ML-05B-0648 ba la niah da u G. Sohsten ka la tynrah ia kawei ka scooty kaba don ia u nombar ML-05P-7453 ba la niah da ka Ibapherlin Suchiang (23 snem karta) , katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha Golf Club, Shillong. Kawei kaba shong ha katei ka scooty ka la mynsaw bad la pynkit sha Civil Hospital, Shillong.
title: Tynrah ka Bos NEHU ia ka Scooty

content: Nongpoh, 03 Lber:Ha kawei ka jingjia ba sngewsih kaba la jia hynnin ka sngi ha ka por 6 baje ei ei janmiet ha ka shnong 18Mer, Ri Bhoi District, ha kaba kawei ka trok kaba don ia u number AS 01 DC 3677, ka la kylla bad ban ia kawei ka Auto Rickshaw kaba don ia u number ML 10 A 8821 bad ha kane ka jingjia uwei u samla u la khlad noh hashen katba u wei pat u la mynsaw jur.Katkum ka tyllong khubor na ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi, la ong ba utei uba la khlad noh hashen la tip kum u Kitboklang Tangsang (18) bad utei uba la mynsaw jur pat la tip kum u Ehdawson Suting (22) kiba dei na ka shnong 18Mer.Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum da Pulit ka Ri-Bhoi, la ong ba ka daw kaba la pynlong ia katei ka jingjia ka dei namar ka jingniah khlemakor da u draibar jong katei ka trok, namar ka jingniah stet ia ka kali tad haduh ba um lah shuh ban tehlakam.Hadien katei ka jingjia, ki Pulit ki la pynkit noh ia ka metiap jong utei u samla ba la khlad noh sha Civil Hospital Nongpoh, na ka bynta ban leh ia ka Post Mortem bad kumjuh ia utei uba mynsaw la la pynkit noh sha NEIGRIHMS Shillong, khang ban ioh ia ka jingsumar kaba kham paka.Shuh shuh, ki Pulit ki la iathuh ruh ba u tei u draibar jong katei ka trok u la phet krad noh na katei ka jaka, hynrei tang hadien katto katne por u la leit ban pyndem noh ialade hakhmat ki pulit ka Byrnihat Police Outpost, kumta haba iadei bad kane ka jingjia na ka liang ki pulit kin dang pynlong iaka jingtohkit halor katei ka jingjia bad ruh ban pynngat ia utei u draibar jong katei ka trok ha ki kyndon ka ain namar ka jingniah khlemakor.
title: Khlad hashen 1, ba ban  ka trok ia ka Auto ha 18Mer

content: Shillong, 3 Lber:Uwei u ehrang GNLA u la wan ban pyndem hakhmat ki pulit mynta ka sngi, utei u ehrang u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Chadam Ramed A Marak uba la ju khot sin kum u Mad kumjuh ru kum u Chitmang, 22 snem karta u ba dei na ka shnong Taidang Nachi Chiring , South Garo Hills.Katkum ka jingiathuh u SP ka SGH u Abraham T Sangma, u la ong ba u Marak u de iuba rung ha ka kynhun ba 7 jong ka GNLA bad u la rung seng ha u lber, 2015.U la phet krad na ka kynhun kaba don ha Rongtol ha ka 24 tarik u rymphang bad u la poi ha Siju ha ka shiteng miet jong ka 2 tarik mynta u bnai.U la poi sha ka lynti ban leit pyndem lyngba ka jingleit ia kren bad ki nongialam niam kiba don ha katei ka shnong. Katei ka jingwan pyndem u Marak ka dei hadien ka jingwan pyndem jong ki lehnoh ASAK mynhynnin ka sngi hapoh ka jingialam u Reding T Sangma.
title: Wan pyndem u GNLA

content: Shillong, 3 Lber:Ka sorkar jylla ka la kham pynjynsur biang ia ki kyndon aiñ na ka bynta ki dukan kyiad ha kaba mynta ka sngi ka la pynkylla biang ia ki kyndon aiñ kaba dei na ka bynta ki dukan kyiad ne ki Wine Store kiba don ha kane ka jylla. Katkum katei ka jingpynkylla thymmai jong ka sorkar la pynkylla ba ia ki Wine Store dei ban buh ki jaka kiba jngai 500 mitar na ka surok bah National High Way ne ki surok bah ka jylla. Ha ki nongbah jong ki District pat ki Wine Store ki dei ban don 100 mitar na ki jaka pule, ki jaka sumar ne ki Hospital bad kumjuh ruh na ki jaka mane blei ne na ki ing mane.Hapoh nongbah Shillong ki Wine Store ki dei ban don jngai 50 mitar na ki skul ne ki jaka pule, ki Hospital ne ki jaka mane blei, ki Wine Store kiba don hapoh katei ka 50 mitar ki dei ban plie beit thik tang naduh ka por 4 baje janmiet haduh ka por 8 baje mynmiet.Katba kiba don shaneng jong ka 50 mitar ki lah ban plie beit kumba j plie kata naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep haduh ka por 8 baje mynmiet.Ka kynhun myntri sorkar ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi ka la pynkylla ia ki kyndon barim kiba don hapoh ka Rules 183 jong ka Meghalaya Excise Rules kaba la hukum ba baroh ki wine Store kim dei ban don hapoh ka 200 mitar na ki jaka pule, ki jaka sumar bad ki jaka mane blei bad shuh shuh katei ka Rules ka la kdew ruh ba ki Wine Store kim dei ban don hapoh 100 mitar na ki surok bah National Highway lane ki surok bah ka sorkar jylla.Lah ban kdew ba hadien ba ka sorkar ka la pyntreikam ia katei ka aiñ baroh ki Wine store kiba don harud surok bah ki la khanglut ha kylleng ki jaka.Ha katei ka jingialang ka kynhun myntri sorkar ka sorkar ka la rai ruh ban thung ia u Adviser jong ka tnad Security ha kaba la thung ia u Rajiv Mehta DGP barim kum u nongaibuit ai bor ki bor pahara lane u Adviser bad katei ka jingthung ia u ka dei na bynta kiba bun ki kam kiba dei ha ka shongshngaiñ kum ha khappud.
title: 50 mitar na ki skul, hospital, ing mane;  buh Wine Store ha nongbah Shillong

content: Shillong, 03 Lber:U Bah Pynshngain N Syiem u MLA ka Mawsynram u la pan jingshai na u Lamphang u AT Mondal, ka ing dorbar mynta ka sngi, la u dei ban shong ialade kum u dkhot ka liang synshar ne ka liang pyrshah,hadien ba u la shah sospon ha ka seng Congress, na ka bynta lai snem kynthih.“Nga kwah ban tip, la nga lah ne em ban shong ha ka liangsynshar haba nga la shah sospon ha ka party, ka MPCC”, la buh jingkylli u Bah Pynshngain ha u Lamphang.Hynrei na ka liang u AT Mandal, Lamphang ka dorbar Jylla, u la ong ba haduh mynta, um pat ioh pdiang jingthoh eiei na ka party Congress ba la sospen ne beh seng ia u Bah Pynshngain bad ka paw ba u Bah Pynshngain u dang dei u MLA ka Congress hapoh ka iing dorbar katba shabar u dei u MLA ba la shah sospon.“Katkum ka rule, uno uno u MLA uba shah sospon, u lah ban shong lang ha ka liangsynshar haba u don ha ka liangsynshar hynrei lada u shah beh seng, yn sa ai jaka kyrpang”, la ong u Mondal jaba jubab ia ka jingwad jingshai u Bah Pynshngain.Na ka liang u Bah Pynshngain u la pan jingshai na u Lamphang, ba kumno un shong ha ka liangsynshar haba u la shah sospon. “Kumno ngan shong ha ka liang ka liangsynshar haba la nga la shah sospon, haba ngam dei u MLA ka Congress?. Haei ngan shong, ha ka liang ka liangpyrshah ne ha liangsynshar?, la buh jingylli u Bah Pynshngain bad bynrap ba ka MPCC ka la sospon ia u naduh ka 14 tarik Nailur 2016.Hynrei ha kane ka por, la ieng u Bah DD Lapang uba la ong ba ka ktien ‘sospon’ bad ‘beh’ ka iapher bad u Bah Pynshngain u shu shah sospon khlem beh seng. “Ka jingsospon ka dei kam iing ka party, bad u dang dei u MLA ka Congress”.
title: Haei ngan shong, ha ka liangpyrshah  ne ha ka liangsynshar?

content: Shillong, 3 Lber:Ki pulit ki la pynthikna ba ka metiap jong ka longkmie ka ba la ioh tam na Dkhiah, East Jaintia ka dei kaba la shah batbor bad la pyniap ia ka hadien ba la batbor bad na ki dak ki shin ki la ong ba ia katei ka longkmie la bret na kali. Lah ban pynkynmaw ba la lap ia ka metiap jong ka Binora Dohtdong kaba shong basah ha ka shnong Lawpyllun-Ri-Bhoi District ha ka 22 tarik u rymphang.Ki pulit ki la iathuh ba ki la ioh ksai shaphang katei ka jingjia bad ki dang thwet mynta ba ioh kem ia ki briew kiba donkti ha katei ka kam. Ka kong Binora Dohtdong, 25 snem karta ka de kaba ju trei ing briew ha ki snem 2013 ha ki shnogn ba marjan jong ka, Hynrei la ong ba ka la leit ban bylla noh shajngai ban kyrshan ialade bad ka khun kynthei jong ka kaba dang 9 snem karta, “Ka ju wan sha ing teng khat bad ka ju ia thuh ha ngi ba ka trei ha Lad Rymbai” ong ka kong Airilda Dohtdong ka hynmen jong ka.Katkum ka jingiathuh ki pulit ki la ong ba ka kong Binora ka ju trei bylla ha kawei ka dukan sha ha Lad rymbai kaba dei ruh ka jaka ba ju die kyiad be-aiñ , la iathuh ba ha ka 21 tarik u rymphang ka la leit pan kam na kawei ka dukan die kyiad be-aiñ kaba don ha Datsimpein, Ladrymbai ka jaka ba ka la trei teng. Ka khun jong ka kaba dang 9 sne mkarta ka shong ka sah bad ka para khadduh jong ka ka Ribiphul Dohtdong.Hynrei la ong ba ha katei hi ka miet ba ka leit pan kam na ka malik rim jong ka ka kong Binora ka la jah rngai bad hadien la ioh jingtip ba ia ka metiap jong ka la lap na rud surok bah na Dkhiah. Ki hynmen para jong ka ki la pyntip sha ki pulit ba ki dei kiba duk bad kim kot bor ban wanrah ia ka metiap jong ka sha shnong bad ki la ai bor ha ki pulit ban tep ia ka ha katei hi ka jaka, kumta la tep ia ka ha ka jaka jong ka Jobly Dkhar ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki pulit, ki bahaing ha sem , ki paralok bad u Rangbah Shnong.
title: “Shah batbor bad shah pyniap  ka longkmie ba lap na Dkhiah”

content: Shillong, 03 Lber:U Lat ka jylla ba peit shipor ia ka Meghalaya u Banwarilal Purohit u la maitphang ia ki kam ba ka sorkar MUA-II ka la leh bad kiwei ki ban dang leh kynthup naduh ka shongsuk shongsain, ka roi ka par bad ka pule puthi.Hynrei kiba bun ki mat ba la kdew ha ka jingkren jong u Lat ka jylla, kim da iapher than na ka snem ba la dep namar ba bun ki mat la shu lape ia kijuh, kiba ka sorkar naduh kham mynshwa bad haduh mynta ki dei ki juh ki kam.Haba maitphang ia ka suk ka sain ha ka jylla, u Lat u la kdew ba ka snem 2016 ka dei kaba kongsan bha ha kaba ka sorkar ka la lah ban wanrah ia ka jingshong suk shongsain ha ka thain Garo kaba jubor da ki kam pyntriem ba har rukom. “117 ngut ki dkhot na ki kynhun lehnoh ki la wan ban pyndem wait ha u snem 2016 bad ka jingpyndam ia ka kynhun ANVC kaba la jia ha kane kajuh ka snem”, la ong u Lat. U la ong ba ka sorkar ka la thaw ruh 18 tylli ki Police Station ha ka jylla bad kumjuh ruh ia ka SpecialForce-10.Katkum ka jingkren u Lat, ka sorkar ka la kam ruh ba ka thain khappud hapdeng ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam ka don hapdeng ka jingshong suk, khamtam ha ka Block-I bad II, bad la phikir bha ha ki jaka ba lah ban mih ka jinghuri hura ha ki thain khappud.U Lat u la kdew ba la don 3.80 lak ki nongshong shnong kiba la plie bank account na ka skhim ka sorkar pdeng ka Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY) bad T. 72 lak klur la mang pisa da ki bank na ka bynta 14 hajar ngut ki riew shimet ban ioh ram na ka skhim Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (MUDRA).Ka jingkren u Lat ka la maitphang ruh ia ka jingthaw thymmai ka sorkar ia ki 6 tylli ki Block kynthup lai tylli ha Khasi Hills kynthup ka Bhoirymbong, ka Sohiong bad ka Mawlai bad sa lai tylli ha Garo Hills.Na ka skhim shna iing baduk ne ka Pradhan Mantri Awaas Yojana (PMAY), ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba ioh jiingmyntoi ia kane ka skhim shna iing ka la kot 12, 732 ngut ha ka jingpyntreikam kaba sdang. Ka sorkar ka la buh thong ban pynshna iing baduk baroh ha ka jylla haduh u snem 2022, la ong u Lat.Halor ka umbam umdih, u Lat u la ong ba ha u snem 2015-16, ki don 230 tylli ki nongkyndong, 253 tylli skul bad 100 tylli ICDS la pynioh um katba ha u snem 2016-17, 110 tylli ki nongkyndong, 150 tylli ki skul, bad 83 tylli ki ICDS yn sa pynioh umbam umdih kaba bha.U la ong ba ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Greater Shillong water Supply Scheme (Phase-III) bad ka Tura Phase-I & II ki dang iaid shaid shaid mynta.Halor ka lynti syngkien, u la ong ba ka jylla ka la don 9666 km ka jingjrong ka surok nalor ka jingpyndep ia ka surokbah National Highway Two Lane Jowai Bypass na ka skhim SARDP-NE, ka surok Two Lane Shillong-Nongstoin-Tura la dep shna haduh 96 percent nalor kiwei pat.Ha ka kit ka bah ne ka transport, ka sorkar ka la pyntreikam ia ka lynti rel na Byrnihat Ri Bhoi sha Shillong bad ia kane, lah ban sdang ban pyntreikam noh ha u Lber u snem ban wan. U la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la iasoi bad ka sorkar pdeng ba kan pynshlur ia ki kompeni ban wan pynher liengsuin kamai ha kane ka jylla.U la kren ruh ia ka jingkynduh jingeh ha kaba iaddei bad ka jingpynmih bording ka jylla bad ban tem ia kane, ka sorkar jylla ka la pynshlur ia ki nongshong shnong bad ki tnad sorkar ban pyndonkam noh da ka ding ba la ioh na ka bor jingshai ka sngi bad ka sorkar ka la shim ki lad ki lynti ban buh ia ki Solar Plant ha ki sub-division.Halor ka koit ka khiah, u Lat u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dang pynkhreh ban pyntreikam noh sa ia ka Phase III jong ka Meghalaya Health Insurance Scheme na ka bynta ki paidbah ka jylla.Katba ha ka pule puthi, u la maitphang ba ki don 1700 tylli ki skul Secondary kiba ioh jingiarap na ka skhim RMSA ka sorkar pdeng,bad ki don ruh sa 9 tylli ki skul ba dang iaid ha ka jingpynkhreh ban tei ha ki 9 tylli ki Block ba kham sahdien. “Ka sorkar ka kwah ban pynioh biang ia ka nam ka nongbah Shillong kum ka ktem ka pule puthi”, la ong u Lat.U phai ruh shaphang ka jingialehkai ha kane ka jylla, ha kaba ka sorkar ka la iakhun ban ioh pdiang ia ka National Games ha u snem 2022 kaba dei artad ka snem ba ka jylla Meghalaya kan rakhe ia ka jingdap 50 snem ka jingioh jylla.Ban kyntiew ia ka jingialehkai, ka sorkar ka la pynlong ruh ia ka prokram, “Saindur naduh dang rit” kata naduh ki khynnah ba 7-11 snem la ai jinghikai ha ki jait jingialehkai kum ka phutbol bad kiwei.“Ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh ruh shaid shaid ban pynbit pynbiang noh ia ka Sports Policy”, la ong u Lat.Halor ka marbam mardih, u Lat u la ong ba ka jylla ka don 20,64,073 ngut ki briew kiba hap ha ka Priotity Household (PHH) kiba ioh jingmyntoi na u khaw tad ka sorkar bad 85,022 kiba ioh ia u khaw AAY.Halor ki kam pynroi ha sor, u Lat u la ong ba ka sorkar kan sa ioh shuh sa 104 tylli ki bos ban pyniaid ha ka nongbah na ka sorkar pdeng bad kine kin sa iaid ha surok shen ban kit ia ki nongleit nongwan.
title: T.72klur sha 14hajar ngut ki riew shimet na ka skhim MUDRA

content: Nongstoiñ, 5 Lber:U Sirdar jong ka Hima Raidmynsaw bah Hindro Samakha, hadien ba u la ïoh jingtip halor ka jingthmu jong ka District Council ban pynkylla biang ia ka Hima Raidmynsaw Sirdarship sha ka Hima Nongmynsaw Syiem Ship, ha ka sngi Thohdieng ba ladep, u la lum lang ia baroh ki Nongsynshar shnong bad ia u paitbah ka thain ha iew Langpih ban iapyrshah halor ka jingthmu jong ka KHADC ban pynkylla biang ïa katei ka Hima Sirdar sha ka Hima Syiem.Na ka liang jong ki paitbah ha katei ka jingialang ki la pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah kaba jur bad ha katei ka jingialang da kawei ka sur ki la ia rai ba kin ym pdiang satia ia katei ka jingthmu ka KHADC, bad ki la ong ruh ba naduh u snem 1979 haba ka sorkar Assam ka la sdang ban wan thombor ïa ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ki jaka puta jong ka Hima Raidmynsaw bad wan buh ruh da ka ktem pulit ha Langpih bad Mawsikar ym shym la don mano mano ba ïarap lem hynrei dei tang ki paitbah ha ryngkat ki nongsynshar shnong kiba la ïakhun dohïap.Shuh shuh ha katei ka jingialang ki paidbah ki la rai ruh ba lada ka KHADC ka shu thom da ka bor khlem ka jingmynjur jong ki nongsynshar shnong bad ki paitbah ban pynkylla biang ia katei ka Hima, na ka liang jong ki kim banse ban tur sha ka ophis jong ka District Council ban pynpaw ïa ka jingpyrshah bad ban pynlong ruh da ki jingïakhih kiba tyngeh.Haba iaphai dien khyndiat ha ki snem ba la lah kata naduh u snem 2009 ha ka por ba u Bah K.P.Pangñiang u long kum u EM Elaka ha ka District Council la ithuh ïa ka Raidmynsaw kum kawei na ki Hima Sirdar ba dang pynkha thymmai bad la dep mynjur ruh da ka Council bad baroh ki jingthoh jingtar kiba ïadei bad ka jingïakren halor u pud u sam hapdeng ka sorkar Meghalaya bad Assam, ki la ïaid kat kum ka kyrteng ba la ithuh da ka KHADC bad ka sorkar jylla.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka jingthmu jong ka KHADC, ban pynkylla Hima Syiem ia ka Hima Sirdar na ka liang jong ki nongthoh khubor kila iohlad ruh ban iakren bad u MLA jong ka thain u bah K.P. Pangniang u ba dei ruh artad kum u nongai buit (Adviser) jong ka Hima ha kaba u la ong ba ka thain Langpih bad ka Hima Raidmynsaw, hi ka ju don ka jingiakajia ha pdeng ki Khasi bad ki Nepali, hynrei lyngba katei ka jingthmu jong ka KHADC kan sa pynmih pynban ka jingiaklumar para Khasi ym shuh bad ki Nepali. Shuh shuh U bah Pangñiang u la ong ruh ba lada u Bah P.N.Syiem kum u CEM ka KHADC u pynkylla ïa ka Hima Raidmynsaw Sirdarship sha ka Hima Nongmynsaw Syiemship u la dei ban pynim biang ïa baroh ki Hima Sirdar kum ka Jyrngam Sirdarship, Nonglang Sirdarship, Riangsih Sirdarship kum ki Hima Syiem bad ba ka synshar khaddar ka rukum thung Syiem ka dei ban long kum ha ki por mynhyndai hynthai bad ka District Council kam dei shuh ban tuklar ha baroh ki bynta.
title: Pyrshah ki Sordar, ban kylla  kyrteng ia ka Hima Raidmynsaw

content: Nongpoh, 05 Rymphang:U Dr. D.D Lapang, Chief Adviser ka sorkar jylla, hynnin ka Sngi Saitjain ha ka jingialang kaba la long ha Sajer Community Hall, Nongpoh, u la lah ban pyllait paidbah bad aiti ia ka Kali kit metiap (Mortuary Van) sha ka Hindu Welfare Society Nongpoh, ia kaba la mang tyngka lyngba ka skim SRWP ha ka jinglut kaba T. 8 lak,Kum ban shu ong hangne, baroh shikatta ki paid Hindu hapoh ka shatri jong ka Hindu Welfare Society Nongpoh ha ka thain Nongpoh, ki shem jingeh bha haba don ki jingiap briew namar ka jingbymdon ki kali ki ban kit ia ki metiap sha ki jaka ‘Thangbriew’, hynrei mynta pat katno kan da long ka jingkmen kaba khraw, namarba ki la ioh ia katei ka kali kit matiap.Haba kaba pyllait paidbah ia katei ka Kali kitmetiap, la sakhi ruh da ka jingdonlang u Bah C.B Syiem, Chairman ka Nongpoh Town Committee, u Bah S. Mynsong, Rangbah shnong ka Nongpoh Proper, ki nongialam ka Hindu Welfare Society Nongpoh lem bad kiwei de ki riew rangbah ka thain.Haba ai jingkren ha katei ka sngi, u Dr D.D Lapang, u la ong kumba ka sorkar ka la shimkhia ban pynioh ia kaei kaba la donkam da ki paidbah, kumta u la ban jur ia ki nongpyndonkam ia katei ka kali kit metiap ba ki dei ban sumar bha ia ka, khnang ban kan long ka jingmyntoi kaba khraw ia ki paidbah ba bun balang.U la iaroh halor ka jingiatylli bad jingkloi jong ki paid Hindu kiba don ha Nongpoh, na ka bynta ban tei ia ka bha ka miat ha ka thain Nongpoh, ha kajuh ruh ka por u la kyntu ia ki briew ka Hindu Welfare Society Nongpoh, ba kin iatreilang na ka bynta ban iada ia ka jingwanrung kyrthep jong ki mynder ha kane ka jylla bad ba kim dei ban pynshlur ne ai jaka rieh ia kiwei pat ki mynder kiba thmu ban wan bsuh khlieh ha kane ka jylla.
title: Khanglad ia ki mynder, ong  U MLA ia ki Hindu Nongpoh

content: Shillong, 06 Lber:U MP ka Tura u Conrad K Sangma hynne ka sngi u la leit ban jngoh ia kiba mynsaw kiba thiah pang ha NEIGRIMS na ka jingjia aksiden kali ha Nongspung, ka West Khasi Hills ha kane ka sngi u Blei ba la dep katba ki dang thmu ban leit sha ka jingialang ka Balang Presbyterian ha Nonglang. Ha kane ka jingleit jngoh u Conrad u la kynduh ia kiba thiah pang bad u la iakren bad ki, bad u la kyntu ia ki doktor bad ki nurse kiba peit bad sumar ia ki ban leh ia kaba bha tam. Ha ka jingkylli u Conrad, ki doktor kila iathuh ba ar ngut kiba mynsaw jur ki la khlad noh katba sa ar ngut ki dang don hapdeng ka jingshitom jur katba kiwei ki la kham biang.U Conrad u la pynpaw iaka jingsngew nguh ia ki doktor bad ki nurse kiba la sumar ia ki bad kyntu ia ki ban iai bteng ban ai ia ka jingshakri kaba bha tam.Ha kajuh ka por, u Conrad u la iakren bad ki bor pyniaid ka hospital ia ki jingeh ba kane ka jaka sumar ka iakynduh bad u la kular ba un iakrene bad ka sorkar pdeng.
title: Jngoh U MP ka Tura, ia kiba  mynsaw hap kali ha Nongspung

content: Shillong, 5 Lber:Kumba ju long manla u snem ka Raid Shabong mynta u snem ruh kan pynlong ia ka shad Lyngdoh kaba ju pynlong shisien shisnem. Katei ka shad kan long ha ka 10 tarik mynta u bnai ha madan shad katei ka Raid ha Rangthylliang. Ha katei ka sngi yn pynphuh pynphieng ia ka lehniam leh rukom da ki jingshad tynrai. Kin don ki kali ki ban leit shaw ia ki paidbah na ki shnong bapher bapher naduh ka por 7 baje mynstep.La kyrpad ia ki paidbah kiba wan ba kin le hdonakor bad burom markylliang la ha ka ktien ka thylliej ne ki kam ki jam, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah I Diengdoh, Secretary Shad Lyngdoh.
title: Shad Lyngdoh ka Raid Shabong

content: Shillong, 6 Lber:Ka KHNAM State Youth Wing kala wad jingtip lymba ka ain wad jingtip paidbah, halor ka jinglait ei ka pisa jong ka Council ha u snem 2007-08, bad ka KHADC ka la jubab ba ka daw ka dei ba ka khlem khate ia ka VAT na ki 155 tylli ki kam kontrak na ka bynta u snem 2007-08 kaba la wanrah ka jingduh nong ka bala kot haduh T.8,05,756.31 tyngka. Nangta la jubab ba ki MDC baroh ki la ioh ia ka Grand-in-Aid for Arts and Culture na ka bynta u snem 2007-08, bad haduh 19 ngut ki MDC ki khlem pynbiang ia ka Utilisation Certificate na ka pisa kaba la kot haduh T.2,66,000.00 tyngka.Katei ka seng ka la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia halor ka jingbym lah jong ka council ban pynbit pynbiang ia ka rukom lum, rukom buh bad ka rukom pyndon ia ka pisa u paidbah bad ka la ong ba ka KHADC ka la donkam kyrkieh ia ka jingpynkylla ha ka rukom shakri paidbah bad ka long kaba donkam bha ban wanrah kyrkieh ia ka Administrative reform ha ka KHADC. Ka la thoh sha u CEM ba u dei ban wad tynrai ia ka daw ba ka KHADC kam biang jingkhein jingdiah.
title: Thoh ka KHNAM sha u CEM bym biang jingkhein ka District Council

content: Shillong,6 Lber:Mynta ka miet ki nongialam jong ka UDP ki la shong jingialang biang ban pyrkhat halor ki kam kiba dei hapoh KHADC . Hadien ba la wai katei ka jingialang u General Secretary katei ka seng u Dr.Jemino Mawthoh u la ong ba hadien ba u Lat u kwah ia ki kot ki sla ban kyrshan ia ka jingujor katei ka seng pyrshah ia u CEM ka KHADC bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem, ka UDP ruh ka la dep ban aiti ia ki kot ki sla kiba long ki sabut ka jyrsieh bamsap ha KHADC.Ha katei ka jingialang u bah Mawthoh u la ong ba ki nongialam katei ka seng ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih halor ka jingkob u CEM ba shuwa ban leit ujor sha u Lat ka UDP ka dei ban weng shuwa ialade, “Ngi la iatai ia kane hynrei ngi la shim ia ka rai kaba bha tam na bynta ka Party ba ngin iaid jai pa jai ym ban shu weng hak dak” u la ong. Ka UDP ka la rai ba kan ap shuwa tad haduh ban da ioh ia ka kaiphod jong ka House Committee ba la thaw da ka ing dorbar ban tohkit ia katei ka kam bamsap.
title: La aiti ka UDP sha u Lat ia ki bamsap

content: Shillong, 6 Lber:U Shri Mumtaz Ali u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ki bor Municipal ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki pulit ki la kurup ia ki mar die jong u ba kynthup ia ki biskit bad kiwei pat ki jait jingbam kiba u ju die hajan ka Lady Hydari Park, Shillong hynrei kim shym la ai pat ia ka slip ban pyni ia ki mar ba ki kurup bad kim shym la pynphai ruh ia ki mar.Ka Nirmala T Sangma pat ka la ujor ba naduh u naitung, 2016 ki bor Municipal ryngkat ki Majistor, ki pulit ki la kurup ia ki mar jong ka katba ka dang shong die hajan PWD Rest House, Lady Hydari Park, Shillong bad ym shym la ai jingthoh ban pyni ia ki mar ba la kurup bad ym shym la pynphai shuh ia ki. Ka Chamakala Chettri pat ka la ujor ba naduh u snem 2014 la knieh ia ki mar jong ka ba shongdor T.3000 tyngka najan Lady Hydari Park bad ym shym la ai jingthoh bad ym shym la pynphai shuh ia ki mar.
title: Ujor ki nongdie madan ia ka Municipal

content: Nongpoh, 06 Lber:Wat hadien ba ki bor sorkar ki la dep ban pynpra ia baroh ki iing kiba la shna beain ha jaka jong ka Meghalaya Industrial Development Corporation Ltd (MIDC) kaba don ha Umiam, Ri Bhoi District, hynrei ka long pat kaei kaei kaba lyngoh ban iohi ba ki khar Nepali kiba don ha katei ka jaka kim shem la phet satia, ha kaba la lap pynban ba don napdeng jong ki katto katne tylli, ki la shna pynbha biang ia kito ki iing kiba la shah pynpra.Kane ka la paw pynthei mynta ka sngi, hadien ba ki nongialam ka RBYF, Sengkmie, ia kaba la ialam khmat da u Vice-President u Bah L.K Sawkmie bad u General Secretary u Bah August Sten, ha ryngkat ka jingsynranlang bad ki dkhot ka RBYF, Umiam Circle, ki la leit ban jurip ia katei ka jaka jong ka sorkar, kaba la pynlong shnong pynban da ki khar Nepali.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, ki bor sorkar mynha ka 25 Tarik u Risaw u snem ba ladep, ki la leit ban pynpra lut ia baroh naduh ki dukan ba la longtrai da ki Khasi bad ki iing jong ki khar Nepali, hynrei ia ki Khasi ym shah shuh ban shna ia ki dukan die jingdie, katba ia ki khar Napali kiba don ha katei ka jaka ym shem la leh ei ei, namar ha kane ka jingjurip da ka RBYF, la lap ba kitei ki Nepali ki shna pynbha biang ia la ki iing ki sem bad don ruh napdeng jongki kiba la shna iing biang ha syndah ka kynroh jong ka MIDC da kaba pynpra ia katei ka kynroh, kaba la ker khnang da ka MIDC.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor, na ka liang u Bah L.K Sawkmie, u la ong ba kum ka seng ka dap da ka jingsngewkhia ban iohi ba para Khasi kim ioh shuh ban shna ia ki dukan naduh ba la shah pynpra, katba kine ki khar Nepali pat ki iaibteng ban shong ha katei ka jaka jong ka sorkar, da kaba kim phet wat haba ki bor sorkar ki la beh bad pynpra ia ki iing ki sem ki jongki.U la ong ruh, kum ka seng ka dap da ka jinglyngoh ban iohi ba kine ki khar Nepali, ki la shna pynbha pynban ia ki iing kiba la dep shah pynpra bad kaba kham sngewkhia eh ban iohi ka long ba kine ki khar Nepali ki la shna pynban ia ki iing jongki harud ka kynroh jong ka MIDC, kaba don ha syndah ka wah Umiam, namar ka jingshna iing beain da kine ki khar Nepali harud jong katei ka wah, ka lah ruh ban wanrah ia ka jingpynjaboh ia katei ka wah Umiam.Kumta haba iadei bad kane ka nongrim, ka seng kan sa leit ruh ban ujor sha ki bor bahalor, khnang ban ioh jingshai halor kane ka jingiai bteng da kine ki khar Nepali ban shong ha katei ka jaka jong ka MIDC, wat hadien ba la beh bad pynpra ia ki iing ki sem ki jongki, u la bynrap.Haba ki nongthohkhubor, ki la pyrshang ban iakren bad kitei ki khar Nepali kiba shong ha katei ka jaka, ki la iathuh ba kumba da ki phew snem ki la shong ha katei ka jaka, kumta namar ba kim don jaka ban phet shawei kim banse ban iaishong ha katei ka jaka.Ki la iathuh ruh ba jan baroh kiba shong ha katei ka jaka, ki dei kiba trei ha ki karkhana otding bapher bapher kiba don ha katei ka thain.
title: Lap ka RBYF ba shong ki Nepali,  haba la kyndang ia ki iing ki sem

content: Shillong, 06 Lber:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la kubur ba bun bah ki nongkhaii mawshun ha ka jylla kim tip ia ki kyndon ba la pynmih ka sorkar khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka hukum na ka iing kashari, kaba la pynsah umdum ia ki.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u Nongialam liangpyrshah u Dr Donkupar Roy mynta ka sngi ha iing dorbar u Dr Mukul u la ong ba ka sorkar kan thaw lad noh ban pynlong ia ka jingpynshai kum ka workshop, ka awareness prokram ban pyntip ia ki nongkhaii ia ki kyndon ba ka sorkar ka pyntreikam ha kaba iadei bad ka jingtih bad khaii mawshun.“Ka long kaba shisha ba bun ki nongkhaii bad kiba tih mawshun ha ki jaka nongkyndong ha ka jylla kim da bna ia ki kyndon kiba ka sorkar ka la leh khamtam hadien ba la mih ki kyndon na ka iing kashari”, la ong u Dr Mukul. U la ong ba ka jingpyntreikam ka sorkar ban tehlakam ia ka jingtih bad khaii mawshun ka long hadien ba tuklar ka kashari kaba pynmih ia ki kyndon kiba pher ha ka rukom tih bad khaii mawshun.U la ong ba ka sorkar ka la thung ia ka District Environment Impact Assessment Committee ban peit ia ka kam ban peit ngor na ka por sha ka por.Shwa ia kane, na ka liang u Dr Don u la ong ba ka long kaba donkam ia ka sorkar ba kan tuklar ia ka jingshah ktah ki nongkhaii bad tih mawshun namar ba ki mawshun ba la khlong, ki sahkut lut hadien ba la shah khang ha ka sorkar. “Ka sorkar ka dei ban tuklar ia kane ban ailad ia ki nongkhaii bad tih mawshun ban shalan ia u mawshun ba la tih”, la ong u Dr Don.
title: Bun ki nongkhaii mawshun  kim tip ia ki ain ka sorkar

content: Shillong, 6 Lber:Mynta ka sngi ha ka por 12:45 baje mynsngi uwei u nongbylla sngi u la lap ia u bom Hand Grenade katba u dang tih thliew ha ka jaka tei jingtei jong ka kong Ila Lyngdoh Mawnai kaba don ha Shyiap, Nongmynsong, Shillong. La aiti noh sha ki pulit, ka jingtohkit ia katei ka jingjia ka dang iaid.
title: Lap bom na Lumshyiap

content: Nongpoh, 06 Lber:Shisngi hadien ba ki briew bym ithuh ia kaba la suba ba ki dei na ka jylla Assam, ki la wan ban hiar thma da ka jingthmu ban pynjulor ia ka jingkieng thew kali, kaba don ha 13Mer, Ri Bhoi District, hynrei kat haduh ba la thoh ia kane ka khubor, na ka liang ki Pulit ka Ri Bhoi, kim pat lah ban kem ia kiba donkti ha katei ka kam runar.Kum ban shu pynkynmaw hangne, hynnin ka sngi ha ka por 6:30 ei ei janmiet, ki runar ia kaba la suba ba ki dei ki nong Assam, ki la wan ban hiar thma ia ka jingkieng thew kali ba kynthup ia ka DMR and Sale tax ba shipor, ha kaba ha kane ka jinghiar thma da kitei ki briew, bun ki tiar ki tar kiba don ha katei ka jaka ba kynthup naduh ki Komputor, ki kot ki sla ba donkam bad kiwei de ki tiar jong ka sorkar ki la julor lut.Kitei ki runar ki la kawang maw ruh sha ka ophis, ha kaba bun na ki it ki la pait bad ha kajuh ka por kitei ki runar ki la thmu ruh ban thang ia ka JCB, ha kaba katei ka JCB ka la julor lut.Lah ruh ban kdew hangne, ba ka daw hi kaba la pynlong ia katei ka jingjia, ka dei tang hadien ba kawei na ki trok kit Dewiong ka la thmu ban iaid lait na katei ka Weighbridge, hynrei katei ka trok ka la kum tyngkhuh noh ia ka JCB kaba don ha katei ka surok bad kyllon noh ha surok.Haba budien halor kane ka jingjia, na ka liang u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi u C.P Gotmare, u la ong tang mar ia tip halor katei ka jingjia u la hiar ban jurip bad hadien kane ka jingjurip, u la ai jingmut ia katei ka tnat sorkar ba kan ujor noh da ka Ejahar pyrshah ia kitei kiba la donkti ha katei ka kam runar.“Kat haduh mynta ym pat shem la ioh kem ia kiba la donkti ha katei ka kam runar bad ka long ruh kaba shitom ia ki Pulit ban budien namar bun na kitei kiba la wan hiar thma ia katei ka Weighbridge ki dei na Assam, kumta khnang ban iohkem ia kiba donkti, u la ai jingmut ruh ia ki pulit ba kin peit thuh bha lyngba jong ki kor CCTV, khnang ban iohkem ia baroh kiba donkti ha katei ka kam” ong u C.P Gotmare.U la ong ruh, ba kitei ki runar ki la dep pynkhreh lypa hashwa ba kin hiar thma pyrshah ia ki nongtrei ha katei ka Weighbridge, kumta haba iadei bad kane u la kyntu ruh ia ki pulit ba kin pynngat ia kitei ki runar ha ki kyndon ain thmu pyniap bad ha kajuh ka por ba ki la pynkhein ia ki kyndon ain 144 CrPC kaba dang shu dep pynjari shen.Watla ki Pulit ki shem jingeh ban ithuh ia kitei ki runar, namar ba kidei kiba wan na Assam, hynrei na ka liang ki bor Distrik kin iatrei ryngkat ryngkat bad ki Pulit khnang ban iohkem ia kitei ki runar, kiba la donkti ha kaban leh kat ia katei ka kam runar pyrshah ia ka sorkar, u la bynrap. Haba iakren pat bad u Bah G.D Kharwanlang, SP ka Ri Bhoi, u la ong ba ki Pulit kin leh shitom ban iohkem ia kitei ki runar kiba la donkti ban hiar thma ia katei ka Weighbridge, u la ong ruh, watla ngim pat la iohkem wat tang uwei ruh, hynrei lyngba ka jingiarap jong ki kor CCTV, ki Pulit ruh shen kin sa ioh ban kem ia kitei ki runar.
title: Ym pat iohkem ia kiba hiar thma  ia ka jingkieng thew kali ha 13Mer

content: Nongpoh, 6 Lber:Mynta ka janmiet ha ka por 4 baje ei ei, ka la don ka jingpluh jong ki dukan ha Iew Umsning bad ha kane ka jingpluh haduh 5 ne 6 tylli ki dukan kiba don ha katei ka Iew ingkhong bad haba khein kyllum lang baroh ki jinglut jingsep ka la poi sha ki lak tyngka.Haba pyntip sha ki nongthohkhubor, u Bah Rocky Marwein Rangbah Shnong ka Umsning Proper B, u la ong ba ia ka daw kaba la pynlong ia katei ka jingpluh jong katei ka Iew ym shem la lah ban tip, namar ka la shu pluh kynsan kynsan.U la ong ruh, donbok ba katei ka ding kam shem la lap ban klang sha kiwei pat ki dukan, namar ka jingiarap da ki paidbah bad ruh ka jingkloi jong ka kali pynlip ding na Umiam ban wan pynlip noh ia katei ka ding.Kumta hadien kane ka jingiai jia ki jingpluh ding ba khah khah, na ka liang ka Dorbar Shnong Umsning proper A bad Proper B, ki la buh ruh ka jingkyrpad ia ka sorkar bad nongmihkhmat ba kin phai khmat lem na ka bynta ban buh noh iaka Sub Fire Service Station ha Umsning, khang ba yn lah ban tehlakam lada jia ba don kino kino ki jingjia pluhding ha ki thain Umsning.
title: Jan pluh ka Iew Umsning

content: Shillong, 07 Lber:Ka sorkar jylla kam pat lah ban pynthikna lano kan pyndep ia ka jingshna ia ka jaka rung bad jaka mih kumba la iarai bad ki seng bhalang ban tehlakam ia ka jingwan ki briew nabar.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongkrem u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit hynne hapoh ka iing dorbar, u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma, u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la pynkhreh shaid shaid ban pyndep shwa ia ka jingshim jaka ban shna ia ka jaka rung bad jaka mih.“Ka jingpyndep ia ka jaka mih bad jaka rung ka dang iaid ha ka jingpynkhreh shaid shaid”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ka sorkar ka la iaid khlem sangeh ban pyndep ia kane kam watla kala don ka jingeh khamtam haba iadei bad ka jingshim jaka namar ka jingtreikam ka ain ka sorkar pdeng ka Right to Fair Compensation of Land, ha kaba ka sorkar ka hap ban bishar bniah bad iaid katkum kane ka ain.Ha kajuh ka por, u la iathuh ba ka sorkar ka la pynlait ia ka pisa ban siew ia ki trai jaka ba la dep ban pynbiang nadong shadong sha ki tnad ba dei peit halor kane.
title: Ym thikna ka sorkar, ki jaka rung jaka mih

content: Shillong, 07 Lber:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar jylla kam nym rakhe ia ka Good Governance Day ba la pynbna da ka sorkar pdeng ha ka 25 tarik Nohprah namar ba kane ka sngi ka long pyrshah ia ka jingsngew jong ki paidbah riew ngeit Khristan.Haba jubab ia ka mat ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongkrem Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit mynta ka sngi hapoh ka iing dorbar, u Dr Mukul u la ong, “Ia ka jingsngew bad ka sur jong u paidbah ka jylla, yn pynsngew sha ka sorkar pdeng halor kane”,.Haduh mynta kam don satia ka jingrakhe ia ka Good Governance Day ha ka jylla lait noh tang ki ophis ka sorkar pdeng, la ong u Myntri Rangbah.Ka sorkar pdeng ka la pynbna ia kane ka sngi kum ka Good Governance Day ban burom ia ka sngi kha jong u Myntri Rangbahduh barim ka ri u AB Vajpayee.“Ka Good Governance Day ka la dep don lypa ha kane ka jylla, ngim donkam ban shaniah ha kiwei ban pynbna ia ka Good Governance Day”, la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba haba ka sorkar ka la ioh ia ka jingthoh na ka sorkar pdeng ban rakhe ia kane ka sngi, ka sorkar jylla ka la rai ban nym pdiang satia.Shwa ia kane, haba wanrah ia kane ka mat, u Bah Ardent u la ong ba ka jingpynbna ka sorkar NDA ba ialam da ka BJP ban rakhe ia ka Good Governance Day ha ka 25 tarik Nohprah, ka dei ka jingthmu ban niut roit ia ka hok jong ki paidbah Khristan ha kane ka jylla bad pynkhein ia ka kyndon ka riti synshar ka ri kaba ai laitluid ban mane niam.U la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban phah da ka jingujor kaba tyngeh sha ka sorkar pdeng halor kane ka jingthmu.Kiwei pat kiba kyrshan ia kane ka mat ba la wanrah da u Bah Ardent ki long u MLA ka South Tura u John Leslee K Sangma bad u MLA ka Dadenggeri u James K Sangma.
title: Ka sorkar jylla kan nym rakhe  ia ka 25 tarik u Nohprah: Mukul

content: Shillong,6 Lber:Ka Seng Samla Mawkneng ka la lap lyngba ka jingwad jingtip, ba u MLA ka Sohiong konstitwensi u bah HDR Lyngdoh u la sam skhim dalade ialade bad katei ka skhim kaba u laai sha lade baroh ka kot haduh T.40 lak tyngka. U President katei ka Seng Samla u bah Curtis Rani ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u Secretary bah Simen Jaraiñ ryngkat kiwei pat ki nongialam katei ka seng ki la ong ba katkum katei ka jingwad jingtip, u bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ai skhim ialade lyngba ka scheme CMSRDF 2012-2013 T.15 lak tyngka. Nangta ki la ong ba u la ai skhim T.25 lak tyngka na ka MPLAD ka MP Scheme kaba wan lyngba ka kong Wansuk Syiem-MP Rajya Sabha bad ia katei ka skhim u la pyndonkam ban siang rong ia ka phyllaw ing lajong bad ka jingshna ia ka Meribon K.H Memorial College, Sohiong kaba dei ka HDR Educational Trust kaba long trai shimet da u hi.“Ki la don bunbah ki skul ba la seng da ki shnong, ki skul niam kiba la rim bha hapoh Sohiong konstitwensi hynrei kim ioh satia katba katei ka kolej pat kaba dang shu plie dang ha ka 25 tarik u nailar snem 2016 ka la ioh skhim lypa naduh u 2012-2013, 2013-2014” ong u bah Curtis Rani haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor. Shuh shuh u la ong ba u MLA ka Sohiong u la ai ia ka MLA Scheme bad MDC Scheme tang ha kajuh ka jaka, bad don ruh ki MDC scheme ha ki katto katne jaka ba u la ai hynrei ia ka work order u la ai beit ha u Personal Secretary jong u – u bah Pynshai Malngiang. Ia ka madan phutbol la kynnoh ba ka don tang kawei hynrei la pyntrei ar tylli ki skhim bad ia ka kam la pyntrei da ka JCB jong u bah HDR Lyngdoh hi.“Katei ka jingleh jong u ka long kumba u aid a ka kti ka mon u pdiang pat da ka kti ka diang” ong u bah Rani bad u la pyntip ruh ba ia ka T.25 lak ka MP Scheme la ai ha ka kyrteng jong u khun u bah HDR Lyngdoh u bah Nathaniel Rymbai. Haba kynnoh ba u MLA jong ki u la klun lut sha lade ia ki skhim ba dei ban pynpoi sha ki paidbah, katei ka Seng Samla ka la ong ba kan wad jingmut na ki stad aiñ hato katei ka rukom ka lah ne-em ban long bad lada kam lah ban long shano kin ujor kin sa wad jingtip ban iaid katkum ki lynti ka aiñ. “Lada dei ki MLA ,MDC kiba trei hok wat ia ka tulop ruh ki ai sha ki paidbah” ong biang u bah Rani.Kitei ki nongialam Seng Samla ki la pyntip ruh ba ia ka RTI ki la pan jingtip naduh u snem 2016 hynrei ki dang ioh jingtip mynta u snem 2017. Ki la pynpaw ba kum ki nongwad RTI ki ju lap bunsien ba ki PIO jong ki tnad ba dei peit ki ju pynslem ban ai jubab bad haba leit ban ujor sha u CIC ym ju don ka jingpynshitom ia ki, “Ngi sngewsih bha ia kane, haba ngi leit ujor sha u CIC ne sha u First Appellate Authority ruh , kim ju pynshitom ia ki PIO” ong u President ka Seng Samla Mawkneng. Ha kaba ia dei shuh shuh bad ki skhim ha Sohiong konstitwensi kitei ki samla ki la pynpaw ka jingbym sngewhun bad ki la kynnoh ba bunsien ka pisa ka dei kaba heh hynrei ka kam pat la shu trei tang dep rukom.U bah Rani u la ong ba ka surok kaba la mang pisa T.7.50 klur tyngka na Sohiong sha Pariong kam shym la pynhun ia ki ha kaba tang ka nala la pyni ba ka lut haduh T.40 lak tyngka katba ka kam pat tang T.2 lak ruh ym i kop ban pynlut, “Dei tad hadien ba ngi kynthoh ha ki kotkhubor ba ki sa leit ban pynshna biang” u la ong.
title: Dalade ai skhim u bah HDR,  ban siang ia ka phyllaw ing lajong

content: Shillong, 6 Lber:Ka Jingiaseng Rangbah jong ka Khasi Jaintia Presbyterian (KJP) Synod Sepngi kan long ha kane ka sngi u Blei ban wan ha ka Balang Mawlai. Ka jingiaseng kan sdang naduh ka 9 tarik haduh 12 tarik. Ka jingiaseng paidbah ha ka sngi U Blei, 12 tarik kan long ha Umshing.Haba u nongaikhu-bor u la leit jurip mynta ka sngi la iohi ba ia ka rynsan long jingiaseng la shna ha pynthor bad kiba bun ki jaka ban shong ki paidbah nongleit jingiaseng kan dei hi ha ki pynthor bad ki don ruh ki jaka lum kiba lah ban shong paidbah. Kane ka rynsan ka don mar pyrshah bad ka gate no.2 jong ka skul bah NEHU. Ki paidbah kiba leit jingiaseng kiba wan ki thain polytechnic kyntonmasar kan kham suk ynda haba ki iaid beit beit ia ka surok NEHU. Ki paidbah kiba wan na ki thain Mawroh ki lah ba iaid lyngba ka surok sanker bad la iohi ruh ia ki lynti iaid kjat kiba la shna kyrpang kiba lah ban leit sha kane ka jaka long jingiaseng lyngba ka surok mawroh- sanker.
title: Hajan NEHU ka rynsan jingiaseng Synod

content: Shillong, 6lber:U MDC ka UDP na Nongkrem konstitwensi u bah H.S Shylla u la ong ba naduh lashai ka sngi kata ka 7 tarik u lber ki paidbah ki bym ioh bording lane ki bym ioh umbam umdih ki dei ban leit pan konekshon na ka ophis MeECL bad kumjuh na ka PHE bad lada kitei ki ophis ki dang pan ia ki kot ki sla jong ka MUDA dei ban pyntip sha u da kaba shu phone bad ryngkat bad u paidbah un leit ban gheroa ia kitei ki ophis ban pan jingshai, “Lada ka MeECL , PHE kim ai konekshon ia ki paidbah, ngin leit ban Gheroa bad ngin pan jingshai na ka daw aiu kim ai” ong u bah H.S Shylla haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor.Katkum ki jingkren jong u bah Shylla u la ong ba ka Division Bench jong ka Meghalaya High Court ka la pynmih ia ka hukum ha ka 16 tarik u rymphang, 2017 halor ka PIL ba la thep da u bah Tirot Sing Syiemlieh hynrei katei ka PIL jong u bah Tirot Sing ka la iap noh hadien ka jingweng noh ka MUDA ia ka Public Notice jong ka ha ka 21 tarik u kyllalyngkot, 2016 kaba ka la pynmih ha ka 5 tarik u naiwieng, 2015. “Baroh lehse kin lyngngoh ka hukum aiu ka High Court ka la pynmih ha ka 16 tarik u rymphang, ngi dei ban tip ba ka PIL jong u bah Tirot Sing ka dei beit thik tang ia ka Public Notice ba ka MUDA ka la pynmih ha ka 5 tarik u naiwieng, 2015” ong u bah Shylla da kaba batai ba ka High Court ka la pynkut noh ia katei ka kam naba ka sorkar lyngba ka MUDA ka la weng noh.U bah Shylla u la kynthoh ruh da kaba ong ba ka jingleit ka KHADC sha High Court ka long kumba ka shu leit kai namarba ym shym la leh da kata ka lynti kaba ia beit lang kumba batai da ka High Court naba ka PIL kam lah shuh ban ieng, u la ong ba lah ban pynkut noh ia katei ka kam tang lyngba ka jingiabeit jingmut hapdeng u CEM bad u myntri rangbah, hynrei u la ong ba ka jingbym ia sngewthuh jingmut hapdeng u CEM bad u MR ka la pynkynduh jingeh ia ki paidbah. Ha kaba ia dei pat bad ka jingpynkhreh ka KHADC ban ujor da ka jingujor kaba thymmai pyrshah ia ka aiñ shan ing ka MUDA u bah Shylla u la ong ba ka dei ka jingbiej bad ka long kum ka jingkhot kali pynlip ding haba ka ding ka la lip, “Long kumba phi khot kali pynlip ding haba ka ding ka la lip lypa” u la ong.Ute iu MDC ka Nongkrem u la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban siew bai lutksan bad ba ka dei ban pynphai lut ia ka pisa ba ka la ioh lum na ki paidbah namar ka jingpyntreikam ia katei ka aiñ ka bym dei ban pyndonkam ha ki jaka ba hap hapoh u pud u sam ka Council. U la ong ruh ba un thoh sha ki Rangbah Shnong ba kin ym shah ia ka briew jong ka MUDA ban dang wan tuklar eiei sha ki shnong jong ki bad lada ki dang leit dei ban phah kem shisyndon ia ki.
title: Lada ka MeECL, PHE kim ai ding  ne ai um, ngin leit Gheroa: Shylla

content: Shillong, 06 Lber:U nongialam liangpyrshah u Dr Donkupar Roy hynne ka sngi u la ther ia kane ka sorkar jylla kaba kam ba ka la pyndep ia ka jingkular kumba la kular ia ki paidbah, bad u la ong, “Kane ka sorkar ka pyndep ia ki jingkular tang ha ki katto katne ki konstitwensi”,.“Haba ka sorkar ka ong ba ka la pyndep ia ka jingkular jong ki paidbah, kam lah ban kam ba la pyndep lut namar ba kumba ka paw, ka pyndep tang ha ki katto katne ki jaka”, la ong u Dr Don haba wanrah ia ka amendment halor ka jingkren jong u Lat ka jylla.Wat la um shym la kdew ia kano kano, hynrei ka jingkren u Dr Don ka lah ban thew ia ka konstitwensi jong u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul, uba la plie bun ki prokram bad ki kam tang ha ka jaka jongu.U Myntri rangbah u bud ia ka jingong, ‘Ka jingisynei ka sdang na la iing’ bad kane ka paw ha kaba u la wanrah ia ka madan ialehkai phutbol kaba iaryngkat kyrdan ha ka pyrthei ne ka international standard katba ha kiwei ki jaka tang ka national standard ruh ym pat ioh.“Ha jaka jong nga, lada ioh tang ka madan ka National standard kaba 30-40 lak ruh nga la sngew kmen eh shibun”, la ong u Dr Don.U la ong ba ka Ampati ka la ioh ia ka madan kaba iaryngkat bad ka pyrthei hynrei bun ki madan ki jaka ialehkai ha kylleng ki jaka ha ka jylla kiba shu sah khongreng khlem lah ban pyndep bad kane ka paw ba ka sorkar kam shym la leh ia kamram jongka. “Ban shu ieh kumto ia ki madan bun snem khlem pyndep, ka bha ia ka sorkar ba kan shu rai ban pynbna ba kam treh shuh ban pyntreikam ia ka, khnang ban lait na ka ktha khlieh khlem pyndep”, la ong u Dr Don.“Ha ki katto katne ki jaka, ki briew ki lah ban mynjur ba ka sorkar ka leh ia ki jingkular jongka, hynrei ha ka jylla, kim nym pdiang satia”, la ong u Dr Don. “Ka jingjur ka jingnang kiew ki kam thombor ia ki kynthei khynnah ka jylla ka la nangkiew na ka snem sha ka snem , hato kane ka dei ka jingkular ka sorkar”, la ong u Dr Don.U la pule ia ka jingkhein jong ki kam thombor ha kane ka jylla kaba pyni ba ka nangkiew bad haba ianujor bad ka jylla Utter Pradesh, ka kham jur ki kam thombor ia ki kynthei ha Meghalaya ban ia katei ka jylla kaba heh duh ha ri India.Ha kawei ka liang, u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la kular ban pyntreikam ia kata ka skhim shna ia kiba duk naduh bun snem hynrei haduh khlem pat urlong satia hynrei kumba ka paw, la iohi ba ka jingurlong jong kane ka skhim, ka long tang haba pynkylla kyrteng khlem pat lah ban pyntreikam. “Mynshwa ka sorkar ka ai kyrteng ka Affordable Housing Scheme hynrei la iohi ba mynta ka la kylla sha ka Chief Minister Housing Assistance Scheme”, la ong u Dr Don.U la buh jingkylli ia ka sorkar balei ka kwah ban ai nam ia u Myntri Rangbah ban jer kyrteng ia kane ka skhim bad kaba bha ka long ba ka dei ban ai da ka kyrteng Meghalaya ha ka kyrteng Chief Minister.
title: U MR ka International standard, ngi tang  ka national standard ruh la kmen: Dr Don

content: Shillong, 06 Lber:U Myntri ba peit ia ka tnad ri jingri, u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ki don 9 ngut ki nongtrei shipor (adhoc) jong ka tnad Animal Husbandary and Vetrinery ka jylla, kiba la rai ban pynlong kum ki nongtrei ba pura (regular).Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka West Shillong Bah Paul Lyngdoh mynta ka sngi hapoh ka iing dorbar, u Bah HDR u la ong ba ia kine ki 9 ngut ki nongtrei la phah da ka tnad Veterinery sha ka tnad Personel ba kan ai ia ka jingmynjur ban pynlong kum ki nongtrei ba pura. Hynrei haba kylli biang shaphang katno por kan slem bad mynta ka tnad ka la phah ia ka jingthoh sha ka tnad Personel,u Bah HDR Lyngdoh um shym la lah ban jubab namar ba um tip. Hynrei u la kular ban wanrah ha kaba iadei bad kane ka jingtip hapoh kine ki sngi ba long dorbar.Na ka liang u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la pynduh ia ka jingthung kontrak ha ki tnad sorkar hynrei ia kine ki 9 ngut la thung naduh kham mynshwa. Na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma uba bynrap halor kane, u la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ka sorkar ka la pynduh ia ka jingthung adhoc ha ki tnad sorkar bad ia kane la leh da ki sorkar ba na khmat hynrei kumba a paw, kane ka kam kam shym la trei kam satia namar ba ka jingthung adhoc ne kontrak ka la nang iaid haduh kine ki sngi.“Ka sorkar kan pynduh noh ia ka jingthung kam adhoc nangne shakhmat”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah. U la ong ba ym shym la ioh jingtip kaba thikna naduh mynta ka sorkar ka la pynduh ia ka jingthung kam da ka adhoc namar ba ia kane ka kam, la leh da ki sorkar bapher bapher kiba la synshar ha ki snem ba la dep.
title: Pynkylla nongtrei pura ka sorkar ia 9  ngut ki nongtrei shipor ka Veterinery

content: Shillong, 6 Lber:U Lamphang ka Iingdorbar ka jylla u Abu Taher Mondal u la pyntip ba u la ioh pdiang ia ka jingkyrpad na u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit (MLA) ban iatai lyngba ka adjournment Motion halor ka jingkiew ki kamthombor pyrshah ia ki kynthei ha ka jylla.U Lamphang u la pynbna ba um pdiang ia kane ka jingtyrwa jong u bah Ardent namar u bah Paul Lyngdoh (MLA) u la tyrwa ban iatai halor kane ka juh ka phang bad u la pdiang ia kane ban iatai lyngba ka special motion ka ban long lashai ka sngi 7 tarik.Nalor kane u Lamphang u la pynksan shuh shuh halor ka jingbym pdiang ia kane ka mat iatainia, namar ka la don ruh ka jingtyrwa ban iatai lyngba ka amendment motion ban ai khublei halor ka jingkren jong u lat ka jylla bad u la ong ba lyngba kine ki ar tylli ki bynta ki dkhot jong ka iingdorbar ki lah ban iashim bynta ban iatai kham bniah halor kane ka phang.Hadien kane ka jingpynbna u Lamphang u bah Ardent u la ieng bad ong ba u kwah ban iatai lyngba ka adjournment motion namar u sngewkhia halor ka jingshah thombor jong ki kynthei khamtam bad ki nongmihkmat ruh ki la iadon bynta bad kane kan ktah ia ka burom jong ki nongmihkhmat.U la kdew ruh ba ka la mih lyngba ki kot khubor halor ka jingjia ha Rajbhavan bad na ka liang jong u lamphang u la kem ktien da kaba ong ia u ba Ardent ba um lah ban kren halor ka Rajbhavan. Hadien kane u bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ieng bad kylli lano yn ailad ban iatai ia ka special motion kaba u la tyrwa ban iatai halor kane ka phang bad u Lamphang u la pyntip ba yn iatai lashai ka sngi 7 tarik.La sngewthuh ba lashai ka sngi kin don bun ki ban iashim bynta halor kane ka jing ia tai nia, kaba dei ka jingkiew jong ki kam thombor pyrshah ia ki kynthei bad ka lah ruh ban mih ka jingiakren halor ka jingshah thombor jong ka khynnah 14 snem dang shen ha kaba u bah Julious Dorphang u la shah kem halor ka jingkynnoh donkti halor kane ka jingjia.
title: Ai ksai u bah Ardent halor ka  jingdonkti u nongmihkhmat

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Ka kali Maruti Car, kaba don ia u number ML 04 B 0906, ka la kylla kynriang mynta ka nohsngi, hajan ka jaka pyniaid kali ki pulit ha Rilbong. Katei ka kali, kaba wan na sha thain MES, la iathuh ba ka la kylla pyrdet, namar ka jingthut jong u steering bad haba u nongniah, ula kulmar jingmut bad iuh ia u accelator, katei ka kali, ka sa kylla noh da kynriang. Ki pulit, ki iathuh ba ka jingkylla, ka dei namar ka jingthut hi jong ka kali bad u nongniah, u khlem buaid satia bad u don bad ka kurim jongu lem bad i khun rit. Ym shym don ba mynsaw jur, hynrei don tang ka jing ia mong kaba malu mala.
title: Kylla ka Maruti hapdeng surok

content: Shillong 07 Lber:U Myntri ka tnad ka kit ka bah u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ki kali kamai sawkhmut (SPTS) ki lait na kaba siew khajna sha ka sorkar namar ba ia kine ki kali, la pyniaid da ka sorkar.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Sohra u Bah TW Chyne hynne ka sngi hapoh ka iing dorbar, u Myntri u la ong ba kine ki bos kim donkam ban siew khajna eiei sha ka sorkar halor ka nongrim ba la pyniaid da ka tnad Urban Affairs ka jylla.Hynrei haba u MLA ka Sohra u la kylli kumno ka lah ban long haba ia kine ki bos la aiti sha ki riew shimet na ka liang u myntri u la shu jubab, “kine ki bos kim siew khajna namar ba ki hap ha ka jingpyniaid ka tnad Urban Affairs”.
title: Ki kali sawkhmut kim siew khajna: HDR

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Mynta ka sngi uwei u ehrang United Achik Liberation Army ( UALA) u Jijabell C Marak, 25 snem karta uba ju khot sin kum u Asim uba dei na ka shnong Nongalbibra, South Garo Hills la wan pyndem hakhmat ki pulit ka East Garo Hills ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki nongialam niam ha ri Lum Garo ryngkat kiba haing hasem.U Marak u la don hapoh katei ka seng naduh u snem 2013 haduh ba kan da ia ia soi ia suk bad ka sorkar bad u dei ruh uba la thmu ban thaw ia kawei pat ka seng lehnoh kum ka United A.chik National Front (UANF) hynrei namar ka jingsha khynra kaba na ka por sha ka por u la wan pyndem noh ha ki pulit.
title: Wan pyndem u ehrang UALA

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Ka Meghalaya High Court, ka shong bishar mynta ka sngi, ha kaba iadei bad ka jingdon ki karkhana dewbilat ha Jaintia Hills, ha ryngkat ka jingdon bynta jong ka Jaintia District Council lem bad ki Doloi katei ka Thain.Katei ka mukot-duma, ka dei kaba la ujor da ki Doloi ka Ri Jaintia bad la shim ia katei ka mukotduma da U Chief Justice jong ka High Court, ha ryngkat U Justice Ved Prakash Vaish bad ha katei ka jingshong bishar, ki lai ngut ki nong ia said, ki la ia don lut, kiba kynthup na ka liang jong ki kompeni dewbilat, na ka liang ka JHADC bad kumjuh sa U Amit Kumar, uba dei u riewsaid ain jong ka Supreme Court, uba wan ban mihkhmat ia ki Doloi.Ki kompeni dewbilat, ki iathuh ia ka iing bishar, ba ka jinglum khajna ki Doloi kam don shuh bad kumta ki kwah ban pynkut noh ia ka mukotduma, hynrei ki Doloi, ki kam ba mynta ka mariang, ka la julor thiaw sha katei ka thain, ki mrad ki la duh jait lut khoit bad ki khlaw ki btap ki la la synlen, na ka jingtih mar poh khyndew da kitei ki kompeni dewbilat.Na ka liang ki Dolloi, ki la dep jubab lut ia ki jingpharep jong ki kompeni dewbilat bad ka Jaintia Disrict Council ruh kumjuh, hynrei na ka liang ka JHADC, haduh mynta kam pat lah ban ai jubab lane ban jubab ia ka nongrim jongka, halor kane ka mukotduma bad ka dei halor katei ka phang, ba ka iing bishar, kam lah satia ban ai rai pynkut ia ka mukotduma.Ka Kashari, ka la bthah ruh ia u nongiasaid ka JHADC, ba un ai ia ka jubab kaba shai, hapoh lai taiew, ha kaba u riewsaid ka JHADC, ula mynjur ia kata.Ban shu pynkynmaw, ka Supreme Court, ka la kyntait lut ia baroh ki jingpharep ka JHADC ia ki Doloi jong ka Jaintia bd haduh mynta, ka Supreme Court, ka khlem ai ia kano kano ka rai, ban kubur ia ka jinglehbein ka JHADC, ia ki khlieh nongsynshar ka Ri Jaintia.Ka sorkar Jylla ruh dang shen ha ka 5tarik Kyllalyngkot 2017, ka pyntip sha U Deputy Commissioner, ka Ri Bhoi District, ba kat kum ka riti dustur, na ka bynta ban pyniaid ia ki kam ki jam baroh, ki khlieh nongsynshar, ki lah ban lum khajna na ki mar ki mata ba mih napoh ka Hima lane ka Elaka jongki, ong shuh ka kyrwoh jong U Ma Chawas Lyngdoh, Chairman, Dorbar ki Daloi ka Ri Jaintia.
title: Pynslem ka JHADC ban jubab  ia ka mukotduma ki Dolloi ha HC

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Ka kali Maruti Car, kaba don ia u number ML 04 B 0906, ka la kylla kynriang mynta ka nohsngi, hajan ka jaka pyniaid kali ki pulit ha Rilbong. Katei ka kali, kaba wan na sha thain MES, la iathuh ba ka la kylla pyrdet, namar ka jingthut jong u steering bad haba u nongniah, ula kulmar jingmut bad iuh ia u accelator, katei ka kali, ka sa kylla noh da kynriang. Ki pulit, ki iathuh ba ka jingkylla, ka dei namar ka jingthut hi jong ka kali bad u nongniah, u khlem buaid satia bad u don bad ka kurim jongu lem bad i khun rit. Ym shym don ba mynsaw jur, hynrei don tang ka jing ia mong kaba malu mala.
title: Kylla ka Maruti hapdeng surok

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Ka jingiakhih kaba jur ka la jia ha Resubelpara mynhynin ka miet ha kaba la mih ka jingkynad hapdeng ki pulit bad ki paidbah. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ha katei ka jingjia ha ka por 10 baje eiei mynmiet ki pulit ki la pynsangeh ia kawei ka trok rit (bolero pickup) kaba dang wan na ki thaiñ Kaldang, ha mar ba ka poi ha jaka pahara ki pulit. Hynrei ha katei ka por la ong ba katei ka trok kam shym la sangeh satia bad ha katei hi ka por la iathuh ba ki pulit ki la siat sha ki briew kiba don ha katei ka trok rit.Tang mar ia ioh jingtip ia katei ka jingjia puk ki paidbah katei ka thaiñ ki la khih bitar ia ki pulit, namar katei ka jingsiat briew bad hangtei ka la don ka jingiakynad kaba jur hapdeng ki paidbah bad ki pulit bad ha katei ka jingjia, nalor kiba don hapoh trok la don ruh kiba mynsaw napdeng ki paidbah kiba ia khih bad kiba mynsaw ki la don haduh 3 ngut bad ia kitei baroh lai ngut la pynkit sha ka Hospital kaba don ha nongbah Guwahati.Ki paidbah kiba la khih bitar bad kiba ia leh pyrshah ia ki pulit ki la leit ba ker pyllun ia ka thanad kaba don ha Resubelpara bad ki la thang ia ka Resubelpara Police Station , ki la thang ia ki kali pulit, ki la thang ruh ia ki kali pynlip ding kiba ieng hajan thanad.Katkum ka khubor na ki pulit pat la iathuh ba katei ka jingtalasi ia ki kali ba iaid ka dei hadien ba ki la ioh jingtip ba ki don ki lehnoh kiba iaid lynti bad kiba pynkit tiar siat lyngba katei ka jaka.Shah thang san tylli ki kali sorkar,2 ki kali shimet ha Resu-KhaldangKa sorkar ka la pdiang ban thung da ka kynhun tohkit, halor ka jingjia ha Resu-Khaldang ka North Garo Hills kaba la mih hapdeng ki pulit bad ki paidbhur haduh ba la lai ngut ki la mynsaw jur ki riew paidbah hynnin ka janmiet.U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar kan thung ia ka jingtohkit Judicial inquiry halor kane ka jingjia bad kan sa siew bailutksan sha baroh kiba la mynsaw na kane ka jingjia.Ia kane ka jingjia la wanrah da u MLA ka NPP u Nihim D Shira mynta ka sngi hapoh ka iing dorbar uba la dawa ba dei ban thung da ka Judicial inquiry bad ban siew bailutksan ia kiba mynsaw bad ban pynshitom ia ki pulit kiba donkti ha kane ka kam. Ia kane ka jingdawa u Nihim, la kyrshan ruh da u MLA ka thain u Salseng C Marak.Shwa ia kane, u Myntri tnad kam pohiing ka jylla u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ki don san tylli ki kali sorkar kiba shah thang bad ar tylli ki kali shimet ha ka jingjia ha Resu-Khladeng ka North Garo Hills kaba jia hynnin ka sngi.Haba wanrah ia ka jingpynshai hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi, u la ong ki kali sorkar ba shah thang ki long kawei ka gypsy, ka jeep, ka mini trok, ka water tender bad ka bike katba jong ki riew paidbah kaba shah thang ka dei ka maruti bad ka bike.U la ong ba ka jingjia ka la mih haba ki pulit hadien ba la ioh jingtip ba don u dkhot lehnoh u William Sangma, ki la pynlong ia ka jingthwet ia ki kali ba iaid ha Resu-Khaldang ha ka por 8 Pm haduh 10 PM, bad kawei ka bolero pick-up ka la wan iaid hynrei haba ki pulit ki pyrshang ban pynsangeh ka khlem ieng satia bad ka la pynlong ia ki ban synreit kuli da kaba suba ba dei ki lehnoh.Ha kane ka jingsynreit kuli, lai ngut ki briew ki la mynsaw ba kynthup u Milseng Sangma (27), Tubal Sangma (29) bad u Janrak Sangma (27) bad la pynkit sha CHC bad kham hadien la rah sha International Hosoital ha Guwahati.Hynrei ki paidbah mar synioh jingtip ia kane ka jingjia, ki la leit tur puk sha CHC ha Resubelpara bad ka la pynlong ban mih ka jinghuri hura ha kaba ar tylli ki kali pulit ka la pynpra bad nangne ki paidbah ki ala tur sha police station ha kaba ki la hiar thma haduh ban pynjulor ia ka ophis bad ki mar.Hynrei namar ka jingsted ki pulit ban wan sha katei ka jaka, la lah ban pynthanda mynta bad ka sorkar ka la thung ia ka Magisterial Inquiry.U la ong ba katei ka thain ka dei kaba kynrei bha ki kam runar ha kaba dang shen, ka la don ka jingiather kuli bad ki dkhot seng kieng atiar ba ialam da u Singbirth Marak ba khot sin kum Norok uba thaw ia ka kynhun kiengatiar ka United Achik National Front (UANF). Ki don ruh ki jingshah rahborr bad kiwei ki kam bymman khamtam namar ba ka dei ka jaka ba khappud bad ka Assam.
title: Bitar ki paidbah ba siat briew ki pulit, shah  thang 5 ki kali sorkar & 2 ki kali paidbah

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Ka Khasi Students Union (KSU), ka la phah ia ka jingujor sha U Bah Ronnie V. Lyngdoh, myntri ka tnat pynroi sor, halor ka jingthmu jong katei ka tnat ban ai jaka sah pyngngad ia kiwei ki ophis sorkar jong kiwei pat ki Jylla kiba nabar bad la ong ba ha ka jaka ban ai jaka ia kitei ki sorkar Jylla, la dei ban ai jaka sah ia kiba ha iing jong ki nongpang, kiba shong ba sah ha katei ka Hospital.Ka KSU, ka shim, ba katei ka jingleh jong ka MUDA, ka dei kaba long pyrshah paidbah bad kaba pyrshah ia ki duk ki rangli, kiba la shaniah bad aiti ia kane ka sorkar, ba kan synshar ha ka Jylla, ha ki saw snem ba ladep.
title: Ujor ka KSU ban tei basa hajan NEIGHRIMS

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Ki dkhot ka CSWO seng kmie hapoh ka jingialam ka Kong Irene Hujon kum ka President, ha ka sngi nyngkong, ki la leit peit sngewlem ia u samla Kerbor Nongrum, uba don hapdeng ka jingshitom kaba jur bad uba dang shah sumar mynta hapoh ka ICU jong ka Woodland Hospital, Shillong. Une u samla u la mynsaw jur na ki bynta jong ka khlieh haba u la hap nalor ka trok ha ki thain Smit, ha ka 3tarik mynta u bnai.Na ka jingiathuh i kmie jong u, ryngkat ki bahaiing, la sngew mat ba u la shah iuh da ka shaka kali na ka bynta ka khlieh.Ki doktor jong katei ka hospital ki la leh lut ia kaba donkam hynrei haduh mynta, utei u samla um pat tipbriew satia.Ki dkhot ka seng ki la ai ruh i jingiarap iba rit katba lah bad kan dang ai shuh bad ha ka juh ka por, ka buh ruh ka jingduwai ba U Blei Trai Kynrad un ai biang ia ka jingkoit jingkhiah ha utei u samla.Ka seng ka kyrpad ruh ia kito kiba don ia ka mynsiem ban iarap, ba kin ai lem ka kti kamom kti ka diang, la i long iba rit ne baheh sha katei ka longiing kaba duk kiba la mad ia katei ka jingeh, namar ba ka jinglut jingsep ka long kaba shyrkhei, bad ka da kyrpad ruh khamtam eh ia u Bah Remington Pyngrope bad u Bah Banteidor Lyndoh kiba long ki MLA bad MDC jong ka Mawkynrew ba ki dei ruh ban leit jngoh da lade bad theh ruh ka jingiarap kylluid sha katei ka longiing, khamtam ki duk ki suk namar ki dei ki briew jong ki hi.Ka jingkynnoh ka long ruh ia u trai jong katei ka trok, namar ba u lah tip bha ba ka trok jong u ka long kaba lah jot bad ka jingkhang sha ka liang kaba shong utei u samla ka dei kaba lah shu teh tang da u sainar. Kumta, u hap ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh bad un siew ia ka bai lutksan baroh.Ki pulit kiba shimti ia kane ka jingjia ruh ki dei ban kitkhia, lym kumta, na ka liang ka seng kan hap ban leit sha ki bor ba halor,ong ka kyrwoh ba la thoh da ka Khasi, ba la phah da ka kong Kong Irene Hujon, President bad ka Kong Rosetta War, Joint Secretary CSWO.
title: Na khlieh iuh ka trok ia u samla

content: Shillong, 07 Lber:“Ngam shym la leh eiei kaba bakla, la aiti laitluid ha ki pulit ban tohkit iano iano bad ka ain kan leh ia kaba donkam”, la ong u myntri ka tnad kam pohiing ka jylla u Bah Horju Donkupar Roy Lyngdoh haba jubab ia ka jingtainia hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi, halor ka mat kaba iadei bad ka kam thombor ia ki khynnah bad kynthei ha ka jylla.Ha kaba iadei bad ka jingjia ha hotel Marvelenn Inn ba dei trai kiba haiing jongu, u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka sorkar bad ma u, kum u myntri ba peit ia ka tnad pulit ka jylla, um shym la tuklar eiei ia ka jingtohkit jong ki pulit halor kane ka kam ha kaba u MLA ka Mawhati u Bah Julius K Dorphang ruh u la shah kem halor ka jingdonkti ban don bynta ha ka kam leh beijot ia ka khynnah 14 snem.“Nga pynthikna ba mano mano ba donkti ha ka kam, kiba heh ne kiba rit, ka ain kan leh ia kaba donkam”, la ong u Bah HDR Lyngdoh.U la bynrap, ka jingshah kem u MLA uba dei u dkhot ka iing dorbar ka pynpaw ba ka sorkar kam shym la tuklar.Ha kajuh ka por, u la kyntait ia ka jingkynnoh ba leh beijot ia ka khynnah ha hotel u khun jongu ha Rilbong da kaba ong, “Kam dei ka jingshisha ba la leh beijot ha ka hotel ba dei trai kiba haiing jong nga”,.U la sait met ia ka jingkynnoh da kaba ong, “Haba u trai ka taksi u aiti ha u nongniah, un leit tip shano ba u nongniah un kit ia ki runar ha kali bad kumjuh ruh, ka jingjia ha hotel Marvelenn Inn”.U la iathuh ba ka sorkar ka la thung ia ka Fast Track Court ha ki district ban pynsted ban shim bishar ia ki briew kiba donkti ha ka kam thombor ia ki kynthei, nalor la buh ruh ia ka Women Cell ha ki san tylli ki police station ha ka jylla ban peit kyrpang ia ki kam thombor ia ki kynthei.Shwa ia kane u MLA ka Nongkrem u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit u la dawa hapoh ka iing thawain ba u myntri tnad kam pohiing u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u dei ban hiar shuki noh namar ba ka jingjia leh beijot ia ka khynnah 14 snem ka la jia ha ka hotel Marvelenn Inn kaba dei trai kiba haing jongu, khnang ban ailad ia ka jingtohkit kaba khuid.Haba shim bynta halor kane ka mat hapoh ka iing dorbar thaw ain hynne ka sngi ba la wanrah da u MLA ka West Shillong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, u MLA ka Nongkrem u la ong, “u Myntri u dei ban pynshai ia ka jingjia ha ka hotel Marvelenn Inn bad u dei ban hiar shuki noh khnnang ban ailad ia ka jingtohkit kaba laitluid”.U la ong ba ka jingjia shah leh beijot bad shah thombor ki kynthei ha kane ka jylla kaba la pynjngut ia ka ophis ka Raj Bhavan ruh ka la pynjah burom ia ka jylla Meghalaya kaba la bna nam ba ka niew kor bha ia ki kynthei.“Kaei kein kane kaba la jia ha kane ka ri Tip Briew Tip Blei jong ngi”, la ong u Bah Ardent bad kyntu ia ka sorkar ba kan shim khia ban pynthikna ba ki khynnah ki kynthei ha kane ka jylla kin ioh ia ka jingshngain.Katba u Bah Paul Lyngdoh haba wanrah ia kane ka mat ba kyrpang, ula ong ba katkum ka jingkhein ba la ioh na ka tnad pulit, ka jingkharoi ki kam thombor ia ki kynthei ka la pynjah burom shibun eh ia ka jylla.“Nalor u nongthawain u MLA ka Mawhati, u ophisar sorkar ruh u la paw kumba la donkti ha kane kam, da kaba kdew ia u director ka tnad Soil and Water Conservation”, la ong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.U la ong ba ka la dei ka por ia ka sorkar ba kan thaw dur thymmai ia ka tnad pule puthi khnang ban ai ia ka jinghikai ia ki samla kane ka pateng ban saindur ia ka lawei jongki.“Kaba sngewsih ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka la wan shakhmat ban ia ka jylla Utter Pradesh ha ki kam thombor ia ki kynthei”, la ong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.U la ong ba ka nongbah Delhi, Bangaluru bad kiwei ki dei kiba la bna nam ha kam thombor ia ki kynthei ha kaba ki don ki ri kiba la ai jingmaham lypa ia ki nongshnong jongki, haba ki leit sha katei ka jaka kim dei ban iaid marwei bad dei ban husiar. “Ngim kwah ba ka Meghalaya ruh kan long kum kine ki nongbah ka ri India”, la ong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh.“Kane ka khlam kan sar lada ngim leh mynta”, la ong u MLA ka West Shillong.Katba u James K Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban leh da kaba tyngeh ban thaw ia ka ain kaba khlain ia ki nongleh bymman khnang ban pyntieng ia ki. “Lada ka sorkar kam lah ban leh ia kane, khlem pep, ka nongbah Shillong kan long ka nongbah jong ki kam thombor ia ki kynthei kum ka Delhi”, u la ong.
title: Dawa hiar shuki u Bah Ardent  ia u myntri kam pohing

content: Shillong, 07 Lber:U Nongialam liangpyrshah u Dr Donkupar Roy u la ong ba ka jingbym shim khia ka sorkar pdeng bad ka sorkar jylla ban pynbiang ia ki tower mobile ha ki thain khappud, ka la pynlong ia ki paidbah khappud ban pyndonkam da ki SIM Card na Bangladesh.Haba wanrah ia kane ka jingkylli hapoh iing dorbar, u Dr Don u la ong, “Bun ki shnong ha khappud ka India bad Bangladesh ha kaba ka konstitwensi jongu ruh, ki pyndonkam da ki SIM card na Bangladesh bad ka daw ka dei namar ba kim ioh network ki SIM card na India”.U la ong biang, “Wat ki shipai BSF ruh ki don kiba pyndonkam da ka SIM card Bangladesh wat lada ki tip ba ka long beain hynrei kim banse haba kim ioh network”.Katkum ka jingong jong u Dr Don, ka sorkar ka la ai daw ba ka jingbym ailad ia ki network India ha khappud ka long na ka bynta ka jingshngain ka ri.“Ngi la aiti kum ki nongshong shnong ka ri ha khappud na ka bynta ka jingshngain ka ri, ka la dei ruh ia ka sorkar ba kan pyrkhat ia ki nongshong bad kata ka long ban pynbiang ia ki network mobile ha khappud ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah”, u la ong.Ha kawei ka liang, ka myntri ba peit ia ka tnad sam jingtip ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ka la kynnoh ba ka jingbym ioh network sha khappud ka dei ka kam jong ka sorkar pdeng bad ka sorkar jylla kan shu kyrpad.Katkum ka jingong ka kong Ampareen ka kompeni BSNL kam shym la don mobile tower satia ha shnong Mawkliaw, Nongjri ki shnong ba hap ha ka thain khappud bad ka Bangladesh.
title: Ha khappud, kham treikam  ka network Bangla: Dr Don

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Mynta ka step la lap ia ka metiap jong kawei ka longkmie narud surok ha Itshyrwat, ka lynti ban leit sha NEIGRHIMS. La lap ia katei ka metiap ha ka por 5 baje mynstep. Katei ka longkmie kaba don hapdeng ka 30 bad 32 snem karta ka dei kaba shong basah ha Mawprem Bishop Falls. Ia katei ka metiap la lap da ki nongshong shnong jong katei ka shnong bad mar mar ki la pyntip sha ki pulit.Ki pulit ki suba jur ba katei ka longkmie ka la shah batbor bad hadien la pyniap noh ia ka, ia katei ka metiap kaba thiah lyngktar harud surok la lap ba kam don jaiñ don nep shuh. Ia katei ka metiap la pynkit noh sha Civil Hospital ban leh ia ka Post Mortem. Haduh mynta ia katei ka metiap ym pat shym la don kiba wan kam. Ki pulit ki dang tohkit ia katei ka jingjia.Ha ba iakren bad u bah B Rynjah uba long u rangbah shnong ka Mawprem u la iathuh ba katei ka longkmie kadei kaba sah ha Kyrbom ha ïing baduk (MUDA Housing Complex) bad ka don hapdeng ka rta kaba 27 haduh 28 snem bad ka lah don khun bad u rangbah shnong u la iathuh ruh ba mynta um pat lah ban ai ka jingtip kaba bniah namar ba un dang hap ban leit sha katei ka ïing lashai ka sngi.
title: Shah pyniap ka longkmie na Mawprem,  lap ia ka met iap ha Itshyrwat

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Ki nongtrei shipor lane ki Officiate jong ka tnad PWD Road and Building mynta ka sngi ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma bad ia kitei la ialam da ka President jong ka Mahila Congress na kane ka jylla ka kong Joplin Shylla. Katei ka jingiakynduh jong ki ka long ban pynsngew ha u Dr.Mukul ia ka jingeh ba ki ia kynduh namar ka jingshah weng kam kynsan kynsan ha ka sorkar kaba la ktah lut ia ka kam ing ka sem jong ki.Kitei ki nongtrei shipor ka PWD ki la ai ruh da ka jingthoh sha u Dr.Mukul ban pynpaw ba kane ka jingweng kam kynsan kaba tang da ka ktien kaba la pynsngew sha ki ka la treikam tang hapoh ri Lum Khasi bad Jaintia katba ha ri Lum Garo baroh ki nongtrei shipor ki dang trei ia ka kam jong ki.Ki la dawa ruh ba u myntri rangbah u dei ban ailad ia ki ban bteng biang ia ka kam ba ki trei namarba kumba ka long mynta ka snem jong ki ruh ka la heh namarba don na ki kiba la trei la palat ia ka 30 snem kum ki nongtrei shipor hynrei kiba bun hi ki trei palat ia ka 5 snem bad kim lah shuh ban leit trei da kiwei pat ki kam.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u General Secretary jong ka All Meghalaya Officiating Employees PWD Road and Building Association u bah Barristar Roy Thabah u la ong ba ki nongtrei kiba la shah weng kam kynsan ki la palat ia ka 100 ngut bad la weng kam ia ki tang da ka ktien ha u naiwieng, 2015 bad naduh katei ka por kim shym la ioh ia ka tulop ruh kaba shisnem tam.Ka kong Joplin Shylla President Mahila Congress ka la ong ba bun na kitei ki nongtrei ki la pynpep skul noh ia ki khun jong ki ruh namarba ka la ktah ia ka jingioh kamai jong ki.
