Ha katei ka jingialang kaba la wan ban ia shim bynta da ki phew ngut ki nongtrei shipor la donlang ruh u bah D.D Lapang nongaibuit ka sorkar, u Martin M Dango myntri ka tnad PWD bad kiwei pat ki heh sorkar.
title: 100ngut shah weng kam,  ki nongtrei shipor ka PWD

content: Shillong, 08 Lber:Ka Synjuk Ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Bri U Hynniewtrep (SNSBH) ka pynrem jur ia ka jingjia leh beijot bad pyniap dusmon ia kawei ka longkmie kaba na Mawprem, Shillong ha ka miet 06 tarik Lber kumba la paw ha ki lad pathai khubor.Ha ka kyrwoh ba la pynlait mynta ka sngi ka SNSBH ka la ong ba ha kane ka sngi ba kyrpang kaba baroh ryngkat bad ka pyrthei shityllup la rakhe ia ka sngi burom ki kynthei bad burom ia ki kum ka jingai ba kordor jong u Blei ha u khun bynriew.Ka Synjuk ka ai khublei Sngi Burom basuk ia ki kynthei naduh ki khunlung, khynnah, samla, longkmie bad ki tymmen ki kro.Ka Synjuk ka sngewkhia shi kat dei halor ki jingshah rahbor, batbor bad shah pyniap dusmon (khamtam) jong ki khynnah/samla kynthei bad longkmie kiba mih khubor na ka por sha ka por. Kaba sngewtriem bad pynsuhjer shuh shuh ka long ba kum kine ki kam sniew ki iai jia man ka sngi ha ki jaka bapher bapher ka Ri Hynniew trep baieid jong ngi.Ha kajuh ka por ka synjuk ka kwah ruh ban maham ia ki khynnah samla samhoi halor ki jingma jong u drok; uba u la wanrah ia ki jait jingsniew ba har rukom ha kane ka ri.Ka Synjuk ka bynniaw ia ka jinglong jingman ka imlang sahlang mynta bad ka kyrpad ruh ban don ka sneng ka kyntu hala ki rympei, ki kur ki jait bad ki shnong ki thaw ban pynneh pynsah ia ka akor ka burom bad ka tip briew tip blei ba la buh la seng da u mynba rim; khnang ban jop ia kane ka jingeh kaba ia kynduh mynta.Ha kum kane ka saw ka sian jong ka jait bynriew, ka synjuk ka kyntu ia baroh ki Dorbar bad ki nongshong Shnong ban pyrman bad peit bniah ia la ki nongshong shnong. Dei ban adong de ia ki ban leh kino kino ki kam kiba pynthut ia ka suk ka sain bad kiba pynjah burom ia ka shnong ba ki shong ki sah bad ia ka jait bynriew Hynniew Trep baroh kawei.Ka la ong ai ba ka ktien phira jong ka Dorbar Bah ba 30 tarik Jymmang 2015 kaba ong “Kumba hyndai kumjuh lawei namar ka ri ngin long kawei” kan pynshlur ha kane ka por jong ka jingtynjuh. Ka synjuk ka long kaba kloi ban ia trei lang bad kino kino ki Dorbar Shnong ha kaba iadei bad kane ka liang, la ong ka kyrwoh na u Bah R.L.Blah u Genl Secy ka SNSBH.
title: Pynrem jur ka SNSBH  ba shah pyniap ka longkmie

content: Shillong, 08 Lber:U Myntri ka general administration u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka national population registration (NPR) ka iadei beit bad u Aadhaar number bad ka sorkar ka dang pynkhreh ban sdang biang ban leit register hadien ba la pynbit pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam.U Bah HDR Lyng-doh u la ong ia kane haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongkrem u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit mynta ka sngi hapoh ka iing dorbar.U Bah HDR u la ong haduh mynta ka jingdon jong ki briew kiba la rejister ha ka National Population Register Biometric ha kane ka jylla ka la long tang 10 percent. “Ka jingpynrung kyrteng ia ki nongshong shnong ha ka jylla la pynkut noh da ka sorkar pdeng ia ka agency kaba leh ia kane ha ka 31 tarik Nohprah 2016 bad na kata ka daw, la pynsangeh shwa ia kane ka kam shipor”, la ong u Bah HDR.Ka jingpynrung kyrteng kan sa sdang biang hadien ba ka sorkar pdeng kan thung ia ka agency ba thymmai na ka bynta kane ka kam, u la bynrap.Ha kajuh ka por, u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la kyntait ia ka kam ba ki paidbah kim pdiang ban leh ia u Aadhaar da kaba ong, “Mynta ki paidbah ka jylla ki la sdang ban pdiang ia u Aadhaar”.U la ong ba kane ka jingsdang jong ki paidbah ban pdiang ka dei hadien ba ka bor sorkar ka la pynlong ia ka jingpynshai bad ban pynsngewthuh ia u paidbah sha kylleng ki jaka bad ki shnong.Halor ka jingkylli u MLA na Rambrai ba ki paidbah ka West Khasi kim pat pdiang ia u Aadhaar, u Bah HDR u la ong, lada donkam ka sorkar kan sa pynlong biang ia ka jingpynshai paidbah halor kane.
title: U NPR u iadei bad u Aadhaar  number, ong u myntri

content: Shillong, 7 Lber:Katba dang iaid lynti ban leit sha Maw-tajuh -Khad-Ar Shnong haba la poi ha ka jaka ban rung sha ka shnong Kshaid (12 Shnong) une u nongthohkhubor u la iohi ba ka don ka jingtwa khyndew kaba la jur bha ha kaba ki mawbah, maw rit bad ka khyndew kaba la twa ka la khang lynti sbuk ia ka surok ban kiew sha ka Shnong Kshaid kaba hap ban iaid lyngba ka shnong War-War.Une u nongthohkhubor u la kylli na ki briew jong katei ka thaiñ, shaphang katei ka jingjia bad ki la iathuh ba ka la jia la jan dap shibnai mynta; hynrei haduh mynta ki bor sorkar kim pat leit ban pynkhih lane ban weng ia katei ka twa kaba la khang sbak ia ka surok ban rung hapoh shnong.Ki briew jong katei ka thain ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewsih namarba ki bor ba dei peit kim shym la shimkhia ban weng noh ia katei ka jingeh u paidbah bad ki la kren iam rem da kaba ong ba ki dei ki nongkyndong ym don ba phai khmat sha ki.Uwei na ki rangbah haba kren bad u nongthohkhubor u la ong ba bunsien la ju iohi ba haba don kino kino ki jingjia twa khyndew ha ki jaka sor ne khapsor la ju iohi ba mar-mar tang da ki minit ne kynta la phah ia ki puh shilum ban leit pynkhuid bad pyllait lynti, hynrei katei ka jingjia hangtei ka la jia la shibnai mynta hynrei ym don ba phai khmat satia.
title: Shibnai sahkut ka twa hapdeng surok, ym don ba pynkhih

content: Shillong, 8 Lber:Ki pulit jong ka nongbah Shillong, ki la pyntip ba kito kiba leit jingiaseng Synod Sepngi ha Mawlai Umshing, ha ka 12tarik Lber 2017, kim dei ban ia kit palat pud ha ki kali leit jingiaseng bad ba kim dei ruh ban shong jingiaseng, ha jrong prah jong ki trok. Ki pulit, kin nym shah ba kiba kum kitei ki kali, na ka bynta ka jingsuk ka leit ka wan ia baroh, ong ka khubor na U Bah M Kharkrang, Superintendent of Police, East Khasi Hills.Lah ban pynkynmaw, ba dang ar taiew mynshwa, kawei ka trok, ka la kylla ha ka lynti leit jingiaseng Synod sha Nonglang, ha kaba ka la kit briew kumba 70ngut tam eiei bad kaba la pyniap ia 19ngut ki briew haduh mynta bad sa bun kiba dang mynsaw jur ha Hospital.
title: Kali leit iaseng, wat thep  khapngiah, maham ki pulit

content: Nongstoiñ, 8 Lber:Ka seng Khasi Student Union West Khasi Hills District Unit, ka la leit ban ia kynduh ia u Deputy Commissioner ka West Khasi Hills, u Arun Kumar Kembhavi ban dawa pyntreikam noh ia ka ia ka khyrdop rung bad mih ha Athiabari.Katkum ka kyrwoh khubor ba la phah da u samla Ellen Syiemlieh Education secretary KSU Nongstoin Circle, la ong ba na ka liang jong ka seng.Ha katei ka jingleit kynduh DC ka la buh ruh ia ka jingthoh ban kyrpad ia u DC ba un kham pynkloi noh ia katei ka kam, namar ba ia katei la dep ban ai jingmynjur hi da ka sorkar ha kine ki snem ba ladep bad kumba ka long ha kiwei kiwei ki District jong ka Jylla ia kitei ki khyrdop rung bad mih la dep ban pyntreikam bad ka la iaid shait shait katba hapoh West Khasi Hills, ka dang sahkut.Shuh shuh la ong ruh ba ka seng ka la ai jingmut ia u DC ba lada don kano kano ka jingeh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingshim jaka, ba ki dei dei ban wad noh shawei ia ki jaka khnang ba ka kam kan nym sahkut ka kam.Ha kajuh ka por ka seng, ka la pynpaw ruh ba katkum ka jing thmu jong ka sorkar ka jaka ba mut ban buh ia katei ka khyrdop ka long ha Athiabari lane Kamriangsih hynrei kitei baroh ar jaka kim da long ki jaka kiba biang namar ba ha kitei ki ar jaka dang don ruh ki lad ki lynti ban ioh rung ioh mih bad ka seng ka la ong ba dei ban buh ha ki jaka kiba bit ba biang khnang ba ka jingthmu buh khyrdop kan long kaba sei soh.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta na ka liang jong u DC u la ong ba ka jingeh ba ka sorkar ka ia kynduh mynta ka long namar ba ka khyndew kam dei ka jong ka sorkar, hynrei ia ka jaka ba la thmu ban buh ia katei ka khyrdop hapoh Athiabari ka dei hapoh ka jingpeit jong ka KHADC, kumta u la ong ba ka donkam ruh ban hap iaid lyngba ka KHADC.Ha kawei pat ka bynta na ka liang jong ka seng ka la ai jingthoh ruh ban tyrwa ia ka Kyrshai ruh kum kawei na ki khyrdop rung bad mih, namar hadien habud, ynda la shna ia ka surok Nongstoin Rambrai Kyrshai kan sa kylla long kum kawei na ki lynti heh ban rung ban mih na ka Jylla Meghalaya sha ka Jylla Assam bad ha kajuh kapor ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ia ka jingeh namar ka jingpynslem jong ka sorkar ban siew dep noh ia ka bai jaka, sha ki trai khyndew ban shna ia katei ka surok bah.Na ka liang jong u DC ha kaba iadei pat bad katei ka bynta u la kular ba un sa shim khia ban siew lut noh baroh bad u la dep ruh ban wad jingtip bad buh ruh ia ka jingkylli na ka ka regional ophis kaba don ha sorbah Guwahati halor ka jingpynslem ia katei ka jingsiew sha ki trai khyndew, ong ka kyrwoh.
title: Kwah khohreh ka KSU, ki jaka talasi mynder ha Athiabari

content: Tura, 9 Lber:U nongialam jong ka Garo National Liberation Army (GNLA) uba bat ia ka kam Foreign Secretary u la wan pyndem noh ialade mynta ka sngi hakhmat ki pulit. Utei u nongialam ka GNLA u dei uba la tip kyrteng kum u Briyan R Marak bad uba ju khot sin kum u Millam (40 snem karta) na Tura Ringregittim, West Garo Hills, u la wna pyndem hakhmat ki pulit South Garo Hills ha ka por 10 baje mynstep ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u DC ka SGH u Shella N Marak, SP Abraham T Sangma, ki nongialam niam bad ki sengbhalang. Utei u GNLA u la rung ha katei ka seng ha ka 30 tarik u lber, 2011.U la iathuh ba hadien ar taiew ba u la rung sha katei ka seng la phah ia u sha Bangladesh bad ka por kaba bun u la pynlut ha Bangladesh. Ka kam jong u ha katei ka seng ka dei ban ia kren bad kiwei pat ki seng lehnoh ban pynioh ia ki tiar siat bad kiwei pat ki jingdonkam. U la shah kem ha ki pulit Bangladesh ha ka 15 tarik u nohprah, 2012 namar ka jingryngkang pud bad u la shong phatok kumba 10 bnai.
title: Wan pyndem u nongialam ka GNLA

content: Shillong, 9 Lber:Ka Shnong Lad-mawreng, Mawkalum bad na kiwei dei ki Shnong kiba marjan ki la mad ia ki jingeh ba ki hap ban thied ia ka Umdih umbam ha ka dor T.900/- man la ka sngi mynta la palat ar Taiew tam tang na ka daw ka jing leh bym suit niew jong ka tnad PHE bad ka Company BSC ba shna ia ka Surok ar kali na Ladmawreng shaduh 7th Mile, Upper Shillong.Halor kane ka phang, ki Dkhot jong ka FKJGP Upper Shillong Circle hapoh ka jingialam jong u President, Samla Kitboklang Nongphlang mynta ka sngi, ki la leit ban ka jingleit jurip kyndit ban lap ia ki jingshisha baroh. Haba kren sha ki lad pathai khubor na ka liang jong u Samla Kitboklang Nongphlang, President FKJGP Upper Shillong Circle u la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ha shwa ban sdang ia ka jingtrei ban shna ia ka surok, na ka liang jong ka PHE Department, ka la dei ban ia pynbeit lypa lyngba ka jing ia sngewthuh jing mut bad ka BSC Company khnang ba ki paidbah nong shong shnong kin ym mad ia ka jing kyrduh um namar kiba bun ki Nong Shong Shnong ki dei kiba im kamai jakpoh da ka kam rem kam riang bad ha kiwei pat ki kam bylla sngi. Mynta tang na ka daw ka jing leh bym suit niew jong ka tnad PHE bad ka Company BSC ki paidbah ki hap ban thied ia ka um ha ka dor T.900 bad kane ka la iaid mynta la palat ar taiew tam.U Samla Kitboklang Nongphlang u la ong ba ka FKJGP kam pyrshah ia ka jingshna surok iaid ar kali, lane ia kino kino ki kam pynroi, hynrei u la ong pat ba lyngba kata ka jing wan jong ki kam pynroi kam dei pat ban pynlong sohpdung ia ki paidbah nong shong shnong. U samla Kitboklang Nongphlang u la dawa na ka PHE Department ba kadei ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam baroh hapoh shitaiew bad lada katei ka jing dawa jong ka Seng kam seisoh na ka liang jong ka FKJGP kam banse ban shim da kiwei pat ki lad ki lynti na ka bynta ka bit ka biang jong ki paidbah nong shong shnong.Ha katei ka jing leit jurip kynsan jong ka FKJGP Upper Shillong Circle la ia don ryngkat ruh u Rangbah Shnong jong ka Shnong Lad Mawreng u Bah Jores Sun, ki dkhot jong ka Committee Shnong lem bad ki Dkhot jong ka KSU Upper Shillong Circle bala ialam da u Samla Shngainlang Sohkhlet, President KSU Upper Shillong Circle.Na ka liang jong u Bah Jores Sun, Rangbah Shnong Ladmawreng u la pynpaw ia ka jing bynniaw halor ka jing leh bym suidniew jong ka PHE Department bad ka Company BSC kaba buh jingeh ia ki Paidbah Nong Shong Shnong ha kaba u la kyntu ia ka Tnad ka PHE Department ba ka dei ban Shimkhia khnang ba ki paidbah kin ym mad ia ka jing jynjar. Haba bynrap ha ka jingiakren bad ki Lad Pathai khubor na ka liang jong u Samla Shngainlang Sohkhlet, President KSU Upper Shillong Circle u la ong ba na ka Liang jong ka KSU Upper Shillong Circle ruh kin sa shimkhia ban bud dien ia kane ka kam ban leit iakren bad u Executive Engineer PHE bad kumjuh ruh ia ki Nong pyniaid jong ka BSC Company ban weng mardor ia kine ki jingeh baroh kaba ki Paidbah Nong Shong Shnong ki iakynduh, ha kajuh ka por u la ong ruh ba na ka liang jong ki Ar Seng (KSU & FKJGP) Ngin ai por Hapoh shitaiew ia ka PHE Department bad ka Company BSC ba kidei ban shimkhia ia kane ka kam hashwa ba kum ki Seng Bhalang ngin shim da kiwei pat ki Sienjam.
title: Na ka surok ar kali, shongdor  T.900 ka um ha Ladmawreng

content: Shillong, 09 Lber:U Myntri ka tnad sam ding ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar u la pyntip hapoh ka iing dorbar ba ka Meghalaya Energy Corpration Limited (MeECL) ka dang dei ban siew ram haduh T. 527.07 klur ban siew sha ki kompeni sam ding bapher bapher kiba ka jylla ka thied bad kane ka dei haduh ka 2 tarik Lber, 2017. Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongthymmai u Dr Jemino Mawthoh hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi, u myntri u la ong, “Ka ram ba hap ban siew ha na North Eastern Eletric Power Corporation Limited (NEEPCO) bad kiwei ki kompeni sam ding ka sorkar pdeng, ka la kot sha ka T. 527.07 klur haduh u Lber mynta u snem”.U la ong ba ka sorkar jylla ka la shim bun ki lad ki lynti ban pynkhuid noh ia kane ka ram bad kawei na kine, ka long ba ka sorkar jylla ka la kubur ban long kum ka nongbahkhlieh na ka bynta ban shim ram T. 325 klur na ka Power Finance Corporation (PFC) ka sorkar pdeng ban siew ia kane ka ram sha ki kompeni.“Ia kane ka pisa la siew sha ka NEEPCO ha ka 21 tarik Noprah, 2016 kum shi bynta ban pynkhuid ia ka ram”, la ong u Myntri. Kawei pat ka sienjam ba ka sorkar ka la pyrshang ban pynsting ia ka jingban khia ka ram ia ka MeECL ka long ban shim bynta ban pyntreikam ia ka skhim ka sorkar pdeng ka Ujwal DISCOM Assurance Yojana (UDAY).U la ong ba ka daw ka jinghiran ka tnad MeECL ka dei na ka jingoh da ka dor kaba tad ia ki nongthang ding, bad kane ka dor ka dei kaba rit tam ha India bad namar kane, ka sorkar ka la hap ban buria na kaba thied ia ka ding na kiwei ki kompeni bad die pat ha ka dor kaba kham tad sha ki paidbah.Kawei pat ka jingeh ba ka MeECL ka dei ka jingbym siew thikna ki kompeni ia ka bai thang ding bad u la jer kynthup ia ka MCCL T. 8 klur, ka Cyprakash kaba khlem siew T. 35klur, RMB T. 5 klur, bad kiwei.U la ong ba ka MeECL ka la phah jingthoh man ka por sha kine ki kompeni ba kin siew ia ka bai thang ding hynrei kim kohnguh bad ka sorkar shen kan sa shim kam ban pynshitom.
title: T. 527 klur hap siew ram ka  MeECL ha ki kompeni sam ding

content: Shillong, 9 Lber:Ha kine ki khyndiat ka UDP ka la shong jingialang khah khah namar ki kam KHADC bad haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor la pyntip na ka por sha ka por ba ka jingialang ka dei ban pyrkhat halor ka kynrum kynram ha KHADC kiba katei ka seng ka pyrshah ia ka rukom treikam u CEM ka KHADC u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem. Wat la u bah Pynshngaiñ u la kob ba shuwa ba ka UDP kan leit ujor sha u Lat halor ki 9 tylli ki mat ka dei ban weng noh ialade na ka PDF hynrei ka UDP kam shym la leh kumta bad ka la ong ba kan ujor sha u Lat ka jylla bad dang shen ka la ong ba kan ap ia ka jingtohkit ka House Committee ba la thaw da ka ing dorbar.Hynrei kiwei pat ki lad khubor kiba jan bha bad katei ka seng ki la iathuh ba la don katto katne ngut ki nongialam kiba kwah ba ka UDP kan weng noh na ka PDF hynrei la don pat ka jingiatyngkhuh para nongialam ha kaba don ki nongialam kiba kwah ban weng bad don ruh ki bym kwah ban weng. La ong ruh ba don napdeng ki MDC kiba byrngem ban phet seng lada weng noh na ka PDF, la ong ba dei na katei ka daw ba ka UDP ka shem jingeh ban shim rai bad ka hap ban shong jingialang khah khah ban pyn wandur ia ki jingiakren.Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ka UDP ka la don jingthmu ban shimti noh ia ka kam nongialam ha KHADC hynrei ka jingeh kaba ki ia kynduh ka dei ba kim don ia ka nombar kaba biang lada jia ba kim treh ban ia treilang bad ka seng Congress kaba don 6 ngut ki MDC. La iathuh ruh ba ka ka la don ruh ka jingiakren ha ka jingialang jong ka ba lada yn ia treilang bad ka seng Congress kumno kan sei ia ki nia ki jutang jong ka sha u paidbah ha ka elekshon 2018 ban iada ialade na ki jingshah kynthoh lada treilang bad ka Congress kaba synshar ia ka jylla.
title: Lum jingialang khah khah  ka UDP, ba khynra MDC ka PDF

content: Jowai, 9 Lber:Uwei u briew u la duhnoh ia la ka jingim ba kordor jong u hadien ba u waiar light High Tension u la dkut ban hap sha madan, ha kaba utei u briew u ba iaid lynti tang da ki kjat suda khlem phong juti u la kum iuh ia utei u waiar hapdeng ka jingdum jong ka miet bad shah bat noh ha ka bording haduh ba un da khlad noh hashen.Kane ka jingjia ka la jia ha Nongchen ha lynti sha Dawki hynnin ka meit bad utei u rangbah uba la duh noh ia la ka jingim ba kordor la tip kyrteng kum u Mel Pohchen (52).
title: Shah bat elektrik uwei ha Amlarem

content: Shillong, 09 Lber:U MLA ka Mawthengkut u Bah Witting Mawsor u la pyrshah jur ia ka jingbuh ka sorkar, ia ar tylli ki jaka jingkieng thew (weighbridge) ha Mawpun ha kajuh surok Shallang-Athiabari ha West Khasi Hills bad kata ruh tang hapdeng ka jingjngai kaba 12 km.Haba buh ia ka jingkylli ia kane, u Bah Mawsor hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi, ula ong ba kane ka jingleh ka sorkar, ym lah ban pdiang namar ba hajuh ka surok kan don ar tylli ki jaka thew bad u la dawa ba dei ban rah noh shawei pat sha khappud ka Meghalaya bad ka Assam.“Lada ka sorkar kam kynriah noh ia ka jingkieng thew na Mawpun, ngan ujor sha ka High Court”, la maham u Bah Mawsor.Haba jubab halor kane, na ka liang u myntri ka tnad ka kit ka bah u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la kyntait ha kaba nyngkong ban pdiang ia ka jingdawa u MLA ka Mawshynrut da kaba ong ba ia kane ka jingkieng thew la ioh bor na ka National Green Tribunal (NGT) hynrei kham hadien u la ong ba sorkar kan bishar biang ia kane ka jingkyrpad u Bah Mawsor.U Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la iathuh ba ka sorkar ka la ai wai shi snem ia katei ka jingkieng thew ha ka dor T. 90 lak ha u riew shimet bad ka dor ban khrong na kawei ka trok kit dewiong ka long T. 200.
title: Ujor u Bah Witting ba don ar tylli,  ki jingkieng thew ha kajuh ka surok

content: Shillong, 09 Lber:Ka Myntri ba peit ia ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka jylla ka Kong Roshan Warjri ka la ong ba ka jingslem ban pyntreikam ia ka skhim iarap ia ki nongpang ne ka Megha Health Insurance Scheme (MHIS) ha kane ka bynta kaba lai (PhaseIII) ka dei namar ba ka sorkar ka hap ban khot biang ia ka tender haduh lai sien namar ba ki kompeni ba shim bynta kim shym la biang ban jied ban pyntreikam ia kane ka skhim.Katkum ka jingong ka Myntri hapoh ka iing dorbar thawain mynta ka sngi, ka jingsangeh kane ka skhim ka long naduh 31 tarik Risaw 2016 haduh mynta.Ka Kong Roshan ka la pyntip ba kane ka skhim kan sa treikam noh la kumno kumno lashem snem namar ba mynta ia ka tender la dep pynbiang bad kaba sah ka long ban ioh ia ka jingmynjur na ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar pdeng, kaba shong mynta hi ka sngi.“Ka bynta balai (Phase III) jong kane ka skhim la kumno kumno kan treikam noh naduh u bnai ban wan tangba kito ki bnai ba la sangeh ym lah ban leh eiei”, la ong ka myntri.Ka la iathuh ba ka daw ka jingdonkam ban hap ap ia ka jingpdiang ka sorkar pdeng ka long ba ha kane ka skhim MHIS, la pyniasoh lang bad ka RSBY ka sorkar pdeng ha kaba ka jingbei pisa ka long 90 percent na ka sorkar pdeng bad 10 percent na ka sorkar jylla.Ka la pyntip ruh ha iing dorbar ba kane ka skhim ka ai jingiarap haduh T. 2.8 lak ia kito ki briew kiba ioh ia ka jingpang ba kham jynjar kum ka jingpang bampong.Ha kajuh ka por, ka la ong ba kan leh ia kaba donkam lada ki kompeni kiba ioh ban pyntreikam ia kane ka skhim kim siew ia ka pisa ha ka por kaba biang sha ki bor pyniaid ki hospital ba kin siew pat sha ki nongpang.Shwa ia kane, haba wanrah ia ka jingkylli, u Dr Donkupar Roy u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynthaw lad ban buria ia kito ki briew kiba thiah pang hapdeng kine ki bnai ba la pynsangeh ia kane ka skhim namar ba ka jingpynsangeh kynsan ia ka naduh u bnai Risaw haduh mynta ka la ktah jur ia ki nongpang khamtam kiba duk.Kumjuh u MLA ka Mairang u Bah Metbah Lyngdoh u la kyntu ia ka myntri ba kan pynthikna ba ka jingpynrung kyrteng ia ki nongkyndong kan long kaba salonsar khlem da niew shiliang namar ba ka jingpynrung kyrteng ha ka bynta kaba nyngkong bad kaba baar, kam long kaba biang.
title: 3 sien pynsangeh ka sorkar  ia ka tender MHIS, ong ka Myntri

content: Shillong, 09 Lber:U MLA ka Nongthymmai u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u la kynnoh ba katkum ka jingtip jongu, ia ki kam nongap khyrdop, timekeeper, bad enforcement la shu thung pathar ha ka tnad Transport ka jylla da u myntri ba peit ia kane ka tnad.Haba wanrah ia kane ka jingkylli hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi, u Dr Mawthoh u la ong, “Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum, ia ki timekeeper, enforcement checker bad ki gate chowkidar la shu thung thurmur da u Myntri ka tnad transport”,. U MLA ka Nongthymmai u la ong ba kane ka jingleh kan dei ka nuksa kaba sniew bha namar ba lashai lada wan myntri da uwei pat un sa kyndang naphang ia kine kiba la shu thung pathar mynta bad hangta kan don ka jingeh ia ki.U la ong ba kaba bha tam ia ka sorkar ka dei ban aiti ha ka District Selection Committee (DSC) ba kan pyniaid ia ka eksam khnang ban lait na ka jingeh namar ba ia kine la shu thung tang 89 sngi bad hadien kata, ki lah ban pynthymmai.Hynrei haba jubab ia kane ka jingkylli, u myntri ka tnad u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la kyntait ba kan don ka jingthungkam pathar bad u la ong ba kam don satia kaba kum kata. U la ong ba ka jingthungkam la leh katkum ka rukom leh. Ha kajuh ka por, u la ong ba un sa peit ia kane ka mat katkum ka jingtip ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongthymmai.
title: Thung kam pathar u Myntri  ha Transport, ong u Dr Mawthoh

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u la kular ba ka sorkar kan iakhun tyngeh pyrshah ia ka jingma na u drok kaba la long ka daw ka jingkharoi ki kam sniew ha ka imlang sahlang khamtam ia ki samla kaba la wanrah ia ka jingshong syier ia ki kynthei khynnah ha ka nongbad bad ka jylla.Haba jubab mynta ka sngi ha iing dorbar halor ka jingiatai halor ka jingkren u Lat ka jylla, u Dr Mukul Sangma, u la ong “Ngin pynthikna ba kane ka jylla kam dei ka ktem ban shong ki kam sniew”.U la ong ba ka sorkar kan pynkhlain ia ka tnad ka koit ka khiah ha kaba u Inspector u dei ban leit jurip sha ki jaka ne dukan die dawai bad lada lap ba ki pynkhein ia ka ain, yn pynshitom namar ba bun ki dawai ba long drok la die beain na ki dukan die dawai ne pharmacy.“Bun ki dukan die dawai kim don wat tang ia ka license ruh”, la ong u Dr Mukul.Ha ka jingjubab kaba jrong bha da kaba ktah bun ki phang ba la maitphang ha ka jingiatainia halor ka jingkren u Lat, u Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba kane ka sorkar ka thong ka long ban wanrah bad ban pynneh ia ka suk ka sain ha ka jylla.U la ong ba ha kaba iadei bad ka jingai jingiarap ia ki dkhot ka ANVC-B, ka sorkar ka la mang T.2.37 klur sha ki 139 ngut ki dkhot hynrei napdeng kine, tang 11 ngut kiba biang ka bank account, bad 54 ngut kiba phah pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam ha kaba iadei bad ka bank account bad kiwei pat kim shym la leh eiei.U la ong ba ka sorkar ka la pyntreikam shaid shai ban shna ia ki skul na ka skhim Asian Development Bank (ADB) ha ka jylla bad ka la jied 117 tylli bad bun kiba la pyntreikam ban shna ia ki skul bad ki don sa tang katto katne kiba dang thmu ban khot tender.U la ong ba ka sorkar kan buh ruh ia ka College of Commerce ha Mawphlang bad ka College of Science ha South Garo Hills nalor ka Engineering College ha Shillong bad ka Architect College ha Tura. “Ka daw ba ka sorkar ka thmu ban seng ia kine ki jaka pule ka long ban pynthikna ba ki samla na kane ka jylla kim dei ban leit shabar hynrei ki dei ban don ha kane ka jylla, ban plie lad ia ki”, u la ong.Kumjuh u la maitphang ia ka jingdonkam ban pynbha ia ki mar rep kum ka jingpynphriang ia ki nongrep ban thung ia u dien agar, ka sohtrun namar ba kine ki don ka kynja dawai katkum ka jinglap ka saian bad kan long ka jingmyntoi shibun ia ki nongrep bad wat ia ki samla ban shim ia ka kam rep kaba ioh nong.Halor ka tnad kam jngohkai, u Dr Mukul u la iaroh ia ka Mawphunlur kaba don ha syntai lum u Mawthadraishan ka West Khasi Hills, kum ka jaka kaba itynnad tam ha ka pyrthei. “Nga la poi ha Mawphanlur, ka dei ka jaka kaba itynnad tam ha ka pyrthei”, ula ong.U la bynrap, “Ha ka por ba nga leit jngoh ha katei ka jaka, ngam kwah shuh ban hiar shapoh namar ba ka long kaba itynnad tam”.Halor ka jingbym iohkam bym ioh jam ki samla, u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la rai ban pynlong ia ka jingpynrung kam haka tnad Home Guard ka jylla kumba 300 tylli ki kam bad sa ka kam pulit ban sa pynbna lashem snem la kumno kumno 2000 tylli bad kane kan long ka kabu ia ki samla ban iakhun ia kine ki kam.
title: Ka Mawphanlur kaba itynnad  tam ha ka pyrthei,ong u Dr Mukul

content: Shillong, 9 Lber:Ka la pynkyndit ia kawei ka longing ha ka shnong Kut, ka shnong kaba jngai kumba 7 kilomitar na Mawryng-kneng kaba don hajan ka shnong Puriang haba ka tnad MeECL ka la pynpoi ia ka bai thang ding lane ka Bill kaba haduh T.48 hajar tyngka. Ka dei ruh ka sien ba nyngkong ba ka MeECL ka la pynpoi bai thang ding sha katei ka longing kaba la thang-ding la 10 snem tam. Katei ka dei ka iing jong ka kong Bakorlang Lawai, katei ka longkmie ka la iathuh ba ka la ring bording ha u snem 2006 bad kam ju poi bill dei tad ha u 2016 ba la pynpoi ia ka bill kaba haduh T.48 hajar tyngka. Ka la iathuh ba T.48 hajar tyngka la eh than ban siew ia ka bill bad kumta ha ka jingbym kot bor kam shym la siew shuh bad ki bor ka MeECL ki la wan ot noh ia ka bording na ing jong ka, hynrei kaba sngewphylla ba katei ka longkmie ka la iathuh ba ka long ba hadien ba la dep ot ia ka bording la shisnem tam ruh ka dang wan poi hi sa kawei pat ka bill kaba haduh T.52 hajar tyngka.Don pat ki longkmie kiba la iathuh ba katei ka shnong ka la ioh bording ha u snem 2006 bad naduh katei ka por ba ioh ding ka bill kam ju poi tikna, don kiba ioh bill shisien lai bnai bad don ruh kiba ioh shisien shisnem, ki la iathuh ba ia ka bill ruh la pynpoi sha ing khlem da wan peit ia u mitar katno ka poi hynrei la shu khein antad naba shong bad la pynpoi beit ia ka bill sha ing. Namarba kiba bun ki nongshong shnong katei ka shnong ki dei kiba duk kiba bun ki la shah ot noh bad ki la shah pynduh bording, hynrei wat hadien ba la pynduh ding ruh don na ki, kiba dang poi bill bad don pat ki bym poi shuh. Namar katei ka jingleh thur mur ka tnad MeECL haduh kumba 60 tylli ki longing na katei ka shnongkaba don kumba 300 tnum ing ki la shah ot bording. La iathuh ba kitei ki longïing ki pyndonkam da ka domestic kaba bun eh hynriew tylli ki bulb ki thang.Halor katei ka jingjia, ki nongialam ka Aam Aadmi Party ( AAP) ki la leit ban jurip sha katei ka shnong ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u sordar u bah Chestarwell Sohtun.U Adviser katei ka seng u bah Ukit Uriah u la kynthah jur ia ka sorkar da kaba ong ba kine baroh ka dei namar ka jingniew beiñ bad ka jingiehbeiñ ka sorkar ia ki nongkyndong ha kaba u la ong ba katei ka jia ym tang ha ka bording hynrei ha kiba bun ki liang naduh ki skul, ka umbam, ka koit ka khiah bad kiwei pat ki kam pynroi. Ha katei ka sngi kiwei pat ki nongialam ka AAP kiba la donlang ki kynthup ia u bah Peter Dohkrut na ka Legal Cell, u bah Dedrit Binong bad u bah Philip Kharsati.U Sordar katei ka shnong u bah Chestar Sohtun u la ong ba na ka bor shnong ki la leit ban ia kren na ka por sha ka por bad ki nongmihkhmat jong ka Mawryngkneng konstitwensi hynrei u la ong ba ka jingiakren ka shu kut beit tang ha ka ‘Ngan Sa’. Ki nongshong shnong ki la khñium ruh halor ka jingtorti ban pynieng u nar ilektrik bad ki transformer bad kane la ong ba kam jia tang ha ka shnong Kut hynrei la ong ba ka jai ruh ha ka shnong Puriang. Ha ka jingleit jurip ki nongialam ka AAP ki la lap ba bun na ki longing kiba la shah ot bording ki ioh pdiang ia ka bill kaba naduh T.20 haduh T.55 hajar tyngka manla u bnai. U bah Peter Dohkrut Secretary Legal Cell u la pyntip ruh ba ka ing Asha jong ka tnad National Rural Health Commission ka la mad ia katei ka juh ka jingjia.
title: Shah ot bording 60 tylli ki longïing  ha Kut, poi bill hadien 10 snem

content: Nongstoiñ, 10 Lber:Ka jingnang jingstad ha Kane ka juk kaba mynta ka long kaba donkam haduh katta katta, bad kiba bun na ki kmie ki kpa na ki thain nong-kyndong ruh kila sdang ban sngewthuh ia ka jingkordor jong ka jingpule bad kila iabeh ban phah iala ki jong ki khun ki kti sha ki skul khang ba kin ioh ia ka jingnang jingstad khlem da khein watla ka skul ka long tang ha I iing skum.Katei ka pawshai ha ka shnong Nongjyndiang kawei na ki shnong kyndong kaba don ha ka thain West Khasi Hills, ha kaba ka skul Persara Uppet Primary School kala ialeh shitom ban sam ia ka jingnang jingstad sha ki khynnah katei ka shnong tang ha i iing skum bad katei ka skul kala mad shisha ia ki jingeh namar ka jingbym don ia ka iing skul kaba bit ba biang.Hadien ba ka seng Khasi Student Union West Khasi Hills District Unit ka la iohi ia ki jingeh ba katei skul kala ia kynduh na ka liang jong ka seng kala pyrshang ban leh ia ka kam kaba bha eh na ka byntn ban pyntei syndon da ka iing skul kaba thymmai lyngba ka jingianoh synniang lem na ki para dkhot jong ka seng. Shuh shuh hadien ka jingianoh synniang lem da ki para dkhot jong ka seng KSU ia ka iing skul ba thymmai jong katei ka skul la ioh ban plie paidbah noh hynne ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew da ka Khasi Student Union sengkmie bad West Khasi Hills District Unit.U president barim ka KSU sengkmie haba ai jingkren ha ka jingialang ba lyngkot kaba la long ha katei ka sngi u la ong ba ka jaitbynriew jongngi ka dang bun ki jingeh jingduna bad lada ngi phai khmat tang sha ka sorkar lehse kan dier palat ka por ha kaba ki heprit ki jongngi ki lah ban iehnoh ia ki jingpule ki jongki namar ba kim don ia ki jaka pule ki ba biang.Shim ia kane ka khyllipmat ba mynta ba hapoh ka jingialam u samla Lambok Marngar, President ba thymmai ka KSU sengkmie yn lah ban sei shuh shuh ban pynmih ia ki skul ki ban long ki jingkyrkhu ia ka ia ka ri bad jairtbynriew baroh kawei, ong u Bah Daniel u ba la ai mynsiem ruh ia ki nonghikai da kaba ong ba ka ka jinglen lade jong ki nonghikai kan ym long sepei hynrei u Blei trai kynrad un kyrkhu iaki bad ka iing ka sem jongki ha man la ki bynta ka jingim jongki.Katba na ka liang jong u samla Lambok Marngar President ka KSU u la ong ba ka jinglah ban pynieng ia kane ka skul ka dei na ka jingtrei shitom jong ki para dkhot kiba la ieng skhem ban pynurlong ia kane ka thong, u la ong ruh ba ai ba kane kan long kum ki maw bynna ki ban long ki sakhi hadien habud bad shim ia kane kum ka umpohliew na kabynta kine ki hep kiba rit ba kin dih bad tei ia ka jingpyrkhat pyrdain nangne shakhmat. Lada ka jingnang jingstad kam ioh ban suhthied ha ki hep kiba rit jongngi , nga sngew ban ong ba ka jaitbynriew ka sa nang hiar dor na ka sngi sha ka ngi, u la ong.
title: Noh synniang ka KSU, ioh ka Persara ka iing skul thymmai

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:U MLA ka West Shillong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ujor ha ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi ia ka jingkynrei u drok ha ka thain Mawprem bad ha ka nongbah Shillong kaba la pyntroin shoin ia ka jingim jong ki samla.Haba shim bynta ha ka jingiatainia halor ka jingkren jong u Lat ka jylla, u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba u drok u kham ma shibun ban ia ki kam lehnoh.“Ka jingioh suk ia ki jingdih drok ha ka nongbah ka long kaba ma shi katdei eh kaba la ialam ia ki samla ban ngat ha u shrip jong u drok hynrei kaba sngew lyngngoh ka long ba ki pulit kim ju ioh kem ia ki briew ba donkti ha kane kam ba shyrkhei”, la ong u Bah Paul.U la ong ba u drok u jubor bha wat ha ka thain Mawprem kaba u mihkhmat bad ka dorbar shnong ka la khuslai shibun ia kane.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Paul, u drok u dei ka daw jong ka jingmih ki kam sniew ba shyrkhei ha ka nongbah Shillong haduh ba ki khynnah kynthei, ki kynthei ki la shong syier thot thot namar ka jingkynrei ki kam sniew.“La jan baroh ki longiing ki don ki nongdih drok, kam don shuh ka jingshngain ia ki kynthei bad kane ka dei ka kam kaba khia shibun”, u la ong bad bynrap, ka jingkynrei u drok ha ka thain Mawprem ka long kaba ma bad ishyrkhei haduh katta katta.Ha kajuh ka por, u la pynpaw ba kaba sngewsih ka long ba ki pulit kim ju ioh kem ia ki briew kiba donkti ha kane ka kam hynrei ki kem pynban tang ia kiba rit baria.Ki nongkhaii drok kim dei shuh tang ki samla, wat ki kynthei bad kiba la kham tymmen ruh ki don bynta ha kane hynrei aiu ki pulit ki la leh halor kane, u la ong.U la kren ruh ia ka jingtlot ka ain ban pynshitom ia ki briew ba donkti ha kaba shalan bad pyniaid iew ia u drok. “Haba ia ki nongbuaid ba iakajia, la set along san sngi, haei pat la pynshitom ia kiba donkti ha ki kam ban khaii bad u drok”, u la ong.
title: Jyllei u drok ha thain Mawprem:Paul

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:U Myntri ka tnad pynroi sor u Bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh u la iathuh mynta hapoh ka iing dorbar ba ki don sa 11 tylli ki shnong kiba hap shabar ka Shillong Municipal Board (SMB) kiba la mynjur ban wan kit niut da ka kali Municipal.“Kine ki shnong ki la mynjur ban iasoi ia ka jingiateh bad ka sorkar ba kan pyntreikam ia ka skhim pynkhuid ia ka sor kaba la bei pisa da ka Asian Development Bank (ADB)” la ong u Bah Ronie haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongthymmai u Dr Jemino Mawthoh hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi.U Bah Ronnie u la iathuh ba kine ki shnong kiba la pynpaw ba ki kloi ban iasoi ia ka Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) ki long ka Mawlai Mawiong, Lapalang, Lawjynriew, Lumsohphoh, Nongmensong, RR Colony, Rynjah, Umpling bad na ka thain Nongthymmai”.Hynrei ha kajuh ka por, u Bah Ronnie u la ong ba ka sorkar kan nym tuklar ban pynrung ia ki ha ka jaka ka Municipal hynrei kin neh haka jingpeit ka district council ha ka Scheduled Area.“Ka sorkar kan nym tuklar eiei ia ka jingdon jongki shabar ka Municipal ne kan pynrung sha ka Municipal hynrei kan shu pyntreikam ia ka skhim na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ka jingkhuid”, la ong u Bah Ronnie.U la ong ba kane ka skhim pynkhuid ia ka sor ka long ban pyniakhlad ia ki jaboh ba pyut bad ki bym pyut ha kaba ka ADB ka la bei pisa na ka bynta kane.U la ong ba nalor kine ki shnong ba la mynjur, ka sorkar ka kloi ruh ban khot lang ia kiwei kiba hap hapoh u pud u sam ka Master Plan ka sor Shillong ba kin pyntreikam ia kane ka skhim jingkhuid.
title: 11 shnong, shabar Municipal  ki pdiang ban kit niut ka Municipal

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:U symbud Myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr RC Laloo u la ong ba ki nongsam khaw reshon kin ioh ka baikit T.1.43/- na u khaw na ka shi kilo.U Dr Laloo u la ong ia kane halor jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA u Dr Donkupar Roy ha ing dorbar hynne Ka sngi.Ha kajuh ka por u la ong ba ka jingpynrung kyrteng ia ki briew ka dang iaid bad haduh mynta ki don 21 lak tam ki nongshong shnong ha Ka jylla.U Dr Laloo u la ong ba ha baroh kawei ka jylla ki don 280 ngut ki nongdielang ne wholeseller bad ka jingjied ia kine la leh katkum ka kyndon ba la pruid dak ha ka Meghalaya Foodgrains Control Order.Kawei na ki kyndon jong kane ka long ba ki nongdielang ki dei ban buh ia ka security deposit kaba T. 1 lak ia ki trai jylla bad T. 2 lak ia ki bym dei trai jylla. Ki dei ruh ban pynrung ia ka jingdon ki marbam bad ka jingsam ha ka internet ban pyni sha ka sorkar.Shwa ia kane u Dr Don u la ong ba lada ka sorkar kam ai bainong ia ki nongsam kan pynlong ia ki ban die tuh pynban ia u khaw.
title: T.1.43 shi kilo yn ioh ki nongsam khaw

content: Jowai, 10 Lber:Ka Balang Presbyterian Mihmyntdu, lyngba u Secretary Balang jong ka, u Tymmen Basan D Passah ka la ai khublei kyrpang ia baroh ki paid riew ngeit kiba la wan poi sha ka jingiaseng ha katei ka Balang kaba la long ha kane ka Sngi U Blei ba la lah.“Ngi ai khublei ia ka Dorbar Shnong Mihmyn-tdu, ia ka Balang Catholic Mihmyntdu bad ia ki tnad sorkar bapher bapher naduh ka tnad PWD, PHE, ka tnad Health Department, MeECL bad kumjuh ia ka Soil and Water Conservation bad ruh ia ka tnad Forest kiba la iarap ia ngi kum ka balang ban pynlong ia ka jingiaseng Synod Samla kaba jop”, la ong u kyrwoh na ka Balang.Ha kajuh ka por ka Balang ka ai khublei kyrpang ruh ia ki Pulit ka Jowai bad West Jaintia Hills kiba la trei shitom naduh dang step naduh ban da miet ban pyniaid ryntih ia ki kali kiba la wanpoi sha katei ka jingiaseng.“Ngin duwai ba U Blei un kyrkhu ia phi baroh”, la pynkut u kyrwoh khubor na ka Balang.
title: Ai khublei ka Balang Mihmyntdu

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:Ki pulit ka nongbah Shillong, ki pynshai ba ka don ka jingphah jingtip kylleng kylleng, lyngba ka whatsapp, ba ka don kawei ka kali Maruti Van, kaba pyrshang ban rahbor ia ki khynnah, na ki katto katne ki dong ka nongbah Shilong, hynrei ki pulit, kim pat ioh jing ujor satia halor katei ka phang, haduh mynta. Halor kane ka phang, la kyrpad namarkata ia ki paidbah, ba kin nym pdiang, ia kitei ki jingtip kiba ialam bakla ban pyn kulmar khlieh ia ki briew.
title: Hamsaia, ba mut rahbor briew ka Maruti

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:“Ngam don tang ka suloi ruh, kumno ngan pynap bad byrngem siat ia u” ong U Sengam N Marak, MLA ka Rongjeng Constituency, East Garo Hills, haba iakren bad U Rupang mynta ka miet da ka mobile.“Ngi ia shong jingialang ha ka jaka sahmiet ha Rongjeng bad ha katei ka por, nga don bad 3ngut ki paralok jongnga bad nga khot ia uwei u doktor, uba na Assam, namar ba u dei u bym don kot don sla, kiba biang, kiba pyni ba u dei shisha u doktor” ong shuh U Marak. “Hadien ba um lah ban pyni, la ki kot ki sla, kumta nga la khot ia ki pulit ba kin kylli bniah shaphang jong utei u doktor” ong shuh U Sengam.“Nga lyngngoh, ba hadien ba nga la mih na ka jaka sahmiet ha Rongjeng, ha ka por 10baje eiei mynstep, nga ioh jingtip, ba la ujor pyrshah ianga ha ki pulit. Hynrei nga ruh, ynda nga la wan phai sha Shillong, nga la ujor kylla pyrshah ia utei u doktor” ong shuh U MLA.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, na ka liang U Dr.Sandipani Malla Bujar Baruah u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka 5 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por shiteng synnia u MLA ka Rongjeng u Sengnam N Marak ryngkat ki paralok jong u, ki la khot ia u ha kawei ka kamra kaba don marjan bad ka IB PWD ha Rongjeng, East Garo Hills. U la ujor ba u MLA ryngkat ki paralok jong u ki la shongshit kyiad bad ki la phah sah jubor ia u ryngkat bad ki ha katei ka kamra bad khlem daw ki la pynshitom bein ia u haduh ka por 3:30 baje mynstep bad katba kiwei pat ki dang pynshitom u MLA ka Rongjeng. u nang pynap da ka suloi
title: Ngam don tang ka suloi ruh, kumno  ngan byrngem siat, ong U MLA

content: Nongpoh, 10 Lber:Ki paidbah nongshong shnong jong palat 6 tylli ki shnong ha ka thain Umtyrnga, kaba hap hapoh ka Pilingkata Police Outpost, Ri Bhoi District, mynta ka sngi ki la pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah ha shnong Umlathu, kum ka jingpyrshah jur ia uwei u riew shimet, uba la thmu ban die ia ka jaka kaba don ha katei ka shnong.Kum ban shu kdew hangne, ka daw kaba la pynlong ia ki paidbah jong kitei ki 6 shnong ban pynshah ia utei u riew shimet ia kaba la tip kum u Aisail N. Sangma, ka dei namar ba katkum ki kot ki sla ia kaba la ioh ban kurup da ka shnong, la iohi shai ba une u briew uba la thmu ban die ia ar tylli ki jaka kiba rit ki jongu, katba ha ki kot ki sla kaba ula phah tyrwa ia ka jaka, kaba la poi sha ka 654 Akar bad kaba la shah kynthup ruh wat ia ki shnong kiba don ha katei ka thain bad kaba la pynpaw shai ba ki dei tang ki kam thok kam shukor suda.Ha kane ka jingialang paidbah, kaba la wan ban iashimbynta da ki spah ngut ki paidbah jong kitei ki 6 shnong, ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki nongialam ba hakhmat ka HNYF, Northern Region, ha kaba ka sur kaba mih na ki paidbah la kynnoh ba u Aisail N. Sangma, u la kam ba baroh katei ka jaka ka dang dei ka jongu bad kaba kham pynbitar eh ia ki paidbah ka dei namar ba u Aisail N. Sangma, u la ong ba baroh kiba shong ha katei ka shnong ki dei tang ki nongshongwai ha katei ka jaka jongu.Haba pynrem halor katei ka jingshimkabu da u Aisail N. Sangma, ki Rangbah shnong na kitei ki 6 shnong, ki la pynrem jur ruh ia ki briew kiba la donkti ha katei ka kam, namar ia katei ka jingthmu ban die ia katei ka jaka la shu leh sop sop tang da ki katto katne ngut ki briew, kiba la iaid lait bad khlem da pan jingbit na ki rangbah shnong kiba don ha katei ka thain.Katba na ka liang u Bah Marcus Marten, President ka HNYF, Northern Region, u la ong ba ka seng ka la pynrem jur halor kane ka jingshim kabu da u Aisail N. Sangma, ha ryngkat bad ki Agent kiba la thmu ban die ia ka jaka ka bym dei hok.“Da lei lei ka seng kan nym ailad ia kiba kum kine ki khwan myntoi shimet ba kin shu shimkabu ia ki paidbah bad halor jong kane ka seng kan ieng halor ka nongrim jong u paidbah, namar ha ka jinglap da ka seng la iohi shai ba katei ka jingkam trai da u Asail N. Sangma ba u dei trai ia katei ka jaka, ka dei tang ka kam thok kam shukor suda” ong u Bah Marcus marten.Namarkata, ka seng kan sa shimkhia da kaba leit ruh ban kynduh syndon sha ki bor bahalor, da kaba dawa ba ki dei ban pynsangeh noh shisyndon ia katei ka jingkam trai da u Aisail N. Sangma ia katei ka jaka kaba don ha katei ka thain, u la bynrap.
title: Bitar ki 6 shnong, ba thmu lilam  u riew shimet ia ka shnong

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:Ha ka 9 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 8:30 baje eie mynmiet ki pulit ki la kem ia u Peter Nongkynrih na Motphran, Shillong bad na utei ki la ioh kurup saw tylli ki tin duma Golden kiba don haduh 1.88 kram u kynja powder ba la suba ba u dei u drok heroine, la kurup 26 tylli ki nar injek bad 19 tylli ki antiseptic swab.
title: Shah kem u nongkhaii drok na Motphran

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma u la plie paidbah ia ka Dialysis Unit ha Shillong Civil Hospital mynta ka sngi ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ka myntri ka koit ka khiah ka sorkar jylla ka kong Roshan Warjri. Ha katei ka jingialang u Dr.Mukul u la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen ba la lah ban pynurlong ia katei ka jingangnud ki paidbah bad u la ong ba da ka jingbiang ki tiar ki tar bad ki lad jingsumar bapher bapher kan pynlong ia ki paidbah ban phai khmat sha ki jaka sumar sorkar. U la ong ba ka sorkar ka pyrshang ban wanrah ia kiba bun ki jingdonkam ha ki lad jingsumar ban pynsuk ia ki paidbah khnang ba kin ym donkam shuh ban mareh shaduh Shillong ne ki nongbah jong ki District haba ki pang ki shitom bad kan pyllait ruh na ka jinglut phut ha ka iaid ka ieng .U la a khublei ia ka North Eastern Council (NEC) kaba la bei tyngka ia ka Dialysis Unit bad u la pynpaw ia ka jingkhublei namar ka jingkloi ka NEC ka tnad ba dei peit ia ka thain shatei Lam mihngi ban kner ia ki kti jong ka ha ka roi ka par. Lah ban pynkynmaw ba kham mynshuwa u Secretary ka NEC u Ram Muivah u la pyntip ba ka NEC ka bei tyngka T.4.98 klur tyngka ban wanrah ia ki saw tylli ki lad sumar ha Civil Hospital, Shillong bad kitei ki kynthup ia ka Dialysis Unit, Endoscopic Unit, Major Operation Theatre Unit bad ban tei ia ka Emergency and Casualty Ward kaba 10 jingthiah, bad la ong ba na kitei 3 tylli la dep ban pyndep. Kiwei pat kiba la kren ha katei ka jingialang ki kynthup ia ka myntri ka koit ka khiah kong Roshan, Additional Chief Secretary, Health & Family Welfare, Y Tsering, IAS bad Director of Health Services (MI) Dr R O Budnah.
title: Plie u Dr.Mukul ia  ka Dialysis Unit ha Civil

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:U Myntri rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka kam ban khang ia ka jingshalan tuh ia ki masi sha Bangladesh ka dei ka kamram jong ki Border Security Force (BSF) bad ka tnad Custom ka sorkar India, ym ki Pulit ka jylla.Haba jubab ha ing dorbar halor ka jingkylli ba wanrah da u MLA ka Nongkrem u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit mynta ka sngi, u Dr Mukul ula ong ba lada ki pulit kin leit ban tuklar man ki jaka ba kit masi ka long kumba pyndik bein ia ki nongkhaii ha jylla.U la long ba ki don bun bah ki paidbah kiba thied masi, namar ba ka jylla Meghalaya ka dei ka jylla bamdoh.“Kumno ngin khang ia ka jingthied masi, ka jingbam ki briew. Ia ki masi la shalan kylleng ki jaka ka meghalaya. Hynrei lada shalan sha Bangladesh, kan dei ka kamram ka sorkar pdeng”, u la ong.U la ong ba naduh 2011-16, la kurup masi ba thmu shalan tuh sha Bangladesh tang 8000 tylli na ki 28 tylli ki jinglap bad ia kane ka jingtip la ai da ki BSF sha ki pulit ka jylla”.Ula ong ruh ba ka kamram ka sorkar jylla ka long tang ban kyntu ia ka sorkar pdeng ba kan pynkhlain ia ka jingpahara ha khappud.“Ngi la kyrpad ia ka sorkar pdeng ba kan phikir bha ia ki khappud bad na ka liang ka sorkar pdeng ka la kyrpad ia ngi ban ai jaka ban buh ia ka Battalion ban pynkhlain pahara”, la ong u Dr Mukul.Na ka liang u bah Ardent u la ong ba ka sorkar kam lah ban thet kti halor kane, hynrei ka dei ban shim khia.
title: Ban khang shalan masi sha  Bangla ka dei ka kam ki BSF

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:Ka Kopili Hydro Electric People Affected People Association (KHEPAPA) West Bank ha ryngkat ka jingiatrei lang bad ka NEEPCO Umrangro ka la pynlong ia ka jingsumar ei ha ka Shnong Iooksi Kyan-mynsar Thlongmoo, West Jaintia Hills District. Ha kane ka sngi la ia don ryngkat lang u General Manager, Deputy General Manager, u Senior Manager ka HR department, ki doktor bad ki nongtrei ka NEEPCO Umrangro bad u General Secretary, u President jong ka seng KHEPAPA West Bank bad ki dkhot jong ka.Shuwa ban sdang ka jingsumar rei ka la don ka jingialang lyngkot ba la pyniaid da u President ka seng u ma Dapbiang Lapasam bad la ioh jingkren na ki heh jong ka NEEPCO.Ha katei ka jingsumar ei ki la poi da ki spah ngut ki briew ba wan na kylleng ki shnong kiba marjan bad katei ka Kopili Hydro Electric Plant jong ka NEEPCO ,ong ka kyrwoh ba la pyllait da u General Secretary Ioanis Manar.
title: Sumar ei ha Iooksi

content: Shillong 10 Lber:U MLA ka South Shillong u bah Sanbor Shullai u la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba dei ban dawa na ka sorkar India ban thaw ain thymmai kaba khlain ia ka Kashari halor ki kam thombor ia ki khynnah, kynthei.Haba shim bynta ha ka dorbar mynta ka sngi, u bah Sanbor u la ong ba ha ki 30 snem mynshwa ha kawei ka shnong ha Jaintia hills, ia u nongleh beijot la pynshitom da kaba thep ha byrni bad tied haduh ba un iap bad sa bret sha riat. U la ong ba don ki shnong kiba pynieng ha jaka paidbah, kiba pyndait tala na shkor bad ki bynta jinglong shynrang ban pynthngad ia ki nongleh beijot, hynrei ha kine ki sngi kam don shuh bad ka la pynshlur ia ki riew bymman.Kane ka jingkren jong u Bah Sanbor ka la pynrkhie lut khait ia ki MLA bad ka iing dorbar, namar ba ka long kumba kren biria, wat la u kren ia ka jinglap jongu.“Ha kiwei ki ri, kum ha Iraq ia ki nongleh beijot la shu siat, ha Afghanistan la shu phasi hynrei ha ri India la shu pynlait jem”, la ong u bah Sanbor.“Ha India ia ki nongleh beijot la pyrkhat,sa bishar, pynbam pisa 2000, la kut khlem pynshitom. Ka jinglehrain ia ngi” la ong bah Sanbor.Ha kajuh ka por, u la dawa ba dei ban pynthaw skhim lem ia ki kpa ba shah ieh ha ka tnga namar kumba ka long mynta ki don tang ki skhim ia ki longkmie ba shah ieh lok.“Ha ka konstitwensi jong nga don shibun ki kpa ba shah ieh ha ka tnga namar ba ka lok ka leit lok da uwei bad ki hap ban peit ia ki khun jong ki”, la ong u bah Sanbor.U la ong ba kine ki longkpa ki la wan ud ia u ba un sam jingiarap bad kyntu ia ka sorkar ba kan thaw lem ka skhim jingiarap ia ki longkpa khnang ba kan long ka jingiarap ia ki.
title: Thaw skhim ia ki kpa, kiba shah ieh ha ka tnga: Sanbor

content: Nongstoiñ, 10 Lber:“Ka jingbym lah jong ka sorkar ban shna bad wanrah ia ki ain bad ki rukom treikam kiba biang la ka long ha ka lad ioh kam ioh kam, ka khaii ka pateng, ka rep ka rang ka koit ka khiah, ki lynti ki syngkien bad kiwei kiwei ka la long ka daw bah jong ka jingsahdien dien ka Jylla ka jong ngi naduh ba ngi la ioh iala ka jong ka Jylla 44 snem mynshwa” ong u samla Suspicious L Mawphlang ha ka rynsan ialap ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla (Campaign for Change) kaba la long ha ka sngi Thohdieng jong ka taiew ha iew Riangdo.Na ka liang jong u bah Milan Warjri Information Secretary ka Campaign for Change haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang u la ong ban saindur ia ka Jaitbynriew ym dei ba lah tang kiba shong hapoh Secretariat, hynrei dei ban lah da ki paidbah bad ban leh ia kata ka kynhun nongialam ia ka CFC, ka iaid ban pynsngewthuh paidbah, ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla ngi donkam ia kum kine ki rynsan pynshai paidbah.Ha katei ka jingialang nalor kitei ki samla pule la ioh ruh ia ka jingkren na u bah P.N. Syiem CEM ka KHADC, u ba la wan ban iashim bynta lang ha katei ka rynsan ialap ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla bad haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang na ka liang jong u CEM u la kdew ruh ba ka jingeh kaba khraw ba ki paidbah ka Jylla ki iakynduh ka long namar ka jingbym lah jong ka sorkar Jylla ban thaw ia ki rukom treikam kiba biang.Shuh shuh u CEM u la ong ruh ka Jylla la jong, ka long ban thaw ia ki ain na ka bynta ban iada ia ka jaitbynriew bad ban shna ruh ia ki rukom treikam (policy) kiba biang, hynrei kaba sngewsih haduh mynta ym pat don kita ki ain kiba biang ban iada ia ka jaitbynriew, ka jingdon jong ki marpoh khyndew ha kane ka jylla ka jong ngi, ki dei ki nong kynti jong ki paidbah hynrei ha kiwei ki jylla jong ka ri India ki marpoh khyndew ki dei ki nong kynti jong ka sorkar.“Ka jingdon jong ka District Council kaba la pynkup bor lyngba ka 6th Schedule ka long ban iada bad pynkhlain ia ka hok long trai ha ka khyndew ka shyiap ha ka synshar ka khadar bad kiwei kiwei ki jinglong ba kyrpang jong ka jaitbynriew, hynrei ka sorkar jylla ka thmu ban khniot ia ka District Council ban pyntroin noh ia kitei ki jinglong ba kyrpang bad ia ka hok long trai, bad ngi long pat kiba donbok ba ngi don ia ka 6th Scedule ka dang lah ban pyniapher ia kane ka jylla ka jong ngi bad kiwei pat ki jylla ha ka ri” ong biang u CEM.La pyniaid ia katei ka jingialang da u bah A.L. Nonglait Secretary shnong Riangdo ha ryngkat ka jingiadon lang u bah Banteidor Lyngdoh MDC ka Mawkynrew, bah Emlang Lytan nongialam barim ka seng FKJGP, u bah M. Mawsor MDC ka Mawshynrut, ki Samla pule kiba dei ki dkhot ka CFC kiba la ai jingkren ruh ha katei ka jingialang.
title: Ka sorkar Jylla, ka khniot ia ki  District Council: CEM KHADC

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:U Myntri ka tnad sam ding ka jylla u Bah Sniawbhalang Dhar, u la ong ba ka dam pynmih bording ka MeECL ka Myntdu Leshka Project ka la twa kynsan ha ka 22tarik Rymphang namar ka jingwan u slap bym poi pyrkhat.U la pyntip ia kane hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi halor ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongthymmai u Dr Jemino Mawthoh uba kylli la ka don ne em ka jingduh kaba jur na kane ka jingtwa.“Ka jingjulor na kane ka jingtwa ym pat lah ban tip namar ba ki bor ba dei peit ki dang leit jurip ia kane ka jaka bad shen yn sa tip ia ka dor jong ka jingjulor”, la ong u Myntri.U la ong ba ka jingtwa ka dam kam dei kaba jubor, namar ba ka dei tang ka jingkiew kynsan ka um na ka jinghap u slap ha katei ka sngi ka long hapdeng 170 haduh 300 mm.
title: Twa ka dam Myntdu na u slap  bym poi pyrkhat, ong u Myntri

content: Shillong, 10 Lber:Ki Sengbhalang na ri Lum Garo ba kynthup ia ka Garo Student Union (GSU), ka ADE, ka FKJGP bad ka AYWO ki la thoh shithi sha u myntri tnad pohing ka sorkar jylla ban pyntip ia ka daw ka jingjia ha ka 6 tarik u lber ha Resubelpara bad ha katei ka jingthoh ki la dawa na u myntri ka tnad pohing u bah HDR Lyngdoh ba dei ban pynkynriah kam noh ia u SP ka North Garo Hills, dei ban weng kam shisyndon ia ki pulit kiba donkti ban siat ia ki riew lui lui bad ba ia ka jinglut jingsep ban pynsumar ia kitei kiba mynsaw dei ban bei da ka sorkar, ki la dawa ruh ba dei ban thungkam ia kitei kiba mynsaw ba kin lah ban kyrshan ia ka ing ka sem jong ki. Ha katei ka shithi kitei ki 4 seng ki la pynpaw ha u myntri ka tnad pohing ba katei ka jingjia ka mih na ka daw ba ki nongniah kali ki la ngiah ki la kdang ia ka jingdawa pisa jubor ki pulit bad dei na katei ka daw ba kim patiaw shuh lada ki pulit ki pynieng ia ka kali jong ki naba ki tip lypa ba lada ieng kin shah dawa pisa bad lada kim don pisa ruh ki pulit ki knieh ia ki tiar ba ki kit hapoh kali, kynnoh ki 4 seng.Ki la ong ba ha ka 6 tarik u Jamrak Sangma ( nongniah kali) , u Milseng T Sangma, u Tumbul A Sangma bad uwei pat ki la leit ban buh kwai sha Assam bad hadien ba la dep ki kam jong ki -ki la wan phai noh lyngba ka Kaldang. Haba ka kali kitei ki briew ka la poi hajan jingkieng Rereng ki pulit ki la siat khlem da maham eiei, ki 4 seng ki la iathuh ba kitei 3 ngut ki la mynsaw hynrei kim shym la sangeh ia ka kali bad ki la iaid beit beit da kaba thmu ban leit sha Hospital, watla ki la mynsaw ki la pynher beit ia ka kali sha Hospital bad ki pulit ruh ki la kthong ia ki shaduh Hospital.Ki 4 seng ki la ong ba haba la poi ha hospital ki pulit ki la patan ia kitei ki ba mynsaw napoh kali bad la pynthiah ha madan ha kaba la don ruh katto katne ngut ki pulit kiba la kyrdem da ka kjat ba ki jaka ba mynsawryngkat bad ka pynap suloi bad ka byrngem siat iap syndon. Kham hadien la ong ba ki paidbah ki la wan ban pynithuh ba kitei kiba shah siat kim dei ki runar hynrei ki dei ki trai shnong.Ki la iathuh ba u Jamrak bad u Mileng u la mynsaw jur na shadem bad u shah siat na ksang kti,u Tumbul u la mynsaw jur naba u kuli u la ksam sha u dohnud jong u bad u la mynsaw ruh na ksang kti.
title: Mih ka jingjia ha Resubelpara, ba dawa pisa jubor na ki pulit

content: Jowai, 15 Lber:Ha ka Sngi U Trai, ki nongsam ia ka ktien U Blei ha ka jingiaseng ka ba 10:30 AM da u Rev. B.B. Lamin; ha ka por 1:30 PM da U Rev. Dr. M.J. Hynniewta bad ha ka por 6:30 PM, U Rev. S.P. Dkhar un kren halor ka subject Balang ‘Ka Balang kaba shah synshar ha U Trai’ (Jingpynpaw 19:6). Na ka byna ka jingiaid beit iaid ryntih ka Jingiaseng, ka jingpynbeit ia ki kali wan Jingiaseng ha ka Sngi U Trai, 19.03.2017 ka long kumne; Entry No. 1: Na ka bynta ki Official Synod, VIP, Car Pass, Choir na surok hajan CHC Ummulong kumjuh ki kali rit (light vehicle) kiba wan ka thain Jowai kin rung lang na kane ka juh ka entry sha ki jaka parking ha Thangsamynting, Lumthangbru bad Lumwalieh. Entry No. 2: Ki kali heh (heavy vehicle) ba wan na ka thain Jowai kin buh kali (parking) ha Thlu Ummulong. Entry No. 3: Ki kali heh (heavy vehicle) ba wan na ka thain Nartiang kin buh kali ha Iewpynsin Wahiajer. Entry No. 4: Ki kali ba wan na thain Bamkamar Tyrshang kin rung na lad Chutwakhu bad kin iaid lyngba ka Ingmane Katholik shaduh ki jaka parking. Entry No. 5: Ki kali rit (light vehicle) ki ba wan na ka thain Shillong kin rung na la Moodymmai bad kin iaid lyngba ka shnong Moodymmai haduh lad Lumsalah shaduh ki jaka parking. Entry No. 6: Ki kali heh (heavy vehicle) kiba wan na ka thain Shillong kin rung na lad Chutwakhu bad kin iaid lyngba ka Ingmane Balang Katholik shaduh ki jaka parking. Entry No. 7: Ki kali kiba wan na ka thain Sohmynting- Madur kin rung na lad Lumsalah shaduh ki jaka parking.Kumta la kyrpad ia baroh ki nongwan Jingiaseng ba kin sngewbha ban kohnguh bad ia treilang bad kajingpyniaid jong ki traffic police bad ki volunteers. Ka Balang ka kyntu ruh ïa ki nongwan jingïaseng bakin ym bret pathar ïa kino kino ki ba lah ban pynjaboh ia ka mariang. Kiba wan ïalam ia ki khunlung, ki khynnah ki dei ban da sumar bha khnang ba kin ym sakma ban lait na kano kano ka jingeh. Kane ka longkatkum u kyrwoh u Secretary, Balang Presbyterian Ummulong.
title: Ka K.J.P. Synnod Mihngi

content: Shillong, 15 Lber:Kane ka jingjurip, kaba long mynta ka sngi, ka la long kaba iaid beit iaid ryntih bha namar la wan ban ia shim bynta lang naduh ki Executive Engineer jong ka tnad PHE (Electrical, Distribution, Division II), SDO jong ka PWD, National Highway, Engineer Company BSC, Rangbah Shnong jong ka Shnong Lad Mawreng, Mawkalum bad kumjuh ruh na ki Dkhot jong ka Committee Shnong.Ha kane ka jing ia leit jurip, la lap ba na ka liang jong ka PHE Department ka la shimkhia shisha namar ba mynta ka sngi ki la lah lut ban pyndep ia ki nar um baroh ban sam um sha ki paidbah Nong Shong Shnong jong ka Shnong Lad Mawreng bad Mawkalum, wat la ka long makna ka jing pynbiang kaba tang shipor (Temporary) ia mynta hi, katba ka dang iaid ka jing shna ia ka Surok.Na ka liang jong ki Executive Engineer jong ka tnad PHE (Electrical, Distribution, Division II) ki la pyntikna ba nangne shakhmat ki paidbah kin ym mad shuh ia kine ki jingeh lyngba ka jingiatreilang, ka PWD, National Highway bad Company BSC pat ki la ai ka jingkular ba nalor ka Surok yn pynshna ruh ia ki lynti iaid kjat, ha baroh ki jaka kiba i donkam hadien ba na ka liang jong ki nongialam jong ka FKJGP Upper Shillong Circle & KSU Upper Shillong Circle ha ryngkat ki Rangbah Shnong kila pynpaw ba ka don ka jingma ia ki paidbah lada ym don ki lynti iaid kjat kiba shngain.
title: Poi um biang ha Lad Mawreng, Mawkalun

content: Jowai, 15 Lber:U SP ka WJH u la iathuh ba ka jingioh kurup ia kitei ki masi ka long ha ka por ba ka kynhun pulit hapoh ka jingialam u OC ka Amlarem ki dang iaid pahara sha katei ka thain.La iathuh ba ki nongbeh ia kitei ki masi mar syn iohi ia ki pulit ki la phet noh. Ia kitei ki masi kiba la ioh kurup yn aiti sha ka tnad Custom na ka bynta ban leh ia kaba donkam.
title: Kurup ki pulit Amlarem 11 tylli ki masi

content: Nongstoiñ, 15 Lber:Shuh shuh u DC u la bthah ruh ba baroh ki skul ki jaka pule kidei ban pynlong skul ha kitei ki sngi bad kumjuh ki ophis sorkar kidei ban pynlong trei ha kitei ki tarik kaba long ruh ka tarik bala ia bujli bad ka 28th & 29th December, 2016.Ha kajuh kapor u tei u khlieh duh jong ka District u la kyntu ia ki paidbah jong ka thain ba kkidei ban shim ia Kane kum ka jingpynbna bad pyntip lypa.
title: Yn plie ki ophis ha ka 18 & 25 tarik Lber

content: Nongstoiñ, 15 Lber:Ki katto katne ngut ki paidbah katei ka thain kiba don Account ha katei ka Bank, haba iakren bad ki katto katne ki nongthoh khubor, ki la ong ba ka jingbym lah jong katei ka bank ban pynbiang ia ki pisa khutia ka la pynlam wir ia ki paitbah ka thain Shallang, kaba la pynjynjar ha ka thied ka ka pet bad ki wei ki wei .Nalor katei ka jingbym biang pisa khutia katei ka Bank ka dang don ruh ia shibun ki wei pat ki jingdkoh trei kham kum ha ka jing bymtikna ki kor ki bor hapoh jong katei ka Bank kaba la pynlong shuh shuh ia ki paidbah jong katei ka thain ban nang ia kynduh shibun ki jingeh la pynpaw da u bah Robert Sohbar u wei na ki riew rangbah jong katei ka thain.U bah Sohbar ha ryngkat ki paidbah jong katei ka thain kila kyntu ia katei ka bank ba ka dei ban ialeh la kumno kumno ba kan pynbiang ia ki pisa 500 bad 100 bad ki wei ki wei ki jingdon kam khnang ba kan long ka jingsuk bad jingmyntoi ia ki paitbah.
title: Ym don kot 500 & 100 ka UBI

content: Nongpoh, 15 Lber:Haba shimkhia halor jong kane ka jingpyrshah, na ka liang ki nong shong shnong ka Umsning Proper-B ia kaba la ialam khamt da u Bah Wonding Thawbri, u Bah T Mylliem bad u Bah D Kharmaw, ha kaba ka daw kaba la pynlong ia ki paidbah ban pyrshah halor katei ka jingthmu ban rah ia ka Iew Umsning sha Patarim, ka dei namar ka jingleh lyndet da ki nongialam shnong, khlem da kynjoh ktien ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong.Kumta haba iadei bad katei ka jingthmu, na ka liang ki paidbah nongshong shnong ki la kynntu ia u Paiem Ricky lem bad ia ki myntri ba kim dei ban ailad halor katei ka jingthmu jong ka UTD bad KHADC ban rah ia ka Iew Umsning sha Patarim.Kum ka jingpyrshah halor katei ka jingthmu ban rah ia ka Iew Umsning sha Patarim, na ka liang ki paidbah nongshong shnong ka Umsning Proper-B, ki la rai ruh ba kin pynlong da ka jingiaiaid paidbah ha ka 18 Tarik mynta u Bnai, kaba long kum ka jingpyrshah namar ha katei ka sngi ka la don ka jingthmu ban iateh soskular hapdeng ki nongialam ka UTD bad KHADC.
title: Rai ban mih paidbah ha ka 18 Tarik

content: Shillong, 15 Lber:Haba wanrah ia kane ka mat hapoh ka iing dorbar ha ka cut motion, u bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba katkum ka jingkhein ka jingjyllei ki kam sniew ha ka nongbah bad ka East Khasi Hills ka la buh jingma ia ka jylla hynrei ka sorkar namar ka jingphiel ka tnad pulit hynrei kaba sngew lyngngoh ka long ba ka sorkar ka la pynshong syiad ia uwei u ophisar u Bah Vivek Syiem haduh 10 snem tam naduh u 2007 haduh mynta ha kane ka district.“Kaei ka polisi ka sorkar ban buh ia uwei u briew haduh 10 snem haba ki kam sniew ki nang kharoi”, la ong u Bah Paul.U la ong, “Balei ia kiwei ka sorkar ka pynshong ar ne lai snem la shah kynriah katba ia une uwei la leh kyrpang. Kaei ka daw ban pynshong haduh 10 snem ia uwei u briew hajuh?, ka sorkar ka la leh bym hok”,.Katkum ka jingong u Bah Paul, kane ka lah ban don eiei ha lyndet ban pynshong ia ujuh u ophisar ha kajuh ka jaka da ki phew snem bad lada kam dei, balei ka jia.U la kdew ia ka jingjia ba shah pyniap ka khynnah na Sawmer kaba la kam ki pulit ba la kem ia u runar haba ka jingshisha ka long ba ia utei uba donkti la pyntip ka kmie jongu ban kem hadien ba u la phla hi, ym da ka jingtrei shitom jongki pulit ban kem.U la ong ruh ba ka jingjia ha Laimer ha kaba ka khynnah ka la shah pyniap sha thain Umiam hynrei haduh mynta kam pat ioh kem satia. “Ha u 2016, ki don 228 tylli ki kam runar ba la rejister hynrei khlem don kawei ruh ba la pynshitom ne rai pynrem”, la ong u Bah Paul.U la ong ba kaba sngewsih ioh ba ki paidbah kin leit pan jingiarap na ki seng lehnoh ban pynshitom ia ki nongleh bymman kumba jia ha ki 15 snem mynshwa lada ka tnad pulit kam lah ban leh eiei ban pynshitom ia ki briew ba donkti.Haba jubab halor kane, na ka liang u myntri kam pohing ka jylla u Bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka sorkar kan sa bishar ia kane ka kam ban kynriah kam ia u ophisar. U la kyntait ba ki pulit ki la phiel ban tehlakam ia ki kam sniew ha ka jylla.“Ha u 2015, na ki 91 tylli ki jingjia, 84 la pynngat ha ki kyndon ain ia kiba donkti ha ki kam sniew”, la ong u Bah HDR Lyngdoh.U la ong ba ka sorkar kan bishar ban kynriah kam ia ki ophisar kumba dei man ka por katkum ki kyndon ka sorkar.
title: Ther u Bah Paul Lyngdoh ba don

content: Shillong, 15 Lber:Haba wanrah ia kane ka mang tyngka hapoh ka iing dorbar hynne ka sngi, u Dr Mukul u la tyrwa ia ka mang tyngka kaba T.12873 klur ban pynlut ha une snem 2017-18 ban wan na ka bynta ban siew tulop ia ki nongtrei sorkar bad ban pyntrei ia ki kam pynroi ka sorkar.Katkum ka mang tyngka, u Myntri Rangbah u la khein antad ba ka sorkar kan ioh pdiang pisa T.12,510 klur, ha kaba ka khajna yn ioh T.11,280 klur, bad ka capital T. 1230 klur. Lait noh ka jingpan kylliang, ka jingioh pdiang la buh antad ba kan long T. 11,302 klur.Ha ka jingpynlut u la antad ba kan long T. 12,873 klur ha kaba ka jingpynlut na ka khajna kan long T.10,648 klur bad ka jingpynlut ia ka capital ka long T. 2225 klur. Lait noh ka ram, ka jingpynlut kan long T.12,538 klur. Ka jingsiew ram ha une u snem kan long T.589 klur bad ka baibam tymmen kan long T. 730 klur.Kane ka mang tyngka ka duna pisa T. 1236 klur kaba long 3.8 percent na ka Gross State Domestic Product (GSDP).Ha ka jingkren mang tyngka, u Dr Mukul u la ong ba ka sorkar kan pynthymmai biang ia ka khajna na ka kyaid bad kiwei ki jait jingdih ba iasyriem bad ka kyaid. Ka sorkar kan pynthymmai ruh ia ka jingai license ia ki jaka shna kyiad hynrei kan pynhiar ia ka khajna na ka kyaid ban pynjur ia ka jingshalan sha ka jylla.U la ong ba ka sorkar kan pynthymmai ruh ia ki license ban song, ban tah bad ban shna ia ki kyiad.Ka sorkar kan pynthymmai ruh ia ka khajna ka VAT ia ka kyaid, ban bishar biang ban ailad ban khang slem ki jaka dih kyiad.U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar kan pynkiew ia ka khajna jong baroh kiba hap ha ka Meghalaya Passengers and Goods Tax Act. Kan pynshong nongrim bha ruh ban shim khajna na u sikret, bad biris.Ha kajuh ka por, u Dr Mukul u la ong ba ka sorkar pdeng ka la pyniasoh lang noh ia ka mang tyngka ka Non-plan bad ka Plan jong u snem 2017-18 ban wanrah ia ka jingkylla ha ka rukom pyniaid pisa ha kaba lum khajna bad ka jingpynlut.U la ong ba ia kane ka mang tyngka la wanrah ban pyniadei dur bad ka mang tyngka ka sorkar pdeng.U la ong ba ka jingkhang ka Supreme Court ia ki dukan kyiad, ka la ktah jur ia ka khajna ka jylla nalor ka jingkhang dewiong ha kane ka jylla da ka NGT.Katkum ka jingong jong u Dr Mukul, ka jingkiew jong ki kam rep kam riang ha ka jylla ka long 11.93 percent katba kiwei ki kam trei kam ktah ka long 9.38 percent bad ha ki kam primary ka long 7.51 percent jong u snem 2016-17. Ka jingkamai jong ki briew ha ka jylla shimet shimet ka long T. 88,497 katkum ka jingkhein antad na kaba rim kaba T. 81,498 jong u snem 2015-16 kaba pyni ba ka la don ka jingkiew sha ka 8.26 percent na ka snem ba la dep, la ong u Dr Mukul.U myntri rangbah ha kane ka jingkren jong u, ula mang ia kawei pa kawei ka tnad sorkar bad ka jingmang pisa ia ki tand sorkar ka long kumne. Law & order T.42.20 klur, Judiciary T.60 klur, District Council Affairs T.1.05 klur, Agriculture T.287.94 klur, Animals husbandry & veterinary T.57.38 klur, Fisheries T.45.50 klur, Sericulture & Weaving T.37.20 klur, Waters Resources T.199.20 klur, Forest & environment T.48.01 klur, Soil & Water conservation T.193.87 klur, Community Development T.1731.57 klur, Housing T.60 klur. Haka tnad Border Areas Development T.59.96 klur, Urban Development T.267.07 klur, Health & family welfare T.420.93 klur, Education T. 909.94 klur, Sport & Youth Affairs T. 51.20 klur, Tourism T.51.19 klur, Art & Culture T.41 klur, Labour & Employment T.26.61 klur, Social welfare T.386.10 klur, Water Supply & Sanitation T.350.80 klur, Food Civil Supplies T.106.11 klur, Road Bridges T.712.80 klur, Power T.131.40 klur, Transport T. 17 klur, Commerce & Industries T.27.91 klur, Mining & Geology T.3.69 klur , Information Technology T.61.95 klur, Information & Public Relation T.9.80 klur.
title: Wan rah U Mukul, ka mang

content: Shillong, 15 Lber:La iathuh shuh shuh u myntri rangbah, ba ka sorkar Jylla, ka dang shu dep pynkhreh ia ka syllabus, na ka bynta kiba ialeh MCS bad kumta, ka dei ha ka 6tarik Lber 2017, ba ki dang pyntip sha ka MPSC, na ka bynta ba kan sdang ban jied noh ia ki MCS. La iathuh shuh shuh u myntri rangbah, ba ka jingjied ia ki MCS nangne shakhmat, kan iapher, na ka jingjied ia ki MPS.U Bah Paul Lyngdoh, ula kylli, ba ka jingailad ia kiba pass MPS, ba kin leit sha ka MCS, ka lah ban ktah ia ka jingkiew kyrdan jong kito kiba wan beit na ka jingialeh eksamin MCS bad halor kane u myntri rangbah, u ong ba kito kiba jop ia ka eksamin MPS ruh, ki lah ban rung sha ka MCS, tangba ka sorkar, ka peit ba kan nym ktah pat halor ka jingkiew kyrdan jong kito kiba la nang shah jied kham ha shwa.Ha kawei pat ka phang, U Bah Paul Lyngdoh UDP, u la ujor ba ki pulit, kim ju don satia ha ki surok bah jong ka sor, hadien ka 8baje janmiet bad halor katei u myntri kam poh iing, u ong ba ki pulit, ki don beit baroh shimiet shi sngi, tangba ki dei ki pulit kiba iaid lane kiba ki ong ki flying squad.U myntri, u iathuh ba ki pulit, kiba don ha ki kam jongki, ki sdang naduh ka por 7baje mynstep haduh 1 baje nohsngi bad nangta, kiba naduh 1baje nohsngi, haduh ka por 8baje janmiet. U bah Paul, ula ai jingmut ia u myntri kam poh iing, U Bah HDR Lyngdoh, ba un buh pulit ha ka por mynmiet ruh, namar ba ki don bun ki briew, kiba iaid ba ieng haduh ka por shiteng synnia ruh.Kwah kam any
title: 42tylli lait ki kam MCS ha Jylla

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:Ka 91.1 FM Radio Mirchi -It’s Hot la plie paidbah mynta ka sngi da u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma bad katei ka radio station kan sdang ban pynshongshit bad pynbyrngia ia ki paidbah lyngba ki jingrwai phareng bad ki jingrwai hindi katkum ka jingkwah u paidbah. Ha katei ka sngi u Regional Head jong katei ka steshon u Bithindra Biswas u la ong ba la tip ia ka nongbah Shillong kum ka nongbah jong ka rwai ka siaw bad ka put ka tem ha ka ri India baroh kawei bad dei na kata ka daw la jied kyrpang ia ka nongbah Shillong ban pyniaid ia katei ka stashon kaba u la ong ba kan dei ruh ka steshon radio kaba khluit tam jong ka Radio Mirchi kaba don ha India baroh kawei. U la ong ba ka Mirchi ka don 74 tylli ki Frequency ha 64 tylli ki sorbah ha ka ri bad ka dei ruh ka mirchi kaba heh tam hapoh India. Ki RJs ki ban pyniaid ia katei ka prokram jong ka 91.1 FM Mirchi ki long u RJ Gordon, ka RJ Marisa bad u RJ Nicky J (uba la ju tip paidbah kum u Manik), ki prokram jong ka 91.1 ka long baroh shisngi. Ha katei ka sngi la don ruh u Abdul
title: Rwai Hindi u Zenith ha jingialang plie ia ka 91.1 FM Mirchi

content: Shillong, 15 Lber:La pynkhreh ia ki syntiew, ki jain spong, ki jain ryndia, ki ksing ki dhah kiba la pynap ryngkat ka tynghung ha kali ban pynsawa bad pdiang burom ia u Sordar ka Mawryngkneng. U tang mar ia mih na phatok ryngkat ka spong bad ka riam khasi tynrai la sawa ka ksing dhah, ki paidbah ki la risa ki la kynhoi bad bun na ki longkmie ki la tur sha u ban leit kdup ieit ia u bad ka jaw ummat.Shuwa ba un kiew noh sha kali ban leit sha Mawryngkneng , ki nongthohkhubor ki la ioh ban ia kren bad u bah Peter hakhmat ka khyrdop phatok. Ha katei ka jingiakren u la ong ba kam dei kaei kaei ruh kaba u la shah kem hynrei ka dei beit tang na ka daw ka jingiabuh shun namar ki kam shnong, “Ngam leh bakla eiei, dei tang ka jingiashun daw shnong bad ki rukom treikam hapoh shnong da ka jingthmu ban pynpait pynpra khamtam ba la jan ka elekshon 2018” u la ong.Shuh shuh u la ong ba ka daw ka jingsha kem jong u kam dei na ki bahaing hasem jong ka khynnah kaba la shah batbor hynrei ka dei ka jingkynshoit jong kiwei pat kiba shun ia u, “Dei ka jingkynshoit mano re mano nadien ban wanrah jingiapait ia pra, ngi la kren shai kdar sha ki bahaing hasem kaba shah batbor ba ym lah banpyniasuk da lei lei ruh ia katei ka kam namarba ka dei ka bynta jong ki pulit bad ka aiñ, hynrei nga la shu ong ha ki ba ai ba ka aiñ kan leh ia kaba donkam hynrei kam dei pat ban don ka jingbuh shun para nongshong shnong” u la ong biang.Katkum ka jingiathuh u bah Peter u la ong ba ka jingjia shah batbor ka la jia nadhu ka 1 tarik u kyllalyngkot hynrei la phone bad pyntip sha u haduh ka 2 tarik u kyllalyngkot ha ka por 5 baje eiei janmiet, “Nga la ong ia ki ban leit ujor FIR sha ki pulit hynrei kim treh ki ong ba kin leit phah sumar shuwa sha Shillong, hadien ki la pyntip ba kim treh ban sumar hapoh Hospital bad nga la pynbor biang ia ki ban ujor ejahar, hynrei kim treh biang ki ong bym pat tip lut kiba haing hasem, ngi la leit sha Mawryngkneng Police Station ha ka 3 tarik ban ujor ejahar, hynrei ki pulit kim treh , nga la pan kot sada ki pulit ki phah wan pat ha ka 4 tarik, kumno ngan ialam ia ki nongbatbor sha ki pulit haba ym don ba ujor ia ki, nga shu ong ia ki khie leit sha ing tangba wat phet. Ia ka ejahar ba mut ban ujor ruh nga la phah draft ha ka kong Bell Kharsati, nga kylli ka la biang ne-em ka ong la biang, nga sngewlyngngoh kumno ka kynnoh kylla pynban ia nga” ong u bah Peter J Lawai.U la pynpaw ruh ka jinglyngngoh halor ka jingshah kem jong u ryngkat kiwei pat ki rangbah nongialam shnong jong ka Mawryngkneng ha kaba u la ong ba ym don ba ujor FIR eiei pyrshah ia u , hynrei ki pulit ki la khot ki ong ba kin shim statement hynrei tang mar ia poi ha Sadar Police Station ki la knieh noh ia ki mobile phone bad la iathuh ba ngi la sha kem, “Ka jingshah kem ruh kaba ngam sngewthuh sngewthaw shuh hynrei ngan ong kumno shuh ha katei ka por ba la shah kem , ka lynti ia ngi ka dei beit tang ka aiñ ban ia khun” bynrap biang u bah Peter da kaba ong ba lada ki paidbah ki dang shaniah ha u un dang bteng ban bat ia ka kam Sordar shnong.
title: Hadien 2 bnai tam lait phatok

content: Jowai, 17 Lber:Ba baroh ki kali kiba wan na thain East Khasi Hill ki rung na lad Moodymmai bad ban pynieng ia ki kali jong ki ha jaka pynieng kali Lum Mynso, jaka ka Hun Shylla bad kin mih leit phai na ka juh ka surok ba ki la wan rung.Baroh ki kali kiba wan na thain East bad West Jaintia Hills kin rung na Ummulong CHC, Moodymmai Junction bad kin pynieng ia ki kali jong ki ha ki jaka ba la pynbeit ha Thadsamyting, Lumwalieh, katba ki kali heh kin pynieng ia ki kali ha Lum Challam. Yn ym shah ia kino kino ki kali ba kin pynieng ha rud surok bah.Baroh ki kali kiba wan na ka thain Nartiang kin pynieng ia ki kali jong ki ha Iaw Pynsin bad ki kali heh kin hap ban iaid lyngba ka Lad Langi bad kin pynieng ia ki kali jong ki ha Lum Challam, Yn nym shah ia kino kino ki kali ban poi sha NH-44KI kali kiba wan na Tyrshang bad Larnai kin hap ban iaid lyngba ka Lad Chutwakhu bad kin ieng ha Madan skul Catholic.La buh ruh ia ka No Entry Timing ia ki trok naduh 7 baje mynstep haduh 7 baje mynmiet.Baroh ki kali ki heh ki hain bad ki kali ki Choir bad baroh kiba don Car Pass kin pynieng ia ki kali jong ki ha Lum Thangbru.Na ka liang u SP ka West Jaintia Hills u la kyntu ruh ia baroh ki driver (NOngniah kali) ba kin long kiba don akor khamtam haba ki wan ban shakri Blei, khnang ban lait na kano kano ka jingdheng kali bad khamtam eh na ka jingjia ba sngewsih naka daw ka jingpynher sted bad overtaking.
title: Ka jingbthah ia ki nongwan Synod Mihngi ha Ummulong

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba wanrah da u nongialam liangpyrshah u Dr Donkupar Roy ha ing dorbar hynne ka sngi u bah tynsong u la ong ba ka jingpynduna ka sorkar pdeng ban ai Pisa ka shem jingeh namar ba ka sorkar jylla kam don Pisa.U la ong ba naduh u snem 2014-15 ba synshar ka sorkar NDA ha Delhi ka jingioh Pisa ka duna. “Ha ki snem shwa ka kham heh ka jingai pisa”, la ong u bah tynsong.Ha u snem 2016-17 ka jingioh Pisa ka long T.40.8 lak tam na ka sorkar.Halor kane u Dr Donkupar u la ong ba lada ka sorkar pdeng ka ai pisa duna, ka sorkar jylla ka dei ban thawlad ban sei na pla lajong na ka bynta ki paidbah.
title: Duna ki projek PHE, ba ai

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:U la jubab ia ka jingkylli la ka sorkar kan pdiang em ia ki Hindu ba dei nabar ri katkum ka jingpynkylla ka sorkar India ba la wanrah u MLA Nongkrem bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit hapoh ingdorbar.“Ka India ka don 1.25 klur ki nongshong shnong, ka long kaba donkam ban bishar shwa ia ka jinglong jong ki ban tip mano ba dei na India bad mano bym dei”, la ong u Dr Mukul.Katba u myntri kam pohiing u bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka sorkar kam pat don kano kano ka jingtip ba ka sorkar Assam kan wan leh ia ka NRC ia ki briew ba sah ha khappud. U la ong ba ka sorkar kam pat kren eiei halor ka Citizenship Amendment ka sorkar pdeng ban pdiang ia ki Hindu ba sah shabar ri ban wan sha India namar ka jingshah lehbein.
title: Donkam ka NPR ia ka NRC:Mukul

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:Ia kane la iathuh da u Myntri ka khajna ka jylla u Zenith M Sangma mynta ka sngi ha ing dorbar halor ka jingkylli jong u bah Dr Jemino Mawthoh.U Zenith u la ong ba hadien ba hukum ka Supreme Court ia ki dukan kyiad ban khang hajan surokbah, jaka mane ha u snem 2014-15, la khang 265 tylli na ka 561 tylli ha baroh ka jylla.U la ong ba ka jingkhang ia ki dukan kyaid ka la ktah jur ia ka iarong pisa ka jylla nalor ka jingkhang ia ka tih dewiong ka National Green Tribunal (NGT).Katkum ka jingwanrah u Myntri ia ka jingdon ki dukan kyaid ka long ha East Khasi 61 tylli, West Khasi 10, South West Khasi 13, Ri Bhoi 31, East Jaintia Hills 35, West Jaintia Hills 26, East Garo Hills 07, West Garo Hills 53, South Garo Hills 13, North Garo Hills 18, South West Garo Hills 21 bad Sohra sub division 08 tylli. Ha u 2013-14 ka sorkar ka ioh khajna T.1626620757, ha 2014-15 ka ioh khajna T. 1511353697 bad ha u snem 2015-16 ka ioh lum khajna T.1700549408. Kaba sngew phylla ba u Myntri u la ong ba dei tang ha jaintia hills ba la ithuh ia ka kyiad ba shna hi ki briew katei ka thain.
title: Na 561, sah sa 296 ki dukan kyiad, 500 klur duh khajna

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:La iathuh shuh shuh ba ka ophis u myntri rangbahduh, ka la mang T.2lak sha kiba iap bad T.50hajar sha kiba mynsaw, katba ka sorkar Jylla, ka la mang T.50hajar sha kiba iap bad T.10hajar sha kiba mynsaw.
title: T.3.23lak sha ki lanot hap kali Nongspung

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:U bah Marbud Dkhar President ka FKJGP Mawlai Circle u la ong “Ngi kyndit ba u MLa jong ngi tad hadhu mynta mynne um shym la ang bad kren khyndiat ruh shaphang ka Mawlai Block ka bym pat shym la plie paidbah haduh kine ki sngi”. “Ki MLA jong kiwei ki konstitwensi u bah Paul Lyngdoh bah Ardent ki la kyrkait bad tied miej ha ing dorbar hynrei u MLA jong ngi shi kyntien ruh um kren eiei, i kumba um don shyntur ba un kren, ne um kwah ban kren shaphang ka Block Mawlai, ngim kwah kum une u MLA, ngi kwah da u nongmihkhmat uba shlur ban kren ha ing dorbar thaw-aiñ” ong u bah Marbud haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor ha khyrdop jong ka Ing Dorbar Thaw-aiñ ka jylla. U nongialam ka HYC u bah Donbok Kharlyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingwan ki sengbhalang sha khyrdop ka Ing dorbar ryngkat ki pla kad ka long ban dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban plie noh ia ka Mawlai Block. Ka la don ka jingkynnoh ba ka jingpynslem ban plie ia ka Block Mawlai ka dei namarba ka dei ka jingleh politik jong ka sorkar naba ka Mawlai kam dei ka konstitwensi ba mihkhmat da ka seng Congress bad ba ka don ka jingthmu ban pynhun ia ki briew lajong da kaba leit ia kren ban rah sha Mawpat kaba mihkhmat da u MLA Congress u bah A.L Hek. U bah Lyngdoh u la ong hato ka sorkar haba ka wanrah ia ki kam pynroi hapoh ka jylla ka buh jingmut ban ai tang ha ki jaka ba don MLA Congress, u la ong ruh ba ka sorkar kam dei ban leh politik ia katei ka kam bad ka dei ban plie noh bad tei wut wut kumba ka leh ha kiwei pat ki jaka. U la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewlyngngoh ba saw tylli ki Block la dep ban plie katba ia ka Mawlai pat haduh mynta ym pat leh eiei.U la kyntu ia u myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr.Mukul Sangma ba u dei ba ym dei ban pynlong ia ka shi tarik u iaiong kum ka sngi thok lane ka Aprill Fool hynrei u dei ban plie noh wut wut. U bah Lyngdoh u la ong ruh ba ka jaka ot doh ka don ha Mawlai, ka jaka bret jaboh ka don ha Mawlai, ka Sanker ka don ha Mawlai, ka FCI ka don ha Mawlai, balei ba khohnioh lada wanrah ia ka Block ha Mawlai.
title: Poi ki plakad dawa Block Mawlai sha khyrdop iing Dorbar

content: Shillong, 19 Lber:Utei u MLA ka Mawlai u la ong ba u khlem shongthait ban khih ban ksaid na bynta ka Mawlai C&RD Block bad u la iai dawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban buh beit hapoh u pud u sam ka Mawlai bad ban plie noh ia ka. U la ong ba u la dep ia syllok ruh bad kiwei kiwei pat ki MLA jong kiwei ki konstitwensi ba kin hunlang ia ka jingdawa ban buh hapoh Mawlai. U la pyntip ba u la lum ruh ia ki Rangbah Shnong ka Mawlai Town Dorbar ban ia pyrkhat biang halor katei ka bynta ban tynruh sha ka sorkar halor ka jingpynslem jong ka wat hadien ba ka Mawtawar ka la ai sngewbha ia ka jaka kaba heh haduh Ar akar ruh.
title: “Haba ym tip ia ka jingshisha, wat ialam bakla ia ki paidbah”

content: Shillong, 19 Lber:Ha ki khyndiat sngi ba ladep, u Myntri u la kular bad pynshngain ia kine ki rangbah ba yn ai ia ka hukum ban pynkhuid noh ia u mawshun ba la lum Iypa bad ban shah noh ban trei bad ban shalan ia U Mawshun. “Hynrei kaba sngewsih kthang mynta ka long ba kita ki jingkular kim shym la seisoh bad urlong haduh mynta mynne bad ba ka jingtrei bad shalan Mawshun, ka long tang da kitei ki ar-tylli ki Company Dkhar bad ym da ki Paid Riewlum ka jylla Meghalaya” ong shuh ka kyrwoh.
title: “Khaii mawshun tang ka Komorrah bad ka Lafarge sha Bangladesh”

content: Jowai, 17 Lber:Halor kane ka jingwanpoi u dewiong na bar ri sha ki karkhana dewbilat kiba don ha ka thain Lumshnong, ka JTHTOA ka la pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur bad ha ka juh ka por ka East
