Jaintia Hills Trucks Owner’s Association (EJHTOA) ruh ka la ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura ia ka khubor kaba la pynmih da ka JHTOA hynne ka sngi.Ka JHTOA ka la kynnoh pyrshah ba u dewiong uba la wan poi sha ki kharkhana ki long kiba be-ain namar ym shym la siew ia ka khajna ba bun rukom.“Ka jingshalan dewiong sha kine ki Karkhana ka long khlem ka jingtip ka DMR bad kim don ruh ia ki ko ki sla kaba biang ha kaba shallan ia une u dewiong”, la ong u Nidamon Shullet, President ka JHTOA.Utei u nongialam ka JHTOA u la ong ruh ba kane ka jingiohlad ki Company pynmih dewbilat ha Jaintia hills ban wanrah dewiong na bar ri bad na bar jylla kan ktah shi katdei ia ka khaii ka pateng ki trai ri trai muluk.Ha kajur ka por na ka liang ka EJHTOA, lyngba u kyrwoh ba la phah da u ma Richie L Dhar bad u ma Yes Shylla, u Secretary bad President ka seng ki la ai ka jingkyrshan kaba pura.“Ngi pyrshah jur halor kane bad ki dawa naka sorkar bad ki tnad sorkar ba don bynta ban shimkhia ban pynsangeh shisyndon ïaki karkhana dewbilat ban thied dewiong nabar”, la ong u Richie Dkhar, Secretary ka EJHTOA ia kane ka rukom wanrah ia u dewiong na bar ri sha ri lum Jaintia.Halor kane ka jingkynnoh ki trai trok hapoh ka Lama ka JHTOA, ki heh karkhana Dewbilat ka thain Lumshnong ki la kubor ba ki la thied dewiong na bar ri ka jingremdor palat u dewong mynta nalor ba u dewiong ba la wanrah na ki par dewiong bapher bapher kim long satia kiba lah ban pyndonkam ha ki kharkhana cement plant na ka daw ba bun palat ka Ash, Moisture bad kiwei kiwei.“Mano ban khang ia ngi ban thied dewiong na bar haba ngi don ka hok katkum ki ain sorkar, lada ki lap pat ba ka jingwan poi u dewiong ka long kaba be-ain bad lada ki trok ba shalan dewiong sha ki kharkhana jong ngi kim biang ki kot ki sla lane kim siew khajna, ka sorkar ka dei ban kem bad pynshitom ia ki”, ong ki heh company na Star Cement, Topcem bad kumjuh na Adhunik (Dalmia Cement).
title: Ba thied dewiong ki karkhana dewbilat na USA, Australia bad Malayasia

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:Ka KSU ka la pyntip ba hapoh katei ka Cell ki don da ki spah ngut ki dkhot jong ka kiba long dkhot ban leit khynra ha kylleng ki jaka bad ka la maham ruh ia kino kino kiba mut ban iada ia ki bar jylla naba katei ka seng ka la ong ba ka la tip shai ba kiba bun kiba wan bylla khamtam ki jing bylla dewiong haki thain Nongjri, Rajaju, Diengan, Nongumsur, Saw kilo, Porkut, Nongkulang bad kiwei khambun ki dei ki Nepali, ki khar Bangladesh bad Ki briew kiba ym tip ki wan naei.Ka KSU ka la ong ba ka la shim ia katei ka rai ba tyngeh naba ka la lap ba ki malik dewiong bad ki kontraktor ki kdup ia ki bar jylla khamtam ha ki jaka khappud, ka la maham ruh ia kiba leh Benami. Katei ka seng ka la pynpaw ruh ka jingsngewkhia namar ka jingsynjor jong ki jingkieng iaid kali naduh Ranikor haduh Umpung namar ka jingkitkhia palat ki trok kit dewiong bad ka la byrngem ba kan sa leit ban khynra ia ki trok kiba kit palat ia ka 9 ton, ong ka kyrwoh khubor na u President KSU SWKH.
title: 15 sngi ai por  ka KSU, ia ki malik ban pynbiang laisen nongbylla

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:Haba wanrah ia kane ka kam ha ing dorbar mynta ka sngi, u bah Chyne u la ong ba kamai kompeni sorkar MCCL ka ktah jur tang namar bym don byrni ban thep dewbilat ban pyniaid sha iew.“Kaei ka jingmut ban thung chairman, vice chairman, managing director haba tang ia ka byrni song ruh kim lah ban shim rai” la ong u MLA ka Sohra.“Hato ka dei ka kamram jong u Myntri rangbah ban peit wat tang ia ka byrni ruh”, la ong u MLA ka Sohra.U la ong ba mynta ki trok kiba thmu ban kit dewbilat MCCL ki hap ban shu shong thiah sngi, namar ba ym don byrni ban song dewbilat bad kane ka ktah jur ia ka kamai kajih ka MCCL tang na ine i daw barit.“Hato ki chairman, vice chairman, managing director ki shu shong jahthait ha MCCL”, la buh jingkylli u MLA ka Sohra.U la ong ba lada ka sorkar ka ai kontrak ha u kontraktor ban pynpoi byrni u bym lah ban pynbiang, ka bha ban weng bad ban ai ha kiwei kiba lah.Halor kane u Myntri rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka kam sorkar ka shim por ban shim rai bad kam long kumba long ki kompeni shimet.“Kano kano ka kompeni ba pyniaid ka sorkar kan iai kynduh kum ia kane ka jingeh”, la ong u Dr MukuL.U la ong ba ka kompeni kumba long shawei ki jylla bad ki ri, la dei ban aiti ban pyniaid ki riew shimet bad ka sorkar kan shu iarap.“Kumba long ka MTC, MeECL ki kompeni sorkar kin iaid mad ia kum kane ka jingeh”,la ong u Myntri Rangbah.
title: Duh kamai ka MCCL, bym don byrni

content: Shillong, 17 Lber:
title: Kynshlein u tymmen 70 snem ia ka longkmie

content: Shillong, 19 Lber:Na ki 51 ki don 19 tylli ki longing kiba pyndonkam da ka BPLM, kawei ka BPLU hynrei baroh ki dei ki DLT. Haba kheiñ lang baroh ia ka bai ding ba ka MeECL ka sahram ha ka shnong Kut ka poi sha ka T.5,80,317 tyngka (lait noh ki jingkheiñ ia ki naia). Na katei ka jingkheiñ la iohi ba ka bai-thangding kaba rit eh kaba la shah ot noh ka dei T.5987.17 tyngka jong ka Risting Lawai katba kaba hehduh dei jong ka kong Bakorlang Lawai kaba haduh T.T.47,930.15 tyngka, Udia Sohtun kaba haduh T.43,275.03 tyngka bad Stella Lawai T.29,755.62 tyngka. Kiba bun na kitei ki bill ki dei kiba T.10 hajar shajrong bad T.20 hajar shapoh bad don ruh katto katne kiba hapoh ka T.10 hajar tyngka.Lah ban kdew ba khyndiat sngi mynshuwa ka la don ka jingkhih bitar ki paidbah ha ka por ba ka seng saiñpyrthei ka Aam Aadmi Party ( AAP) ka la leit ban ia kynduh ia kiba bun ki paidbah jong katei ka shnong, namar ka jingshah ot bording bad ka la don ruh ka jingkynnoh ba ka dei ka jingthur mur jong ka tnad MeECL ha kaba la ong ba kam ju pynpoi bai-thangding sha ki paidbah, ym ju don ba wan peit mitar hynrei la pynpoi kynsan ia ka bill hadien 10 snem ba la pyndonkam bad katei ka bill kaba da ki phew hajar tyngka , ka la don ruh ka jingkynnoh ba wat hadien ba la dep ban shah ot ruh ka MeECL ka dang pynpoi bai thangding sha ki paidbah.U Public Relation Officer ( PRO) katei ka tnad u bah P.Sahkhar haba ia kren bad une u nongthoh khubor u la ong ba baroh ki jingkynnoh pyrshah ia ka MeECL ha kaba ia dei bad ka jingjia ha ka shnong Kut ka dei ka bym lah ban pdiang. U la ong ba naduh ba la ai ding ia ki paidbah la ju pynpoi bai-thang ding manla u bnai bad ki don ruh ia ki rikod ba ki leit peit ia u mitar bad ki briew katei ka tnad ki ju leit ruh ban lum pisa bai thangding shaduh sha Shnong. Halor ka jingkynnoh ba wat hadien ba la shah ot ka bill ka dang poi u bah P.Sahkhar u la ong ba ka long kaba dei ba ka MeECL ka pynpoi ia ki bill sha kitei ki longing kiba la shah ot hynrei ha katei ka bill ym shym la khein shuh ia ki bnai ba ki la shah ot bad la pynpoi sha ki ia ki bill kiba rim ha ka por ba ki dang pyndonkam hynrei ha katei ka bill la kheiñlang ia ka Arrears bad ka sut , kumta katba nangmih uwei u bnai ka nangkiew shi nangkiew.U bah Sahkhar u la ong ba katkum ka jingkynthoh ha ki kotkhubor ba ka kong Bakorlang Lawai, ka ioh bill hadien 10 snem ba la ioh ding u la ong ba la ai ding ia ka kong Bakor naduh 1 tarik u nohprah, 2007 bad naduh ba ka la iohding la pynpoi bill manla u bnai hynre ihadhu mynta tang shibnai ruh kam siew, ong u bah Sahkhar da kaba pyni ruh ia ki rikod ba la leit ban peit ia u mitar bad ki bill kiba poi man u bnai. U la iathuh ba napdeng ki 51 tylli ki longing don kiba la siew teng ruh bad don ki bym ju siew ruh bad ka jingkynnoh bym ju pynpoi bill ka dei kaba bakla. Shuh shuh halor ka jingkren u sordar katei ka shnong sha ki kotkhubor u bah Sahkhar u la ong ba ki nongtrei katei ka tnad ki ju leit na ka por sha ka por ban peit mitar bad kumjuh ban lum bai-thangding na ki nongshong pyndonkam bording ha ka shnong Kut hynrei ym ju don ba ujor mano mano ruh ia ka jingeh ba ki ia kynduh kaba pyni ba ka iaid beit iaid ryntih, lada dei ba ki ujor ngi la ioh jingtip ha ophis, u la ong.Une u nongthohkhubor u la kylli na u PRO ka MeECL hato lada jia ba kitei ki ing kiba la shah ot bording ki kwah ban tan bording biang sha ing jong ki katei ka tnad kan dang ai ne-em , “Ngim ai tad haduh ba ki siew ia ki bill kiba rim katkum ka jinglah jong ki la ki kwah ban siew lut shisien siew ne ki kwah ban siew khyndiat khyndiat ruh ngi ailad” ong u bah Sahkhar uba la batai bniah ba lada ki kular ban siew khyndiat khyndiat ruh yn ai ding ia ki wat haba kaba rim kam pat khuid lut ruh. La kylli biang hato kumno katei ka tnad kan leh ia kitei ki pisa kiba la duhei kaba la kot sha ka T.6 lak eiei, u bah Sahkhar u la ong ba ym lah leh eiei shuh lada kitei ki longing kim kwah ding shuh ka mut ka la duhei hynrei lada ki dang kwah bording ka pisa kan wan biang.
title: T.6 lak duna sahram ka MeECL ia ki 50 tylli ki longing ha ka shnong Kut

content: Nongpoh, 20 Lber:Arngut ki shi kurim ki la lait im da ka said, hadien ba kawei ka trok thylli kaba don ia u number MN 01 – 9658, ka la leit tynrah ia ka iing jong kitei ki shi kurim kaba don ha Mawtnum, harud jong ka surok bah NH-6, Ri Bhoi District.Katkum ka khubor ia kaba la ioh ban lum da ki nongthohkhubor, la ong ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia hynnin ka miet ha ka por 12 baje ei ei mynmiet, ha kaba katba kitei ki shi kurim ia kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Ebrin Wajri bad u Bhupen Basumatri, kiba dang iohthiah lyngai ha katei ka iing kaba ki shu shongwai.La ioh jingtip ruh ba donbok, ha katei ka jingjia ym shem la don kiba la mynsaw, hynrei ka la don tang ka jingjulor jong ki tiar ki tar ba kynthup kum ia ka TV,  Dish TV, u Khaw, ki jain, ki shuki lem bad kiwei kiwei.Hynrei ka tyllong khubor na ki pulit, la ong ba ia u nongniah jong katei ka trok kaba la leit tynrah iing briew ym pat la ioh kem, namar tang hadien katei ka jingjia, u la phet noh ialade katba ia katei ka trok u la iehnoh ha katei ka jaka, kumta haba iadei bad kane na ka liang ki pulit kin dang pynlong ia ka jingtohkit khnang ban lap ia ka jingshisha.
title: Da ka said laitim ki shi kurim,  ba tynrah ka trok ia ka iing

content: Shillong, 20 Lber:U MLA ka Sutnga u Bah Hopeful Bamon u la ong ba ki paidbah ha thain Hingiria, Huroi ba don ha khappud bad ka Bangladesh, ki leit shah sumar, leit shim dawai sha Bangladesh bad ka daw ka long ba ki jaka sumar kiba don ha ka thain ki don sha jngai bah.Haba kren mynta ka sngi, hapoh ka ing dorbar u bah Bamon u la ong  “Ki briew katei ka thain ha khappud ki shah pynbor ban leit shim dawai ban shah sumar sha Bangladesh namar ka jingbym don ki lad sumar ha ka thain”.U la ong ba ki dorbar shnong, ki sengbhalang bad ma u ruh kum u MLA, u la ai dorkhas sha ka sorkar ban pynbha bad ban kyntiew kyrdan ia ki sub-centre sha ka PHC, sha ka Sub-centre hynrei khlem lerkam haduh mynta. U la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban peit ia kane ka jingeh jong ki paidbah halor ka koit ka khiah jong ki paidbah.
title: Ha thain Huroi, leit  shah sumar sha Bangla

content: Da u Bah Philip MarweiñShillong, 20 Lber:Dei tang u Jisu hi U ba ai ïa ka bam kaba pynkdang junom bad ïa ka um kaba pynjah sliang shi junom, la ong u Arch-Bishop Dominik Jala jong ka Shillong Arch-Diocese, haba kren kum u nongkñia bakongsan ha ka Mass bakhraw, hadien ba la pynkhuid pynkyntang ïa ka ïingmane thymmai ha Mawhati, ba la jer kyrteng “Sacred Heart Church”. Kane ka la jia-long hynnin ka sngi 19 tarik.U Arch-Bishop u la kylli ïa ki 6000 ngut ki riewngeit kiba la wan sakhi bad ïashim bynta ha kane ka jinglehniam ha Mawhati da kaba ong, “Ha ka Baptisma bakhuid, hato ngi la bamsmai ne em ba ngi ngeit tylli tyllan ha u Blei u Kpa U Nongthaw jong  ka bneng, ka khyndew bad kiei kiei baroh?  Hato ngi la bamsmai ba ngi ngeit ha u Jisu Khrist, u Nongai ïa ngi ïa ka jingim bymjukut bad ha u Mynsiem bakhuid u Nongai ïa ka jingshemphang, jingpynkhuid phar bad u Nongpyntngen? Bad hato la pynbaptis ïa ngi da u Mynsiem bakhuid? Hato ngi la bamsmai ban kyntait phar ïa u Soitan bad ki kam bymman jong u baroh? Balei pat dang don na ngi kiba ngeit ha kiwei pat ki jait blei jong kane ka pyrthei lane ki blei ba ngi shu thaw hi, da kaba ngeit biej ha kiei kiei baroh? Hato ngi la dih ïa ki umktieh umjngut jong kane ka pyrthei, kaba pynjaboh khait ïa ka jingngeit bad ka jingim jong ngi? Hangne ngi la wan ban kylla bak, da kaba pynthymmai noh ïa kane ka rukom im bad ïa ka jingngeit ba la bakla. Phai noh sha u Blei bashisha bad tong noh ïa ka um jong ka jingim junom kaba tuid na ka khet bad ka tyllong jong ka jingim bymjukut jong u Jisu”, la kyntu u Arch-Bishop.Hadien ba pyndep ïa ka jingleh niam pynkhuid pynkyntang ïa ka ïingmane da kaba synreit da ka um ba la kyrkhu, u Archibishop u kren shai ba kane ka ïingmane, kam dei shuh tang ka ïing dewbilat ka bym don jingim, hynrei ka la dei ka ïing ba-im bakyntang, ïing blei, haba kaba u Blei u shong neh na kaba ki riewngeit na Mawhati bad nawei, ki lah ban leit duwai, ainguh bad mane ïa u Blei ba-im, bad ban tong ïa ka um jong ka jingjim bymjukut. U la ong shai ba la tei khnang ïa kane ka ïing ka jong u Blei na ka bynta ki briew, khnang ba kin ïatuid ïaboi ban ïasnoh tylli bad u Blei bad ban khring ruh ïa ki bym pat ïoh ïa ka jingngeit bashisha ha U Blei bashisha. U la ai ka jingïaroh ïa ki paid riewngeit na ka shnong Mawhati kiba la trei shitom bad theh lut ka bor, ka por bad ka spah ban tei ïa kane ka ïingmane blei, ïa u Rangbah Balang, u Bah Emmanuel Lyngdoh bad ïa ki synrop rangbah baling bad khamtam, ïa u Phadar Rangbah, u Fr. Sedish N Marak bad ki phadar ba ïasharai lang ha ka lyngkha jong u Blei, ka Parish Umsohlait, Ri Bhoi District.Ka la don ruh ka jingleh pynkupburom bad pynkmen da ki paidbah riewngeit jong kane ka shnong bad bamarjan shnong, ban pynkhraw pynsah jingkynmaw ïa kane ka sngi khraw ha ka histori balang jong kane ka shnong.
title: Tang U Jisu, uba ai ia ka um ka  jingim ba  junom: Arch Bishop Jala

content: Shillong, 19 Lber:Katei ka jingkren u bah HDR ka dei kaba u la iathuh khana ha katei ka jingialang shaphang ka jingiaid lynti jong u kumno ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi ha Sohiong konstitwensi naduh ka C&RD Block bad kiwei pat, “Ngi la ia khun ban ioh la ka jong ka Block, ngi la leit ban ia kren bad u myntri rangbah ka jylla bad u la ong ba un sa peit, nyngkong nga la duh jingkyrmen, hynrei khlem poi pyrkhat katba ngi dang ia don ha kawei ka jingialang ha State Convention Centre u la pasiaw ia nga bad u la ong ba la mynjur ban thaw ia ka C&RD Block Sohiong. Nga la kmen palat ha katei ka por naba kaei kaba ngim poi pyrkhat ka la urlong bad ha katei ka por da ka jingkmen nga la shim ia ka kti u myntri rangbah nga la buh ha shyllang kum ka dak ka jingburom (u pyni artad da kaba shim ia ka kti lajong), hynrei don pat kiba pynsngewthuh bakla ia kane bad ki la ong ba nga doh ia ka kti u Dr.Mukul bad nga la pynhiar dor ia ka jaitbynriew” ong u bah HDR Lyngdoh.Shuh shuh u la pynkynmaw biang ba ha ka por ba u long myntri kam pohing ha ki snem ba la dep ka la don ka jingiakhih kaba shyrkhei bha ha ka jylla, na bynta ka ishu MBOSE bad hangtei ka sorkar ka la kulmar jingmut bad kam lah ban pynjem kumno kumno ruh ia ki seng bhalang, “Nga la khot ia kren ia ka GSU ha ri Lum Garo, ia kren kumno kumno ruh ban pynjem ym long, nga la ktah na khohsiew jong u President ka GSU ban kyrpad ban weng noh ia ki jingiakhih bad ka la thanda jai-hadien ba mih ki sengbhalang u DG u ong ia nga phi la pynpoh ia ka burom lajong ban lem kumto, nga ong ym lei lei na bynta ka shongsuk shongshngaiñ bad ka jingbha ki paidbah, ngam salia wat ban ktah na kjat jongno jongno ruh lada kaei kaba nga leh kan dei ka jingmyntoi u paidbah” ong biang u MLA ka Sohiong.Katei ka jingringksai jong u ka dei halor jingiaid lynti jong u ban pynioh ia ka Sohiong mynta sa ia ka ïew nongkyndong kaba heh (Rural market) ha ka jinglut kaba T.11 klur shiteng kaba la sdang shaid shaid ban trei mynta kaba u la ong ba ka dei naduh ka por ba long myntri DoNER u bah Ripple Kyndiah (Bam kwai ha dwar u blei) bad u la ong ba ka dei ka jingthmu naduh ka por ba u dang long u Lyngdoh Sohiong naduh u snem 1977 haduh u snem 1988 shuwa ba un rung sha ka politik. Ha katei ka jingialang u la pynsngew ba ka plan ia katei ka iew ka dei ban tei ia ka iew kaba lai mala, ka mala ba ha trai duh ka dei ban ieng kali bad ar mala pat ban buh dukan bad ia katei ka iew yn long trai da ka Sohiong. U la ong ba ka jingdon katei ka iew kan pynriew spah ruh ia ka Hima naba kin lah ban kamai pisa lyngba ki bai-wai dukan bad kiwei pat ki khajna, u la ong ba kan don ruh ka jaka buh mar-rep kaba heh bha kaba 11oo sq.ft bad kaba lah ba nngiam haduh 14 trok ki mar-rep.Ha katei ka jingialang la donlang u Lyngdoh ka Sohiong u bah Bashemphang Lyngdoh Thabah, u BDO ka Sohiong u bah M.A Challam, u Joint Director C&RD u bah J.Massar, kong I.Iangrai Project Director EKH, ki enjiniar kiba la plan bad ki ban peit ia ki kam katba ka jingtrei ka dang iaid bad la don ruh ki longkmie ki rangbah. Ka jingpyntrei ia katei ka iew kaba thymmai ka dei ha ka iew kaba rim kaba la pynpra noh mynta bad la pynkynriah shipor ia ka iew mynta sha kawei pat ka jaka kaba don marjan.
title: “Nga kloi ban ktah nakjat jongno jongno ruh na bynta ka jingmyntoi u paidbah”

content: Jowai, 20 Lber:U CEM ka JHADC u ma Thombor Shiwat mynta ka sngi ha ka jingialang lyngkot ha kamra trei kam jong u, u la aiti ia ka Sanad sha ki ar ngut ki dolloi kiba dang jop thymmai ha ka election Dolloi ba ladep.Kitei ki ar ngut ki Dolloi kiba la ioh pdiang ia ka Sanad mynta ka sngi ki kynthup ia u ma Puramon Kynjin bad u ma Phrangki Rynjah, U Dolloi ka Jowai Elaka bad u Dolloi ka Muskut Elaka. Na ka liang u CEM u la kyntu ia kitei ki Dolloi ban bat la ka akor ka burom ha ka jingtreikam jong ki kum ki Dolloi da kaba burom ia ki ain bad ki kyndon jong ka District Council.
title: Ioh Sanad ar ngut ki Dolloi

content: Nongstoñ, 20 Lber:Ki paidbah nongkyrshan jong u bah L.G. Nongsiej MDC ka Nongstoin, ha ka jingialang kaba la long mynta ka sngi hapoh ka phyllaw iing jong u bah Nongsiej, da kawei ka sur kila iashim ia ka rai ban phah iakhun beit ia u bah Nongsiej kum u kyrtong ha ka election MLA sha ka iing dorbar thaw ain jong ka jylla ka ban sa long ha u snem ban wan.Ha katei ka jingialang la wan ban iashim bynta ruh da ki spah ngut ki nongkyrshan ki jong u ha kaba ki la ia tai sani bha halor katei ka bynta bad hadien ba ki paidbah nongkyrshan ki la shim ia katei ka rai bad ki la ai ka jingkular ban kyrshan na ka liang jong u bah Nongsiej ruh u la mynjur ia katei ka jingtyrwa bad rai beit ban mih madan ha u 2018.Ban pynskhem shuh shuh ia katei ka jingiakut ba la ia rai ha katei ka jingialang la thaw ruh ia ka Committee jong katei ka kynhun na ka bynta ban ia pyrkhat bad iatai sa na ka bynta ka Seng, ba u bah Nongsiej un leit pyniasoh bad na ka liang jong kitei ki paidbah nongkyrshan, ki la ai por ruh 10 sngi ia katei ka committee ban kan pyndep ia ka jingai rai ia ka Seng.Shuh shuh ha kaba iadei bad katei ka committee la jied ruh ia ki katto katne ki dkhot jong ka kiba kynthupi ia u bah H.F. Marngar MDC barim, bah She Kharrit, bah S. Thabah, Commingstar Kharbani, Erristar Lyngdoh, D.E. Lyngkhoi lem bad kiwei kiwei kiba dei ki longkmie bad ki Samla bad la ioh ban jied ruh kumba 81 ngut ei ei ki dkhot na man la ki Primary Unit jong ka Konstitwensi.Hadien katei ka jingialang u nongthoh khubor u la iohlad ruh ban iakren bad u bah Nongsiej bad ha ba kylli la u la don lypa ne ka jingthmu ba un leit ban pyniasoh bad kano kano ka seng bad na ka liang jong u bah Nongsiej, wat la um shym pat la kren shai ia ka seng ba un leit pyniasoh hynrei u la ong pat ba un jied beit ia ki seng Riewlum. Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ha kaba iadei bad ka seng, na ka liang jong u hap ban ap shwa ia ka rai jong katei ka committee bad u la ong ruh ba hadien ka rai jong katei ka committee na ka liang jong u ruh un sa pynbna paidbah noh shi syndon.
title: U bah LG Nongsiej un iakhun election 2018 & shen yn rai ia ka Seng

content: Shillong, 20 Lber:Ka Myntri ka tnad pule puthi ka jylla ka Deborah Marak ka la ong ba ki don haduh 17299 ki kynnah kiba pep skul shiteng por ha jylla jong u snem 2016-17.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da ka MLA na liang synshar ka Dikanchi Shira mynta ka sngi, ka Marak ka la pyni ruh ia jingdon kiba pep skul jong u snem 2017-18 kaba kot sha ka 12406 ngut ki khynnah. Kiwei pat ki snem ki long, ha u snem 2013-14 kiba pep skul ki long 33557 ngut, ha u 2014-15 ki long 31276 ngut, ha u 2015-16 ki long 14957 ngut. Ka jingdon jong ki khynnah ba pep ki skul jong u snem 2016-17 ki kynthup ia ka East Khasi Hills 662 ngut, West Khasi Hills 4508, South West Khasi Hills 874, Ri Bhoi 1041, East Jaintia Hils 692, West Jaintia Hills 1440, East Garo Hills 886, North Garo Hills 1316, West Garo Hills 592, South West Garo Hills 241 bad South Garo Hills ki don 164 ngut.Katkum ka jingong ka Myntri ka daw ka jingpep skul ka long namar ka jingduk, ka jingduna ka bor jabieng, ka jingphiel bunsien, ka jingbym biang ki skul, ka jinglong ki nonghikai, kiba hap ban peit Para, bad ka jingphet shnong. “Ka jingpep skul ka kham jur ha ki shynrang ban ia ki kynthei”, la ong ka Myntri.Halor ka jingkylli kiei ki lad ba ka sorkar ka shim ban weng ia kane ka jingeh, ka Marak ka la ong ba ka sorkar ka la shim ia ki lad ki lynti kynthup ka jingbuh ia ka jaka hikai ban hikai ia kiba pep skul, ka jinghikai ia ki nonghikai ha kane ka bynta.Ka Myntri ka la ong ba ka sorkar ka la pynlong ia ka jingpynshai paidbah khamtam ia ki Kmie ki kpa, ka jingpynrung skul ia kiba pep skul. Ka sorkar ka la buh ruh ia ka jaka hikai ia ki kynnah ha ki skul bapher bapher ha ka jylla da kaba iateh bad ki Seng.Ka ai kot, uniphom, ka ja sngi la ai ei bad pynbiang Kali ban leit shaw bad leit on ha ki jaka ba jynjar. Nalor kine, la ai jinghikai ruh ia ki khynnah ha ki jait kam bapher bapher bad ka jingkular aikam.Ki don 74 tylli ki jaka hikai kyrpang ha East Khasi Hills, 45 ha West Khasi Hills, 39 ha South West Khasi Hills, 43 ha Ri Bhoi, East Jaintia Hills 8, West Jaintia Hills 65, East Garo Hills 24, North Garo Hills 21, West Garo Hills 68, South West Garo Hills 18 bad ka South Garo Hills 13 tylli bad baroh ka long 418 tylli.
title: 17299 kiba pep skul shiteng por

content: Shillong, 20 Lber:Ki khubor ki la sa-phriang sted ha Facebook ba ka jingkhlong Uranium ha ka shnong Nongjri, South West Khasi Hills ka dang iaid shaid shaid ha kaba la ong ba ki la don haduh 1800 tylli ki thliew ba ka kompeni Mahesh-wari Ltd ka la khlong bad ka la song ia ki phngit Uranium ha ki pla plastic. La pyni ruh ha ka dur ba ka kompeni ka la pynieng ia ki mashin heh jong ka ban trei ia katei ka kam.Thang dusmon ki runar ia ka iing sah ki nong trei ka kompani UCIL ha WahkajiKi runar ki bym shymla lah satia ban tip la ki dei kiei, ki la leit ban thang dusmon ia ka jaka sah (Guest House) jong ka ka kompani UCIL da kaba thang da ka petrol nadien ka jaka shet ja jong katei ka iing sah kaba don ha ka shnong Wahkaji SWKHD.Katkum ka tyllong khubor bala phah da u SP ka SWKHD ha ki lad pathai khubor la ong ba katkum ka jingujor bala wan ban ujor da u Johnteibor L.Sangriang CSR Assistant jong ka UCIL la ong ba katei ka jingjia kala jia ha ka step jong ka 19 tarik mynta u bnai ha kapor kumba 1:00 a.m.Shuh shuh ka khubor na u SP ka iathuh ruh ba Mar ia ioh jingtip halor katei ka jingjia u OC ka Mawkyrwat u la her sha katei ka jaka ban pynlong ia ka jingtohkit bad ha katei ka jingleit tohkit la lap ba katei ka iing kala pra na ki bynta jong ka iing shet.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka jingjia ki pulit kila register case ha thanad Mawkyrwat case NO. 5(3)2017 u/s 438 IPC  bad ka jingtohkit ban lap ksai ia ki runar ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: Thang dusmon ki runar ia  ka iing sah ki nongtrei ka UCIL

content: Shillong 20 Lber:Ka sorkar kam pat lah rai ban buh ia ka Block Mawlai, namar ba ki don lai tylli ki jaka ba la tyrwa sha ka sorkar, la ong u Myntri ka tnad Pynroi nongkyndong u bah Sniawbhalang Dhar ha ing dorbar mynta halor ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Mawlai Bah Embhahlang Syiemlieh.“Ngi la ioh biang lai tylli ki jaka kynthup ha Mawtawar, Mawsiat-khnam bad ha Mawpat ban buh ia ka ophis ka Block”, la ong u Myntri.Katkum ka jingju-bab u Myntri, haduh mynta ka sorkar ka dang eksamin bha ia kine ki jaka bad kan sa rai.“Ngi dang eksamin ia ka jaka ban buh ia ka ophis Block”, la ong u bah Sniawbhalang.Ha kawei ka liang, u MLA ka Nongthymmai u Dr Jemino Mawthoh haba shim bynta halor kane, u la ong ba ka saw ngut ki MLA kynthup ma u, u MLA ka Pynthorumkhrah u bah AL Hek, u MLA Mawryngkneng u bah David Nongrum bad u Bah Embhahlang Syiemlieh ki la mynjur lang ban buh ia ka ophis ka Block ha Mawlai Mawroh namar ba kham long ia baroh.Katba u Bah Embhahlang u la ong ba ka sorkar kam dei ban rah shabar u pud u sam ka Mawlai ia ka ophis ka Block.
title: Dang eksamin ka sorkar ia ka block

content: Shillong, 20 Lber:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma mynta ka sngi u la ong ha ka ing dorbar thawain, ba ka sorkar kan ai pisa ia baroh ki samla pule hadien ba la dep ia ka klas ba shiphew ne matric haduh skulbah, kum  shi bynta ban pynshlur ia ki samla ban wan tista sha klas.Haba jubab ia ka jingiatainia halor ka mang tyngka hapoh ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi, u Dr Mukul u la ong,”Mynta u snem hi, ka sorkar kan ai T. 5000 ia ki khynnah pule kiba wan tista sha klas, ha kaba ka jingpoi jongki sha klas kam dei ban duna ia ka 80 percent shaneng”.U la ong ba kane ka jingthmu jong ka sorkar ka long ban pynshlur ia ki samla ban pule tista bad ban trei shitom ha ka jingpule jongki sha jrong namar ba bun kiba pep noh tang ha ki klas barit ban wad kam sorkar. Hynrei ym tang katta, ka long ruh shi bynta ban iarap ia ki kmie ki kpa kiba duk kiba shem jynjar ban siew bai klas ia ki khun jongki.U la ong ba ka long kaba shisha ba ka sorkar ha ki por ba la dep, kam shym la lah ban pynbha ia ka pule puthi namar kiba bun bah ki jingeh hynrei kane ka sorkar kan trei tyngeh ban pynbha ia ka pule puthi kajylla ban pynbiang ia ki jingdonkam kum ki iing, ki tiar jong ki skul.“Na ka bynta ka jingtip ka iing dorbar, nga kwah ban iathuh ba ia ka Engineering College ka ban buh ha syndah ka jaka ba don ka Shillong Polytechnic la dep mang pisa ka sorkar bad ruh ia ka Achitecture and Urban Design ha Tura bad shen yn sa khot tender noh”,la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ki samla kane ka jylla kim dei ban wad kam tang ha kane ka jylla hynrei ki dei ban mih ban leit wad kam shabar ruh bad ha ki tnad sorkar pdeng bapher bapher namar ba ha kane ka jylla ki kam sorkar ki la shlei.Ha kawei ka liang, u la ong ba ka sorkar kan peit ruh ia ka jingeh jong ki nonghikai ha ka jylla. U la ong ba ka jingbun ki kyrdan nonghikai ha kane ka jylla ka la pynkulmar ia ki briew wat ia ki ophisar ka tnad pla tyngka ka sorkar India. “Hangne la bun ki kyrdan jong ki nonghikai, ka deficit, deficit pattern, adhoc, bad bun kiwei”,la ong u Dr Mukul.“Ka sorkar kan peit ia kane bad kan pynbeit ia ki jingdkoh”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah bad bynrap, ba wat ki ophisar ka tnad pla tyngka ka sorkar India haba ka jylla ka leit pan pisa ia ki nonghikai ki la kulmar namar ba ka jingdon palat ki kyrdan jong ki nonghikai.
title: Pynbna U Mukul ban ai T.  5000, ia kiba wan klas tista

content: Shillong, 20 Lber:Ka ing dorbar mynta ka sngi, ka la pdiang ban khot hajir ia u CEO ka Tura Municipal u Zenithsky J Sangma katkum ka jinglap ka Privilege Committee ba la ujor da u MLA ka South Tura u John Leslee K Sangma mynshem snem.Haba pynbna mynta ka sngi, ha ing dorbar, u Lamphang u AT Mondal u la ong ba u CEO u dei ban wan hajir ha iing dorbar ha ka 23 tarik mynta u bnai khlem pep. “Ka shithi lyngba ka tnad ba dei peit ka dei ban pynpoi sha u Zenithsky J Sangma mardor”, la ong u Lamphang.Ia ka kaiphod jong ka privilege committee la wanrah da u Saleng A Sangma bad katkum ka kaiphod ka shem ba u Zenithsky u la pynkhein ia ka kabu jong u John Leslee K Sangma kum u MLA bad namarkata un hap ban shah pynshitom.U Zenithsky u la shah pynshitom hadien ba u la kynnoh ia u MLA ka South Tura ba u pynshit ia ki nongdie madan ha Tura mynshem snem, ha ka por ba ka don ka jing khynra ka Municipal ia ki nongdie madan ha katei ka jaka.Halor kane u John Leslee u la ujor pyrshah ia u Zenithsky uba long ruh u CEO ka Tura Municipal bad ka Privilege Committee hadien ba la tohkit, ka la phah ia ka kaiphod jongka sha ka iing dorbar ban pynshitom ia u Zenithsky.
title: 23 tarik khot hajir ka Ing dorbar,  ia u CEO ka Tura Municipal

content: Jowai, Lber 20:U Secretary ka EJNC, u Sambormi Lyngdoh u la shah kem ha ki pulit ka East Jaintia Hill halor ka jingthmu jong u ban rahbor bad ban dawa pisa ia uwei u bar jylla uba dei u trai kawei ka Restaurant kaba don ha Petrol Pum, Datsimpein Ladrym-bai, East Jaintia Hills.Katkum ka khubor na ki pulit ka EJH, la iathuh ba ha ka 19 tarik, ki trai dukan ki la ujor sha ki pulit ba ki don lai ngut eiei ki briew ki bym lah satia ban ithuh  ki la wanrung ha katei ka restaurant bad ki la shoh la bom la tied bad patan jubor ia utei u trai dukam uba la tip kyrteng kum u Chana Narayan Barman uba dei u riewlum na ka jylla Tripura.Katei ka kynhun ka la patan jubor ia utei u trai dukan shapoh ka kali jong ki kaba dei ka kali Alto ronglieh bad da ka jingiarap ki paramarjan dukan ki la ithuh nombor ia katei ka kali. Ka Nombor jong katei ka kali ka dei ML011-0820.  Haba ki pulit ki la tohkit bniah halor katei ka kali, kila lap ba kadei jong u ma Roibok Lyngdoh uba dei u hynmen trai jong u President ka EJNC, u Sambormi Lyngdoh.Lyngba ka jingtohkit ki pulit la lap ba ia katei ka kali jong u Roibok Lyngdoh la pyndonkam da u Sambormi Lyngdoh ha katei ka meit bad na ka liang ki pulit ka East Jaintia Hills ki la kem noh ia u.Ki pulit ki dang tohkit bniah  ia utei u nongialam sengbhalang ka Rilum East Jaintia Hills ban lap shuh shuh ia ki kam be-ain jong u halor kiwei pat ki kam runar khamtam ha kaba iadei bad ka kam lute bad dawa pisa. Utei u nongialam ka EJNC u la shah kem bad shah set phatok jin haduh lai bnai eiei halor ka jingdonkti jong u ban pynlong DJ bad iadih bad khawai kyiad ha Destination Hotel kaba don ha Mookhep ha u snem bad ladep nalor kiwei kiwei de ki kam be-ain jong u khamtam eh ha kaba iadei bad ka jingsuba jur ki pulit ba u donkti bad ka seng HNLC.U la ju bat teng ia ka kam kum u Vice President ka Jaintia Student Movement ha kaba ha katei ka por u la pyniasoh noh ialade sha ka seng HNLC ha ryngkat u Vive President ka KSU..
title: Thmu U Secretary ka EJNC ban rahbor ia u Trai Dukan

content: Shillong, 20 Lber:Kumba 40 tylli ki ïng briew ki la julor na ka daw ka jinghap phria ha ka  miet sngi saitjaiñ ha ka shnong Erpakon kaba don ha Ri-Bhoi district. Katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka por 6:30 baje mynmiet, iathuh u bah Lambor Kharshilot Secretary shnong jong ka Erpakon. U la iathuh ba ki don sa ar tylli ki ïng kiba la shah rat ha ka lyer bad kitei ki dei ka ing jong ka kong Real Nongsiej bad kong Restina Thongni. Kitei ki ar tylli ki ïng ym long sah briew shuh bad ki shna da ka  dara ha katei ka jaka ban sah shipor.Nalor ki ïng briew u bah Lam u la iathuh ba ka ïng mane jong ka balang Presbyterian ruh ka la shah ktah bad ki tin ba sop ia ka tnum ing mane ki la pei thliew lut. Kiba bun pat na ki ing ha katei ka shnong ki dei kiba la pei thliew ki tin soping, don kiba malu mala bad don kiba la julor bha.Nalor ki ing sah briew u secretary shnong u la iathuh ba ki jingthung jingtep ha katei ka shnong ki la julor lut, u Gram Sevak ba peit ia katei ka thaiñ u la hiar sha katei ka shnong mynta ka sngi ban leit jurip ia ki jingjulor, hynrei la ong ba ym pat ioh jingkheiñ lut ia baroh ki jingjulor.
title: Shah rat 2 tylli ki ïng, julor palat  40 ïng ba hap phria ha Erpakon

content: Shillong, 20 Lber:Hadien ba la sahkut la bun bun bnai, hynrei  mynta ka sngi Lat ka jylla u la mynjur ia ka kyrteng u bah Latiplang Khar-kongor MDC ka Nong-thymmai kum u Executive Member ka KHADC. Haba ia kren bad u bah Latiplang u la iathuh ba u la ioh jingtip ba u Lat u la mynjur, haba la kylli ka tnad aiu un bat ha District Council, u la jubab ba haduh mynta um pat tip.Katkum ka jingioh-lum khubor la iathuh ba u bah Latiplang un bat ia ka tnad kaba heh kaba lah ban dei ka tnad Elaka ne ka khaii pateng kaba u la ju bat teng mynshuwa ha ka por ba dang long CEM u bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit bad bah Adelbert Nongrum.  Lah ban pynkynmaw ba ha ka por ba u bah Latip u la bat ia ka tnad khaii pateng ka iew ka hat ka la khihwin bad ka jingkhynra laisen khaii ka la jur bha ha katei ka por. Ka jingwan phai biang u bah Latiplang sha ka EM ka dei hadien katto katne tylli ki shuki EM ka KHADC ki la sah thylli noh hadien ka jingrisaiñ ki MDC Congress kiba la weng noh ialade na ka PDF.Lah ban kdew ba ki la don ar tylli ki shuki EM ba lait hadien ka jingrisain u bah P.T Sawkmei na ka kam Dy.CEM bad bah Lamphrang Blah na ka kam EM Elaka hynrei kawei la pyndap bad ka dang don sa kawei kaba dang sah. Ka kam Chairman kaba la thylli hadien ka jingrisain u bah Manstudy Nongrem la pyndap da u bah L. G Nongsiej hynrei ia ka kam Deputy Chairman ym pat shym la lah ban pyndap naduh ka jingrisain jong u bah Donevan Kharwanlang MDC ka Sohra konstitwensi. Ki lad khubor  ki la iathuh ba ia kitei ki shuki kiba dang sah thylli u CEM u dang ia kren ban ai bhah ia ki MDC ka HSPDP kiba donlang mynta hapoh PDF.
title: Mynjur u Lat ia u bah Latiplang kum  u EM, lah ban ioh tnad khaii pateng

content: Shillong, 20 Lber:U MLA ka Sohra u bah TW Chyne mynta ka sngi u la ther ia ka jingtreikam ki ophisar ha kane ka jylla ki bym don ka jingkitkhia ia kam. Haba kren halor ka jingiatainia ia ka mang tyngka ha ing dorbar u bah Chyne u la ong, “Don ki ophisar kiba lapmiet ban lehkai kot bad ludo ha komputer khlem treikam. Ki wan ruh 1 pm sha ophis ki mih run 4 pm” la ong u bah Chyne. U la ong, “Katba ki briew kiba leit donkam tang iba rit ruh ki hap ban wan lai sien saw sien tang namar ka jingleh sting ki ophisar ia kam”.U MLA ka Sohra u la ong ba ka por ka la dawa, ia ka sorkar ba kan pynkylla ia ka rukom treikam jongka, lym kumta ka phail kaba dei ban dep tang shi taiew kan shim por da ki bnai bad ka jingmih ka long ba ka jylla kan sahdien. “Ha ka por ba don ka Synshar President Rule ki nongtrei sorkar ki poi ophis 10am bad ki mih 5pm. Balei kim leh kumjuh mynta, balei tang ha ka president rule?”, la buh jingkylli u MLA ka Sohra. Don ki ophisar kiba leh bym suid niew ia ki MLA tang namar ba kim don ha ka liangsynshar, la ong u Bah Chyne.Katba u MLA ka West Shillong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingpynshlur ka sorkar ban seng jam seng jam ki samla kam don jingmut lada kam kylla shwa ia ka jingleh jong ki ophisar sorkar.U la ong, ki ophisar kim iarap ia ki samla bad ki leh baheh. U la ai nuksa ba uwei u samla uba seng kam lajong u leit pan permit ban shalan syiar na DTO ophis, hynrei  u shah leh bym salia haduh ba un leit pan jingthoh na u Dr Jemino Mawthoh u MLA. “Hato ki samla kin shlur ban seng kam haba ki ophisar kiba dei ban iarap ki leh kumne”, la ong u bah Paul.
title: Don ki ophisar kiba shu lehkai  kot, ludo ha ophis, ong u MLA

content: Mairang, 21 Lber:Ka seng Tulba kaba la ju tip kum ka wei ka seng ki nongniah thuk thuk, ha ka sngi saitjain jong ka taiew ki la leit hiar sha ka shnong Tengri West Khasi Hills District, ban pynlong ia ka programe halor ka rep ka riang, ha kane ka program halor ka rep ka riang la ioh ruh ban ai jingpynsngew-thuh ia ki paidbah ha kane ka shnong.U president ka TULBA u bah Seibor L. Nonglait haba ai jingkren ha kren ha kane ka sngi u la ong, “Ka jingthmu ba kongsan eh bad ka thong jong kane ka jinghikai, ka long ban kyntiew ia ki nongrep ha ka kam rep kam riang ym tang ha ki kam rep hynrei ka kam ri jingri ruh kumjuh, kaba kongsan eh ha Ri India hi ka dei ka ban pynkhlain ia ki kam rep”.“Ngi wan hangne ban shim bynta lang ban iarap lem ia phi ban plie lynti , ban ai jinghikai , ai jingmut bad pynshai haba ia dei bad ki scheme bapher ba pher, ha ka jylla jong ngi, ngi don ia ki tnad kum ka agriculture, horticulture, Cr&d block, Veterinary, ICAR, NABARD bad kiwei.Na kine ki tnad lah ban ioh ki jingiarap bapher bapher haba ia dei bad ka kam rep bad ka ri jingri” ong u bah Seibor. Kawei pat ka jingeh ka long ka jingkyrduh kam bad jingbym iohkam iohjam ha ki thain nongkyndong kaba pynlong ia ki paidbah na ki nongkyndong ban kiew ban wad kam katba ioh ha sor.Une u President u la ong ruh “Na ka liang jong ka sorkar pdeng bad sorkar jylla ruh ki pynshlur ki pynmih bun jait ki skhim bad ka ai jingiarap ban thied ki mashin na ka bynta ki nongrep. Ka la dei ka por ba ngin shim ia ka kabu jong ka jingstad kum ka juk mynta khnang ba ngin lah ban pynkhlain ia ka rep ka riang.Kumba phi ïohi mynta ka jinghiran ka pyrthei mynta jingkyrduh kam bad ka jingkhang pom dieng , tih shyiap, tih mawria, tih mawshun, tih dewïong ka la ktah jur ia ki briew ka Meghalaya ha ka ioh ka kot. Kumta ngi dei ban phaikhmat ban ialeh katba lah ban pynkhlain ia ka kam rep, khamtam ka jylla Meghalya bun ki mar bam ka dang ap na shabar ia ki jing don kam ba manla ka sngi, kum u khaw, ka shini bad kiwei kiwei”.Ha kane ka sngi ia ka programe la pyniaid da u vice president bah Splendour sawkmie, ha kane ka sngi la iadon lang ruh ka kong F.M. Lakiang BDO Mairang,H.D Tallang scienctist ICAR Utpal Bezbaruah District Development Maneger West bad South West Khasi Hill District.
title: “Dei ban pynkhlain ia  ka rep ha nongkyndong”

content: Shillong, 20 Lber:Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ha u jylliew mynta u snem u Chief Executive Member (CEM) ka KHADC u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem uba dei ruh u MLA bad MDC ka Mawsynram konsti-twensi u lah ban risaiñ noh na ka kam MLA. Ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ruh ba tang mar ia dep risaiñ na ka kam MLA u bah Pynshngaiñ un shimti noh kum u President ba pura jong ka People Democratic Front ( PDF) kaba haduh mynta ka dang dei tang ka Adhoc Body bad kaba dang don tang ki nongkitkam ba shipor.Kiba bun ki MDC kiba don jingthmu ban ia khun na ka PDF ha u 2018 ki la iathuh ba kan shem jingeh ia ki ban pyntyllun ia ki kam jong ka PDF khamtam ban pynkhlaiñ na bynta ka elekshon 2018 lada u bah Pynshngaiñ um risaiñ naba ka aiñ kyntiap seng ka teh ia u kumba ka long mynta. La ong ba ha u bnai jylliew ne naitung mynta u snem ka PDF kan pynbna ruh ia ki kyrtong jong ka na ka bynta u 2018 bad katei kan dei ka bynta ba nyngkong jong ka jingpynbna kyrteng ka ban wan shuwa da ka thup kyrteng jong ki MDC ha ki katto katne tylli ki konstitwensi.Ha kine ki khyndiat sngi u nongthohkhubor, u la ioh ban ia kren bad katto katne ngut ki MDC ka KHADc kiba don hapoh ka People Democratic Forum ( PDF) bad ki la pynpaw ba ki la rai ban ia khun beit na ka PDF ha u 2018.  Katto katne ngut na kiba la dep ia kren kum u bah Morning Mawsor, u bah Latiplang Kharkongor bad sa kiwei pat kiba ym pat kwah pynpaw ki la pynpaw ka jingsngewskhem bad ka jinglong ba la khreh ban ia khun na katei ka seng sainpyrthei kaba thymmai.Ka mang tyngka ka sorkar kaba khlem don lynti iaidHa kawei pat ka khubor, U MLA ka Mawsynram uba shah sospen ha ka Congress u Bah Pynshngain Syiem, u la ong ba ka mang tyngka jong kane ka sorkar ka dei kaba lymmuh, khlem pyrkhat, khlem lynti iaid bad kaba dum ia ka jylla.Haba shim bynta mynta ka sngi ha ka iing dorbar halor ka jingiatainia halor ka mang tyngka, u Bah Pynshngain u la ong, “Ka mang tyngka jong kane ka sorkar ka dei kaba khlem don eiei ka jingkyrmen namar ba kam don ka lynti iaid, kaba khlem pyrkhat janai”.U la ong ba kumba ka paw kane ka sorkar ka don tang ka kynhun myntri kaba leh shiliang ban theh skhim tang ha ki konstitwensi lajong ki myntri sorkar bad ka long kumba kim long myntri ia ka jylla.“Kumno ngin khmih lynti ba ka sorkar kan leh ia ki paidbah haba ki myntri jongka, ki dei kiba shu pynleit jingmut tang ia ki konstitwensi lajong”, la ong u Bah Pynshngain bad bynrap ruh, ba wat ia u ophisar (khlem da niew ia ka kyrteng u Bah HM Shangpliang) ruh ka ailad ba un leit sha ka jingialang bym dei jong ka sorkar kaba la jia ha ka konstitwensi jongu ha Mawsynram.U la ong ba ka mang tyngka ha kine ki saw snem ki dei kijuh suda khlem don kano kano ka jingpher eiei bad haba ka jylla ka don ha ka jingbym khlain ha ka iarong pisa, kan nym lah ban iaid shakhmat.“Ka jylla ka kiew lada ka don ka jingkhlain ha ka pisa bad ka jingtbit ban pyniaid ia ka, hynrei kane ka sorkar kam don satia ia kine”, u la ong.Kaba khampher jong kane ka mang tyngka ka long ka jingpynkiew khajna ia ki kali kaban ktah jur ia ki paidbah ha ka leit ka wan bad ka kamai kajih, la ong u MLA ka Mawsynram. U Bah Pynshngain u dei uwei na ki MLA uba la iakhun pyrshah ia u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma haduh ba ka party ka la sospen syndon ia u.
title: Ha u Jylliew yn risaiñ  MLA u bah P.N. Syiem?

content: Shillong, 21 Lber:Ki don 6471 ngut ki nongbylla sngi ha ka jylla kiba la rejister ban ioh jingiarap na ka sorkar khamtam ka bai dawai dashin bad kiwei ki skhim.Ia kane la iathuh da ka Myntri ka tnad bylla ka jylla ka Kong Ampareen Lyngdoh haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ba wanrah da u MLA ka Nongthymmai u Dr Jemino Mawthoh hynne ha ing dorbar.Ka Myntri ka la ong ba ki jingiarap ba ka sorkar ka ai ia ki nongbylla ki long ha ki ha por Kha Khun, baibam tymmen, ban thied ing, ia kiba duna dkhot met, ka ram ban thied tiar, haba iap, ia ki Khun ba leit pule, bai Sumar, bad kiwei. Halor kane u Dr Mawthoh u la ong ba tang 6000 ki nongbylla ba rejister ka dang duna palat ha kane ka jylla ha kaba ki don bun bah ki nongbylla bad ka sorkar ka dei ban leh eiei ban pynshai ia ki paidbah ha ki shnong kylleng kylleng ban pynthikna ba ki nongbylla kin tip ban leh ia Kane.Ka Myntri ka la ong ba ka daw ka jingduna kiba wan pynrung kyrteng ka dei namar ba ki kontraktor kiba dei ban leh ia kane, bun kim treh ban wan shakhmat. “Ka sorkar ka buh T. 10 tyngka uwei u nongbylla ban pynrung kyrteng bad kiba lah ban rejister ki dei hapdeng 19-60 snem”, la ong ka Myntri.
title: 6 hajar ngut ki nongbylla ba  rejister ban ioh iarap na ka sorkar

content: Shillong, 21 Lber:Ha ka 24 bad 25 tarik mynta u bnai ka Society for Promotion of Tourism (SPT)  pynlong da ka tamasa ban pyni paidbah ia ki nongwan jngohkai pyrthei ia kiba bun ki jaka jngohkai kiba paw ha ki thain ka East Jaintia Hills bad ia katei ka tamasa la tip kum ka  Discover East Jaiñtia Tourism Festival, 2017 , yn pynlong ia katei ka tamasa ha Khliehriat. Nalor ka jingpyni nam ia ki jaka kan don ruh ka jingpyni nam ia ki jingshet jingbam tynrai, ki jingshad tynrai, ka jingiaid kjat, ka jingniah thuk thuk bad ka jingniah saikil.U  Bah Glorious Bareh, Coordinator ka Society for Promotion of Tourism u la ong ba katei ka tamsa kaba yn pynlong ha Khliehriat West Youth Welfare Playground, Khliehriat kin don ruh kiwei pat ki jingpynbyrngia kum ka jingiaid kjat ba ai kyrteng kum ka  East West Eco Trail bad ka Prang River off Road Bike rally, ka jingniah saikil, bad ka jingpynlynguh da ki kynhun nongtem bapher bapher. Kane ka jingiaid kjat kan sdang na Ialong Park sha ka shong Tuberkmai lyngba ka Pynthor Langtein katba ka jingniah thuk thuk kan sdang na Khliehriat bad iaid lyngba ka shnong Rymbai, Borkhat, Huroi, Hinguria bad phai biang sha Khliehriat. Kin don ruh ki kynhun tem ban pynshongshit ha kitei ki ar sngi kiba kynthup ia ka  Melominds, The Scores, Agape, Enbloc Bond bad Chyrmang Link.
title: 24tarik, tamasa  jngohkai pyrthei ka Jaintia

content: Shillong, 21 Lber:Ki dkhot ka liang pyrshah mynta, ka sngi ki la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynkylla ia ka polisi thungkam ha ki tnad sorkar da kaba ailad ia ki samla kiba dei na ka thain haba thungkam ha ki ophis sorkar kiba don ha kano kano ka bynta jong ka jylla.Haba wanrah ia kane ka mat ha iing dorbar u MLA ka Sohra u Bah TW Chyne u la ong ba haba ka sorkar ka plie ne buh ia kano kano ka ophis treikam khamtam ha ki jaka nongkyndong, kaba kongsan ka dei ban ailad ia ki samla jong kato ka thain ban pynrung kam ha ka Grade IV bad III bad ia kane, dei ban leh khlem da donkam ban shim personal interview kumba la rai ka sorkar pdeng ba la ialam da u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi.“Ka sorkar ka dei ban pynduh noh ia ka personal interview ha ka thungkam ha ka Grade IV bad III ha ka jylla bad ka dei ban thung ia ki samla na ka thain ba ka don ka ophis ha baroh ki district ha ka jylla”, la ong u MLA ka Sohra.Katba u nongialam liangpyrshah u Dr Donkupar Roy uba kyrshan ia kane, u la ong ba peit nuksa haba ka sorkar ka plie ia ka ophis ka Bhoirymbong, ki samla ki rah plakad rah lama iong namar ba ki dawa ba dei ban aikam ia ki samla na ka thain haba ka sorkar ka plie ne thaw ia ka Block. “Haba ka sorkar ka plie ne thaw ia ka Block ne Civil Sub Division, ne ka district, ki samla kato ka thain ki kmen ban don ka jingmyntoi ba kin ioh kam”, la ong u Dr Donkupar.Hynrei namar ka jingbym don ka polisi ka sorkar ka la pynlong ia ki ban duh jingkyrmen kumba jia iaka jingplie ia ka Bhoirymbong, u la ong.Katba Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingailad ia ki samla kiba dei na ka thain kan pynlong ia ki ban kham lah ban ai ia ka jingiadei bad ki paidbah haba ki wan donkam ha ka ophis. “Ka donkam ruh ia ki nongtrei sorkar ban ai jinghikai kumno ba kin iarap ban shakri ia ki paidbah namar ba lada ki nongtrei kim lah ban pyniadei bad ki paidbah, ki kam sorkar kim poi shaei shaei ruh”, la ong u Bah Paul.U Bah Paul u la ong ba ka jingthung ia ki dkhot ka District Selection Committee da ki politishian ka pynsniew dur ia ka jingthungkam namar ba kan wanrah ia ka jingbamsap, bad ka jingjied tangia ki briew kiba iadei.Haba jubab halor kane, na ka liang u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar kan peit ia kane ha kaba kan nym thung ne pyndonkam shuh da ki politishian ban long ki dkhot ka DSC ne MPSC khnang ban wanrah ia ka jingkhuid ha ka jingthungkam.U myntri rangbah u la kyntait ban bud ia ka jingbthah ka sorkar pdeng ban pynduh noh ia ka personal interview ia ki kam Grade IV bad III hynrei kala shu pynkylla ia ka rukom ai mark .U Dr Mukul u la ong hadien ba ka sorkar ka la ioh ia ka jingthoh na ka sorkar pdeng ban pynduh noh ia ka personal interview ia ki kam Grade IV bad III, ka la phah ia ka jingthoh sha ka sorkar pdeng ba ka la pynkylla ia ka rukom ai mark ia kiba ialeh eksam jong ka personal interview ban pynlait na ka jingsuba ne mutdur thungkam da ka lynti bym dei.“Ngi la rai ban nym pynduh ia ka personal interview hynrei la pynkylla ia ka rukom ai mark. Na ka 300 mark, ngi la rai ban ai mark ia ka personal interview tang 10 mark, katba kiba sah yn shim na ka written eksamin”, la ong u Dr Mukul.
title: Haba plie Block, Sub-Division, District ai kam ia ki samla ka thain

content: Shillong, 21 Lber:Ka shnong Mawphu kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit ka sub division PHE Sohra ka dang jynjar ban ioh umdih na ki kor tong um, namar ba lah bun ki top um kiba lah jot bad pei thliew bad kiba khlem pynbha haduh mynta. Bun ki nongshong shnong ki ju bynniaw ha kaba iadei bad kane, naba ki hap ban leit tong um naki tyllong um kiba kham jngai na ka shnong bad ki hap ruh ban kit ia ki khiew, ki klong ha ki khoh ban leit tong umdih na kine ki jaka. Kane ka ju jia barabor hapoh kane ka shnong namar ba jngai ki jaka tong um bad ki ju pynlut ruh bun ka por ha ka ban maramot ka leit tong um. Kumta na ka liang ka shnong ka sngewkhia ha kaba iadei bad kane bad ka kyrpad ia ki bor dei peit ba kin pynbha noh khamkloi ia kine ki top um kiba lah jot khnang ba kin ioh biang ka um dih hapoh ka shnong, ong ka kyrwoh na u Para Legal Volunteer ka Shnong Mawphu Bah Betorien Wanroi.
title: Jynjar ka Umdih, lyngba  ki kor hapoh Mawphu

content: Shillong, 21 Lber:U Myntri ka tnad khajna ka jylla u Zenith M Sangma u la ong ba ka Goods and Services Tax (GST) kan treikam naduh ka 1 tarik Naitung mynta u snem ha Kane ka jylla.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli mynta ka sngi ha ing dorbar ba la wanrah da u MLA u Winnerson D Sangma, u Myntri u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la buh thong ban py treikam naduh u Naitung tangba ia ka rai ba khadduh yn shim da ka GST council halor Kane. “Ka GST kan ai jingmyntoi shibun ia ka jylla”, la ong u Myntri.U la ong ba ka GST ka dei ka khajna kaba la rai ka sorkar pdeng ban pynkylla dur ia ka rukom shim khajna ha ka ri baroh kawei kaban mih bujli noh na baroh kiwei ki rukom shim khajna ba mynshwa.Ka GST kan lum khajna na ka Excise duty, service tax, custom, VAT, sale tax, bad kiwei.“Baroh ki jinglum khajna yn hap lut ha ka GST ha kaba kan weng ia ka jingtlot ha ka rukom lum khajna ba mynshwa bad kan weng ia ka jingktah na ka jingkiew dor ki mar ki mata”, la ong u Myntri.
title: Ka GST kan treikam naduh  u Naitung ban wan, ong u Myntri

content: Nongstoiñ, 21 Lber:Ki katto katne ngut ki nongkhaii dewiong ka thain West Khasi Hills, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingshah kynnoh u District Mining Officer jong ka tnad DMR Nongstoin, West Khasi Hills, ba u la don kti ban iarap sei tuh ia ki Challan jong ki katto katne ki nongkhaii dewiong ka thain sha uwei u nong-khaii na Jylla Assam, khlem ka jingtip da ki trai Challan.Ka kyrwoh khubor bala phah da ki 6 ngut ki nongkhaii dewiong ba kynthup ia u bah I. Diengngan, bah Bendrowell Hahshah, bah S. Marbaniang, K. Sangriang, R. D. Lyngkhoi bad u bah Donkupar Syiem, ka ong ba “Kumba kala paw ha ki katto katne ki kot khubor ha kine ki khyndiat sngi, na ka liang jong ngi ki nongkhaii dewiong kaba ngi im na kane ka kam khaii dewiong bad kiwei kiwei ki para nongkhaii dewiong ngim sngewtynnad ia katei ka jingshah kynnoh pyrshah ia u tei u ophisar khlem da lah ban pynshisha”.Shuh shuh ka kyrwoh khubor ka ong ruh ba katei ka jingkynnoh ia u tei u ophisar ka tnad DMR ka long ka bym don nongrim hynrei kadei beit tang ka jingthmu pynthoh bria ia u tei u ophisar bad ia ka tnad ryngkat ia ngi lang ki para nongkhaii kumba la kynnoh.“Lada katei ka jingkynnoh ka long kaba shisha bad lada ki trai Challan ki lap ba kila shah sei tuh ia ki Challan jong ki kidei ban mih shakhmat bad kumjuh dei ban leit ujor ruh sha kibor jong ka ain ha ryngkat ki jingpynshisha ym ban shu pynthoh bria ia ka tnad DMR kumjuh ruh ia u tei u ophisar” ong biang ka kyrwoh.
title: Sngewkhia ki nongkhaii ba shah kynnoh u ophisar

content: Shillong, 21 Lber:Ka MLA na liang-synshar ka Dikkanchi D Marak kaba dei ka lok u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma, ka la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban tohkit halor ka jingshna ia ki painkhana ha ki skul LP bad UP skul ha jylla.Haba wanrah ia Kane ka mat hynne ha ing dorbar ka Dikkanchi ka la ong ba don bun bah ki skul kiba khlem don ki painkhana bad lada ki don ruh kiba don tangba kim biang. “Ka sorkar ka dei ban shim Ki lad ki lynti ban thung da ka jingtohkit halor Kane”, la ong ka Myntri.Halor kane, u Myntri sam um ka jylla u bah Prestone Tynsong u la ong ba ka sorkar kan peit halor kane. U la ong ruh ba la dep shna 13501 ki painkhana shynrang bad 14867 ki painkhana kynthei ha ki Lower Primary bad Upper Primary skul ha ka jylla.U bah Tynsong u la ong ba ia kine ki painkhana la shna hi da ka tnad PHE bad ka MeECL bad baroh lah dep siew lut ia ka pisa.
title: Dawa tohkit ka Dikkanchi ia  ka jingshna painkhana ia ki skul

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:U Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar kan burom ia ka sur jong u paidbah ka jylla halor u uranium ha ka jylla. Haba jubab ia ka jingiatainia ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongkrem u Bah Ardent M Basaiaw-moit mynta ka sngi ha iing dorbar u Dr Mukul u la ong ba ka jingrai ka sorkar ban pyndam ia ka jingaiwai ia ki jaka ba heh 444 hektar ha thain Domiasiat sha ka UCIL ka paw shai ia ka nongrim ba ka sorkar ka burom ia ka sur jong u paidbah ka jylla.“Ka jingpyndam ia ka soskular aiwai ia ka jaka ba 444 hektar sha ka UCIL ka kren shai ba ka sorkar ka burom ia ka sur u paidbah ka jylla”,la ong u Dr Mukul. U la ong ba ha u snem 2010, u la dep iakren bad u Myntri Rangbahduh barim ka ri u Dr Manmohan Singh ba ka sorkar pdeng ka dei ban sangeh ban thmu tih uranium na jylla Meghalaya namar ba ka long pyrshah ia ka sur jong u paidbah. “Naduh kane ka snem, haduh mynta ka sorkar ka ieng skhem halor kane ka nongrim ba lymda ki paidbah ka jylla ki pdiang, ym dei ban tih ia u uranium”,la ong u Dr Mukul.U la ong ba ym dei ban long kapkap halor kane namar ba ka sorkar kan nym ailad ban tih uranium kumba la pynpaw da ki paidbah ka jylla,la ong u Myntri Rangbah. Ha kajuh ka por, u Dr Mukul u la pdiang ia ka jingai jingmut u Bah Ardent ban thaw ia ka komiti ha kaba ki MLA ki myntri sorkar kin leit jurip sha thain Mawthabah, ha kaba ki don haduh kumba 1500 tylli ki thliew ba la ksam uranium ka UCIL.Shwa ia kane, na ka liang u Bah Ardent u la ong ba ka party HSPDP kam nym lah ban iapein ia ka jaitbynriew bad u uranium bad da lei lei kan pyrshah beit lada don kiba thmu ban tih uranium ha ka jylla.U la ong ba haduh mynta ym pat don ki stad ban pynthikna ba u uranium um ktah ia ka koit ka khiah jong ki briew bad ia ka mariang, bad u la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban nym ailad da lei lei ia kane ka jingthmu ka sorkar pdeng ban tih ia u uranium.Ha kane ka jingiatainia, la kyrshan ruh da u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, Bah TW Chyne, Dr Jemino Mawthoh, u Bah KP Pangniang, Bah D Jyndiang.
title: Ka sorkar kan nym shah ban  tih Uranium, ong U  Mukul

content: Shillong, 21Lber:U Myntri rangbah ka jylla u la ong ba ki don 45 tylli ki Karkhana ot dieng ha ka jylla baroh kawei kiba ioh license.Ha ka jingjubab ia ka jingkylli ba wanrah u MLA ka Rambrai u Bah KP Pangniang ha ing dorbar mynta ka sngi, u Dr Mukul u la ong ka sorkar ka la thmu ruh ban buh shuh ia ki iew Karkhana ne industrial estate ha ki sub-division jong ka jylla da kaba iaid katkum ki kyndon ka sorkar pdeng.U la ong ba ka tnad Environment, Forest & Climate Change ka la phah ia ki kyndon ha kaba iadei bad ki karkhana of dieng ha 11 tarik Naiwieng 2016 sha ka sorkar jylla.U la ong khnang ban weng ia ki jingeh jong ki nongkyndong, ka sorkar ka la buh ia ki 7 tylli ki karkhana ot dieng ha ka jylla kynthup ka Khliehtyrshi ha West Jaintia hills, ka Umiam, Byrnihat, Nongpoh ha RiBhoi, Mawiaban West Khasi Hills, Tura ha West Garo Hills, bad ha Daugre ha East Garo Hills.U la ong ruh ba ka sorkar ka la thaw ia ka state level expert committee na ka bynta ki Karkhana dieng ha u Rymphang 2017 katkum ki kyndon ba la bthah da ka sorkar pdeng. Ka komiti kan bishar ruh na ka bynta ban buh ia ki Karkhana dieng ha ki district katkum ki kyndon ka ain, u la ong. U Myntri rangbah u la ong ba ka sorkar ka la bthah ia ki Karkhana dieng ban plie ia ki jaka buh dieng na ka bynta ban plie lad ia ki paidbah ban thied dieng ia ki jingdonkam jongki.
title: 45 tylli ki Karkhana ot dieng  ba don laisen, ong u Dr Mukul

content: Shillong, 21Lber:U MLA ka Nong-stoin u Bah D Jyndiang u la ong ba ka sorkar kam dei ban ai jaka sha ki shipai ka ri India kynthup ia ki BSF hapoh 20km u pud u sam ka Nongstoin.Haba wanrah ia kane ka mat ha ingdorbar mynta ka sngi, u bah Jyndiang u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban sangeh shi syndon ban pyrkhat ban ai jaka sha ki shipai namar ba ki paidbah ka Nongstoin kim kwah ban mad jingeh kumba jia ha sor Shillong. “Hapoh 20 km na Nongstoin ngin nym shah ban buh ktem shipai. Shabar une u pud ngi lah ban ai jaka”, la ong u MLA ka Nongstoin.U la ong ba ki shipai BSF ki dei ban leit shong buh ktem sha Maweit ne sha Shahlang ba jan khappud ym sha sor Nongstoin.Haba jubab halor kane, u Myntri kam pohiing u bah HDR Lyngdoh u la ong ba ha ka jingshisha ki trai jaka ki la rai ban ai ia ki jaka ban buh ktem ki shipai BSF 65 Battalion ha Sohpian hynrei la pulom noh hadien ba pyrshah ka dorbar shnong.Hynrei u DC Nongstoin u la ioh jingtyrwa biang ia ka jaka ha Umjaram, Pyndengrei Nongstoin ba la tyrwa 10 ngut ki trai jaka kynthup u MLA ka Mawshynrut u Bah Witting Mawsor ban ai jaka sha ki BSF kumva 100 akar.Hynrei haba la pan ia NOC ban pynshisha ia ki jaka, kim shym la lah ban leh ia kane bad kumjuh ka dorbar shnong kam pdiang ban bun ktem shipai ki BSF.“Kane ka kam ka la kut noh namar ka jingpyrshah ki paidbah bad bym ailad ka dorbar shnong”, la ong u bah HDR Lyngdoh.U la ong ba ki BSF ki la ioh jingtyrwa na ka kur Sohbar ha Shahlang hynrei kim treh bad ki kwah beit ban buh ktem ha Thain Nongstoin.“Kano kano kaba pyrshah ki paidbah, ka sorkar kan nym leh da ka bor”, la ong u bah HDR Lyngdoh.
title: “Tyrwa jaka U MLA Mawshynrut ia ki BSF”

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:Mynta ka sngi palei u ehrang jong ka seng lehnoh ASAK u la wan ban pyndem hakhmat ki pulit, utei u dei u dkhot ba rangbah jong ka GNLA uba la tip kyrteng kum u Raksim Ch Momin, 22 snem karta uba ju khot sin u Arikam hynrei u la phet noh na ka GNLA bad u la thaw ia ka ASAK. U la ia soh bad ka GNLA ha u snem 2012 ha ka kynhun kaba san hynrei ha u 2013 pat u la mih na katei ka seng ryngkat bad u Reding T Sangma bad ki la thaw ia ka ASAK.U la wan pyndem ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang ki nongialam balang bad ki bahaing hasem. Katkum ka jingong jong u SP ka East Garo Hills u Vivekanand Singh u la ong ba utei u dei u lehnoh uba runar bha bad u dei uba j uteri ha ki thain ka East Garo Hills bad South Garo Hills. U de iruh uba la wan pyndem teng ha u snem 2014 ha Baghmara bad hadien u la shah kem biang bad la set ia u hapoh phatok ha Williamnagar hynrei u la lait phet na phatok ha u snem 2015 ryngkat bad 5 ngut kiwei pat bad u la isoh bad ka AMEF. Ha ka AMEF ruh um shym la shong slem bad u la mih noh ha u nohprah 2015.
title: Wan pyndem u ehrang ASAK

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:Ka iing dorbar mynta ka sngi ka la map noh bad weng ia ka jingpynshitom ia u CEO ka Tura Municipal u Zenithsky J Sangma hadien ba u la panmap hapoh ka iing dorbar thawain pyrshah ia ka jingujor jongu, ia u MLA ka South Tura u John Leslee K Sangma.U Zenithsky uba la shah khot hajir ha ka iing dorbar hadien ba ka Privilege Committee ka la lap ia ka jingleh tam jongu, ban pynkhein ia ka kyrdan jong u MLA.“Nga panmap na u MLA ka South Tura John Leslee K Sangma bad ia ki dkhot ka Privilege Committee”, la ong u Zenithsky hapoh ka iing dorbar.U Lamphang ka iing dorbar u AT Mondal uba pyniaid ia ka dorbar, u la ong, “Ka iing dorbar ka la pynngat ia phi halor ka jingpynkhein ia ka kabu jong u MLA ka South Tura”.Shen hadien ba la panmap u Zenithsky, u Lamphang u la pan jingkynthoh na u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma halor kane. U Myntri Rangbah u la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew phylla namar ba kum kane ka jingjia, ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ha ka jinglong MLA jongu naduh u snem 1993 haduh mynta.“Ka dei ka sien kaba nyngkong naduh ba nga long MLA naduh u snem 1993 ban don kum kane ka jingjia. Ai ba kane ka jingjia kan dei ka nuksa hadien habud bad ba kan nym jia biang”, la ong u Myntri Rangbah.U la ong, “Namar ba u ophisar u la panmap da ka mynsiem baroh, ngin nym iaid shuh shakhmat ban pynngat kam ia u bad weng noh ia ka jingpynshitom”,la ong u Myntri Rangbah.U la ong ba ki ophisar ki dei ban sngewthuh ba ka iing dorbar ka dei kaba la bynshet kat kum ka synshar paidbah bad ym dei ban jia biang kum kane hadien habud.Kumjuh u Lamphang u la ong “Namar ba ka iing ka la pdiang ia ka jingpan map jong u ophisar, ia kane ka kam la pynkut noh bad la weng”. Ha shwa ban shah ia u Zenithsky ban mih na jaka ba la pynieng ia u ha iing dorbar, u Lamphang u la bthah ia u ban dem sha baroh ki dkhot ka liangsynshar bad liangpyrshah jong ka iing dorbar.Shwa ia kane, u James K Sangma u la pynpaw ba um iahap ban khot hajir ha iing dorbar ia u ophisar bad u la mih noh shwa ban shim bishar ia u Zenithsky.Lah ban kdew ba ka ing dorbar mynta ka sngi, ka la khot hajir ia u CEO ka Tura Municipal u Zenithsky J Sangma katkum ka jinglap ka Privilege Committee ba la ujor da u MLA ka South Tura u John Leslee K Sangma mynshem snem.Ia ka kaiphod jong ka privilege committee la wanrah da u Saleng A Sangma bad katkum ka kaiphod ka shem ba u Zenithsky u la pynkhein ia ka kabu jong u John Leslee K Sangma kum u MLA bad namarkata un hap ban shah pynshitom.U Zenithsky u la shah pynshitom hadien ba u la kynnoh ia u MLA ka South Tura ba u pynshit ia ki nongdie madan ha Tura mynshem ha ka por ba khynra ka Municipal ia ki nongdie madan ha katei ka jaka.Halor Kane u John Leslee u la ujor pyrshah ia u Zenithsky uba long ruh u CEO ka Tura Municipal bad ka Privilege Committee hadien ba la tohkit ka la phah ia ka kaiphod jongka sha ka iing dorbar ban pynshitom ia u Zenithsky.
title: Map ka iing dorbar ia  U CEO ka Tura Municipal

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:U bah Daniel stone Lyngdoh Nonglait u nongiasaid aiñ jong ka Supreme Court u la ong ba lada pyntreikam ia ka aiñ khyndew jong ka sorkar pdeng – ka Land Acquisition Act 2014, ha kane ka jylla kan pynduh noh ia ka hok longtrai bad long nongkynti jong ki paidbah kane ka jylla naduh ki jaitbynriew Khasi, Jaintia bad Garo.U bah Daniel u la ong ba la pynkupbor ia ngi ban long trai ia ka khyndew ka shyiap lyngba ka IOA kaba dei ka jingiasoi soskular ha u snem 1947 hynrei ka jingwanrah jong ka sorkar NDA ia katei ka aiñ hapoh ka jingialam jong ka BJP ia ka sorkar ka la buh jingma. U la ong ruh ba ka jingthaw ka sorkar ia katei ka aiñ ban pyntreikam ha baroh kawei ka ri India, ka dei ka bym lah ban pdiang ha kane ka jylla namarba kan pyniap noh ia ka IOA. U la ong ba lada pyntreikam ia katei ka aiñ kan nym lah lait na ki jingdkoh bad ki jingduna ha kiba bun ki liang.“Haduh mynta, ngim donkam ban registar ia ka khyndew hynrei katkum ki kyndon jong kane ka Aiñ bathymmai ka Sorkar Pdeng kin pyniap noh ia ka Instrument of Accession kaba la iasoi ha u snem 1947, ngin hap ban pyrkhat bha halor kane namar lada ka Sorkar BJP kan pyntreikam salonsar ia kane ka aiñ kan wanrah jingmynsaw ia ngi hi bad ym tang katta, wat ki Autonomous District Council kiba peit bad khmih ia ka khyndew ka shyiap bad ka riti ka dustur kin ngat lang ha ka jingshah ktah na kane ka aiñ bathymmai ka Sorkar Pdeng.” Ong u bah Daniel da kabakyntu ia ka Sorkar NDA ba ka dei ban pyrkhat thymmai biang da kumwei pat khnang ba kane ka aiñ kan ym ktah ia ki nongshong shnong kane ka Jylla bad ia kiwei pat ki jylla kane ka thaiñ Shatei Lam mihngi kiba hap hapoh ka khyrnit jong ka Sixth Schedule.
title: Ka aiñ khyndew ka sorkar pdeng kan  pynduh ia ka hok longtrai, ong u riewsaid

content: Shillong, 23 Lber:Ka jingduh ding ilektrik ha Mot Nongsteng (Lum Mawshken), kaba hap ha ka shnong Nongsteng, kaba hap hapoh ka thain ri war Sohra ka la long kumba 11 bnai ei ei kata naduh u bnai Iaiong 2016 hadien ba ka jingjur u slap bah bad u lyer iong ha kitei ki sngi ka la pynlong ia u Transformer ban sniew noh bad ka shnong ka la hap ban shong ha ka jingdum naduh katei ka por haduh mynta.Hadien ba la ioh kren bad u Rangbah dong jong kane ka jaka u la ong hadien ba la duh ding, da ki taiew bym don ba wan shna, ma u bad kiwei ki rangbah ka shnong ki la leit ujor sha ka ophis MeECL, ba don ha sohra hynrei kim shym la wan ban maramot ia utei u transformer. U la ong ruh hadien ka jingwan sha ka ophis kaba don ha Lumjingshai, shillong haduh 3 sien ruh ki khlem wan satia ban shna ne wat tang ban wan jngoh ia utei u transformer.Shuh shuh la ong ba ha ki bnai ba la dep hadien ka jingduh ding katei ka jaka, ki nongshong shnong ki la ud palat namar ba ki bait hang ding ki poi thik thik man la u bnai wat la ki khlem ioh ban pyndonkam bor ding ei ei ha kitei ki bnai. Hynrei hadien ka jingujor ha ophis ha sohra ki ong ba ki la bakla, bad hadien kata ka khlem poi shuh ka bill. Hynrei ka shnong pat ka dang sah ha ka jingdum haduh kine ki sngi mynta.
title: Duh ding 1snem duna, ba sniew  u transformer ha Nongsteng

content: Shillong, 24 Lber:U Myntri tnad lum khajna ka jylla u Zenith M Sangma u la pyntip mynta ka sngi, hapoh ka iing dorbar ba ia ki trok ba iaid ha surok la buh rekod da ki nongtrei ka tnat lum khajna da ka kti, namar ba ka sorkar kam pat pyntreikam da ka kor computer.Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli mynta ka sngi hapoh ka iing dorbar ba la wanrah da ka MLA ka Dikkanchi Shira, u Zenith u la ong ba ka tnad mynta ka dang pynkhreh ban pyndonkam noh da ki kor computer ia ki trok kiba iaid khnang ban pynjanai ia ka rukom lum khajna ka sorkar. U myntri u la ai jingkhein ruh ia ki trok kiba iaid naduh u snem 2014 haduh 2017, ha ki khyrdop bapher bapher kynthup ka Byrnihat 2,94,522 tylli, na Athiabari 18,652 tylli, na Umkiang 26,765 tylli, bad na Dainaduba ka long 1,58,334 tylli ki trok kiba iaid.U myntri u la pyntip ruh ha iing dorbar ba ka sorkar ka ioh khajna ka long ha u snem 2014-15, ka ioh T.24,85,87,632, ha u snem 2015-16 ka ioh T.7,10,30,21 bad ha u snem 2016-17 ka ioh T. 2,70,75,622.
title: “Ki trok ba iaid ha khyrdop  khajna la rekod da ka kti”

content: Shillong, 24 Lber:U myntri rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma u la ong ba ka sorkar kam ju pynlong tamasa, hynrei ka shu ai jingkyrshan bad iarap ia ki seng, ki kynhun kiba pynlong ia ki. Ia kane u Dr Mukul u la kren ha iing dorbar halor ka jingkylli ba la wanrah da u MLA ka Nongkrem u bah Ardent M Basaiaw-moit mynta ka sngi, uba la buh jingkylli la ka sorkar ka ju pynlong tamasa ne em.U Myntri Rangbah u la ong ba ka sorkar ka ju ai jingkyrshan ia ki kynhun kiba pynlong ia ka tamasa ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka bor synshar district bapher bapher bad tang ha u snem 2016-17, ka sorkar ka la pynlut T. 1,18,06,200 ha ki kam tamasa ha ka jylla.U Dr Mukul u la ong ba ia kine ki tamasa la kyrshan pisa da ka sorkar katkum ka jingpan jongki da kaba pynshnong nong-rim katkum ka jingdon-kam. Ka District Arts Society kaba khlieh da u Deputy Commissioner ka peit ia ki jingpan pisa jong ki kynhun ba pynlong ia ki tamasa ha ki district jongki, la ongu Myntri Rangbah. U la ong ba kiba kwah ban pynlong ia ki tamasa ki hap ban thoh aplikeshon sha u Deputy Commissioner ban ioh jingmynjur.Na ka liang u Bah Ardent u la ong ba ka sorkar ka dei ban thaw ia ki kyndon kiba biang haba ai jingmynjur, ban pynlong tamsa namar ba bunsien ki tamasa ki kylla long ki kam pynjah burom namar ka jingiadih kyaid, ka jingialeh ki kam bym lah ban pdiang. “Nga la ioh jingujor na ki paidbah ba ka jingpynlong ia ki tamasa ka jingpynwit bad pynjah burom namar ba la mih ka jingiadih kyiad pathar, ka jingleh khlemakor ba lait phew jait”, la ong u bah Ardent.U la kyntu ia ka sorkar ba kan bishar bniah bha ia kane khnang ba kan nym long ka kam pynjah burom ha kaba u Myntri Rangbah u la kular ba ka sorkar kan peit bad bishar ia ki bynta ba dei halor kane.
title: Ka sorkar kam ju pynlong tamasa,  ka shu iarap, ong U Mukul

content: Shillong, 24 Lber:Ka bor Shnong Sohryngkham lyngba U Sordar Shnong ka pynbna paitbah ba ha kaba iadei bad ka Jingiaseng KJP Assembly ka ban long ha ka Balang Presbyterian Sohryngkham naduh ka 6haduh ka 9tarik Iaiong, 2017 ka mana bad khang ban nym shah ban die jingdie ha ka Sngi U Trai. Kine ki kynthup ia ki nongdie kot, caset, calendar, ki jingbam plastic, ki jingbam khutia bad kiwei kiwei ki jait jingdie.Yn shah tang ia ki dukan shnong kiba ju plie lypa man ka Sngi U Blei bad ki dukan sha & ja kiba la ioh jingbit, kata ruh kham pajih na ka jaka long Jingiaseng.Kumta ka Bor shnong ka pyntip paitbah lypa khnang ba baroh kin ioh jingtip. Ki volunteer Shnong kin beh beit ia kiba pynkhein ia kane ka adong bad kan nym don jingkitkhlieh ia ki. Ha kajuh ka por ka Bor Shnong ka pdiang sngewbha ia ki pait riewngeit kiban wan sha kane ka Jingiaseng Bah ba kin poi ha ka jingsuk jingsain, ong ka kyrwoh na U Sordar Sohryngkham U Bah I. Dkhar.
title: Ym shah die jingdie ha ka jingiaseng Assembly ha  Sohryngkham

content: Shillong, 27 Lber:Haba kren ha ka dorbar kyrpang ka KHADC mynta ka sngi u bah H.S Shylla MDC ka UDP na Nongkrem u la ong ba un sa pynmih ia kawei ka kot kaba un ai kyrteng ia ka ‘Please Arrange’ bad katei ka kot u la ong kan batai ia ki jingjia ha KHADC. Ia katei ka kot u bah Shylla u la pynshong nongrim ia ki jingjia ha District Council kaba ia tyngkhuh bad u Secretary barim jong ka u bah Welljune Syiemlieh, “Ha katei ka kot ia u bah Welljune, ngan buh kyrteng noh da u bah Welldone” u la ong.Lah ban kdew ba ka kyntien Please Arrange ka dei kaba u bah Shylla u la kren hapoh ing dorbar mang tyngka ka KHADC kaba la long ha u bnai ba la dep halor ka shithi kaba u CEM u la phah sha u bah Welljune ( ha ka por ba u dang long Secretary sha ka EC) bad ha katei ka shithi u CEM u la thoh sha u Secretary ‘Secretary Immediately Please Arrange T.35,0000 kum ka Advance’ katei ka dei ha ka por ba ka KHCF ka pan ram na ka KHADC na bynta ki jinglut ha ka Tamasa Mawbynna ha Mawphlang ne ka Monolith Festival.Shuh shuh utei u MDC ka Nongkrem u la ong ba u la ju lap ha ka por ba u don hapoh District Council ba ki ophisar ki kohnguh beit kat kaba ong kiba heh jong ki bad de ihangne ba ki sa shem jynjar, “Ia kaba lieh ruh lada ong u Boss kaba iong ki ong lang kaba iong, nga kyntu ia phi ki ophisar ba phi dei ban husiar ioh ynda phi la shongthait ha ka jaka ban ioh pension phi ioh pynban da ka Tension” ong u bah Shylla da kaba bynrap ba haba ioh pension ki ioh tang marwei hi i pisa ba khyndiat, hynrei haba ioh tension pat ki ktha khlieh lut baroh shi ing shisem.
title: Ka kot U bah Shylla, ia ka KHADC

content: Shillong, 27 Lber:Ka Joint Action Committee of Social Organizations kaba kynthup ia ka CSWO Umran Dairy Unit, ka CSWO Central Body, Laban, Shillong, Poor People’s Movement (PPM), Hynniewtrep Youth Movement, (HYM), Ri Bhoi People’s Movement (RBPM), ki dkhot ka JAC ryngkat katto katne ki nongshongshnong jong ka Umran Dairy kynthup ruh ki shnong ba marjan, ha ka 27 Tarik Lber 2017, ki la iakynduh ia u Deputy Commissioner, ka Ri Bhoi District, u Shri C. P Gotmare ban pynpaw ia ka jingpyrshah jur ban tei thymmai sa kawei ka Petrol Pump nalor ba lah don lypa artylli ki petrol pump kiba ia jan bha ha kane ka shnong. Ka Commttee ka la kyrpad ia u DC ban pynduh pyndam syndon ia katei ka pump kaba dang iai tei mynta.Ia ka dorkhas ryngkat ki dur ki dar kaba la suh lang ruh ia ki jingsoi jong shibun ki nongshongshnong kiba pyrshah ia katei ka petrol pump, la aiti ha u DC ban bishar bniah halor katei ka kam bad na ka liang jong u, u la kular ban pyndep noh ia ka jingtohkit hapoh ki khyndiat sngi. Ka Joint Action Committee jong ki Social Organizations kan sa aiti ruh ia katei ka dorkhas sha ka Meghalaya State Pollution Control Board bad sha ka National Green Tribunal. Ha kaba iadei bad kane, ka Committee ka la rai ba lada pyn sahteng ia kane ka jingtohkit, ka Committee kam banse ban shim da kiwei pat ki lad kiba kham tyngeh.Ha ka jing ujor sha U Deputy Commissioner, ka Ri Bhoi District, kitei ki sengbhalang, ki pyni ruh da ka sakhi, ba ka don ka Petrol, kaba tuid sha katei ka Wah bad kaba la pynlong ba kan nym long shuh kaba bit ban pyndonkam, namar ba ka la tuid da ka Petrol sha katei ka Wah, kaba don ruh ka jaka saitjain. Ha ka dorkhas, la iathuh ba katei ka dei ka wah, kaba pynbiang um dih ia u paidlang ka shnong Nongpoh bad kiwei de ki shnong ba marjan.Ym tang katta, la iathuh ba ki dohkha dohpnat bad kiwei kiba ju don ha katei ka wah, ha ki por mynshwa mynta ki la jah rngai lut khoit.Kitei ki seng, ki sngew pyrshah namarkata ia katei ka Petrol Pump, kaba thymmai, kaba dang pynkhreh ban tei da U Rohit Jain bad ki sngew lyngngoh ruh ba kumno u ioh ia ka jingbit ban tei ia katei ka Petrol Pump, kaba don ha syndah jong katei ka Wah.
title: Tuid ka Petrol, ym long um  dih shuh ka Wah Umran

content: Shillong, 27 Lber:Ka kaiphod tohkit jong ka House Committee ba la wanrah mynta ka sngi ha ing dorbar ka la pyni ba katkum ka jinglap jong ka, ka shem jingeh ban pynkut ia ka jingtoh-kit jong ka naba ka la ong ba ym lah ban pynkit-khlieh marwei tang ha u Secretary barim ka KHADC u bah Welljune Syiemlieh halor ki san tylli ki mat ba ka la tohkit bad la kdew ba katei ka kam ka dei kaba eh bha naba la mih kyrteng ruh u CEM ba mynta ka KHADC u bah Pyn-shngaiñ N Syiem bad u EM u bah Antonio War bad donkam ba ia katei ka kam yn bteng da ka ing dorbar bad donkam ruh ban lum ia ka dorbar kyrkieh.Lah ban kdew ba ki san tylli ki mat ba katei ka komiti ka tohkit ki long ka bai lutksan ba ioh na Byrnihat na ka jaka ba heh 405 sq.ft ha ka dor T.264 tyngka shi sq.ft kumjuh ruh ka bai lutksan namar ka jingshah pynpra ki jingtei ka KHADC, ka jingsei pisa na MRB Nongpoh bad Nongstoin, ka jingthied jaka ka Council ha Mawkyrwat, ka ram sha ka Anderson Structural Construction bad ka jingthung ia ki nongtrei ba shipor ki peon ki cleaner.Ha ka dorbar pat kaba la long mynta ka sngi ban ia kren na ka bynta katei ka mat u MDC ka UDP na Nongkrem u bah H.S Shylla u la ong ba katei ka ripod yn ym lah hi ruh ban pynkut katba u CEM bad u EM ki dang shong ha ka shuki jong u, “Yn ym lah hi ruh ban pynkut katba kine 2 ngut (EM&CEM) ki dang shong ha ka shuki, kam don jingmut shuh ba ngin dawa ba kin hiar shuki, ki la dei ban sngewthuh hi da ka jingiatip lem” ong u bah Shylla haba kren hapoh Ing Dorbar.U bah Shylla u la ong ruh ba lada dei ba ki sngewkhia shisha ia katei ka kam ki la dei ban iehnoh beit ia ka shuki ba ki shong mynta khnang ba yn ioh tohkit da kaba khuid namarba katba ki dang shong ha ka shuki yn ym lah ban ioh lut ia ki kot ki sla, “Katba pan ia ki kot ki sla la jubab ba ka don beit sha u CEM- baroh ki don ha ka miej u CEM, lada khein da ka nombar ki lah ban shong jubor ioh lehse ki dei shisha ki snieh hati kumba la kren da u CEM ha ka jingialang ha Laitkor” ong biang u bah Shylla.Katba ka kong Teilinia Thangkhiew MDC ka HSPDP na Mylliem ka la ong ba u CEM u dei ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh halor kine kiei kiei baroh namarba u dei ma u u khlieh duh jong ka Council, “Kum u CEM uba dei u khliehduh, phi la pheil namar ka jingbym lap ia kane, phi hap ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh” ong ka kong Teilinia haba kren ha ing dorbar. Ka ing dorbar ka KHADC ka la rai ban rah biang ia katei ka mat sha kawei pat ka dorbar ban ia kren sani bha.
title: Ym lah pynkut ka HC ia ka  tohkit, na u CEM bad u EM

content: Shillong, 27 Lber:Hapdeng ka jing ia kawang ktieh hapdeng u Bah Michael Pakyntein uba wad jingtip paidbah bad u MLA ka South Shillong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh, mynta ka sngi la sei shuh ia ka jingkynnoh ba pyndonam bakla ia ka MLA skhim da u MLA kaba la kot sha a T. 1 klur.U Bah Pakyntein u la kam ba u la lap ba shuh ia ki dukan kiba suplai ia ki tiar ba shong dor T. 73 lak kaba kot sha ka T.1.40 klur kynthup kaba mynshwa T. 55.80 lak.Ha ka 22 tarik u Lber, u Bah Pakyntein u la ujor ejahar sha u Chief Vigilance Commissioner pyrshah ia u Bah Paul Lyngdoh uba la kynnoh pyndonkam bakla ia ka MLA skhim kaba T. 55.80 lak.Hynrei na ka liang u Bah Paul, ha ka sngi Thohdieng u la ujor ejahar kylla I u Bah Pakyntein da kaba kdew ba ka jingkynnoh pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa ka MLA skhim jongu, ka dei tang ka jingthmu sniew ban pynjah burom ia u hakhmat ki paidbah. U Bah Paul Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka jingthied ia ki tiar hapoh ka constituency la leh da ka Implementation Committee kumba la bthah da ka Urban Affairs Department bad baroh ki kot ki sla ba donkam la aiti sha ka Shillong Municipal Board ia ki jingdonkam baroh.Haba kren hynne sha ki lad pathai khubor, u Bah Pakyntein u la sei biang sa kawei ka jingkynnoh pyrshah ia ka jingpyndonkam baka ia ka MLA skhim jong u Bah Paul Lyngdoh kaba kot sha ka T.1 klur.Ha kajuh ka por, u Bah Pakyntien u la kyrpad ban tuklar u Myntri Rangbah, u Myntri kam pohiing ba kin pynsted ia u Chief Vigilance Commissioner ban pynsted ia ka jingtohkit ia ka jingpyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa paidbah.
title: Sei shuh U Pakyntein, ia ka  jingpyndonkam bakla u Bah Paul

content: Shillong, 27 Lber:Ki paidbah thain Riwar ki la lynniar ha kine ki sngi namar ba ki mar rep jongki, kila hiar dor shaba palat ban ianujor mynshem snem.Ha ka jingiakynduh u nongthoh khubor ia kiba bun ki nongrep, ka thain Riwar Pynursla ki la iathuh ba mynta ka dor jong u synshar ka long tang T. 30 shi kilo katba ka sla tyrpad ka shong dor tang T.15 ne T.20 shi kilo.“Mynshem snem ka dor u synshar ka poi sha ka T.70-80 shi kilo hynrei mynta ka hiar palat ia ka mar shiteng”, la ong uwei u rangbah.U la iathuh ba ka sla tyrpad ruh kaba ka dor jongka, ka long T. 30-35 shi kilo mynshem snem, mynta ka la hiar sha ka T. 15 shi kilo. Ha ka jinglong nongrep kim tip ia kaei ka daw hynrei la iathuh ki malik nongthied (middlemen) ba u kharkaia u thied tad dor bad kim lah ban leh eiei.Don kiba ong ruh ba namar ba ka jingpynkiew ka sorkar jylla ia ka dor bai kit bai bah mynta, ka la long ka daw kaba la pynlong ia ki kharkaia ban khnoit ia ki mar rep jongki. Katkum ka jingtip ka KHADC ka shim khajna T. 1700 shi trok ia ki mar ba kit shabar kum ia u synshar bad sla tyrpad katba ka sorkar ka shim kham rem bun shah ka khajna nalor ka district council.Namar ka jingduk bad ka jingkyrduh, watla ka dor ka long kaba tad kim lah ban nym die namar ba thngan ka kpoh bad kane ka la ktah jur ia ka kamai jongki, kiba shem jingeh shano ban phai.Ka thain war ka dei kawei kaba jur bha ban pynmih synshar bad kiba bun bah ki paidbah ki im na u synshar, ka sla tyrpad lait noh tang katto katne ki rep da kiwei kiba kham biang ki jaka rep.Kham mynshwa, ka Joint Action Committee of All Meghalaya Farmer Union (JACAMFU) ka la pynrem ia ka sorkar jong u Mukul Sangma halor ka jingbym pyntreikam ia ki jingdawa jong ka seng khamtam ban wanrah noh da ka ain halor ka rep ka riang bad kumjuh ruh halor ka jingdawa ban ithuh noh ia u synsar bad u sla tyrpad kum ki mar rep. U la kyntu ruh ia ki MLA ba kin iakren ia kane ka mat jong ki nongrep ha Assembly, lym kumta ki nongrep kin sa ai jubab ha u 2018.Ha kane ka dorbar mang tyngka ba dang shen, u nongialam ka liangpyrshah u Dr Donkupar Roy u la dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban pynlait khajna noh na u synsar bad ka sla tyrpad namar ba ka jingshim khajna ka la pynlong ia ki nongrep ban shah khnoit.U la ong ba ia kine ki mar, la ithuh tang kum ki mar rep khlaw da ka tnad khlaw ka sorkar jylla bad ka long kaba donkam ban pynlait ia ka jingeh jong ki paidbah nongrep.
title: Lynniar ki nongrep ka Riwar,  ba tad dor u synsar bad sla tyrpad

content: Nongstoiñ, 27 Lber:Tang hadien 1 sngi ba la ioh ban tam ia kawei ka met iap kaba la pyut bad shah tep ruh ha u shyiap jong ka wah Umpniang kaba don kham harum ia ka madan Nongpathar Pyndengrei, ki pulit ka Nongstoin ha ka sngi nyngkong jong ka taiew ki la lap bad la lah ruh ban pyntikna ia ka kyrteng bad ka jaka sah jong katei ka met iap.U bah S. Nongtnger Superintendent of Police ka West Khasi Hills ha ba ia kren bad u nongthoh khubor u la iathuh ba katei ka met iap ka dei jong kawei ka samla kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Daritngen Syiem Shangoi 19 snem ka arta na ka shnong Siejlieh West Khasi Hills District. Shuh shuh u bah Nongtnger u la ong ruh ba la lap ba katei ka samla kala jah nala iing la kumba 1 bnai ei ei bad katei ka samla ka dei ka khun swet bad ka sah tang bad la u para jong ka u ba dang 15 snem ka arta ha katei ka shnong Siejlieh kaba jngai tang kumba 2 KM ei ei na ka sor Nongstoin.Hadien ba ki pulit kila dep ban leh ia ki jingdonkam baroh la aiti noh ia katei ka met jong katei ka Samla sha ki ba ha iing ha sem bad pyndep ia kaba sah, bad ki pulit ki dang pynlong ka jingtohkit ban lap ia ka daw jong ka jingiap jong katei ka samla.
title: Ka metiap ba la ioh tam, dei  ka samla na ka shnong Siejlieh
