content: Amlarem, 29 Lber:Ka Shnong Amkoi kaba don hapoh ka Amlarem Sub-Division ka la pynlong biang mynta ia ka Shad Rongkusi jong ka, hadien 15 snem ba la pynlong khatduh ha u snem 2002 .Ia kane ka Rongkusi jong ka Shnong Amkoi la wan plie ia ka da u MDC jong kane ka Thain u Ma Het Pohthmi u ba la long kum u kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u Lecturer jong ka Saint Edmund ‘s College Shillong U Bah R V Langstieh bad ka kynhun, ki nongkitkam Shnong, ki riewrangbah bad ki paid nongshong shnong ki ba la ia don lang ha kane ka sngi.Ha ka jing kren jong u wei na ki Rangbah jong kane ka Shnong, u la ong ba ka jing pynlong ia kane ka Shad Rongkusi kaba long kum shibynta ban pynneh pynsah ia ka dustur jong u longshuwa manshuwa hyndai.U MDC u ong ba kane ka Shad Rongkusi kaba mut ka Shad tamasa leh kmen leh sngewbha jong ki Shynrang bad kynthei, ha kaba ka kamai kajih ka kiew kum ka jing die ia u Kwai u tympew bad kiwei kiwei ki jing die kiba ki rep.Ha ka jing kren pat na ka liang u kongsan u Ma Het Pohthmi ha kane ka sngi u ai ka jingiaroh ia kane ka Shnong wat la ka Shnong kaba don ha kyndong, hynrei ki don ka jingmut na ka bynta ban pynneh pynsah ia kiba u longshuwa manshuwa, namar ba lyngba ka jing pynlong jong ki ia kane ka jingshad ka pynsahnam pynsah kynmaw ia ki long dien, na ka bynta jingmyntoi ka pateng ka ban wan.U la ong shuh shuh ruh da kaba u kyntu ia ki nongkitkam Shnong jong kane ka Shnong bad ki dei ban don ka mynsiem jong ka jing ia tylli na ka bynta ka jing bha jong ka Shnong ka thaw bad ruh ban ia burom kylliang iwei ia iwei pat.
title: Ha ka jingphuh jingphieng kut  ka Shad Rongkusi ha Amkoi

content: Shillong, 27 Lber:Ka Khasi Heritage Conservation Forum (KHCF) kaba pyniaid ia ka Tamasa Mawbynna ha Mawphlang, ka la pynlut pisa haduh T.13 lak tam na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ki khubor heh ka ri India ha ka tamasa mawbynna kaba la long ha u 2013 ha Mawphlang. Kawei na ki khubor kiba ka KHCF ka la theh tyngka bha ka dei ka CNN -IBN ha kaba la iohi ba katkum ka jingkheiñ ba ka KHCF ka la ai (ba la suhlang ha ka kaiphod jong ka House Committee) la pynlut haduh T.10, 22,375 tyng-ka (Shiphew lak ar phew ar hajar lai spah hynniew phew san tyngka) bad katei ka long beit thik tang ia ka CNN-IBN.Katkum katei ka jingkheiñ ka KHCF ka la siew pisa sha ka CNN-IBN T.6,50,000 tyngka ha ka 23 tarik u risaw, 2013 lyngba ka cheque no. 135345 bad ha katei kajuh ka sngi ka la siew biang sa T.50 hajar tyngka lyngba ka cheque 135347. Nangta ha ka 15 tarik u nailur, 2014 la siew biang sha ka CNN-IBN bad ki khubor heh ha India sa T.2,86,375 tyngka (ym shym la pyni da ka pisa ne ka cheque). Nangta ha ka 4 tarik u rymphang, 2016 pat la pyni ba la siew biang T.36 hajar tyngka sha ka CNN-IBN bad hangtei la batai ruh ba katei ka dei na ka bynta ka bai kali bad ka bai bam kaba T.4500 shisngi na bynta ki saw sngi ha ka sngi long tamasa. Baroh ka pisa ba la siew sha ka CNN-IBN katkum katei ka jingkheiñ ka mih T.10,22,375 tyngka.Nalor ka jingsiew sha ka CNN-IBN la pyni biang ba la siew sha ki National Media lyngba ka Advance Publicity Committee bad la siew T.1 lak tyngka ha ka 4 tarik u risaw, 2013 lyngba ka cheque 135337. Ha ka 1 tarik u nailur 2014 la siew biang sha ka National Media lyngba ka Publicity Committee T.1, 70,000 tyngka lyngba ka cheque 149202. La pyni ba la siew sha ka DDK Shillong T.13,500 bad ki kynhun ka IBN T.20,000 tyngka ha ka 15 tarik u nailur,2014 lyngba ka cheque 149209.Sha ka Eclectic Magazine la siew T.15,000 tyngka ha ka 4 tarik u rymphang, 2016 (ym shym la pyni da ka pisa ne da ka cheque) bad sha ki khubor na ka jylla ( Local) bad ki Regional la pyni ba la siew T.8,45,050 tyngka ha ka 17 tarik u nailur, 2014 lyngba ka cheque 149215. Sha ka Red FM la pyni ba la siew T.39,680 tyngka ha ka 4 tarik u rymphang, 2016 lyngba ka cheque no. 975328.Na katei ka jingkhein kaba don ha ka kaiphod jong ka House Committee ka KHCF, ka la pyni ba ka la ioh pisa T.95,22,000 tyngka na ki nongbei tyngka bapher bapher ba kynthup ia ka Lafarge Umiam Pvt.Ltd kaba la bei T.10 lak tyngka, ka Directorate of Arts and Culture, Meghalaya ka la bei T.5 lak tyngka, ka Directorate of Tourism, Meghalaya ka la bei T.3 lak tyngka, ka North Eastern Council ( NEC) ka la bei T.20 lak tyngka bad ka KHADC ka la bei tyngka T.57,22,000 tyngka ha u snem 2013 ba la pynlong ia ka Monolith Festival. La pyni ruh kumno la pynlut ia katei ka pisa kaba jan kot klur tyngka kum ka baiburom ia ki ki briew kiba la don bynta ban iarap, ki jingpynsawa, ki bai hotel, ka bai siew sha ki nongrwai nongtem, ki nongshad bad kiwei pat ki jingpynlut kiba biang jingkhein sbiak -ka pisa ba ioh bad ka pisa ba pynlut.
title: Da ki phew lak theh tyngka ka  KHADC, sha ki khubor heh ka India

content: Shillong, 27 Lber:T.72,47,000 tyngka (Hynniewphew ar lak saw phew hynniew hajar tyngka) dei ka pisa ba la siew sha ka Khasi Heritage Conservation Forum (KHCF) naduh u snem 2013 haduh u 2016, batai ka jingthoh jong u Secretary ka KHADC sha ka House Committee ha ka kaiphod kaba la wanrah mynta ka sngi sha ka dorbar kyrpang ka KHADC. Katkum ka jingthoh ba u bah Welljune Syiemlieh Secretary barim (uba la shah kyntiew kyrdan shipor kum u Principal Secretary ka KHADC, hadien ba u la shongthait) sha ka House Committee ba ha ka 20 tarik u naiwieng, 2013 la siew T.16 lak tyngka da ka cheque, nangta T.20 lak ha ka 27 tarik u naiwieng, 2013 da ka cheque bad ia kitei ki pisa u la siew sha u Secretary ka KHCF bah Allan West (u la suh ia ki kot ki sla na bank) . La kdew biang ba ha ka 30 tarik u lber, 2016 la siew sha ka KHCF T.35 lak tyngka lyngba ka NEFT.Nangta la batai biang ba u bah Welljune u la iathuh sha ka komiti ba la siew T.1,22,000 tyngka sha ka KHCF da ka pisa (hynrei ym shym la batai la siew ha kano ka dur) bad ha ka 28 tarik u nailur, 2013 la siew T.25 hajar tyngka sha u bah Antonio War u EM ba peit ia ka pla tyngka bad uba dei ruh u Chairman ka KHCF (la suh ha ka kaiphod ia ka kot ba la pyni ba u bah Antonio u la ioh pdiang ia katei ka pisa). Baroh katei ka pisa ka kot T.72,47,000 tyngka. Ka komiti ka la kynthoh ba ka KHCF ka la pyni ia ki jingkhein jong ka ba ka la ioh pisa T.57,22,000 tyngka na ka KHADC katba ki kot kiba u bah Welljune u don sakhi pat ki pyni ba u la siew tang T.36 lak tyngka (lait noh ki jingkhein kiba u la ai khlem ki jingpyni ia ki sakhi). Katei ka komiti ka la kynthoh ruh da kaba ong mano ba la siew ia ka T.21,22, 000 tyngka sha ka KHCF ha u 2013 na ka liang ka KHADC, ka la buh jingkylli ruh hato katei ka pisa ka dei kaba la ai ha kano ka dur-ka Grant, ka ram ne kaba shu bei tyngka sngewbha.Ka komiti ka la kynthoh biang ba katkum ki jingong u bah Welljune da ka ktien bad da ka jingthoh ka long ba ia kitei ki tyngka kiba heh la leh lyngba ka hukum jong u CEM u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem bad u EM ka pla tyngka u bah Antonio War. Ka ripod ka la ong ba u bah Welljune u la pdiang ba ka la don shisha ka jingiaid lait ia ki kyndon pisa jong ka Council kumba dei ban leh. Ka komiti ka la bteng biang da kaba ong ba ym shym la lah ban pynkut ia ka jingtohkit naba ka komiti kam lah ban tohkit ia u bah Pynshngain bad u bah Antonio.Shuh shuh u bah Welljune u la pyni da ki jingthoh sha ka komiti halor kiwei pat ki jingsiew pisa lyngba jong u bad kawei na kitei ki jingsiew ka dei sha ki nongiasaid aiñ ha kaba u la pyni ba ha ka 23 tarik u nailur,2014 la siew T.7 lak tyngka sha u V.J Hansaria ban ia khun kes (NGT bad kiwei pat ki kes ha Supreme Court) bad la siew lyngba ka NEFT. Kumjuh ruh la pyni ba ha ka 13 tarik u lber, 2015 la siew biang sha utei u nongiasaid aiñ T.11 lak tyngka da ka pisa (kiba u pyni ia ki kot ba la ioh pdiang ia ka pisa). 7 tarik u lber, 2015 la siew lyngba ka NEFT sha u P.Jose Advocate, Council matters T.50 hajar tyngka, ha ka 19 tarik u kyllalyngkot, 2016 la siew sha u Hansaria Advocate T.1,21,000 tyngka bad ha u Silley Singh Consultant ( Delhi) T.45,000 tyngka (ym shym la pyni ia ki kot ki sla). Nangta la pyni ba la siew biang sha u Akshat Hansaria Advocate SC T.2,20,000 tyngka ha u 2014 , sha u B.B Narzary Advocate T.60,000 tyngka ha u 2008 bad sha u S.Chauhan Advocate T.20 hajar tyngka. Haba kheiñlang ia baroh ka pisa ba la siew sha ki nongiasaid aiñ ka long haduh T.23,16,000 tyngka.Katto katne ki jingthoh kiba la suh da u Secretary barim u bah Welljune Syiemlieh la iohi ba ka kes ba la siew pisa sha ki nongiasaidaiñ ka dei halor ka kam khang dewiong ba ka All Dimasa Student Union Dima Hasao ka ia khun pyrshah ia ka sorkar jylla ha ka NGT, ka kes u Faily Shyiem pyrshah ia ka KHADC, nangta ka kam sha ka Election Commission.
title: T.72 lak tam sha ka KHCF; T.23  lak tam sha ki nongiasaid Aiñ

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:Lashai ka sngi ka Meghalaya High Court kan shim bishar biang ia ka kam nongdie madan halor ka jingujor jong ka kynhun ki nongdie madan pyrshah ia ka jingkhynra ka sorkar.Katkum ka jingia-kren bad ka Kong Angela Rngad, ka High Court ka la buh lashai ka sngi ban shim bishar biang ia kam bad yn sa ap ia kaei kaba ka Kashari kan rai.Hynrei ha kawei ka liang, la iathuh ba ki nongdie madan ha saw dong jong kane ka sor Shillong kila sngewkyndit halor ka jingshah khot hajir sha ka ophis jong u District Urban Planner Shillong ha kaba ia dei bad ki nongdie madan bad ka rai jong ka iing bishar jong ka Meghalaya High Court.Bun na kine ki nongdei madan kila kyndit ban shah khot hajir sha ka ophis jong ka sorkar jylla kaba dei peit ia ki kam pynroi sor.Ki nongdei madan kin sa iashong ban ia kren ia kane ka kam bad kin leit ban iakynduh ia ki ophisar jong katei ka ophis ban pan jingshai bad kin sa shim ia ka raiu kumno ban leh.Kiwei pat ki lad khubor, ki iathuh ba ki nongdie madan ha sawdong jong kane ka sor Shillong, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkyndit jong ki halor ka jingshah khot hajir sha ka ophis jong U District Urban Planer shillong ha kaba u bah T.Lyngwa u la ong u Nodal Officer ha kaba ia dei bad ki nongdie madan bad ka rai jong ka iing bishar jong ka Meghalaya High Court.Haba kren ha u SP News Agency bun na kine ki nongdei madan, ki la pynpaw ia ka sngewkyndit ka jong ki ban ioh ia kane ka kot sha khot hajir sha katei ka ophis jong ka sorkar jylla kaba dei peit ia ki kam pynroi sor, kaba la pynkyndit eh ia ki, ka long ba ia kane ka jingkhot hajir la thoh da ka ktien phareng ha kaba kiba bun kim sngewthuh.Na ka liang jong ki nongialam kine ki nongdie madan kin sa ia shong ban ia kren ia kane ka kam bad kin leit ban ia kynduh ia ki ophisar jong katei ka ophis ban pan jingshai halor kane ka jingshah khot hajir bad ha dien kata kin sa shim ia ka raiu kumno ban leh. (SP News Agency).
title: Mynta yn shong bishar ka  HC, halor ki nongdie madan

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:Ka Sub Committee on KHADC Affairs ka UDP mynta ka sngi ka la rai ban weng noh ia ka jingkyrshan na ka PDF ka kynhun synrop jong ki seng sain hima bapher bapher kaba synshar ha KHADC.Hynrei katei ka rai kam dei kaba kut naba ka Sub Committee ka dang hap ban ap sa ia ka rai ba khadduh na ka Party. Ia katei ka rai ka SC ka la shim hadien ba ka la peit bniah bin pa bin ia ka kaiphod jong ka House Committee kaba tohkit halor ki kam bamsap ha KHADC na ka pisa kaba la iohlum na ka Professional Tax na nongpoh bad Nongstoin khamtam ka jingpaw ka kyrteng u CEM ban Pynshngaiñ N Syiem bad u bah Antonio War EM pla tyngka ha katei ka kaiphod.“Ngi la shim ia ka rai ban weng noh na ka PDF bad ngin phah ka jingmynjur sha ka Party ban weng noh na ka PDF kaba ialam da u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem hadien ba ngi peit bniah ia ka kaiphod ka House Committee” ong u bah Bindo M Lanong u khlieh jong katei ka Sub Committee.“Ngi ieh ha ka jingstad jong ka Party ban shim ia ka rai khadduh” u la ong biang. U bah Bindo u la ong ruh ba ka seng UDP kan shong jingialang shen ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ban wan ban pyrkhat ia katei ka kam hynrei u la ai ksai pat kan ym lah ban long ba ka seng UDP kan dang ia treilang bad katei ka Executive Committee ba mynta ka KHADC kaba donkti ha ki kam bamsap.“Nga la don hangtei ha KHADC la 30 snem bad ngam pat ju lap ba ka ndon kat katei ka jingbam sap” ong shuh shuh u bah Bindo da kaba bynrap ba shen katei ka seng kan sa leit ia kynduh ia u Lat ka jylla ban ia kren ia katei ka kam bad ban pan twad ia ka jingmut jong u na u halor katei ka jinglap ka HC. Shuh shuh u la ong ba ki don katto katne tylli ki mat kiba ka HC kam shym la eksamin kiba ia dei bad ki 9 tylli ki mat ba ka UDP ka la pan jingshai.U la ong ba ka KHADC ka la pynlut T.1.35 klur tyngka ban pynkhuid ia ka Wahumkhrah hynrei ym shym la iohi kam eiei, “Lada ngi khein lei sa ia kine ka pisa ba ka KHADC ka pyndonkam bakla ka kot sha ka T.4 klur tyngka” u la ong biang. Haba jubab ia ka jingkylli ki nongthohkhubor u la ong ba ka shong ha ka sorkar jylla la kan pynjari synshar Administrator ne kan dang ailad ia katei ka EC hangtei ba kan bteng ia ka jingsynshar.Haba kren ia katei ka kaiphod jong ka HC u la ong ba ka dei ka kaiphod kaba la ia soi da u nongialam ka Liang pyrshah uba dei u Chairman u bah Manstudy Nongrem, ka nongialam jong ki MDC ka HSPDP ka kong Teilinia Thangkhiew, nongialam ki MDC ka KHNAM bah Adelbert Nongrum bad nongialam ki MDC ka UDP u bah Teinwell Dkhar kiba dei ki dkhot ha ka kynuhn synrop ka PDF. Haba kylli la ka UDP ka don jingthmu ne-em ban ialam noh ia ka EC ha KHADC , u bah bindo u la ong ba haduh mynta ka jingiakren bad ki seng riewlum ka dang iaid namarba ka UDP kam kwah ban ia treilang bad ka Congress.
title: Rai ka Sub Committee ka  UDP ban weng noh na ka PDF

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:Ka khubor ka la par sted shaneng sharum ba ki MLA ka party Congress wat kiba bat myntri ha kane ka sorkar mynta ruh ki lah ban mih iing noh shwa ban poi ka aiom iakhun elekshon 2018 ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya kaban long sa tang shi snem thik.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum, ki don ki myntri ha kane ka sorkar ba mynta kiba thmu ban mih noh shwa ban poi ka samoi elekshon ban iakhun noh na ka BJP bad na kiwei ki kynhun halor ka jingngeit jongki, ba ka Congress kan nym lah shuh ban wan ha ka bor ha ka 2018 ha kane ka jylla.Bun kiba mutdur ba ka sorkar kaba thymmai kaba lah ban don lang ka BJP kan wan ha ka 2018 ha kane ka jylla khamtam ka jingbeh jubor ka lyer u Narendra Modi kumba ka la paw sha kiwei ki jylla.“La kumno kumno hadien u bnai Naitung ne Nailar, ka sain pyrthei iamih iaphet seng kan sa shai”, la ong uwei u politishian uba long u MLA.U President ka BJP Meghalaya u Bah Shibun Lyngdoh kham mynshwa, u la ong ki don bun ngut ki MLA kiba la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew jan bad ka BJP hynrei namar ba ka por kam pat dei, ki dang ap shwa ban pyni da ki kam ynda la dei ka por.Katkum ka jingtip ka BJP Meghalaya ka la don ka jingthmu ban wanrah da ka phormula ne ka buit treikam ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya kumba la leh ha ka jylla Goa ha kaba kiba bun ki nongialam bad ki nongmihkhmat ki dei na ka kynhun Balang Khristan, kaba iasyriem kum ha kane ka jylla Meghalaya kaba bun paid da ki riew ngeit Khristan.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum, la iathuh ba ki heh nongialam ka BJP na seng kmie bad na ka thain Mihngi, ki la iakynduh bad ki nongialam ka Balang ha kane ka jylla, khamtam kito kiba dei ki riew sain pyrthei ban pyndonkam da kane ka buit na Goa khnang ban pynlait na ka jingkynnoh ki paidbah ba ka BJP ka dei ka seng pyrshah Khristan.Ha Goa kumba long mynta, kiba bun ki MLA ka BJP ki dei kiba na ka balang Khristan haduh kiba don kumba 8 ngut ki MLA na ki 13 ngut ki MLA ka BJP ha ka iing dorbar kaba 40 ngut.Ka jingthmu jong ka BJP, ka long ban pynduh noh ia ka jingsynshar ka Congress ha kane ka jylla kaba la jubor sa tang ka bamsap bampong bad ka jingleh bym hok ha kiba bun ki liang ia ki paidbah naduh ki kam pynroi bapher bapher.La ioh jingtip ba ki don ki MLA kiba la ap siar ban poi ka por ba kin phet noh na ka Congress ban leit pyniasoh bad ka BJP kynthup na West Khasi Hills, na Jaintia Hills, bad ruh na Khasi Hills.
title: Lah ban stait ki MLA  Congress, shwa ban poi u 2018

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:U Phrangborlang Warjri u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka 26 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 6:30 baje janmiet ki runar ki la pynpait pynpra 2 tylli ki bos sawkhmut ( SPTS) bad kawei ka Maruti car kaba don ia u nombar ML-05E-6795 kaba dei trai da u Marius Mawlong, kitei ki kali ki dei kiba la pynieng ha Umkdait, Nongmynsong, Shillong. Ka jingkhangit, ki dashboard bad Headlight kitei ki bos ki la julor.
title: Shah pynpait ki bos sawkhmut

content: Nongpoh, 29 Lber:Ka Synjuk jong 6 tylli ki Dorbar Shnong ba kynthup ia ka Sohlait thymmai, Sohlait rim, Nartap, Langpadon, Umsawnoldhi bad ka shnong Umjarasi, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngewkhia kaba jur halor ka jingeh kaba la iakynduh da ki paidbah nongshong shnong halor ka jingsniew palat ka surok bad kane ka la jia ruh tang namar jingpynslem jong u Kontraktor ban pyndep ia ka surok PMGSY, kaba na Umjarasi sha Langpadon kaba don ia ka jingjngai kumba 7.50 km.Kum ban shu ong hangne, katei ka surok ia kaba la sdang ban pyntrei naduh u snem 2014, hynrei ka long pat kaei kaei kaba lyngoh bad kat haduh mynta, katei ka surok ia kaba la dep ban mang pisa haduh T. 6 klur lyngba ka skhim PMGSY, ym shem la lah satia ban pyndep.Haba pynpaw sha ki nongthohkhubor, u Bah P Nongshli, Chairman jong katei ka Synjuk ki 6 shnong, u la ong ba ka Synjuk ka dap shisha da ka jingsngewkhia ban iohsngew ia ka jingud jongki paidbah bad kane ka dei tang namar ka jingsniew palat jong katei ka surok.U la iathuh ruh, kaba kham pynsohsat eh ia ki paidbah nongshong shnong ha katei ka thain ka dei haba la wanpoi ka por lyiur, ha kaba ki paidbah ki shem jingeh ha ka leit ka wan naka daw ka jingktieh jong ka surok bad kaba la dap tang da ki thliew ki syar suda.Kumta haba iadei bad katei ka jingpynslem ban shna pyndep ia katei ka surok, ka Synjuk ka la kyrpad ruh sha ka sorkar bad ki nongmihkhmat ba kin tuklar lem bad ban bthah ia u kontraktor ba un pynstet noh ka jingpyntrei, khnang ba kan pynsuk ia ki paidbah kiba shong ba sah ha katei ka thain, u la bynrap.
title: Sngewkhia ki 6 shnong, sahteng ka surok na Umjarasi sha Langpadon

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:Ka All Meghalaya Dancers Association kan pynlong ia ka jingialang paidbah lashai ka sngi, ha ka por 11.00 baje mynstep ha poh Stand Jaiaw Mawkhar ha ryngkat ka jing kyrshan lang jong ki riew don sap shad rwai bapher ba pher ryngkat ka jingsynran lang ki seng bhalang bapher bapher.Ka jingkhot ia kane ka jingialang paidbah, ka ka long kawei na ki mat jingdawa kaba ka seng, ka la iaid lynti naduh u snem 2012 bad ha une u bnai, ka seng ka dang shu dep ia ka jingia shong kyllain mongor hapoh Additional Secretariat ban pynpaw sha ka sorkar halor ki mat jingdawa jong ka seng.Hynrei kat haduh mynta na ka liang ka sorkar ka khlem khot ia kren ne ai jingtip ei ei halor ka shithi sha u myntri rangbah, ba la suh lang ruh ryngkat ka dorkhas(Memorandum) bad ka dei halor katei ka daw, ba ka seng kam banse ban pan jing kyrshan lang na ki paitbah bad ban dawa ruh mar dor ia ka sorkar ba kan khot ia kren halor kane ka bynta ha kaba iadei bad ka jingeh jong ki riew donsap kiba leit shim bynta shabar ka Jylla bad kiwei kiwei de ki jing donkam.Ha kajuh ka por kan don ruh ka jing pynshai paitbah kumno ban kyrshan ia ka wei ka samla Bateithymmai Nongrum ka ban ia knieh ia ka nam lahduh jong ka rynsan iakop pyni sap ha Mumbai yes I am.
title: Mynta 11baje, yn tur ki  nongshad ha Motphran

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:Mynta ka sngi ki pulit ka East Khasi Hills ki la pynlong ia ka jingia-lang VDP ha Mawngap Mawkharshiing Commu-nity Hall bad ha katei ka jingialang la donlang u SP ka East Khasi Hills U Davies N R Marak kum u kongsan uba la pynpaw ka jingsngewkmen ban ia kynduh ia ki VDP ki ban peit ha ki shnong ki thaw ban lait na ki kam sniew.Ha katei ka jingialang la wer la khot ia ki VDP baroh kiba hap hapoh Mawngap PS bad Sohiong Outpost ba kin ia khun ban pynduh jait ia ki kam sniew bad ki kam be-aiñ kum ka jingshah thok pisa da kaba kular ban ai kam ai jam bad kiwei bad la bthah ba lada ki don jingiarap na ki pulit ki dei ban pyntip mar mar sha ki Police Station jong ki bad la kyntu ruh ia ki shnong ki bym pat don VDP ba kin thaw da kaba ia treilang bad ki pulit.
title: Jingialang ki pulit bad VDP ha Mawngap

content: Nongstoiñ, 29 Lber:U wei u rangbah na ka shnong Lamavilla Shillong, u la ujor da ka ehajar ha thanat Nongstoin pyrshah ia u wei u briew u bala tip kyrteng kum u Wanlang Kharkrang na ka shnong Pyndenglawar Nongstoin, halor ka jingdon kti jong u ban thok bad shukor ia u tei u rangbah da ki phew lak.Katkum ka tyllong khubor na ki pulit ka Nongstoin, la ong ba u tei u rangbah na Lamavilla ha ka 9 tarik Kyllalyngkot 2014, u la iakut da kaba iathoh jingiateh bad u bah Wanlang Kharkrang ba un shah ia u bah Wanlang Kharkrang, ba un leit kit ia u dewiong na ka par jong u tei u rangbah ha ha ka dor T 3100 shi ton.Shuh shuh ka khubor na ki pulit ka iathuh ruh ba u tei u bah Kharkrang u la dep ruh ban siew lupa (Advance) 3 lak tyngka sha u tei u rangbah bad hadien ba u tei u bah Kharkrang u la dep ban kit lut plain ia u dewiong u ba la poi shaduh ka 700 metric ton kaba la kot ruh sha ka T. 21 lak 70 hajar tyngka bad ka pisa kaba sah sa kumba 18 lak 70 hajar, ki la iakut ban siew ar sien siew (two installment) haduh 6 bnai hynrei haduh mynta u tei u briew ym shym pat la lah satia ban siew.Kumta haba u tei u rangbah u la iohi ba u tei u bah Kharkrang la leh bym patiaw ei ei hadien ba u la ai da ka jingthoh sha u, u tei u rangbah u la pyrshang biang ha ka sien kaba khatduh ban khot iakren bad u tei u bah Kharkrang ha kaba u la wan mih ban iakren bad ha katei ka jingiakren u tei u bah Kharkrang u la pan por ban siew ia katei ka pisa ba sah bad u tei u briew u la thoh ruh ia ka Promissory Note da ka mon sngewbha jong u kata ha ka 31/8/2016 bad u la buh ruh ia kapor kaba khatduh ha u bnai Naiwieng 2016.Hynrei haduh ba la kut noh katei ka por ba u la buh hi ruh um shym pat la lah satia ban siew dep ia katei ka pisa ba sah bad haba u tei u rangbah u la pyrshang ban phun la bun bun sien hynrei utei u bah Kharkrang u la kyntait ban shim wat ia ka phun ruh.Kumta na ka liang jong ki pulit ka Nongstoin hadien ba ki la ioh pdiang ia katei ka ehajar na u tei u rangbah na Lamavilla hynnin ka sngi ba ar jong ka taiew ki la ioh ban kem noh ia u tei u briew na ka shnong Siejlieh West Khasi Hills District, bad ki pulit kila register case ia u tei u briew bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat.
title: Shah kem 1, ba thok T.18  lak, ha ka kam dewiong

content: Nongstoiñ, 29 Lber:Tang namar ka jingbuh pathar jong ki briew ia ki mar ki mata ba pyndonkam, ban shna ia ki jingtei ki jong ki hapoh jong ka surok PWD jong ka sor Nongstoin, u Deputy Commissioner jong ka West Khasi Hills District, u Arun Kumar Kembhavi IAS, u la ai por 7 sngi ba ki dei ban weng noh.Na ka liang jong u DC u la ong ruh ba ka jingbuh pathar jong ki briew ia ki mar kum u shyiap, u maw bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar shna ia ki jingtei kiba heh ki jong ki hapoh jong ka surok PWD da ki bun bun bnai, ka la wanrah ruh ia ka jingthut ha ka iaid ka ieng jong ki paidbah bad khamtam kala pynlong ruh ia ka jingdheng kali hapoh jong ka sor Nongstoin.Kumta na ka liang jong u DC u la kyntu ia kiba kum kitei ki briew ba ki dei ban pynkynriah noh ia ki mar ki mata ki jong ki ba kila buh hapoh jong ka surok PWD ha sor Nongstoin, hapoh ka 7 sngi bad lada lap ia kiba dang pynkhein kin shah kurup noh ia ki mar ki jong ki bad yn ujor ruh da ka ehajar halor ka jingpynthut ia ki paidbah bad yn shah pynngat ruh ha ki kyndon ain hapoh jong ka IPC.
title: 7sngi ai por U DC, ban  weng ia ki tiar ha rud surok

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:Ki kyrteng jong ki MDC shu ba phah ka KHADC bad ka sorkar jylla ki dang sahteng ha ka phail u Lat ka jylla haduh kine ki sngi. Ka KHADC ka la phah kham mynshwa ia ka kyrteng jong u bah J.Reenborn katba ka sorkar jylla ka la phah ia ka Kong Irene Lyngdoh.Katkum ka khubor ba la iohlum, la iathuh ba u Lat ka jylla u lah ban pyndonkam da ka bor laitluid jongu katkum ka riti synshar ka ri, ban thung MDC hi noh da u briew uba ibit ma u, da kaba kyntait ia ki kyrteng ba phah ka sorkar jylla bad ruh ka KHADC.La ioh jingtip ba u Lat um kwah ban iashah liang iano iano bad dei na kane ka daw, ba um kwah ban pdiang ia ka kyrteng ba phah ka sorkar ne ka KHADC hynrei u lah ban pyntreikam da ka bor lajong jongu.Kane ka jingiaknieh hapdeng ka sorkar bad ka KHADC ka la long kum ka jingiapyni bor hapdeng u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem uba dei u CEM ka KHADC bad u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma.Haduh mynta kine ki ar tylli ki kyrteng ban long MDC shu sieh ki la shu sahteng ha ka phail jong u Lat ka jylla namar ba u shem jingeh ban jied iano, la yn jied ia ka kyrteng ba phah ka KHADC ne yn pdiang ia ka kyrteng ba phah ka sorkar jylla.Ia ka kyrteng jong u Bah Reenborn uba dei u nongbishar ba la shongthait ka KHADC, uba long ruh u Secretary ka tnad Law Commission ka sorkar jylla ha ki snem ba la dep bad u tymmen basan, la pdiang da ka Dorbar ba kyrpang jong ka Khasi Hills Autonomous District Council (KHADC) ha u Nohprah ba la dep. Katba ka sorkar jylla kam shym la pdiang ia ka kyrteng ba phah ka KHADC bad ka la phah ia ka kyrteng ka MLA barim ka Pariong kaba long ruh ka myntri barim ka Kong Irene Lyngdoh.Hynrei katkum ka jingtip, u Lat ka jylla u lah ban nym pdiang ia kine ki kyrteng ba la phah da ka sorkar jylla bad ka KHADC namar ba ki don hapdeng ka jingiashrut hapdeng jongki, bad u lah ban pyndonkam da ka bor bad ka iktiar lajong ban jied hi noh ia u briew uba u bit ban sieh kum u MDC ha ka KHADC bad ruh ha JHADC.
title: Lah ban nym pdiang U Lat ia ki  kyrteng ban sieh MDC ha KHADC

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:Ka Hynniewtrep Student Union, Seng Kmie ka ai ia ka jingiaroh ia u Myntri Rangbahduh ka Ri U Narendra Modi, halor ka jingshimkhia jong u ban tuklar lem halor u pud u sam hapdeng ka jylla Meghalaya bad ka Assam kaba long kawei na ki mat ba hakhmat eh jong ka seng.Hadien ba ka sorkar MUA-II kam leh ei ei, ka seng ha ka 27tarik Rymphang 2017 ka la phah da ka jingthoh sha u Myntri Rangbah Duh jong ka Ri ban tuklar ia kane ka kam pud kam sam bad ha ka 6tarik Lber 2017 ka seng ka la ioh jubab na ka ophis u myntri rangbahduh, kat kum ka shithi No. PMOPG/D/2017/0098916, kaba 6tarik Lber 2017 kaba la kdew shai ba ka sorkar pdeng kan shimkhia ban ioh pynbeit ia u pud u sam hapdeng kine ki ar jylla.Ka seng lyngba ka kyrwoh na u President u samla Kyrshan Rymbai, u kyrmen skhem ba lyngba ka sorkar pdeng, yn sa ioh ia u pud u sam uba biang.Ka seng ka ong ruh ba kumba paw ha ki kot khubor ba u Myntri Rangbah ka Meghalaya bad Assam kin ia kynduh ha ka 3 Iaiong 2017 ban iakren halor u pud u sam bad ka seng, ka kyrmen ba katei ka jingiakynduh jong, kan ym long tang ka jingiadihsha, hynrei ban ia pynbeit ia u pud u sam namar khamtam eh ba la jan ka election 2018, lane ba ka seng kan pynbna ban nym shim bynta elekshon lada katei ka jingpynbeit ia u pud u sam kam seisoh, la pynkut u kyrwoh.
title: Kular U Modi, ban pynbeit kajia  pud hapdeng ka Assam, Meghalaya

content: Nongstoiñ, 29 Lber:Ka KSU Girls Wing WKHD Unit lyngba ka President jongka, ka kong Iadeimon Khongmalai, ka pynpaw ia ka jingsngewsih kaba khraw halor ka jingshah pyniap dusmon jong ka Samla Daritngen Syiem Shangoi, kaba dei na ka shnong Siejlieh ha ki riew runar ki bymdon shuh ka jingiatiplem para briew ban shim syndon kat ia ka jingim briew.Ka President, ka pynpaw ruh da kaba ong ba katei ka jingshah pyniap dusmon jong katei ka Samla ka dei kaba pynsyier mynsiem haduh katta katta ia kiwei pat ki samla kynthei jong ka sor Nongstoin bad ha ka District hi baroh kawei.Kumta na ka liang jong ka seng ka kyntu ia kiwei pat ki samla kynthei ba ki dei ban husiar ha ka rukom iaid rukom ieng, ban kiar na ki jingdih ba sniew bad kiba pynbuaid bad ruh ban kiar na ki jingleit kai sngewbha.Na ka liang jong ka seng ka kyntu ruh ia ki kmie ki kpa, ki kni ki kong, ki hymmen para ban pynlut por ha ka ban shim ia ka jingkitkhlieh ban sneng ban kraw ia ki khun ki kti bad ki ba ha iing ha sem khnang ban lait na ki kam sniew kam smeh.Ha kaba iadei pat bad ka jingshah pyniap dusmon,katei ka samla na ka liang jong ka seng ka kyntu jur ia ki bor jong ka ain ba ki dei ban pynstet ia ka jingtohkit khnang ban ioh kem noh ia kiba don kti ban leh ia katei ka kam runar bad ban pynshitom ruh katkum ki kyndon kong ka ain, bad shi bynta ban ia sngewlem halor katei ka jingjia na ka liang jong ka seng ka phah ruh ia ka khubor sngewlem sha ki ba ha iing jong katei ka samla .Ha kawei pat ka khubor na ka liang jong ka Dorbar shnong Siejlieh hapoh ka jingialam jong u bah S.K.Thongni kum u Sordar ha ka Dorbar shnong kaba la long mynta ka sngi, da kawei ka sur ki la shim ia ka rai ban iamih paitbah ha ka 3 tarik da kaba yn iaid paidbah bad ban khang shnong syndon ha katei ka sngi kum ka dak ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingshah leh dusmon jong ka khun samla jong ka shnong.Ha katei ka jingiaid paidbah, yn sdang ia ka jingiaid kjat na ka kyntoid Mawiaban bad yn pynkut pat ha Pompor kaba dei u khappud jong ka shnong Siejlieh bad ka Nondeiñ bad kan don ruh ka jingiakren paitbah ha kaba yn ia shim bynta na ki seng bapher bapher kiba napoh jong ka shnong Siejlieh, bad na ka liang jong ka Dorbar shnong ka khot ka wer ruh ia baroh ki sengbhalang bad ki seng bapher bapher jong ka thain ba kin wan ban iashim bynta lang ha katei ka jingjia iaid paidbah.Lah ban pynkynmaw, ha ka step jong ka Sngi U Blei ba ladep, ki pulit, ki la ioh ban tam ia kawei ka met iap kaba la pyut kaba la shah tep ha u shyiap jong ka wah Umpniang kaba don kham harum ia ka madan Nongpathar Pyndengrei.Katei ka samla, ka dei kaba la tip kyrteng kum ka Daritngen Syiem Shangoi 19 snem ka rta na ka shnong Siejlieh West Khasi Hills District bad ka dei kaba la jah na iing la kumba 1 bnai ei ei bad katei ka samla ka dei ka khun swet bad ka sah tang bad la u para jong ka u ba dang 15 snem ka arta ha katei ka shnong Siejlieh kaba jngai tang kumba 2 KM ei ei na ka sor Nongstoin.
title: 3 tarik yn iaid paidbah  & khang shnong ha Siejlieh

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:U Sub Divisional Magistrate, Sohra Civil Sub Division, Sohra, ula pynjari da ka kyndon 144 CrPC, ha kaba la mana ia ki kali, ba kim bit ban kit palat ia ka 6 ton ka jingkhia, haba iaid ha ka jingkieng Wahjapuh, kaba don ha ka surok Ichamati Bholaganj.Katei ka jingbuh kyndon ka dei namar ba ka don ka jingkiew jong ka um, kaba la pynsynjor shibun ia katei ka jingkieng bad kumta, kam long satia kaba shngain ba ki kali kiba kit khia, kin iaid lyngba.
title: Maham U SDO Sohra ban kit 6ton

content: Shillong, 29 Lber:Ka KHADC ka la thung Acting Sirdar ia u Bah Iaishah S Japang jong ka Sohbar Elaka hadien ba ka samoi jong u Bah KS Lyngskor ka la kut noh. Ha ka jingpynbna, u Secretary ka KHADC u la ong ba u Acting Sirdar thymmai un pyniaid ia ka synshar katkum ka riti dustur jong ka Elaa bad ki Act/rules jong ka KHADC ryngkat ka jingiatreilang bad ka Executive dorbar ba la mynjur da ka Executive Committee.Kane ka hukum kaba la pynmih ha ka 28 tarik Lber, 2017 kan treikam mardor haduh ban da pynbna da kumwei pat.
title: U Acting Sirdar ka Elaka Sohbar

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:Ka ju don ka jingong, ba u lum u suh khun, hynrei u kha pynban da u dkhan bad ha ka jingseng ia ka PDF ruh, la ia bna paidbah, ban ialam da U bah PN Syiem MLA, ha ryngkat shibun ki MDC, hynrei mynta ka sngi la pynbna ia ka People’ s Democratic Front (PDF) kum ka seng saiñ pyrthei ba thymmai ha ophis treikam jong katei ka seng hi kaba don ha Nongrim Hills, hynrei u nongialam (ba shipor jongka) dei U bah Ivanlum Marbaniang na Mawsynram, Working President bah Emlang Lytan na Nongthymmai, General Secretary u bah Auspicious L Mawphlang na Mawphlang. Ki don sa kiwei pat ki nongkitkam jong katei ka seng na Pynursla konstitwensi u bah Shanborlang Khongwir, na Nongstoiñ konstitwensi , na Mawkynrew, Mawshynrut, Mawkyrwat bad Mawhati.U General Secretary katei ka seng u bah Auspicious u la ong ba la saiñdur ia katei ka seng ha ka 1 tarik u lber, 2017 bad la thep ia ki kot ki sla sha ka Election Commission ha ka 17 tarik mynta u bnai bad ka EC ka la pyntip sha ki ba kan ai jingtip hapoh 15 sngi lada don kino kino ki jingbym biang hynrei namarba ka por ka la dap 15 sngi bad ym shym la pyntip sha ki la shim ba ka la biang. U la iathuh ba la shim ia ka rai ban thaw ia ka PDF ha ka jingialang kaba la don haduh 120 ngut kiba rung dkhot ryngkat ki nongkitkam hynrei mynta u la ong ba ki la don bun ngut kiba la rung dkhot.U bah Auspicious L Mawphlang u President barim jong ka NEHU Student Union u la ong ba ka kynhun ki paralok jong u-ki la sngewkhia bha namar ka jingsahdien jong ka jylla ha kiba bun ki liang naduh ka jingduk jingkyrduh, ka ioh kam ioh jam, ka rep ka riang, ka jingeh ki samla pule bad kiwei pat ki mat. Na kitei ki daw u la ong ba ka la don ka jingmut ban leit pynrung ia ka jingmut jingpyrkhat kaba thymmai ha ka jingmut ki paidbah ba kin wanrah noh ia ka jingkylla bad dei hangtei u la ong ba ka la shon ha ka jingmut jong ki ban thaw noh da kawei ka kynhun kaba la tip kum ka Campaign For Change ne ban ialap ia ka jingkylla.Hadien ba la mih ka Campaign For Change u la ong ba donkam pat ban wad sa ia ki riew sainpyrthei kiba don shisha ka jingmut rangbah ban wanrah jingkylli bad kiba khih ba ksaid na bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew bad dei hangtei u la ong ba ki la leit ban ia kren bad u Chief Executive Member ka KHADC u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem ban ia don bynta lang ban pynsngewthuh ia u paidbah. Hadien ba ka CFC ka la iaid lynti la katto katne por u bah Auspicious u la ong ba ki i donkam pat ban wanrah da kawei pat ka seng sainpyrthei kaba kin don tang ki briew kiba don ia katei ka thong ban trei na bynta ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew bad ban rat diengkhong ia ki jingsahdien baroh bad dei hangtei u la ong ba ka la wan biang ka jingpyrkhat ban thaw da ka PDF.Katkum ka jingkren utei u nongialam jong ka PDF la sngewthuh ba ki nongialam ba mynta ki lah ban dei tang katto katne por, hynrei ia ka kam nongialam kaba hakhmat eh yn sa wan ban shimti da ki briew kiba la ih bha ha ka politik ki ban long kum kita ki Icon jong katei ka seng.Watla ki nongialam ka PDF kim shym la jer kyrteng iano iano ruh hynrei la ioh jingtip pat na kikhubor ba jan bha bad katei ka seng ba u nongialam ba hakhmat jong ki un dei hi u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem CEM ka KHADC.La kylli biang hato ki don ne-em ki riew sainpyrthei kiba la ih ha ka politik kiba dei ki dkhot jong katei ka seng, u la jubab ba mynta ki dang shu sdang bad kin dang hap ban pyntyllun ia ka kam shakhmat ban thaw ia ki tnad jong ki samla Youth Wings, ka tnad ki kynthei Women’s Wing bad kin sa thaw ia ki District bad kumta ter ter. U la ong ba ka jingwan rung dkhot ki riew sainpyrthei kan lah ban long kham hadien ha ka por ba yn pyrkhat sa ia ka kam elekshon.La kylli biang hato kan buh kyrtong ne-em ka PDF ha baroh 60 konstitwensi, ia katei ruh u la ong ba dang hap ban peit bniah. La kylli don ne-em napdeng ki MLA ne ki MDC ki ban ia soh bad katei ka seng, ia katei ka jingkylli ruh kim pat kwah ban ong eiei.
title: Bluit mih ka PDF, U President  “ym U Bah Pynshngain”

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:Ka jingshah kynnoh donkti u CEM Bah Pynshngain N Syiem bad u EC ka tnad pisa u Bah Neil Antonio War, ha ka jyrsieh pyndonkam ia ka pisa tamasa mawbynna, ka lah ban poi shaduh u pud wat ban pynjari synshar administrator rule (president rule) lada jia ba mih ka kynrum kynram ha ka sain pyrthei khamtam lada dang iai neh u Bah Pynshnain kum u CEM.Hadien ba la pynkhyllem ia ka Executive Committee (EC) ba ialam da ka NPP ha Garo Hills Autonomous District Council (GHADC) hynnin ka sngi, ka sorkar jylla ka lah ban thawlad sa kumno ban pynkhyllem noh ia u CEM ka KHADC u Bah Pynshngain N Syiem. Katkum ka jingtip ba la iohlum, ka jingmih kyrteng u CEM bad u EM ka KHADC ha ka jyrsieh pyndonkam bakla ia ka pisa ka tamasa mawbynna, ka long kum ka kabu ia ka sorkar jylla ba kan ai khubor sha ka ophis jong u Lat ka jylla ba un pynjari da ka administrator rule.Ka jingeh mynta ka long ba u Bah Pynshngain u dang ioh ia ka jingbun paid kum u CEM watla, ka Congress kala iai pyrshang ban thawlad ban pynkhyllem noh hadien ka jingiakhun iakawang ktieh hapdeng u Myntri Rangbah ka jylla u Dr Mukul Sangma haduh ba u Bah Pynshngain u la hap ban shah sospon syndon ha ka party haduh lai snem.Ka kaiphod tohkit ka House Committee (HC) ka KHADC ba la wanrah ha ing dorbar kyrpang ha ka sngi Nyngkong, ka la pyni ka shem jingeh ban pynkut ia ka jingtohkit naba bym lah ban pynkitkhlieh marwei tang ha u Secretary barim ka KHADC u bah Welljune Syiemlieh halor ki san tylli ki mat ba ka la tohkit bad la kdew ba katei ka kam ka dei kaba eh bha naba la mih kyrteng ruh u CEM ba mynta ka KHADC u bah Pynshngaiñ N Syiem bad u EM u bah Antonio War bad donkam ba ia katei ka kam yn bteng da ka ing dorbar bad donkam ruh ban lum ia ka dorbar kyrkieh.Lah ban kdew ba ki san tylli ki mat ba katei ka komiti ka tohkit ki long ka bai lutksan ba ioh na Byrnihat na ka jaka ba heh 405 sq.ft ha ka dor T.264 tyngka shi sq.ft kumjuh ruh ka bai lutksan namar ka jingshah pynpra ki jingtei ka KHADC, ka jingsei pisa na MRB Nongpoh bad Nongstoin, ka jingthied jaka ka Council ha Mawkyrwat, ka ram sha ka Anderson Structural Construction bad ka jingthung ia ki nongtrei ba shipor ki peon ki cleaner.Ka Central Executive Committee (CEC) ka United Democratic Party (UDP) kan long ha ka 10 tarik Iaiong ban wan, ban iakren bad ban shim ia ka rai, la yn dang kyrshan ne em ia ka Executive Committee ka People Democratic Forum (PDF) ba ialam da Bah Pynshngain N Syiem ha KHADC.Ha katei ka kaiphod jong ka HC, la iasoi da u nongialam ka Liang pyrshah uba dei u Chairman u bah Manstudy Nongrem, ka nongialam jong ki MDC ka HSPDP ka kong Teilinia Thangkhiew, nongialam ki MDC ka KHNAM bah Adelbert Nongrum bad nongialam ki MDC ka UDP u bah Teinwell Dkhar kiba dei ki dkhot ha ka kynuhn synrop ka PDF.
title: Ka synshar President ha KHADC  na ka jyrsieh tamasa mawbynna?

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:U Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills u bah P.S Dkhar mynta ka sngi ki la lum ia ka jingialang hapdeng ki bor shnong ka Lawsohtun, ki bor District, bor shipai, ia ka kynhun ki nongialam shnong la ialam da u bah Sanbor Shullai MLA ka 19th Shillong South konstitwensi ryngkat u bah Ricky Shullai MDC ka Laban-Mawprem ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u Rangbah Shnong u bah M Wankhar. Ha katei ka jingialang la shim ia ka rai ba dei ban leit jurip lang ia ka jaka kaba don ha Lawsohtun kaba la kynnoh ba ki bor shipai ki la leit klun da kaba pynieng kynroh bad katei ka pynjulor ia ki tyllong um bam um dih jong katei ka shnong.La shim ia ka rai ba ia katei ka jingleit jurip yn leit lang da ki bor district, bor shnong, bad ki bor shipai. Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u rangbah Shnong bah M Wankhar la iathuh ruh ba ki shipai hapoh ka jingialam u Station Commandant Brig Amrit Lal ki la pan jingbit na ka bor shnong ban shah ia ki ban tei ia ka kynroh “Hynrei ngim shym la ailad bad ngi la ong ba ki dei ban sangeh shisyndon” ong u bah Wankhar.U bah Sanbor pat u la ong ba ka jingtei kynroh ki shipai ka la pynjulor ia ki tyllong umbam ka Lawsohtun nalor kaba ki la pynpra ia ki paip um bad u la ong ba ka shnong kan dang iai pyrshah ba ki shipai kin tei ia kano kano ka jingtei ha katei ka jaka da kaba kdew ba ka Guwahati High Court ruh ka la pynmih ia ka jingbishar jong ka ha u snem 2007 ba ki shipai kin ym la ban tei kino kino ki jingtei ha katei ka jaka.Hynrei u la ong ba ha u 2013 kyndit ki shipai ki la sdang ban tei kynroh khlem ka jingtip ki bor district hynrei ma u bad ka dorbar shnong ki la leit ban pynsangeh. U bah Sanbor u la ther ruh ia ka sorkar jylla naba kam shym la pynbna noh ia katei ka jaka ha Lawsohtun kum ki kynja law adong. U bah Sanbor u la byrngem ruh ban leit pyntip sha ka High Court halor katei ka jingbym lah ka sorkar ban pynbna noh kum ka Law Adong naba u la ong ba ka Advisory Committee ka la dep bthah ia ka sorkar ba ka dei ban pynbna noh hapoh 60 sngi katkum ka jingbishar jong ka ia ka PIL ha u 2005 hynrei ka sorkar kam shym la lah satia ban pynbna haduh mynta ruh.
title: Lum jingialang U DC ia  ki shipai bad ka Lawsohtun

content: Umthli, 30 Lber:Lyngba ki khohruh khohram bad ki jingeh jingjynjar ba har rukom ba ka la ia tyngkhuh la bun snem ha ka jingiaid lynti jong ka ha kaba la don ruh ki khep ba ka la duh jingkyrmen ha kaba la don teng ka por ba ym shym la lah ban pynlong skul namar ka jingshah pynjot pynpra ka ing skul ha ki bor mariang pynban ka bor shnong jong ka Umthli kaba pyniaid ia ka Umthli Secondary School ka la lah ban thom naphang ia baroh ki jingeh haduh ba ki lah ban pynieng bad ban pyntyllun ia katei ka skul kumba ka long haduh mynta. Ia kane la pynkynmaw mynta ka sngi ha ka sngi pynkut ia ka jingrakhe Jubili Paila ne ka jingpynkut ia ka rakhe dap 35 snem jong katei ka skul lyngba ka jingpule jong ka kong J.Kharumnuid ia ki mawjam ba katei ka skul ka la iaid lynti naduh ba la seng haduh kumba ka long mynta.Hapdeng ka jingther u lapbah katei ka skul ka la lah ban pyndep lut ia ki prokram jong ka mynta ka sngi baroh kumba la pynbeit. U Myntri ka tnad PHE ka sorkar jylla uba dei ruh u MLA ka Pynursla konstitwensi u bah Prestone Tynsong u la long u kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u MLA katei ka thaiñ u bah Titos W Chyne, MDC ka Lyngkyrdem-Laitkroh u bah Jansing Tynsong , BDO 12 Shnong Laitkroh C&RD Block kong E.L Warjri, Rangbah Shnong bah S.J Mylliemngap bad kiwei pat.Haba kren hadien ba la dep ban pyllait paidbah ia ka kot sah kynmaw ne ka Souvenir katei ka skul u bah Prestone u la pynkynmaw ba ha ka por ba ka Laitlyngkot bad ka Umthli ka dang hap hapoh Lyngkyrdem konstitwensi hapoh ka jinglong MLA jong u katei ka skul ka dang dei tang ka UP School bad u la ong ba la pyrkhat kumno ban kyntiew ia ka sha ka kyrdan Secondary bad mynta ka la urlong. “Ngan dang iai ia treilang bad phi, ka sorkar ka buh thong ban kham iarap ia ki LP bad UP School da ka jingthmu ba baroh ki khynnah skul kin lah ban pyndep ia ka matrik na shnong lajong” ong u bah Prestone Tynsong da kaba bynrap biang ba ha ka mang tyngka kaba dang shu dep ka sorkar ka la kham pynnoh sha ka tnad pule puthi naba ka buh thong ba ha u snem ban sa wan kane ka jylla ka dei ban long kaba kiew sted ha ka jingnang jingstad ban ia kiwei pat ki jylla.U la kdew ba ka shnong Umthli ka dei kaba pawnam bha ha ka ri India naba ka dei ka shnong kaba wan ba-ar hadien ka Mawlynnong bad la ithuh ia ka kum ka Clean and Green Village. U la ong ba ka dei ruh ka shnong kaba pawnam naba ka la lah ban sei ki nongialehkai phutbol kynthei kiba tbit bad ka dei ruh ka shnong kaba nyngkong eh ban sei ia ka nonghikai phutbol kynthei kaba nyngkong eh ha ka jylla (Football Coach) bad nangta la don ruh sa kawei pat na Pynursla bad kitei mynta u la ong ba ki bit ki biang bad ki la ioh ka jingsiew kaba biang namar katei ka kam. “Ki kmie ki kpa phi dei ban pynshlur ia ki khun lajong ha kane ka pyrthei kyrduh kam mynta ba ka sap jong ki kan dei ka kam ka jam jong ki” ong biang u bah Prestone haba pyni nuksa ia kitei ki Coach kynthei.Ha katei ka jingialang ba la pyniaid da u Babu T.Khonglam u bah Titos W Chyne u MLA katei ka thaiñ u la ong ba ka tnad pule puthi ka dei ka tnad kaba hap ban shimkhia bha naba ka dei lyngba ka pyle puthi kaba lah ban saindur ia ka lawei. U la pynpaw ka jingsngewkhia namarba la saw snem ka jinglong MLA jong u ka la iaid lynti hynrei haduh mynta um pat lah ban noh jingiarap ia katei ka skul hynrei u la ong ba mynta ka kynti un buh skhim kyrpang kum ka dak ka jingiadonkti lang, “Nga sngew dapram shisha ba la 4 snem mynta ngam pat don lad ban ia donkti lang bad phi, nga pynbna ruh ba nga buh skhim kyrpang ha u 2017-2018 T.5 lak tyngka ia kane ka skul” ong u bah Titos.Nalor kiba bunbah ki nongkren i kong J.Kharumnuid i la pynsngew ruh ia ka khana naduh ba la seng ia ka skul, ia ki jingjynjar ba ka skul ka la ia tyngkhuh bad ki jingiaid lynti jong ka lyngba ki khohruh khohram ha ki snem ba la dep kum na ka jingshah pynjulor ha ki bor mariang bad kiwei pat ki daw ha kaba la don ka khep bym ioh lad ban pynlong skul ruh hynrei ka la lah pat ba nieng mynta kumba ka long. Ha katei ka sngi ka la don ka jingsam khusnam kyrpang sha ki nongseng ia ka skul, sha ki nongialehkai phutbol kynthei kiba la ia khun ha ka phutbol Subroto Cup 2016, ki la don ruh ki jingialehkai pynbyrngia kiba bunjait da ki khynnah skul, ki khynnah skul barim bad kumjuh ruh na ki nonghikai.
title: Pynkut ka Umthli SS  ia ka rakhe Jubili Paila

content: Shillong, 31 Lber:Mynhynnin ka sngi ha ka por 4 baje janmiet ka la don ka jingkhie eriong kaba jur bha ha ka thaiñ Mawsynram bad la ong ba ha katei ka jingjia uwei u rangbah bad ka khun kynthei jong u ki la iap hashen hadien ba u diengbah u la khyllem ha ka ingsah jong ki. Katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka shnong Pattaghat (Mawsynram PS). U Ramesh Hajong -41 snem karta bad ka khun kynthei jong u ka Gritali Hajon gkaba dang 3 snem karta ki la iap hashen.
title: Khyllem u dieng, iap shi kpa shi khun

content: Jowai, 30 Lber:Uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Deimi Lyngdoh uba na ka shnong Thadmuthlong B, West Jaintia Hills, u la shah shoh shah bom haduh bym tip briew shuh bad shah lute ruh haduh 25 hajar tyngka nalor ka Mobile Phone bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar.Kane ka la jia ha ka miet sngi Nyngkong ha ka por 10 baje katba utei u Deimi Lyngdoh u dang leit lynti sha iing da ka Kali (Ford FIgo) kaba don ia u No. AS-01-BE-4280.La iathuh ba katba u dang niah ia ka kali jong u, la wan kawei ka trok bad ka la tynrah ia ka kali jong u. Ia u driver bad kiba don hapoh katei ka trok um lah satia ban ithuh.Hadien ba katei ka trok ka la dep tynrah ia ka kali jong u, u driver katei ka trok ha ryngkat ki paralok jong u ki la hiar ban bom ban shoh ia u haduh un da iapler bad ki la lute pat sa ia ka pisa 25 hajar tyngka, kawei ka Mobile Phone bad kiwei kiwei ki tiar kiba don hapoh katei ka kali jong u.Ki pulit ki dang thwet ia kitei ki runar ban pynshitom ia ki katkum ka ain.
title: T.25hajar, shah lute u rangbah

content: Shillong, 30 Lber:Hadien ba la dep ujor sha u Deputy Commissioner ka Ri Bhoi District ha ka 27 Tarik Lber 2017, ka Joint Action Committee of Social Organizations kaba kynthup ia ka CSWO Umran Dairy Unit, ka CSWO Central Body, Laban, Shillong, Poor People’s Movement (PPM), Hynniewtrep Youth Movement, (HYM), Ri Bhoi People’s Movement (RBPM); ki dkhot ka JAC ha ryngkat katto katne ki nongshongshnong jong ka Umran Dairy, hynnin ka sngi, ki la leit pat ban iakynduh sa ia u CEM KHADC U Bah P.N Syiem bad kumjuh ruh ia u EM Trade, u Bah N.A War halor ka jingpyrshah ban tei ia ka petrol pump thymmai kaba ha Umran Dairy halor ki nongrim kiba biang.Kane ka jingiakynduh jong ki seng ka long kaba seisoh ha kaba kitei ki rangbah, ki la shah skhor shisha ia ka jingud bad jingkyrpad jong u luk u lak kiba shong ba sah ha Umran Dairy.Na ka liang jong ki, ki la kular ban shim khia kloi halor katei ka jingeh bad ban leh ia kaba donkam. Ka JAC of Social Organizations ka kyrmen ba na ka liang jong ki, kin pynsangeh noh shisyndon ia ka jingtrei jong katei ka petrol pump kaba dang iaid shaid shaid haduh mynta bad khamtam eh ban khot hajir ia u Rangbah Shnong, u Bah Lambor Bina.Na ka liang ka seng, ki la dep ruh ban ia ka dorkhas sha ka Meghalaya Pollution Control Board bad kumjuh ruh sha ka NGT, kiba dei ban peit ia ka jing pynneh pynsah ia ka spah mariang.
title: Pyrshah Petrol Pump  Umran sha U CEM

content: Shillong, 30 Lber:Ka Rangthylliang Eco-Tourism Co-operative Society Ltd, kum shi bynta ban kyntiew ia ka kam jongoh-kai hapoh ka Shnong Rangthylliang, Pynursla, ka la plie ia ka Rangthylliang View Point Cum Information Centre ha ka 25tarik Lber 2017 ha ka por 02:00baje nohphai sngi.U Kongsan ha kane ka sngi ula long u MDC ka thain, u Bah Jansing Tynsong ha ryngkat u Asst. Registrar ka Co-operative Society, East Khasi Hills.Kiba la ia don ryngkat lang ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup ia ki dkhot ka Executive Committee ka Shnong Rangthylliang, ki dkhot na ka Livingroot Eco-Tourism Society, ki dkhot jong ka Rangthylliang Eco-Tourism Co-operative Society , ki Riew Rangbah bad ki Nongshongshnong.Ki Nongkren ha kane ka sngi ki kynthup ia u Samla Morningstar Khongthaw, uba dei ruh u President jong ka Rangthylliang Co-operative Society, u Secretary jong ka Shnong Rangthylliang, u Bah M. Kharbyngar uba dei u Asst. Registrar Co-operative Society, u Bah Hawson Khongsit uwei na ki dkhot ka Livingroot Eco-Tourism Society, u Bah E.G Khongngai President jong ka HYC- RMC.Haba kren ha kane ka jingialang kum u Kongsan, u MDC, Bah Jansing Tynsong, ula kyntu ia baroh ki dkhot jong kane ka Tourism Society hapoh ka jingialam jong u Samla Morningstar Khongthaw kum u President, ba kin iai tylli lang kawei ha kano kano ka kam ba ka Society ka trei, khnang ba ki kam bad ka roi ka par ha ka shnong kan kiew.Shuh shuh na ka liang jong u, u la kular kum u nongmih khmat, ban ai ka jingiatreilang ban iarap bad kyntiew ia ka kam jngoh-kai ha kane ka shnong.Shuh shuh na ka liang u President jong ka Society, u Samla Morningstar Khongthaw, ula maitphang ia kane ka jingialang da kaba ong ba kane ka Shnong ka dei kawei na ki shnong kaba paw bha ha ka ba iadei bad ka kam jngoh-kai pyrthei ha ki por ban sa wan. Ka Shnong Rangthylliang ka dei na ki shnong ba bun eh ki Jingkieng-Jri ne Livingroot bridges, u Samla Morning ula iathuh shuh ba katkum ka jingwad bniah jong ka Society la lap ba ki don haduh 20 tylli ki Jingkieng-Jri, nalor ki jingkieng-Jri ka Rangthylliang ka don sa kiwei pat ki jaka peitkai kum ki Kshaid, ki Pung (Natural Water Pools), Synrang Maw (Natural Travellers Shelter), ki jaka Kyntang (Sacred Places),kiwei pat ki jingtei nam kum u Mynbarim (Monuments) bad kumta ter ter.Shuh shuh ula ai khublei ia ki dkhot jong ka Society kiba la trei shitom ban pynurlong ia kane ka kam, kum ban shu iathuh lyngkot ia kane ka View Point Cum Information Centre ha Rangthylliang, la shna bad pynlong tang da ka jingtrei mon sngewbha jong ki dkhot, khlem da ioh kano kano ka jingiarap la na ka liang ka Sorkar ne ka bor Shnong.Haba pynkut ia ka jingkren u samla Morningstar Khongthaw u la kyntu na ka liang ka Sorkar ba kan phai khmat lem sha kane ka Shnong ha ka ban thaw ia ki lad jingiarap lyngba ki Scheme bapher bapher na ka bynta ban kyntiew ia ka kam jngoh kai pyrthei (Tourism) ha kane ka shnong.La pynwai ia kane ka jingialang da u Secretary jong ka Rangthylliang Eco-Tourism Co-operative Society, u Bah Paul Micky Marbaniang.
title: Plie jaka jngoh kai U  MDC ha Rangthylliang

content: Shillong, 30 Lber:Ha ka 3 tarik u iaiong kan don ka jingia-lang jong ka Joint Action Committee jong ka Khasi Jaintia Land Owners and Quarries Association. Katei ka jingialang kan long ha ka por 11 baje mynstep ha phyllaw ing u Pa’iem Laboius Syiem ha Mawlai Mawroh. Ka kyrwoh khubor na u General Secretary katei ka JAC u bah Jropsing Nong-khlaw ka la khot la wer ia baroh ki trai jaka bad ki trai par ba kin ia poi lang sha katei ka jingialang ban pyrkhat na bynta ka kam tih maw tih shyiap.
title: 3 tarik ka jingialang ki trai mawshun

content: Jowai, 4 Iaiong:Uwei u khynnah ba dang 14 snem ka rta u la shah kem ha ki pulit ka Saitsama Outpost kaba hap hapoh ka jingpeit ka Jowai Police Station namar ka jingdonkti jong u ban tuh haduh 12 lak tyngka na ka iing jong ka kong Emidaplin Rymbai ha ka shnong Khanduli.Utei u khynnah u la tuh ia katei ka pisa naduh ka 15 tarik Lber, hynrei katei ka longkmie ka la ong ha ka ejahar jong ka ba ka daw ka jingslem jong ka ban ujor sha ki pulit kadei namar ba u lok jong ka um don satia ha shnong bad khlem ka jingtip bad ka jingiasngewthuh bad la u lok kam lah ban rai marwei.Na ka liang ki pulit mar synioh ia katei ka jingujor, ki la kem ia utei u khynnah bad la wanrah ia u ha khmat ka iing bishar bad ka iing bishar ka la phah noh ia u sha iing koidi khynnah (Juvenile Home) Shillong.
title: Shah kem u khynnah  14 snem, ba tuh 12 lak

content: Nongstoiñ, 4 Iaiong:Ka United Democratic Party (UDP), Mawshynrut Circle, ha ka General Meeting ba la pynlong ha ka 31 tarik March, ka la tyrwa ia u bah Savio Iawphniaw ba un long kum u kyrtong jong ka seng, na katei ka circle u ban ia ai reng ha ka election sha ka iing dorbar thaw ain jong ka Jylla ka ban sa long ha u 2018.U tei u Samla Savio Iawphniaw u dei u wei na ki samla ba la nang la stad hapoh ka Ri Amerika, bad u la wan ban pyndep ia ka jingpule na ka City University of New York bad kumjuh na ka New York University bad u tei u samla u don ia ka Dual Masters ha ka subject Anthropology bad Evolutionary Biology bad u la long kum u researcher kumba san snem ei ei ha katei ka university ba pawnam jong ka pyrthei.Hadien ba katei ka General Meeting jong ka seng, ka la imon bad tyrwa ia u tei u samla ba un long kum u kyrtong jong ka seng, na ka liang jong u tei u samla ruh u la pdiang sngewbha ia katei ka jingtyrwa jong ki Executive Members bad ki Paidbah nongkyrshan jong ka seng na katei ka Konstitwensi.U samla Savio haba ai jingkren ha katei ka jingialang hadien ba la dep ban jied ia u kum u kyrtong u la kular ba un trei tyngeh na ka bynta ban pynkiew ia ka shynshar khadar (Democracy) ka ba khuid bad ruh ban iai trei shitom na ka bynta ki jingangnud jong ki paidbah kiba kynthup naduh ka koit ka khiah kaba biang, ka imlang sahlang, ka jingnang jingstad kaba kham tbit bad ka ioh ka kot na ki kam ki jam ki ba pynim lem ia u ba duk ba suk.Shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba ki nongialam ki ban ialam ia ka ri bad ka jaitbynriew ki dei ban long kiba la bit la biang ha ka jingnang jingstad bad u la ong ruh ba ki ri kiba la kham paw mynta kidei tang namar ba ki nongialam ki long kiba la bit ban ialam, bad ki long kiba la iohi jngai bha bad sngewthuh ia ka rukom im ba ha khmat ha kane ka juk (contemporary zeitgeist).Ha katei ka meeting la don ruh ki dkhot EC jong ka party UDP, ba kynthup ia President, Bah Lowing Sangriang, bah Caphius Lyngkhoi bad bah Qwest Paliar kum ki Working President, u bah Taliham Iawphniaw Publicity Secretary, i kong Eslinda Nongspung, President Women’s Wing, bah Bimstar Lyngkhoi secretary ka Farmer’s Wing, Bah Phostin Diengan bad Bah Eric Thongni, President bad secretary ka Youth Wing, bad kiwei ruh ki Executive Members ba kynthup na ka West Khasi Hills District Executive Members.
title: Da u samla ba  pule na Amerika, yn pynieng MLA 2018

content: Shillong, 4 Iaiong:Mynta ka sngi ka 4tarik Iaiong, 2017, u nongaibuit ba Rangbah ka Sorkar Jylla u ba dei ruh u MLA ka thain u la leit ban jngoh ia ki katto katne ki Shnong hapoh ka Constituency ki ba la shah pynjulor ha ki bor ka mariang ha kane ka taiew ki ba kynthup ia ka Shnong Pahamsyiem, Pahamlapong, Nongpoh, Mawdiangum kiba la kot ka jingjot ki tnum iing sha ka san spah tam ei ei, u la leit ban jngoh ha ka por 10:30 mynstep bad hadien kane u la leit ruh ban jngoh ia ka Shnong Umtham, Sarikhushi bad Borgang ka ba la kot ka jingjulor sha ka Lai spah tam ei ei ki tnum iing ha baroh lai Shnong.Ha kane ka jingiakynduhlang la ia don ryngkat ki Ophisar Sorkar kynthup naduh u Project Director ka DRDA u Bah Kharsati, u BDO ka Umling C&RD Block bah R.Kharbihkhiew, u MLA ka Umsning Constituency u Dr.C.Lyngdoh, ki riew rangbah ki ba kynthup ia u Bah Min Makri, Chairman ka Umling C&RD Block, Bah Mayral Born Syiem, Political Secretary jong u Dr.D.D.Lapang, Bah Plielad Tiewsoh, Bah B.S.Teron, Bah Augustine Wahlang, U Sardar ka Nongpoh, Ki Rangbah Shnong, ki riew Rangbah, ki longkmie bad ki samla.La ioh jingkren na ki katto katne ki long iing ki ba la mad ia kane ka jingjia ki ba la iathuh kumba ia kaei kaba ki la mad bad la ioh jingkren na ki rangbah Shnong bad ki riew rangbah, na U Dr.C.Lyngdoh, MLA uba la ai ka jingsngewlem sha baroh ki long iing ki ba mad ia ka jingjulor bad shah ktah ha ki bor mariang.Ha ba ai jingkren ha kane ka sngi u Dr.D.D. Lapang, u la ai khublei ia baroh ki Rangbah Shnong ki ba la shimkhia ban iatreilang bad ki paitbah nongshong Shnong ki ba mad ia kane ka jingjia lem bad ki Ophisar, u la ai khublei ruh ia u Project Diretor bad BDO ki ba la shim khia ban pynkloi katba lah ban pynioh jingiarap ia kine ki lanot bad ha kum kane ka por u la ai ki kyntien sngewlem sha baroh ki ba mad ia kiane ka jingjia ryngkat ki kyntien ai mynsiem ba kin nym duh jingkyrmen, ha ka ba na ka liang jong u, u la ong ba un pyrshang katba lah ban pynsted ia ki jingiarap da ka jing iatreilang bad ki Ophisar sorkar.
title: Leit jngoh u Bah Lapang  ia ki lanot Shohphria

content: Shillong, 4 Iaiong:Jan baroh na ki nongialam ba hakhmat ka seng KHNAM ki la poi mynta ka sngi ha jingra-khe 15 snem katei ka seng kaba la ia kynduh lang ha ingsah u bah Adelbert Nongrum (Working President) kaba don ha Jaiaw. Hynrei ym shym la iohi ia u MDC ka Mawkhar-Pynthor u bah James Ban Basaiawmoit ba un donlang ha katei ka jingialum ki nongialam KHNAM.La kylli na u bah Adelbert hato ka KHNAM ka la phah jingtip ne-em sha u bah James Ban ba ka don katei ka jingiarakhe 15 snem, u bah Adelbert u la ong ba la pyntip. La kylli biang hato u bah James Ban u la pyntip ne-em ba um lah ban poi ne ioh ka don kano kano ka daw kaba um lah kiar ban poi sha katei ka jingialang, “Em, ngi khlem ioh jingtip eiei-u khlem pyntip” ong u bah Adelbert. Katei ka jingbym lah u MDC ka KHNAM na Mawkhar ban poi sha katei ka rakhe 15 snem ka la pynlyngngoh ia kiba bun ki nongialam jong ka KHNAM.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba u bah James Ban Basaiawmoit u la pynkhreh bha ialade ban ia khun ha ka elekshon MLA 2018 na Pynthor hynrei haba wad jingtip na ki nongialam KHNAM la sngewthuh ba kam pat don kano kano ka jingiasyllok ne ka jingpynsngew sha ka Party ba u don jingmut ban ia khun elekshon MLA. Hynrei kiwei pat ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba u bah James Ban u lah ban ia khun na ka PDF ka seng saiñpyrthei kaba dang shu mih thymmai.
title: Ang lyngngoh ki KHNAM  bym poi u MDC ka Mawkhar

content: Shillong, 4 Iaiong:Mynta ka sngi kum-ba 40 ngut ki nongialam ba hakhmat ka seng UDP na west Shillong konsti-twensi ki la leit ban pyniasoh ialade sha ka seng Congress ban ai ka jingkyrshan radbah ia u bah Mohendro Rapsang ha ka elekshon MLA 2018. Kitei ki nongialam jong ka UDP ki kynthup na ki Unit bapher bapher kum na Lumdiengjri, Qualapatty, Lama Villa,Mawprem bad kiwei pat ki Unit.Ka kong Bari Thangkhiew General Secretary ka UDP na Lama Villa Unit kaba dei ruh ha kajuh ka por ka Secretary jong ka Constituency Committee Women’s Wing jong ka West Shillong bad u bah Willyson Iongnong Vice President ka UDP na Lumdiengjri Unit ki la ong ba kiba wan mynta ka sngi ban kren sha ki nongthohkhubor dei tang ki nongialam hynrei ki don pat da ki spah ngut ki paidbah kiba bun kiba bud lang ia ki nongialam.La kylli na ki na kaei ka daw ba ki la phet na ka UDP ban leit ia soh Congress, ki la jubab ba ka daw ka dei namarba ki la kwah ban wanrah noh ia ka jingkylla. Ki la ong biang ba haba ki ong ka jingkylla kam shym dei eh ia ka roi ka par hynrei ki kwah ban wanrah da u bah Rapsang kum u nongmihkhmat katei ka konstitwensi da kaba ong ba u dei u briew uba la iarap shibun ia ki longing longsem kiba duk ba kyrduh ha ka jingiakynduh kam shimet jong ki. Ki la iathuh ruh ba ka daw ba ki phet noh na ka UDP hapoh ka jingialam u bah Paul Lyngdoh MLA ba mynta ka dei namarba kim sngewhun ia ka jingiakynduh kam jong ki bad u bah Paul.U bah Mohendro Rapsang uba donlang ha katei ka sngi haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor ha ing jong u kaba don mar pyrshah ka ophis u SP East Khasi Hills u la ong ba da ki spah ngut ki dur khmat thymmai ki la wan ban ia soh bad u bad ban kyrshan ia u ha ka elekshon MLA 2018. U la ong ba kiba bun na kitei ki spah ngut ki dei ki nongkyrshan jong ka UDP bad mynta u la ong ba u don ka jingkyrmen kaba skhem ba un jop ha ka elekshon 2018. U la pynkynmaw ba ha u 2013 ha ka sien ba nyngkong eh ba u aireng pyrshah ia u bah Paul u la shah rem tang da 481 vote, “Mynta ka kynti nga don ka jingkyrmen ba ngan jop khamtam hadien ka jingwan ia soh thymmai ki spah ngut” u la ong.La kylli na u bah Rapsang hato u la kut jingmut lane u la sngew thikna ialade ban ia khun na ka seng Congress ha u 2018, “Haduh mynta nga dei u Congress, hynre iym lah ban tip ka politik te ka politik ka lah ban kylla ha kano kano ka por ruh” u la jubab. La kylli biang hato haba ki spah ngut ki wan pyniasoh sha u don pat ne-em kiba phet na u, “Ki don 4 ngut kiba la phet noh” u la jubab biang. Katkum ka jingiathuh u bah Rapsang uba la long teng u myntri pla tyngka ka Hima Mylliem u la ong ba haduh mynta ki kyrtong kiba dang iaid shakhmat na bynta ka 2018 dei tang ma u bad u bah Paul.
title: Haduh mynta nga dei u Congress,  ka politik ka lah ban kylla: Rapsang

content: Shillong, 4 Iaiong:Mynta ka sngi, ki dkhot ka Khasi Students Union (KSU) ki la pynlong ia ka jingrakhe kyrpang kum ka sngi Kyrsiew Ri, kaba ki shim ka sngi ha kaba u SyiemTirot Sing Syiem, u la hiar thma nyngkong ia ka bor jong ka sorkar phareng ha u snem 1829.Ha kane ka sngi, la thang ruh ia ka dur bula (tyngshop) jong ka Uranium Corporattion of India Limited (UCIL) bad ka Atomic Mineral Directorate ha Nongmensong.Ki dkhot ka KSU na kylleng ki jaka jong ka ri Khasi Jaintia lem bad kiwei ki seng kum ka LYWA, ki la wan ban iashim bynta shitrhem ha kane ka sngi da kaba pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah na madan Urkaliar shaduh ka jaka ba don ka ophis ka AMD ha Nongmensong.Ki nongkren naduh u President ka KSU u Bah Lambok Marngar, u GeneralSecretary u Bah Donald Thabah, bad ki nongialam barim ka seng kum u chairman ka NESO u Bah Samuel Jyrwa, bad Bah BS Lyngdoh na ka Langrin Youth Welfare Association (LYWA) ki la ther bad byrthen ia ka UCIL ba ka dei ban sangeh noh ka jingphoh sniew ban ioh khlong ia u uranium na kane ka jylla.U president ka KSU, u samla Lambokstarwell Marngar, u la ong ba ka UCIL haduh mynta ka la shim ïa bun ki jingim jong ki briew namar ka jingïaibteng jong ka ban drill ïa ki jaka na don u uranium, bad bynrap ba lada ka UCIL bad AMD ki dang ïabteng ïa kane ka kam, ka seng kan kynnoh ba kitei ki ar tylli ki tnat kidei ki nongshun bakhraw tam jong ka jaidbynriew bad ka nongpynïap briew ba shyrkhei tam ha ka jylla baroh kawei.“Lada ka UCIL bad ka AMD ki dang bteng ïa ka jingtreikam jong ka ha ki thaiñ ba don u uranium, ka seng kam banse ban pynher krad ïa ki na kane ka Bri Hynñiewtrep,” ong u Bah Lambokstarwell.Haba kren ha ka jingïalang, u president ka LYWA, u Bah BS Lyngdoh u la ong ba ka UCIL bad ka Sorkar ki dei ban nym khmih lynti ne phohsniew ban ïoh tih ïa u uranium na kane ka jylla namar kam don ka jingïohnong ïa ka jaidbynriew hynrei ka wanrah tang ka jingduhnong ïa ki myndiem ba kordor. U Bah Lyngdoh u la pynpaw ka jingsngewnguh ïa ka KSU ha kaba naduh ka snem 1993 ka la ïeng ban ïada ïa ka thaiñ SWKH na ka jingthmu ka UCIL ban tih ïa u tei u marpoh khyndew.Katba u General Secy ka KSU, u samla Donald Thabah u la ong ba ka seng naduh ki snem kiba mynshwa ka ju ïeng pyrshah ïa ka jingthmu ban tih ïa u uranium bad kan ïai bteng ïa kane ka jingpyrshah ha ki pateng ban wan bad lada ka UCIL ne ka Sorkar ka thmu ban tih jubor ka seng kan nym kynrandien wat lada hap ban ïaumsnam.“Ngim kwah ba ki pateng jong ngi kin don hapdeng ka jingkhrew na ki jingpang ba harukom, hynrei ngi donkam ïa ka jaidbynriew kaba khih ba ksar kaba khlaiñ bad kaba im, na kata kadaw ngin nym ai lad ban khlong ïa u uranium na ki thaiñ WKH bad SWKH”, ong u samla Donald.Nalor ka mat uranium kaba dei ka mat pdeng ha kane ka jingrakhe ïa ka sngi Kyrsiew Ri, u nongïalam ka KSU u la pynpaw ba kiwei kiwei pat ki mat kiba ka seng ka ïeng ban ïakhun ki long ka jingbuh noh kloi ïa ki entry bad exit point ban khanglad ïa ka jingwan rung ki mynder, ka jingpyrshah ïa ka jingwan jong ka lynti rel bad ban pyrshah ïa ka jingpynbna nongshong shnong ba pura ïa ki Hindu Bangladesh kiba kwah ban wan sha Ri India namar ngim kwah ban long mynder hala ka jong ka Ri.U President barim ka KSU u Bah Daniel Khyriem, u la ong ba lada ka ophis jong ka AMD bad ka UCIL ki thmu ban tih jubor ïa u uranium na ka jylla na ka liang ka seng kan thom da ka bor ïa katei ka ophis bad kan pynher krad lut ïa ki nongtrei bad khang khyrdep syndon ïa katei ka ophis ha kane ka jylla.Katba u chairman ka NESO, u Bah Samuel Jyrwa u la ong, mynta la 27 snem ka Sorkar ka la thmu ban tih ïa u uranium na kane ka jylla, hynrei dei da ka jingïatylli jong ka jaidbynriew kane ka jingthmu jong ka UCIL bad ka Sorkar ka la pulom noh. U la ong ba ka jingpyrshang jong ka Sorkar ban pynbiej ïa ki paidbah da ki kam pynroi bad wan rah ïa ki surok ba da ki spah klur kadei ka buit sianti suda ban ïoh tur sha ki bynta ba don utei u marpoh khyndew.“Wat la u uranium udei u marpoh khyndew u ba kordor bad u ba rem dor, hynrei lada ailad ban tih ïa u, u long ka jingtim ïa ka jaidbynriew bad ka pateng ban wan,” bynrap u heh ka NESO.Ka jingthmu ban rakhe ia kane ka sngi ka long ban kyrsiew ia ki trai ri trai muluk ban ieng pyrshah ia ka jingthmu ka sorkar pdeng ban tih ia u Uranium ha West Khasi Hills district, la ong u president barim ka KSU u Bah Samuel Jyrwa.U la ong ba ka surok kaba thmu ban shna ha Mawthabah ka thew beit tang ban ioh khlong ia u uranium hynrei na ka liang ka seng bad ki paidbah kim dei ban ailad ia kane da lei lei ruh.Hadien ka jingïalang ki dkhot ka KSU ki la thang ruh ïa ki tyngshop jong ka AMD bad UCIL kum ka dak ka jingpyrshah ïa ka jingthmu jong kitei ki tnat ban tih ïa u Uranium, bad la pyllait ruh ïa ka Disc bala ai kyrteng “Khyllie pat para Ri ïa ka khaïi ka pateng-II” da u Gen Secy barim ka KSU u samla Auguster Jyrwa.
title: Rakhe Sngi Kyrsiew ri ka KSU,  da kaba thang ia ki bula UCIL

content: Shillog, 4 Iaiong:U Additional Chief Secretary ka sorkar Meghalaya, jong ka tnat General Administration (A) Department, u pyntip ba baroh ki ophis sorkar Jylla, ki jaka pule, kiba hap ha East Khasi Hills, ba kin khang ha ka 10tarik Iaiong 2017, na ka daw jong ka Shad Suk Mynsiem.
title: Shuti Shad Suk Mynsiem

content: Jowai, 4 Ialong:Uwei u briew uba la tip kyrteng kum u Pualus Lamin (45) na ka shnong Mukroh u la shah kem ha ki pulit hadien ka jingthwet kaba bun bnai halor ka jingshah kynnoh ba u la donkti ban dung ia uwei u briew haduh ba u la jan pei snier ha u snem ba ladep.Utei u briew la ioh kem mynta ka sngi da ka kynhun ki pulit ba kyrpang jong ka West Jaintia Hills na Riatsasim Jowai.Utei u briew u la dung ia uwei u paralok jong u, u Sabit Thappa hadien ba ka la don ka jingiania hapdeng jong ki hadien ba ki la dep ban iadih. Utei u Sabit Thappa u la shah dung na Kpoh haduh ba u la shitom jur.Ia utei u Lamin yn sa rah ia u lashai sha ka iing bishar.
title: Shah kem u nong Mukroh ba dung briew

content: Shillong, 4 Iaiong:U Donald D Ingty Secretary ka Diocese Church of North East India u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ka la don ka jingpyn-donkam bakla ia ka pisa kaba la lum na ka bai skul ki khynnah skul kaba kot haduh T.53,93,621 tyngka. U la ujor ba ia katei ka pisa ym shym la thep ha bank bad haba la wad bniah u la kdew ba la pyndonkam bakla ia katei ka pisa da ki 5 ngut ki nongtrei jong katei ka skul bad kitei ki long u Shri F.G. Daimari, Acctt. Shri Supriyo Biswa, Asst. Acctt., Rishot Shanpru, Banteibah Niangti bad u Shri Dhurbajeet Dey kiba trei ha katei ka skul. U la ong ba ia kane la lap da ka Management Committee jong ka skul.
title: Pyndonkam bakla T.53 lak tam

content: Shillong, 4 Iaiong:U Shri Ravi Thakur u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka 3 tarik mynta u bnai ha ka por 11 baje mynmiet uwei u pulit AB constable uba la tip kyrteng kum u Pitamber Hajong u la pynhuri hura ha jaka sah jong u Thakur kaba don ha Lapalang, Shillong bad u la byrngem byrsit ruh ia ute iu nongujor da kaba pyntieng da ka pistol bad u la shoh ia u, u la ujor ba u tei u pulit langrut u la bu-aid kyiad.
title: Shah pynap Pistol ha u pulit bu-aid

content: Shillong, 4 Iaiong:Ha ka jingkynmaw burom ia ka jingdap 15 snem jong ka-ka Khun Hynniewtrep National Awakening Movement ( KHNAM) ka la dawa na ka sorkar jylla ba ka dei ban thaw noh ia ka Ing dorbar Thaw-aiñ ka jylla namarba haduh mynta ka jylla kam pat don ia la ka jong ka Ing Dorbar Thaw-aiñ kaba pura. Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor u General Secretary katei ka seng u la ong ba mynshuwa ia dorbar la pynlong ha ka Hall kaba dei ka Library hynrei mynta pat la pynlong ha ka Hall ia leh tamasa jong ka tnad Arts and Cultures. “Ia ka dorbar la pynlong ha ka Hall ia leh tamasa bad ki minister, ki MLA pat ki ia heh tang ka ia rwai ia shad” ong u bah Batkupar Wahlang uba la pynkynmaw ba la seng ia ka KHNAM naduh u 2002 bad ka jingiaid lynti jong ka mynta ka la kot sha ka 15 tylli ki snem.U President rangbah ka KHNAM u bah Pyndap Saibon u la pynkynmaw ba la seng ia ka KHNAM ha u 2002 shisnem shuwa ka elekshon MLA bad ha u 2003 ka la sei 2 ngut ki MLA bad ha u 2004 ka la sei 2 ngut ki MDC. Ha u 2008 ka la sah sa tang uwei u MLA bad ha u 2009 ka la kiew sha ka 4 ngut ki MDC.Hynrei ha u 2011 u la ong ba la pyrshang ban pynduh pyndam noh ia ka seng KHNAM da ki katto katne ngut ki nongialam jong ka hynrei ki nongialam kiba don mynta ki la lah ban pynkhie im biang ia katei ka seng kaba la ioh jingithuh biang na ka Election Commission ha u snem 2012.“Dei na kitei ki jingjia, ngim shym la ioh ban pynkhreh bha ia ka elekshon 2013” ong u bah Pyndap Saibon, hynrei watla katta ruh u la ong ba ha u 2014 ka KHNAM ka la lah biang ban se ihaduh 4 ngut ki MDC hynrei mynta ki sah sa tang 2 ngut.U bah Adelbert Nongrum working President kumjuh u CEM barim ka KHADC uba dei ruh u MDC jong ka Jaiaw u la ong ba ka KHNAM kan ym kmen toh hoh shuh tang ha ka jingbun paid ne ka jingbun briew hynrei kan iaid beit da ka nongrim bad ki nongialam kiba don ia ka nongrim. “45 tylli ki snem ki la iaid ka jaitbynriew ka la nang ring swai naba kiba don ha ka bor bad kita kiba don ha ka Majority ki pynkylla Minority ia ka jaitbynriew” u la ong.Shuh shuh u bah Adelbert u la ong ba hadien ka jingphiah konstitwensi thymmai ha u 2013 la pynduh noh wat ia ka kyrteng Khasi ruh kum ka Jaiaw, Laitumkhrah bad kiwei hynrei la wanrah pynban da ka kyrteng North, East, South, West ha nongbah Shillong.“Ngi kren shai ba ka KHNAM kam dei ka seng kaba isih ia kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew hynrei ka pyrshah ia kito kiba wan rung be-aiñ sha kane ka jylla ym ia kiba la shong la sah naduh ki por ba mynshuwa” ong biang u bah Adelbert.U la kynthah ruh ia ka sorkar jylla hapoh ka jingialam u Dr.Mukul Sangma kum u myntri rangbah kaba dang shu leit ban ia kren kam pud kam sam bad ka sorkar Assam hapoh ka jingialam u Sarbananda Sonowal, “Balei naduh mynshuwa ha ka por ba synshar ka Congress ha ka jylla bad ka ri ym don kum kane ka jingiakren pud kren sam, hynrei mynta ynda ka seng Congress ka la duh lyer la sdang ban leit ia kren” u la ong da kaba kdew ruh ia kiwei pat ki jingdkoh treikam ka sorkar kum ka ioh kam ioh jam ki samla ne ka mat kaba ka KHNAM ka ia khih mynta ka Reservation Policy ha kaba u la ong “Dei ka sorkar kaba pynbor ia ki samla ban rah suloi bad hadien kan sa pynbna pat ia ki da ka skhim Special Package, ngim kwah da kane ka rukom” u la ong.U President ka KHNAM State Youth Wing u bah Thomas Passah u la ong ba ka kam ba nyngkong ka seng KHNAM ku ka kyrteng jong ka ka dei ban kyrsiew thiah ia ka jaitbynriew bad ka la iaid ia kane ka lynti la 15 snem mynta.U la ong ba ka KHNAM kam shym la lah ban pyni ia ki kam jong ka namarba kam don tang uwei u MLA ruh bad ka la ong ba mynta ka la pynkhreh bha na bynta ka elekshon 2018 ban sei MLA bad dei ynda ka la ioh MLA ba ki MLA jong ka kin pyni da ki kam sha u paidbah.
title: “Ki Minister & MLA, tang ka rwai  ka shad, ka dorbar ruh ka tamasa”

content: Shillong, 04 Iaiong:Ka jingbthei ki paip um ha ka janmiet jong ka 3 tarik u Iaiong ha Mawkriah ki la pynkyrduh um ia ka nongbah Shillong bad kumjuh sha ki shnong ba markhap bad ka nongbah. Halor kane, ki nongialam ka Synjuk ki Nongsynshar Shnong ka Bri U Hynniewtrep (SNSBH) hynne kila leit peit da la ki jong ki khmat ha kane ka jaka ha ka jingialam u Bah R Blah u ba dei u Secretary bad ka la iakynduh ia u Executive Engineer ka Public Health Engineering Division II u Bah Samuel Kharmawphlang bad ioh ban iakren bad u ha lor kane ka bynta.U Bah Kharmawphlang u la iathuh ha ki nongsynshar shnong ba ka jingbthei ki paip um ka dei ba ki paip ki la rim palat bad ka rta jong ki ka la poi sha ka 30 snem tam.“Ka jingiapynbeit hapdeng ka tnad PHE bad ka kompeni kaba pyntrei ia ka 2-lane (Sohiong By-Pass) ka don hynrei ka lah ruh ban long ba jingtheh khyndew ha kane ka bynta ka la pynkhia bad pynlong ia ki paip ba kin bthei”, la ong u Bah Samuel.Ki paip ki dei ki 750 mm bad ym lah ban ong ba ka jingpyllait palat ia ka um kan palat ia ka 750 mm namar ia ka jingpyllait ia ka um la leh da kawei ka bynta.Ka Synjuk ka la pynpaw ia ka jingai khublei ia ka tnad PHE kaba la shim khia ban maramot ia kane ka jingbthei jong ki pipe bad pyniaid shaid shaid ia ka kam. La iohi ruh ba ki nongtrei ba kynthup ia u Executive Engineer, u SDO bad kiwei kiwei ki la ia shim bynta ban iatrei lang khlem shongthait naduh ka janmiet 3 tarik ban pynthikna baka jingtrei dei ban pyndep mynta ka sngi ka 5 tarik u Iaiong khnang ba ki paidbah kiba shaniah tylli ha ka tnad PHE na ka bynta umbam umdih kin ym don jingthut.
title: Kynduh ka SNSBH ba tyrkhong  um ka sor, naba bthei u nar PHE

content: Nongstoiñ, 4 Iaiong:U Deputy Commissioner ka West Khasi Hills District, u Arun Kumar Kembhavi, u la hiar sha ki thain Riangdo mynta ka sngi, ban pynlong ia ka jingleit jurip ia ki ar tylli ki jaka thew kali kit dewiong (Weight Bridge) kata kawei kaba don ha ka shnong Mawpun H bad kawei pat kaba don ha Nongdomprut.Hadien katei ka jingleit jurip jong u DC ia kitei ar tylli ki jaka thew kali dewiong kiba don ha ka thain Riangdo, na ka liang jong ki katto katne ki nongthoh khubor, ki la ioh lad ruh ban iakren markhmat bad u DC ban kylli kaei ka jingthmu ka jong u kum u khlieh jong ka District ban leit jurip ia kitei ki jaka thew kali kit dewiong.Haba jubab ia katei ka jingkylli na ka liang jong u DC u la ong ba hadien ba la ioh ia shibun ki jingujor na ki paidbah halor ka jingdon ar tylli ki jaka thew kali kit dewiong ha katei ka thain, na ka liang jong ka sorkar ka la bthah ia u ba un leit ban jurip biang ia kitei ki ar tylli ki jaka thew kali kit dewiong.Shuh shuh u DC u la iathuh ruh ba hadien katei ka jingjurip na ka liang jong u kum u khlieh jong ka District un sa pynlong ia ka jingialang ban iatai sani bha halor katei ka bynta bad ha katei ka jingialang ka ban sa pynlong yn sa khot lang ruh ia baroh ki seng jong ki trai dewiong bad kumjuh ruh ia ka tnat jong ka kit ka bah jong ka sorkar Jylla.U DC u la ong ruh ba ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta na ka liang jong un ialeh katba lah ban kham pynkloi khnang ban bishar bniah kano ka ban kham ibit ban buh na pdeng kitei ki ar tylli ki jaka thew kali dewiong kitei ba don ha katei ka thain.Ha katei ka jingleit jurip jong u DC la iadon lang ruh u Superintendent of Police ka West Khasi Hills u bah S. Nongtnger, ki ophisar jong ka tnad Transport bad kiwei kiwei.
title: Ba don ar ki jaka thew kali,  hiar jurip U DC sha Riangdo

content: Pyniasoh ialade ha ka klob wad shyiengkrung. Ka bai rung Club, kaba tang T.100 ia kawei ka kyrteng, na ka bynta shi bnai. Phone ha u number 80147 42583 hadien ka 7PM lane shu email ha rupangnews@gmail.com.Ki dkhot jong ka Club, kin ioh ban iashim bynta ha ka wad shyiengkrung bad ia ki kyrteng jongki, yn nym ai paidbah satia, lait tang ia kito kiba para ba long dkhot. Ki la don bun ngut, kiba la rung Club bad ngi kyrmen ia kiwei ruh, ba kin wan noh kloi, ioh duh ei, ia la ka jong ka kabu ksiar ban wad shyiengkrung.Kito kiba siew ia katei ka bai rung T.100, kin ioh ban long dkhot shibnai bad la kyrpad, ia kito kiba la kut por, ba kin leit ban siew biang ia ka bai rung, na ka bynta ban pynthymmai ia ki kyrteng jongki.Hato lada  pyn iasoh bad ka club jong phi ngi lah tharai ban ioh shyiengkrungHato ioh shi sha ia kata ka shyiengkrung
title: klob wad shyiengkrung

content: Shillong, 04 Iaiong:Ka Khasi Jaintia Butchers Welfare Association (KJBWA) ka la rai ban pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah ba jar jar ha ka 7 tarik Iaiong ha nongbah Shillong ban pynpaw pyrshah ia ka jingshalan tuh ia ki masi sha Bangladesh.Ha ka jingpynlait khubor mynta ka sngi, u bah Theodore Nongsteng u general secretary ka KJBWA u la ong ba ka jingialang kaba long mynta ka sngi, kaba la wan iashim bynta da ki spah ngut ki dkhot, ka la shim ia ka rai ban pynlong ia ka jingiaid paidbah kaba jar jar ha ka por 1 baje nohphai sngi na Motphran sha Additional Secretariat ban pynpaw pyrshah ia ka jingshalan masi tuh ne beain sha Bangladesh.U la ong ba ka jingshalan tuh ne beain ia ki masi sha Bangladesh ka la ktah jur ia ki nongot doh masi bad kumjuh ia ki nongbam doh masi na ka jingkiew ka dor ka doh masi.Halor kane, ka seng ka la khot lang ia baroh ki paidbah kiba don mynsiem ba kin wan iashim bynta lang ha kane ka jingiaid paidbah ban pynsngew sha ka sorkar, la ong u Bah Nongsteng.La kyntu ruh ia ki dkhot ka seng ba kin iapoi ryntih shuwa ka por 1 baje khnang ban sdang ia ka jingiaid paidbah ha ka por kaba biang.Ha kawei ka liang, ka ai jingiaroh ia u MLA ka Nongkrem u Bah Ardent M Basaiawmoit uba la rah ban iakren ia kane ka jingeh ki nongkhaii masi na ka jingshalan beain sha Bangladesh.
title: 7 tarik yn tur ki nongot  doh masi sha Secretariat

content: Jowai, 5 Iaiong:Wat hadpeng ka jingsniew ka suin bneng, ki 120 ngut khynnah skul na kylleng ki la wan ban ia shim bynta shongshit ha ka tamasa Jamboree kaba nyngkong eh ha Jaintia Hills kaba la pynlong da ka District Arts and Culture Society ha ryngkat ka bor synshar District ha North-east Adventist College, Khliehtyrshi kaba la sdang mynta ka sngi bad kaban kut ha ka 7 tarik une u bnai.Ka mat pdeng kane ka Jamboree ka dei ‘Igniting the Young Minds’ ha kaba u Deputy Commissioner, R Rapthap u la plie donburom ia ka, mynta ka sngi.U bah Rapthap u la ai khublei ia ki ophisar, hapoh ka jingialam u ADM bah DM Wallang halor ka jinglah jong ki ban pynlong ia kane ka program.“Kane kadei ka sien kaba nyngkong eh ban pynlong ia kum kane ka tamasa na ka bynta ban iarap bad ban pynioh ia ka lad ia ki khynnah skul ban wan sha khmat ban ioh ia phylliew jingmut hapdeng ki para khynnah skul kiba na kiwei pat ki skul bad ban pyni ruh ia la ki sap ki phong kiba ki don.U la kyntu ia ki khynnah skul ban shim ia kane ka kabu kaba don ban tip ia kiwei bad ia lade da kaba ia shim bynta shongshit ha kum kane ka program.U la kyntu ruh ia ki ba kin long kiba kohnguh bad tip ha kine ki 3 sngi.Katba na ka liang ka kong B. Blah, kaba dei ka Block Development Officer, Thadlaskein C& RD Block cum programme co-ordinator ka la iathuh ba ha kine ki lai sngi kan don ka jingkren sha ki khynnah skul da ki riew paw khmat kiba kynthup ia u Dr. S. Syiem, Brain Dali Kharphran bad Dr. S. Pohsnem.Kan don ruh ka jingiaid kjat (trekking) sha ki jaka donnam naduh Khimusniang shaduh Krangshuri, kaba dei ka jaka shut wait ki shipai u Syiem Jaintia. Krang ka mut Krem, Shuri kamut Waitlam ha ka ktien War Jaintia. Na ka liang ka kong I. Laloo.IAS, SDO Amlarem Civil Sub Division ka la ong ba ka jingthmu ba kongsan eh jong kane ka Jamboree ka long ban ai lad ia ki khynnah skul ia ka rynsan ban ioh ia ka lad ban ia khynnduh ia kiwei pat ki para khynnah skul bad ban ioh jinghikai mar kylliang.Ia ki ktien ai khublei la ioh na u bah B. J Kharshandi, EAC ka West Jaintia Hills District.
title: Ka jing ia phylliew jingmut  ki khynnah skul ha Jowai

content: Shillong, 5 Iaiong:Hadien ba la kut ka jingbuh por ia ka sorkar ka Synjuk jong ki nonghikai SSA bad 4th teachers hapoh la jylla, ka Meghalaya SSA School Association (MSSASA) Central Body ka la pynbna ia ka ra ia khih da kaba iaid paidbah ha nongbah Shillong ha ka 12 tarik mynta u bnai naduh ka por 10 baje mynstep.
