Katei ka jingiaid paidbah kan sdang naduh Jingkieng -Nongthym mai bad kan iaid lyngba ka Fire Brigade, St.Edmund’s College, Dhankheti, Malki, Barik, IGP bad yn pynkut ha Addl Secretariat, ong u Aristotle C rymbai President ka MSSASA.Ia katei ka rai ka kyrwoh khubor ka la ong ba la shim namar ka jingbym sngap ka sorkar ia ka jingdawa bad ka por ba la buh ka la kut noh ha ka 31 tarik u lber. Katto katne ki mat jingdawa ki long ka tulop thymmai bad Arrears jong ki 12481 ngut ki nonghikai SSA kaba ki dei ban ioh naduh u April 2016 katkum ka jingpynmih hukum da u Commissioner bad Secretary ka tnat pule puthi ka jylla uba long ruh u State Mission Director ka SEMAM , ka tulop ki 4th teachers kiba don 1521 ngut hapoh ka jylla kaba la shu sah teng naduh u snem 2013 bad ban pynbeit ia ki kynrum kynram jong ka resol Diploma in Elementary Education (D.El.Ed) kaba la shu sah teng mynta la shi snem tam.Lah ban kdew ba kham mynshuwa ki la byrngem ban ialam bad khun bad kti bad bahaing hasem ha ka jingiaid paidbah kaba kin sa pynbna.
title: 12 tarik yn tur paidbah ki  nonghikai sha Secretariat

content: Mawkyrwat, 5 Iaiong:Ka jing angnud bad jingap khmih lynti ki nong Mawkyrwat ia ka jaka ot doh bad khamtam eh ha kaba iadei bad ka khuid ka suba jong ki sawdong sawkun ban lait na ki jingbret jakhlia pathar mynta ka la urlong ha kaba Ka ophis jong ka San Kur Ri Kynti Khaiñ Nonglang bad Mawkyrwat Hat mynta ka sngi ka la ioh ban plie ia ka jaka theh niut bad ka jaka ot doh ha Phod Umkhniang (Hilland), South West Khasi Hiils District ha kaba ka Kong R. Lyngdoh ka la long kum ka kongsan.Na ka liang u bah L. Shangdiar, Manager Sankur haba ia kren bad u nongthoh khubor u la ong ba dei lyngba ka jingiaid lynti bad ia kynduh shibun ki jingeh bad ruh da ka jingtrei shitom ha kaba na ka liang ka San Kur ka hap ban mad ba sa lah ban plie ia kane ka jaka theh niut mynta ka sngi, u la ong ruh ba dei ha u snem 2015 na ka liang ka 5 Kur ka la pyntrei hi ia ka surok bad ruh da ka jingiarap jong ka skhim lyngba ka Border Area kaba la bah khlieh da ka DC Mawkyrwat la lah ban plie ia ka.Na ka liang ka kong Ripnar Lyngdoh DC Mawkyrwat haba ai jingkren ka la pynpaw iaka jing sngew kmen kaba khraw ha kaba ka la ioh ban don lang ha katei ka sngi ban plie ia kane ka jaka theh nuit bad jaka ot doh ha Phod Umkhniang bad ka la ong ruh ban poi shaduh kane ka sngi ka long ka long ka jingiad lynti kaba jrong bad ka long ruh ka sngi ka ba khraw bad ka ba sah jingkynmaw ha ka history jong ka South West khasi Hills.Shuh shuh ka la ong ruh ba kumba ka pyrthei ka kylla, kum ki briew ruh ka donkam ban pyrshang ban wan rah ia ka jingkylla la ka long ha ka roi ka par bad ha baroh ki liang bad lyngba ka jingiatreilang ki paidbah bad ka San Kur yn dang lah ban pynbha shuh shuh ia kane ka jaka theh ñiut, khatduh na ka liang jongka ka ai ka jingkit bok kit rwiang bad jingkyrkhu kyrdoh ia ka 5 Kur ba kan nang iaid shakhmat bad iaid shaphrang ha ki kam jong ka.Ha kane ka sngi la pyniaid iaka jingialang da u Bah L.Shangdiar bad la ioh jingkren ruh na u bah Y.G.Lyngdoh, Member E.C San Kur, H.G.Lyngdoh, Superintendent of Police South West Khasi Hills, H.S Diengdoh, ADC South West Khasi Hills bad kiwei kiwei ki riew rangbah.
title: Ioh ka Mawkyrwat ka jaka  theh niut bad jaka ot doh

content: Shillong, 5 Iaiong:Ka Smart Charitable Trust ka la ithuh ia ka jingtrei shitom ki pulit pyniaid kali ha nongbah Shillong bad ka la ai khusnam ruh sha ki 2 ngut ki pulit kum ka dak ka jingithuh ia ka kam ba ki trei.Ki pulit pyniaid kali ba la ioh khusnam ki long ka Women Police Head Constable ka Sabitri Rabha na Laitumkhrah Traffic Branch bad Head Constable Chandradhar Basumatry na Madanriting Traffic Branch , katei ka khusnam la tip kum ka “Best Shillong Traffic Policeman Award” na bynta u snem 2016-2017, la ai ia ki da ka syrnod bad ki jingai sngewbha ban buh jingkynmaw.Ia katei ka Trust la sdang ban wanrah da u Shri. Prashan Naik, Retd. IAS. Ex Addl. Chief Secretary, ka sorkar jylla bad kiwei pat da ka jingthmu ban ithuh ia ka jingtrei shitom jong ki pulit ha ka imlang sahlang da kaba ai khusnam ia ki khnang ban nang pynshlur ba kin long smat ha ka kam.Kiwei pat ba la donlang ha katei ka jingsam khusnam ki long u Shri Davis N R. Marak, IPS. Superintendent of Police, East Khasi Hills, Shillong. Shri Vivek Syiem, MPS. Superintendent of Police (City), Shillong, N K. Syiem, MPS. Superintendent of Police (Traffic), Shillong bad Dr. Sacheng R Marak, MPS. Addl. Superintendent of Police (Traffic), Shillong bad kiwei pat ki ophisar.
title: Khusnam Pulit pyniaid kali

content: Shillong,5 Iaiong:Uwei u rangbah u la ujor sha ki pulit ba ha ka 19 tarik u lber ha ka por 6 baje mynstep ka khun kynthei jong u kaba dang 16 snem karta bad kaba don jingduna ha ka bor pyrkhat ka la mih na ing ban leit thied jingthied hynrei kam shym la wan phai ing shuh baroh shimiet. Ha ka sngi kaba bud u la ong ba ki bahaing hasem ki la lap biang ia ka bad la ioh jingtip ba la batbor ia ka da 7 ngut ki briew kiba la tip kyrteng kum u Jok Chyrmang, Kit Shadap, Marjan Chyrmang, Khian Chyrmang, Sai Lamurong, Poisalan Lamurong bad u Boting Chyrmang, baroh kitei ki dei na ka shnong Mynthning kaba don ha East Jaintia Hills.
title: Shah bat bor ka samla ha ki 7 ngut

content: Shillong, 5 Iaiong:Ka KSU CEC kan leit ban ia kynduh ia u myntri ka tnad pynroi sor u bah R.V Lyngdoh ban ia kren halor ka jingpyrshah jong ka ia ka jingai jaka ka tnad Urban Affairs ia ka sorkar Nagaland hakhmat ka NEIGRHIMS. Ka KSU kan leit ban ia kynduh ha ka por 3:30 baje nohphai sngi.
title: Mynta iakynduh myntri ka KSU

content: Nongstoiñ, 6 Iaiong:Hadien ka jingiai ud jong ki paidbah nongkhaii dewiong ka thain Shal-lang halor ka jingdon bun palat ki khyrdop khrong Pisa beain ha shi lynter ka surok bah na Shallang shaduh Nongchram, ki katto katne ngut ki nong-thoh khubor jong ka thain ha ka sngi Balang jong ka taiew kila hiar sha ka thain Shallang ter ter shaduh Nongchram kaba dei ka kut duh jong ka West Khasi Hills District, ban pynshisha ia ka jingdon jong ki khyrdop lum pisa beain na ki trok kit dewiong kiba iaid lyngba katei ka surok.Na ka liang jong ki nongthoh khubor kila iohlad ruh ban leit jurip ia kawei pa kawei ka khyrdop lum Pisa ha katei ka thain bad la lap ruh ba na pdeng jong kitei ki khyrdop khrong pisa don ruh ki bym don ia ka order bad ia ka singnboard hynrei kila shu shim pisa beit katba wan ki kali kit dewiong katba kiba don ia ka order bad signboard pat kila shim palat ia ka dor ba dei hok ban shim katkum ka order.Naduh ka shnong Shallang haduh Nongchram kaba jngai tang kumba 12 KM ei ei ki don shi bun tylli ki khyrdopkiba kynthup ia ka Entry Gate kaba la khrong haduh 200 tyngka hynrei katkum ka order kalong 20 tyngka, Parking lot 200 tyngka, Mono poly katkum ka order kalong 200 tyngka hynrei la khorng 300 tyngka ka wei ka trok, ka Non- Tribal Gate kaba la khrong haduh 500 tyngka, ka khyrdop lum khajna kaba la kam ba ka dei ka State Transport Authority Good Carriage Transport Agency Shillong kaba khlem sign board bad kaba khlem ka hukum da kaba la kam ba la iehnoh sha iing 300 tyngka ka wei ka trok.Haba ki nongthoh khubor, ki la pyrshang ban kylli halor ka jingshim tam ia kador don kiba la jubab ba ki ioh ka hukum na ki Malik don ruh kiba la ong ba hap ban shimtam na ka bynta ka bai bam jong ki nongtrei khyrdop bad don ruh kiba la len bad ai daw ba kim tip namar ba ki dang Shu wan ban ap bad ha kaba iadei Pat bad ki khyrdop bym don order haba pyrshang ban phah pyni ia ka order kila aidaw ba kila buh ha iing don ruh kiba la ong ka don bad u Malik.Ym tang kata ki nongthoh khubor, ki la iohlad ruh ban iakren bad ki nongniah trok ha kaba kiba bun ki nongniah trok kila phla ba ki la siew katkum ka dor ba kitei ki nongap khyrdop kila pan bad haba phah ban pyni ia ki slip ym shymla don kawei ruh ka slip ka ban thoh dor bad haba kylli ba balei ki draibar ki shim ia ka slip khlem kador ki la jubab da kaba ong ban ia kaba shah than bad shah shoh kaba ban shim la ka shim ia ki slip lada thoh ne khlem thoh dor rub.Hadien katei na ka liang jong ki nongthoh khubor kila iohlad ruh ban iakren bad ki nongkhaii dewiong ka thain Shallang halor katei ka bynta bad na ka liang jong ka Synjuk Shallang Area Joint Action Committee kaba dei kawei na ki synjuk ki nongkhaii dewiong ka thain Shallang kila pynpaw ia ka jingsngew diaw halor ka jingdon bun ki khyrdop khrong pisa beain kiba la mih ruh ban khrong pisa tang ha kapor mynmiet ia kaba ym shymla lah ban tip la kidei kiei.Shuh shuh na ka liang jong katei ka Synjuk ki nongkhaii dewiong ka thain Shallang ha kaba iadei pat bad ka jingshim tam ia ka pisa katkum ka order na ka liang jong ka Synjuk kala pynpaw ba ka wad ia ki lad ki lynti ban pynduh noh ia kitei ki khyrdop beain bad kan sa leit ruh ban ai kynduh ia ki bor ba halor bad ki bor ba dei peit ba kin shimkhia.
title: Shim kabu ki nongap khyrdop lum  pisa, khrong palat ia ka dor ba la buh

content: Shillong, 6 ïaiong:Ki nongialam ka KSU Central Body mynta ka sngi ki la leit ban ia kynduh ia u myntri ka tnad pynroi sor ka sorkar jylla u bah Ronnie V Lyngdoh ha kamra treikam jong u. Katei ka jingleit ia kynduh myntri ka KSU ka long ban pyrshah ia ka jingdie ka sorkar jylla ia ka jaka kaba don hakhmat NEIGRHIMS sha ka sorkar ka jylla Nagaland.Haba kren sha ki nongthohkhubor hadien ba la mih na kamra treikam u myntri sorkar u President ka KSU u samla Lambokstar Marngar u la ong ba KSU ka leit ban pynpaw ka jingpyrshah bad ka jingdawa na ka sorkar ba ka dei ban shim biang noh ia katei ka jaka kaba ka la dep die sha ka jylla Nagaland bad ka la ai jingmut ba ha ka jaka ban die sha kiwei ki jylla ka sorkar ka dei ban thaw da ki ïng basa ha katei ka jaka kaba don hakhmat ka jaka sumar khnang ba kan pynmyntoi ia ki paidbah kiba wan na ki nongkyndong kiba wan shim dawai ne thiah pang ba kin sahmiet haba kim ioh kali shuh ban leit phai sha la shnong.U General Secretary ka KSU u samla Donald V Thabah u la ong ba haba ka sorkar ka la thied ia katei ka jaka ka New Shillong ka dei ban peit ba kan pynmyntoi ia ki trai jylla ym ban myntoi ia kiba nabar. U la ong ruh ba ka shong ha ka jingstad ka sorkar kumno ban pynbeit ia katei ka kam la kan ai sha jaka shawei ne katba ka sngewbit hynrei na ka liang ka KSU ka pyrshah beit ba kan ai ia katei ka jaka kaba don hakhmat NEIGRHIMS.Haba pynrem jur ia katei ka jingdie jaka ka sorkar sha ka jylla Nagaland ki nongialam ka KSU ki la ong ba u myntri ka tnad pynroi sor u la ong ba un sa peit bniah namar ba ka jingai jaka kam dei ha ka por ba u long myntri ma u.Katkum ka jingiathuh ki nongialam ka KSU ki la ong ba la ai ha ka por ka jinglong myntri pynroi sor ka kong Ampareen Lyngdoh.
title: “Shim noh ia ka jaka ka Nagaland, thaw ïng basa ia ki nongkyndong”

content: Jowai, 6 Iaiong:Ka Surok Jowai Bypass kaba jrong kumba 8 km naduh Pung Thadlaskein haduh Soomer, ka la jot la pra noh tang hapoh shibnai eiei naduh ba la dep ban plie lane shah iaid kali.Khublei ia u Slap ba la ther ha kine ki khyndiat sngi ba sa paw katei ka jingtrei torti ia katei ka surok da ka Ms. Dhar Construction Company lyngba ka PWD Central Division, Jowai ha ka jinglut kaba haduh 46.6 klur tyngka.U Executive Engineer ka PWD, u ma Sainia Kyndiah u la iathuh ba ia katei ka surok la trei lyngba ka skim sorkar kmie kaba la tip kum ka Special Accelerated Road Development Programme for North Eastern Region (SARDP-NE), Ministry of Road Transport and Highway.“U slap u la iarap shisha ia ngi ban iohi ia katei ka rukom trei torti”, u la ong bad ha kajuh ka por u la ong ruh ba katei ka Company kan hap ban kitkhlieh ban maramot ia katei ka surok na ka jinglut na lade”.“Kane ka dei katkum ka National Highway Standard ha kaba kano kano ka Company kaba pyntrei ia kano kano ka surok ka hap ban peit haduh 3 lane 4 snem ban maramot hi na pla la jong lada ka surok ka sniew noh.Ia katei ka surok la dep ban trei ha u Nohprah 2016 bad la plie ia ka ha ka 22 tarik u Rymphang 2017.
title: Tang hapoh shibnai, sniew  ka surok Jowai Bypass ba 46 klur

content: Shillong, 6 Iaiong:Ka iakob kinglieng, kaba dei ban long lashai ka sngi, ha Wah Umngot, la pynsangeh noh bad ka daw, ka long namar ka jingshlei um jong katei ka Wah, kaba don ha Dawki. Na ka bynta ka tarik, kaba thymmai, yn sa pyntip kham hadien, ong ka kyrwoh na U bah Carmell Manner Secretery jong ka Raid Mukertilla Boat Rowing Competition.
title: Pynsangeh kinglieng ha Umngot

content: Shillong, 6 ïaiong:U MDC ka UDP na Nongkrem u bah H.S Shylla u la ong ba ka aiñ jong ka MUDA kaba ka tnad pynroi sor (Urban Affairs) ka la pynbna ha ka 13 tarik u kyllalyngkot 1989 ka la iap noh, namar ba kam shym la don kano kano ka rai ne ka Resolution ba ka KHADC ka la pdiang ia ka jingpyn-trteikam ia ka Meghalaya Town and Country Planning Act,1973. U bah Shylla u la ong ba u la ioh da ka jingthoh napoh ka tnad pyniaid ïng dorbar ka KHADC ba kam shym la don kano kano kaba kum kata ka rai hapoh KHADC ba la pdiang ia katei ka aiñ bad ia kane u la ong ba u la pna jingshai na ka sorkar ba kan sei madan ia katei ka rai lada ka don ka rikod ha ka hynrei ka sorkar kam lah ban sei bad dang shen ha ka ïng dorbar Thaw-aiñ ka jylla u la ong ba u MLA ka Mawlai u bah Embhah Syiemlieh u la rah da ka Call Attention Motion ban dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban sei ia kita ki dulir ban pynshisha ba ka KHADC ka la pdiang ia katei ka aiñ.Tang mar ia ioh ia ka jingthoh na KHADC kaba la ong ba ym don rikod bad ym don kum kata ka rai u bah Shylla u la leit ban ia kynduh ia u myntri ka tnad pynroi sor u bah R.V Lyngdoh ban dawa ba ka sorkar ka dei ban sngeh noh ia katei ka jingpyntreikam ia ka Notification 1989. U la kynnoh ruh ba katei ka jingpynbna kaba la soi da u P.K Datta Special Secretary sha ka sorkar Urban Development Dept, ka dei kaba be-aiñ. Haba kylli kaei ka jubab ba u ioh na u myntri ka tnad pynroi sor-u bah Shylla u la ong ba kam da shai hynrei u la ong ba un ap katto katne por aiu ka sorkar kan leh naba katei ka aiñ ka la iap hi noh naba kam don ka jingmynjur na ka KHADC. U bah Shylla u la byrngem ruh ba lada ym ioh ka jubab kaba shai un leit sha ing kashari.
title: “Ka Aiñ jong ka MUDA ka la ïap,  ym don Resolution ha KHADC”

content: Shillong, 6 ïaiong:U MLA ka 19th Shillong South konstitwensi u bah Sanbor Shullai uba dei ruh u President jong ka seng NCP ha kane ka jylla u la ong ba ki la don bun ngut ki MLA bad MDC ba mynta kiba la wan ban ia kynduh ia u ban pan tiket na bynta u 2018, “Ki don katto katne ngut ki MLA, ki MDC ba mynta kiba kyrpad ba ngan buhrieh ia ka kyrteng jong ki kiba la wan pan tiket na bynta u 2018 kiba phin ym poi pyrkhat satia bad phin sa shu lyngngoh da la dei ka por hynrei kiba bun hi ki dei kito kiba la rem salit ha ki elekshon ba la dep (2013/2014)” ong u bah Sanbor Shullai bad u la iathuh ruh ba kiba bun hi na ki kyrtong ki dei na ri Lum Garo.U la iathuh ba haduh mynta um pat pynkut ia ka jingiakren bad ki, hynrei u la ong ba ha u bnai ba la dep u la leit sha Delhi ban ia kren bad u President rangbah ka NCP u Sharad Pawar halor ki kam elekshon bad ha katei ka jingiakren u la ong ba u Pawar u la ai jingmut ba dei ban pynieng kyrtong tang ha kito ki konstitwensi kiba don jingkyrmen ban jop, “Kam myntoi ba ngin shu pynieng ha baroh 60 tylli ki konstitwensi lada ngim don lyer, hynrei lada ki kyrtong ba ngi ioh ki dei kiba don jingkyrmen ha baroh 60 tylli kam don jingeh eiei ruh em” u la ong biang hynrei la sngewthuh pat ba katei ka seng kan ym pynieng satia haduh 60 ngut”.La kylli hato ka NCP ka don jingmut ne-em ban ia thaw paralok bad kino kino ki party shuwa ka elekshon ban ioh thaw sorkar lang, u bah Sanbor u la ong ba ha ka taiew ban wan kan don ka jingialang heh jong ka NCP ha Delhi ha katei ka jingialang yn ia kren ia ki kam elekshon bad ki kam pynkhlain Party bad un pynsngew sha ki nongialam ha Delhi ia katei ka mat., “Badno ngin ia treilang kan shong ha ka rai jong ki nongialam rangbah ka Party na Delhi, ngi nangne ngi hap ban kohnguh ia ka hukum jong ki, kumba ka long mynta ruh ngi donlang bad ka Congress kumba ka Party ka la rai naduh ba sdang elekshon bad haduh mynta kam pat don kano kano ka jingkylla ha ka rai ka Party” u la ong.Katba kiwei pat ki riew saiñpyrthei ki dang wan pan tiket na ka NCP ha u 2018 u bah Sanbor u la iathuh ba don ruh kiwei pat ki Party heh kiba wan khroh ia u ba un ia khun na ka seng jong ki bad kitei kiba la wan khroh ka dei ka seng BJP bad ka seng Congress.“Ka BJP bad Congress ki la wan, don ruh sa kiwei pat na ka seng UDP, HSPDP kiba dei ki paralok ba iajan jong nga hi kiba la wan ban tyrwa ba ngan ia khun na ka Party jong ki, nga la ong ia ki kumno ka lah ban long haba nga ialade nga dei u metbah jong ka NCP ,nga don la ka jong ka klob” ong u bah Sanbor.
title: Bun ki MLA/MDC kiba pan tiket, don ruh ki Party kiba wan: Sanbor

content: Shillong, 6 Iaiong:Ka HANM ka la ujor sha u Controller ka tnad Legal Metrology namar ka jingbym biang thew ki lyer shet ba sam sha ki paidbah. Ha ka jingujor ba la soi da u President katei ka seng u bah Lamphrang Kharbani ka HANM ka la ong ba ka la ioh jingujor na kiba bun ki paidbah ba ki ioh lyer shet da kaba duna jingthew bad hadien ba la ioh jingujor katei ka seng ka la wad bniah la ki nongsam lyer shet ne ki Ejen ki don ne-em ka tiar ban thew ia kitei ki lyer shet hynrei ka la ong ba ka lap ba ym don tang kawei ka Agency ruh kaba don ia ki tiar thew bad y mdon kawei ka kali ruh kaba kit tiar thew.Katkum ki kyndon jong ka aiñ ka HANM ka la ong ba ki kompani ne ki nongsam lyer shet ki dei ban pynthikna ba ka jingthew kan biang thik pa thik bad ki dei ruh ban thew ia ki lyer shet shuwa ba aiti sha ki paidbah. Ka HANM ka la kyrpad ia katei ka tnad ba ka dei ban leh eiei noh khnang ba katei ka jingjia kan ym bteng hadien habud.
title: Ym biang jingthew ki lyer shet

content: Shillong 06 Iaiong:Ar ngut ki bar jylla ba ai jait Khasi ki la shah rai pynrem ha ka Registration Authority ka KHADC, hadien ba u General Secretary ka Hynniewtrep Youth Council (HYC) u Bah Robert June Kharjahrin.Kine ki bar jylla kiba ai jait Khasi, ki long u Varun S Lyngdoh bad ka Sheena S Lyngdoh kiba dei ki khun jong u Shyam Singhania.Haba kren sha ki nongthoh khubor mynta ka sngi, u Bah Kharjahrin u la ong ba kine ki briew kishu shim ia ka kyrteng ka jait Khasi tang ban ioh thied jaka, ban khaii pateng, ki kam sorkar bad kane ka dei kaba pynjemdaw ia ka jaibynriew.“Ban ai jingsneng ia kine ki briew, kiba shim kabu ia ki, ka seng ka la wad jingtip da ka RTI bad la lap ia ar ngut, kynthup u Varun S Lyngdoh bad ka Sheena S Lyngdoh kiba dei u khun jong u Shyam Singhania bad ka Pearl S Lyngdoh na Rock Cliff, Cleve Colony, Dhankheti”, la ong u Bah Kharjahrin.U la ong ba u Pa ieid jongki u dei u RB Lyngdoh bad ka kmie ieid ka Pamela kaba shu ai jait Lyngdoh tang namar ba kam tip tynrai ia la ka jait. Ka Pearl S Lyngdoh ka khun jongi, ka shongkha ia u Shyam Singhania, bad ki ai da ka Jait Lyngdoh.Namar kane ka jingai jait Khasi, ki la ioh Scheduled Tribe (ST) jongki hynrei kim ioh ia ka Khasi Tribe na KHADC. “Ban ioh ia ka ST, ki dei ban nang ban kren Khasi, bad kiwei ki jinglong Khasi. Nga la ujor sha u Registratrar ka KHADC namar ba kim lah ban kam Khasi namar ba tang ban kren ban thoh Khasi ruh kim tip”, u la ong.U la ong ba ki shu shim jait na uta u Pa ieid Khasi (RB Lyngdoh) bad u Khasi ba songkha ia ka dkhar, u hap ban Tang Jait ia ki khun, bad ym lah ban shu kylla ne bud sha u shynrang.“Hadien ba la iakhun shi snem lynter, ka KHADC ha ka 3 tarik, Iaiong 2017, ka la ai rai ba u Varun S Lyngdoh bad ka Sheena S Lyngdoh kim dei shuh ki Khasi”, la ong u bah Kharjahrin bad bynrap ia kum kine ki briew kiba tuh jait na ka jaitbynriew, ym dei ban ailad, ki shu thied jait na Khyndai Lad, bad ngin buddien namar ba ka DC ophis ka la ai ST ia ki bad ngin leit dawa ban weng noh ia ki, bad ruh na Income Tax ba ki la iaid lait ban siew khajna, ki la thied jaka ruh bun da kaba kam Khasi”.“Ngi phah khubor kaba shai sha ka jaitbynriew, lada don kiba shim kabu, tang ban ioh jingmyntoi, sa pyntip sha ka seng, ba kan leh ia kaba donkam”, la bynrap u general secretary ka HYC.
title: Duh jinglong Khasi ar ngut  ki khun u Shyam Singhania

content: Shillong,6 ïaiong:Lashai ka sngi ka sngi thohdieng 7 tarik u ïaiong ka seng ki nongdie doh masi ha ka jylla ka Khasi Jaintia Butcher and Welfare Association (KJBWA) kan pynlong ia ka jingiaiaid paidbah naduh Motphran shaduh Addl.Secretariat, katei ka jingiaid kan sdang naduh ka por 1 baje mynsngi bad yn pynkut haduh ka por 3:30 baje nohphai sngi.Haba ia kren bad u Rupang u General Secretary katei ka seng u bah Generous Warlarpih u la ong ba kin don da ki spah ngut ki nongdie doh masi ryngkat kiwei pat kiba ai jingkyrshan ki ban ia shim bynta ryngkat ka rah lama iong bad ka jingrah pla kad kiba la dep pynkhreh lypa kum ka dak ka jingpynpaw ia ka jingsngewsih bad ka jingpyrshah ia ka jingbym lah ka sorkar ban tehlakam ia ka jingkhaii masi tuh sha Bangladesh.U la ong ba ha katei ka sngi kin wan ban ia shim bynta da ki nongdie doh masi na kylleng ka ri Khasi-Jaintia hynrei kam shym la don pat kano kano ka jingkhang dukan die doh naba ka dei tang nadh 1 baje haduh 3:30 hynrei la shu pyntip ba kawei pa kawei ka dukan die doh ka dei ban phah briew.Ka daw jong katei ka sienjam ba ki nongdie doh ki shim u la ong ba ka dei namar ka jingkren sting ka sorkar lyngba ka jingkren u myntri rangbah u Dr.Mukul Sangma uba la ong ba kam dei ka kamram ka sorkar ban peit ia ka jingiaid tuh ki masi sha Bangladesh hynrei ka dei ka kam jong ki Custom bad ki BSF.U la ong ba katei ka pynpaw ba ka sorkar kam khein snep ia ka jingeh ki paidbah nongbam doh. Shuh shuh u la ong ba lada ka sorkar ka kwah ban khang ia katei ka jingkhaii tuh ka lah da kaba phah pulit ban pahara ba ki masi kiba khlem soh shkor ym dei ban sha iaid hynrei kam shym la leh kumta.
title: Na Motphran sha Addl.Secretariat  da ki lama iong bad pla kad

content: Shillong, 6 ïaiong:Bun ki jingiakren ki la mih ha kine ki sngi ba ka elekshon MLA ka lah ban long ha u naiwieng ne nohprah mynta u snem. U Rupang u la wad jingtip ia kane, hynrei ym shym la ioh ka jingtip kaba long thikna, hynrei ki tnad syntiat ki la iathuh ba ka Election Commission ka la shong jingialang mynhynin ka sngi ban pyrkhat ban pynlong kloi noh ia ka elekshon ha kane ka jylla bad kiwei pat ki jylla kum ka Tripura bad kiwei. Katkum ki lad khubor la iathuh ba ka Election Commission kam pat lah ban shim rai mynhynnin ka sngi bad la ong ba mynta ka sngi ruh ka la shong jingialang biang bad la iathuh ba ka rai ka lah ban mih noh shen ha kane ka taiew ban wan.Kiwei pat ki lad khubor ki la iathuh ba ka sorkar pdeng ruh kaba lamkhmat da ka seng BJP ka kwah bha ban pynlong kham kloi noh ia ka elekshon ha kane ka jylla naba ka lyer ka BJP mynta ka dang suhsieng bha khamtam hadien ba ka la ioh jingjop dang shen ha Uttar Pradesh, Manipur, Goa bad ymda kham slem than ha Assam.Ha kawei pat ka khubor, u Rupang u la twad jingmut na ki katto katne ngut ki MDC kumno ki sngew lada jia ba ka elekshon kan long noh ha u naiwieng ne nohprah kumba la her ki khubor hamsaia-kiba bun ki MDC ki pynpaw ba ki kmen palat lada jia ba yn pynlong kloi noh ia ka elekshon naba mynta ki dang ia shongshit bha ban sam skhim paidbah na ka T.3 klur tyngka kaba ki ia sam para ma ki ba ki ia ioh lyngba ka Special Assistance na ka sorkar pdeng kaba haduh T.133 klur tyngka.
title: Ha u Naiwieng ne Nohprah, yn  pynlong ia ka elekshon MLA?

content: Amlarem, 9 Iaiong:Ka Shnong Nong bareh Lyntiar kaba hap hapoh Amlarem Sub-Division ka la pynlong biang mynta ia ka Shad Rong kusi jong ka mynta ka snem ia kaba la wan shim bynta lang ia kane ka jingshad da u MP ka Tura u Conrad K Sangma kum u Kongsan ha ryngkat ka jingdonlang u MLA ka tei ka Thain u Ma Stephenson Mukhim kum u synbud kongsan, u MDC ka War Central u Ma Holando Lamin, ka SDO Amlarem I Kong Isawanda Laloo, I EAC Amlarem I Kong JU Kharpuri, I Ma H.Mohrmen bad shibun ki paidbah kiba la wan sakhi lang.Ha kane ka sngi wan plie u Conrad ia ka ia kane ka jingshad Rongkusi u la plie artad ruh ia u mawnongrim jong ka skul na kane ka Shnong ka Nongbareh Lyntiar Secondary school ha kaba kane ka skul kaba don jingthmu na ka bynta Ban tei thymmai ia kane iing skul.Ha shwa ba u kongsan un ai jing kren  u Headmaster jong kane ka skul u Prolin Langshiang u la ai ia ka dorkas ha kaba iadei bad ki jing donkam jong kane ka skul ha u Conrad K Sangma.Ha ka jing kren jong u Conrad kum u kongsan u la pynpaw  da ka jingkmen ia ka jinglang biang jong u bad ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka Shnong hadien ba u la ju wan teng ia kane ka Shnong naduh u snem 2008, u la  ai ka jing kyntu  ia ki nongshong shnong jong kane ka Shnong ba kin nang pynkiew shuh shuh  ha kaba iadei bad ka jingnang jingstad lyngba ka pule ka dangle, da kaba u la ong ba na ka liang jong u kum u MP un pyrshang ban ai ka jingiarap ia kane ka skul kumba 10 lak tyngka ha kane ka snem Ban wan .Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang jong u MLA jong kane ka Thain u Stephenson Mukhim u la ai ia ka jingiarap ha kaba iadei bad ki riam Shad Rongkusi jong kane ka Shnong kaba la kot sha ka 75,000 tyngka .
title: Wan iashim bynta U Conrad ha ka  Shad Rongkusi ka Shnong Nongbareh

content: Shillong, 9 Iaiong:U General Secretary ka HYC u bah Robertjune Kharjahrin u la ong ba ha ka jingwad RTI jong u na ophis u Deputy Commissioner ka East Khasi Hills u la lap ba ki don bun ki bar jylla ne kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew kiba ai jait Khasi ialade tang da kaba shu pynkylla lyngba ka Affidavit. U la ong ba ka jingwad RTI jong u ka dei beit thik tang ia ka East Khasi Hills bad ha katei ka jubab ba u la ioh u la ong ba ki kyrteng jong ki briew kiba dei na kawei pat ka jaitbynriew kiba ai jait Khasi ki bunbha.Dang shen ar ngut ki bar jylla kiba la ai jait Khasi ki la shah pynduh pyndam ia ka jingling khasi jong ki hadien ba ki rem ia ka jingialeh mukot duma, ong u bah Robert uba la iathuh ba namar ka jingbun palat ki kyrteng na ka liang jong ka HYC ka shu jied iano ban ai mukotduma bad haba jied ia kita ki kyrteng ruh u la ong ba la jied ia kiba la ioh jingtip thikna ia ka ing ka sem jong ki kaba ym lah satia ban pdiang ia ki kum kita ki Khasi. “Ki briew ki bym nang tang ban kren ne thoh khasi ruh, ka rukom im jong ki ruh kam dei shuh kum ki Khasi-kumno ngin lah ban pdiang ba ki dei ki Khasi” ong u bah Robert haba ia kren bad une u nongthohkhubor.Lah ban kdew ba u Varun Lyngdoh bad ka Sheena Lyngdoh ki khun jong u Shyam Singhania ki la shah pynduh ia ka jinglong Khasi jong ki. U la ong ba kitei ki ai jait Lyngdoh na ka daw ba u kpa ieid jong ki u R.B Lyngdoh u dei u khasi katba ka kmie ieid jong ki pat ka Pamla ka shu shim jait khasi naba kam tip ia ka jait ka khong jong ka. U bah Robert u la ong ba katkum ka riti ka dustur ki briew kiba shongkha khleh lada ki kwah ban ai jait khasi ia la ki khun ki kti ki hap ban Tang jait thymmai. “Kiba shongkha khleh kim lah ban shu ai jait khasi kumto ki hap ban Tang jait thymmai katkum ka Riti ka dustur” u la ong.Utei u nongialam ka HYC u la ong ba katei ka seng kam pat shongthait hynrei ka dang tih tynrai ia kiwei pat ki briew kiba ka la ioh jingtip bad kan dang wad jingtip shuh shuh sa ha kiwei pat ki District U la ong biang ba bun kiwei pat ki briew na kiwei pat ki jaitbynriew ki shim kabu ban ai jait Khasi ban ioh Schedule Tribe tang ban pynkha pynroi bad pynheh pynsan ia ka kam khaii pateng jong ki.
title: Kiba shongkha khleh ki hap ban tang Jait thymmai katkum ka dustur

content: Jowai, 9 Iaiong:Ka Shad Sukra jong ka Sein Raij Tuber bad Sein Raij Jowai ka la kutnoh ha kane ka sngi Saitjain bad Sngi U Blei.Ka Sein Raij Tuber ka la pynlong ia kane ka shad lehkmen ha Biar, Tuberkmai Shnong katba ka Sein Raij Jowai pat ka la pynkut ia kane ka tamasa ha ‘Thaw Shad Sukra, Iawmusiang, Jowai.Ha Tuber, ki Sein Raij Shnong bapher bapher jong ka Sein Raij Tuber ki la wan ban pyni ia ki jingshad tynrai bapher bapher bad la sakhi ruh da ki hajar ngut ki paidbah.U ma Justine Dkhar, Local MLA bad u Local MDC, u Laski Rymbai u la ong u kongsan bad Symbud kongsan ha ka jingiadonlang ka kong Violet Lyngdoh, MDC ka Rymbai ha ryngkat ki nongialam ka Sein Raij Tuber.Katba ha Jowai pat, ka Tamasa lehkmen Shad Sukra ka la sdang naduh ka sngi Saitjain bad la pynkut ia ka ha ka sngi U Blei.Ka Sein Raij Jowai, mynta u snem ka la rakhe ia kane ka tamasa halor ka mat pdeng, ‘Ha ki tyrpeiñ ki tympha ka Bei Rymaw, ya ki kha kti u warim u ksoh u wyrchaw’.Da ki hajar ngut ki paid nongshong ka nongbah Jowai bad na kiwei kiwei de ki shnong ki la wan ban sakhi ia kane ka shad sukra ba shisien shisnem. Ki khun ka Sein Raij Jowai ki la iamih paidbah ban lehkmen ha ryngkat ki riam tynrai ba iphuh iphieng ha bar ki sur tynrai ba sngewtynnad.Ka prokram kaba khadduh jong kane ka tamasa ha Jowai la pynlong ha ka por miet ha Mukoi Pyrdi, Loom Pyrdi, Iongpiah Jowai ha kaba ka la don ka shad Kper Syntu bad ka Shad Pynjaw.
title: Kutnoh ka Shad Sukra ka Jowai & Tuber

content: Shillong, 09 Iaiong:Ka Shad Suk Mynsiem ba lai sngi lynter ka Seng Khasi Kmie,  Mawkhar Shillong, kan kut lashai la 10 tarik Iaiong kaba la dang naduh mynta ka sngi Saitjain ka 8 tarik u Ïaiong 2017 ha lympung Shad Weiking,Jaiaw.Kumba ka juh long ka sngi ba nyngkong kaba dei ka Sngi Nohkjat yn sdang shwa da ka jingtem ïa ka Ksing Lumpaid  ban tem ïaka haka por 12:30 mynsngi ha phyllaw jong ka Ïing Seng ha Mawkhar.Ha ka por 2 baje  mynsngi yn sdang ïa prokram  da ka jingdwai kaban ai da u Rgh J.S. R Syiemlieh, kaba hadien kane kan don pat ka jingïaid kjat da ki nongshad shynrang ryngkat ki duhalia bad ki paidbah sha Lympung Weiking, JaïawHaba la poi ha lympung kan don  ka nguh ka dem kaban pyndep da u Rgh Skor Jala, ban bud da ka jingkyntiew ïa ka lama jong ka Seng da u Wh N.R Shullai ba dei napoh ka Seiñ Raij Shillong.Hadien ba la dep ban kyntiew ïa ka lama, yn sa sdang pat ka jingshad bad ha ka por 5:30 nohphai sngi yn khreh ban wanphai biang pat sha Ïing Seng, ha Mawkhar ia kaba yn sa pynkut da ka Shad Mastieh ha phyllaw jong ka Ïing Seng.
title: Mynta  yn kut ka Shad Suk Mynsiem

content: Shillong, 09 Iaiong: Saw ngut ki briew  ki la shitom jur bad lait  na ka iap hadien ba ki la bam ia u tit khlaw  ba lieh (uba syr iem kum u tit  thamblai ba ju khot ha ka ktien Jirang) ha ka Jareibasai, Jirang Syiemship,  Ri Bhoi District.Katkum ka  tyllong khubor ba la ioh lum la iathuh ba kitei ki briew ki dei na ka juh ka  iing kiba dei shikmie shi pyrsa, ba la ithuh kyrteng  u Bah Rasin Lapang bad ka Kong Trilowin Doloi (kiba dei shi lok) bad ka khun jong ki ka kong Wall Doloi bad u lok u Hepron Wahlang.Kane ka  jingjia la jia ha ka sngi ba-ar mynta ka taiew  hadien ba kitei baroh saw ngut ki la dep bam ja miet haka sngi ba-ar, 4 tarik mynta u bnai. Hadien katto katne  kynta ba ki la dep bam ja ban thiah noh ki la ioh prie bad pynhiar khlem tip briew shuh, hynrei donbok ba la wan lap noh ki para marjan  ki la iarap  lem bad  pynkit noh  mar mar sha hospital ha Nursing Home VIP,  kaba don hajan Airport , Asssam.La iathuh da ka jingkloi ban iarap ki para  nongshong shnong ban pynkit mar mar sha hospital ki la lait na ka iap, namar ka jingpang ka la ktah jur wat tang ha ki kyndiat kynta namar ka prie pynhiar bad at ka met haduh ba ki kim tip  briew shuh.Haba kren bad uwei  u rangbah Bah B Rani ula ong, donbok ki khun ba dang rit ki la kyntait bam iatei u tit ba lait na ka  iap.Ula ong kitei ki saw ngut ki la kham khlain ia mynta tyngba ki dang hap ba leit phah sumar, namar ka  jingpang ka dang khie haduh mynta wat hadien ba ki la wan shah sumar.
title: Poi Hospital saw ngut  ba bam tit khlaw ha Jirang

content: Shillong, 09 Iaiong:Ka lympung ba laiphew (30) jong ka Seng Khihlang kan long mynta u snem ha madan Urksew, Pynursla, East Khasi Hills naduh ka 14 haduh 16 tarik Iaiong 2017.Ha kane ka lympung, yn wanrah ia ki mawbynna sahnam da ka Sein Raij Muthlong, West Jaintia Hills ryngkat ka Nguh ka Dem Blei bad ka suit ka shor. Ha kine ki lai sngi kynthih, kan don ruh ka jingiatainia, ka jing iakop rwai, ka phawar, ka jingkren da ki riew kynsai ka Seng Khasi Sein Raij bad ka jingpyni riti dustur na ki tnat seng bapher bapher ka bri u hynniew trep ban pynphalang ia ka jingshai jong ka jaitbynriew. Halor kane, ka Seng Khihlang, ka khot ka wer ia ki khun ki ksiew u hynniewtrep ban iapoi khnang sha kane ka lympung ba kyrpang, la ong ka kyrwoh na u Secretary ka Seng Khihlang.
title: 14-16 tarik ka  lympung Seng  Khihlang  ha Pynursla

content: Shillong, 9 ïaiong:Hadien ba ka la pynbna ïap ia u Vinod Khanna ka BJP ka la kynnoh kylla ba katei ka jingbakla ka dei tang na ka daw ka jingpynphriang khubor ha ki social Media. Ha ka sngi sait jaiñ jong ka taiew ka la don ka jing ialang rakhe 34 snem ka BJP ha Jhalupara bad ka la don ka prokram Swachh Bharat Abhiyan. Shuwa ban sdang katei ka prokram u General Secretary ka BJP u bah David Kharsati u la ong ba dei ban kynmaw burom shuwa ar minit ia u Vinod Khanna ( U Aktor kumjuh ruh u MP ka seng BJP na Gurdaspur, Punjab) “Shuwa ban sdang ia ka prokram ngin sngap jar 2 minit ban kynmaw burom ia u Vinod Khanna uba la khlad noh” ong u bah David ha katei ka jingialang.Katei ka dei ka jingkren ha ka jingialang kaba la donlang u National Vice President ka BJP u Avinash Rai Khanna, u Jagdamba Mall uwei na ki nongialam rangbah bad ki nongialam ka BJP na kane ka jylla.Hynrei hadien ba la ioh jingtip ba u Vinod Khanna um pat iap u bah David Kharsati u la phah kyrwoh sha ki lad pathai khubor ba katei ka jingbakla ka dei namar ka jingpynphriang khubor ha ki social media, hynrei u Vinod u dang don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar, u la kitbok kitrwiang ba un shait un khlain noh. U Vinod u la jop MP Lok Sabha ha u 2014 hadien ba u la pynliem ia u kyrtong ka seng Congress u Pratap Singh Bajwa na Gurdaspur, Punjab-mynta u don hapdeng ka jingshah sumar ha Sir HN Reliance Foundation Hospital, Mumbai.
title: Pynbna ïap ka BJP ia U Vinod Khanna, kynnoh ia ki Social Media

content: Shillong, 09 Iaiong:Ka Civil Society Welfare Organisation (CSWO) hapoh ka jing ialam ka Kong Agnes Kharshiing ka la pyrshah jur ia ka jingthmu ka bor pyniaid ka Secretariat ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly ban pynlong nongtrei pura ia ki nongtrei kontrak kumba 400 ngut eiei kiba shut hung da ki politishian khlem iakhun eksamin eiei ha ki snem ba la dep.Ha ka jingpynlait kyrwoh, ka President ka CSWO ka Kong Agnes ka la ong ba kane ka jing thmu ka dei ka jingiuhroit ia ka hok jong ki samla kiba la khlem kam khlem jam kiba don ka jingangnud ban iakhun da ka lynti kaba dei.  “Ka CSWO ka maham ia ki bor ba dei peit ba kane ka sorkar ka dei jong u paidbah bad ym dei ka iing ba la pyniaid da uwei ne ar ngut ban pynkhein ia ka ain”, la ong ka Kong Agnes.Ka la ong ba ka Finance Department ka sorkar jylla kam dei ban pynlait ia ka pisa ban siew ia ki nongtrei shipor, kiba shu pynlong nongtrei pura da ka lynti kaba beain ha ka Meghalaya Legislative Assembly Secretariat lane sha kiwei ki ophis hynrei dei ban bud ia ka Service Rule bad ia ki kam dei ban pynmih ia ka jingpynbna paidbah ban plie lad ia ki samla khlem kam ban iakhun da ka lynti kaba dei, ym ban shu thung na kyrpong iing.Ka jingthung kam shipor la leh da ka sorkar ha kiba bun bah ki tnad sorkar kiba dei tang ki briew kiba don ka jingiajan ka jingiadei bad ki politishian bad ki ophisar sorkar, da kaba pynkhein ia ki kyndon thungkam bad ka Service Rules.Ha ka jingshisha, ki tnad sorkar ki dei ban bud ia ka Service Rule bad ban pynbna ia ka ha ka Gazette ka sorkar hynrei bun ki heh sorkar ki iaid lait tang ban ioh thung kam beain. Halor kane, ka seng ka la kyntu ia ka tnad Finance, tnad ain bad ka Meghalaya Public Service Commission, ban sangeh ban pynshlur ia ka jingthungkam beain kaba dei ka jingpynkhein ia ka riti synshar ka ri kaba 14 kaba kdew ia ka hok ka jingiaryngkat ha kaba ka Parliament lane ka Assembly kam lah ban iaid lait.
title: Byrthen ka CSWO ba thmu pynlong  nongtrei pura palat 400 ngut ha Assembly

content: Shillong, 9 ïaiong:92 tylli ki masi kiba shongdor T.15 lak tyngka la ioh ban kurup na kawei ka khlaw kaba don ha Nongshken kaba hap hapoh Pynursla PS bad la ong ba kitei ki masi ki dei kiba la thmu ban khaïi tuh sha Bangladesh. Ia kitei ki masi la ioh kurup da ki shipai BSF bad ki pulit katba ki dang khynra masi khaii tuh sha Bangladesh ha katei ka thaiñ. La ong ba ki nongkhaii masi ki buhrieh ha kitei ki masi ha ki khlaw kiba rben bad ki ap ban ioh ia ka lad ban pynrung sha Bangladesh, la iathuh ruh ba ki la ioh jingtip ba ki nongkhaii masi nangne na India bad Bangladesh ki don ka jingiadei kaba ia jan bha bad ki buddien bha ia ka iaid ka ieng ki BSF ban iohlad ban pyniaid ia ki masi.
title: 92 tylli ki masi   kurup  na Nongshken

content: Shillong, 9 ïaiong:Ka FKJGP kan pynlong ia ka jingiaid Rally da ki kali ha ka 11 tarik u iaiong, katei ka rally kan sdang na Mawlai Motsyiar bad kan iaid baroh kawei ka sor Shillong bad yn pynkut pat ha Dinam Hall. Katei ka dei ka jingiaid paidbah ka FKJGP kum ka dak ka jingsdang ia ka Socio-Economic Movement. Ka kyrwoh khubor na u Eldie Newton Lyngdoh Information Secretary ka la khot ia baroh ki dkhot katei ka seng ban wan ia shim bynta lang.
title: Ka Rally kali ka FKJGP

content: Shillong,9 Iaiong:Haba la jubor ka kular bang thylliej, ki mrad ruh ki bitar bad katei ka la jia ha Jirang Kon stitwensi ha kaba la 15 snem mynta ki paidbah ki la ap khmih lynti lano kin ioh PHC, hynrei ka long lehnohei naba la shu pynbiej kai ia ki tang da ki maw nongrim elekshon.Ha kane ka sien, ka la jia ka jingjia kaba kham phylla kaba la jia ha katei ka konstitwensi ha kaba hati khlaw ruh ki nang ban bitar ia katei ka jingshah thok shah shukor ki paidbah bad la iathuh ba mynta ka sngi ka kynhun ki hati khlaw ki la leit ban kyrdem ia kitei ki mawnongrim haduh ba ki la pra hi phum.La wan thung maw nongrim la arsien ha Jirang konstitwensi ban tei PHC bad la thung ha u snem 2002 bad 2003 ha ka jaka ba la tip kum ka Sohkshang, New Jirang-Ri-Bhoi District. Ha u snem 2002 la thung da u Dr.F.A Khonglam (Bam kwai ha dwar u blei) uba dei u myntri rangbah ka jylla ha katei ka por, hadien katei sa ha u snem 2003 la wan thung da u Sayeedullah Nongrum u myntri ka koit ka khiah ha katei ka por hynrei ia kitei ki maw nongrim la shu sop soh pailen bad ym pat iohi syrngiew PHC haduh mynta ruh.
title: Kyrdem ki hati ia ki maw nongrim  U Dr.Khonglam bad U Sayeedullah

content: Shillong, 09 Iaiong:Ka Dorbar Hima Jirang ba la khot da u Syiem bad ki Myntri ha ka sngi Thohdieng ka la pulom noh hadien ba ki paidbah ki la pyrshah halor ki kynrum kynram kiba mih hapdeng u Syiem bad ka Joint Action Committee (JAC) lem bad ki Kur Wahlang phra kpoh kiba ujor pyrshah ia u Syiem u Paiem RH Wahlang.Mar ia sdang ka dorbar, la mih ka jingiatai nia ba khluit na ki paidbah bad ki la kyntu ba u Syiem ba u dei ban pynbeit shwa ia ki kynrum kynram hapoh ka Hima bad ban iasuk shwa bad ka JAC lem bad ki Kur Wahlang Phra kpoh, khnang ba yn lah ban iakren ia kiwei pat ki kam dorbar.Ki nongialam ka JAC ki la ong ba ka kam ka dang don hapoh ka District Council ban bishar ia ka kaiphod ba la ai da u observer ka KHADC uba la donlang ha ka dorbar hima  ha ka 11 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2017.Halor kane,  u Syiem ka Hima Jirang ula pynpaw ba u kloi ban iakren suk bad ka JAC  lem bad ki Kur Wahlang Phra kpoh bad pynbeit ia ki kynrum kynram hapoh ka Hima bad ki la rai ban pynlong ia ka dorbar ban iakren iasuk shwa hapdeng kitei ki ar liang mamla ha ka taiew ba khadduh mynta u bnai.U President ka JAC, Bah O Thangkhiew bad Secretary  Bah M Sangkli ki la la ong, ka JAC ka ieng skkem halor ki mat ba la dep ujor pyrshah u Syiem ia ki kam leh donbor jongu kaba la ktah ia ka riti dustur treikam ha ka it ka hima.Ki la ong, ka jingthmu jong u Syiem ban pynlong ia katei ka dorbar ka long ban tap eit miaw ia ki rai jong ka dorbar kaba long ha ka 11 tarik Kyllalyngkot, 2017 kaba la donlang da u observer ka KHADC, hynrei na ka liang ka District Council haduh mynta shu leh sngap jar bad ki paidbah ki sah ha umdum.Ki la kyntu ia ki bor ka District Council ban pyndep kloi ia ka katei ka kam na bynta ka jingiaid beit iaid ryntih ha ka synshar khadar hapoh ka it ka hima, bad kam dei ban shu sngap mynthi ia ka jingud jingnam ki paidbah.Ki la ong, ki MDC kum nongmihkhmat kiba peit ia ka bha ka miat jong u paidbah ki dei ban pyndep kloi noh bad lada ka council ka sngap jar ka paw ban ka don eiei sha lyndet, namar na ka liang u nogpeit pyrman ka Council ula dep phah ia ka kaiphod jong ka dorbar ba la dep.Ki la byrngem ba lada ka District Council kam leh eiei kim banse ban leit sha kiwei pat ki bor ba halor ka sorkar bad ka ain.U Bah Gumbris Wahlang ula pynpaw ba ka jingleh donbor u Syiem ka la pynjot pynjulor ia ka it ka hima bad ka ktah shibun ia ki khun ki hajar ka hima bad ka Kur Wahlang Phra kpoh ka kyrshan ia ka JAC kaba la iaid shakhmat ban ujor pyrshah ia u Syiem na bynta ban wanrah ia ka synshar kaba khuid ba suba ha ka hima Jirang.
title: Pulom ka dorbar U Syiem  Jirang ba pyrshah ki paidbah

content: Shillong, 10 Iaiong:U bah HS Shylla, MDC jong ka seng United Democratic Party (UDP), u kam ba ka ain Meghalaya Town & Country Planning Act 1973, ka long kaba dkoh, naduh ba la thaw ia ka, namar la shu pynkylla tang ia ka kyrteng jong ka na ka Jylla Assam, sha ka Jylla Meghalaya bad na ka snem 1959 sha ka snem 1973, hynrei ki ain baroh, ki dei kiba long thik kum ka ain 1959 jong ka Assam.”Kane ka Act 1973 ka dei ba la kha iap, ka bym lah ban treikam la ha ki jaka sor (urban areas) ne ha ki jaka nongkyn-dong (towns and country sides) namar ki dei ki Autonomous District. Kumta, ka Act 1973 kam don lyngkha-trei ha khyndew lait noh tang ban shu jngi ha ki lyoh ka Meghalaya” ong ka kyrwoh na U MDC
title: Ka ban shu jngi ha ki lyoh  ka Meghalaya: HS Shylla

content: Shillong, 10 ïaiong:U Moderator ka Presbyterian Church of India u Rev Ladawng-liana, haba kren kum u kongsan ha ka jingialang ban ai khublei khatduh (Valedictory service) ia ki samla pule Bachelor of Divinity (B.D) ka John Roberts Theological Se-minary, Mawklot Shillong ula buh ia ka jingkylli kaba khia da kaba u ong, “Haei nga don bad nga dei u ei? Ha kaba ula ong ba kane kam dei tang ia ki, hynrei wat ia ki nongialam Balang bad kumjuh ruh iaki khristan.Ula ong ba ka jingbuh ia katei ka jingkylli ka dei hadien ba kum u nongialam Balang ne wat kiwei ruh hadien ka jingbishar bniah ia ka jinglong jingman ka imlang ka sahlang, la iohi ba kam i don shuh ka jingkyrmen, lada phai sha ka jingjot jingpra ki iing ki sem, ki shnong ki thaw, da kaba u ong, “Ki iing ki sem ki jot ki pra namar ba kam don shuh ka jingieid hapdeng jongki bad ruh ba kam don ka jingniewkor ia kiwei, bad kane ka pyni shai kdar ba kum ki briew ngi pynjot bad pynsepei iala ka jingim tang na ka bynta kiei kiei ki bym don jingmyntoi.”Ka jingkylli ba mano ban leit shaki, kumta ula kyntu ia ki samla pule kiba la dep pule bad kiba dang pule hapoh kane ka shlem jinghikai ban shakri ha ka kam U Kynrad, ula ong ba kin long ka sakhi sha kiwei lyngba ka jingim ha ka doh bad khamtam ha ka jingim ba kynja mynsiem khnang ban wanrah biang ka jingkyrmen bad jingsuk ia ka imlang ka sahlang bad ka ri baroh kawei, kumba kila ioh iaki jinghikai bad jingtip lyngba kane ka jaka pule, khnang ba kin long kum kita ki shakri kiba pyndonkam ia ka sap (talent) kaba u Kynrad u ai, ym ba kin long kum u shakri uba buhrieh iala ka jong ka sap.“Ngi donkam ka jingiatreilang ban sopspaiñ sa shisien ia ka imlang sahlang kaba la duh iaka jingkyrmen lyngba ka jingling jingim kaba bha, ka jingim kaba myntoi sha kiwei bad ba ngin long ka khubor kaba bha,” ong u Rev Ladawngliana da kaba bynrap, ba kum ki samla pule BD kila ioh shibun ki jingmyntoi ha ka liang ka jingling ba shimet jongki (jingling mynsiem) ne wat ha kaba iadei bad kiwei ki bynta.Nalor kane ula kynthoh ruh ba kum ki shlem ai jinghikai ban shakri iaka kam u kynrad ki duna bha ban sei shisha kita ki shakri ki ban don iaka jingling mynsiem, ka jinglong kaba bha bad ka jingmyntoi sha kiwei, namar ka imlang ka sahlang ka donkam ia ki ba kin long ka jingkylla.Ha kane ka sngi na ka liang u President ka Governing Body ka JRTS u Rev T.Mukhim ula ai ia ki Certificate sha ki 40 ngut ki samla kynthei bad shynrang kiba la dep ban pule iaka Bachelor of Divinity (B.D) bad ruh sha ki ba puyndep iaka Lay Leadership. Katba na ka liang u Tbn.T.L Rapmai ula buh ka jingduwai kaba kyrpang na ka bynta kitei ki samla ba kin nang kiew shaphrang ha kaba ban ai ka jingshakri ia ka kam U Kynrad.Ha kane ka sngi ka kong L.Lyngdoh Ex-Secretary Jingiaseng Kynthei KJP Assembly kala pyllait paidbah ruh iaka Seminary Magazine. Nalor kitei ki prokram la pyniphuh iphieng lyngba ka jingrwai kaba kyrpang na ki samla pule B.D.Ha kane ka sngi la iadon ryngkatlang ki nongialam ba hakhlieh ka PCI, ki Pastor ka KJP Assembly, KJP Synod Mihngi, KJP Synod Sepngi, ki Nonghikai ka JRTS, ki kmie ki kpa, kiba ha iing hasem jong ki samla ba pyndep iaka jingpule B.D, bad kiwei kiwei.
title: “Haei nga don bad nga dei u ei” kylli  U Ladawngliana ia ki samla pule B.D

content: Shillong, 10 Iaiong:Ki nonghikai skul hapoh ka lama ka Joint Action Committee of All Teachers Meghalaya (JACATAM), kin pynlong ia ka jingshong shah thngan ha ka 12 tarik Iaiong, 2017 naduh ka por 11 baje mynstep ha khmat ka ophis All India Radio, kaba don hajan ka khyrdop ka iing u Lat ka jylla.Kane ka jingshah thngan ka long hadien ba ka sorkar jylla kam shym la ai khubor eiei sha ka JACATAM halor ka jingkular jong u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma ha iing dorbar dang shen ban pynkiew tulop 100 percent ia baroh ki nonghikai Adhoc ha ka jylla jong ki primary bad upper primary skul.“Namar ba ka sorkar ha ka jingialang ka cabinet kam shym la rai ban pynkiew tulop 100 percent ia ki nonghikai adhoc kumba la kular u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma ha iing dorbar dangshen, ka JACATAM kam banse ban iaid shakhmat ban pynlong ia ka jingiakhih da kaba shah thngan”, la ong u Publicity Secretary ka JACATAM u Babu Kular Khongjirem.U Babu Khongjirem u la ong ba baroh ki dkhot jong ka JACATAM kin iashim bynta ha kane ka jingshah thngan.Lah ban kdew ba ka JACATAM ha ka jingialang ha u bnai ba la dep, ka la rai ban ap haduh ka 11 tarik Iaiong 2017 ia ka jingkular jong u Myntri Rangbah u Dr Mukul Sangma ban pynkiew tulop 100 percent ia baroh ki nonghikai skul adhoc ha ka jylla kumba u la kular ha ka iing dorbar dang shen.
title: Bym jubab ka sorkar, 12 tarik yn shah thngan ka JACATAM

content: Jowai, 10 Iaiong:Uwei u briew u la shah pyniap ha uwei pat u paralok hapoh iing ka kmie jong u hadien ba utei u paralok u la wan kai bad mih ka jingiakajia hapdeng jong ki ar ngut.Katei ka la jia ha ka 8 tarik une u bnai ha ka dong Madan-Laban jong ka shnong Khonshnong kaba hap ha Garampani Police Outpost, Jowai Police Station.Katkum ki pulit na Garampani, ki la iathuh ba ha ka miet 8 tarik une u bnai ha ka por kumba 10 baje eiei, u Rangbah shnong katei ka shnong, u ma Phulbi Passah u la pyntip sha ki pulit ba ka la don ka jingiahylla bad iashoh iadat hapoh kawei ka iing jong ka kong Bhalang Papeng bad haba ki pulit ha ryngkat ki VDP ka shnong ki la wan poi bad rung hapoh katei ka iing ki la lap pynban ia ka metiap jong uwei u briew u ba la tip kyrteng kum u Paitlang Suchiang kaba la thiah lyngktar ha kamra shetja.Hadien kane na ka liang u Rangbah ha ryngkat ki pulit ki la pynlong ia ka jingtohkit bad la lap ba u khun phrangsngi katei ka kong Bhalang Papeng uba kyrteng u Rimiki Papeng ula pyniap ia utei u Paitlang Suchiang.Ia utei u Rimiki Papeng la kem noh da ki pulit bad ka jingtohkit ka dang iaid shakhmat pyrshah ia u. Na ka liang ki pulit ki la register mukotduma ruh pyrshah ia u.
title: Shah pyniap ha u paralok ha Madan Laban

content: Shillong, 10 Iaiong:Ka BJP Youth wing Amlarem Mandal ka la pynlong ia ka prokram ai jinghikai shaphang ka Bhim App ka rukom thep pisa sei pisa da kaba pyndonkam lyngba ki Android phone ne smart phone khlem pyndonkam pisa ha kane ka sngi Saitjain ba la dep.Kane ka dei kawei na ki polisi ba la wan rah da ka sorkar kmie hapoh ka nongialam u Myntri Rangbahduh ka ri u Narendra Modi kum kawei na ka lad ban pynsuk iaki paidbah haka liang ka iadie iathied bad ka shim ka ai pisa da ka buit stad mynta. Kane ka polisi ka dei kawei na ka buit ban khanglad iaka bamsap bampong.Ha kane ka sngi ka BJYM ka la ai jinghikai iaki samla bad ki nongshong shnong ka thain Amlarem ha Emanuel Pohshna Hall Amlarem ha kaba u Samla Egenstar kurkalang u long kum u kongsan ban ai jinghikai bad la ioh jingkren na Bah Marki Mulieh MDC, u Bah Lam salanki Pariat State Secretary BJP Meghalaya bad kiwei.
title: Ai jinghikai ka BJP ha Amlarem

content: Shillong, 10 ïaiong:Ka jingdheng kali mynta ka sngi ha Upper Shillong, ka la long jan baroh shisngi, ha ka por mynsngi ka jingdheng kali ka la sdang tang na 7 mer shaduh 5 mer, hynrei ha ka por janmiet ka la nang jrong bad dei ha ka por ba la kem dum artad naduh ka por 6 baje eiei ba ka la jubor palat. Ka la shim por haduh 3 kynta ban iaid lynti na 7 mer sha 4 mer. Une u nongthohkhubor u dang iaid lynti na 7 mer ban leit sha 4 mer u la mih na 7 mer ha ka por 6 baje janmiet bad u la poi sha 4 mer haduh 9:15 minit baje mynmiet.Ka daw jong katei ka jing dheng kali ka la mih namarba ka don ka jingsiang rong na 7 mer ter ter kaba la dang poi mynta ha Air Force. Ka jingdheng kali kaba kham sharum pat ka la mih namar ka jingiatynruh ki kali bad nalor nangta ka la don ka jingiaid ki trok kiba la kit jingkit khia. Katei ka jingbun kali mynta ka miet ka dei ruh namar ba ki don bunbah ki kali kiba dang wan phai na ka Shad Weiking.
title: 3 kynta na 7 mer sha 4 mer,  dheng kali ha Upper Shillong

content: Shillong, 10 Iaiong:Ka Shad Suk Mynsiem kaba 106 jong ka Seng Khasi Mawkhar Shillong kaba lai sngi kynthih ka la kut mynta ka sngi ha madan shad Weiking, Jaiaw kumba ju long man u snem. Mynta u snem, ki don baroh 1028 ngut ki nongshad kynthei bad shynrang kiba la iashim bynta ha kane ka sngi kut jong ka shad. Ki nongshad shynrang ki kham bun kata baroh ki don 547 ngut katba ki nongshad kynthei ki don 481 ngut.Kumba ju long man u snem, ki nongshad naduh khynnah haduh ki rangbah ki la iashim bynta shitrhem ryngkat ka sur ka tangmuri, ki ksing ki dhah, kum shi bynta ban pyni ia ka riti dustur jong u khun Khasi Khara. La sdang ia kane ka shad ha ka por 1 baje nohphai sngi da kaba sdang naduh ing seng Khasi na Mawkhar shaduh lympung shad Weiking.Lah ban kdew ba shwa ban pynlong ia kane ka shad, ar taiew shwa la pynlong ia ka jingpyrta da kaba sdang ia ka jingtem bom tem ksing ha ing seng ha Mawkhar kum ka dak ban pynkynmaw ïala ki para kur ki para kha ban pynkhreh naka bynta ban ïashim bynta sha ka Shad Suk Mynsiem.Ha ka sngi kut jong ka jingshad la wan sakhi lang ruh ki heh Sorkar, kynthup ka Kong Roshan Warjri, u Lat ka jylla, u Banwarilal Purohit, u Chief Justice ka Meghalaya High Court, u Justice Dinesh Maheshwari, ki riew pawkhmat ka jylla, ki President bad Secretary ki tnat ka Seng Khasi bad Seiñ Raij, ki nongïalam ka Seng Khihlang bad kiwei kiwei.Na ka liang u President ka Seng Khasi (Kmie), u Rangbah Banteilang Rumnong u la batai ïa ka jingmut jong ka jingshad, ïa ki shynrang la pynshad na sharud jong ka jylli namar ba u long u nong ker nong da bad ïa ki kynthei pat la pynshad hapdeng jong ka jylli kaba thew ba kadei ka nong ri nong sumar bad ka nong kdup nong pynbha, wat la ïa ka Ri Khasi la ju kheiñ ka Ri tip briew tip Blei hynrei u la pynpaw ïa ka jing bynñiaw ïa ka jingjur ki kam thom bor pyrshah ïa ki kynthei.U la ong, “Kum ki Khasi ngi dei ban tip ïa ka burom ka akor bad ban kynmaw ban im tip briew tip Blei khnang ban lait na ka jingsniew jong ka pyrthei ha kane ka juk kaba mynta”, u la ïathuh ruh ba na ka liang ka Seng Khasi ka ju maham tyngeh bad ai jinghikai ïa ki khun ki kti ban lait na ki jingsniew ka pyrthei.
title: Shim bynta 1028 ngut ki nongshad  kynthei, shynrang ha madan Weiking

content: Shillong, 10 Iaiong:Ka jingiakop thei bha briew jong ka ‘Mrs South Asia, India 2017’ kan long ha New Delhi, ha ka 22 tarik bad kan kut ha ka 25 tarik mynta u bnai, ha kaba ia ka jylla Meghalaya yn mih khmat da ka kong Sabina Parves Warjri. Ki nongiashim bynta baroh kiba la shah jied ki don haduh 28 ngut.Ka kong Sabina Parves Warjri kaba dei ruh ka Miss Shillong, kan mih khmat ia ka jylla Meghalaya ha kane ka rynsan jingiakop thei bha briew bad lada ka jop ha kane ka jingiakop kan long ka nongmih khmat ia ka Ri India ha ka jingiakop bad kiwei pat ki Ri jong ka pyrthei. Ka kong Sabina ka ai khublei ia ki dkhot jong ka Board jong ki Director kiba la ibit ia ka ban mih khmat ha kane ka jingiakop.Ka phang pdeng jong kane ka jingiakop ka long ban ai bor ia ki kynthei bad ban pynneh pynsah ia ka mariang. Ka la ong ba ka la ia don bynta ha ki kam thung dieng bad ka la juh leit ban jngoh ruh ia ki tymmen ki kro kiba sah ha ki jaka ri ia ki tynmen ha kane ka nongbah bah, ha kaba ka ong “Nga pang ka mynsiem ba iohi ba ki kmie ki kpa ki shah ieh ha ka jinglong tynmen”.La ong ba kane ka jingiakob kam dei tang ba la ioh ban ia shim bynta ha ka rynsan, hynrei kaba kongsan ka dei ka thong bad ka thong ka long ban aibor ia ki riew kynthei bad ban pynneh ia ka mariang. Na ka liang jong ka kong Sabina ka kyrpad ia ki paidbah jong kane ka jylla ba kin sngew bha ban kitbok bad ai lem ka jingkyrshan ia ka ha kane ka jingiakob na ka bynta ka burom jong ka jylla bad lada ka jop kan mih khmat ia ka ri sha ki jingiakob jong ka pyrthei.Ka Irish Manju, kaba la mih khmat ia ka Ri India ha u snem 2015 ha ka jingiakop kaba kum kane ha ka rynsan jong ka pyrthei, ka la kren diaw ha kaba ka la ong ba ka Ri India kam juh ai jingkyrshan ha kaba kum kine ki jingiakop, hynrei kine ki nongleit ia shim bynta haba ki mih sha bar jong ka Ri India ki mih khmat ia ka Ri baroh kawei.
title: Yn mihkhmat ka kong Sabina ia  ka Jylla, ha ka iakob Mrs South Asia

content: Shillong, 10 Iaiong:Kum shi bynta jong ka jingpynkhreh na ka bynta ka elekshon sha ka Ing Dorbar Thawain ka ban sa wan ha u snem 2018, ka seng National People’s Party, Ri Bhoi District Committee ka la pynlong ia ka jingia-kynduh lang jong ki nongialam jong ka seng ha Jirang Constituency ha ka 8tarik u Iaiong ha ka madan ialehkai jong ka shnong Umsong.Ha kane ka jingia-lang, la wan ban iashim bynta bad pynshit pynshngain da ki hajar ngut ki nongkyrshan jong ka seng na kylleng ki shnong ki ba hap hapoh u pud u sam jong ka Jirang Constituency.Ia kane ka jingialang la pyniaid da u Bah Sranly Wahlang, u ba long ruh ha ka juh ka por u Adhoc Secretary jong ka seng na ka Western Circle jong ka Constituency.Ha kane ka jingialang la sakhi ia ka jingiadon ryngkat jong u National President ka Party, u Conrad K. Sangma, u ba long ruh u MP jong ka Lok Sabha na Tura Parliamentary Constituency ha ryngkat ka jingsynran u Dr. Charles Reuben Lyngdoh, General Secretary ka Party, State Unit bad u Bimol Saikia, uwei na ki riew rangbah ba pawkhmat na Byrnihat.Ha kane ka jingialang la ioh jingkren na kiba bun ki riew rangbah kiba pawkhmat jong ka constituency kiba kynthup ia arngut ki MLA barim jong ka Constituency, U Rev. Gerson Lyngdoh bad u Bah Snowmik Kalwing, u Bah Sevenman Roy Thangkhiew bad u Bah Wesley Doloi, ki President jong ki Unit bapher bapher bad na ki Mahila Unit jong ka party.Uwei na ki riew rangbah ka thain, u Bah Snowmik Kalwing, uba long ruh u MLA barim haba ai jingkren u la pynpaw ia ka jingkyrshan ba pura ia ka seng bad u khmihlynti ba hapoh ka jingialam jong ka seng NPP u don ka jingkyrmen ba kan don ka jingkylla ha kiba bun ki liang hapoh ka jylla baroh kawei.Ha kane ka jingialang, u Secretary jong ka seng ba peit ia ka Ri Bhoi u la pynskhem ia u Bah Wesley Doloi kum U President jong ka Western Circle bad ia u Bah Sranly Wahlang kum U Secretary jong ka Western Circle.Haba kren ha kane ka jingialang, ka Kong Wandashisha Wahlang, kawei na ki samla ba pawkhmat jong ka thain Jirang, ka la pynpaw ia ka jingthmu ban ia aireng ha kane ka Elekshon ka ban wan. Ka la ong ruh ba ka jingthmu jong ka, ka long ban shakri ia la ka dong ka thain ka ba la shah iehnoh khunswet bad kaba dang sahdien ha baroh ki liang.U MP badonburom, u Conrad K. Sangma haba kren kane ka jingialang u la ai khublei ia ki nongialam jong ka seng ha Ri Bhoi District kiba la trei shitom ban pynkhlain ia ka seng bad u la iaroh ruh ia ki rangbah jong ka Jirang Constituency kiba la wan shakhmat ban kyrshan ia ka seng ha kane ka kynti kaba mynta.U la iathuh ruh ba ki don ia ka jingkyrmen ban leh bha ha kane ka Elekson ka ban wan na ka bynta ban wanrah ia ki jingkylla ha ka Jylla hi baroh kawei. U la kynthoh ia ka jingbymkitkhlieh bad jingbym shimkhia jong u nongmihkhmat ka thain ban wanrah ia ki kam pynroi ha kane ka thain.U la pynpaw ruh ba kum ki nongmihkhmat ym dei ban don kano kano ka jingniew shilliang ia ki paidbah, hynrei ka kamram jong u Nongmihkhmat ka long ban shakri ia ki paidbah ym ba ki paidbah kin shakri ia U.U la pynkynmaw ruh ba u kpa jong u, U PA Sangma (bam kwai ha dwar U Blei)u ju sneng ju kraw ia U ban kynmaw ia ki lai tylli ki nongrim ha ka jingshakri paidbah bd kitei ki long ban tieng ia u nongbuh nongthaw khnang ban lah ban trei hok na ka bynta U paidbah.Kaba ar ka long kum ki nongmihkhmat, dei ban buh ia u paidbah ha khmat, katba ka bor bad ka shuki ki dei ban wan hadien. Kaba khatduh ka long ba ym dei ban biej ia ka tyngka pliah, hynrei dei ban ai ka jingshakari kaba bha tam na ka bynta u Paidbah. U la kynthoh ruh ia ka jingbymlerkam jong kane ka sorkar ba mynta hapoh ka jingialam U Dr. Mukul Sangma, kaba la ka ktah shikatdei eh ia ki nongshong shnong hapoh ka jylla.U la ong ruh ba kane Ka Sorkar ka dei ka Sorkar ka bymlerkam tam ha ka histori jong ka Jylla. U National President jong ka party u la pynpaw ba na ka liang jong u, u la kular ban ai ia ka jingkyrshan ba pura ia ka Kong Wandashisha Wahlang ha kane ka kynti kaba mynta bad kyrmen ruh ban kan poi sha ka thong jong ka jingjop.
title: Ka Sorkar U Mukul, ka bym  lerkam tam ha ka histori:Conrad

content: Nongstoiñ, 10 Iaiong:Kumba 13tylli ki long iing, kiba ring bording ilektrik jongka thain Riangdo, ki la pynpaw ia ka jingsngew kyndit bad sngew lyngngoh kaba jur halor ka jingshah shain kuna, ha u wei na ki ophisar jong ka tnad Meghalaya Power Distribution Corporation Ltd, wat la ki ju iai pynbiang ban siew ia ka bai bording manla u bnai sha katei ka tnad bad kaba kham sngewsih ka long ba ki la shah dain ruh da ki phew hajar tyngka bad don ruh kiba la jan kot 1 lak,da kaba ki la shah kynnoh ruh ba ka rukom ring bor ding ka jong ki ka la long kaba la shu ring tuh bad iaid lait ruh na u meter (bypass) kaba la tam ka jingshim bor ding.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta na ka liang jong ki katto katne ngut ki paidbah kiba la ngat ha katei ka apot haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor, ki la ong ba katei ka jingjia ka la jia ha ka sngi Palei jong ka taiew ba la lah ha kaba u tei u ophisar, u la wan sha ka thain Riangdo bad ruh u la leit ban rung sha ki katto katne tylli ki dukan bad ki ing briew ban jurip bad ka rukom leh jong u tei u ophisar ka long kaba khlem akor haduh katta katta, namar u la shu rung beit sha ki iing briew bad dukan kumba leit wad ia ki riew sniew bad haba ki paidbah ki pyrshang ban kylli ia ka jingthmu jong ka jingwan jurip u tei ophisar u la kren da ki ktien kiba khor bad kynhet ruh artad ia ki paidbah da kaba u la ong ba ki la ialeh tuh bad ki hap siew ia ka kuna.Uwei na ki riew rangbah jong katei ka thain uba la ngat ha katei kajuh ka apot u la ong ba ka jingwan jong u tei u ophisar ka la long kumba shu wan dawa pisa na ki paidbah namar hadien ba u tei u ophisar u la dep ban rung bad jurip sha ki katto katne ki iing bad ki dukan sa kham shiphang, ka la wan poi kawei ka kot kaba la pyni ba ki la shah dain kuna da ki phew phew hajar bad la thoh ruh ba ki la pynkhein ia ka kyndon 126/135 Indian Electricity Act 203 & Amendment Act 2007 bad yn tian bishar bad pynshitom ruh katkum katei ka ain, bad ki hap ruh ban siew dep noh ia katei ka phain hapoh ka 21 tarik mynta u bnai bad lada kim siew ka tnad kan ujor da ka ehajar.Ha kaba iadei bad katei ka bynta ki paidbah kiba la ngat ha katei ka apot mynta ka sngi ki la ialum ia ka jingialang ha ryngkat ka jingiadon lang u Sordar shnong Riangdo u bah M. Mawsor MDC ka thain, ki riew rangbah ban ia pyrkhat halor katei ka kam hapoh ka shnong Riangdo bad ha katei ka jingialang ki la pynpaw ruh ka jingpyrshah kaba jur halor katei ka jingleh jong u tei u ophisar bad ha katei ka jingialang da kawei ka jingmut, ki la ia shim ia ka rai ba da lei lei ruh kin nym siew ia katei ka kuna namar kim tip halor kano ka nongrim ba ki shah dain kuna bad khamtam katei ka kuna ka long thik kumba shu shah dawa pisa jubor bad ka jingsoi ha katei ka kot ruh ka iapher bak la bak na kawei sha kawei pat.U Sordar ka Riangdo haba iakren bad ki nongthoh khubor u la ong ba ka bor shnong ka don bad lada katei ka tnad ka lap ba ki don ki paidbah kiba leh tuh, ki dei ban pyntip lem sha ka bor shnong khnang ba ka shnong ruh kan leh ei ei ban pynshitom kum ia kita ki jait briew, hynrei katei ka jingleh jong u tei u ophisar kala iaid lait ruh na ka bor shnong, shuh shuh u la ong ruh ba jan baroh ki paidbah kiba la ngat ha katei ka apot ki ju ioh ia ka bill na u nongwan peit meter manla u bnai ha kaba ki ju siew dep ruh manla u bnai ia ka bai bording bad ia katei la pynshisha lyngba ka jingiohi ia ki bai bor ding bala siew da kitei ki paidbah manla u bai sha katei ka tnad.Katba na ka liang jong u MDC ka thain u bah Morning Mawsor u la dep ruh ban iakren bad u SDO halor katei ka bynta ban pan jingpynshai bad ha katei ka jingiakren u bah Mawsor u la iathuh ba na ka liang jong u tei u SDO u la ong ba um don jingtip ei ei halor katei ka bynta bad u la bthah ruh ia utei u nongmih khmat ba un iakren bad ki bor ba halor kiba don ha Nongbah Shillong.
title: Bun phew hajar bad jan  dap lak, shah dain kuna
